There are removable parts just like the other AT's in the series - by using the weapon set that went on sale at the same time as this figure, you can recreate the AT's of the other 3 members of the unit. In a way, this is an all purpose AT.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-03 Commando Vorct Scopedog Nolden Custom (こまんどふぉーくと すこーぷどっく のるでんかすたむ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: Finally the fabled lingerie warrior has been made into a figure!!!
description: This anime was originally released to the public as an ONA, and it was quickly accessed over 500000 times online. Fansites were even made outside of Japan. Because of this boom in popularity, a real OVA was created, but only one volume of six planned volumes was ever released. It's the mystical anime "Lingerie Soldier Papillon Rose"! The heroine with the unbelievable career, "Papillon Rose" has been sculpted into a compelling figure. She is smiling happily in a sexy costume that will enchant anyone who looks at her. Enjoy the detailed work that went into this masterpiece!
name: Papillon Rose (ぱぴよんろーぜ)
series: ランジェリー戦士パピヨンローゼ

subtitle: "Mi-Mi-Mikuru Beam!"
description: The second figure in "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figure series, Mikuru Asahina. but this time she's available in a special "Mikuru Asahina: Mikuru Beam!" version, which will only be sold through the Good Smile Online shop. She has a colored contact lens in her left eye, so now she really is about to shoot the Mikuru Beam!! Trying her best to be useful, Mikuru stands valiantly, unintentionally letting a tear loose. It's a collector's item for any Mikuru fan.
name: Mikuru Asahina: Mikuru Beam! Ver. (あさひなみくる みくるびーむ)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The silent humanoid interface.
description: The third figure in "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figure series, and the last of the three SOS Brigade girls, Yuki Nagato is finally here! She's been sculpted along with her witch's hat, mantle and magical want "Starling Inferno", just as she looked in the play "The Adventures of Mikuru Asahina". Her expressionless face is as suspicious as it is cute, which is very much like Yuki. Not to mention, that if you remove these extra, you can get Yuki in her school uniform, something any fan would want! The figure gives a completely different impression without the extras! You can enjoy both of the two versions, the "Evil Witch version" and the "School Uniform ver". A single price for twice the beauty!
name: Yuki Nagato (ながとゆき)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The 4th Figure from the "Shining Project"! The Fire Assassin.
description: Yet another figure from the "Shining Project"! The Fire Assassin Mao, released in a swimsuit to keep to the tradition! She's got an incredibly healthy looking body, as one would expect of a beast woman. She's also got supple arms and legs to boot, and she's got her characteristic cat ears. She was sculpted in a way to draw out as much charm as possible from a woman from the beast quarter. It's a reproduction of Tony's original illustration. This is a figure for fans of the game, fans of Tony, or just simply figure fans!
name: Mao (まお)

subtitle: The Roanapur Assassin, who struggles to use English.
description: From the popular serialization in Monthly Sunday Gene-X, "Black Lagoon", comes the freelance assassin Shenhua. Based off the front cover of the 4th volume, this figure has been beautifully sculpted into a true masterpiece. Displayed with thin, fine hair and a long flowing Chinese dress - which you can peek under to reveal her lovely legs. She's armed with a kukuri, which is also beautifully detailed. You'll feel her silent intent to kill underneath her calm smile.
name: Shenhua (しぇんふぉあ)
copyright: © 広江礼威・小学館/BLACKLAGOON製作委員会

subtitle: Reprinted to accompany the new addition to the series!
description: This lovely figure has been reprinted by popular demand to coincide with the new Modest Fantasy Maid version of Rider. With her long, sweeping skirt and perky pose, this figure manages to capture Rin's cheery disposition, and gives off a feeling of nobility that shines through her humble maid's outfit. Even under her skirt, this detailed rendition takes pains to recreate the feeling she gives off throughout the second Fate game. A beautiful figure and the perfect complement to the other two Fate maids.
name: Rin Tohsaka ~Precious Fantasy Maid Version~ (とおさかりん もうそう たからかなめいどへん)

subtitle: The newest PSE product is here!
description: The front cover illustration for the June 2002 volume of Kairakuten Magazine has been sculpted into a figure! The sculpted design was created with cooperation from the original illustrator Murata-sensei.
name: ribbon style (りぼんすたいる)

subtitle: The Deathscythe, Kira's image item has been made into a silver accessory!
description: The symbol of Shinigami Light, Kira's Deathscythe from the mega-hit anime Death Note is now a silver accessory brought to you by Good Smile. The latest in the lauded high-quality sterling silver jewellery collection, this cast silver piece is the spitting image of the real thing, but in a convenient size perfect for a stylish necklace. Any fan of Death Note should take note of this spetacular product!
name: Kira's Deathscythe Pendant (きらのですさいずぺんだんと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: A heart-warming story told in a rural town
description: Hayami Kohinata, a heroine in the popular PC game H2O ~ Footprints in the Sand, comes to you courtesy of Good Smile! This classic beauty with long, dark hair is usually unsociable and a little bit mean, but all that is really just a front which conceals her true, kind nature. Her form-fitting dress and hairpin, which holds great sentimental value to her, really illustrate this hidden gentle side, and the expert sculpting surounds her with a truly extraordinary atmosphere.
name: Hayami Kohinata (こひなた はやみ)

subtitle: 33cm tall! A large soft vinyl figure of this loveable character!!
description: Even though the anime ended in 2003, "Please! Twins" is still popular. From that hit series comes two large soft vinyl figures of the main characters, "Miina Miyafuji" and "Karen Onodera", both standing an impressive 33cm in height! Karen Onodera is a modest, mature girl. Even in this huge size she still feels composed. Her uniform is also mode from soft vinyl, and can be removed. She's just as cute when she's standing in her panties... When you have both of them, why don't you try recreating a scene of the two at school together?
name: Karen Onodera Soft Vinyl Figure (おのでらかれん そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: The second Ikkitousen figure based on illustrations by Shiozaki-sensei!
description: From February an anime series of "Ikkitousen" will start to air. This series of figures has been based off original illustrations by the creator of the series - Yuji Shiozaki-sensei. This is Ryomou Shimei, the second figure in the series. This "Blue Nurse Ver." is a repeat version of the limited edition figure that was sold in Comic Gum magazine, but this version will be sold via normal retail sales. She has been sculpted twisting her body whilst slashing her sword vigorously. Every single crease in the nurse uniform had a tonne of attention put into it. The Kanu figure for this series will be released soon after this one, so complete your collection with all three of the figures!
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Ryomou Shimei (Blue Nurse Ver.) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん りょもうしめい（ぶるーな)

subtitle: Slay evil immediately!! The platoon commander of the 3rd division - Lieutenant Alice!!
description: Heroine of the hit TV series Pumpkin Scissors and commander of the 3rd reconnaisance regiment, Alice L Malvin stands ready to defeat the wicked and defend the innocent! Wearing her signature uniform and holding a double-edged blade, one can almost feel this aristocratic soldier's passion as she works to rebuild her war-torn nation. Knife at her hip and sculpted with great attention to detail, she seems to urge all around her "Come with me if you have the courage!"
name: Alice. L. Malvin (ありす・L・まるう゛ぃん)
copyright: © 2006　岩永亮太郎・講談社／イズミプロジェクト

subtitle: I'll protect my master, who saved my life!
description: From the popular series "Himawari" comes the main character, Himawari Hinata - the first figure from the series! Her willpower won't lose to anybody else. Using okama's original illustration as a basis, a delightfully happy figure collecting persimmons has been sculpted. You'll feel the happiness by just looking at it - the smile on this figure is that amazing.
name: Himawari Hinata (ひなたひまわり)
copyright: © GoDo/「ひまわりっ！」製作委員会

subtitle: The living legend who is said to be a super ace. His name is Vorct.
description: Currently being serialized in Hobby Japan is an original story "Armoured Trooper Votoms: Commando Vorct"; together with the "Rane Custom" comes the legendary super ace Commander Vorct's favorite AT, the "Vorct Custom". Equipped with a large antenna for long range communication, as well as a custom booster rocket placed on the legs, the main feature of this AT is its improved mobility. It's equipped with a heavy machinegun. All removable parts can be used with other machines in the 35MAX series.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-02: Commando Vorct Scopedog: Vorct Custom (こまんどふぉーくと すこーぷどっく ふぉーくとかすたむ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: Earning him his nickname of "Wheel Of Flames", comes the young ace Captain Rane's Custom AT!
description: 23 years have passed since the TV series aired. Currently being serialized in Hobby Japan is an original story "Armoured Trooper Votoms: Commando Vorct" - from this story comes the main character's favorite AT, the "Rane Custom" to join the 35MAX series. Based off the mass-produced Scopedog, but with custom improvements to the chest and visor, it became a personal custom model. It's armed with a special machine gun with joint magazines. All removable parts can be used with other machines in the 35MAX series.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-01 Commando Vorct Scopedog Rane Custom (こまんどふぉーくと すこーぷどっく れーんかすたむ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: It shines! The alloy model loaded with a lighting system is here!
description: From the high quality EX Alloy series that brought you Getter Robo, comes the mascot character from "Ghost in the Shell" - the AI Walker "Tachikoma". His design was based on the Tachikoma from "Ghost in the Shell S.A.C 2nd GIG". Both manipulator arms as well as all four legs have ball joints for posing, even the eye balls can be moved, allowing for various cute scenes to be reproduced. On the back pod a lighting system has been added, which lights up using LED lights. As far as weapons go, he is equipped with a the grenade launcher can be switched for a heavy machinegun. The model has been created using 60% alloy, enjoy its heavy, realistic feeling!
name: EX Alloy Tachikoma (えくすごうきん たちこま)
series: Ghost in the Shell S.A.C. 2nd GIG
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The cupid that came from the future to intervene.
description: The second figure in "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figure series, Mikuru Asahina. Coming from "The Adventures of Mikuru Asahina" comes the "fighting waitress" sculpted beautifully by prototype sculptor Chieri. In her slightly embarrassing "Mikuru Beam!" pose, she looks like she is about to burst into tears. If she were displayed next to super-director Haruhi with her megaphone, it would make a perfect scene. It's a figure that truly captures Mikuru's personality.
name: Mikuru Asahina (あさひなみくる)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: I'll cross over the Grand Stream, as my father always dreamed to.
description: From Last Exile, the story of war and class struggle in the open sky, comes Klaus' vanship, the small aircraft he uses to pursue his father's dream of crossing the Grand Stream, a mysterious, persistent storm which turns back all who attempt to conquer it. His most prized posession and sole inheritance from his father, his vanship sees him through the myriad struggles and pain he encounters while caught up in events much larger than himself.

This expertly sculpted model is so detailed, it looks as though it might fly off at any moment. Even the gauges and foot pedals are perfectly reproduced, and the included figures of Klaus and Lavi can of course sit in their respective cockpits. This is truly an essential part of a Last Exile fan's collection.
name: Klaus' Vanship (う゛ぁんしっぷ くらうすき)

subtitle: The "Please! Twins" are coming as large soft vinyl figures!
description: Even though the anime ended in 2003, "Please! Twins" is still popular, and from that hit series comes two large soft vinyl figures of the main characters, Miina Miyafuji and Karen Onodera, both standing an impressive 33cm in height! Miina Miyafuji is a bright, lively girl... and in a figure of this size, that liveliness doubles! Her uniform is also made from soft vinyl and can be removed. She's just as cute when she's standing in her panties... When you have both of them, why don't you try recreating a scene of the two at school together?
name: Miina Miyafuji Soft Vinyl Figure (みやふじみいな そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Sorry for making you wait! Master!! I'm here!!
description: From Max Factory who brought you the "Sakura Wars Heroine Figure Collection Series", comes the long awaited "Sakura Shinguji" figure. Using the package illustration on the PS2 version of "Sakura Wars ~In Hot Blood~" Sakura has been sculpted in her well-known hakama. She is a disciple of the Hokushin Itto style of swordplay. Great care has been taken to keep the image that fans have of Sakura, who has always been a heroine in the long running series. What do you think of her dignified, beautiful pose?
name: Sakura Shinguji (しんぐうじさくら)

subtitle: A huge, sexy bunny girl! Re-released due to popularity!
description: The last of FREEing's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny Series is finally here with the release of Ryouko Asakura, and in addition to that, the SOS Brigade's mascot Mikuru Asahina has also been re-released due to public demand! Sculpted as a 1/4 scale figure, leaves her with an overwhelming presence. Her body is gorgeous, and she looks embarrassed, just as Mikuru should be in that kind of outfit. She's wearing realistic net tights - they even feel like the real thing. If you haven't bought her yet, then now is your chance to complete your collection of girls!
name: Mikuru Asahina Bunny Ver. (あさひなみくる ばにーばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Leave her in your room, and appreciate the punishment!
description: From the popular adult game released in 2004, "Taisen Hot Gimmick 3: Digital Surfing" comes a figure of Novia! The garage kit that was released by Cerberus Project at events has now been sculpted into a PVC figure. The character designer behind this masterpiece is the hugely popular Mine Yoshizaki. It's both colorful and cute, not to mention the breasts and legs have transparent parts, making for a very erotic costume. Using a mahjong tile as as a basis, a very sci-fi design has been reproduced, and the erotic pose she has taken by holding her hair up simply pulls her charm out even further.
<!-- お仕置き鑑賞 seems to refer to a mode in the game, may be lost on many people (including me...) -->
name: Novia (のーびあ)

subtitle: The long awaited new Guyver series! Here is one of the 12 Zoalords, Purg'stall!
description: Introducing one of the twelves Zoalords, Purg'stall!, from the BF-MAX "Guyver: The Bioboosted Armor" series! It has the power to call thunderclouds, and manipulate thunder at will. Specifications that were never drawn by the original author "Yoshiki Takaya" were used to bring out even more charm to the design. The ability to reproduce scenes goes even deeper with the included "Lightning Drive" made from clear plastic, not to mention the ability to unequip and reequip the mantle and armour. We're sorry you had to wait to get it, but we know you'll be happy with the finished product.
name: Zoanoid Purg'stall (ぷるくしゅたーる)

subtitle: I want to protect you... even if I destroy my own body.
description: The popular garage kit created by Orchid Seed of "Witchblade - Masane" was only ever sold at events, but now it’s become a PVC figure by the hands of Good Smile Company! Sculpting was done by the well-known Satoshi Ishiyama, and his work really is an amazing sight. The breasts and hip area in particular are an absolute must see! The blade she is thrusting into the heavens and her long flowing hair surrounding her body give the figure an amazing sense of volume. You would never have seen this degree of exposure during the TV series! This is the sexy body armour version, and it's on sale now!
name: Witchblade - Masane (ういぃっちぶれいど・まさね)
copyright:
© 2006　Top Cow Productions, Inc. ・GONZO／CBC・GDH・SPWT All rights reserved.
Witchbladeは、Top Cow Productions, Inc.の米国登録商標です。

subtitle: This perky underclassman is always thinking pervy thoughts.
description: Here we have Mao Shinjoji, the cheeriest and most energetic character from Front Wind's PC game Boy Meets Girl, in a beautiful sculpt based on an illustration by popular artist Shintarou for this very purpose. The illustrator also participated directly in the prototyping process, to ensure that the end product conformed perfectly to his vision. The result is a vibrant, smiling rendition of this stunning girl running along in her typical fashion. Her friend and upperclassman Haruna Kasugano is scheduled for release, and complements Mao's figure nicely
name: Mao Shinjoji (しんぐうじまお)

subtitle: The new novel series "To Aru Majutsu no Index" has a new accessory!
description: Set in a world where magic and science coexist, the light novel series To Aru Majutsu no Index, published by Dengeki Books, has garnered much acclaim for its fascinating characters and unique feel. Now, the Black Magic Project, a collaboration between Good Smile and the publisher, brings you a new entry in the Good Smile silver accessory series in the form of this cross pendant. Worn by the main heroine, Index, and appearing in the first novel, this signature cross is designed by illustrator Kiyotaka Haimura and is certain to impress.
name: Index's Cross Pendant (いんでっくすのくろすぺんだんと)
series: To Aru Majutsu no Index (A Certain Magical Index)

subtitle: The wind rides on the scent of the budding meadows.
description: "Kaze no Ushiro Ayumumono", one of the charming girls from Nitroplus' popular adult game "Jingai Makyou" has been sculpted as a PVC figure. The figure was sculpted by Satoshi Toda, who put his heart into this work, as a true Nitroplus fan. The most defining point of this figure is her bottom! The garage kit that gained popularity at events has been released as this PVC figure with a few changes, such as the pocket and thigh areas. It's the first product being sold as a joint effort between Solid Theater and Good Smile Company. Please buy it when you get the chance!
name: Kaze no Ushiro wo Ayumumono (かぜのうしろをあゆむもの)

subtitle: The egotistical, flat-chested vampire.
description: The second in the "Renkin 3-kyu Magical? Pokahn" figure series, following Yuuma, comes the long awaited tsundere vampire "Pakira". She has a bit of a complex over her flat chest, but her body's curves are magnificent, and her sexy pose is enchanting. Her characteristic hair and clothes are both beautifully sculpted, and the coffin stand is also a wonderful addition. Also includes the new "POLO system", if you're not sure what parts use the POLO system, you'll find out once you've bought it...
name: Pakira (ぱきら)
copyright: © 2005 がらくたはうす/まじぽか團

subtitle: A slightly mysterious, rainbow colored first love story.
description: Based on Unison Shift and Itou Noguchi's game, the TV anime Nanatsuiro Drops is a light-hearted story of magic and first love. Sumomo is normally a timid girl, but in order to return her beloved plush goat, Yuki-chan, to his human form, she willingly fights to collect the mystical Stardust Drops. This delightful rendition, in which Sumomo hugs Yuki-chan to her chest with a sincere smile, is certain to give even the most jaded collector a warm, fuzzy feeling deep down.
name: Sumomo Akihime (あきひめ すもも)

subtitle: No prison can contain Tsumami!!
description: From the newly released hit children's book come two beetle friends, the titular Kuwagata Tsumami and her friend Joshi-chan, in Nendoroid form. Tsumami's horns are articulated, and can be positioned to your liking, and both adorable figures are optimal for desktop display. They're eager to make new friends, and are on sale now!
name: Nendoroid Kuwagata Tsumami & Joshi-chan (くわがたつまみ＆じょしちゃん ねんどろいど)

description: Sabar fantasy:lovely Maid
name: Sabar fantasy:lovely Maid (せいばー うるわしのめいどふくへん)

subtitle: Are you going to wind me up, or not?
description: Shinku, heroine of both the manga and anime versions of Rozen Maiden, finally makes her first appearance as a pre-assembled PVC figure! Tall and proud, her blonde hair pulled back in two ponytails, she features impressive detail, especially on her frilly dress and rose-shaped pedestal. A perfect representation in both appearance and attitude, Shinku cuts an imposing figure, especially when displayed with her included mirror.
name: Shinku (しんく)
copyright: © PEACH-PIT・幻冬舎コミックス/薔薇乙女製作委員会

subtitle: GiMABOX
description: Gima Tomotats, the Okinawan artist whose work has been making waves as far away as New York, has partnered with Good Smile to bring you three limited edition figures of his own design, the Gimadog, Gimarobo, and Gimakuma.

The Gimadog could be called artist Gima Tomotats' life's work, and this figure certainly impresses with its pure white color scheme, adorable smiling face, and stock-straight tail. Replace the included collar in order to make this Gimadog your very own!
name: GiMADOG (ぎまどっく)

subtitle: The handcuffs that chained Kira and L, now in charm form!
description: As the Death Note TV series delves deeper into its intricate plot, Good Smile brings you the second in our Death Note charm series, this time of the handcuffs that bind L and Kira together. These handcuffs renewed the troubled relationship that Kira and L share, and can be worn not just as a collectible item but as a fashionable accessory. Together with our previous Death Note charm, it's a worthy part of any stylish ensemble.
name: Kira and L's Handcuffs Charm (きらとえるのてじょうちゃーむ)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: MisaMisa's fashionable trademark, now in silver!
description: As the Death Note TV series' epic battle between Kira and L finally comes to its close, Good Smile brings you the third in its accessory series, this time based on the cross which Misa, the heroine, always carries about her neck. This adorable accessory is quite in keeping with Misa's gothic lolita style, and is imprinted with the series' logo in its reverse, making it a perfect complement for any Death Note fan's ensemble.
name: Misa's Cross Choker (みさのくろすちょーかー)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Gimabox
description: Gima Tomotats, the Okinawan artist whose work has been making waves as far away as New York, has partnered with Good Smile to bring you three limited edition figures of his own design, the Gimadog, Gimarobo, and Gimakuma.

These large, brightly colored figures are certain to brighten any room. These figures are limited to 100 pieces each, and are each printed with their serial number. Which number will you get? Find out when you get your own, and be sure to take good care of it!
name: GiMAROBO (ぎまろぼ)

subtitle: GiMABOX
description: Gima Tomotats, the Okinawan artist whose work has been making waves as far away as New York, has partnered with Good Smile to bring you three limited edition figures of his own design, the Gimadog, Gimarobo, and Gimakuma.
This big bear looks awfully confused, having put on a shirt but neglected the pants. What does this silly fellow have his eyes on now?
*On the artist's request, a part of the clothing has been changed. Thank you for your understanding.
name: GiMAKUMA (ぎまくま)

subtitle: Celebrating Miyazawa Mannequins' 60 year anniversary, this special edition is limited to 600 pieces!
description: A color swap of the Mina Majikina figure which went on sale a month ago, this limited edition is distributed solely by Miyazawa Mannequins, and is limited to only 600 pieces! Don't miss your chance to pick one up!
name: Mina Majikina: Miyazawa Mannequins Special Limited Edition (まじきな みな みやざわもけいげんていばーじょん)
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE 2003　© 2003 Yuki Enterprise
※「サムライスピリッツ」は株式会社ＳＮＫプレイモアの登録商標です。
※「サムライスピリッツ零」は株式会社ＳＮＫプレイモアの許諾を受けて株式会社悠紀エンタープライズが開発するものです。

subtitle: This gorgeous class rep. is the third of AT-G's V.I.P figures!
description: Based on an illustration by popular artist Tatsuki Amadzuyu, The V.I.P series continues with Manaka Komaki, a class representative from To Heart2. Well, second in command, actually, but that's neither here nor there. Depicting Manaka combing her hair with a hair band between her smiling lips, this figure manages to capture a single, perfect moment from her carefree morning as depicted in Mr. Amadzuki's signature style. Displayed with Lucy and Konomi, the previous two V.I.P figures, Manaka is sure to add a healthy dose of cute to any room.
name: Manaka Komaki (こまき まなか)

subtitle: Fear Haruhi's power! Who thought she would go this far?!
description: The figure was re-released in February, April, and June, but the demand was so great she's coming back for a 4th release! Scheduled to release in December 2007, this is the ultimate Haruhi figure! Don't miss this chance!
name: Haruhi Suzumiya (すずみやはるひ)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Major~! We've been made into soft vinyl figures!!
description: FEWTURE MODELS has taken all the attenton around the popular anime "Ghost in the Shell S.A.C" and sculpted "Tachikoma" into a soft vinyl figure! In a strained atmosphere, he's sometimes carefree, he's sometimes philosophical, and he'll give you a heart warming feeling when you see him. It's the mascot of Public Security Section 9! His two manipulator arms and four legs all have joints in them, allowing you to recreate scenes from the anime itself. He spans a great 24cm, and is also pretty tall. You can display him all over the place! How about recreating the information parallelization scene?!
name: Tachikoma Soft Vinyl Figure (たちこま そふびふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The  Ikkitousen figure series based on illustrations by Shiozaki-sensei!
description: The popular series "Ikkitousen" which is currently being serialized in Gum Magazine and is scheduled to air as an anime in February, is spanning across all kinds of media. The original creator of the series, Yuji Shiozaki-sensei, has drawn original illustrations to be sculpted into figures. These figures are a different color to the figures that were sold via magazine mail order, and will be sold in normal retail stores. The first figure in the series is of the main heroine Sonsaku Hakufu. She's sculpted with her cute smiling face, holding her weapon "Houtengeki" which is lined with dragon ornaments. Her socks are also lined with a dragon design. This is one series that is going to leave a long lasting influence. The figures of Ryomou Shimei and Kanu Unchou will also be sold in different color versions. If you're an Ikkitousen fan, this is one collection you've got to get!
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Sonsaku Hakufu (Pink Maid Ver.) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん そんさくはくふ（ぴんくめ)

subtitle: I will become a beast. The sci-fi masterpiece finally has a figure based on it!
description: An anime of the sci-fi manga series created by Natsumi Itsuki, "Jyu-Oh-Sei", has been created by Bones, the animation studio with many great successes behind it. The main character is voiced by Kouichi Doumoto, which attracted a lot of attention to the series. beagle aspiringly brings you a beautiful figure of that main character, "Thor" who has been left with a cruel fate, and struggles to live on. There are many fans who will want this pose of Thor, his eyes are reflecting his wishes to live on, as he sits peacefully staring ahead. The figure is sculpted out of a material called polyregen, which gives it a strong presence that accurately expresses the outlook of the "Jyu-Oh-Sei" world. Be sure to take one home with you!
name: Thor (とーる)
copyright: © 1993,2006 INA,Inc./白泉社/獣王星製作委員会

subtitle: I'll show you my magic~♪
description: Here we have a beautiful rendition of Arin, the mage girl from the popular Korean online game Super Swing Golf Pangya. Arin graduated from her magic school at the top of her class, and using that ability she decided to enter the Pangya tournament, along with her mascot and caddy Ponta, who stands at her side. This figure is expertly sculpted to show her poise and balance, as well as her fierce determination to get on the green, as she readies for as shot with her driver.
name: Arin (ありん)
copyright: © 2004～2006 Ntreev Soft Co., Ltd. & Hanbit Soft Inc. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A Victorian Romance ~ the ultimate maid has arrived.
description: The end of the 19th century, England. The romance manga "Emma" is a story set in Lake Victoria, London, which focuses on the love between a maid and a nobleman, and the troubles they face due to status differences, The second anime series has just been announced, and once again we see the heroine of the show "Emma" being sculpted into a figure! The apron and dress have both been sculpted using the high level of skill at Max Factory. The trademark glasses were made using engraved parts. This work of art comes with a red carpet stand and much more to gaze at. It truly is a masterpiece.
name: Emma (えま)

subtitle: Celebrate! An anime version has been announced! A re-release in celebration!
description: The popular serialization "Kodomo no Jikan", published in COMIC HIGH (Futabasha Publishers), has had an anime version announced! To celebrate, Max Factory is re-releasing the "COLLECT800 Kodomo no Jikan" trading figures that were released in January 2007. The figures will be released in November 2007 to coincide with the release of the anime series! The three classmates: the heroine "Rin Kokonoe", her best friend "Kuro Kagami" and "Mimi Usa" are all in the collection. For people who haven't managed to collect them all yet, this is your chance to get them all.
name: COLLECT800 Kodomo no Jikan (こどものじかん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル/こどものじかん製作委員会

subtitle: The ultimate AT, with it's shoulder dyed blood red!! Released as a limited edition!
description: Introducing the "Red Shoulder Custom" as part of the 35MAX series. This is the second model from the LM Series that will only have a limited quantity made. In the Uoodo storyline, Chirico customized a scopedog into a heavy-armed type custom AT so that he could break though the Peace Police's defense network. His original design featured a SMM missile launcher, a Gatling gun, a rocket launcher, a solid shooter and a custom backpack, all of which has been faithfully recreated. All removable parts can be used with other machines in the 35MAX series. You only have one chance to get your hands on this LM series!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES Limited Edition LM-02 Scopedog Red Shoulder Custom (すこーぷどっくれっどしょるだーかすたむ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: God shall exact judgement... is the meaning behind this ultimate armour's name.
description: As part of Max Factory's "Gun X Sword" series, we finally see the mysterious, strongest armour piloted by the main character Van, "Dann of Thursday" made into a figure. The invincible armour which Van calls from Endless Illusion's satellite has been made into a full action figure by Max Factory. Prototype sculptor Takeshi Hamasaki has used his skill as a figure modeller to make an excellently sculpted model, while still leaving it as poseable as possible. Because of this poseability, it's possible to place the figure in various positions - many of the scenes from the anime can be resurrected. It really is a masterpiece that any fan can't help but buy.
name: Full Action MAX: Dann of Thursday (だん)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Takeshi Hamasaki)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

description: A compelling 1/5th scale figure, this former event exclusive is back for general sale!

Mina Majikina, from the popular fighting game Samurai Spirits Zero, wields a bow and arrow in this PVC figure sculpted by Eiji Nakayama, which was originally an event exclusive garage kit by popular dealer Tetsukoryuu, courtesy of Good Smile!! After her village was destroyed, Mina set off to find and kill the evil demon responsible. Mina shows off her poise and energy in 1/5 scale as she prepares to draw her longbow. This beautiful and unique rendition varies slightly from Mina's official model, as it is truly the brainchild of Tetsukoryuu.
name: Mina Majikina (まじきな みな)
series: サムライスピリッツ零
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE 2003　© 2003 Yuki Enterprise
※「サムライスピリッツ」は株式会社ＳＮＫプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: Konomi Yuzuhara is the second figure in the AT-G V.I.P figure series.
description: From illustrator Noizi Ito comes Konomi Yuzuhara, the second figure based on the popular V.I.P series of collectible trading cards. Duplicating Mr. Ito's soft, delicate touch was a tall order, but with the help of Alter staff, sculptor Hiromitsu Morikawa managed to create a rendition so perfect as to be indistinguishable from the original illustration. Flower in hand, healthy legs peeking out from under her skirt, Konomi makes an attractive, detailed addition to any collection.
We're working to expand the AT-G limited edition figure set, so be sure to check out the official AT-G website.
name: Konomi Yuzuhara (ゆずはら このみ)

subtitle: Finally, the next charm in the Death Note accessory series!
description: L, the genius detective whose battle of wits with the protagonist is the main focus of the Death Note TV series, has his all-important thinking chair made into an accessory, courtesy of Good Smile Company! This chair, one of the tools L uses to catch the main character Kira, includes a Death Note title plate, making for an extra stylish accent to any fan's casual attire.
name: L's Chair Charm (えるのちぇあーちゃーむ)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The second in the Death Note silver accessory series is here!
description: L's thrilling battle of wits against Kira, the main character, serves as the focus of the Death Note TV anime. L's coffee cup, one of his signature accessories from Death Note, is the subject of the second Death Note silver accessory from Good Smile Company. Made from sterling silver and containing three high-clarity cubic zirconia, this fashionable accessory is certain to sparkle almost like a real diamond pendant, making it a beautiful complement to any outfit.
name: L's Coffee Cup Pendant (えるのこーひーかっぷぺんだんと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The Amazon Danbo is back, this time in a mini-size!
description: Pre-orders begin on 20th October at amazon.
From the best selling manga "Yotsuba&!" (Kiyohiko Azuma - ASCII Media Works) comes the robot costume that was built completely out of cardboard boxes during the summer vacation, "Danbo"!

But what if those boxes were all Amazon boxes? Using that idea, the Revoltech Danbo (Amazon Box Version) was created. It's been one year since it went on sale, but now it's coming back in a more petite size. Compared to the previous size of 130mm, this one is approximately 80mm in height; you could attach a string to it and hang it adorably from your bag - it's the perfect mascot size.

Everything that was in the larger version has been downsized into this version as well - from the eyes that can light up to the Revoltech joints in the arms and legs. Everything moves just like before. There is a special coating on the figure that makes it feel as if it really was made of cardboard, and every fine detail of the logos and warnings on the boxes has been kept. (Miura-chan's face that came with the original Revoltech Danbo Amazon Box Version is not included.)
This time around the Amazon.co.jp version also comes with it's own personal package that looks like a miniature Amazon box!

The first wave of figures that release on December 15th will include a limited edition clear brown rib container with the Amazon.co.jp logo marking the front. This limited edition container will only be sold with the first batch of releases, from the second a different color will be used. (The rib container is a small box used to store the optional Revoltech parts and joints.)
name: Revoltech Danbo Mini Amazon Box Version (りぼるてっくだんぼー・みに amazon.co.jp ぼっくすばーじょん)

subtitle: Behold the many magnificent techniques that the joints can recreate!
description: From SFO (Street Fighter Online) comes Ryu's best friend and eternal rival, Ken.

Ken is well-known as the owner of many championship titles from various fighting tournaments. All the techniques that he mastered using his superior fighting sense can all be recreated using the Revoltech joints on this figure. He is wearing his red karate gi, with his blond hair flowing with his movements.
Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Ken (SFO けん りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: A high quality Miku Hatsune sticker set, that's big enough for real cars!
description: The ultimate sticker set for real cars and bikes. Using the Miku Z4 Machine that raced in the SuperGT as a motif, these 13 stickers have been collected and released on a single sheet of stickers. The character sticker reaches an incredible 30cm at it's longest point.

No matter what ideas you come up with, the designs are bound to make an impact when used. The material used for the stickers is obviously made from a high quality weather resistant material - meaning the colors won't fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Hatsune Miku Big Sticker Set 01 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ かすたまいずしりーす はつねみくびっくさいずすてっかー01)
copyright:
© Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
© Advancestep. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The Axe of Light, Bardiche Assault, once again.
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS we once again see a metal charm of the Axe of Light wielded by Fate.T.Harlaown - Bardiche Assault, but this time it's in "Assault Form". The entire charm is coated in a chrome plating, with a strong contrast brought out by the beautiful yellow rhinestone center.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 08: Bardiche Assault -Assault Form- (ばるでぃっしゅあさると あさるとふぉーむ でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: An incredibly intense battle between good and evil!!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the sixth figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. More robots arrive to join the battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side". The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Even more fun will open up to you once you've collected the whole set of warriors!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 6 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい６だん)

subtitle: She's a perfect bride with a great body and flawless cooking!
description: Unity Yuno is the heroine of Unison Shift Accent's latest game, Unity Marriage ~The Two Brides~ and the latest creation by Akifumi Ozawa, who illustrated both Melissa Seraphy and ChuChu Astram. This gorgeous girl is sculpted and colored in detail to match the concept illustration, and the effort has really paid off, especially in the clear-cast hearts and wings at her hips, not to mention the breast pieces, which can be removed to show off some serious skin! Even the pedestal, which bears her symbol, is crafted with precision, making this a very complete and sexy package.
name: Unity Yuno (ゆにてぃゆーの)

subtitle: Official seals to produce a Miku version of anything from a model car to a real car!
description: From 1/10 scale model cars, bikes, even full-scale cars - these Miku Hatsune Character Seals can be used on all sorts of things! Obviously if you want to use them on something else, such as a computer or cell phone, they would still be the perfect Miku seal set for the job!

The seals are made from a high quality weather resistant material, meaning the colors will not fade easily. Both character designs and racing designs are both included on two A3 sheets, allowing you to use which ever ones you want, wherever you want. A number plate reading "Hatsune 300 Ne 39-39" is also included.
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Hatsune Miku 1/10 Scale Seal Set 01 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ かすたまいずしりーす はつねみく1/10すけーるしーるせっと01)
copyright:
© Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
© Advancestep. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Behold the many magnificent techniques that the joints can recreate!
description: From the popular online fighting game "Street Fighter Online" comes a Revoltech of an original character, Baichoufu, who fell to into the pits from fear of society and became a bloodthirsty killer. Even the characters in the game make use of the revolver joints, so you can interchange their parts to make your own original characters. Link the games with the figures, and get that K.O.!
name: Revoltech SFO Baichoufu (SFO ばいちょうふ りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: The idol of the slot machine world! The clumsy Haruka!
description: The new OVA is finally on sale! Even the theme song by Avenue Project has become popular! From the popular moe pachiko series "Kaitou Tenshi Twin Angel", comes two of the heroines who have been sculpted in impressive maid outfits. Haruka Minadzuki is the cheerful, energetic, but slightly clumsy girl. She comes with replacement parts so that you arrange her how you like - you can choose how she looks best
name: Haruka Minaduki (みなづき はるか)

subtitle: The queen has landed, with an alluring gaze.
description: Misato Mitsumi is the popular illustrator who was responsible for both the character creation and character designs for the PC game "FullAni". Now one of the characters from that game - the queen who governs the world, "Rafiel" has arrived as a PVC figure making use of the POLO system. Just as the original design intended her to be, she has been sculpted overflowing with mature charm, and her clothes can be cast-off allowing you to enjoy an even sexier queen.
name: Rafiel (らふぃえる)

subtitle: The long wait for the second Muv-Luv figure is over!!
description: From the PC game with thousands of fanatical fans "Muv-Luv Alternative" comes a PVC figure of Kasumi Yashiro, one of the key characters from the story. She has been sculpted standing in the reinforced clothing that she wore while piloting the Susanoo 4th Model, and her beloved stuffed rabbit gives a contrastingly cute feeling to the figure. The carefully sculpted base can be connected to the other three stands in the series, which will include the upcoming third figure in the series "Sumika Kagami" - look forward to her!
name: Kasumi Yashiro (やしろかすみ)

subtitle: The idol of the slot machine world! Miss Aoi!
description: The new OVA is finally on sale! Even the theme song by Avenue Project has become popular! From the popular moe pachiko series "Kaitou Tenshi Twin Angel", comes two of the heroines who have been sculpted in impressive maid outfits. Aoi Kannadzuki is the gentle girl with the best grades in school, but she also makes some silly mistakes. She comes with replacement parts so that you arrange her how you like - you can choose how she looks best.
name: Aoi Kannazuki (かんなづき あおい)

subtitle: Pure poseable muscle!!
description: Joining the SFO (Steet Fighter Online) Revoltech series comes Zangief, a national Russian hero nicknamed the "Red Cyclone". He has been fighting for his beloved country for many years, and now Revoltech joints have been placed throughout his muscular body allowing you to recreate his powerful techniques as you see fit. Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Zangief (SFO ざんぎえふ りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: The second-rate mech that became a great accomplishment! This mass-produced superior fighter rolls out as part of the 35MAX series!
description: As part of the 35MAX series, Max Factory brings us an action figure of the Fatty from "Armored Trooper Votoms". This AT was the main fighting force in the Balarant Union, it was developed to counter the Gilgamesh Confederation in mid-air combat. It was sculpted with it's distinct streamlined yet busty build. The catapult launcher and burner nozzle are included as weapons, as well as a maintenance arm. The lens on the head is movable.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 08 FATTY (ふぁってぃー)

subtitle: Two powerful tomes that hide great magic potential.
description: The 9th item in the Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS Device Charm Collection comes in a set of two tomes: The Book of Darkness that is used by Hayate Yagami, and The Book of the Azure Sky held by Reinforce Zwei. The two books used to store extensive magical data have been impressively recreated with finely detailed etchings. Each of the charms is different, so find the one that suits you.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 09: Book of Darkness & Book of the Azure Sky (やてんのしょ そうてんのしょ でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: Moe is justice!  Nendoroid Sakura Nankyoku!
description: The heroine of internet-distributed anime Penguin Girl Heart and student council President of South Pole Academy, Sakura Nankyoku, AKA Penguin, is the latest member of the Nendoroid family! Although she's the heiress to the enormous Antarctic Holdings fortune, Sakura is a naturally kind, gentle girl with a proper sense of right and wrong, which gets her into all sorts of hilarious adventures. In addition to her three interchangeable faces, she includes the hard hat and pickaxe which she uses in the opening animation, for a perfect recreation of some of the funnier scenes.
name: Nendoroid Sakura Nankyoku (なんきょくさくら ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2008 高橋てつや(秋田書店)／南極財閥

subtitle: figma Shana is here, ready to face her enemies with her hair dyed a deep crimson.
description: The anime, games, and manga of Shakugan no Shana that all started in Dengeki Bunko have expanded into more and more forms, and now the heroine of the series, Shana, has been made into a figma in her "Flame-Haired Burning-Eyed" form.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes.
She has been sculpted with a powerful presence, and along with her strong-willed expression the figma truly feels like Shana herself.
A flexible plastic was used for her uniform, skirt as well as a part of her hair.
Shana's long hair comes with a mechanism that allows it to be moved left and right.
Two face parts and well as many hand parts are included. Hand parts for holding her sword are also included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Shana: Flamed-Haired ver. (ふぃぐま しゃな えんぱつver.)
copyright: © 高橋弥七郎/いとうのいぢ/アスキー・メディアワークス/『灼眼のシャナⅡ』製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: Now is the time to go on a journey and collect them all!
description: A second set of tiny mascots depicting the three heroines from the series "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" is finally here. Each set of charms is sold in one of the six following regions: Hokkaido, the Kantou region, Akihabara, The Hokuriki/Shinetsu/Toukai region, the Kinki region and the Chuugoku/Shigoku/Kyuushuu region.

Each of the different regions have three different charms, one for each of the main characters, and they are all wearing cosplay outfits that depict something that relates to that specific area. The charms will be sold in animate shops in each of the regions. Each of the 18 charms will be sold as both a netsuke and a miniature charm, so you can take whichever suits you better.
name: Nendoroid PLUS: "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Cosplay Netsuke and Charms Series 2 (ねんどろいどぷらす すずみやはるひのゆううつ こすぷれねづけ だいにだん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Official Miku Hatsune decals for you to produce your own Miku-themed 1/24 scale model car!
description: Any 1/24th scale model car can now get the perfect finishing touches by adding these Miku Hatsune Decals. The decals are made of very high quality materials, making sure that the colors won't fade over time.

Both the character designs and racing designs are both included on a single sheet, allowing you to use which ever ones you want, wherever you want. With just one sheet of decals you can completely transform your model car into a Miku car!
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Hatsune Miku 1/24 Scale Decals 01 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ かすたまいずしりーす はつねみく 1/24すけーる でかーる01)
copyright:
© Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
© Advancestep. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Even when he's on the opponent’s turf, he brings freedom! Figma Doala Visitor version!!
description: The popular figma Doala is back again, and this time he's dressed up in the uniform he uses for visitor games!

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes. - A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, while still allowing many action poses. - The head and body have unbalanced proportions, and his expression is the so-called "unnatural smile". - Multiple hand parts are included to hold the various items that are included, one of these items is the baseball glove that he should never be seen without. - A drag for keeping the sports grounds maintained, as well as the bread that Doala receives as payment are both included. The Doala world is growing. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, so even the acrobatics he does so well are possible!
<!-- Once again, the catch phrase pun will be lost on English audiences -->
name: figma Doala: Visitor ver. (ふぃぐま どあら びじたーver.)

subtitle: The master of submission is now poseable! figma Ryomou Shimei!
description: From "Ikkitousen Great Guardians" comes one of the Four Devas of Nanyo, Ryomou Shimei, the master of grappling arts from Nanyang Academy. She has been sculpted as a figma wearing her well-known maid outfit. [ul]
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes.
A flexible plastic was used for parts of her apron and skirt, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Her trademark eye patch and handcuffs have been faithfully added to the figure. You can even enjoy handcuffing other characters.
Three face parts and many hand parts are included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Ryomou Shimei (りょもうしめい ふぃぐま)

subtitle: I love the stars! The reliable student council president.
description: From the love story based around an astronomy club "Hoshiful", comes a figure of "Kotone Kusuhara" - the main character who won in both the first and second character popularity polls! She is the most popular girl in Seito Academy, and she's also the student council president. She loved gazing at the stars so much, that she decided to create an astrology club. She's a diligent, hard working girl, and now she has been sculpted in a position showing her in a brief moment of embarrassment. Now you can watch the night skies together with a girl who loves to watch the stars.
name: Kotone Kusuhara (くすはら ことね)

subtitle: Both fiece and cute, it's the battle of the beauties!!
description: With high expectations of the new Ikkitousen anime, all the beautiful girl warriors have been sculpted into figures! A different set of colors was used by this set of figures compared to the limited edition figures that were sold by mail order through the wani books magazine. Each character has their own special charm, and it's all been brought together with the custom bases included with each figure. The energetic look of the "Fierce Fighting Girls" contrasts the feminine colors of the figures, making for a fascinating new set of figures.
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Ikkitousen Trading Figures (こみっくがむ ふぃぎゅあ・これくしょん いっきとうせんとれー)

subtitle: He has an open-hearted, warm personality.
description: From the popular online fighting game "Street Fighter Online", comes a Revolech figure of Hiko, a completely new character to the game modeled off a character from one of Chinese novelist Jin Yong's works. Even the characters in the game make use of the revolver joints, so you can interchange their parts to make your own original characters. Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Hiko (SFO ひこ りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: Everything brings freedom! figma Doala is here!
description: He unexpectedly had a book based on him, and soon after that both a DVD and CD went on sale - the popular Chunichi Dragons mascot Doala now has the unbelievable transfer to being a figma!

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes. - A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, while still allowing many action poses. - The head and body have unbalanced proportions, and his expression is the so-called "unnatural smile". - Multiple hand parts are included to hold the many accessories that he comes with. The Doala world is growing. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, so even the acrobatics he's so good at are possible!
name: figma Doala: Homegame ver. (ふぃぐま どあら ほーむver.)

description: An original character created simply to be a figure.

Popular illustrator Shunya Yamashita created an original illustration for the LILICS series of figures, and here it is! She's got cute eyes, and her body has an enticing, adult pose. She's dressed in a vivid science fiction costume, in an artistic yet sensual pose - one of the specialties of Shunya Yamashita. Enjoy the skilled sculpting and originality behind the LILICS series!
name: Canal (かなる)

subtitle: Her strength is unrivalled in all three kingdoms!!
description: Based on the Chinese hero, Lu Bu, with the courtesy name Fèngxiān, comes the wonderful Ren. She comes from the popular PC game "Koihime Musou", which was recently converted into an anime! Ryofu Ren, the strongest member of the Toutaku Force, has been sculpted standing in a valiant pose holding her spear. She's normally a quiet, accepting, girl who loves to play with animals. But when on the battlefield, she takes pride in her unrivalled strength. The stand also had a lot of thought put into it, making it a wonderfully detailed package.
name: Ren Ryofu (りょふ れん)

subtitle: Nanoha's beloved staff is back again!
description: The 7th charm to join the "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS" Device Metal Charm Series is once again Nanoha's "Raging Heart Excelion" - but this time in it's in Accel Mode. Just like the staff that was in Buster Mode, the center of the staff is made from rhinestone, and every little detail has been carefully sculpted to match the original.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 07: Raging Heart Excelion -Accel Mode- (れいじんぐはーとえくせりおん あくせるもーど でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: Eyes and hair burning like fire, it's Nendoroid Shana!
description: Shana, the main heroine from the popular anime "Shakugan no Shana" has been given the Nendoroid treatment, complete with fiery eyes and burning hair! The figure comes with three facial expressions and many different hand parts to switch around, allowing you to express Shana in all sorts of ways! Her namesake sword "Nietono no Shana" as well as her cloak and her pendant are included as accessories.
name: Nendoroid Shana: Burning Hair and Eyes Ver. (しゃな えんぱつしゃくがんばーじょん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 高橋弥七郎/いとうのいぢ/アスキー・メディアワークス/『灼眼のシャナⅡ』製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: Behold the many magnificent techniques that the joints can recreate!
description: The third figure in Revoltech's Street Fighter Online series is the beautiful special agent of the ICPO, Chun-Li. She's a master of Kenpou, who has long been searching for her missing father. All of her joints are Revoltech joints, allowing you to recreate many of her well-known techniques. Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Chun-Li (SFO ちゅんりー りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: Klar Wind, the ring of the wind. A breath of fresh air.
description: "Klar Wind" is the device used by Shamal, one of the Wolkenritter, and now it has joined the metal charm collection! The two variations of the ring - one with a blue stone and one with a green stone, have both been carefully sculpted to look identical to how they did in the series. The two rings are bound together by a chain, and sold as a charm.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 06: Klar Wind -Ring Form- (りんげふぉるむ でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: Burn away our enemies!!
description: This rendition of the Human Mage is from Lineage II, the popular MMORPG with an engrossing world and an elegant sense of design. It features extremely detailed armor which can barely contain the sexual undercurrent suggested by her sensual body lines.
name: Human Mage (ひゅーまん めいじ)
copyright:

subtitle: Poses perfectly, looks great. It's Koshien Stadium's super hero, figma TO LUCKY!!
description: Announcing a figma of the Hanshin Tigers baseball team mascot that fans have loved for ages, TO LUCKY!

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes. - A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, while still allowing many action poses. - The unique proportions of the costume have been faithfully reproduced. - Multiple hand parts are included to hold the many accessories that he comes with. The baseball glove he should never be seen without is also included. - Other items that would be used on the sports ground, such as a drag, a ball and a bat are all included. You can have fun creating the scenes from the baseball stadium as they were meant to be. - Comes with a poseable figma stand, so even the acrobatics he's so good at are possible!
name: figma To Lucky: Homegame ver. (ふぃぐま とらっきー ほーむver.)

subtitle: His singing voice will be heard all over your desk ♪ The powerful singer, figma Len Kagamine!
description: Following the release of the Character Vocal Series' Miku Hatsune comes both Rin and Len Kagamine, here to join the figma brigade!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - Various areas make use of a flexible plastic, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Both of his heads, his belt, his detailed expressions as well as the coloring all had a lot of work put into them. - Two face parts and various hand parts are included, allowing you to pose him however you prefer. - His shoulder keyboard is included, and its strap can be hung around him realistically. - A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kagamine Len (かがみねれん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: Not only poses perfectly, but is just as mysterious. figma Ryouko Asakura!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma of Ryouko Asakura, the class member who is actually a humanoid interface.

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes. - A flexible plastic was used for her uniform and skirt, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability. - The two included face parts allow you to create either a smiling, or a mysterious feeling to her. - Included in the various hand parts that allow you to recreate the battle scene between Nagato, this includes hand parts that interlock with Nagato. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
As an additional bonus, a head part for Taniguchi is also included. By putting this head part on Kyon (sold separately), you can create a figure of Taniguchi as well!
name: figma Ryouko Asakura: School Uniform ver. ( ふぃぐま あさくらりょうこ せいふくver.)
copyright:
© 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: This young lady's a detective, a high-schooler, and a glutton to boot!
description: Yako Katsuragi, the young detective from the manga and anime Demon Detective Neuro Nougami, is the latest to get the Nendoroid treatment, along with her ghoulish sleuthing partner and title character. As usual, she has plenty of faces to match her many moods, including one smiling, one accusatory, and one surprised. She also comes with a fork and spoon, a bowl of the Doping Consomme Soup she so enjoys, and a cell phone with Akane-chan, the mysterious lock of hair/corpse/secretary that Neuro employs, attached. With Neuro also being released in Nendoroid form, you can set up your very own adorable demonic detective agency! Nendoroid
name: Nendoroid Yako Katsuragi (かつらぎ やこ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 松井優征／集英社・VAP・マッドハウス・NTV・D.N.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: He's ready to solve any and all adorable mysteries that might arise!
description: Neuro Nougami, the mystery-eating demon and titular character of Demon Detective Neuro Nougami, is squished and deformed to monstrously cute Nendoroid proportions! Among his many accessories are a demon head, which can open and close his mouth, plus two more faces and replaceable hands, to defend against extradimensional invaders. Together with his partner Yako, you can set up your own adorable demonic detective agency!
name: Nendoroid Neuro Nougami (ねうろねんどろいど)
copyright: © 松井優征／集英社・VAP・マッドハウス・NTV・D.N.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The sword of kings brings victory to its bearer.
description: The popular Animate limited edition metal charm series adds some Fate/stay night to its repertoire. The first in this new series is Excalibur, the sword wielded by Saber, said to be the blade of kings itself. This charm was cast in painstaking detail to capture the essence of Excalibur's shining hilt and blade, and is an essential part of any Fate fan's collection.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 01: Excalibur (えくすかりばー ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん０１)

subtitle: It's a walking embodiment of cuteness! figma Miyuki is here!
description: From "Lucky Star" comes a figma of the cute but clumsy Miyuki Takara, in her winter school uniform.

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - A book as included - perfect for the book-loving Miyuki.There are also parts for hiding the area that the hair and the stand connect. - To commemorate the release of all four characters, a background mat of the opening theme is included, allowing for a perfect recreation of the opening theme. - Her face parts can be exchanged with any of the other Lucky Star figmas. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Miyuki Takara: Winter Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま たからみゆき ふゆふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The tsundere sister who can't be honest with herself.
description: From the love story based around an astronomy club "Hoshiful", comes a figure of the tsundere character "Ruka Hoshikawa". She was very close to beating the main character Kotone in character popularity polls. She has been sculpted in a pose that suits her stubborn personality, with long blond twin tails, and different colored eyes. Her striped knee socks look great on her long legs. It's time to give this strong-willed girl what she deserves...
name: Ruka Hoshikawa (ほしかわ るか)

subtitle: Electric vocals singing on top of your desk ♪ figma Rin Kagamine!
description: Following the release of the Character Vocal Series' Miku Hatsune comes both Rin and Len Kagamine, here to join the figma brigade!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - Her characteristic ribbon, as well as the details of her expression and the coloring have all had a of work put into them. - Two face parts and various hand parts are included, allowing you to put her in whatever pose you prefer. - Her mike is included, so even though she has a short build you can recreate her powerful singing pose. - If you put her together with Len Kagamine, you can recreate a stage with both of the twins preforming. - A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kagamine Rin (かがみねりん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: They're rocking out and playing games in their third set!
description: The Nendoroid Petite series returns with another cute and soft set of Haruhi trading figures! Based on the concept illustration "The Music of Suzumiya Haruhi" and the TV series' 11th episode, "The Day of Saggitarius," respectively, The five members of the SOS Brigade have been shrunk to a petite size once again! With ten in all, plus one secret figure, your desire for these versatile little character is sure to grow!
name: Nendoroid Petit Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya #03 (すずみやはるひのゆううつ＃３ ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Kneel before her, peasants!
description: The main character of Princess Resurrection, a manga serialized in Monthly Sirius Magazine, Hime wears a black dress and holds an enormous pair of scissors in this figure, which truly captures the regal bearing inherent in her sinister smile and long blonde hair. Also included is a Nendoroid Petite figure of her servant android Flandre, complete with a word bubble holding her only spoken word, "Hooba."
name: Hime (ひめ)
copyright: © 光永康則・講談社／怪物王女製作委員会

subtitle: A mysterious, sexy bunny.
description: An addition to FREEing's popular "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny Series! This time it's Asakura Ryouko, the class representative, who is also another human interface. There is no doubt that anyone who looks at the beautiful honours student in her bunny girl outfit is going to be astounded by her beauty. Worn around her extended legs are the popular net tights used on the previous figures. For both those who are collecting the series, and those who aren't, this is a figure you'd best buy quickly!
name: Ryouko Asakura Bunny Ver. (あさくらりょうこ ばにーばーじょん)
copyright:
© 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Beware of the deadly poison hidden behind her beauty!
description: From the popular online fighting game "Street Fighter Online" comes a Revoltech figure of the founder of the "Five Poisons" assassination order, Teiran! She is a completely new character to the game who has been modeled off a character from one of Chinese novelist Jin Yong's works. Even the characters in the game make use of the revolver joints, so you can interchange their parts to make your own original characters. If you collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Teiran (れぼるてっくSFOていらん)

subtitle: The joints are put to their full use to recreate the decisive Hadouken!!
description: The characters from the king of fighting games "Street Fighter", are finally being released as Revoltech figures! The first character to be released is, of course, Ryu. Wearing his karate gi with a red headband, he is the man who has always been searching for the knowledge to become the "True Fighter". All his joints are revolver joints, allowing his well-known techniques to be recreated. The characters in "Street Fighter Online" also use revolver joints, so that you can interchange their parts to make your own original characters. If you collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Ryu (SFO りゅう りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: It poses mega well, nyoron~ figma Tsuruya-san is here!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma of the honorary consultant who protects the SOS Brigade from the shadows... Tsuruya-san!

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out many scenes. - A flexible plastic was used for her uniform and skirt, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability. - Her beautiful long hair is also movable, so it won't get in the way of making action scenes that suit Tsuruya-san. - Two face parts and well as many hand parts are included. Tsuruya-san's signature "peace" hand parts are also included. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
As an additional bonus, a head part for Emiri Kimidori is also included. By putting this head part on Tsuruya-san, you can create a figure of Emiri as well!
name: figma Tsuruya-san: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま つるやさん せいふくver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: You can have a fox deity in your home too!
description: Dengeki Bunko's original heart-warming story "Wagaya no Oinari-sama" has just had an anime based off it. Now the fox deity "Kuugen Tenko" from the series is being sculpted into a figure, disguised in her human form as an incredibly beautiful woman! The figure was based on the front cover of the 6th volume of the original novel, and it looks exactly like the original! Her long hair was partly made of clear plastic, and makes use of a powerful gradient effect. The fox deity head part is included, so fan's that want to recreate her half-transformed form will enjoy this figure.
name: Kuugen Tenko (てんこくうげん)
series: Our Family's Fox Diety (Wagaya no Oinari-sama)
copyright: © 柴村仁／アスキー・メディアワークス

subtitle: figma Miku Hatsune ♪ Her on-stage performances are in the palm of your hands.
description: Everyone is entranced by her beautiful voice.♪ The long awaited figma version of Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune is here!
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A metallic coloring was used for parts of the body. Lots of detail was put into areas such as the sleeves and belt.
There are two different face parts, and various hand parts. You can display her with her mike and mike stand to recreate her lively stage performances.
The leek that fans know all too well has also been included - two of them in fact, so you can create all kinds of fun scenes.
Her long twintail hair also has figma joints in it, allowing for more action poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Miku Hatsune (はつねみく ふぃぐま)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: A knight's pride burns bright in this magical sword.
description: The newest in the Device Metal Charm Collection, the Laevantein Schwertform dazzles with its shining blade and solid casting. The weapon of Flame Knight Signum, leader of the Wolkenritter, this single-edged sword seems ready for battle, and makes a stylish charm.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 05: Laevantein Schwertform (れヴぁんてぃん でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)

subtitle: The never ending battle between the block warriors!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the fifth figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. More robots arrive to join the battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side". The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Once you've collected all the warriors in the series, you'll be able to create an original powered up warrior!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 5 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい５だん)

subtitle: Raijin, taking off! Collect all three and activate the Delta Lock!
description: From the anime "Sky Girls" comes another of the exoskeleton Sonic Divers that the heroines ride. Its been sculpted as a poseable figure that can shift between modes. This release completes the series. The third Sonic Diver, "Raijin", piloted by Eika Ichijou is equipped with two large lasers. Depending on which you prefer, you can switch Raijin into one of the three modes: the high-speed acceleration G-Mode, the reinforced exoskeleton A-Mode, which was used in battles, or the AS Mode, which was used for solo missions. The Eika Ichijou figure is also included. With all three of the girls present, the Sonic Diver squad can stand up against the Worms!
name: Sonic Diver Raijin (そにっくだいばー らいじん)
copyright: © 2007　Konami Digital Entertainment Co.Ltd/スカイガールズ製作委員会

subtitle: To collect them all, you'll need to tour Japan!
description: The three heroines from "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya": Haruhi Suzumiya, Yuki Nagato and Mikuru Asahina were first made into Petit Nendoroids, and now they're also being made into tiny mascots! Each set is sold in one of six different regions, and their cosplay costumes are based off well-known costumes or landmarks of that area. They will only be sold in animate shops in these areas. Each of the 18 designs will be sold as both a netsuke and a charm. Wouldn't they make wonderful souvenirs?
name: Nendoroid PLUS "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" cosplay netsuke & charms (ねんどろいどぷらす すずみやはるひのゆううつ こすぷれねづけ)
price: ¥399 each - each set includes a single figure with either a netsuke or charm attachment.
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The older, more reliable of the twin sisters, figma Kagami!
description: From the anime "Lucky Star" comes a figma of the most serious of the close friends, Kagami Hiiragi, wearing her winter uniform!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability. - Two separate face parts as well as many different hand parts are included. The hands for the pose in the opening theme are also included. - A removable magazine is included and her characteristic twin tails can also be changed. - It's possible to change her face with other Lucky Star figma faces. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Kagami Hiiragi: Winter Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ひいらぎ かがみ ふゆふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: Mysterious and adorable, it's Nendoroid Ryoko Asakura!
description: Asakura Ryoko, the lovely school idol/artificially created psychotic killer from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, is the fifth in the Nendoroid Haruhi series. She includes a knife and handbag, as well as enough face and arm parts to recreate any scene from the show. As if all that weren't enough, she also includes a number of parts to enhance the previous Haruhi Nendoroids, making her an even more essential part of the series.
name: Nendoroid Ryoko Asakura and Extra Parts Set (あさくらりょうこ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Straddling the line between love and friendship...
description: Following the previously released Haruka Suzumiya's example, the second heroine from the popular PC game Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, "Mitsuki Hayase" has been released wearing a sexy bikini. Sculpted in exquisite detail to capture her curvaceous body and the movement of her waist-length hair, she makes a perfect complement to Mitsuki's figure, and a wonderful rendition of an idyllic summer day.
name: Mitsuki Hayase (はやせ みつき)

subtitle: Once again we see Yuki Nagato as the Evil Witch!
description: From the play we saw in The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, "The Adventures of Mikuru Asahina", comes a figma of Yuki Nagato in her "Evil Witch" costume!

- The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes. - Using the guitar, guitar strap, signboards (which read "Akutsuchi Figure Shop" and "Oomori Electric Shop"), the witch's wand, a small teapot, a lantern, a cup and various accessories, you can recreate many scenes - and the enjoyment value of the figure never ends. - The witch's cloak can be removed, and you can choose whether or not she holds the guitar, so there are 2 ways to display her. - Beneath the mantle is the Yuki Nagato school uniform version. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Yuki Nagato: Evil Witch ver. (ふぃぐま ながとゆき わるいまほうつかいver.)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The Big Bunny Series continues! And this time the charming figure is...
description: Another figure has been green lit for production as part of FREEing's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny Series! This time the figure is of Emiri Kimidori, the first client of the SOS Brigade, who asked the Brigade to find her missing boyfriend. She's part of the student council, and she's also another humanoid interface. What do you think of the mysterious girl in a bunny girl suit?
name: Emiri Kimidori Bunny ver. (きみどりえみり ばにーばーじょん)
copyright:
© 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: The crimson magician is now available as a figma!
description: Following on from the popular Saber, comes a figma of the "Average One", Tohsaka Rin from Fate/Stay Night!

- Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can reproduce many different scenes. - To make sure that proportions were kept while still leaving the figure poseable, a flexible plastic was used for a part of the skirt and the shirt. - There is a replaceable shouting face for action scenes. Using the posability of the hair you can give her an uplifting pose. - Comes with the Azoth sword, as well as a clear mould of the jeweled sword Zelretch as weapons. - Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Rin Tohsaka: Casual ver. (ふぃぐま とおさかりん しふくver.)

subtitle: The block warriors battle continues!!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the forth figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" is reaching it's climax.The figures are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Once you've collected all the warriors in the series, you'll be able to create an original powered up warrior!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 4 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい４だん)

subtitle: The revival of the temporal space fighter!
description: From the shooting game with a long history behind it "Gradius", comes a plastic model kit of the well-known spaceship, the Vic Viper. It's one of the many variations of the ship, and was modeled after the Vic Viper from the "Gradius 4" game, which was the game that revived the series after a 10 year break.
