name: Black Rock Shooter Blu-ray Disc (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー Blu-ray)

subtitle: The honest, hard-working laborer.
description: Usavich is a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison. When the first season aired in the Autumn of 2006, it quickly generated many fans with its unique and interesting atmosphere. The third season is currently airing on MTV, and it is still just as well acclaimed as when it originally aired.

This is a soft vinyl figure of Putin, the cheerful and kind protagonist of the show. 'Komanech', the transvestite chick with a powerful personality, is also included, allowing you to enjoy the carefree Putin along with Komonech to your heart's content.
name: Putin Soft Vinyl Figure (ぷーちん そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Wafu! ♪ It's a super big, super exotic Kudo!
description: From the popular PC Game, "Kud Wafter" comes a giant plushie of the main heroine, Kudryavka Noumi - even when sitting she is an amazing 70cm in height!!

Her trademark mantle and hat are both included, and can also both be worn or taken off at any time. Place her together with the Little Busters! Ecstasy plushie of Kudo and you'll really be able to notice the amazing difference in size! ♪♪ Just make sure you have enough space in your room!
name: Kud Wafter Giant Plushie: Kudryavka Noumi (くどわふたーびっぐぬいぐるみ のうみくどりゃふか)

subtitle: A wish on a star, in the darkness of the night.
description: The original illustration by huke, "BLACK ROCK SHOOTER" has been brought to life as a PVC figure! When ryo first saw huke's illustration, he was inspired to compose a song based on the image, huke then created a PV for that song, which became a huge hit online. Even a CD has been released!

She has been sculpted holding her huge Rock Cannon, in an striking pose that draws out her mysterious charm. Her flowing hair and jacket, as well as her weapon and beautiful stand have all been carefully sculpted - even the smallest of details have had careful attention paid to them, making this a top quality figure from anybody's viewpoint.
name: BLACK ROCK SHOOTER (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: Once he gets angry there is no stopping him, the original boss of Fear.
description: Usavich is a story that follows the carefree life of rabbits that are imprisoned in a Russian prison. When the first season aired in the Autumn of 2006, it quickly generated many fans with its unique and interesting atmosphere. The third season is currently airing on MTV, and it is still just as well acclaimed as when it originally aired.

This is a vinyl figure of Kirenenko, who was once the boss of the organization, 'Fear', but is now nothing more than a criminal that has been sentenced to death. Leningrad, the frog with just as much presence as the main characters themselves, is also included, allowing you to enjoy the prison life of all the characters together!
name: Kirenenko Soft Vinyl Figure (きれねんこ そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: The girl with both beauty and intelligence, Hinagiku!
description: From "Hayate the Combat Butler", the comedy series filled with both love and bloodshed (?) comes a Nendoroid of the student council president of Hakuou Academy, Hinagiku Katsura!

Three expressions are included: her standard smiling face, an embarrassed face as well as an angry face. She also comes complete with her beloved wooden sword "Masamune" as well as a bamboo sword. There are also cat ears and a tail included as optional parts!
With all of this you can recreate Hinagiku as the tough girl she always appears to be, or display her slightly more shy side that she sometimes ends up showing herself… the choice is yours!
name: Nendoroid Hinagiku Katsura (ねんどろいど かつらひなぎく)
copyright: © 畑健二郎／小学館・白皇学院生徒会・テレビ東京

subtitle: The cheerful Putin!!
description: Another soft vinyl figure of Putin from the popular comedy series "Usavich" is on it's way.

He is posed in such a dynamic way that it seems as if he might start jumping around and dancing at any second - which only adds to the charming feeling of the figure. Of course 'Komanech', the transvestite chick is included this time around as well. Enjoy the slow-paced daily life of the Usavich rabbits!
name: Putin Soft Vinyl Figure 02 (ぷーちん そふびふぃぎゅあ02)

subtitle: The carefree Kirenenko!
description: Another soft vinyl figure of Kirenenko from the popular comedy series "Usavich" is on its way.

This time Kirenenko is reading his beloved sneaker magazine sprawled out on the floor. It's a pose that shows that Kirenenko doesn't intend to change the relaxed state of his life any time soon. Be sure to display him with the Putin figure that is die for release at the same time!
name: Kirenenko Soft Vinyl Figure 02 (きれねんこ そふびふぃぎゅあ02)

subtitle: A certain set of silk-screened decals that glow in the dark!
description: From the popular anime "Toaru Kagaku no Railgun" comes another addition to the GSR Character Customize Series, this time focusing on both Mikoto Misaka and Kuroko Shirai, along with various symbols and signs that bring out the world of Academy City, allowing you to fully customize your favorite model car into a fantastic 'Railgun' itasha.

Certain decals make use of a special glow-in-the-dark ink that emits a luminous light in the dark. The entire sheet also makes use of silk-screen printing, meaning the decals are durable, beautifully colored and will not fade over time. The decals are designed for use with the Modeller Support Series' "Decal Fitter" and "Decal Fitter Pro".
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decal Set 013: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun Decals- 1/24th scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる013／ とあるかがくのれーるがん)
series: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun (A Certain Scientific Railgun)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN

subtitle: Let Nanoha and Fate's magic protect your precious iPhone!
description: From "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes three different varieties of iPhone cases - the Nanoha&Fate Ver. , the Nanoha Magical Circle Ver. and the Fate Magical Circle Ver.
Pick your favorite case and keep your iPhone safe while making it look great at the same time!
name: Lyrical Nanoha iPhone Cases (Nanoha&Fate Ver. / Nanoha Magical Circle Ver. / Fate Magical Circle Ver.) (りりかるなのは iPhoneケース シリーズ （①なのは＆ふぇいと／②まほうじんなのはVer.／③まほうじんふぇいとVer.）)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st
copyright: Images are samples only. The actual product may differ slightly. ©NANOHA The MOVIE 1st PROJECT

subtitle: Well... this way looks way more interesting!
description: From the huge hit anime movie "The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a Nendoroid of Haruhi herself. She is wearing her Kouyou Academy school uniform and has her hair down and long, creating a very different appearance compared to the standard Haruhi.

Three expressions are included, as well as a variety of replaceable arm parts. She even includes some extra parts to be used with 'Nendoroid Yuki Nagato: Dissappearance ver', which was announced some time ago. Display her with Yuki, and recreate the world from the movie in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Haruhi Suzumiya: Disappearance ver. (ねんどろいど すずみやはるひ しょうしつVer.)

subtitle: A gleeful smile as a Nendoroid!
description: From the popular "Black Rock Shooter" comes a Nendoroid of BRS's rival, Dead Master!

She comes complete with her giant weapon, "Death Scythe" as well as two Nendoroid sized skulls. Also, just as the Nendoroid Black Rock Shooter did, Dead Master also includes a facial expression based on an illustration by CHANxCO.
Recreate your best Black Rock Shooter scenes in cute Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Dead Master (ねんどろいど でっどますたー)

subtitle: The dutiful wife and devoted mother.
description: From "Queen's Blade", the action anime filled with beautiful girls left, right and center comes a Nendoroid of the ever-resourceful adventurer and shop owner "Cattleya". She also comes with a petite Nendoroid of her son Rana, as he would never leave her side.

Also included is the sword her missing husband Owen created, the "Giant Killer" as well as optional parts to pose her standing on her knees. Recreate the noble mother fighting whilst still standing as a shield to her son - all in the cutest way possible: the Nendoroid way!
name: Nendoroid Cattleya (ねんどろいど かとれあ)
copyright: © 2010 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイド EX パートナーズ

subtitle: The much loved Midget II is joining the ex:ride range!
description: ex:ride: vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of figures brought to you by FREEing.

This time the figmas get to ride on the ever popular Daihatsu Midget II, which was originally manufactured between 1996 and 2001 and was best known for it's cute, yet very practical design. Your favorite figmas can choose to ride in the driver's seat or in the back of the truck, giving them a bunch of new ways to enjoy the road. They are available in both white and emerald green.
name: ex:ride - SPride.02: Daihatsu Midget II (えくすらいど SPらいど02 だいはつ みぜっとⅡ)

subtitle: "After all this, we're friends now."
description: From "Magical Girl Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes plushies of both Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa. Nanoha is wearing her school uniform, while Fate is wearing casual clothes. Both of their adorable smiles can now always be your side in plushie form!

The legs, arms and even twin-tail hair are all fitted with joints, meaning you can make a variety of poses. ♪♪ Be sure to display them both together and recreate the touching scenes between the two friends.
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 20: Fate Testarossa (Casual ver.) (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ20 ふぇいと・てすたろっさ（しふくver.）)

subtitle: "After all this, we're friends now."
description: From "Magical Girl Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes plushies of both Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa. Nanoha is wearing her school uniform, while Fate is wearing casual clothes. Both of their adorable smiles can now always be your side in plushie form!

The legs, arms and even twin-tail hair are all fitted with joints, meaning you can make a variety of poses. ♪♪ Be sure to display them both together and recreate the touching scenes between the two friends.
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 19: Nanoha Takamachi (School Uniform ver.) (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ19 たかまちなのは（せいふくver.）)

subtitle: The second magical girl.
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 1st' comes plushie of the the second heroine from the movie, "Fate Testarossa", also as a huge plushie that is an impressive 70cm in height even when sitting! The new barrier jacket design has carefully been redesigned to fit the giant plushie!

If you seat her next to Fate and Arf from the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series you'll really be able to see the incredible size difference between them! Just make sure you have enough space in your room before you buy her!
name: Lyrical Nanoha Giant Plushie Series 02: Fate Testarossa (りりかるなのはびっくぬいぐるみしりーず② ふぇいと・てすたろっさ)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Come on.... let's dance! figma Metis is online!
description: Aigis's self-proclaimed daughter and powerful combat android "Metis" is finally joining the figma line-up!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Two expressions are included: a normal face and a smiling face. The visor on her head can be lowered to display her in a combat stance.
Her iron mallet is included to fight with, as well as a bus stop sign which can also be wielded as a weapon! Koromaru, the Shiba dig is also included!
Clear parts that can be placed on her feet allow her to stand without the use of the figma stand.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Metis (ふぃぐま めてぃす)

subtitle: A figure to keep you company at night.
description: From "Isshoni Sleeping", the popular anime that helps get you to sleep and helps you to wake up in the morning, comes a 1/8th scale PVC figure of the main character, Hinako. She has jumped out of the anime world and into the figure world for you to take home!
There is one little problem though... she is wearing the sexy negligee from the anime... which is more likely to keep you awake than get you to sleep!
As an added bonus, the entire "Isshoni Sleeping" DVD will be included with the figure! With the figure and the DVD, you're bound to have that peaceful sleep you need!
name: Hinako (ひなこ)
manufacturer: エンブレイスジャパン

subtitle: A new revolution for decals! Holographic decals that can easily be stuck on curved surfaces!
description: A brand new set of decals to allow for even more customization on your favorite models!

These Lamé Flake patterns allows you to create various fun effects on your models, such as the designs on decorated trucks or highway racing cars. By using the GSR Decal Fitter or GSR Decal Fitter Pro you can even apply the decals to curved or bumpy surfaces smoothly. The decals are silk-screen printed and thus very high quality, and they can be coated with clear paints with no negative effects. A solid area of color, along with 9 different sized stripes of color are included on each sheet. The Lamé Flake pattern is available in Black, Red and Purple.
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Can be used on a variety of different models with nine differently sized stripes included on each sheet.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-38 GSR Color Decals (Black Lamé Flake) (MSS-38 GSRからーでかーる（らめ ぶらっく）)

subtitle: Aid to all through her holy prayers.
description: From the ever popular Ragnarok Online which has won Oricon's "Most Players" award for three consecutive years comes a Nendoroid of the Archbishop character!

She comes with many optional parts that allow her to take a variety of poses such as wielding her staff ready for battle, or sitting down to increase her regeneration rate - poses that players of the game will really be able to associate with. She also comes with a Porin, and items to customize her with - the "Balloon Hand" and the "Heart-Ribbon Hairband". A stats ticket of the Heart-Ribbon Hairband identical to the one in the game is also included!
name: Nendoroid Archbishop (ねんどろいど あーくびしょっぷ)

subtitle: Tsundere time is over, let's rock!
description: From the popular dating sim adventure game, "Sekirara" comes the fifth figma heroine - Mana Miyuki!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Various items from the game are included, such as her laptop and her "disciplinary committee" armband.
Her acoustic guitar is included along with a guitar case that can hold it. Hand parts to hold the guitar are also included.
Two expressions are included each looking in different directions, along with the doubtful expression seen in the game.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mana Miyuki: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま みゆきまな せいふくver.)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

These Lamé Flake patterns allows you to create various fun effects on your models, such as the designs on decorated trucks or highway racing cars. By using the GSR Decal Fitter or GSR Decal Fitter Pro you can even apply the decals to curved or bumpy surfaces smoothly. The decals are silk-screen printed and thus very high quality, and they can be coated with clear paints with no negative effects. A solid area of color, along with 9 different sized stripes of color are included on each sheet. The Lamé Flake pattern is available in Black, Red and Purple.

subtitle: figma Love Machine is invading the real world! Recreate the epic battles seen that summer!
description: From the award winning 2009 film, "Summer Wars" comes a figma of the villanous avatar that appeared in the virtual world of OZ, "Love Machine".
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the loincloth, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
As a first in the figma world, replaceable parts are included that allow his eyes to look in different direction.
Love Machine's huge halberd, as well as the bunch of keys from the film are included, as well as a halo that shows off his power.
A small figure of temporary-Kenji being punched is also included with a stand. Recreate poor Kenji's futile attempts to fight Love Machine!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Love Machine (ふぃぐま らぶましーん)

subtitle: The popular new alloy series continues: Change!! Getter-1
description: The new alloy figure series from Art Storm, 'ES Alloy' continues! ES, or "Excellent Short" style, is a compact, deformed figure style that allows the figures to take many poses, allowing them to be displayed in various enjoyable ways!

All three of the Getter Machines, Getter-1, Getter-2 and Getter-3 are all being released simultaneously. Getter-1 includes the Getter Tomahawk , the Getter Machine Gun as well as various hand parts to enrich the posing possibilities of the figure. It's a perfect addition to the cute, yet robust alloy figure series.
Be sure to add all the three figures to your collection!
name: ES Alloy 03: Getter-1 (いーえすごうきん 03 げったーわん)
copyright: © 永井豪・石川賢／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: figma Haruhi from a completely different world!
description: From the movie "The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma of Haruhi wearing her Kouyou Academy uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
As a first in the figma series, Haruhi comes with a figma-sized cloth sleeping bag based on the one in the film. Head parts for sleeping also included!
Two expressions for Haruhi are included - a sleeping face, as well as the sullen face she had before she met Kyon.
An embarrassed, but smiling expression for use on the Nagato figma is also included - something needed to recreate even more scenes from the movie.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Haruhi Suzumiya: Kouyou Academy uniform ver. (ふぃぐま すずみやはるひ こうようえんがくいんver.)
copyright: © 2009 Nagaru Tanigawa・Noizi ito／SOS団　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Anti-Shadow special android Aigis: operation start.
description: A figma of the self-conscious combat android 'Aigis', designed to suppress the Shadow outbreak.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Three expressions are included - a 'normal face', a 'smiling face' and an 'angry face', enough expression to make her not seem like a robot!
The machine guns that attach to both arms can be attached and removed, and her 'Rocket Punch' arm is also included.
Clear parts that can be attached to the bottom of the feet allow her to stand without a figma stand.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Aigis (ふぃぐま あいぎす)

subtitle: "I'm Aigis, the android maiden!"
description: The 18th character to join the partly posable Nendoroid Plus Plushie series is Aigis from Persona 3! The powerful android that is actually an anti-Shadow weapon herself, has been given an adorable plushie rendition! ♪♪
A rocket-punch glove is included and can be equipped and removed, plus the legs and arms are fitted with posable joints, allowing you to pick your favorite poses!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 18: Persona 3 - Aigis (ねんどろいどぷらすぬいぐるみシリーズ18 ぺるそな3 あいぎす)

subtitle: The official mascot of the racing team is back again!
description: Racing Miku is back once again in the GSR Character Customize Series! A whole new set of decals illustrated by redjuice are ready to give your favorite car a makeover! The images are based off the same images used on the official racing machine used in the 2010 SUPER GT - you can use these decals to mimic the exact same design of the official car, or create your very own!

The decals are printed through silk-screen printing, which leaves them very robust with beautiful color that won't fade easily. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Decals 017 - 1/24th Scale Racing Miku vol.2 (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる017／Racingみく vol.2)

subtitle: figma Yoshika Miyafuji... take off!
description: With the second season currently being broadcast in Japan, the popular series "Strike Witches" sees its first figma, the novice witch with amazing potential, Yoshika Miyafuji!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.

Both her striker unit and her weapon, the 2nd model 99 aircraft cannon are both included, and special care has been placed on the ever-important lower body clothing, which have been made as "shift:body" pieces, which are high quality non-posable body parts.
Her ears and tail that appear when using magic power are both included, as well as replaceable parts on the striker unit that allow rotating and still propellers.
Three facial expressions are included: a normal face, a shouting face and a happy face as if Yoshika is touching something "big and soft".
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yoshika Miyafuji (ふぃぐま みやふじよしか)

subtitle: The adult charm of Bayonetta - now available in decals!
description: From the climatic action game from Sega and Platinum Games "Bayonetta" comes an exiting set of 1/24th decals to spice up your favorite model cars with both decals of the stunning Bayonetta herself, and a variety of decals based on the world she comes from. Create your very own Bayonetta Itasha!

The entire sheet of decals makes use of silk-screen printing, meaning the decals are durable, beautifully colored and will not fade over time. The decals are designed for use with the Modeller Support Series' "Decal Fitter" and "Decal Fitter Pro".
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decal Set 014: Bayonetta - 1/24th scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる014／ べよねった)

subtitle: "Place the product in the cart, click... place the product in the cart, click..."
description: The original mascot character "wooser" seen in various places including Black Rock Shooter is getting its very own plushie! The design was created by supercell's member and character designer, Usa!

With its highly noticeable presence and soft, fluffy feel, its almost impossible to not want to give it a hug every time you see it! As a bonus extra, twits from twitter selected by the creator, "Usa" will be placed onto stickers - a total of 30 available, but three randomly placed together with each plushie.
This product will only be sold on 'amazon.co.jp' and 'goodsmile online'.
name: wooser Plushie (うーさーぬいぐるみ)

subtitle: The short but powerful drummer!
description: From the popular anime and manga series "K-ON!" comes a 1/7th PVC figure of the president of the K-ON music club, as well as the club's drummer - Ritsu Tainaka. She is wearing a jersey over her school uniform, just as she appeared in the show. She is posed with her school bag slung over her shoulder - a pose that really brings Ritsu's rough and lively personality out!

You can see her drumsticks sticking out of the bag slung over her shoulders, plus there is even a little mascot character hanging off the bag! Whilst it might not be on the stage, it's still a great scene out of Ritsu's everyday life!
name: Ritsu Tainaka (たいなか りつ)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Always by your side ♪The character charms from Love Plus are getting a re-release!
description: From the popular dating simulation game "Love Plus" comes a second release of the character charms of Rinko, Nene and Manaka!

They are all in their chibi animal costumes that were seen in the game, which just adds even more of a cute feeling to the already adorable characters. You can put them on your DS, on your cellphone or even just keep them on you at all times - however you do it you'll be able to be with your special "girlfriend" even more than before! If you missed out on the first release, don't miss out on this one!
name: Character Charm Collection: Love Plus - Bunny Manaka (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん らぶぷらす うさまなか)

subtitle: The legendary magical girl: ready to decorate your 1/24th scale model cars.
description: Another addition to the GSR Character Customize Series, this time Takamachi Nanoha from Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st is here to give your favorite model car a full itasha make-over!

In addition to a multitude of images of Nanoha, there are also various other decals featuring elements from the story, and others of Raging Heart. There are countless ways you can make a Nanoha Itasha using this set of decals! Another set of decals featuring Fate are being released simultaneously, so you can use them together to make the ultimate magical girl design!
The decals are printed using silk-screen printing, giving durable decals with brilliant color. The decals are designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'. Made in Japan.
name: GSC Character Customize Series Decal Set 015: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st: Nanoha Takamachi - 1/24th Scale ( GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる015／ まほうしょうじょ りりかるなのは The MOVIE 1st “たかまちなのは”)

subtitle: All the unique traits of the heroines captured in Nenoroid form!
description: From the romantic comedy set in a fantasy school, "Ichiban Ushiro no Daimaou" comes a set of petite Nendoroids featuring some of the girls that appeared around Akuto's side during the show. The set includes Keena Soga, the mysterious and spontaneous flying girl, as well as Junko Hattori, the earnest and pure class representative and finally Korone, the Liladan android that was put in charge of watching Akuto.

Each girl also comes with their own respective optional parts, such as a rice tub for Keena, a sword for Junko and Korone's 'mystical tool'. Each figure also comes with an additional comedic expression for some extra laughs. A variety of ways to enjoy the girls of the show in adorable Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Ichiban Ushiro no Daimaou Set (ねんどろいどぷち いちばんうしろのだいまおうせっと)
copyright: © 水城正太郎/ホビージャパン・コンスタン魔術学院

subtitle: Masking will never be a problem again!
description: A powerful rubber-based masking agent that will peel off easily without ruining the color of your models - allowing for the quickest and easiest masking on your models ever! It also makes use of a bright pink color for easy visibility.

No matter what kind of modeling you need it for, this masking agent will work on anything from a bumpy surface down to a wide flat surface. The bottle has a wide opening for more stable application. Please note that this product should not be used with water-based paints.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-35 GSR: Mask of Sol (MSS-35 GSR かいけつ！ぞる)

subtitle: Another magical girl, also ready to decorate your 1/24th scale model cars
description: . Another addition to the GSR Character Customize Series, comes decals of Fate Testarossa from Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st, ready to give your favorite model car a full itasha make-over!

In addition to a multitude of images of Fate, there are also various other decals featuring elements from the story, and others of Bardiche. There are countless ways you can make a Nanoha Itasha using this set of decals! Another set of decals featuring Nanoha are being released simultaneously, so you can use them together to make the ultimate magical girl design!
The decals are printed using silk-screen printing, giving durable decals with brilliant color. The decals are designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'. Made in Japan.
name: GSC Character Customize Series Decal Set 016: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st: Fate Testarossa - 1/24th Scale ( GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる016／ まほうしょうじょ りりかるなのは The MOVIE 1st “ふぇいと・てすたろっさ”)

subtitle: The girls and guys who stood up and fought their fate - condensed into petite Nendoroid form!
description: Another set of three Nendoroid Petite figures from "Angel Beats!", this time featuring Tenshi, the student council president of the afterlife, Otonashi, the main character who awakens with amnesia of the time he was alive and Yui, who was the adorable vocalist and guitarist of the band Girls Dead Monster.

Each figure comes with optional items, such as Tenshi's Hand Sonic parts, Otonashi's gun and Yui's guitar, allowing for a variety of different poses and scenes to be remade in Nendoroid form. Tenshi also comes with two facial expressions: her standard emotionless face, as well as the smiling face that she showed in the final episode.
name: Nendoroid Petite: Angel Beats Set 02 (ねんどろいど ぷち えんじぇるびーつ! せっと02)

subtitle: CR-5, assemble!
description: From the adventure game "Lucky Dog 1" comes cute plushies of two more of CR5's members, Luchino Gregoretti and Bernardo Ortolani!
The dazzlingly gorgeous Luchino and the darling Bernardo wearing his glasses are both ready to be cuddled with all your other plushies! Collect all the CR-5 members and display them all together! ♪
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 6: Bernardo Ortolani (らっきーどっく１ぬいぐるみしりーず⑥ べるなるど・おるとらーに)

subtitle: Always by your side ♪The character charms from Love Plus are getting a re-release!
description: From the popular dating simulation game "Love Plus" comes a second release of the character charms of Rinko, Nene and Manaka!

They are all in their chibi animal costumes that were seen in the game, which just adds even more of a cute feeling to the already adorable characters. You can put them on your DS, on your cellphone or even just keep them on you at all times - however you do it you'll be able to be with your special "girlfriend" even more than before! If you missed out on the first release, don't miss out on this one!
name: Character Charm Collection: Love Plus - Cat Rinko (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん らぶぷらす ねこりんこ)

subtitle: The reliable monk with the power to heal wounds.
description: From the 3D RPG "Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City" comes a soft plushie of the monk, cutely posed with an adorable expression.

You'll feel relaxed with the monks healing powers by your side! She is due to be released together with the pirate and the princess plushies from the same game, so be sure to display them all together! ♪♪
name: Etrian Odyssey III Plushie Series 02: Monk (せかいじゅのめいきゅう3 ぬいぐるみしりーず2 もんく)
series: Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City

subtitle: The descendant of the pirates that lived on the sea.
description: From the 3D RPG "Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City" comes a sexy plushie of the pirate, posed showing off all her charm in adorable plushie form!
Her trademark pirate hat can be attached and removed! She is due to be released together with the monk and the princess plushies from the same game, so be sure to display them all together! ♪♪
name: Etrian Odyssey III Plushie Series 03: Pirate (せかいじゅのめいきゅう3 ぬいぐるみしりーず3 ぱいれーつ)
series: Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City

subtitle: The deathly smile that rises above the darkness.
description: Black Rock Shooter's rival-to-be, "Dead Master" is getting her own PVC figure, based on an illustration by her original creator, huke!

Dead Master stands with a relaxed expression as a fearless smile stretches across her face. In her right hand she wields her giant sickle, "Death Scythe", and in her left hand she holds a skull which can be replaced with a chain using the included replaceable parts. It’s a figure that shows both the mystery surrounding Dead Master, as well as emphasizes the unique style that can only be found in the world of Black Rock Shooter.
name: Dead Master -original version- (でっどますたー おりじなるばーじょん)

subtitle: The 2nd Black Rock Shooter accessory!
description: Yet another accessory from Black Rock Shooter! The 2nd one to join this metal charm collection is the "Dead Scythe" belonging to the series' main antagonist and Black Rock Shooter's rival, Dead Master.

The charm is based on the original illustration by the creator, huke - and its unique design and tinted coloring have all been kept as close to the original as possible, creating a charm that is a true gem to the look at. It is attached to a genuine leather strap, all-in-all making a top quality accessory to keep with you wherever you go!
name: Black Rock Shooter Metal Charm Collection 02: Dead Scythe (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー めたるちゃーむこれくしょん02 でっどさいず)

subtitle: Always by your side ♪The character charms from Love Plus are getting a re-release!
description: From the popular dating simulation game "Love Plus" comes a second release of the character charms of Rinko, Nene and Manaka!

They are all in their chibi animal costumes that were seen in the game, which just adds even more of a cute feeling to the already adorable characters. You can put them on your DS, on your cellphone or even just keep them on you at all times - however you do it you'll be able to be with your special "girlfriend" even more than before! If you missed out on the first release, don't miss out on this one!
name: Character Charm Collection: Love Plus - Tanuki Nene (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん らぶぷらす ぽんぽこねね)

subtitle: Lined up and ready to support the racing! An adorable Racing Miku Set!
description: Reservations start at 18:00 on 2010/07/13 at Niconico Chokuhan!
Niconico Chokuhan: http:niconico.qt.shopserve.jp/ (Japanese only)

Miku Hatsune's racing alter-ego, Racing Miku, along with Rin Kagamine and Luka Megurine - all the girls of Vocaloid are becoming petite Nendoroids dressed in mechanic outfits and ready to help out at the race track!

The original concept of Racing Miku being a mechanic is really brought out by this set - but it also shows just how cute she can be even as a mechanic! Also included is a pull-back car based off the Miku GT Car that is really taking part in races, using the new colors and decals that debuted in July!
The atmosphere in the pits is due for a cuteness upgrade, and here it is!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Racing Miku Set - 2010 ver. (ねんどろいどぷち れーしんぐみくせっと 2010 ver.)

subtitle: CR-5, assemble!
description: From the adventure game "Lucky Dog 1" comes cute plushies of two more of CR5's members, Luchino Gregoretti and Bernardo Ortolani!
The dazzlingly gorgeous Luchino and the darling Bernardo wearing his glasses are both ready to be cuddled with all your other plushies! Collect all the CR-5 members and display them all together! ♪
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 5: Luchino Gregoretti (らっきーどっく１ぬいぐるみしりーず⑤ るきーの・ぐれごれってぃ)

subtitle: The vivid Panther Pink - with bumblebee stipes!
description: A special charming MOPER MUSCLE model car! With the Panther Pink body paint, and the SE model of the Dodge Challenger which included a vinyl roof, leather seats and a Rallye instrument cluster. Even the smaller rear window of the SE model has been carefully modeled into miniature size. All that, and it is even painted with the popular bumblebee stripe to boot. It's the ultimate Challenger for avid collectors!

The GSR Cars: American Muscle Series is a series that aims to create new generation 1/43th scale mini-cars with the deepest care for details. Digital planning is used to make sure that every model is made to specifications, even through mass production; the bodies are made from high quality ABS-resin, and painted with top quality paints to truly leave you with a realistic and perfectly made model of your favorite cars!
name: GSR Cars: American Muscle Series 04 - 1970 Dodge Challenger (Panther Pink) (GSRかーず・あめりかんまっする・しりーず04 だっじ ちゃれんじゃー (ぱんさーぴんく)1970)
copyright: Dodge is a trademark of Chrysler Group LLC. Dodge Challenger and its trade dress are used under license by Good Smile Racing Co., Ltd. © Chrysler Group LLC 2010. Goodyear (and winged foot design) is a trademark of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company, used under license by Good Smile Racing Co. Ltd,

subtitle: The descendant of the Daishou Nation and charismatic force in Armoroad.
description: From the 3D RPG "Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City" comes a soft plushie of the princess posed in a highly dignified yet still super adorable pose.

She comes with her staff which can be attached to her hand using internal magnets and is due to be released together with the pirate and the monk plushies from the same game - so be sure to display them all together! ♪♪
name: Etrian Odyssey III Plushie Series 01: Princess (せかいじゅのめいきゅう3 ぬいぐるみしりーず1 ぷりんせす)
series: Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City

subtitle: The most ferocious car in the world! The overpowering ultimate monster car!
description: The car designed by Carroll Shelby that has the prestige of winning the 24 hour race, the "Le Mans". The Shelby Cobra 427 is an open-roofed sports car known as the most ferocious car in the world. Originally designed as a 2.0 liter car in an AC Ace 2-seater roadster, it then received a special model that made use of a Ford V8 428 Cu.in engine (7.0 L) rated at 425 bhp.

Some of the racing models were detuned and made road worthy, and become known as semi-competition (S/C) cars that kept a certain charm from the originals, and this model is here to show that charm. From the fender to the roll-bars - if you're a sports car fan, this is one model that should do it for you. The Cobra owned the roads with its 425 hp engine, and now you can own the Cobra for your very own collection!

The GSR Cars: American Muscle Series is a series that aims to create new generation 1/43th scale mini-cars with the deepest care for details. Digital planning is used to make sure that every model is made to specifications, even through mass production; the bodies are made from high quality ABS-resin, and painted with top quality paints to truly leave you with a realistic and perfectly made model of your favorite cars!
name: GSR Cars: American Muscle Series 01 - 1965 Shelby Cobra (GSRかーず・あめりかんれじぇんど・しりーず01 しぇるびー 427 S/C 1965)
copyright: SHELBY® , 427 S/C® , GT-350® , GT-500® , SUPERSNAKE® are registered trademarks and/or the tradedress of Carroll Shelby and Carroll Shelby Licensing, Inc. (Shelby).COBRA and the COBRA SNAKE Designs are trademarks of Ford Motor Company used under license. Goodyear (and winged foot design) is a trademark of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company, used under license by Good Smile Racing Co. Ltd,

subtitle: OZ’s net-fighting contest champion!.
description: From Summer Wars comes a posable plushie doll of Ikezawa Kazuma's avatar in the world of OZ, the rabbit avatar "King Kazuma".
All the details of the impressively strong King Kazuma have been recreated in a huggable plushie format, and he even has joints placed in his arms and legs which allow him to take a number of poses!
name: Summer Wars King Kazuma Plushie (さまーうぉーず きんぐ・かずまぬいぐるみ（かどうしき）)

subtitle: The fashionable yet mysterious Vocaloid, with a husky voice.
description: From the popular "Character Vocal Series" comes yet another figma, Luka Megurine!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Luka's standard face, as well as a singing face ideal for a Vocaloid are both included as facial expressions.
Various extras are included, such as the well-known tuna fish "Ooma-san", as well as a new classic mike to sing into.
Careful attention to detail has left Luka just as stunning as she should be, including the metallically colored parts of her outfit.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Megurine Luka (ふぃぐま めぐりねるか)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: -How to use a Pass Case-
description: Good Smile Company's accessory division, "dicokick" is bringing you six of the popular characters from the Star Wars universe as acrylic "Pass Cases".

They are simple to use: simply place any smart card inside the case and lock it inside with the included chain. After that you can use the card just as normal! You can then attach it to your bag, which is sure to make you stand out in a crowd!
name: Star Wars Acrylic Pass Cases (C-3PO/R2-D2/Darth Vader/Stormtrooper/Yoda/Boba Fett) (すたー・うぉーずあくりるぱすけーす (C-3PO/R2-D2/Darth Vader/Stormtrooper/Yoda/Boba Fett))
price: 5900JPY each (Excluding Boba Fett who will be 6500JPY)

subtitle: Do you remember? That time at the library?
description: From the hit animated film "The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a Nendoroid of Yuki Nagato.

She includes three expressions, which is quite the repertoire for Nagato! She also comes two different upper body parts - one wearing her coat, and the other her cardigan and she also comes with her glasses, which can be removed and held in her hand - with all this you can recreate a multitude of scenes that appeared in the film!
It's the perfect Nendoroid to recreate all your favorite Nagato scenes!
name: Nendoroid Yuki Nagato: Disappearance ver. (ねんどろいど ながとゆき しょうしつver.)

subtitle: The humble and honest warrior priestess of Hinomoto.
description: From the action anime "Queen's Blade" comes a Nendoroid of Tomoe, the warrior priestess of Masakado Shine, and the protector of the Hinomoto lands. Tomoe's lovable smile and humble personality has all been condensed into Nendoroid form!

Her sword which is her pride and joy is included as an optional part, along with some religious seals. She also includes replaceable parts to let her be displayed in a more exposed pose. Display her with the previously announced Reina, and recreate your favorite battle scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Tomoe (ねんどろいど ともえ)
copyright: © 2009 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイドパートナーズ

subtitle: The first in the Evangelion figma series is finally on its way!
description: From the second 'Rebuild of Evangelion' movie comes the heroine shrouded in mystery, Makinami Mari Illustrious!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
The neck features a brand new double figma joint that allows for a multitide of new facial expressions.
Her torso is made from a combination of hard and soft materials, leaving the feeling of the plugsuit as realistic as possible.
You can recreate various scenes of Mari piloting her suit using the included interior of the entry-plug, which features posable renditions of the seat, control lever and more!
Three expressions are included: A smiling face, a grinning face perfect for Mari, and even the screaming face she put on while in beast mode.
Exchangeable parts to recreate the "beast mode" scene are included, along with parts that give the back of her head a different look.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Makinami Mari Illustrious: New Plugsuit ver. (ふぃぐま まきなみ・まり・いらすとりあす しんがたぷらぐすーつばーじょん)

subtitle: A new revolution for decals! Holographic decals that can even be placed on curved surfaces!
description: A brand new set of holographic decals to allow for even more customization on your favorite models!

This Hologram 1 version features a gridded pattern, and allows you to create various textures and effects, similar to those seen on decorated trucks and cars. By using the GSR Decal Fitter or GSR Decal Fitter Pro you can even apply the decals to curved or bumpy surfaces smoothly. The decals are silk-screen printed and thus very high quality, and they can be coated with clear paints with no negative effects. A solid area of color, along with 9 different sized stripes of color are all included on each sheet.
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Can be used on a variety of different models with nine differently sized stripes included on each sheet.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-36 GSR Color Decals (Hologram 1) (MSS-36 GSRからーでかーる（ほろぐらむ1）)

subtitle: A new revolution for decals! Holographic decals that can even be placed on curved surfaces!
description: A brand new set of holographic decals to allow for even more customization on your favorite models!

This Hologram 2 version features a spotted pattern, and allows you to create various textures and effects, such as spangles on character models. By using the GSR Decal Fitter or GSR Decal Fitter Pro you can even apply the decals to curved or bumpy surfaces smoothly. The decals are silk-screen printed and thus very high quality, and they can be coated with clear paints with no negative effects. A solid area of color, along with 9 different sized stripes of color are included on each sheet.
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Can be used on a variety of different models with nine differently sized stripes included on each sheet.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-37 GSR Color Decals (Hologram 2) (MSS-37 GSRからーでかーる（ほろぐらむ2）)

subtitle: A beautiful face and figure thats good in both acedemics and sports - it's the perfect Izumi ♪
description: From the popular romance adventure game "Sekirara" comes a figma of the main character's childhood friend, "Izumi Shizuno".
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Various little extras are included, such as a vacuum cleaner and the deeply meaningful YES/NO pillows.
A cake is also included and smaller cut slices can be taken off and placed on a small plate.
Two expressions are included: a bright smile brimming with affection, as well as a charming winking face.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Izumi Shizuno: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま しづのいずみ せいふくver.)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: The blue flash that shoots through the darkness.
description: From the popular "Black Rock Shooter" comes yet another PVC figure - this time the "animation" version based on the upcoming anime! This new sculpt features a much more dynamic scene compared to the previous figures: Black Rock Shooter is in mid-motion, dashing forward while ready to fire the giant "Rock Cannon" she holds with both hands.
The stand the figure is placed on also creates quite the scene, with chains wound around the collapsing ground - it adds even more to the lively feeling of the figure!
name: Black Rock Shooter -animation version- (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー あにめーしょんばーじょん)

subtitle: The king of muscle with a hidden wild charm!
description: MOPER MUSCLE's display model, the Dodge Challenger, was originally designed by Carl Cameron at the Chrysler Advanced Design Studio. The dynamic style of the original design has been compressed, but kept to the original every step of the way, making an ideal model of the car.

The Dodge Challenger had a 425 bhp, 426 cu in hemi engine loaded on a sports grade R/T model and even had a vinyl roof - it was a very scarce yet powerful design. That design along with the high-impact Plum Crazy coloring, makes this a really stunning Challenger to add to your collection.

The GSR Cars: American Muscle Series is a series that aims to create new generation 1/43th scale mini-cars with the deepest care for details. Digital planning is used to make sure that every model is made to specifications, even through mass production, the bodies are made from high quality ABS-resin, and painted with top quality paints to truly leave you with a realistic and perfectly made model of your favorite cars!
name: GSR Cars: American Muscle Series 03 - 1970 Dodge Challenger (Plum Crazy) (GSRかーず・あめりかんまっする・しりーず03 だっじ ちゃれんじゃー (ぷらむくれいじー)1970)
copyright: Dodge is a trademark of Chrysler Group LLC. Dodge Challenger and its trade dress are used under license by Good Smile Racing Co., Ltd. © Chrysler Group LLC 2010. Goodyear (and winged foot design) is a trademark of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company, used under license by Good Smile Racing Co. Ltd,

subtitle: The crow-tengu closest to home!
description: The 16th member to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series is the Touhou Project's traditional Genso reporter, Aya Syameimaru!

Aya comes with her camera to make her reports, as well as with a leaf fan - both of which can be attached to her hand with magnets! She also comes with her cute tengu hat made from ABS, and as always the arms and legs are fitted with joints for you to pose however you want!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 16: Aya Syameimaru (ねんどろいどぷらすぬいぐるみシリーズ16 しゃめいまる あや)

subtitle: Petite Nendoroids of the cute witches of Gensokyou!
description: From the popular doujin game series, the "Touhou Project" created by the doujin circle Shanghai Alice comes a set of three adorable petite Nendoroids from the world of Gensokyou - Marisa Kirisame, Patchouli Knowledge and Alice Margatroid are all joining the other Touhou girls from the previous set.

Each of them also comes with some specific items that relate to them - Marisa even has her magical token which allows her to be posed using her signature attack, "Master Spark". A grassy plain is also included to place them on.
Display them together with the first Petite Nendoroid set, and let the Touhou universe continue to grow in your collection!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Touhou Project Set #2 (ねんどろいどぷち とうほうぷろじぇくとせっと だいにしょう)

subtitle: The adorable girls that fight in the afterlife!
description: From the popular anime currently airing in Japan, "Angel Beats" comes a Nendoroid Petite set featuring Yuri, Shiina and Yusa - three of the girls from the "Afterlife War Front".

The set comes with a variety of optional parts that tie in with the series, such as Yuri's pistol, and Shiina's short swords. Yuri also comes with both a smiling face and an angry face, leaving you able to recreate the Angel Beats world in a variety of different ways!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Angel Beats! Set 01 (ねんどろいど ぷち えんじぇるびーつ! せっと01)

subtitle: Haruhi Suzumiya - back when she was a first year student!
description: From "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma of Haruhi when Kyon met her three years in the past!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the torso and between the legs, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
The paint cart for drawing white lines that was seen in the episode "Bamboo Leaf Rhapsody" is included for "John Smith" to use.
The bench that featured multiple times in the series is included. Let your favourite figma take a seat!
An irritated face perfect for the young Haruhi, as well as a sceptical face are both included as expressions.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Haruhi Suzumiya: Middle School ver. (ふぃぐま すずみやはるひ ちゅうがくせいばーじょん)
copyright: © 2009 Nagaru Tanigawa・Noizi ito/SOS団 ※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Accessories from the upcoming Black Rock Shooter anime!
description: From the popular "Black Rock Shooter" comes a brand new Metal Charm Collection! The first in the collection is the well-known "Rock Cannon", and it has been made into a metal charm whilst keeping its solid feeling and appearance in tact,. It can be kept just for collection's sake, or used as an accessory with the included chain - an accessory any fan should keep with them.
name: Black Rock Shooter Metal Charm Collection 01: Rock Cannon (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー めたるちゃーむこれくしょん01 ★ろっく かのん)

subtitle: The number one combatant in CR:5 - Mad Dog!
description: From the adventure game "Lucky Dog 1" comes a plushie of CR5's 3rd leader, Giulio Di Bondone. Even the poker-faced Giulio has joined the adorable plushies! Seen he looks up to Giancarlo, be sure to display them together! ♪
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 4: Giulio Di Bondone (らっきーどっくぬいぐるみしりーず④ じゅりお・でぃ・ぼんどーね)

subtitle: F-class' adorable genius.
description: From the school comedy series with an upcoming continuation, "Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu" comes this adorable PVC figure of the well-behaved top student - Mizuki Himeji. She has been posed turning around with an embarrassed look on her face, as if someone has just called out to her. The innocent yet charming expression on her face is perfectly appropriate for the lady-like Mizuki!
As an added bonus, her summoned creature is also included as a Nendoroid Petite for your collection - display them together and let them fight their way to A class!
name: Mizuki Himeji (ひめじみずき)
series: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu (Idiots, Tests and Summoned Beasts)
sculptor: Mizuki Himeji: Ryou Hashimoto, Summon: César
copyright: © 2010 Kenji Inoue／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN，INC.／バカとテストと召喚獣製作委員

subtitle: She's a monster that eats stories?!
description: From the anime movie recently released in Japanese theaters, "Bungaku Shoujo: The Movie" which is based on the popular light novel series of the same name, is this Nendoroid of the head of the literature club, the "Literature Girl" Tooko Amano.

Various poses can be taken with the Nendoroid, such as the familiar pose of Tooko sitting with her legs up on a chair, or even the scene where she eats pages from a book can be remade with included stickers. You can even place her inside the Surströmmings and make her look like a fish-girl using the included replaceable parts. The possibilities to recreate your favorite scenes are all there!
name: Nendoroid Tooko Amano

subtitle: CR:5 is freaking cool!
description: From the adventure game "Lucky Dog 1" comes a plushie of CR5's 4th leader, Ivan Fiore. The always aggressive and impulsive Ivan is now a cute plushie... even with his piercings, which are made from real metal. Make sure to give him a lot of attention or who knows what might happen...
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 3: Ivan Fiore (らっきーどっく１ぬいぐるみしりーず③ いう゛ぁん・ふぃおーれ)

subtitle: The mysterious plushie whose very body is a weapon.
description: From the popular comedy anime "Tentai Senshi Sun Red" comes this adorable plushie of the Florsheim Kawasaki Branch's animal soldier super ace, "P-chan Custom". Even his missile has received a fluffy plushie rendition to accompany him.

Weights have been placed in the bottom of the plushie, allowing it to be placed in a stable sitting position easily. He looks great displayed with the already announced "Usacot", from the same series - so be sure to display them together!
name: Animal Soldier Plushie Series: P-chan Custom (あにまるそるじゃー ぬいぐるみしりーず ぴーちゃん・かい)
copyright: © くぼたまこと／スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: Cute, adorable Nendoroids from the magical girl world!
description: The various characters from the anime movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha: The MOVIE 1st" have joined the adorable Nendoroid Petite world for you to add them to your collection!

The two heroines, Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa are of course both included, and along with them comes the friends who supported them - Yuuno, Arf and Chrono are also all in the set! Also included are extra versions of Nanoha and Fate in casual clothes, as well as Nanoha's two friends - Alisa Bannings and Suzuka Tsukimura - allowing you to recreate the peaceful days Nanoha had in between her life as a magical girl!
Altogether that makes an impressive ten figures - plus there is a secret eleventh figure. Recreate your favourite scenes in miniature Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha: The MOVIE 1st (ねんどろいど ぷち まほうしょうじょりりかるなのは ざ むーびーふぁーすと)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The third Love Plus Nendoroid is the older girl who relies on her part-time job.
description: Following the release of Manaka and Rinko comes the long-awaited release of Nene Anegasaki's Nendoroid! As with the previous releases, four facial expressions are included based on various events from the game - including the kiss scene face, as well as an expression to recreate the face of the adorable phone mascot! She also comes complete with a variety of optional parts for you to pose her with.
Recreate your favorite scenes with the lovable Nene - all in Nendoroid form, or display her together with Manaka and Rinko and get together with all the Love Plus girls at once!
name: Nendoroid Nene Anegasaki (ねんどろいど あねがさきねね)

subtitle: The girl who smiles in the darkness, wrapped in shadows.
description: From the anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a figma of Black Rock Shooter's rival, Dead Master.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
She comes with two expressions: a smiling face as well as insidious expression with her tongue out.
Her jet-black scythe, "Dead Scythe" has been given a metallic appearance which gives it an eerie air.
The stand includes two giant skulls. You recreate the action scenes from the series in all their glory!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Dead Master (ふぃぐま でっどますたー)

subtitle: A stunning BRS Plushie!!
description: Black Rock Shooter, the original character designed by huke, is joining the posable Nendoroid Plus Plushie series! ♪

With the anime creating a whole new presence for Black Rock Shooter, this plushie is yet another great item for fans. She is so adorable that you almost can't help pick her up and give her a hug every time you see her. Even the blue flame on her left eye has been recreated in plushie form!

BRS's Rock Cannon is also included and can be attached and taken off using the magnets inside. She is fitted with a number of joints allowing you to pose her sitting down, or even in action poses! - Pick your favorite pose and display it for all to see!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 17: Black Rock Shooter (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ17 ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: How many resales of this famous virtual singer are there going to be? She's back again!
description: As her popularity never seems to lose any momentum, everybody's favorite singing idol is getting yet another resale on her adorable Nendoroid rendition that was based her official public illustration - just shrunk down to Nendoroid size!

The package also includes separate arms, heads, legs and accessories to match her many moods and motions, including a singing pose, the very silly 'Hachune Miku' face and of course her fan-favorite trademark leek.
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku (ねんどろいど はつねみく)

subtitle: The adult Mikuru that came from the future! ♪
description: From the popular anime "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a figma the older and more charming Adult ver. of Mikuru Asahina!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blouse and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
A desk and chair are included to recreate the classroom from the show.
She comes with a standard smiling face, the famous "It's classified information" winking face as well as a sleeping face designed for use on the younger Mikuru.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mikuru Asahina: Adult ver. (ふぃぐま あさひなみくる おとなver.)
copyright: © 2007、2008、2009 谷川流・いとうのいぢ／SOS団　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Return to the events of that unforgettable summer with figma King Kazma!
description: From the 2009 film that was a huge hit, "Summer Wars" comes a figma of King Kazma, the rabbit avatar that held the title of 'Champion Fighter' in the virtual world of OZ.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for bendable areas such as the jacket, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Two expressions are included, a standard face as well a grinning face to show the weight of all his combat.
Another one of the avatars, the strangely-cute avatar that Kenji used when his was stolen is also included with a stand.
As always, a number of hand parts are included, as well as the banner used in the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma King Kazma (ふぃぐま きんぐ・かずま)

subtitle: A fully posable Saber Nendoroid is here!
description: From 'Fate/stay night' comes another Nendoroid of the main heroine, Saber - but this time she comes as a "Super Movable Edition" which has fully posable joints throughout the body for even more poses than before!

She comes with three expressions: a smiling face, an angry face and even a face in mid-tantrum. But that is not all - she also comes with her swords Excalibur and Caliburn, as well as replaceable parts to recreate the sword in its "Invisible Air" form. It's still the adorable Nendoroid, but the amount of ways to have fun with it have increased with this edition - you can create even more of your favorite scenes from the series now!
name: Nendoroid Saber: Super Movable Edition (ねんどろいど せいばー すーぱーむーばぶる・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: A petite body with a huge purpose. The girl who will change the fate of the world.
description: From the popular romance adventure game "Sekirara" comes a figma of the mysterious transfer student, Nozomi Akiyama!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Popular items from the game, such as a go board with stones, as well as a bath set and even an oversized bra are all included!
A variety of hand parts are included, with even a hand holding a go stone for you to recreate her best go games.
Three expressions are included: a standard face, a smiling face and the upward glancing face seen in the game.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Nozomi Akiyama: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま あきやまのぞみ せいふくver.)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: The third set of Bakemonogatari's weird and wonderful characters!
description: From the popular anime now released on Blu-ray and DVD, "Bakemonogatari" comes the third set of three petite Nendoroids - this time featuring the Araragi sisters Karen and Tsukihi, as well as Shinobu Oshino.

As before, each character has specific items that relate to them from the anime, and in addition to that extra parts are included to reposition them standing on their knees or sitting down - allowing for a whole different way to display them.
Yet another set that's ready to recreate all sorts of interesting scenes from the Bakemonogatari world in cute Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Bakemonogatari Set #3 (ねんどろいど ぷち ばけものがたりせっと そのさん)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Newly colored silk-screen decals and polishing wax specially designed for models!
description: Brand new colored decals with the same silk-screen printing for excellent color! These decals use coarse silver-colored particles to allow for a more vibrant and sparkling silver effect when compared to other products.

The printing is done via silk-screen printing and each sheet features a solid block of color as well as nine different stips of color, in various 0.3, 0.4, 0.75, 1.0, 1.2, 1.5, 1,7 and 2.0mm strips, meaning you can use it for a variety of different models!
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Can be used on a variety of different models with nine differently sized stripes included on each sheet.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-28 GSR Color Decals (Shine Silver) (MSS-28 GSRからーでかーる（しゃいんしるばー）)

subtitle: The huge magical girl plushie series begins!
description: From "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes another plushie of the main character, Takamachi Nanoha – but this plushie is an impressive 70cm in height... even while sitting! The newly designed barrier jacket has been adapted into a cute plushie form!

You can really understand the amazing size if you compare the 25cm Nendoroid Plus Plushie of Nanoha to the new 70cm plushie design! But just be careful - it might take up more space in your room than you have spare!
name: Lyrical Nanoha Giant Plushie Series 01: Nanoha Takamachi (りりかるなのはびっくぬいぐるみしりーず① たかまちなのは)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The mysterious plushie becomes a real plushie!
description: From the popular comedy anime "Tentai Senshi Sun Red" comes this adorable plushie of the Florsheim Kawasaki Branch's animal soldier division leader, Usacot!

Weights have been placed in the bottom of the plushie, allowing it to be placed in a sitting position easily, so it’s great to display in a car, your living room, your bed or wherever else you see fit. "P-chan Custom" is due to join him in just a few days, so look out for him as well!
name: Animal Soldier Plushie Series: Usacot (あにまるそるじゃー ぬいぐるみしりーず うさこっつ)
copyright: © くぼたまこと／スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: The elegant Head Maid of the Scalet Devil Mansion.
description: From the ever-popular Touhou Project comes yet another figma - this time it's the head maid who serves at the Scarlet Devil Mansion - Sakuya Izayoi!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Three facial expressions are included: a standard face, a glaring face as well as a grinning face with closed eyes.
Various must-have items are included as well, such as her seven throwing knives, her mop, and the pocket watch she uses with her powers. The sheathed knife on her side can also be used!
Stickers allowing you to recreate the emotions seen in the series are also included, and with all the different expressions allow you to create all sorts of scenes!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Sakuya Izayoi (ふぃぐま いざよいさくや)

subtitle: A man should never be jealous, got it?
description: From the adventure game, "Lucky Dog 1" comes a plushie of the main character, Giancarlo as well as one of his faithful dog Lanu - dressed in a prison uniform, but still just as adorable as any other puppy!

Through his clothes you can just see Giancarlo's belly button, just as in the original. Plus his dog Lanu is unbelievably cute dressed up in a prison uniform - he is just begging for some love. ♪ The cigar included with Giancarlo can be attached and removed using a magnet placed in his hand. ★
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 01: Giancarlo (らっきーどっく１ぬいぐるみシリーズ① じゃん・かるろ)

subtitle: A man should never be jealous, got it?
description: From the adventure game, "Lucky Dog 1" comes a plushie of the main character, Giancarlo as well as one of his faithful dog Lanu - dressed in a prison uniform, but still just as adorable as any other puppy!

Through his clothes you can just see Giancarlo's belly button, just as in the original. Plus his dog Lanu is unbelievably cute dressed up in a prison uniform - he is just begging for some love. ♪ The cigar included with Giancarlo can be attached and removed using a magnet placed in his hand. ★
name: Lucky Dog 1 Plushie Series 02: Lanu (らっきーどっく１ぬいぐるみシリーズ② らーぬ)

subtitle: The food-loving, always-hungry heroine!
description: From the romantic comedy visual novel game, "Flyable Heart" comes a PVC figure of the adorable heroine, Yui Inaba - sculpted keeping her cheerful personality intact with a carefree and innocent pose.

The figure is based on an illustration by the popular illustrator Noizi Ito, and has been sculpted to keep all the characteristics of the original illustration as carefully as possible - in particular the unique expression on Yui's face... which would never be the same if she wasn't munching on a donut!
name: Yui Inaba (いなばゆい)

subtitle: The priestess of the sun, shining as bright as ever at the beach.
description: The three company collaboration series between Max Factory, Hobby Japan and Sega continues to bring you the Shining Wind characters dressed in their swimsuits as beautiful PVC figures - the second to be released is the popular beauty that attends St. Luminous Academy - Kureha.

The figure is based on a popular original illustration by Tony, and has been sculpted into figure form with a gentle touch; keeping Kureha's beautiful curves and alluring pose just as the Tony originally drew them. Whether you are a swimsuit fan, or a Kureha fan - this priestess is calling out to you!
name: Kureha Swimsuit ver. (くれは みずぎばーじょん)

subtitle: The head of the Phantomhive household, known as an "evil noble"
description: From the popular anime series Kuroshitsuji is a Nendoroid of the 12 year-old head of the Phantomhive household - Ciel Phantomhive.

Three expressions are included - a relaxed expression, a standard expression and the embarrassed expression he had on his face when Sebastian and he parted ways. A chair for him to sit in is also included and he comes complete with a silver tableware set for Sebastian to bring to him.
Nendoroid Sebastian Michaelis is going to be re-released with Ciel so you can get the pair together and recreate your favorite scenes with both Master and Servant!
name: Nendoroid Ciel Phantomhive (ねんどろいど しえる・ふぁんとむはいう゛)
copyright: © 枢やな／スクウェアエニックス・女王の番犬・MBS

subtitle: Newly colored silk-screen decals and polishing wax specially designed for models!
description: A new revolution in decals for you models! Silk-screen decals that glow in the dark! These decals are designed to glow in the dark, and they glow even better if left under a fluorescent light before going into the dark. This allows you to recreate the reflective properties that cars in 24 hour races often place on their cars for better visibility, or even for use on model aeroplanes and military models.
The printing is done via silk-screen printing and each sheet features variously sized circular tags and two sets of numbers.
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Two sets of numbers included on each sheet, so they can be used together with other number decals.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-29 GSR Color Decals (Luminous) (MSS-29 GSRからーでかーる（ちっこう）)

subtitle: Fall in love with its beautifully unique colors!
description: The adorable series brought to you by Phat Company, the 'Dokidoki Animal Series' brings you figures of animals like you have never seen before. The forth to join the series is this 1/12th scale figure of the Malayan Tapir.

All the characteristics of the Malayan Tapir are brought out in the figure - the long nose, the round eyes and even the adorable little tail. Combined with the unique black and white coat, it makes for a beautiful figure of the cute Tapir.
name: Dokidoki Animal Series: Malayan Tapir (どきどきどうぶつしりーず まれーばく)

subtitle: Newly colored silk-screen decals and polishing wax specially designed for models!
description: These are striped decals that are great for imitating a metal look. These decals are perfect for creating a metal effect on the rim of cars; they are sold as stripes only in a chrome color. They could also be used on robot models for a more metallic look, or even on military models.

The printing is done via silk-screen printing and each sheet features a couple of different sized strips, there are a total of nine sizes: 0.3, 0.4, 0.75, 1.0, 1.2, 1.5, 1,7 and 2.0mm, meaning you can use it for a variety of different models!
features: High-quality, silk screen printing. Clear paint can be sprayed over the decals with no problems.
Can be used on a variety of different models with nine differently sized stripes included on each sheet.
Designed for use with 'GSR Decal Fitter' and 'GSC Decal Fitter Pro'
name: MSS-30 GSR Color Decals (Chrome Stripe) (MSS-30 GSRからーでかーる（くろーむすとらいぷ）)

subtitle: The left-handed basist.
description: From the huge hit anime that started in Japan in April, 'K-ON!', comes a Nendoroid of Mio Akiyama, the bashful yet serious bassist of the K-ON music club.

Additional face parts are included for her crying face, as well as the expression she made while trying her best to not show her embarrassment. Her beloved bass guitar and an amp are also included, allowing the illustration from the second volume of the manga to be reproduced.
Let her preform live with the upcoming Nendoroid of Yui Hirasawa!
name: Nendoroid Mio Akiyama (あきやま みお ねんどろいどあきやま みお ねんどろいど)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The amateur guitarist. ♪
description: From the huge hit anime that recently finished airing in Japan, 'K-ON!', comes a Nendoroid of Yui Hirasawa, the lead guitarist and second Nendroid from K-ON!

A large set of additional face parts allow her to beam with a smiling face, sob with a crying face, or be ready for anything with a determined face. Her guitar is also included and allows you to recreate the cover of the first volume of the K-ON manga. An amp is also included so that you can recreate the stage of the K-ON girls.
The other members of the club are also planned for future release, so you can look forward to recreating a live stage with the whole club!
name: Nendoroid Yui Hirasawa (ひらさわゆい ねんどろいど)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Making the Love Plus girls even more real! The second is the librarian who just can't be honest
description: Following Manaka Takane from the popular dating game "Love Plus" is this cute Nendoroid of Rinko Kobayakawa!

Once again an incredible four facial expressions are included based on events in the game - including the kiss scenes as well as an expression that recreates the face of the cute phone mascot! Also included is Rinko's portable music player, as she would never be seen without it!
Recreate your favorite situations from the game in Nendoroid form! Nene will also be joining the Nendoroid world shortly!
name: Nendoroid Rinko Kobayakawa (ねんどろいど こばやかわりんこ)

subtitle: The vampiric mistress of the Scarlet Devil Mansion
description: From the popular Touhou series of games created by the doujin circle Shanghai Alice comes a Nendoroid of the vampiric mistress of the Scarlet Devil Mansion - Remilia Scarlet!

A grinning face and a serious face are both included as expressions and the holy spear "Spear the Gungnir" is also included for her to wield. Her Nendoroid form keeps all the sides of her personality, from the slightly childish side down to her stronger more charismatic side!
name: Nendoroid Remilia Scarlet (ねんどろいど れみりあ・すかーれっと)

subtitle: The careless guitarist with a perfect sense of pitch. ♪
description: From the popular anime 'K-ON' comes the long-awaited figma of Sakura High School's music club's guitarist, Yui Hirasawa!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blazer and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Two expressions are included: a beaming smile perfect for Yui, along with a more tense smile that she often showed in the anime.
A blank face and stickers are also included, allowing you to recreate another expression for yourself.
Her beloved guitar which she nicknamed 'Giita' is included along with a guitar strap - and even a guitar case.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yui Hirasawa: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ひらさわゆい せいふくver.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The soothing butler
description: From the anime and manga series Black Butler comes a Nendoroid flawless butler of the Phantomhive household, Sebastian Michaelis!

His relaxed, elegant and well-mannered poses can all be recreated, to reflect his personality perfectly. He has replaceable head parts to recreate both his sideways glance, as well as his gleeful expression as he presses his beloved cat paws.
With the Nendoroid of Ciel Phantomhive also close on his way, you'll soon be able to recreate your favouite scenes with the Master and Servant!
name: Nendoroid Sebastian Michaelis (せばすちゃん・みかえりす ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 枢やな／スクウェアエニックス・女王の番犬・MBS

subtitle: Newly colored silk-screen decals and polishing wax specially designed for models!
description: The ultimate tool for leaving your models sparkling clean! Wax specially designed for models! It can be used on plastic models and mini-cars and will leave them all shining as bright as new. It's quick and easy to use, and there are no components in it that will make any colors fade or change after usage, leaving you with no worries and a clean collection!
features: High quality wax designed to be used on models. Bring that shine back into your favorite models!
Can be used on virtually any model, and will not cause any discoloring.
name: MSS-34 GSR: Mad Wax (MSS-34 GSRまっどわっくす)

subtitle: Romance now! figma Aya is joining the Sekirara figma collection!
description: From the popular dating simulation adventure game "Sekirara" comes a figma of the elegant and exiting Aya Kagura, wearing her school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various extras are included, such as her beloved violin, the cats that featured on the game, as well as various little items.
The included violin case allows the violin to be stored inside.
Hand parts to hold the cats, play the violin, and various others are all included.
Two facial expressions are included: The bright smiling face seen in key images from the game, as well as an embarrassed face.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Aya Kagura: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま かぐらあや せいふくばーじょん)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: ex:ride is finally moving off the road, and onto the water!
description: Vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of figures are on their way brought to you by FREEing. The ninth set in the series is a set of three different colored water-bikes. The three metallic colors available are red, blue and green - and each water bike comes with its own original decals for you to customize it however you see fit.
ex:ride has once again opened out a whole new world to your favorite figmas!
name: ex:ride: ride.009 - Water Bikes (えくすらいど らいど009 うぉーたーばいく)

subtitle: The ultimate cute combo for that K.O.!
description: The collaboration image featuring Lucky Star characters dressed as the characters from Street Fighter from Comptiq magazine is getting the Nendoroid Petite treatment! The hard work illustrated by Kagami Yoshimizu is coming to life again!

Tsukasa is dressed as Ken, Kagami as Ryuu, Konata as Guile and Miyuki as Viper - and they all have more posable joints than normal allowing each of the special attack poses to be taken! Play with them, display them, and enjoy their adorable appearance!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Lucky Star x Street Fighter Set (ねんどろいど ぷち らき☆すた×すとりーとふぁいたーせっと)
copyright: © 2004、2010 美水かがみ／角川書店　© CAPCOM.

subtitle: The sword that only the hero of heroes may wield.
