description: From "Fate/stay night" comes yet another addition to the Metal Charm Collection series, this time it is the mighty weapon known as the Sword of Rupture, Ea - the noble phantasm wielded by the 8th servant, Gilgamesh.
The charm even spins just as the true weapon did! It's another charm with all the care and detail that has become known in the Metal Charm Collection!
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 08: Sword of Rupture, Ea (ふぁいとめたるちゃーむ これくしょん 08 かいりけんえあ)

subtitle: A reliable partner even as a plushie!
description: From the recent theatrical release of Nanoha, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes two new plushies for your collection! One of Nanoha Takamachi's partner, "Yuuno" in his ferret form, and another of Fate Testarossa's familiar "Arf" in her puppy form!
The cute, round-eyed Yuuno, and the adorable Arf - they can be displayed with Nanoha and Fate plushies from the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series so that the partners can all stand side-by-side!
name: Yuuno Plushie (Ferret ver.) (ゆーのくん ぬいぐるみ （ふぇれっとver.）)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: A super-strong mold residue cleaner!
description: This is an aerosol based quick-drying residue cleaning cream. It is designed to clean away the residue formed by the mold lubricant when creating a resin kit. It comes with an attachable pipe nozzle which allows you to get into the harder to clean areas with less effort than ever before. It's great for cleaning both polypropylene and polyethylene-resin products, as well as paint removal on resin and metal models.

[Usage] Please shake the aerosol can well before use. Spray directly onto the surface of the model that requires cleaning, then using a rag and/or brush, quickly clean the areas on the model. Hold the aerosol can upright when spraying.
name: MSS-21 GSR: Resin Cleaner (MSS-21 GSRれじんくりんまぐなむ)

subtitle: The gentle childhood friend with a knack for cooking. ♪
description: From the freely distributed dating simulation game "Sekirara" comes a figma of the childhood friend of the protagonist, Yuu Kawamura!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
To compliment her cooking skill she comes with a variety of kitchen utensils, such as a frying pan and a kitchen knife.
An apron is included and made from flexible plastic allowing it to bend around the body naturally.
A variety of hand parts are included, such as hands for holding chopsticks as well as hands in cooking mittens!
Two facial expressions from the game are included: A bright smile and a surprised face.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yuu Kawamura: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま かわむら ゆう せいふくばーじょん)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: The nomad warrior has decided to try her hand at being a Nendoroid!
description: From "Queen's Blade", the action anime featuring beautiful warriors and amazing action comes a Nendoroid of the main character "Leina". She has been sculpted wearing her charming bikini armor, which shows off her sexy body... which is just as attractive as a Nendoroid!

Various parts are included, from a selection of facial expressions to her sword and shield and even down to extra leg parts allowing her to take a sitting pose, which means you can pose her fighting, or simply looking attractive - however you'd prefer to see Reina.
name: Nendoroid Leina (ねんどろいど れいな)
copyright: © 2009HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイドパートナーズ

subtitle: The giant robots of the past! Godam, launch!
description: From Tatsunoko Production's 1976 anime project, "Goliath the Super Fighter" comes the classic giant robot 'Godam', here to join the ES Alloy series!

The model takes on a deformed version of the original robot, but it still keeps to the original design by Kunio Okawara. Godam's ultimate weapon, the "Godam Houganda" which was created by connecting the two circular shoulder pads on the robot can be completely recreated with the model. In addition, the five smaller vehicles that featured in the series known as the "Gowapper Mecha" are all included, and can all be stored inside the Godam itself.
name: ES Alloy 06: Godam (いーえすごうきん 06 ごーだむ)

subtitle: A reliable partner even as a plushie!
description: From the recent theatrical release of Nanoha, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes two new plushies for your collection! One of Nanoha Takamachi's partner, "Yuuno" in his ferret form, and another of Fate Testarossa's familiar "Arf" in her puppy form!
The cute, round-eyed Yuuno, and the adorable Arf - they can be displayed with Nanoha and Fate plushies from the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series so that the partners can all stand side-by-side!
name: Arf Plushie (Puppy ver.) (あるふ ぬいぐるみ (こいぬver.))
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Jump into the fusion reactor!
description: Another figure coming out of the collaboration between the popular illustrator 'Nagimiso' and Max Factory! This more mature looking Rin was originally drawn for the PV of the song 'Nuclear Fusion (Hard-R.K.mix)', but now it's on its way to becoming a PVC figure!

The frills and ribbons that cover her gothic costume are contrasted by the mechanical guitar in her hands, and the detailed futuristic base she stands upon - creating a definite must-see, whether you are a fan of the original illustration or not!
name: Rin Kagamine -Nuclear Fusion- (かがみねりん ろしんゆうかい)

subtitle: The first of the Love Plus girls to join the Nendoroids is the studious, conserved Manaka!
description: From the popular dating simulation game "Love Plus" comes a set of Nendoroids of the three girls! The first to be released is the top-of-the-class student Manaka Takane.

An amazing four expressions are included allowing you to recreate all kinds of lovable scenes from the game - from the kissing scenes to the faces that featured on the phone mascots! Find your ideal girlfriend and pose her with her ideal expression!
Rinko Kobayakawa and Nene Anegasaki are also on their way soon!
name: Nendoroid Manaka Takane (ねんどろいど たかねまなか)

subtitle: With the anime project going strong, Black Rock Shooter is joining the world of Nendoroids!
description: The popular Black Rock Shooter is joining the Nendoroids! She comes complete with her Rock Cannon and Black Blade, and even comes with the checkered stand that has become a staple for her to stand upon. Additionally, extra hair parts based on the illustration by CHAN X CO are also included and can be replaced with the standard hair whenever you feel like a change!
Enjoy all the different sides of Black Rock Shooter!
name: Nendoroid Black Rock Shooter (ねんどろいど ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: The K-ON club's gentle princess, and keyboard player! ♪
description: From the popular TV anime 'K-ON' comes a Nendoroid of the K-ON club's keyboard player, Tsumugi Kotobuki! She comes complete with three facial expressions: a smiling face, a giggling face, and a confused blank face.

Her keyboard, as well as a tea-set are also both included. The 'radish eyebrows' shown in the final episode of the anime are also included as stickers for you to enjoy. Display her with the other club members, and recreate the live performance of the K-ON club!
name: Nendoroid Tsumugi Kotobuki (ねんどろいど ことぶき つむぎ)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The famous magical girl, as a cute plushie!
description: From the popular new theatrical release of Nanoha, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st", comes a plushie of the main character, Nanoha - here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series! The design is based on her Nendoroid, with careful details added to even the smallest parts of her barrier jacket.

The legs, arms and even her twin-tails are fitted with joints, allowing a large range of poses for a plushie. Her intelligent device, "Raging Heart" is also included, and can be removed and attached by the use of a magnet.
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 10: Nanoha Takamachi (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ10 たかまちなのは)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The centre guard of Nanoha's Stars team!
description: From the series "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS" comes a figma of Teana Lanster, Subaru's close friend.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used important areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Her intelligent device, "Cross Mirage" is included and can take all four forms seen in the anime.
Effect parts simulating the firing of Cross Mirage are also included to recreate your favourite action scenes!
Exchangeable hair parts are also included allowing you to let her hair down, as it was seen three years after the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Teana Lanster: Barrier Jacket ver. (ふぃぐま てぃあな・らんすたー ばりあじゃけっとばーじょん)
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT　© NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: The blue comet that shoots through the night skies.
description: with the upcoming anime project going strong, the long awaited figma of Black Rock Shooter is finally here!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Three expressions are included: a standard face, a shouting face and a face with closed eyes.
By removing the front hair parts, the blue flame that covers her left eye can be attached and removed.
Her "Rock Cannon" weapon, which is even bigger than her entire body is included and can be held for a truly formidable pose.
The "Black Blade" is also included allowing for even more poses filled with action.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Black Rock Shooter (ふぃぐま ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: The Golden Flash... as a cute plushie!
description: From the popular new theatrical release of Nanoha, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st", comes a plushie of yet another main character from the series - Fate Testarossa is also here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series!

The legs, arms and even her twin-tails are fitted with joints, allowing a large range of poses for a plushie. Her intelligent device "Bardiche" is also included, and can be removed and attached by the use of a magnet. Let Fate and Nanoha sit side-by-side together!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 11: Fate Testarossa (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ11 ふぇいと・てすたろっさ)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Even as a plushie their devotion and resolve are unchanged!
description: From the romance adventure game, "Hakuouki: Shinsengumi Kitan" come two adorable plushies, one of Hajime Saitou - the Shinsengumi's third squad leader, as well as one of Heisuke Toudou, the eighth squad leader.

Saitou's lonewolf personality is portrayed by his expressionless gaze, whilst Toudou has a mischievous smile to represent his fun-loving personality. Toshizo Hijikata and Soji Okita are also going on sale as limited edition plushies, be sure to collect them all! ♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 03: Hajime Saitou (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ３ さいとうはじめ)

subtitle: Even as a plushie their devotion and resolve are unchanged!
description: From the romance adventure game, "Hakuouki: Shinsengumi Kitan" come two adorable plushies, one of Hajime Saitou - the Shinsengumi's third squad leader, as well as one of Heisuke Toudou, the eighth squad leader.

Saitou's lonewolf personality is portrayed by his expressionless gaze, whilst Toudou has a mischievous smile to represent his fun-loving personality. Toshizo Hijikata and Soji Okita are also going on sale as limited edition plushies, be sure to collect them all! ♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 04: Heisuke Toudou (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ３ とうどうへいすけ)

subtitle: A wild ride with incredible stability.
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. The eighth set in the series is this set of three-wheeler bikes, available in gold, black and red.
With the extra stability, these bikes are able to go on almost any road - take your favorite figma down that mountain path and let the breeze blow through their hair!
name: ex:ride ride.008: Three Wheeler (えくすらいど らいど008 すりーほいーる)

subtitle: The powerful drummer who always keeps a positive attitude! ♪
description: From the popular anime 'K-ON' comes the much awaited inspirational drummer of Sakura High School's music club, Ritsu Tainaka!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blazer and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Three facial expressions are included: Two different smiling faces perfect for Ritsu, as well as a stunned expression.
Additionally, two different "bumps" are included to place on her head, to recreate all those times she was hit.
Hand parts to hold her drum sticks, along with various other hand parts are included.
Her entire drum set has been included. You can set her up with Yui, Mio and Tsumugi and recreate their live performance in figma style!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Ritsu Tainaka: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま たいなか りつ せいふくばーじょん)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The constantly teased, but skilled guitarist! ♪
description: From the anime series 'K-ON' comes a figma of the hard-working rhythm guitarist and first year student - Azusa Nakano!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blazer and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A smiling face, an upset face and an embarrassed face.
Her guitar is included with a guitar strap. Just like Yui and Mio, the guitar also has it's very own case included.
The cat ears that featured in episode 9 of the anime are included, and suit her embarrassed face perfectly! They can also be attached to other characters.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Azusa Nakano (ふぃぐま なかのあずさ せいふくばーじょん)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: A citris flavoured soundtrack.
description: This CD is the soundtrack to the popular drama CD of "Yuzuko Peppermint", which was sold together with Yuzuko Hayakawa's figure.

Yuki Inadera from the popular band NIRGILIS wrote the songs all for the drama CD released with Yuzuko Hayakawa's figure, and now they have all been remastered and recorded for this soundtrack. The opening song sung by the voice actors Mamiko Noto and Nobuhiko Okamoto "Tsufuu Heart" and the ending song sung by Kaori Nazuka "Peppermint Music" are also both included on the soundtrack. The jacket of the soundtrack is illustrated by the original author of the series, Maseru Gotsubo.
name: Yuzuko Peppermint Original Soundtrack (ゆずこぺぱーみんと おりじなるさうんどとらっく)
manufacturer: ストーリーライダーズ
copyright: © 佐藤大とストーリーライダーズ © 2008 Masaru Gotsubo

subtitle: The leader of the Luminous Knights, smiling by the ocean.
description: The start of a three company collaboration series! Max Factory, Hobby Japan and Sega are bringing you four PVC figures of one of the heroines from the Shining Wind series all wearing stylish swimsuits! One will be released each month for four months.

The first in the series is the leader of the Luminous Knights; the Red Rose Cavalier, Seena! The figure is based on a popular original illustration by Tony, and has been sculpted in figure form with a gentle touch; keeping both her beautiful curves and her lovable expression intact. The pareo around her hips can be removed, allowing any bikini fans to enjoy the leader of the Luminous Knights in all her swimsuit beauty!
name: Seena Swimsuit ver. (しーな みずぎばーじょん)

subtitle: A certain scientific figure.
description: From the popular anime currently being broadcast in Japan, "A Certain Scientific Railgun" comes a PVC figure of Misaka Mikoto wearing her school uniform. Misaka is one of the seven Level 5 espers in Academy City, and the only one who is an electromaster with command over electricity!

She has been posed in the classic pose she always takes just before shooting off her famous "railgun" attack - holding a coin in her one hand whilst staring ahead with an imposing, albeit rather attractive pose. The figure also comes with the popular "iron-sand sword" that appeared in the anime, which can be held in her other hand, allowing for a slightly different display option.
name: Misaka Mikoto (みかさみこと)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN

subtitle: She won't lose when it comes to her pride, or her dreams.
description: From the popular anime 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes a figure of the center guard of the Stars team, 'Teana Lanster' - here to become the second action figure in the actsta series!

She comes complete with three expressions, as well as hair parts to let her hair down so that you can display her as she looked after the StrikerS series. Her intelligent device 'Cross Mirage' is also included in four different forms, leaving you with countless ways to play with her. Display her with Subaru and recreate the Stars combo team in action!
actsta is a new action figure series brought to you from Good Smile Company, designed to focus on both mobility and superior sculpting.
Combining these two ideas, Good Smile Company is aiming for an all new action figure series. Be sure to give them a try yourself!
features: act - able to actively move around, and act out various scenes.
sta - a statue that maintains a high quality image.
name: actsta: Teana Lanster (あくすた てぃあな・らんすたー)
sculptor: Good Smile Company and Liquid Stone

subtitle: The reliable Nodoka, always supporting the K-ON club from the background.
description: With the second season well under way, the popular anime "K-ON!!" sees yet another figma release! This time it's Yui's childhood friend who is always there to help out when help is needed - Nodoka Manabe!

Two expressions are included: A calming smile, as well as a worried face. She also comes with a hat and arm-band allowing you to recreate the look she had at the Culture Festival, when she dressed like a security guard.

As a bonus extra, a new face part designed for use with "figma Yui Hirasawa: School Uniform ver." is also included. Nodoka deserves to be displayed with the other band members from HTT - and now you can display them all together.
name: figma Nodoka Manabe: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま まなべ のどか せいふくver. )
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Back again and ready to do more than ever~nya!
description: The origin of the Nendoroid world, Neko Arc (2006 Wonder Festival Product) is back again with an all new design, fully posable joints and a variety of optional parts to create the "Ultimate Version", which will once again be joining the festivities of the Wonder Festival!!

It's a Nendoroid filled with action, fun and a variety of funny gimmicks - but you have to see it for yourself to truly experience the fun to be had. The new design was created to pay homage to the original, and thus it is here to give you an unbeatable price for a truly amazing figure!
name: Nendoroid Neko Arc: Ultimate Version (ねんどろいど ねこあるく あるてぃめっと・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: The other half of Sakura High's live festival performance, as well as the famous "Untan Untan!" scene! ♪
description: With the second season just as popular as ever, K-ON! is getting more Nendoroid treatment, this time featuring both the guitarist "Yui Hirasawa" and the keyboardist "Tsumugi Kotobuki" wearing the costumes they wore at Sakura High's Festival.

Both figures come with two different expressions as well as their respective instruments, and Yui even comes with castanets to recreate the ever-popular "Untan ♪" scene! The set also comes with a di:stage for them to perform on till their heart's are content!
name: Nendoroid K-ON! Yui and Tsumugi: Live Stage Set (ねんどろいど けいおん！ゆい＆つむぎ らいぶすてーじせっと)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The mecha of the past, revived once again!
description: The start of a new series of alloy figures called the 'EM (Excellent Models) Alloy' series is here! The series aims to allow great posability whilst keeping the detail as realistic and fine as possible - allowing you to pose the models in a countless number of ways, yet still look great!

The first model in the series comes from the anime series 'Special Armored Batallion Dorvack', which was originally created by Ashi Productions (now known as Production Reed) in 1983, but even now still holds fans all over the world. The model is of Masato Mugen's variable machine 'Mugen Calibur', and comes complete with its primary weapon, the 'Armor Rifle', as well as a bazooka and powered armor.
name: EM Alloy 01: Mugen Calibur (いーえむごうきん01 むげんきゃりばー)

subtitle: Showing off her impressive bust, without any hesitation. ♥
description: From the popular school love comedy filled with raunchy scenes, "Kanokon", comes a PVC figure of the beautifully bodied 2nd year student from Kunpou High School - Chizuru Minamoto... and she's wearing an adorable bunny suit!

She has been placed in an alluring pose giving you a full look at her beautiful body, with everything down to her perfectly curved hips sculpted with the greatest of care. Not to mention she has been sculpted in an incredible 1/4th scale, her bunny costume has a stunning glossy finish, and her net tights are made from real cloth! It's a fantastically realistic figure that truly draws out Chizuru's charms!
name: Chizuru Minamoto (みなもと ちずる)
copyright: © 2009 西野かつみ・メディアファクトリー／かのこんR製作委員会

subtitle: The mecha of the past, revived once again!
description: The start of a new series of alloy figures called the 'EM (Excellent Models) Alloy' series is here! The series aims to allow great posability whilst keeping the detail as realistic and fine as possible - allowing you to pose the models in a countless number of ways, yet still look great!

From an anime series originally created by Ashi Productions (now known as Production Reed) in 1983, which even now holds fans all over the world, 'Special Armored Batallion Dorvack' comes another figure to be released at the same time as the 'Mugen Calibur', the mass-produced Generic Calibur, which also comes complete with its primary weapon, the bazooka, as well as an 'Armor Rifle' and powered armor.
name: EM Alloy 02: Generic Calibur (いーえむごうきん02 りょうさんがたきゃりばー)

subtitle:
Moe, moe, kyun! 

♥
description: From the popular anime 'K-ON' comes a PVC figure the easily embarrassed bassist of Sakura High's Music Club - Mio Akiyama.
From one of the most popular scenes in the entire series, Mio has been sculpted in a maid outfit in her "Moe, moe, kyun!
" pose! The maid outfit is designed directly from the anime, along with the expression and posing - it's the ideal replica of the original.
It's definitely a different feeling to her usual musical performances, but it's yet another side of Mio for all to enjoy!
name: Mio Akiyama (あきやま みお)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社/桜高軽音部

subtitle: Strict teaching with a gentle smile.
description: From the school love comedy 'Please Teacher!' comes a PVC figure of the stylish and beautiful teacher 'Mizuho Kazami'.

She's quite the delight to lay your eyes on with her sexy long legs placed in stockings made from real lace - not to mention the entrancing view from her unbuttoned blouse. She smiles with an innocent smile which is contrasted by her sexy pose... which can become even sexier when you remove the clothes and take a look at what's underneath....
A desk, chair as well as a rod for pointing out the important points in her lessons are all included.
name: Mizuho Kazami (かざみみずほ)

subtitle: Bursting with energy even as a Nendoroid!
description: From the popular anime with an upcoming 2nd season, "Strike Witches" comes a Nendoroid of the youngest solider in the unit - the adorable Francesca Lucchini!

She comes complete with three different facial expressions, as well as her Striker Unit leg attachments, her black panther ears and an attachable tail. Her stand also comes complete with extra parts that allow you to pose her soaring through the air!
From a daring battle scene showing off Francesca's genius tactical ability, down to her more innocent, friendly appearance - there are all sorts of ways you can display her!
name: Nendoroid Francesca Lucchini (ねんどろいど ふらんちぇすか・るっきーに)

subtitle: The easily-embarrassed, lefty bassist!
description: From the anime series 'K-ON' comes the long-awaited figma of the shy bassist from Sakura High's music club, Mio Akiyama!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blazer and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: a smiling face, a frightened face ideal for Mio, as well as embarrassed face just bordering on tears.
Her bass guitar is included along with a strap, and even a case so you can store it away.
Various hand parts are included, such as the peace sign and poses from her performances.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mio Akiyama: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま あきやまみお せいふくver.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The calm and gentle keyboardist ♪
description: From the anime series 'K-ON' comes the long-awaited figma of the keyboardist from Sakura High's music club, Tsumugi Kotobuki!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for areas such as the blazer and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A smiling face, a delighted face, as well as the expression Tsumugi often gave when she became entranced by something.
Her keyboard is included and sculpted down to the finest of details, along with its stand.
Various hand parts are included, including poses from her performances.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsumugi Kotobuki: Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ことぶき つむぎ せいふくver.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The blond queen who reigns through military rule.
description: Based on a popular PC game, the anime version of "Shin Koihime Musou' is currently airing, and from it comes this 1/8th scale PVC figure of the quick-witted and noble Sousou (Karin).

With Her trusty weapon 'Zetsu' held behind her back, Karin smiles brightly in a rather enticing pose. She has been sculpted to bring out her noble figure as a queen, along with her captivating charm for all to be entranced by. The breast area of her armor can be removed for an even more voluptuous charm!
name: Sousou (Karin) (そうそう（かりん）)

subtitle: Five color variations of high quality, silk-screen printed decals that allow for a transparent color!
description: The "Clear Smoke" color can be stuck onto model car windows to create the effect of privacy windows perfectly! The blue, pink, red and purple can all be placed onto your favorite models to give them a whole new candy-colored look!
The GSR Decal Fitter works with these decals ideally, and even allows simple fitting onto curved surfaces. Please note that other decal fitters may cause damage to the decals.
name: MSS - 22~26 GSR Color Decals (MSS-22～26 GSRからーでかーる)

subtitle: The tyrant clad in black armor.
description: From "Fate/stay night" comes a figma of the knight dyed in darkness - Saber Alter!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Two expressions are included: her typical expressionless face, as well as a shouting face for combat scenes.
The front parts of her hair can be removed allowing the attachment and removal of her mask. Combined with the two expressions, this allows for various options!
The sombre black lustre of her armor with its blood red streaks have all been sculpted into her figma preserving the truly dark atmosphere around her.
Her Noble Phantasm, 'Excalibur', is also included - dyed a dark black just like the rest of her armor.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Saber Alter (ふぃぐま せいばーおるた)

subtitle: Three color variations of high quality, silk-screen printed racing number decals!
description: Racing numbers were commonly seen on older racing cars or highway race cars, and are now available as decals for your favorite models. Each set of numbers is given in three different fonts, and there are three different colors available to choose from, so you are bound to find the right look for your model!
name: MSS - 31~33 GSR Race Number Decals (MSS-31～33 GSRれーすなんばー でかーる)

subtitle: Petite Nendoroids of the girls from Gensokyou!
description: From the popular doujin game series, the "Touhou Project" created by the doujin circle Shanghai Alice comes a set of three adorable petite Nendoroids from the world of Gensokyou - Reimu Hakurei, Suika Ibuki and Aya Syameimaru are all joining the world of petite Nendoroids!
A pedestal and donations box based on the stone paving of the Hakurei Shine are also included with the set, allowing you to recreate even more of the girls daily life in Gensokyou!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Touhou Project Set #1 (ねんどろいどぷち とうほうぷろじぇくとせっと だいいっしょう)

subtitle: The popular fold-up bicycles are joining the ex:ride collection!
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures. This time around your favourite figma can ride the fold-up bike that has become popular all over the world - the BD-1. Even the folding up of the bike has been reproduced into the miniture form! The BD-1 is available in three colors: black, orange and green.
It's one of the most convenient forms of transport, and it looks great to boot - definitely a ride your figmas will enjoy!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride SPride.01 BD-1 (えくすらいど えすぴーらいど.01 BD-1)

subtitle: “All codes must be destroyed.”
description: The seventh charm to join the Fate Metal Charm Collection is Caster's Noble Phantasm, "Rule Breaker".

Rule Breaker is a short dagger that possesses the ability of dispelling any sorcery - it is a mystical blade shimmers all the colors of the rainbow, and has been sculpted through gilding to recreate this effect. It's unrivalled beauty is now available as a charm, glittering with magical energy.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 07: Rule Breaker (ふぁいとめたるちゃーむ これくしょん 07 るーるぶれいかー)

subtitle: Fall in love with its charming looks
description: A new series brought to you by Phat Company, the 'Dokidoki Animal Series' is here to being you figures of animals like you have never seen before. The first in the series is something nobody would have expected, a figure of an alpaca.

The alpaca became popular in a Japanese TV commercial, and has been sculpted here with its lovable eyes wide open, and gazing ahead. It is sculpted at a 1/12th scale, allowing you to easily pose it together with the figma action series. Enjoy its unique calming presence!
name: Dokidoki Animal Series: Alpaca (どきどきどうぶつしりーず あるぱか)

subtitle: Fall in love with it's heart-warming expression.
description: The adorable series brought to you by Phat Company, the 'Dokidoki Animal Series' brings you figures of animals like you have never seen before. The third in the series is a realistic sculpt of the Capybara, with it's ever-popular adorable expression.

This time around there are two different poses available - both a sitting and a standing pose. The cute rodent brings about a heart-warming atmosphere wherever they are seen, and now you can keep that atmosphere in your very own room!
name: Dokidoki Animal Series: Capybara (どきどきどうぶつしりーず かぴばら（たち／すわり）)

subtitle: The second adorable set of three petite 'oddities'!
description: From the popular anime series currently being sold on Blu-ray and DVD, 'Bakemonogatari', comes a second set of three more Nendoroid Petites: Suruga Kanbaru, Mayoi Hachikuji and Nadeko Sengoku!
Each character comes complete with character specific items they had in the anime - Kanbaru comes with a monkey's paw, Mayoi has her giant backpack and Nadeko has her jacket and hat.
Yet another set that's ready to recreate all sorts of interesting scenes in cute Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Bakemonogatari Set #2 (ねんどろいどぷち ばけものがたりせっと そのに)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Yet another way to have fun with your Nendoroids!
description: Another diorama with various items is coming from Phat Company to expand the world for your Nendoroids! This third set is filled with musical instruments to let your Nendoroids prepare for the upcoming Culture Festival! The set is split into two - this A set features the window-side of the classroom.

[Set Contents] Two wall pieces (window, blackboard), floor, a step, a piano with chair, guitar with case, a saxophone, a speaker and Nendoroid hand parts to hold the guitar case. (No Nendoroids are included with this product)
features: The window is made from clear plastics. The blackboard can really be drawn on and erased with chalk.
A Nendoroid sized piano, guitar and saxophone are all included for your Nendoroids to play if the situation arises. (along with a guitar case that opens and closes)
You can connect the A and B set to create the full classroom.
You can also connect other sets onto the top of this set, allowing you to create a two-story high building if you combine this set with the School Life Set.
name: Nendoroid Playset 03: Culture Festival A Set (ねんどろいどぷれいせっと#03 ぶんかさいAせっと)

subtitle: The K-ON club's first-year student and guitarist - already confirmed for a second release!
description: The Nendoroid of the K-ON club's adorable first-year student and guitar player, 'Azusa Nakano', has already been confirmed to be getting a re-release just after her initial release!

Her guitar with it's amp, as well as "Azunyan #2" - the cat that appeared in one of the side stories, are all included. Three expressions are included: a smiling face, an embarrassed face and a confused face, along with cat ears to attach whenever you see fit. Her trademark twin-tail hair is fitted with joints and can be posed just like the rest of the figure, meaning there are even more scenes you can recreate in Nendoroid form!
Get her together with the rest of the club, and recreate the live performance of their song "After School Tea Time"!
name: Nendoroid Azusa Nakano (ねんどろいど なかの あずさ)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Back again with a new weapon - a blade as black as the darkest night.
description: The popular character illustrated by huke is back again, but this time she is wielding a 'Black Blade' instead of the previous 'Rock Cannon'.

In even more contrast to the original figure, this new version has a much lighter feel to it - as she can be seen removing her jacket with her free hand, with a much more compact base compared to before.
Enjoy a whole new side of BLACK ROCK SHOOTER.
name: BLACK ROCK SHOOTER: Black Blade ver. (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー ぶらっくぶれーどばーじょん)

subtitle: The powerful soldier who lives for battle.
description: From the classic PC game 'Sengoku Rance' comes a PVC figure of the violent princess of the Tokugawa family, 'Senhime'. With a dignified smile across her face, she has been sculpted beside her huge halbred in an enticing pose. Her armor can all be removed, leaving her beautiful, refined body visible for you to enjoy.
name: Senhime (せんひめ)

subtitle: Tons of fun at be had preparing for the Culture Festival!
description: Another diorama with various items is coming from Phat Company to expand the world for your Nendoroids! This third set is filled with musical instruments to let your Nendoroids prepare for the upcoming Culture Festival! The set is split into two - this B set features the corridor-side of the classroom.

[Set Contents] Two wall pieces (door, blackboard), floor, a step, taiko drum with drumsticks, festival lanterns (white and red), a Japanese guitar, a pianica, a tambourine, a recorder, a music stand and Nendoroid hand parts to hold the various instruments. (No Nendoroids are included with this product)
features: The sliding door can be opened and closed. The blackboard can really be drawn on and erased with chalk.
Along with even more instruments for you Nendoroids to use, there is also a Taiko drum and Festival lanterns to prepare for the Culture Festival!
You can connect the A and B set to create the full classroom.
You can also connect other sets onto the top of this set, allowing you to create a two-story high building if you combine this set with the School Life Set.
name: Nendoroid Playset 03: Culture Festival B Set (ねんどろいどぷれいせっと#03 ぶんかさいBせっと)

subtitle: A bike with a presence that none can ignore
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. The seventh set in the series is this set of American Bikes - motorbikes with an impressive outer shell and powerful force behind the engine to boot. It includes a set of decals that can be stuck onto the fuel tank, or anywhere else you think suits the model; letting you customize the bike for your figma! Take your favourite figma on a wild ride with these bikes!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride ride.007: American Bikes (くすらいど らいど007 あめりかんばいく)

subtitle: An all new perspective of Miku!
description: A collaboration between the popular illustrator Nagimiso and Max Factory brings a figure of this cybernetic Miku, which was originally illustrated by Nagimiso as a character for the VN02mix of Hatsune Miku's original song 'moon'.

Placed in an elegant pose as if soaring through the air, this version of Miku is far more than just a robotic version of Miku, it's a carefully designed decorative masterpiece - a bold, yet finely crafted figure that will suit virtually any collection!
name: Hatsune Miku VN02 mix (はつねみく VN02 mix)

subtitle: The Princess of The Moon, overflowing with elegance.
description: From the popular romance adventure game "Yoake Mae yori Ruriiro na" comes a Nendoroid of 'Feena', the Princess of The Moon who has a strong sense of responsibility. She is wearing the most elegant dress on any Nendoroid to date!

Feena comes complete with three expressions including a smiling face, a kissing face and an elegant smile. Also included are her staff, and a sunflower - both important items from the series for you to recreate your favourite scenes.
Be sure to add the cute, lady-like Feena to your collection!
name: Nendoroid Feena (ねんどろいど ふぃーな)

subtitle: It's the War for the Holy Grail... just smaller and cuter!
description: From the movie version of 'Fate/stay night' comes Petite Nendoroid versions of some of your favorite masters and servants!

The set includes two different versions of each of Saber, Rin Tousaka, Sakura Matou, Ilya and Rider. Also in the set is another version of Saber, dressed up in her pajamas - a pose that should strike the memories of any fans of the series!
Altogether that creates a total of 11 figures... plus there is also a secret figure that's sure to surprise you, as well as bring together a collection that any fan will enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Fate/stay night (ねんどろいど ぷち ふぇいと/すていないと)

subtitle: A large glasses cleaner, with various other uses too!
description: From the popular anime series "Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu" comes a large glasses cleaner featuring the popular character Hideyoshi Kinoshita!

This ULTRA-Microfiber material was created by making use of the independently developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber' and printing on it with a special printing technique. This newly created ULTRA-Microfiber allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric!

There are all sorts of ways for you to make use of it - obviously it works perfectly for cleaning glasses, but you can use it for various other things as well - a small towel or blanket, or even a tapestry for your wall!
name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu: ULTRA-Microfiber MEGA-Glasses Cleaner (ばかとてすととしょうかんじゅう うるとらまいくろふぁいばー めがねふき)
copyright: © 2010 Kenji Inoue／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN,INC／バカとテストと召喚獣製作委員会

subtitle: I'll show you my true self - but only to you.
description: From the multi-platform and ever popular dating simulation game 'ToHeart2' comes a PVC figure of the caring, 'older sister' character - Tamaki Kousaka, in a voluptuous, daring pose!

The ever-reliable 'Tama-nee' is showing her more defenseless side, just for you! And since she has been sculpted in a magnificent 1/6 scale, it's certainly a side that shows off some of her greatest charms - even with both of her hands she can't cover the volume of her bust, which is bound to draw almost anyone's eyes.
Enjoy the company of a more risqué Tama-nee by adding her to your collection!
name: Tamaki Kousaka (こうさか たまき)
sculptor: Max Factory Elliot with Hiroki Katayama (H2-Project)

subtitle: Giant stickers of the "Good Smile Racing X COX" mascot character "Racing Miku"!
description: The racing team "Good Smile Racing X COX's" mascot character "Racing Miku", illustrated by redjuice, is filling up a huge A3 page of super large stickers! You can use them on real cars and motorbikes to give them a whole new look, or use them on anything else you want - the possibilities are endless! It's one of the best ways to support the team!
The stickers are designed to stick easily, and are made of high quality materials that won't let the color fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Giant Sticket Set 04: Racing Miku (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっくさいずすてっかー04／れーしんぐみく)

subtitle: Clean your glasses with the adorable girls, or simply hang it up as a tapestry!
description: The sexy characters from the popular TV anime series "Kämpfer" are here printed on a extra large glasses cleaner!

This ULTRA-Microfiber material was created by making use of the independently developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber' and printing on it with a special printing technique. This newly created ULTRA-Microfiber allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric!

There are all sorts of ways for you to make use of it - obviously it works perfectly for cleaning glasses, but you can use it for various other things as well - a small towel or blanket, or even a tapestry for your wall!
name: Kämpfer: ULTRA-Microfiber MEGA-Glasses Cleaner (けんぷふぁー うるとらまいくろふぁいばー めがねふき)
copyright: © 築地俊彦・メディアファクトリー／臓物アニマルカンパニー

subtitle: Stickers of the charming Racing Miku in 1/10th scale for your favourite remote-controlled car.
description: Racing Miku is illustrated by redjuice, as the mascot character to the racing team "Good Smile Racing X COX", and she is now joining the Character Customize Series as 1/10th scale stickers designed for use on remote controlled cars.

You can recreate the atmosphere of the official GT cars by placing a few of the stickers on your favourite cars. Plus there are extra stickers you can use on cellphones, computers or anything else you want to give a dash of Racing Miku to! The stickers are made to stick strong and not fade easily, keeping the original color for as long as possible!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticket Set 009: Racing Miku (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと009 れーしんぐみく)

subtitle: The Perfectly Ordinary Sorceress, as a plushie!
description: From the ever-popular Touhou series of games comes a plushie of Marisa Kirisame - the same plushie that was sold at last year's Comiket is being released for all to enjoy now!

Her black pointed hat and white apron that mark her as a sorceress have been created in plushie form in great detail. As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing for various poses. She will be going on sale at the same time as all the other Touhou plushies, and they look great displayed together!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 08: Marisa Kirisame (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ08 きりさめまりさ)

subtitle: The racing team's official mascot is getting her own set of 1/24th scale decals!
description: The racing team "Good Smile Racing X COX" is racing in the 2010 Super GT series, and their mascot "Racing Miku" is joining the Character Customize Series!

Racing Miku is illustrated by redjuice, as a brand new variation of Hatsune Miku that is officially recognised by Crypton, and this sheet of 1/24th scale decals is filled with her beautiful smile! You can stick them on your own model cars to make them look like the official GT cars! The decals now make use of silk-screen printing for a higher quality print that stays strong and doesn't fade, keeping the original color better than any decals of the past!
The decals are designed for use with the GSR Modeller Support Series' Decal Fitter, and Decal Fitter Pro.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decal Set 012: Racing Miku - 1/24th scale (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず しーる011／れーしんぐみく)

subtitle: A cute figure complete with an equally cute, limited edition Weiß Schwarz card!
description: From the popular school romance series that has had various games, animes and more created from it, "Da Capo", comes a PVC figure of the lovable heroine, Neimu Asakura.

She has been placed in a vibrant pose with both hands outstreached to either side of her, she is holding onto her school bag and pouch in her left hand. Her blouse is also completely removeable, allowing her to be posed in a much more sexually appealing pose.
The figure also comes with a limited edition Weiß Schwarz card - "Nyamu-Senpai", which can only be obtained from this figure! Each figure comes with four copies of the card.
name: Nemu Asakura (あさくらねむ)

subtitle: The Golden Sword of Assured Victory.
description: Following on from Excalibur comes yet another "Fate/stay Night" charm to join the Metal Charm Collection series, Saber's Noble Phantasm - the noble sword Caliburn.
The holy sword has been sculpted down to the finest of details, leaving the gorgeous sword as a fitting symbol to the King of Knights.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 06: Caliburn (ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん 06 かりばーん)

subtitle: A dark smile that holds unspoken power.
description: From the popular anime 'CANAAN' comes Canaan's nemesis, Alphard, also placed in a flashy action pose to be posed with the recently announced Canaan figure.

Based on an illustration by the original character designers of the show - TYPE-MOON, the epic scene shows the calm, tactical Alphard displaying just how powerful she truly is, as she jumps into the air with a sly smile. A diorama base similar to the one with the Canaan figure is included, so they can be placed together to recreate the exact moment of their heated battle!
name: Alphard (あるふぁるど)

subtitle: The Shrine Maiden of Paradise, as a plushie!
description: From the ever-popular Touhou series of games comes a plushie of Reimu Hakurei - the same plushie that was sold at last year's Comiket is being released for all to enjoy now!

She is wearing her trademark red and white shine maiden outfit with the large red ribbon in her hair - making her a perfect rendition of Reimu in an adorable plushie form! The arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing various poses - even carefree poses ideal for Reimu's personality!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 07: Reimu Hakurei (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ07 はくれいれいむ)

subtitle: The Head Maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion, as a plushie!
description: From the ever-popular Touhou series of games comes a plushie of Sakuya Izayoi, the Head Maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion who has the power to manipulate time!

Sakuya is wearing her well-known maid uniform which is adorned with green ribbons. The hands and legs are fitted with joints allowing various poses - you can pose Sakuya with the elegant pose she deserves.
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 12: Sakuya Izayoi (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ12 いざよいさくや)

subtitle: A cute, compact body.
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. This sixth set is a set of small and charming minibikes! There are three colors to choose from: red, white or yellow, so you can pick whichever suits your figma best, and let them take a ride in style!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride.006 - Minibikes (えくすらいど らいど006 みにばいく)

subtitle: The sorrowful 'black priestess', and main character from the show.
description: From the popular anime "Ga-Rei: Zero" comes the long-awaited figma of 'Yomi Isayama', the agent from the supernatural disaster prevention agency. [ul]
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Exchangeable pony-tail parts allow you to recreate her in her transformed form.
Multiple items are included from the show, including her sword 'Shishio', the anti-spirit weapon shaped as an iron, and her cellphone.
Three face parts are included - her standard smiling face, a scowling face as well as the darker smiling face she had when she was transformed.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yomi Isayama (ふぃぐま いさやまよみ)
copyright: © 2008瀬川はじめ／[喰霊-零-]製作委員会

subtitle: The Wind Priestess, as a plushie!
description: From the ever-popular Touhou series of games comes a plushie of Sanae Kotiya, the priestess of Moriya Shrine.

All of the characteristic parts to her costume have been added to the plushie in cute, careful detail - from her unique blue and white priestess outfit, to her frog and snake hair accessories. As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing for various poses. She will be going on sale at the same time as all the other Touhou plushies, and they look great displayed together!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 13: Sanae Kotiya (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ13 こちやさなえ)

subtitle: Seven color variations of vibrantly colored, silk-screen printed decals!
description: These GSR Color Decals are available in the following seven commonly used colors: white, yellow, red, blue, silver, black and matt black. The decals are printed using high quality silk-screen printing. Each sheet has a solid area of color, along with nine strips of color, measuring 0.3mm, 0.4mm, 0.5mm, 0.75mm, 1.0mm, 1.2mm, 1.5mm, 1.7mm and 2.0mm - meaning there is a size for almost any of your needs. Each sheet measures 200mm X 140mm.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeller Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modellers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeller Support Series will cater to all!
features: High-quality silk-screen printing. Seven colors available.
Nine separately sized stripes allows versatility with all kinds of model building.
Designed to work efficiently with both the "GSR: Decal Fitter" and "GSR: Decal Fitter Pro"
name: MSS-11~17: GSR Color Decals (MSS-11〜17 GSRからーでかーる)

subtitle: Softens decals allowing a perfect fit even on curved or uneven surfaces!!
description: By removing the glue component from the original GSR Decal Fitter and improving the formula, this new stronger Decal Fitter has become available. Easily one of the strongest decal softeners available, the GSR Decal Fitter Pro allows decals to be placed without a wrinkle on even curved or uneven surfaces, and prevents silvering (when parts of the decal do not stick down correctly, causing an uneven surface). It is also very compatible with GRS: Edged Cotton Swabs. Please note that applying too much Decal Fitter can cause decals to melt, so apply the solution carefully. Each bottle contains 30ml of Decal Fitter.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeller Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modellers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeller Support Series will cater to all!
features: Softens any decals for easy application - thick or thin, hard or soft.
Specifically designed original formula used to effectively soften decals.
Can be used with the original GSR Decal Fitter for even faster application.
name: MSS-10: GSR Decal Fitter Pro (MSS-10 GSRでかーるごうりきなんかざい)

subtitle: 1/10th scale stickers of the Flame Haze to customize your favourite model cars!
description: From the popular anime "Shakugan no Shana II" comes a 1/10th scale sticker set of the flame-haired heroine Shana. The set also includes various stickers based on the image of her burning hair, as well as other symbols and extras from the world of Shakugan no Shana.

Give your favourite remote-controlled car a dosage of Shana in the easiest of ways with this sticker set, of course you can stick them on anything else as well - from cellphones to computers or anything else you want to bring the world of Shana to!
The stickers are made from high quality materials, meaning the colors will not fade easily and they will stick onto even a curved surface without any trouble.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticker Set 007: Shakugan no Shana II (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと007 しゃくがんのしゃなⅡ)
copyright: ©高橋弥七郎/いとうのいぢ/アスキー・メディアワークス/｢灼眼のシャナ・｣製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: The adorable Kudo-chan is here to make your favourite model car even more lovable!
description: From the hit game "Little Busters!" comes a 1/10th scale sticker set of the self-proclaimed 'exotic' and ever-loveable character 'Kudryavka Noumi'

Give your favourite remote-controlled car a Kudo-esque makeover in the easiest of ways with this sticker set. You can stick them on anything else as well - from cellphones to computers - or anything else you think needs a dosage of Kudo!
The stickers are made from high quality materials, meaning the colors will not fade easily and they will stick onto even a curved surface without any trouble.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticker Set 008: Little Busters! (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと008 りとるばすたーず！)

subtitle: The shy and bashful Toeto.
description: The popular character 'Toeto', created as a spin-off from 'Character Vocal Series 03: Luka Megurine', is a bashful, cuter version of Luka wearing an adorable cat hat - and now she is getting her very own big soft vinyl figure!
The figure appeared in one of Good Smile Company's commercials and became quite popular, and thus is now becoming available for all the fans! Keep her bashful smile by your side at all times!
name: Toeto: Soft Vinyl Figure (とえと そふびふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © トラボルタ/Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: Re-experience the vehicles you admired in the past!
description: Here to join the unique line-up of the EX-Alloy series comes the vehicles from 'Science Ninja Team Gatchaman'. There are two sets of three vehicles each.

This set contains the jet Unit G-1 that the leader of the team Ken rode, the racing car Unit G-2 that 'Condor' Joe took the wheel of, as well as the mysterious unknown vehicle 'Red Impulse' - all in all creating a set of three that any fan should enjoy. A display stand for both Unit G-1 and the Red Impulse are included, and the wheels of both can be retracted into the body to display the models as if they were in flight.
name: EX-Alloy Gatchaman A Set (Unit G-1/Unit G-2/Red Impulse) (えくすごうきん がっちゃまんめかAせっと)

subtitle: A glittering shot to a beating heart!
description: From the magical girl anime broadcast in 1982, 'Magical Princess Minky Momo' comes a figure of the main character, Momo! She has been sculped with the use of various materials, including soft vinyl, PVC and ABS. Also, her clothes and boots are made from real cloth material, giving her a little boost of extra cuteness.

She is holding the 'Minky Stick' in her hand, and her pendant adorns her neck. The neck and arms are also posable, allowing you to recreate a variety of scenes, including her adorable transformation scene!
name: Minky Momo (みんきーもも)

subtitle: Moving with the agility of a leopard.
description: Canaan, the main character from the popular anime 'CANAAN' is here as a PVC figure posed in a flashy action scene, announced together with her Nendoroid counterpart.

Posed in an dynamic pose in the middle of an intense battle, the figure is sculpted to bring out the same feeling that the character designer, TYPE-MOON's Takashi Takeuchi, put into his designs. The robe that flutters by her side is the same robe seen in the bonus scenario from the game '428: Fusasareta Shibuya de', and the base is designed to be a scenic diorama from the series itself, to truly feel like the figure is within the world of CANAAN.
name: Canaan (かなん)

subtitle: Re-experience the vehicles you admired in the past!
description: Here to join the unique line-up of the EX-Alloy series comes the vehicles from 'Science Ninja Team Gatchaman'. There are two sets of three vehicles each.

This set contains the bike Unit G-3 that 'White Swan' Jun rode, the Helibuggy Unit G-4 that 'Swallow' Jinpei, as well as the 'God Phoenix' which was created when all units from G-1 to G-5 connected together. The G-4 Unit's caterpillar tread is movable and its arms can be switched for drill parts or hand parts at any time. The God Phoenix model includes a display stand.
name: EX-Alloy Gatchaman B Set (Unit G-3/Unit G-4/God Phoenix) (えくすごうきん がっちゃまんめかBせっと)

subtitle: A cute set of the strange characters!
description: From the popular anime series currently being sold on Blu-ray and DVD, 'Bakemonogatari', comes this set of three Nendoroid Petites: Koyomi Araragi, Hitagi Senjyogahara and Tsubasa Hanekawa!Each character comes complete with character specific items from the anime, Hitagi has her stapler, Tsubasa comes with her cat ears and tail, and Koyomi's strange sticking-up hair is even included - in all different directions.
It's a set that is ready to recreate all sorts of interesting scenes in cute Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Bakemonogatari Set #1 (ねんどろいどぷち ばけものがたりせっと そのいち)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Ga-Rei, release! The young girl with the harsh fate of a spirit hunter.
description: From the popular anime "Ga-Rei: Zero" comes the long-awaited figma of the prodigy child born into a family of spirit hunters, Kagura Tsuchimiya.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
The 'cellphone' that holds an important meaning in the series is included along with hands to hold it, as well as various other hand parts.
The sword 'Michael #12' is included, as well as the weapon used in the last episode, 'Dokkosho'
Chain parts are included and can be attached to 'Michael #12' allowing for all sorts of action scenes.
A normal face, shouting face and brightly smiling face perfect for Kagura are all included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kagura Tsuchimiya (ふぃぐま つちみやかぐら)
copyright: © 2008瀬川はじめ／[喰霊-零-]製作委員会

subtitle: The tyrant's blade; dyed by darkness itself.
description: From the upcoming theatrical version release of 'Fate/Stay Night' comes another metal charm of the holy sword 'Excalibur', however this time the sword has been dyed a dark black - as it is the sword used by 'Saber Alter', the knight contaminated by a dark shadow.
The dark glint given off by the black blade is contrasted by the deep red engravings, creating a charm any fan would love to lay their eyes upon.
name: Fate Metal Charm Collection 05: Excalibur -Saber Alter Ver.- (ふぇいとめたるちゃーむこれくしょん 05 えくすかりばー せいばーおるた ばーじょん)

subtitle: The motorbike design that never gets old!
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. This fifth set in the series is a set of classic Japanese designed motorbikes.

Three bright color variations are available, allowing you to take your pick of navy blue, green or red. Take your figma on a ride down some old dirt roads, or on a joyride through the city on their very own classic motorbikes.
name: ex:ride: ride.005 - Retro Motorbikes (えくすらいど らいど005 れとろばいく)

subtitle: The front attacker of the Stars Squad!
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha A's' comes a figma of the close-range "Shooting Arts" specialist, Nakajima Subaru.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
The 'Revolver Knuckle' that attaches to her left arm is included, allowing you to reenact the final battle scene.
Effect parts allowing you to recreate the various effects of her magical attacks are included for those intense battle scenes.
A bright smiling face, an expression with gritted teeth, as well as the shouting face when she awakened her power as a cyborg are all included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Subaru Nakajima: Barrier Jacket ver. (ふぃぐま すばる・なかじま ばりあじゃけっとばーじょん)
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT © NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: 'Smash! Pulverize!' - a figure, drama CD and phamphlet set!
description: From the manga currently serialized in YOUNG GANGAN magazine, authored by Dai Satou and drawn by Maseru Gotsubo - 'Yuzuko Peppermint', comes a PVC figure of the stylish, silent high school girl, 'Yuzuko Hayakawa'!

Yuzuko is the wielder of the special ability 'Peppermint', that acts as a powerful stimulant whenever she becomes angered. Her normal long black straight hair, as well as the peppermint green hair are both included, allowing you to pose her both before and after using her 'Peppermint' ability. The huge iron ball she wields whilst fighting, 'Shiranuhi' is also included.
The figure will be sold together with an original drama CD story, written by Dai Satou, placed on a drama CD with a wonderful cast, as well as a booklet including illustrations by Maseru Gotsubo!
name: Yuzuko Hayakawa (はやかわゆずこ)
copyright: © 佐藤大とストーリーライダーズ © 2008 Masaru Gotsubo

subtitle: The young girl who travels between the present, and the feudal ages.
description: From Rumiko Takahashi's popular manga and the anime based on it, 'Inuyasha' comes a figma of the heroine, 'Kagome Higurashi'!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Her bow, six arrows and quiver are all included for her to take on the demons and purify the world of the past.
Hand parts allowing her to her bow are also included, along with other hand parts allowing for endless posing possibilities!
Two expressions are included: Kagome's warm smile, as well as a more serious face, as she goes to face the demons of the past.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kagome Higurashi (ふぃぐま ひぐらしかごめ)
copyright: © 高橋留美子／小学館・読売テレビ・サンライズ 2009　© Rumiko Takahashi/Shogakukan,Yomiuri TV,Sunrise 2009

subtitle: A microfiber towel with high resolution pictures printed on both sides!
description: A large microfiber towel featuring the lovable characters from the popular anime 'The Sacred Blacksmith'!

Making use of the independently developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber' and combining it with a special printing technique - this ULTRA-Microfiber material was created, which allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric.

It can absorb up to three times the average towel, and has excellent resistance to the friction and rubbing caused by washing, meaning the images will not degrade after just a few washes. It's the ideal towel, but you could also simply display it as a tapestry!
name: The Sacred Blacksmith: ULTRA-Microfiber Big Towel (せいけんのぶらっくすみす うるとらまいくろふぁいばー びっぐひーりんぐたおる)
copyright: © 2009 三浦勇雄／メディアファクトリー・アーススターエンターテインメント・文化放送・AT-X

subtitle: The biggest glasses cleaner ever!
description: A large microfiber cloth for cleaning glasses featuring the lovable characters from the popular anime 'The Sacred Blacksmith'!

Making use of the independently developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber', along with a special printing technique - this ULTRA-Microfiber material was created, which allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric.
Obviously it works perfectly for cleaning glasses, but there are many other uses as well - a small towel or blanket, or even a tapestry for your wall! It's up to you how you choose to use it!
name: The Sacred Blacksmith: ULTRA-Microfiber MEGA-glasses cleaner (せいけんのぶらっくすみす うるとらまいくろふぁいばー めがねふき)
copyright: © 2009 三浦勇雄／メディアファクトリー・アーススターエンターテインメント・文化放送・AT-X

subtitle: 1/24th scale decals from the popular new game!
description: From Nitroplus' brand new release, 'Full Metal Daemon MURAMASA' comes another addition to GSR's Character Customize Series.

The sheet features various decals using the illustrations of many of the main characters, including Ichijou Ayane, Kanae Ootori and Chachamaru Ashikaga. Attach them to any of your favourite models and add the dark feeling behind the world of MURAMASA whilst designing your very own itasha!
With even better quality than before, these decals will stick with ease and the colors will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 011: Full Metal Daemon MURAMASA - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーる011／そうこうあっき むらまさ)

subtitle: She'll never forgive you if you don't use these! 1/10th scale tsundere stickers!
description: Louise, the main character from 'The Familiar of Zero ~ The Princess' Rondo~' has come back to the Character Customize Series again, this time filling up two A4 pages of 1/10th scale stickers for you!

It's not just Louise though, various magical circles, symbols and other extras from Louise's world are also included on the sheet. You can stick them on your radio controlled cars, cellphones, computers or anything else you think needs a dose of Louise!
The stickers are made from high quality materials, meaning the colors will not fade easily and they will stick onto even a curved surface without any trouble.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticker Set 005: The Familiar of Zero ~The Princess' Rondo~ - 1/10th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと005／ぜろのつかいま～ぷりんせっせのろんど～)
series: The Familiar of Zero ~The Princess' Rondo~
copyright: © 2008ヤマグチノボル・メディアファクトリー/ゼロの使い魔製作委員会

subtitle: The cute virtual idol on yet another fashion product. ♪
description: The second product in the great collaboration between the popular Vocaloid Character Series 01: Miku Hatsune, and the fast growing accessory creator "decokick" – is bringing this fashionable bandanna for Miku fans everywhere!

The bandanna is designed as a camouflage pattern based off Miku's silhouette. It measures a fairly large 52cm x 52cm allowing it to be used for more than just a a bandanna - you could even wrap things in it, from your lunch to a gift!
Three colors are available to choose from: blue, grey and pink.
name: Miku Hatsune Camouflage Bandanna (Blue/Gray/Pink) (はつねみくかもふらーじゅばんだな（ぶるー／ぐれー／ぴんく）)

subtitle: A pouch ideal for all sorts of things!
description: A microfiber drawstring pouch featuring the lovable characters from the popular anime 'The Sacred Blacksmith'!

Making use of the independently developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber', along with a special printing technique - this ULTRA-Microfiber material was created, which allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric.

It can absorb up to three times the average fabric, meaning it is ideal for storing drinks. It also stores cellphones and gaming consoles very well, as the fabric itself can be used to wipe down the screen without a scratch. Store whatever you wish quickly and easily!
name: The Sacred Blacksmith: ULTRA-Microfiber ULTRA-pouch (せいけんのブラックスミス うるとらまいくろふぁいばー うるとらぽーち)
copyright: © 2009 三浦勇雄／メディアファクトリー・アーススターエンターテインメント・文化放送・AT-X

subtitle: The biggest glasses cleaner ever!
description: A large microfiber cloth for cleaning glasses featuring the adorable Clarissa Satsuki Maezono from the popular PC game '@Honey Coming RoyalSweet'!

Making use of the independantly developed fabric 'SUPER Hi-Microfiber', along with a special printing technique - this ULTRA-Microfiber material was created, which allows super-high resolution images to be printed on both sides of the fabric.
Obviously it works perfectly for cleaning glasses, but there are many other uses as well - a small towel or blanket, or even a tapastry for your wall!
name: Clarissa Satsuki Maezono: ULTRA-Microfiber MEGA-glasses cleaner (まえぞの・くらりっさ・さつき うるとらまいくろふぁいばー めがねふき)

subtitle: The shine maiden of Hakurei Shrine; who preserves Gensoukyou.
description: The well-known garage kit of the Touhou Project's shine maiden, Reimu Hakurei, which was originally designed by Kitsutefu, has been converted into a fully painted PVC figure by FREEing, for all to enjoy!
The PVC version has Reimu wearing drawers instead of the panties that the garage kit version was wearing - allowing for a slightly different feel to that what the original kit had.
name: Reimu Hakurei (はくれいれいむ)

subtitle: Her happy, yet slightly embarrassing first time on stage!
description: From the popular TV anime 'K-ON' comes the bassist from Sakura high school's music club 'Mio Akiyama', wearing the Gothic dress designed by Sawako-sensei, that she wore on her first stage performance at the school festival.

A replaceable embarrassed facial expression is included, allowing you to recreate her pose as she found out she would have to sing in place of Yui at the festival. The base of the figure is sculpted from ABS, and the four strings of the guitar been realistically stung onto the figure.
As for underneath the skirt... that's for you to see for yourself!
name: Mio Akiyama (あきやま みお)
sculptor: Mio Akiyama by Mesuka (UPLARK)/Base by Ani (UPLARK)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社/桜高軽音部

subtitle: Her proud stance of commanding magical spirits
description: From the popular light novel series being sold though Sneaker Bunko Magaine, 'Rental Magica' comes this PVC figure of Adelicia Lenn Mathers, the hereditary leader of the Magician's Society 'Goetia'.

With her deep purple dress wavering in the air, she stands as a proud descendant of King Soloman, commanding the 72 magical spirits. Her characteristic curly blond hair twirls around her impressive stance, all carefully sculpted by the popular Hiroshi - creating a figure filled with delight.
name: Adelicia Lenn Mathers (あでぃりしあ・れん・めいざーす)
copyright: © 三田誠・pako／角川書店／レンタルマギカ製作委員会

subtitle: The vehicle of the future, coming to the figma world ahead of time!
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. This forth set in the series is the 'Wheel Walker' - a vehicle sure to be used a lot more in the near future.
Both off-road and on-road tires are included and can be exchanged at any time. Three colors are available: black, red and white. Let your favorite figma experience the ride of the future!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride: ride.004 - Wheel Walker (えくすらいど らいど004 ほいーるうぉーかー)

subtitle: The starving young 'Index' from Necessarius.
description: With the spin-off anime series 'A Certain Scientific Railgun' currently airing, the world behind the ever-popular light novel series 'A Certain Magical Index' continues to grow more and more, and to expand it even further - the mysterious girl with a photographic memory, and one of the heroines from the original series - 'Index', is here as a PVC figure.

Placed in a pose based on an original illustration, she retains her youthful look with a brilliant, loving smile suited to a nun. Her long silver hair and carefully crafted golden embroidery lining her pure white nun's clothes are all sculpted to make it seem as if the figure really is floating in the air - and her expression and pose allow you to experience her gentle heart as she softly embraces a kitten.
name: Index
copyright: © 鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX

subtitle: Long braids and adorable glasses!
description: From the popular series serialized in Comic High!, 'Kodomo no Jikan', comes the last character to complete the Kodomo no Jikan Nendoroid trio - Mimi Usa!

Three different facial expressions, as well as leg parts for sitting on a chair are all included. Her removable school bag also comes with stickers to decorate it, allowing various scenes from the original to be reproduced in Nendoroid form!
Her long braided is also fitted with joints and fully posable, allowing the dance from the ending theme to be recreated with all three of the Nendoroid trio! Get them dancing!
name: Nendoroid Mimi Usa (ねんどろいど うさみみ)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル／こじか製作委員会

subtitle: Miku's heading this way in a leek car!
description: A brand new idea is here to join the Vocaloid Nendoroid series, filled with an all new playful spirit!

The Nendoroid Plus versions of Miku Hatsune, Rin Kagamine, Len Kagamine and Luca Megurine have all been made even smaller than before, and now each ride a pull-back car based on a specific item that has some meaning to them - Miku has a leek car, Rin and Len are both driving road rollers, and Luca is a tuna-shaped car!

The cars are all loaded with a mechanism that allows them to start accelerating as the Nendoroid character is placed in the car - just pull the car back, place the character in the driver's seat, and watch it drive forward!
VOCALOID is a registered trademark of the YAMAHA Corporation.
name: Nendoroid Plus: Vocaloid Pull-back Cars (ねんどろいどぷらす ぼーかろいど げきそうぷるばっくかー)

subtitle: The warm-hearted, blond haired magical girl
description: With the theatrical release of 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' getting closer by the day, yet another Nendoroid is here to join the cast - Fate Testarossa is here, and just like Nanoha, she is wearing her new barrier jacket from the movie!

Three facial expressions are included: a typical, stoic expression, a serious expression, as well as an expression with closed eyes. Her all important intelligent device, 'Bardiche' is also included in both axe form and scythe form. Her familiar Arf is also included in her dog form, once again giving you everything you need for a Nendoroid reenactment of the original!
name: Nendoroid Fate Testarossa: The MOVIE 1st Ver. (ねんどろいど ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ざ むーびー ふぁーすと ばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Oh darling, it's punishment time!
description: From the huge hit manga 'Urusei Yatsura' comes a figma of the main heroine 'Lum' wearing her tiger-striped bikini!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Lightning effect parts are included allowing you to recreate the famous scenes from the series.
Her cousin, 'Ten-chan' is also included, along with an additional stand attachment allowing him to fly side-by-side with Lum.
In addition to her standard face, a smiling face and an angry face are both included; allowing for various situations.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Lum (ふぃぐま らむ)

subtitle: Protecting the country through patriotism!
description: From the series 'Magical Marine Pixel Maritan' comes the Nendoroid of the 11 year-old Self-Defense Force Official, Jiei-tan! Following the release of the limited edition Marine Defense Hobby Channel version, comes this Ground Defense version.

Wearing a green one piece dress with an Defense Force hat, she comes complete with the constitution bound to her back with chains, as well as the Japanese flag - ready to fly high. She also comes with a the 64-type Defense Force rifle, as well as a military-use shovel and bucket, both needed by anyone in the Self-Defense Force!
She even comes complete with an extra facial expression for those times that she misplaces her glasses! It's a complete set of everything you need to recreate her adventures in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Jiei-tan (ねんどろいど じえいたん)
copyright: © ヒライユキオ／ホビージャパン

subtitle: The vibrant heroines of Demonbane, back again as a 1/10th scale sticker set!
description: This 1/10th scale sticker set from Demonbane is here to be added to the GSR Character Customize Series! Various vibrant images of the two most popular characters, Al Azif and Another Blood are included in abundance, plus there are extra stickers such as the Nitroplus 10th Anniversary logo, along with others.

You can stick them on remote controlled cars, cellphones, computers or anything else you want to decorate with the world of Demonbane. The stickers are made from high quality materials, meaning the colors will not fade easily and they will stick onto even a curved surface without any trouble.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticker Set 006: Demonbane - 1/10th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと006／きしんひしょうでもんべいん)

subtitle: The school life of a magical girl.
description: From the popular anime series "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha A's", comes a figma of Fate Testarossa, Nanoha's close friend, dressed up in her school uniform.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
A school bag that can be held in her hand, as well as her familiar, Arf, in her dog form are both included as extras.
Various hand parts are included, including a hand that can hold the "stand-by" form of Bardiche, which is also included.
Her original ribbon, as well as the ribbon given to her by Nanoha are both included, and can be changed at any time.
Two expressions are included: a gentle smile, and a face with closed eyes - deep in thought.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ せいふく ばーじょん)
copyright: © なのはA's PROJECT　© NANOHA A's PROJECT

description: This set of VOCALOID songs based on the theme of winter ballads have been taken from Niconico Douga and placed on a CD to warm up your heart this winter.
