The set includes songs from doriko, who climbed up the Oricon Daily ranking charts all the way to rank 12, as well as 19's Sound Factory, who are already closing on a country-wide album release, as well as many others to make it the best collection of songs this winter. Also included is a newly designed Winter version of Miku's Petite Nendoroid!
A total of ten thousand sets will be available. The images provided are samples, and may differ from the actual product.
Track Listing

1) Snow Piece - 19's Sound Factory feat. Miku Hatsune 2) Winter Alice - doriko feat. Miku Hatsune 3) Hitohira no - Noripii feat. Miku Hatsune 4) Fuyu no Seiza - Captain Mirai feat.Rin Kagamine 5) Chillyditty Of February - DARS feat.KAITO 6) soundless voice - Hitoshizuku P feat.Len Kagamine 7) White Lights - Haura P feat.Miku Hatsune 8) Yuki Usagi - OSTER project feat.MEIKO 9) Kimibun - 40mP feat.Miku Hatsune 10) Tsunaida Te - mikuru396 feat.Miku Hatsune 11) Fuyu no Mahou - Studio IIG feat.Miku Hatsune 12) Fuyu no Sakura - SixteenRemix AVTechNO! feat.Luca Megurine
name: VOCALOID SEASON COLLECTION ~SNOW SONGS~ & Nendoroid Petite: Snow Miku Set (ぼーかろいど しーずん これくしょん ～すのー そんぐす～ ねんどろいど ぷち ゆきみく せっと)
copyright: © GOOD SMILE COMPANY ,MOER ,Crypton Future Media, Inc. supported by Project DIVA VOCALOIDはヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。 ※画像はジャケットイメージとなります。

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: Various types of catchpins often seen on racing cars, drifters and tuning cars have been made available for model enthusiasts, created using etched stainless steel. Specific types often seen with rally cars, and even the aero-type recently used on tuning cars is included in the set, giving you various different kinds to work with.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-07: Catchpin Set (MSS-07 GSRきゃっちぴんせっと)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: The patterns that are often seen on racing cars and high performance cars have been made in carbon decals for all to add to their favourite model cars. Each sheet contains two differently sized twisting patterns, allowing it to be used on any model cars from a 1/43rd scale all the way up to a 1/24th scale. The decals are printed entirely though silk-screening giving them a shiny gloss effect as well as making them easy to apply. They are designed to work with the GSR Decal Fitter, allowing easy placement even on curved surfaces.
The base color is G (Gray), and the sheet measures 140mm x 200mm (each pattern is 130mm x 95mm).

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-06: GSR Carbon Decals G (Gray) (MSS-06 GSRかーぼんでかーるG（ぐれー）)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: A set of windscreen wipers created from etched stainless steel allowing you to increase the level of detail on your favorite model cars! The 'TYPE-A' windscreen wiper is the silver windscreen wiper with a short arm and blade, commonly seen on most Japanese cars today. The double-link type used on Abarth cars, as well as the double-arm type used on racing cars are included in the set. Instant glue is recommended when attaching the wipers to a car.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-08: Wiper Set (TYPE A) (MSS-08 GSRわいぱーせっと TYPE A)

subtitle: Fall in love with its sharp eyes!
description: The second figure to join Phat Company's 'Dokidoki Animal Series' is the Shoebill - also known as the 'statue bird'. The figure is approximately the same scale as figma action figures, so they can easily be displayed together.

This giant bird's biggest charm is its huge beak, which compared to the size of its face, makes it seems as if it should be on a different bird! Its sharp eyes that gaze ahead into the distance are another entrancing point.
Whist it's certainly a figure out of the ordinary, placing it by your side is well worth the peculiar presence it brings along with it.
name: Dokidoki Animal Series: Shoebill (どきどきどうぶつしりーず はしびろこう)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: A set of windscreen wipers created from etched stainless steel allowing you to increase the level of detail on your favorite model cars! The 'TYPE-B' windscreen wiper is the common black windscreen wiper with a long arm and blade, commonly seen on most Japanese cars today. The set includes various lengths and shapes, allowing you to pick the right look for whichever car you choose to attach it to. Instant glue is recommended when attaching the wipers to a car.

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-09: Wiper Set (TYPE B) (MSS-09 GSRわいぱーせっと TYPE B)

subtitle: Sakura High School's live festival performance is here! ♪
description: From the well-known anime 'K-ON' comes new Nendoroids of the K-ON club's bassist 'Mio Akiyama' and drummer 'Ritsu Tainaka' wearing the outfits from the Sakura High Festival performance!

Both of them have two separate expressions, as well as Nendoroid sized instruments, and even a mike stand for Mio to sing at! A di:stage to recreate their live performance is also included, giving you absolutely everything you need to recreate the day of the festival!
name: Nendoroid K-ON! Mio and Ritsu: Live Stage Set (ねんどろいど けいおん！みお＆りつらいぶすてーじせっと)
sculptor: Mio by Yukiwo Ageta and Ritsu by Maruhige
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Pretty Cure decals for use on 1/24th scale models!  Filled with the charming smiles of the Pretty Cure duo!
description: From the popular anime that caters to viewers of all sorts of different ages, 'Futari wa Pretty Cure' comes this set of decals to join the GSR Character Customize Series. The A4 sheet of decals are not only filled with illustrations of both 'Cure Black' and 'Cure White', but also include various symbols and signs familiar to the series, allowing you to give your favorite model cars a whole new feel to them!
The decals are made in Japan using a high quality material that does not allow the colors to fade easily, but still makes it simple to apply the decals to models or other surfaces.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 010: Futari wa Pretty Cure - 1/24th Scale Decals (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる010／ふたりはぷりきゅあ)
copyright: © ABC・東映アニメーション

subtitle: She'll never forgive you if you don't use these! Tsundere decals are joining the Character Customize Series!
description: From the popular anime series 'The Familiar of Zero ~ The Princess' Rondo~' comes an A4 page of 1/24th scale model decals fulled with illustrations of the main character, Louise!

But that's not all of course - various magical circles and symbols from Louise's world are also included on the sheet, allowing you to decorate your model car collection in some of the most colorful and decorative ways!
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily, and are made in Japan.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 009: The Familiar of Zero ~The Princess' Rondo~ - 1/24th Scale Decals (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる009／ ぜろのつかいま～ぷりんせっせのろんど～)
series: The Familiar of Zero ~The Princess' Rondo~
copyright: © 2008ヤマグチノボル・メディアファクトリー/ゼロの使い魔製作委員会

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: The patterns that are often seen on racing cars and high performance cars have been made in carbon decals for all to add to their favourite model cars. Each sheet contains two differently sized twisting patterns, allowing it to be used on any model cars from a 1/43rd scale all the way up to a 1/24th scale. The decals are printed entirely though silk-screening giving them a shiny gloss effect as well as making them easy to apply. They are designed to work with the GSR Decal Fitter, allowing easy placement even on curved surfaces.
The base color is B (Black), and the sheet measures 140mm x 200mm (each pattern is 130mm x 95mm).

High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!
name: MSS-05: GSR Carbon Decals B (Black) (MSS-05 GSRかーぼんでかーるB（ぶらっく）)

subtitle: Make your own special motorshow!
description: This illuminated rotating pedestal has been designed to display your 1/43 scale miniature cars in a way like never before. The entire platform can be rotated left and right, allowing you to see whichever model you choose to display from absolutely any angle.
Soft LED lights placed on the platform create a classy atmosphere, and the included clear casing leaves you with no worries of dust and dirt on your precious collections.
Create your own special motorshow, right in your own room!
name: GSR Illuminated Rotating Pedestal 431 (じーえすあーる しょうめいつきかいてんだいざ 431)

subtitle: Come on! Come on! Come on!
description: Come on, Aztecaser! This new figure from the series 'Pro-Wrestling Star Aztecaser' is here to join Max Factory's Soft Vinyl figure series. The figure is Tomokazu Seki's 9th release, and it is sculpted to keep the style from the original as best as possible! It's a must have for any soft vinyl collectors and fans of the series!
name: Tomokazu Seki - Aztecaser (せきともかず・あすてかいざー)
copyright: © 永井豪/ダイナミック企画

subtitle: The knight clad in pure white.
description: The previous figure 'Saber Lily ~Distant Avalon~ is still popular well after its release, but now she is back again wearing less armor, leaving her beautiful flowing dress visible for all. Her expression has also been altered to a subtle smile as she brandishes her glimmering sword through the air.

Her sword 'Caliburn' as well as its scabbard are all detailed down to the finest of details, and with her agile, fine body; it's hard to believe that she is a servant that fights in the Holy War. Be sure to add it to your collection, and even display it along with Saber Lily ~Distant Avalon~!
name: Saber Lily ~Golden Caliburn~ (せいばー・りりぃ ～しょうりすべきおうごんのけん（かりばーん）～)
copyright: © TYPE-MOON © EIGHTING © cavia © CAPCOM CO., LTD

subtitle: The 13th Zoalord, Imakarum Mirabilis!
description: After two and a half years of silence, the 'Bio Booster Armor Guyver' BFC-MAX series is back, and to welcome back the series is the Zoalord equipped with the ability to control gravity and space, Imakarum Mirabilis!

With incredible posabilty and many additional hand parts, you can recreate nearly countless scenes from the original series! You can also equip and remove the armor whenever you see fit - and even change the head part into its human form! It's a product overflowing with play value!
name: BFC-MAX12: Zoalord Imakarum Mirabilis (BFC-MAX12 ぞあろーど いまからむ・みらーびりす)

subtitle: A lyrical, magical Nendoroid! ♪
description: Nanoha Takamachi, the main character from the long-awaited theatrical debut of the Nanoha series 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st', is joining the Nendoroid world, with her newly designed barrier jacket shunk down to Nendoroid size with her!

Along with her standard expression, two additional facial expressions are included: A serious face in the midst of battle, as well as a relaxed face with closed eyes. Her beloved device 'Raging Heart' is also included in both 'Device Mode' and 'Canon Mode'!
The figure even includes a Nendoroid size version on Yuuno in his ferret form - it's the ideal set for any Nanoha fan!
name: Nendoroid Nanoha Takamachi: The MOVIE 1st Ver. (ねんどろいど たかまちなのは ざ むーびー ふぁーすと ばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The magical girl with a lonesome glint in her eyes.
description: From the popular upcoming movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a figma the second main character, 'Fate Testarossa' releasing at the same time as the movie!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, and not compromising posability even on a figure smaller than 120mm in height.
Her device 'Bardiche' is included with replaceable parts, allowing 'Axe Form', 'Scythe Form' and even 'Grave Form' to be recreated.
Her removable cloak includes two figma joints, making it possible to give it a feeling of motion, and more accurately create the scenes from the show.
Two expressions are included - a smiling face and a shouting expression.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: The MOVIE 1st ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ざ むーびー ふぁーすと ばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The reliable younger sister.
description: Following closely behind her older sister, comes a figma of Ui Hirasawa to continue the K-ON figma series! Ui will only be available as a limited edition Wonder Festival item.

Three expressions are included: A simple smiling face, another smiling face with an open mouth, and a worried face - all of which can be used with her older sister Yui's figma as well. Her schoolbag is included to keep up her reputation as a good student, and castanets are also included so she can play along with the with others. The castanets can of course also be used by Yui to recreate the famous 'Untan' scene from the anime!
name: figma Ui Hirasawa: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ひらさわうい せいふくver.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Even more cute, albeit slightly strange characters to collect!
description: From the IDOLM@STER spin-off currently being serialized in Dengeki Daimaou, 'Puchimasu', or 'PETIT IDOLM@STER', comes the second set of rubber charms featuring the loveable characters of the series
With this second set, the entire cast is now all available, and just like the previous set each character comes with a speech-bubble exclaiming a characteristic shout.
Join this set up with the first set, and carry these mysterious characters with you wherever you go!
name: PETIT IDOLM@STER - Trading Rubber Charms: Stage 02 (とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ ぷちます！すてーじ02)

subtitle: Even more ways to have fun start here, with ex:ride! This third set is a set of smaller means of transportation.
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. The third set in the series is a 'Street Style' set, including a skateboard, a kick scooter and in-line skates! The skateboard also comes complete with a set of decals, for you to customize however you like.

There are a total of five colors to choose from - pink, navy blue, sky blue, green and yellow - allowing you to pick whichever suits your figma the best, and place them in all new poses of skillful tricks!
No auctual figma figures are included with this product.

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride: ride.003 - Street Style Set (えくすらいど らいど003 すとりーとすたいるせっと)

subtitle: A special Miku to commemorate the Sapporo Snow Festival!
description: To commemorate the snow sculpture of 'Snow Miku' to be erected at the 61st Sapporo Snow Festival, comes a Nendoroid of Snow Miku! The ends of her long twin-tail hair is made from clear plastic - a first in the Nendoroid world!

The snowflakes printed into her hair, and ice blue outfit with parts coated with a glimmering silver coating really give a feeling of a snowy Winter for an all new appearance of Miku - one that almost looks as it it will melt away if you hold her in your hands.
Be sure to visit the 'WONDERFUL HOBBY LIFE FOR YOU!! 11' booth at the 61st Sapporo Snow Festival (5th February - 11th February), or order online to get your Snow Miku Nendoroid before she melts away!
name: Nendoroid Snow Miku (ねんどろいど ゆきみく)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: The intelligent magical girl's staff.
description: From the soon to be released movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a metal charm of Nanoha's intelligent device 'Raging Heart' in Device Mode.

All the delicate details of the evolved design have all been carefully crafted into the charm, and it also includes a magic circle motif with a brand new design from the movie. An item fit for any fan!
name: Device Metal Charm Collection M-02: Raging Heart -Device Mode- (でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん M-02 れいじんぐはーと -でばいすもーど-)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: She's kind of a germ...
description: A new charm set derived from the 'Character Vocal Series' has arrived! A total of three charms are in the set: 'Pylori Miku' and 'Pylori Rin' from the popular songs 'Song of the H. Pylori' and 'Song of the H. Rin Pylori' are in the set, as well as 'Toeto', the character based on Luka Megurine but wearing a cute cat hat!
You'll feel relaxed just by looking at the adorable charms!
name: Character Charm Collection: Pylori Rin (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん ぴろりん)
copyright: © 三月八日/ Crypton Future Media, Ink.

subtitle: Even if she's a cute Nendoroid - she's still the leader of a terrorist organization.
description: From the popular anime CANAAN which is fast approaching it's climax, comes a Nendoroid of Canaan's rival - Alphard.

Alphard comes complete with three face parts, including a calm face perfectly suited to her composed nature, a face filled with a cunning grin, as well as an angered face to display while she is in combat with Canaan.
Place her gun in her hand, and display her with Nendoroid Canaan to recreate the intense battle scenes between them in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Alphard (ねんどろいど あるふぁるど)

subtitle: D1, Takeoff!
description: From the realistic mecha anime, "Metal Armor Dragonar" comes a MAX Alloy model of the Dragonar 1! Max Factory has used the latest technology to recreate the dynamic illustration that appeared in both B-CLUB magazine and the opening animation of the anime.

The exterior makes use of ABS to create a natural, rounded form, with realistic sharp edges. The interior makes abundant use of die-cast, giving the figure a realistic weight, as well as reliable joints that won't lose their positions easily. The joints can be bent very far, allowing virtually any action scene from the anime to be recreated, yet still keep the figure in perfect proportion. The aviation unit, "Lifter", as well as various other parts are included for other scenes.
Max Factory have been putting renewed effort into their Alloy series, and now we finally get to see the results!
name: MAX Alloy: Dragonar 1 (まっくすごうきん どらぐなー1)

subtitle: Her codename: 'Phantom'.
description: Phantom was originally the debut PC game from the popular 'Nitroplus', but as a commemoration of the 10th anniversary of the game, a new TV anime was created and is currently being broadcast! The assassin heroine from the series, 'Ein', is now on her way to the world of figures.

With knowledge of exactly what fans are looking for, Toda Satoshi has sculpted the figure with a dark, realistic ambiance. Ein holds her trusty Colt Python in hand, as she stands right in the center of combat, even the finest details down to each hair and small ripples in her skirt carefully sculpted - creating a figure full of delight to any fan of the series.
name: Ein (あいん)

subtitle: Even if the wolf is wearing sheep's clothing, she won't lose it's track!
description: From the popular anime 'Phantom ~Requiem for the Phantom~', which was made as a commemoration of the 10th anniversary of Nitroplus' popular game, comes the ultimate assassin and main character from the story - Ein, here in Nendoroid form!

You can remake various poses from the anime - from an expressionless Ein ready to accomplish any mission, to a smiling Ein holding her teddy bear, or even put a knife in her hands and place a mask on her to recreate her as Phantom - there are all sorts of ways to pose her however you see fit.
name: Nendoroid Ein (ねんどろいど あいん)

subtitle: Mazinger, rise once more!!
description: The popular 2nd release in Max Factory's alloy series of figures, 'MAX Alloy Mazinger' is back again after a period of four years!

The powerful form and overwhelming power of the Mazinger has been kept true to it's original design - sculpted as a fully posable alloy action figure. The figure makes use of die-cast materials which give it a very heavy feeling. It comes complete with a variety of extras to play with and put on display, as well as a customized display stand.
The ultimate Mazinger is here in the highest of quality for you to enjoy!
name: MAX Alloy Mazinkaiser (まっくすごうきん まじんかいざー)
copyright: © 2001 永井豪／ダイナミック企画・光子力研究所

subtitle: The top idol who used all her talents to the best of her ability.
description: Following the Yuki Morikawa figure from the popular game and anime series 'White Album', comes a PVC figure of Yuki's work superior and top idol, 'Rina Ogata', here just in time for the start of the second anime season.

Just like Yuki, Rina has been sculpted in her stage outfit as if preforming at a live event for her fans. She was born with enough natural skill to write her own lyrics, and even design her own costume - and that costume can be seen here, truly bringing out both her talent, and her charm.
She has been positioned in to be displayed together with Yuki - allowing you to display the two together and recreate the recital contests at the live concert hall.
name: Rina Ogata (おがたりな)

subtitle: The high school idol with hidden potential.
description: With its anime version now complete, the popular work 'WHITE ALBUM' is now due to have a PVC figure of the amateur idol and main heroine 'Yuki Morikawa' join its product line!

She has been sculpted based on an illustration that displayed her singing on a live stage, wearing her stunning stage outfit. Whilst she is normally a very reserved girl, here she has gathered her courage and is singing on stage, creating a truly magnificent performance.
Her rival, as well as senior, 'Rina Ogata' is also planned for release, allowing you to display the two together and recreate the recital contests at the live concert hall.
name: Yuki Morikawa (もりかわゆき)

subtitle: The super-cute Death Note characters are back for the final showdown!
description: The second set of figures of the Nendoroid Petite action figures from Death Note are here! 'Case File #02' features a freshly sculpted looks for Light, L and Misa, as well as figures of L's successors - Near and Mello, and even Kira's worshiper, Mikami!

Each character includes certain items that featured in the original story, allowing multiple scenes from the anime or manga to be recreated in miniature form! Combine it with Case File #01 and recreate the battle of wits in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Death Note - Case File #02 (ねんどろいどぷち ですのーと けーすふぁいる #02)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ.Ｎ.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The elder sister of the Vocaloid family, now as a plushie!
description: The 6th in the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series is the talented songstress and elder sister of the Vocaloids - MEIKO! Her cool and calm personality has been perfectly preserved in this adorable plushie form.
The arms and legs are all fitted with joints, allowing her to be posed in whatever pose you think suits her best!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 06: MEIKO (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ06 「めいこ｣)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: The younger Nanoha, finally joining the figma collection!
description: The main character from the upcoming 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha: The Movie 1st' is joining the figma collection, even before the movie releases!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Her beloved magical device 'Raging Heart' is included in both 'Device Mode' as well as 'Canon Mode'.
Yuno is also included in his ferret form. He can also climb onto Nanoha's shoulder to recreate the popular pose.
A smiling face perfectly suited to Nanoha's personality, as well as a shouting face for battle scenes are both included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Nanoha Takamachi: The MOVIE 1st ver. ( ふぃぐま たかまちなのは ざ むーびー ふぁーすとver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha: The Movie 1st

subtitle: The battle-axe that pierces through the darkness.
description: From the upcoming 2010 movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes an all new metal charm of Fate Testarossa's intelligent device 'Bardiche' in it's axe form.
The new design of Bardiche has been faithfully reproduced down to the smallest details, and also includes a magic circle motif with a brand new design from the movie. An item fit for any fan!
name: Device Metal Charm Collection M-01: Bardiche -Axe Form- (でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん M-01 ばるでぃっしゅ ‐あっくすふぉーむ‐)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The ultimate assassin, with no memories of her past - figma Ein.
description: From Nitroplus' 10th anniversary project, the anime version of 'Phantom ~Requiem for the Phantom~' comes a figma of the ultimate assassin, Ein - codenamed 'Phantom'.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her trusty revolver seen in the series many times is included, as well as the knife seen in the first episode.
Plenty of hand parts are included, such as hands that can hold her pistol or other items in various ways.
An expressionless face and an expression that looks as if something has caught her eye are both included. A masked face is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Ein (ふぃぐま あいん)

subtitle: She's kind of a cat...
description: A new charm set derived from the 'Character Vocal Series' has arrived! A total of three charms are in the set: 'Pylori Miku' and 'Pylori Rin' from the popular songs 'Song of the H. Pylori' and 'Song of the H. Rin Pylori' are in the set, as well as 'Toeto', the character based on Luka Megurine but wearing a cute cat hat!
You'll feel relaxed just by looking at the adorable charms!
name: Character Charm Collection: Toeto (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん とえと)
copyright: © トラボルタ/Crypton Future Media, Ink.

subtitle: She's kind of a germ...
description: A new charm set derived from the 'Character Vocal Series' has arrived! A total of three charms are in the set: 'Pylori Miku' and 'Pylori Rin' from the popular songs 'Song of the H. Pylori' and 'Song of the H. Rin Pylori' are in the set, as well as 'Toeto', the character based on Luka Megurine but wearing a cute cat hat!
You'll feel relaxed just by looking at the adorable charms!
name: Character Charm Collection: Pylori Miku (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん ぴろりみく)
copyright: © 三月八日/ Crypton Future Media, Ink.

subtitle: Even more ways to have fun start here, with ex:ride! The second set gives you the choice of a more accessible vehicle!
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing. Following on from the vintage bikes, comes this 2nd set of vehicles - classically designed bicycles! With such a commonly accessible vehicle, it's bound to match any character who rides it! There are a total of five colors to choose from - pearl white, metallic red, metallic green, metallic yellow and metallic blue, so you can pick whichever suits your figma the best!

What is ex:ride? ex:ride is a set of vehicles created to be used by the figures in Max Factory's figma action figure series. All the vehicles in the series will have careful details on all their designs, and allows for even more possibilities from the figma world. Many more vehicles are scheduled to be announced soon!
name: ex:ride: ride.002 - Classic Bicycles (えくすらいど らいど002 くらしっくじてんしゃ)

subtitle: They might bring you a simpler life...
description: Putin and Kirenenko are two rabbits that somehow manage to enjoy a life of prison in Russia in the slapstick comedy series 'Usavich'. Those two rabbits are now here as good luck charms!

Even with the never-ending attacks from the police and the mafia, these two are always able to live out their lives at their own carefree pace - lets hope their good luck will shine on you too, with these charms by your side!
name: Character Good Luck Charm Collection: Putin/Kirenenko
copyright: © 2009 MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc. All Rights Reserved.  USAVICH:USAVICH and all related logos, titles and characters are trademarks of MTV Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc.

subtitle: The true form of one with no heartbeat - an hiE.
description: BEATLESS is a short novel written by Satoshi Hase and illustrated by redjuice, which is serialized in Newtype magazine. This 'BEATLESS Introduction Set' includes a figure of one of the stories' main characters - 'Leicia', the female hiE. It also comes with a special guidebook to the novel.

The figure of Leicia shows off her delicate, flexible looking body, as well as the huge device she holds behind her. The guidebook features a prologue to the novel, a list of terminology, various illustrations, character designs and more! It really is the perfect introduction to Leicia's story, 'BEATLESS'.
name: BEATLESS Introduction Set (いんとろだくしょん「びーとれす」せっと)

subtitle: Cheer along with Kurisu Makise and Mayuri Shiina!
description: As a part of the fifth month of the 'Cheerful JAPAN!' project, a special T-shirt featuring an illustration of the two heroines from Steins;Gate, Kurisu Makise and Mayuri Shiina will be available!

The two girls are both wearing cheerleader outfits and doing their very best to cheer on for everyone who needs it - with an illustration that is both lively and adorable, and shows off the girls in a way you'd never expect to see them!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Steins;Gate Cheerful T-shirt (しゅたいんずげーと ちあふるTしゃつ)

subtitle: The white megadeus joins the fight!
description: From the mecha anime 'The Big O' comes a soft vinyl figure of the third megadeus, the Big Fau, equipped with a variety of weapons and boasting very powerful defensive capabilities. It features a number of special features to faithfully recreate the look of the Big Fau as closely as possibly - including clear parts used for the cockpit hatch as well as the screws on either arm.
The vinyl figure is also the same scale as the MAX Alloy Big O model, measuring an incredible 320mm in height. Recreate the legendary battle between the Big O and the Big Fau!
name: Big Fau (びっぐふぁう)

subtitle: Make a contract with Kyubey whenever you like!
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a special Kyubey mascot with a sensor activated voice! The base he stands on is designed to look like a ring, and if you put your hand near it Kyubey will start speaking some of his lines from the series!
Create your contract with the lovable Kyubey, and keep him on your desk or shelf to enjoy whenever you like!
name: Kyubey Voice Mascot with Sensor (きゅぅべえ せんさーつきぼいすますこっと)

subtitle: The Hatsune Miku Good Smile BMW has had its first victory!
description: From 22nd June 2011 (Wed) till the 8th August 2011 (Mon), GSR & Studie with TeamUKYO will have a personal sponsor course available, this figma will be an extra included with the sponsor course. For more details please check NicoNico Chokuhan!
- NicoNico Chokuhan - http:chokuhan.nicovideo.jp/special/kosupo2011figma
To celebrate the victory, the mascot character for the Hatsune Miku GT Project - 'Racing Miku' will be coming out as a special figma Racing Miku: First Win ver.!

Her hair has a unique transparent feeling to it, and her racing queen costume design has been fully recreated in figma form, with the same wonderful posability that the figma series is known for! She will also come with a racing queen parasol as well as a first place trophy!
name: figma Racing Miku 2011: First Win ver. (ふぃぐま れーしんぐみく2011 はつゆうしょうきねん ver.)
price: An extra to all those who purchase the personal sponsor course
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: Behold the charm of the Lightning Squad's commander!★
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes the warm-hearted, 'Golden Flash' Fate T. Harlaown wearing a sexy bikini!
Based on the cover illustration of a magazine, this 1/4th scale figure is truly a sight to behold, and has been modeled to be displayed with the already released "Nanoha Takamachi Swimsuit Ver."

Taking a break from all the usual battle poses, this is a figure on the calmer side of things which helps to bring out Fate's adult charm through her enchanting smile and sexy deep blue bikini. Display her together with Nanoha for double the charm!
*The images used above are of a color prototype that was still under development. The final product may differ slightly.
name: Fate T. Harlaown Swimsuit Ver. (ふぇいと・T・はらおうん みずぎVer.)

subtitle: An all new series of sitting figures!
description: From the popular light novel and anime series 'Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a figure of Kirino Kosaka as the first of Penguin Parade's new 'Pettanko' series of figures! The new series of figures will have chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her with the Petanko Kuroneko who is going on sale at the same time!
name: Petanko Kirino Kosaka (ぺたんこ こうさか きりの)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ/アスキー・メディアワークス/ＯＩＰ撮影 ： 井上写真スタジオ

subtitle: Monthly Anime Style issue 5 takes a look at various new and old series!
description: The fifth issue of Monthly Anime Style is going to take a look at various popular anime both new and old! The Nendoroid Petite with this issue is Sawako Yamanaka from K-ON!

The issue itself has special articles on K-ON!, Mawaru Penguindrum's predecessor, 'Revolutionary Girl Uthena' and the classic OVA 'Aim for the Top!" along with various other articles - a nice mix of both new and old anime! Don't forget the various manga being serialized in the magazine as well - including the manga version of Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt written by the author of Gurren Lagaan, Hiroyuki Imaishi!

Monthly Anime Style is a monthly publication that delves into the production side of anime while also featuring a look at some rare images of the original works. Each issue will feature a Nendoroid Petite relating to the special feature in each issue!
name: Monthly Anime Style - Issue 5 (げっかんあにめすたいる だいごごう)
copyright: ©かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The 'Untouchable Queen' after an intense battle!
description: From the popular manga and anime series, 'Freezing', comes a figure of the heroine, 'Satellizer' as a 1/8th scale figure - posed as if she has just been through a fierce battle, with her clothes battered and torn while she still stands steadfast, ready for round two!

With a relaxed expression across her face, she wields her Volt Weapon, 'Nova Blood' in her right hand, ready to strike back at the next enemy who tries to take on the 'Untouchable Queen' - will that be you?
name: Satellizer el Bridget: Damage Ver. (さてらいざー＝える＝ぶりじっと だめーじVer.)
copyright: © 林達永・金光鉉・アートリムメディア・キルタイムコミュニケーション／フリージング製作委員会

subtitle: There is no way my little sister would dress up in a gothloli outfit!
description: From the popular anime 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga nai', comes a 1/8th scale figure of the magazine model and anime loving middle school student, Kirino Kousaka - but she is dressed up in the kind of gothloli outfit that you would normally only expect to see on Kuroneko!
She is posed with both hands on her hips while bending forward to show off her outfit - a completely different feel to the normal Kirino, but definitely still one that fans of the series will love!
name: Kirino Kousaka: Gothloli Ver. (こうさかきりの ごすろりVer.)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga nai
copyright: ©伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／ＯＩＰ

subtitle: Her swimsuit figure is also the ace of aces. ♥
description: Nanoha Takamachi, the "Ace of Aces" from Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS has been sculpted wearing a sexy bikini!

Based on the cover illustration of a magazine, this 1/4th scale figure is truly a sight to behold. As a change from her normal appearance as a strict instructor, this figure of Nanoha has a much more relaxed, open facial expression.
The Fate T. Harlaown that featured beside her in the magazine illustration is also available, and displaying them together only makes an even more beautiful scene.
*The images used above are of a color prototype that was still under development. The final product may differ slightly.
name: Nanoha Takamachi Swimsuit Ver. (たかまちなのは みずぎVer.)

subtitle: The Judgement member with never-ending love for Misaka!
description: From the popular anime "Toaru Majutsu no Index II" comes a 1/8th scale figure of Kuroko Shirai that will be released at the same time as Mikoto, allowing you to display the two roommates together!

She is posed holding her school bag in one hand and pulling out a load of metal arrows with the other, ready to jump into some action. Careful detail has been given to even the smaller parts of her sculpting, including her Judgement armband as well as the hidden metal arrows around her thighs. Also be sure to display her together with her beloved Misaka!
name: Kuroko Shirai: Standard Edition (しろいくろこ つうじょうばん)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

subtitle: The self-proclaimed "Warrior of Love"!
description: From Hobby Japan's 40th Anniversary Anime Project, the action anime 'Samurai Girls', comes yet another 1/8th scale figure following on from the previously released Jubei Yagyu - this time it's the transfer student to Buou Academy's - Kanetsugu Naoe!

She has been posed holding her giant hammer behind her in a confident pose, with careful attention paid to all her trademark features such as the gourd handing down from her hips and the giant bells in her twin-tail hair! Her outfit is also removable giving you the option to display her in a much more revealing pose whenever you like
name: Kanetsugu Naoe (なおえかねつぐ)
copyright: ©2010 すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱パートナーズ

subtitle: The active Puella Magi who made a contract with Kyubey.
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a Nendoroid of the kind third year student from Madoka's school, Mami Tomoe. She comes with a standard smiling face, as well as an upset face and a despairing face. She also comes with a number of muskets as well as the huge cannon she uses to fire her ultimate attack - Tiro Finale.

She also comes with a tea set for those who would rather pose her outside of the combat, and even the famous 'Candy Witch' is included - with so many optional parts, you can recreate all sorts of your favorite Mami scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Mami Tomoe (ねんどろいど ともえまみ)

subtitle: An all new series of sitting figures!
description: From the popular light novel and anime series 'Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a figure of Kirino's otaku comrade 'Kuroneko' - the second figure in Penguin Parade's new 'Pettanko' series of figures! The new series of figures will have chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her with the Petanko Kirino Kosaka who is going on sale at the same time!
name: Petanko Kuroneko (ぺたんこ くろねこ)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ/アスキー・メディアワークス/ＯＩＰ撮影 ： 井上写真スタジオ

subtitle: A 1/6th scale figure of the confident EVA2 pilot!
description: From the second Rebuild of Evangelion film, 'Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance' comes a 1/6th scale figure of Asuka Langley Shikinami, the young girl who becomes the pilot of EVA Unit 2.

She is posed with a shy expression across her face in the exact pose from the film when she first wore her new test plug suit. The plug suit brings out her body's curves, and the expression on her face brings out her feelings perfectly for you to enjoy whenever you want!
name: Asuka Langley Shikinami (しきなみ・あすか・らんぐれー)

subtitle: The kind, shy young girl who is also the strongest fighter in the group!
description: From the popular anime 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes a Nendoroid of another of the Milky Holmes members, Hercule Barton, also known as Elly!

She comes with both a smiling face, and a crying face ideal for her shy personality. She also comes with extra parts that allow you to recreate the embarrassing pose from episode three, as well as parts allowing you to recreate the rather strange looking Elly from episode 9, when she was possessed by her ancestor Hercule Poirot.
name: Nendoroid Hercule Barton (ねんどろいど えるきゅーる・ばーとん)

subtitle: The mysterious Luka; here to join your plushie collection!
description: The Luka Megurine plushie is also getting a re-release at the same time as Hatsune and Hachune Miku!

Even in her adorable plushie form, the design of her outfit and her long flowing pink hair are all carefully detailed for you to enjoy! Her arms and legs are fitted with joints, allowing them to be posed - so you can display her what ever pose you think suits her best! ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 09: Luka Megurine (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず09 「めぐりねるか」)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: Tokiwadai's most powerful Electromaster!
description: From the popular anime 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Mikoto Misaka, the Level 1 esper and student from Tokiwadai middle school. She has been posed in a determined looking pose to bring out her confident personality.

She also comes with replaceable parts that allow you to change the figure into one of her 'little sister' clones! Even a giant sniper rifle for the little sister to hold is included - it's like getting two figures in one! Be sure to display her together with the Kuroko Shirai figure that is due to be released at same time!
name: Mikoto Misaka & Little Sister Set: Standard Edition (みさか みこと＆いもうとSET つうじょうばん)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

subtitle: Both beautiful and powerful, figma Saber is here!
description: From "Fate/stay night" comes the ultimate servant, Saber! She arrives gallantly as a popular "figma" action figure!
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
Excalibur and Caliburn are both included with their scabbards, allowing them to be sheathed.
Three expression parts, as well as multiple hand parts are included, so you can make as many varied positions as you like.
Alternate fringe parts are also included, allowing even more realistic action positions.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to create and keep various action poses.
name: figma Saber: Armor ver. (ふぃぐま せいばー かっちゅうver.)

subtitle: KAITO, the cool and cute plushie!
description: The ever-valiant KAITO has been made into a cute plushie for all, here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series!!

The plushie has joints inside of it, allowing it to be placed in various poses, such as a sitting pose. The arms, legs and scarf can also all be posed however you see fit, allowing you to give KAITO that cool pose that he deserves!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 03: KAITO (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず03 「かいと｣)

subtitle: Come on, just accept it. This is your fate!
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a soft vinyl figure of the Kyubey, the mysterious little creature that recruited the girls into Puella Magi. The figure also comes with the all-important 'Grief Seed' and a 'Soul Gem', which both look great displayed next to him.
name: Kyubey (きゅぅべえ)

subtitle: Super Sonico is back again- this time in her naked apron!
description: Nitro Super Sonic's image character, Super Sonico is back again for her 4th plushie! This time the plushie is based on the famous naked apron Super Sonico that was released in 2009! She also comes with her favorite food - a macron, which she can hold in her hand!
You can pose her together with all the previous versions of Sonico for the complete Super Sonico plushie experience!
name: Nitroplus Plushie Series 04 : Super Sonico-chan ver 1.5 (にとろぷらすぬいぐるみしりーず④ すーぱーそにこちゃん ver. 1.5)

subtitle: Their high-school life in plushie form!
description: From the anime 'A Channel' comes a plushie of the Run, complete with even a cute plushie rendition of her trademark sticking-up hair!
Be sure to display her with Tooru, who is going on sale at the same time!
name: A Channel Plushie Series 01 : Run (Aちゃんねるぬいぐるみしりーず① るん)
copyright: © 黒田ｂｂ・芳文社/Aチャンネル委員会・ＭＢＳ

subtitle: Their high-school life in plushie form!
description: From the anime 'A Channel' comes a plushie of Run-chan's close friend, Tooru! Even the spiky top bit of her hair has been shrunk down into plushie form to keep by your side! She also comes with her baseball bat, which can be removed and attached whenever you want!
Be sure to display her with Run, who is going on sale at the same time!
name: A Channel Plushie Series 02: Tooru (Aちゃんねるぬいぐるみしりーず② とおる)
copyright: © 黒田ｂｂ・芳文社/Aチャンネル委員会・ＭＢＳ

subtitle: The Oshinos are joining the Bakemonogatari plushie series!
description: The forth set of plushies to join the Bakemonogatari plushie series is here, and includes both the vampire girl Shinobu and the mysterious Meme are getting the plushie treatment!
Oshino has his trademark Aloha shirt carefully shrunk down to plushies size, and even includes the cross shaped necklace and earrings! Be sure to display him with Shinobu!
name: Bakemonogatari Plushie Series 08: Meme Oshino (ばけものがたりぬいぐるみしりーず⑧ おしの めめ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The Oshinos are joining the Bakemonogatari plushie series!
description: The forth set of plushies to join the Bakemonogatari plushie series is here, and includes both the vampire girl Shinobu and the mysterious Meme are getting the plushie treatment!
Shinobu comes complete with a donut that you can place in her hands, plus her helmet can be removed whenever you wish! Be sure to display her together with Meme!
name: Bakemonogatari Plushie Series 07: Meme Oshino (ばけものがたりぬいぐるみしりーず⑦ おしの しのぶ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The short girl who is always filled with energy!
description: From Rewrite comes a plushie of Kotori Kanbe, the small but always energetic childhood friend of the main character, Kotarou. Her uniform has been carefully converted into plushie form and looks just as cute as ever! ♪ Your room will be twice as bright with this little one on display!
name: Rewrite Plushie Series 01: Kotori Kanbe (りらいとぬいぐるみシリーズ① かんべことり)

subtitle: The last hope for mankind is here as a figma!
description: BRS, the main character from the PSP Game, 'Black Rock Shooter: THE GAME' is joining the figma family!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard face, as well as a shouting face for combat scenes.
The wings on her back are fully posable, allowing you to pose them to match with various situations.
BRS's weapons, the 'Rock Cannon' and the 'Black Blade' are both included.
Replaceable fringe parts allow you to place the blue flame over her eye.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma BRS2035 (ふぃぐま BRS2035)

subtitle: I said it myself, so you know it's the truth!
description: From the popular game, 'Love Plus+' comes a figma of the part-time waitress, 'Nene Anegasaki'.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, an upset expression and of course a kissing expression.
She comes with lots of extra parts such as her schoolbag, a choker and a tanuki-ear head band.
She also comes with replaceable head part allowing you to pose her with long hair, as well as tip-toe feet parts for the kiss scene!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Nene Anegasaki (ふぃぐま あねがさきねね)

subtitle: A thin, reliable tip that will let you make precise adjustments!
description: A new set of tools called 'Takumi Tools' are joining the GSR Modeller Support Series. One of the first tools to join the series is a pair of needle-nose pliers designed for use with plastic models or any other models that requires careful precision.

These pliers are able to make the smallest of changes with a tiny tip that will let you grab onto whatever is needed with great precision. The long thin pliers are also ideal for reaching into hard to get to spaces, to make small adjustments without damaging the model you are working on. A spare plastic spring with a different strength is also included.

The Takumi Tool Series was created through the experience and ideas of professional modellers, giving high-quality tools to help modellers get the most out of their work. All the problems found in the tools of the past have been corrected, leaving easy-to-use tools that still perform exactly how you expect them to. The Japanese work 'Takumi' means 'Craftsman', and the Takumi tools can help any modeler turn their work into that of a true craftsman - whether you are an expert in the field or an absolute beginner - these tools are designed to be the very best for anyone!
name: MSS-42 Takumi Tools : Needle-nose Pliers (MSS-42 たくみつーるず ぴんせっとぺんち)

subtitle: A nurse who is dedicated to her patient's well being!
description: From the popular PC adventure game 'Anata no Shiranai Kangofu' comes a 1/4th scale figure of the heroine, Amane Shiratori in a very sexy pose wearing her nurse uniform.

She is posed with her shirt open revealing her bountiful bosom, and isn't wearing much on her lower half to boot. She also comes with a hospital stand to lean on complete with drips and all - the tubes can be attached and removed. She also comes with a pair of glasses, which you can choose to have her wear or not! This is one nurse that you'll definitely want by your side!
name: Amane Shiratori (しらとりあまね)

subtitle: The awakening of the electronic diva.
description: 'Miku Hatsune: Append' is an additional library pack that was added to the Miku Hatsune software to add more to her voice, and featured a design of Miku in a new costume - and now that design of Miku is becoming a 1/8th scale PVC figure, sculpted by Asai Masaki.

The figure is sculpted in the same pose from the front illustration of the packaging - overflowing with a a sense of beauty and a transparent feeling that adds a soft touch to the figure. It's a whole new side to Miku, ready to be enjoyed by fans from all over the world!
name: Miku Hatsune: Append (はつねみく・あぺんど)

subtitle: Just strolling along with a Goodsmile on their face!
description: threeA, the company that creates models based on the works of famous artist Ashley Wood, is releasing a limited edition 'WWRp JDF Large Martin and Square' for the Summer Wonder Festival 2011!

The Damn Large Martin is an assault robot with two large cannons equipped to it, and the smaller support robot by its side is the Square. Like the previously released 'WWR JAPAN DEFENSE FORCE SET' they are painted with the 'JAPAN DEFENSE LEAGUE' colors, and are sculpted to a 1/12th size scale. They are also painted using threeA's unique painting techniques, which gives them a realistic weathered look - definitely a set for fans of the series!
name: WWRp JDF Large Martin and Square (WWRp JDF らーじまーてぃん あんど すくえうぇあ)

subtitle: Miku is coming back on stage to show her support once again!
description: The third month of the charity product line 'Cheerful JAPAN!' is here - back again with the Cheerful ver. of Hatsune Miku, but this time as a figma!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to support relief efforts in Japan.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a smiling face, a singing face and a brand new support face designed to cheer everyone up!
The Cheerful version also comes with pompons and a support flag for Miku to use.
As with the original Miku figma, she also comes with her mike, a mike stand and two leeks
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hatsune Miku: Cheerful ver. (ふぃぐま はつねみく おうえんver.)

subtitle: Replicas of the cars from the manga series 'My Favorite Carrera'! The Passionate Ruby Stone Red!
description: From the manga 'My Favorite Carrera' comes a miniature car model of the car that Reina Todoroki was given by her father as a memento - the Porsche 911 Carrera RS. The car has a lovely and bright 'Ruby Stone Red' chassis, and the interior design of the car has also been carefully modeled to be an exact model of the car from the series - even the number plate is in place!

The model is made from high quality resin allowing for the finest of details to be added while still allowing for a sturdy and reliable model! The package illustration is illustrated by the original author of the manga, Kia Asamiya, and the model is an officially recognized Porsche model.
name: GSR: My Favorite Carrera Collection 01 : Porsche 911 Carrera RS - Reina Todoroki ver. (GSRかのじょのかれらこれくしょん01 ぽるしぇ911かれらRS とどろきれいなver.)

subtitle: Sakura High School's K-ON club is getting really to have their cutest performance ever!
description: With the movie fast approaching, the petite Nendoroids from the popular anime K-ON! are going on resale!

There is a full set of each character wearing their school uniforms, each with their instruments ready for a performance, but then there is also another set of all five characters wearing the swimsuits seen in the first season's "Another Training Camp!", even including a sunburnt version of Azunyan! As usual there is also one secret figure for you to look forward to as well!
Recreate the K-ON clubroom, the girl's live stage or even their outings down to the ocean in adorable petite Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Petite: K-ON! (The First) (ねんどろいど ぷち けいおん！（だいいっき）)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The cunning servant with mystic eyes.
description: From "Fate/stay Night" comes a figma of the cavalry of the night, Rider!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Two facial expressions are included: a standard face as well as a shouting face.
Her mask that conceals her mystic eyes can be removed to reveal a different side of Rider.
Her Noble Phantasm, the Rider Dagger is included connected to a long chain, just as it was seen in the series.
Rider's defining long hair is made using both soft and hard plastics, allowing all sorts of poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rider (ふぃぐま らいだー)

subtitle: Replicas of the cars from the manga series 'My Favorite Carrera'! The Charming Riviera Blue!
description: From the manga Favorite Carrera comes a miniature car model of the car that Reina's cousin drives, the Porsche 911 GT3. The car has a lovely and bright 'Riviera Blue' chassis, and the interior design of the car has also been carefully modeled to be an exact model of the car from the series - even the number plate is in place!

The model is made from high quality resin allowing for the finest of details to be added while still allowing for a sturdy and reliable model! The package illustration is illustrated by the original author of the manga, Kia Asamiya, and the model is an officially recognized Porsche model.
name: GSR: My Favorite Carrera Collection 02 : Porsche 911GT3 - Aika Misaka ver. (GSRかのじょのかれらこれくしょん02 ぽるしぇ911GT3 みさきあいかver.)

subtitle: The commander of Mobile Section 6 - ready for a day at the beach! ♪
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a 1/4th scale PVC figure of the commander of Mobile Section 6, Hayate Yagami, wearing a sexy bikini!

The outfit and pose are based on an illustration used for the front jacket of a CD from the series, which has been sculpted into a huge 1/4th scale figure. She is designed to be displayed together with the Good Smile Company figures, 'Nanoha Takamachi: Swimsuit ver.' and 'Fate T. Harlaown: Swimsuit ver.' which have already been released. Grouping the three together creates a charming scene straight from the sunny beach-side!

*The above images of Hayate are of a color prototype that is still under development. The final product may differ slightly. *In the image with all three figures, Hayate is a color prototype, while Nanoha and Fate are both PVC samples.
name: Hayate Yagami: Swimsuit Ver. (やがみはやて みずぎVer.)
series: List of Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS

subtitle: This month's Monthly Anime Style features a look at the classic anime series 'Martian Successor Nadesico"!
description: The latest issue of Monthly Anime Style gives you a closer look at one of the most classic anime series that has something for everyone - from science fiction, robots, comedy and even cute girls - Martian Successor Nadesico!

There are interviews with all the major people who were involved with the series - and not only the main series, but also the 'series within a series', Gekigengar 3! The front illustration of this issue is a cute rendition of Ruri Hoshino by Keiji Gotoh, and the rest of the magazine is also filled with his lovely illustrations! We also take a look at other series that were directed by Tatsuo Satou, such as Shingu: Secret of the Stellar Wars - definitely not a volume anime fans will want to miss!
The manga version of Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt written by the author of Gurren Lagaan, Hiroyuki Imaishi is also currently being serialized in the magazine!

Monthly Anime Style is a monthly publication that delves into the production side of anime while also featuring a look at some rare images of the original works. Each issue will feature a Nendoroid Petite relating to the special feature in each issue!
name: Monthly Anime Style - Issue 4 (げっかんあにめすたいる だいよんごう)
copyright: © XEBEC/テレビ東京/読売広告社

subtitle: The Puella Magi that transferred to Madoka's school.
description: From the hugely popular anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica comes a Nendoroid of Homura Akemi, the mysterious transfer student who warns Madoka not to become a Puella Magi. Her standard expression is a sidelong glance to bring out her cool personality, but she also comes with an upset face and a shy face.

She also comes with the pistol, bazooka, bomb and shield that she used while fighting against witches, as well as separate fringe parts that include glasses and new braided hair parts to recreate Homura back when she was still shy and withdrawn.
name: Nendoroid Homura Akemi (ねんどろいど あけみほむら)

subtitle: The cheerful yet clumsy demon!
description: From the popular anime that just saw its second season, 'The World God Only Knows', comes a Nendoroid of the clumsy demon Elsie, who has come to the human world to collect runaway spirits!

You can bring out all sorts of aspects from Elsie's personality by using the three included expressions - a smiling face, a crying face and a chibi-version face! She also comes with an extra set of arms and legs based on the scenes where she is waving them about like mad!

She also comes with her broom, the fluffy pink raiment around her neck and of course the jar to seal away the runaway spirits! A load of extra parts to recreate all your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Elsie (ねんどろいど えるしぃ)
copyright: © 若木民喜／小学館・落とし神駆け魂隊・テレビ東京

subtitle: Nendoroid Nymph is falling down from the heavens to bring back Ikaros!

She comes with three expressions - a standard smiling face, an angry face struggling to hide her embarrassment and finally a chibi face, for all the famous chibi scenes from the anime. She also comes with optional parts including a packet of chips for her to munch on, as well as a choice between her normal wings and her cut wings - giving you all sorts of different ways to display her!

subtitle: Bring the DOG DAYS universe to life with these 1/24th scale decals!

You can change your favorite model car into a DOG DAYS itasha, or stick them on anything else to easily create some DOG DAYS goods!

The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before! They are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.

subtitle: The young magus of the powerful magi family, back again!
description: From the movie "Fate/stay Night -UNLIMITED BLADE WORKS-" comes a resale of the 1/7th scale rendition of Rin Tohsaka, the young magus who decided to succeed her deceased father and take part in the Holy Grail War. Her pose is based on a key visual used for the film, and the figure makes sure that even her long flowing hair has been faithfully sculpted - down to the last strand!

The base of the figure is based off the image of Archer's world, 'Unlimited Blade Works", which has swords scattered throughout the ground. Rin is holding her pendant in her hand, but also comes with replaceable hands that allow her to hold the Azoth sword as well as her red gems - you can pick whichever you'd prefer to display!

Everything from the huge propeller units on the arms down to the rocket engines have all been recreated for fans of the series to enjoy. It measures an impressive 320mm in height and is the same scale as the MAX Alloy Big O Model, which will make them easier to display together - recreate the epic face off between the two giant mecha!

subtitle: Falling down from the sky as a Nendoroid!

She comes with a load of optional parts allowing for a range of poses - from a relaxed and simple Ikaros embracing her beloved watermelon down to her combat form as the 'Uranus Queen' - even complete with her ultimate weapon, the 'APOLLON'. The difference between the two poses is unbelievable, but it leaves you to decide how you'd prefer to see her displayed by your side!
name: Nendoroid Ikaros (ねんどろいど いかろす)
copyright: © 2010　水無月すう／角川書店／新大陸発見部フォルテ

subtitle: The Tomorrow King - the warrior with the body of a clone.
description: The next product from threeA is the PATHFINDER OYA TK ONO (BBICN EXCLUSIVE Model) from the Popbot series. The warrior in a human-shaped body is sculpted in threeA's original 1/6th scale, with careful detail added to every part of the model - from the realistic clothing and bags to the weapons - it's a unique appearance that only threeA can bring you!

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.

Popbot Popbot is one of the designer toy lines that threeA produces. The line is based on a comic book of the same name, which features illustrations by Ashley Wood and is published by ADW Publishing.
name: PATHFINDER OYA TK ŌNO BBICN EXCLUSIVE (Tomorrow King ONO) (とぅもろーきんぐ おーの)

She is sculpted in FREEing's popular 1/4th scale size, which really captures all of her unique features, and shows off her stunning body in all its glory. The net stockings are made using real material, giving that familiar realistic feeling the FREEing 1/4th scale figures are known for - it'll be tough for her to keep order while looking like this!

The pose is based on the illustration used on the front cover of the 2nd volume of the Blu-ray and DVD series 'Mayoi Snail', which featured Mayoi in an slightly embarrassed pose as she leans against her giant red backpack with an adorable expression across her face.

Her trademark backpack is also carefully detailed with things from the the illustration such as the giant paw coming out the top of the bag, and even a removable teddy bear in the side pocket - little details sure to please any fans of the series!

The first product is this Nendoroid of Puchitto Rock Shooter wearing a cheerleader's outfit - she also comes with pompons and a flag to make sure everyone can see her energetic cheering! You can also use her head with the original Black Rock Shooter Nendoroid to recreate the battle scenes from the game!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid relief efforts in Japan.

subtitle: A collaboration between Ashley Wood and ABC Warriors!
description: Mongrol is a collaboration project between the artist Ashley Wood and the English comic book series "ABC Warriors". Ashley Wood has transformed one of the main characters from the comic into his own threeA style!

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.
ABC Warriors A long running comic serialized in the English magazine '2000AD'. It is still running after many years and has two different series.

Mongrol Mongrol was originally commander of an ABC paratrooper platoon, however his entire body was destroyed on the battlefield, leaving nothing but his head. After that he was found by a scavenger who built him a new body out of other robotic parts, which gave him the body you see here.
name: Mongrol (もんぐろーる)
copyright: 2000 AD, 2000 AD logo,A.B.C Warriors, Mongrol © and TM Rebellion A/S. All Rights Reserved. Used under licence

This product will be on sale at the 'A Thousand Horizons' event, however stock is limited.
