name: A Thousand Horizons iPhone4 Case (あ さうざんど ほらいずんず あいふぉんふぉーけーす)

subtitle: Original T-shirts designed specially for the event
description: These originally designed T-shirts will be on sale at 'A Thousand Horizons', the charity event hosted by Good Smile Company to raise money for earthquake relief. They will be both at the event for sale, as well as available at the Good Smile Online Shop. There are both black and white versions available.
This product will be on sale at the 'A Thousand Horizons' event, however stock is limited.
A Thousand Horizons Official Site: http:www.1000horizons.com/
name: A Thousand Horizons Original T-Shirt (White) (あ さうざんど ほらいずんず おりじなる てぃーしゃつ（ほわいと）)

subtitle: Plushies of the hero from Earth and the Princess of the Biscotti Republic!
description: From the anime 'DOG DAYS' comes two adorable plushies - one of Cinque, the hero that has comes to help in the war and another of Millhiore, the kind and gentle Princess of the Biscotti Republic! Careful detail has been added to their unique outfits as well as Millhiore's dog ears, making sure not to disappoint fans of the series!
Be sure to display them together so they don't get lonely!
name: DOG DAYS Plushie Series 01: Cinque Izumi (どっぐでいず ぬいぐるみシリーズ① しんく・いずみ)

subtitle: Issue 3 of Monthly Anime Style features special coverage on Full Metal Alchemist and BONES!!
description: In this issue of Monthly Anime Style we take a look at the animation company BONES, who have been responsible for great animes such as Full Metal Alchemist , STAR DRIVER and many others! This issue will also come with a Nendoroid petite of Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos ver.)!

In the first special feature we will take a look BONES newest works 'Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos' and 'TOWANOQUON' to get an idea of how they put out the incredible quality that they do. There are interviews with the head developer, as well as rare images from their upcoming works. In the second feature we will be talking to 'Yasushi Muraki', who has been the VFX director in series such as 'Psalms of Planets Eureka seveN' and STAR DRIVER', an interview that anime fans should not miss out on! There are also of course other special features on other topics.

Monthly Anime Style is a monthly publication that delves into the production side of anime while also featuring a look at some rare images of the original works. Each issue will feature a Nendoroid Petite relating to the special feature in each issue!
name: Monthly Anime Style - Issue 3 (げっかんあにめすたいる だいさんごう)

subtitle: The 8-bit Black Rock Shooter, shooting through the darkness!
description: From the Black Rock Shooter anime, comes a figure of Black Rock Shooter based on 8-bit graphics - the start of a new dot-figure series called "Pixtone". The famous 8-bit graphics from the 80's are back as a series of cute figures!

You can even see Black Rock Shooter's Rock Cannon, as well as the popular checkered stand all reproduced in blocks. She will be released at the same time as the Pixtone figure of Dead Master, so you can display them together for twice the fun!
name: Pixtone Black Rock Shooter (ぴくとん ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: The 8-bit Dead Master, rising above the darkness.
description: From the Black Rock Shooter anime, comes a figure of Black Rock Shooter's rival, Dead Master based on 8-bit graphics - the second figure in the new dot-figure series called "Pixtone". The famous 8-bit graphics from the 80's are back as a series of cute figures!
Even her Death Scythe and the famous checkered stand have all reproduced as a block figure! It's a whole new kind of figure to enjoy!
name: Pixtone Dead Master (ぴくとん でっどますたー)

subtitle: Plushies of the hero from Earth and the Princess of the Biscotti Republic!
description: From the anime 'DOG DAYS' comes two adorable plushies - one of Cinque, the hero that has comes to help in the war and another of Millhiore, the kind and gentle Princess of the Biscotti Republic! Careful detail has been added to their unique outfits as well as Millhiore's dog ears, making sure not to disappoint fans of the series!
Be sure to display them together so they don't get lonely!
name: DOG DAYS Plushie Series 02: Millhiore F. Biscotti (どっぐでいず ぬいぐるみシリーズ② みるひおーれ・F・びすこってぃ)

subtitle: The manager that will lead her baseball team to the nationals!
description: Over 250 thousand copies of the original novel have been sold, making it the No.1 bestseller of 2010 which has quickly become both an anime and manga series as well - the popular "Moshi Koukou Yakyuu no Joshi Manager ga Drucker no 'Management' o Yondara" now joins the Nendoroid world as well, with a Nendoroid of the main character and manager of the Hodokubo High School Baseball team - Minami Kawashima!

She comes with three expressions - a smiling face to recreate the scene on the front cover of the novel, a determined face to show her constant determination, and finally a crying face for the times things don't go well. The book written by Drucker, 'Management' is also included along with a baseball bat - all the extras you need to recreate the feeling from the series!
name: Nendoroid Minami Kawashima (ねんどろいど かわしまみなみ)
series: Moshi Koukou Yakyuu no Joshi Manager ga Drucker no "Management" o Yondara
copyright: © 岩崎夏海・ゆきうさぎ・ダイヤモンド社／NEP

subtitle: A rather unexpected visitor is joining the Nendoroids!
description: From 'Level E', an anime based on Yoshihiro Togashi manga of the same name, comes a Nendoroid of the first prince of the planet Dogura well known as 'Prince', whose actual name is Baka Ki El Dogra.

He comes with three expressions - his normal face, a serious face and a joking face. Plus he also comes with a load of extra am parts to help him be the expressive character that he is in the series. He also comes with a chair and parts to let him sit on it, which allow you to recreate the famous scene where you first meet him in the series.
name: Nendoroid Prince (ねんどろいど おうじ)
copyright: ©Ｙoshihiro Togashi 1995年-1997年　©ぴえろ・テレビ東京／集英社

subtitle: The Master Samurai whose power was awoken by Muneakira!
description: From Hobby Japan's 40th Anniversary series, "Samurai Girls" comes a 1/8th scale figure of the heroine from the show, Jubei Yagyu, created by Penguin Parade!

Her pose is based on the front cover of the first volume of the light novel series, and creates a very dynamic feeling along with an innocent smile across her face. Careful attention has been paid on the smallest of details such as the rope around her hips and the many swords she keeps with her. Her outfit can also be removed giving you the option to display her in a much more revealing pose!
name: Jubei Yagyu (やぎゅうじゅうべぇ)
copyright: ©2010 すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱パートナーズ

subtitle: The silent Strength, hidden by a veil of darkness
description: From the Black Rock Shooter anime comes a 1/8th scale figure of Strength - the mysterious girl who watched over one of Black Rock Shooter's battles from the shadows. She has been sculpted with her giant Orge Arms equipped, which create a wonderful contrast when compared to her petite ladylike build. The stand follows on from the rest of the series and boasts an impressive size, with a design that brings out the atmosphere of the Black Rock Shooter universe.
You didn't get to see much of her in the movie - but you can enjoy her anytime you like once you've grabbed the figure!
name: Strength -animation version- (すとれんぐす あにめーしょんばーじょん)

subtitle: The 501st Joint Fighter Wing's Sniper!
description: From the popular series with an upcoming movie version, 'Strike Witches' comes a figma of the warm-hearted sniper from Britannia - Lynette Bishop!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her machine gun and striker unit are both included, along with ears and a tail for when she is using the striker unit.
The striker unit also comes with two replaceable propellers - one for standby mode and another for flying.
She comes with an extra set of hands for 'holding hands' with Yoshika, just like the famous scene in the anime.
She comes with three expressions - a normal face, a shouting face and a worried face.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Lynette Bishop (ふぃぐま りねっと・ びしょっぷ)

subtitle: We can do it! Kami-nii-sama!
description: The second season of 'The World God Only Knows' has just started, and from that series comes a 1/8th scale PVC figure of Elsie, the clumsy demon who supports the main character Keima as they try to capture spirits. She has been posed floating in mid-air, based on a scene from the anime itself!

The stand she is placed on is modeled off the bottle that she uses to capture the spirits, and the fluffy pink raiment she wears around her neck can also be removed whenever you want, giving you the choice as to how you'd prefer to display her!
name: Elsie (えるしぃ)
sculptor: シャイニングウィザード＠沢近(マックスファクトリー)
copyright: © 若木民喜／小学館・落とし神駆け魂隊・テレビ東京

subtitle: The second set of Nanoha rubber straps is here!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st comes another set of rubber trading straps, once again based on the chibi designs of Nendoroids and drawn specially for the rubber straps!

This set features all the most popular characters from the series - there are a total of 10 straps to collect (including two secret straps!). You can take your favorite character with you wherever you go now - just attach the strap to your bag, cellphone, or anywhere else you want! Plus you can trade with your friends to try collect them all!
(Please note that a box of straps may not include all the characters in the set.)
name: Nendoroid Petite Trading Rubber Straps: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st - SCENE 02 (ねんどろいどぷらす とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ 【まほうしょうじょりりかるなのは The MOVIE 1st】 SCENE02)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: 'Just being able to help others is enough to make me happy!'
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figma of the main character from the series - Kaname Madoka!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions - a standard face, a serious face and of course her frightened face, which fans know all too well!
Her bow is included in both its open and closed forms, along with four arrows of light.
A figma-sized Kyubey is included, as well as a Glyph Seed that Madoka can hold - extras that are sure to help recreate your favorite scenes from the anime!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Madoka Kaname (ふぃぐま かなめまどか)

subtitle: The 100th figma is here! figma Miku Hatsune: Append ver!
description: Miku Hatsune: Append is an updated set of voices for Miku, which also features a brand new design for Miku... and that design is also set to be the 100th figma sculpted by Masaki Asai!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A beautiful gradient effect has been applied to her hair, arms and legs to recreate the unique transparent feeling of Append Miku.
She comes with three expressions: a standard smiling face, a face with closed eyes for her 'awakening' pose as well as a more mature expression.
The extra parts on her hips, upper arms and breast area can all be removed and reattached whenever you want.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hatsune Miku: Append ver. (ふぃぐま はつねみく あぺんど ver.)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media,Inc. All Right Reserved.

subtitle: The honors student who always had the best grades!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Tsubasa Hanekawa - 'the girl who was enchanted by a cat'.

The pose is based on the front jacket cover of the 4th Blu-ray/DVD volume, 'Tsubasa Cat'. It features her kneeling on a desk looking behind her with a downward glance. She also comes complete with a set of replaceable cat ears, allowing you to pick whichever version you'd prefer!
name: Tsubasa Hanekawa (はねかわ つばさ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The Milky Holmes mascot!
description: From the popular anime 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes a plushie of the adorable stray cat that Sharo finds in episode two of the anime!

You can keep the lovable Kamaboko by your side whenever you like now- with his adorable expression and realistic cat size it's really the perfect way to enjoy his company! You can display him in your room, cuddle him to bed at night, or even get more creative and use him for some Milky Holmes cosplay!
name: Kamaboko Plushie (ぬいぐるみ かまぼこ)

subtitle: The school's basketball team ace!
description: From the popular anime 'Bakemonogatari' comes a figma of Suruga Kanbaru!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions, including her standard face, a face with closed eyes and a surprised face.
She also comes with parts to recreate the 'Rainy Devil' scene from the anime - including the yellow raincoat and a different head part.
The raincoat is made from fabric so it won't hinder any action poses you want to create!
She also comes with replaceable left hands to recreate her 'monkey paw'. Both an open and closed paw are included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Suruga Kanbaru (ふぃぐま かんばるするが)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Let's go home together! ♪
description: From the popular game 'Love Plus' comes a figma of the top student 'Manaka Takane'!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: A standard face, an embarrassed face and a kissing face.
A school bag, tennis racket case, reverse peace hand, exchangeable ribbon and even a bunny ear aliceband are all included
An exchangeable head part is also included which allows you to display Manaka with short hair.
Extra feet parts standing on tip-toes allow you to recreate the famous kiss scenes - the posing options are nearly limitless!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Manaka Takane (ふぃぐま たかねまなか)

subtitle: The Red Eyes Black Dragon, ressurected as a polystone statue!!
description: From the famous manga, anime and card game series "Yu-Gi-Oh!" comes a polystone statue of the dark dragon, "Red Eyes Black Dragon"!

Under close supervision of the original creator of Yu-Gi-Oh, Kazuki Takahashi as well as careful sculpting direction by Max Watanabe, the ultimate statues of the Yu-Gi-Oh dragons have been created. The team wanted to create a sculpture that was a truly realistic rendition of the mighty dragons, and they have been checked from every angle available to try and reach that realistic dream as closely as possible. The intense feeling of power and life from the sculpture is truly a sight to behold.
Red Eyes Black Dragon can be displayed with the simultaneously announced Blue Eyes White Dragon to create the stage of one of the most intense battle scenes in Yu-Gi-Oh!
name: Artwork Series: Red Eyes Black Dragon (あーとわーくしりーず れっどあいず・ぶらっくどらごん)
copyright: © 高橋和希　スタジオ・ダイス／集英社・テレビ東京・NAS

subtitle: Always going at her relaxed own pace.
description: From the adventure game 'Steins;Gate', which has recently been adapted into an anime as well, comes a Nendoroid of Mayuri Shiina.

She comes with two smiling expressions to really bring out her positive and optimistic personality, plus she also has a worried expression. She comes with a variety of items from the game as well - including her trademark hat, her cellphone and Metal Oopa - they'll help you recreate all sort of scenes!
name: Nendoroid Mayuri Shiina (ねんどろいど しいなまゆり)

subtitle: GuGuGu! The big fluffy mascot is coming down from outer space!
description: The second product of the Cheerful Japan! series is a giant plushie of the Good Smile Seijin - Good Smile Company's big friendly mascot! His huge smile is ready to keep you happy and his soft fluffy body and tentacles are a pleasure to hug whenever you want!
He measures an incredible 53cm in height - a giant size for giant hugs!
* For each sale made, Good Smile Company will be donating 5000JPY to the Japan Red Cross Society * The images above are of a figure still in development, and the final product may differ slightly.
name: Good Smile Seijin Plushie (Giant) (ぐっすませいじんぬいぐるみ（だい）)

subtitle: The Untouchable Queen - suddenly a lot more touchable!
description: From the popular manga and anime series, 'Freezing', comes a figure of the lovely heroine Satellizer wearing an open shirt and net stockings in a sexy pose for fans to fawn over - and what's more is that she is one of FREEing's huge 1/4th scale figures - the perfect size to capture all of her beauty!

The net stockings are made from real cloth for the same realistic effect as previous figures - plus loads of the parts are removable allowing you to pose her baring all or covered up in less revealing pose - you can even choose whether she should be wearing glasses or not! Don't miss your chance to touch The Untouchable Queen!
name: Satellizer el Bridget: Sexy Ver. (さてらいざー＝える＝ぶりじっと せくしーVer.)
copyright: ©2011 林達永・金光鉉・アートリムメディア・キルタイムコミュニケーション／フリージング製作委員会

subtitle: Fighting for life and for happiness, she holds a gun in unflinching hands.
description: After five years, this figure of Henrietta is going on resale, so she can be displayed with the recently announced Triela.

Their memories lost with their tragic pasts, the young girls of the European Social Welfare Agency are given artificial bodies and compelled to carry out assassinations by their handlers in return for the nebulous prospect of happiness.

Henrietta, the heroine of the Gunslinger Girl anime is back again! At first she might appear to be a normal girl, but the gun hidden behind her back shows her true nature. Display her together with Triela and enjoy the world of Gunslinger Girl on your desk!
name: Henrietta (へんりえった)
copyright: © 相田裕／アスキー・メディアワークス，マーベラスエンターテイメント

subtitle: The legendary dragon with unbelievable power is resurrected as a polystone statue!!
description: From the famous manga, anime and card game series "Yu-Gi-Oh!" comes a polystone statue of the light dragon, "Blue Eyes White Dragon"!

Under close supervision of the original creator of Yu-Gi-Oh, Kazuki Takahashi as well as careful sculpting direction by Max Watanabe, the ultimate statues of the Yu-Gi-Oh dragons have been created. The team wanted to create a sculpture that was a truly realistic rendition of the mighty dragons, and they have been checked from every angle available to try and reach that realistic dream as closely as possible. The intense feeling of power and life from the sculpture is truly a sight to behold.
It's a gallant figure with the same overwhelming energy that it had in the manga and anime when Seto Kaiba used it's great power - and now you can keep that power by your side!
name: Artwork Series: Blue Eyes White Dragon (あーとわーくしりーず ぶるーあいず・ほわいとどらごん)
copyright: © 高橋和希　スタジオ・ダイス／集英社・テレビ東京・NAS

subtitle: The characters from Puchitto Rock Shooter are here to cheer everyone on!
description: The second month of the Cheerful JAPAN! project is here, and with it comes a variety of products from Puchitto Rock Shooter - the browser game that can be played as a NicoNico application, which was created as a spin-off of Black Rock Shooter!

The second product for this month is a set of items - a cushion featuring illustrations of Puchitto Rock Shooter and the Great Puchitto Seijin both wearing cheerleader's outfits, as well as an Eco-bag with an illustration of a Puchitto Seijin and a key chain! They all make use of a lovely vibrant orange color - a cheerful color for cheerful products!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid relief efforts in Japan.
name: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Cushion & Eco-bag Set (ぷちっと★ろっくしゅーたー くっしょん＆えこばっぐせっと)
copyright: Images are sample images.© huke/B★RS Project　© 2011・GSC/MAGES./Imageepoch

subtitle: The Anarchy Sisters!
description: From GAINAX's popular anime 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' comes a figure set of the two angel sisters that protect Daten City from ghosts - Panty and Stocking!

They are based on a famous pose from the original illustrations, giving them the ideal look for any fans of the series. The set also includes a miniature figure of Chuck, the pet that the two girls keep at the church that they stay in.
You can pose them together with Scanty & Kneesocks who are due to be released at the same time!
name: Twin Pack+ : Panty & Stocking with Chuck (ついんぱっくぷらす ぱんてぃあんどすとっきんぐ うぃず ちゃっく)

subtitle: The Demon Sisters!
description: From GAINAX's popular anime 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' comes a figure set of the two demons who aim to bring chaos to society, Scanty and Kneesocks!

They are based on a famous pose from the original illustrations, giving them the ideal look for any fans of the series. The set also includes a miniature figure of Fastener the little red creature that the Demon Sisters keep with them.
Look forward to more figures from the series soon!
name: Twin Pack+ : Scanty & Kneesocks with Fastener (ついんぱっくぷらす すきゃんてぃあんどにーそっくす うぃず ふぁすなー)

subtitle: Gumako comes from the country of Udon and is ready to show everyone the power of udon!
description: The first product in the charity project dubbed 'Cheerful Japan!' is a Nendoroid of a character that was born as an April Fools joke in 2008 - but went on to become a full-fledged mascot of Good Smile Company - Gumako!

She comes with a variety of optional parts as well, including a bowl of udon and a content 'udon expression' for her to show just how much she is enjoying it. She also comes with a Nendoroid Petite sized version of the GSC-Seijin mascot. She uses a posable stand which allows you to pose her soaring through the air - or in a number of other creative poses!
* For each sale made, Good Smile Company will be donating 1000JPY to the Japan Red Cross Society * The images above are of a figure still in development, and the final product may differ slightly.
name: Nendoroid Gumako: Cheerful ver. (ねんどろいど ぐまこ おうえんVer.)

subtitle: A peaceful winter's day with Azusa.
description: From the popular anime series which also has a movie coming soon, 'K-ON!', comes a 1/7th scale figure of Sakura High's Music Club's rhythm guitarist - the adorable Azusa Nakako!

She has been posed based on a scene from the anime episode titled 'A Winter's Day', which shows her relaxed on a cushion as she carelessly plays with the kitten named 'Azunyan #2' - the kitten she was looking after for Jun. It's a gentle scene that is bound to warm the hearts of any Azusa fans!
name: Azusa Nakano (なかのあずさ)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The famous 'Black Rock Curry' sold at events is back for everyone to try!
description: At various Hobby Events around Japan including Wonder Festival 2010 and the Black Rock Shooter Festival 2010, Indotei's famous Black Rock Curry has always been one of the most popular choices of food - and now that curry is available in a pre-packaged sachet ready for anyone to heat up and enjoy!

Plus each packet of curry comes with a Black Rock Shooter charm designed by the famous CHAN x CO, the same illustrator behind those adorable BRS Nendoroid expressions! You get to enjoy the unique taste of Black Rock Curry together with a charm of either Black Rock Shooter or Dead Master!
name: Black Rock Shooter Curry & Charm Set: BRS ver./DM ver. (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー かれー＆ちゃーむせっと BRS ver./DM ver.)

subtitle: The cute and clever Lat-type Miku is joining the figure world!
description: The popular 3D CG of model of Miku created by Lat for the program 'MikuMikuDance' nicknamed the 'Lat-type' Miku is getting her very own 1/8th scale PVC rendition!

This version of Miku features a couple of key differences that have been carefully recreated to keep the fresh feeling of Lat-type Miku - she is wearing a larger set of headphones, and instead of a '01' tattoo on her arm she has a red ring. The chain on her dress also boasts a unique checkered design.

Another feature unique to Lat-type Miku is her red-rimmed glasses, which give her a whole new kind of charm... but they can also be removed if you'd prefer to have some of the standard Miku back. Lat-type Miku has been placed in a very dynamic pose that recreates the bouncy feeling of a MikuMikuDance - you can enjoy the dance on your desk whenever you want!
name: Hatsune Miku: Lat-type Ver. (はつねみく らとしき ばーじょん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: Original goods from the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale!
description: The original goods that were available at the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale at the GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP!

The first of which is these four different sets of five tin badges, each featuring illustrations or scenes from the anime. There were 33 different badges available at the café, but we have selected the 20 most popular badges and separated them into these four sets. You can pin them to your hat, bag or anywhere else to show your love for the series, or just grab them as collector's items!
name: Madoka Magica: Tin Badge Set (A/B/C/D) (まどか☆まぎか かんばっじせっと（A／B／C／D）)

subtitle: Original goods from the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale!
description: The original goods that were available at the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale at the GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP!
The second of these goods is these bookmarks, which feature an etched design of a Grief Seed on them. The string on the top comes in either pink or purple.
name: Madoka Magica: Grief Seed Bookmark (Pink/Purple) (まどか☆まぎか ぐりーふしーどしおり（ぴんく／ぱーぷる）)

subtitle: Original goods from the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale!
description: The original goods that were available at the Madoka Magica Café are going on sale at the GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP!

The third of these goods are these Madoka themed thermal cups! There is a 'Puella Magi' version, which features all the girls on the design, and then there is a 'Witch' version which features a much darker design based around the witches of the series.
name: Madoka Magica: Thermal Cup (Puella Magi/Witch) (まどか☆まぎか たんぶらー（まほうしょうじょ／まじょ）)

subtitle: ARMSTRONG, a robot wrapped in mystery.
description: The ARMSTRONG robot is joining the collection of WWRP (World War Robot Portable) brought to you by threeA.

The previous models in the WWR series have all been 1/6th scale, however this new WWRP series will instead feature 1/12th scale models instead. They are smaller than before but offer a much more accessible price, and even if they are smaller threeA have kept the quality just as great as always. There are four ARMSTRONG units available each with their own specific coloring - the Monet 0G, Gerry 1G, Mod 7 1G and Floyd 0G.
World War Robot WWR is a series illustrated by Ashley Wood, and written by Ashley Wood and TP Louise, which tells the story of a fictitious war that took place between 1980 and 1990.

Armstrong A robot originally secretly developed as a bodyguard for Rothschild. There are two models, the 0G and the 1G, where G refers to gravity - the 0G was designed for use on the moon, whereas the 1G was designed for use on Earth.
Rothschild The founder and CEO of the Rothschild company. The main designer of most robots found in the WWR world.
name: ARMSTRONG Monet 0G (あーむすとろんぐ もねっと 0G)
copyright: © ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2011. All right reserved

subtitle: ARMSTRONG, a robot wrapped in mystery.
description: The ARMSTRONG robot is joining the collection of WWRP (World War Robot Portable) brought to you by threeA.

The previous models in the WWR series have all been 1/6th scale, however this new WWRP series will instead feature 1/12th scale models instead. They are smaller than before but offer a much more accessible price, and even if they are smaller threeA have kept the quality just as great as always. There are four ARMSTRONG units available each with their own specific coloring - the Monet 0G, Gerry 1G, Mod 7 1G and Floyd 0G.
World War Robot WWR is a series illustrated by Ashley Wood, and written by Ashley Wood and TP Louise, which tells the story of a fictitious war that took place between 1980 and 1990.

Armstrong A robot originally secretly developed as a bodyguard for Rothschild. There are two models, the 0G and the 1G, where G refers to gravity - the 0G was designed for use on the moon, whereas the 1G was designed for use on Earth.
Rothschild The founder and CEO of the Rothschild company. The main designer of most robots found in the WWR world.
name: ARMSTRONG Gerry 1G (あーむすとろんぐ げりー 1G)
copyright: © ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2011. All right reserved

subtitle: She's coming down to Earth as a figure!
description: From the sci-fi comedy anime 'Asobi ni Iku Yo' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the lovely cat-eared Elis!

Elis is a playful alien known as a Catian - she has cat ears and a tail and she has come to earth to explore and have some fun! Her beautiful proportions have been captured in this figure of her wearing an open shirt in a very sexy pose! Her lovely red eyes, bountiful bosom are long legs are available for all to enjoy!
name: Elis Open-Shirt Ver. (えりす はだかわいしゃつ Ver.)
copyright: ©神野オキナ・メディアファクトリー／キャーティア大使館

subtitle: The caring Triela, who serves as a mentor to the other girls of the SWA.
description: From the popular manga currently being serialized in Dengeki Daiou, 'GUNSLINGER GIRL', comes a figure of the second girl to become employed by the Social Welfare Agency, Triela. The pose is based off the front cover image from the 9th volume of the manga, and features her in a more delicate pose than she would normally be seen in.

Obviously it wouldn't be GUNSLINGER GIRL without a gun - and Triela has her gun in her arms, plus the stand included features a design imitating that of brick paving, helping to bring our the atmosphere from the series as well!
name: Triela (とりえら)
copyright: © 相田裕／アスキー・メディアワークス，マーベラスエンターテイメント

subtitle: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series is going on resale!
description: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series brought to you by FREEing is back by popular demand! This time Yutaka, Minami, Patty and Hiyori are all going on resale - in all their 1/4th scale glory, and with real uniforms made from real fabric for a more realistic feeling! Be sure to grab them if you didn't manage to get them last time

The quiet Minami hardly ever shows her emotions has been sculpted preserving all of her characteristic traits in the impressive 1/4th scale figure. Her tall, slender body is dressed in clothes made from real cloth for that same realistic feeling from the previous figures.
The other classmates are also coming soon, so be sure to line them all up and recreate the school life of your favorite characters!
name: Minami Iwasaki: Gym Uniform ver. (いわさきみなみ たいそうふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The dual sword, dual gun wielding heroine is getting her own character decals!
description: From the light novel and anime series 'Hidan no Aria' comes a new set of decals to join the Character Customize Series. The sheet is filled with the cute heroines from Butei High School, as well as numerous logos, signs and symbols from the series!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 029: Hidan no Aria - 1/24 Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる029／ひだんのありあ)
copyright: ©2011 赤松中学・メディアファクトリー／東京武偵高校

subtitle: The Shinsengumi as plushies!
description: From the romance adventure game, "Hakuouki: Shinsengumi Kitan" comes a limited edition set of plushies featuring Toshizo Hijikata and Soji Okita, that will be sold at the Gift online shop as well as animate stores.

Hijikata has a serious expression suited to his "Demon Commander" title, and Okita is gazing adorably ahead with his trademark "catface" smile on his plushie. They'll look great displayed together in your room! ♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 02: Soji Okita (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ２ おきたそうじ)

subtitle: All three of the Nendoroid Tachikomas are coming back again!
description: Continuing the Nendoroid mecha series, which started with the original Tachikoma, the Tachikoman's yellow version is being released simultaneously with the silver version, so you can create your own little squad!

Expertly crafted in the soft Nendoroid style and following the blue version's lead, there's no telling what will happen when he gets together with his buddies. Only one way to find out, though; get them all!
name: Nendoroid Tachikomans - Yellow version (ねんどろいど たちこまんず・いえろー)
sculptor: りゅういち(ピースメーカー)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: All three of the Nendoroid Tachikomas are coming back again!
description: Continuing the Nendoroid mecha series, which started with the original Tachikoma, comes the silver tachikoma that rescued Batou in episode 25. It is being released simultaneously with the yellow version, so you can create your own little squad!

He's been sculpted faithfully to the original design , with a tasteful silver body. There's no telling what will happen when he gets together with his blue and yellow buddies. Only one way to find out, though; get them all!
name: Nendoroid Tachikomans - Silver version (ねんどろいど たちこまんず・しるばー)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The perceptive leader of the Milky Holmes girls!
description: From the anime and game series "Detective Opera Milky Holmes" comes a Nendoroid of one of the four Milky Holmes girls - Sherlock Shellingford, also known by her nickname, Sharo! This Nendoroid features a different design and various different extras when compared with the Nendoroid of Sharo that was released as an extra to the PSP game.

Sharo comes with three expressions that all pull out a part of her lovable personality. She also comes a magnifying glass to investigate with, as well as a Nendoroid-sized version of Kamaboko - the cat that the girls find in the anime series. She even comes with a set of arms to recreate the infamous 'Baritsu' scene from the anime!
name: Nendoroid Sherlock Shellingford (ねんどろいど しゃーろっく・しぇりんふぉーど)

subtitle: The shy yet always honest girl.
description: From the popular manga and anime series 'Kimi ni Todoke' comes a Nendoroid of the ever-positive main character from the series, Sawako Kuronuma!

She comes with her standard expression as well as a embarrassed expression perfect to show off her shy personality - plus she comes with two different 'joke' faces from the series, both a happy version and a thinking version. Shota Kazehaya's dog, Maru-chan, is also included, giving you a load of variety to recreate scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Sawako Kuronuma (ねんどろいど くろぬまさわこ)
copyright: ©椎名軽穂・集英社 /「君に届け」製作委員会

subtitle: The energetic doppler that loves to love!
description: From the fantasy adventure anime directed by the famous Yutaka Yamamoto, ''Fractale'' comes a 1/8th scale PVC figure of the mysterious girl that appeared from a bracelet that Phryne left behind. The pose is based on an image that featured in 'Shisou Chizu Beta vol.1', which was an illustration by the original character designer, 'Hidari'.

Nessa has a bright and innocent smile beaming across her face, showing off her bright, fun personality. It may make use of different colors when compared to the anime, but it's still the same fun-loving Nessa!
name: Nessa (ねっさ)
copyright: © フラクタル製作委員会

subtitle: The Minamike mascot teddy bear!
description: From Minamike comes a life-size plushie of Chiaki Minami's teddy bear, Fujioka! The arms and legs are fitted with joints so you can pose him as well! ♪ Be sure to display him with the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series: Chiaki Minami that is going on sale at the same time!!
name: Fujioka Plushie (Real Size) (みなみけ ふじおかぬいぐるみ（りあるさいず）)
copyright: © 桜場コハル・講談社／みなみけ 製作委員会

subtitle: The priestess of the Moriya Shrine
description: From the popular 'Touhou Project' comes the third Nendoroid in the Touhou collection - the priestess of Moriya Shrine, Sanae Kotiya! The Nendoroid form has her wearing her blue and white priestess outfit, as well as her snake and a frog-shaped trademark hair accessories!
Along with her standard face, a smiling face and a worried face are also included, as well as various optional parts that allow you to recreate various scenes from the Touhou world.
name: Nendoroid Sanae Kochiya (ねんどろいど こちやさなえ)

subtitle: All three of the Nendoroid Tachikomas are coming back again!
description: The first machine to get the Nendoroid treatment, Tachikoma, the sentient tank, has gotten even cuter (if that's possible).

Hailing from Ghost in the Shell Stand Alone Complex (which needs no introduction), this little guy features ratcheted joints, replacement stickers and parts to duplicate its many configurations, an articulated hatch for its included pilot, and a gatling gun that can replace the grenade launcher at its mouth.
Naturally, this piece has the usual Good Smile quality and Nendoroid cuteness, so it should be on the shelf of any collector worth his salt.
name: Nendoroid Tachikoma (ねんどろいど たちこま)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: "Are you my master?"
description: From Fate/stay night comes two new plushies to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series - one of the most powerful servant, 'Saber' and another of her darker form, contaminated by an evil shadow - the merciless 'Saber Alter'.

Saber is wearing her casual clothes and holds a bamboo sword, while Saber Alter is wearing her dark gothic-lolita dress and is holding dark Excalibur - the swords can of course be removed whenever you like! ★
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 38: Saber Alter (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず38せいばーおるた)

subtitle: "Are you my master?"
description: From Fate/stay night comes two new plushies to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series - one of the most powerful servant, 'Saber' and another of her darker form, contaminated by an evil shadow - the merciless 'Saber Alter'.

Saber is wearing her casual clothes and holds a bamboo sword, while Saber Alter is wearing her dark gothic-lolita dress and is holding dark Excalibur - the swords can of course be removed whenever you like! ★
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 37: Saber (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず37せいばー)

copyright: © ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2011. All right reserved

subtitle: Enjoying the Summer Festival each in an adorable yukata
description: From 'The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya' comes a set of three Nendoroid Petites - Haruhi Suzumita, Yuki Nagato and Mikuru Asahina each wearing their yukatas from the final episode of the Endless Eight arc (Episode 19).
Nagato also has the mask that she bought during the episode, allowing you to recreate the famous scenes that took place at the festival!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Haruhi Summer Festival Set (ねんどろいどぷち はるひなつまつりせっと)
copyright: © 2007、2008、2009 谷川流・いとうのいぢ／ＳＯＳ団

subtitle: The youngest of the Minami Sisters.
description: From Minamike comes a plushie of the Chiaki Minami in her cute school uniform! ♪ She even comes with the typical red bag that all grade school students wear, which can be attached and removed from her back. Be sure to display her with the Fujioka plushie that is going on sale at the same time!!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 42: Chiaki Minami (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ42 みなみちあき)
copyright: © 桜場コハル・講談社／みなみけ 製作委員会

subtitle: The ace of the Nameless, with her huge weapon in hand!
description: From the PSP game 'Valkyria Chronicles 3' comes a Nendoroid of Imuka, the ace of the 'Nameless'. who are a military group made up mostly of criminals and trouble-makers.

Even her weapon, 'Var' is fitted with posable pieces and comes with parts to let you pose her reloading the giant weapon. She also comes with an different expression better suited for battle scenes, leaving you with a load of posing options to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Imuka (ねんどろいど いむか)

subtitle: Can't I just say that I want to become one...?
description: From the popular anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica comes a Nendoroid of the friendly Madoka Kaname, along with a Nendoroid sized version of Kyubey, the mystical little creature that turned the girls into magical girls.

She comes with an extra expression based on the face she drew for herself in her school notes, as well as an upset face, her bow and arrow and another version of Kyuubei that can hands off her arm, allowing you to recreate the famous pose from one of the key visuals from the show!
name: Nendoroid Madoka Kaname (ねんどろいど かなめまどか)

subtitle: The seasoned warrior and instructor - just as strict as a Nendoroid!
description: From the popular action anime filled with cute girls, "Queen's Blade' comes a Nendoroid of the veteran warrior from the tribe of forest elves - Alleyne! Everything from her pointed elven ears to her pale white skin have been shrunk into Nendoroid form - keeping all her unique charm points and adding to the cuteness!
She also comes with her huge hat which can be removed whenever you like, as well as both her staff and cudgels so you can even recreate your favorite battle scenes in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Alleyne (ねんどろいど あれいん)
copyright: ©  2010 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイド EX パートナーズ

subtitle: The contemptuous primary school student
features: The lovable Mayoi Hachikuji from popular anime Bakemonogatari is joining the figma line-up!
Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions - two different smiling expressions as well as an upset expression.
The yellow umbrella from the opening animation is included in both an opened up and closed form.
She also comes with a shift:body which lets you pose her in the crouching pose she was in when she first met Araragi.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mayoi Hachikuji (ふぃぐま はちくじまよい)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Drinking even as a figma! It's Gensoukyou's little devil!
description: From the popular game series, the 'Touhou Project' comes a figma of Suika Ibuki, one of the most mischievous demons in Gensoukyou!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions - a standard face, a smiling face and a drunk face - it wouldn't be Suika without one!
She has figma sized versions of her trademark Ibuki-gourd as well as her shaped weights on chains.
She also comes with a dish to drink her sake, and even a miniature cloned version of herself.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Suika Ibuki (ふぃぐま いぶきすいか)

subtitle: The mysterious girl with giant arms and a spiky tail.
description: From the Black Rock Shooter anime comes a figma of Strength, the mysterious girl with giant robotic arms and a winding tail!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Two almost expressionless faces are included, but each feature her looking in different directions.
The strange mechanical arms she uses as weapons, known as 'Ogre Arms' are included with joints even in the fingers for a variety of poses.
The included 'Ogre Arms' can be removed at any time. A total of 8 replaceable parts are included with her.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Strength (ふぃぐま すとれんぐす)

subtitle: A PVC figure of the incredibly shy Nadeko.
description: From the popular anime "Bakemonogatari" comes a PVC figure of Nadeko Sengoku, the girl with a snake wrapped around her.

The posing for the figure is taken from the cover of the 4th volume of the Blu-ray and DVD release of the series, which depicts the lovable Nadeko playing by some water around the autumn leaves. Even the leaves and snake floating in the water have been carefully detailed for the full effect of the original illustration.

Removable leg parts are also included, which allow you to either display Nadeko standing knee-deep in the water, or standing on the waterside with her legs fully visible. It's a figure fit for any Nadeko fan!
name: Nadeko Sengoku (せんごくなでこ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The Tenth Unit Captain and the prince of the Oni clan!!
description: From the romance adventure game, "Hakuouki: Shinsengumi Kitan" come two more plushies for your collection! This time both the Shinsengumi's Tenth Unit Captain, Sanosuke Harada as well as the prince of the Oni clan, Chikage Kazama are both becoming huggable plushies!

Sanosuke has a typical relaxed expression, as if he is ready for anything to come his way, while Chikage has a selfish expression ideal for his position as a prince. Be sure to love them just as much as the others! ♪♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 05: Sanosuke Harada (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ５ はらださのすけ)

subtitle: The mysterious angel who protects order.
description: From Angel Beats! comes an adorable plushie of the school council president in the afterworld - Tenshi!
Her placid expression has been carefully recreated in plushie form! ♪ Keep the cute little angel by your bedside to keep you company!
name: Angel Beats! Plushie: Tenshi (えんじぇるびーつ!ぬいぐるみ てんし)

subtitle: The Tenth Unit Captain and the prince of the Oni clan!!
description: From the romance adventure game, "Hakuouki: Shinsengumi Kitan" come two more plushies for your collection! This time both the Shinsengumi's Tenth Unit Captain, Sanosuke Harada as well as the prince of the Oni clan, Chikage Kazama are both becoming huggable plushies!

Sanosuke has a typical relaxed expression, as if he is ready for anything to come his way, while Chikage has a selfish expression ideal for his position as a prince. Be sure to love them just as much as the others! ♪♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 06: Chikage Kazama (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ６ かざまちかげ)

Hijikata has a serious expression suited to his "Demon Commander" title, and Okita is gazing adorably ahead with his trademark "catface" smile on his plushie. They'll look great displayed together in your room! ♪
name: Hakuouki Plushie Series 01: Toshizo Hijikata (はくおうきぬいぐるみシリーズ１ ひじかたとしぞう)

subtitle: figma Kaiji is here - ready to begin gambling for his life!
description: From the anime based in the world of gambling, 'Kaiji' comes a figma of the main character himself - Kaiji Itou!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with three expressions: a standard face, a scowling face with gritted teeth and a crying face showing his weaker side.
A load of extra parts are included to recreate famous scenes such as the 'Restricted Rock-Paper-Scissors', 'Balance Beam' and 'E-card' scenes.
The clothes he wore while on the balance beam, as well as papercraft with the famous 'Zawazawa' sound effects are also both included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kaiji Itou (ふぃぐま いとうかいじ)
copyright: ©福本伸行／講談社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・NTV・D.N.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Infinite Stratos is joining the Character Customize Series!
description: From the popular light novel and anime series, IS <Infinite Stratos>, comes a selection of decals for 1/24th scale models. There are a number of decals featuring all of the girls from the series, as well as various symbols and signs from the series that help to bring out the Infinite Stratos atmosphere - everything you need to make your very own IS model itasha!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 027: Infinite Stratos - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる027／いんふぃにっと・すとらとす)

subtitle: The 'strongest' ice fairy in all of Gensoukyou.
description: From Shanghai Alice's famous game series, the "Touhou Project", comes the 9th Nendoroid from the series - this time it's Cirno, the ice fairy!

Cirno is wearing her classic blue outfit and also has her beautiful ice wings carefully sculpted from a clear plastic for a unique transparent effect that really makes them look frozen. She comes with three expressions - a boastful smile, an upset face and a crying face. As optional parts Cirno comes complete with both a frog frozen in ice as well as an ice sword - plus she comes with additional leg parts that let her stand in an even more boastful way! Let everyone know that Cirno knows best!
name: Nendoroid Cirno (ねんどろいど ちるの)
