subtitle: Big O, Action!
description: From the classic giant robot anime 'The Big O' comes a MAX Alloy of the strongest megadeus - the Big O itself! It's the biggest model to join the MAX Alloy series ever, measuring an incredible 300mm in height and weighing an unbelievable 1050g!

The model can recreate a number of the Big O's famous attacks including 'Sudden Impact', 'Cannon Party' and 'Mobydick Anchor'. Even the famous poses from the 'Arc Line' and 'Chrome Buster' attacks can be recreated using the giant model. Additionally, Roger's favorite car, 'Griffon' is also included and can be stored in the left foot of the robot just like in the anime.

The hands can be posed in a number of different ways which allow you to to create even more unique scenes from the anime, plus the model also comes with replaceable 'clenched fists' for a more imposing look. A special kind of painting gives the figure a very realistic appearance and a high quality finish - all coming together to create the ultimate model of the Big O!
name: MAX Alloy Big O (MAXごうきん びっぐおー)

subtitle: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series is going on resale!
description: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series brought to you by FREEing is back by popular demand! This time Yutaka, Minami, Patty and Hiyori are all going on resale - in all their 1/4th scale glory, and with real uniforms made from real fabric for a more realistic feeling! Be sure to grab them if you didn't manage to get them last time

Yutaka Kobayakawa is described as "just like a little sister, frail, pure, and adorable" - a walking example of "moe" itself. That adorable character is coming in an impressive 1/4th scale wearing her gym uniform, and just like all the previous figures, the uniform is made completely from real fabric for a truly authentic feeling.
name: Yutaka Kobayakawa: Gym Uniform ver. (こばやかわゆたか たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series is going on resale!
description: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series brought to you by FREEing is back by popular demand! This time Yutaka, Minami, Patty and Hiyori are all going on resale - in all their 1/4th scale glory, and with real uniforms made from real fabric for a more realistic feeling! Be sure to grab them if you didn't manage to get them last time

The overly energetic and highly strung Patty has been sculpted in 1/4th scale wearing the normal realistic cloth gym uniform. She has been posed to bring out her impressive bust line that Minami always envied. It's a pose that really brings out her charms!
name: Patricia Martin: Gym Uniform ver. (ぱとりしあ＝まーてぃん たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: Thinking of Yuri all day, every day. The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series is going on resale!
description: The Lucky Star Gym Uniform Series brought to you by FREEing is back by popular demand! This time Yutaka, Minami, Patty and Hiyori are all going on resale - in all their 1/4th scale glory, and with real uniforms made from real fabric for a more realistic feeling! Be sure to grab them if you didn't manage to get them last time!

The otaku girl has been given a bright, cheerful 1/4th scale rendition, with the same real cloth clothes as the previous figures. She is the first character to get a sitting pose, which really shows off her cute feminine charm. This figure concludes the Gym Uniform series, so be sure to collect them, and display them all together!
name: Hiyori Tamura: Gym Uniform ver. (たむらひより たいそうふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The Anti-Shadow special android Aigis is back again with new equipment.
description: figma Aigis is back again, this time based on the new design from the new Persona 3: FES game.

Along with the new design, she also features reworked expression parts, machine-gun effect parts and a cannon. You can also lower her visor - something that was not even seen within the game! A definite must-have for any fans of the series!
name: figma Aigis: Heavily Equipped ver. (ふぃぐま あいぎす じゅうそうver.)

subtitle: "You say you can make any wish come true with your magic... but..."
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a Nendoroid of Madoka Kaname, this time wearing her school uniform from Mitakihara Junior High.

She comes with three expressions - a frightened face for when she looks upon the battles of her friends, a smiling face for her everyday cheerful appearance at school and the crying face seen in the opening animation of the series. You can combine her with the previously announced Nendoroid of Madoka to recreate almost any of your favorite scenes from the show!
name: Nendoroid Madoka Kaname: School Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど かなめまどか せいふくVer.)

subtitle: "I want you to make a contract with me."
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a life-sized soft vinyl figure of the Kyubey, the mysterious messenger who came to grant the wishes of any girls who would become Puella Magi.

His adorable, although somewhat expressionless face and huge tail have all been recreated in a full 1/1 scale, and both his head and tail are fitted with joints. If you display him somewhere in your home, you might even get a wish granted...
name: Kyubey Soft Vinyl Figure (きゅぅべえ そふびふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Carry around the Puchitto Rock Shooter cheer wherever you go!
description: The second month of the Cheerful JAPAN! project is here, and with it comes a variety of products from Puchitto Rock Shooter - the browser game that can be played as a NicoNico application, which was created as a spin-off of Black Rock Shooter!

The third product for this month is another set of items - a pair of mugs, one of Puchitto Rock Shooter and another of the Great Puchitto Seijin, a mini tote bag with an illustration of a Puchitto Seijin running energetically, and finally a key chain featuring Puchitto Rock Shooter and the Great Puchitto Seijin - a load of goodies to enjoy!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid relief efforts in Japan.
name: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Mug & Tote Bag Set (ぷちっと★ろっくしゅーたー ぺあまぐかっぷ＆おでかけせっと)
copyright: Images are sample images.© huke/B★RS Project　© 2011・GSC/MAGES./Imageepoch

subtitle: Naoetsu Highschool's basketball star!
description: From the popular anime 'Bakemonogatari' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Suruga Kanbaru, following on from the previous two figures from the same series - Hitagi Senjyogahara and Nadeko Sengoku. The pose for the figure is based on the 3rd volume Blu-ray & DVD jacket cover of the series.

Kanbaru is posed sitting relaxed on a large pile of books, with many more books all around her. She is busy reading one of the books, and seems to be absolutely entranced by it. At first it might seem like a very elegant pose, but if you take a closer look you'll notice that the book she's reading isn't something all that elegant.
It's a pose suited perfectly to Kanbaru's unique image!
name: Suruga Kanbaru (かんばるするが)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The virtual singing sensation is back for another run! ♪
description: This 1/8 scale figure of Hatsune Miku was first released in September, but due to it's overwhelming popularity, a re-release has already been announced for October! From VOCALOID2's popular "Character Vocal Series 01" comes a realistic PVC figure of the mascot character Hatsune Miku.

This particular pose was based off an original illustration by the character's original designer, KEI. Special care has been taken in preserving every enchanting detail, from her trademark twintails fluttering around her, to the hand on her headset, everything comes together and makes her seem ready to burst into song at any moment. She's jumped out of the virtual world and into this cute figure, so be sure to take one home with you.
name: Hatsune Miku (はつねみく)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: It doesn't matter if it's Winter or Summer - this Santa is still coming to town!
description: From the popular anime K-ON! which recently had a movie version announced, comes a 1/7th scale figure of the lovable guitarist from Sakura High School's music club - Yui Hirasawa!

Yui is posed with a smile beaming across her face in a joyful pose wearing the Santa outfit from the first season's 7th episode - 'Christmas!". But... that's not all - the Christmas outfit can also be removed revealing a school swimsuit version of Yui underneath! It's like getting two figures in one!
name: Yui Hirasawa (ひらさわ ゆい)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The mysterious black cat is here!
description: From 'Shining Hearts', a role-playing game set in a fabulous fantasy world, comes a 1/7th scale PVC figure of the mysterious black cat character who also runs an antique store - Xiao-Mei.

The pose is based on a popular key visual from the game, which features Xiao-Mei standing upright with her head tilted slightly to the right as a smile beams across her face. She is wearing a tight outfit which brings out her bodyline beautifully, and also reveals her beautiful long legs and impressive bust. The long black tail she is so proud of sticks out the back of the outfit just like the original illustration drawn by the famous Tony Taka.
Enjoy the friendly smile of Xiao-Mei as she charms you with her cute cat-like pose!
name: Xiao-Mei (しゃおめい)

subtitle: Featuring real fishnet stockings!
description: From the popular anime 'K-ON!' comes a figure of the keyboardist from Sakura High, Tsumugi Kotobuki, wearing the sexy bunny outfit that Sawako-sensei always dreamed Tsumugi would wear.

Although she has been placed in a very sexy outfit and in a very daring pose, Tsumugi sticks true to her character without a worry in the world, and a gentle smile across her face. Enjoy yet another addition to FREEing's impressive 1/4th scale figure collection, even featuring real fishnet stockings!
name: Tsumugi Kotobuki: Bunny ver. (ことぶきつむぎ ばにーVer.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Strength's adorable tail and giant arms all recreated in Nendoroid size!
description: From the Black Rock Shooter anime comes a Nendoroid of the character that watched over Black Rock Shooters battle from the background - Strength. She comes complete with her two giant arms that are called 'Ogre Arms', which are fully posable to help you create all kinds of fun situations.

Plus it wouldn't be a BRS Nendoroid if she didn't come with an expression based off CHANxCO's illustrations! You can pose all the CHANxCO Black Rock Shooter Nendoroids together to create a completely different atmosphere to the normal expressions!
name: Nendoroid Strength (ねんどろいど すとれんぐす)

subtitle: The powerful flame manipulator with a gentle side to her.
description: From the action anime packed with sexy girls, "Queen's Blade" comes a Nendoroid of Nyx - the wandering mage who has control over flames.

Nyx comes complete with 'Funikura', the staff that gave her unlimited magical power and allowed her to enter the Queen's Blade tournament to prove herself to all the humans who had previously looked down on her - the Nendoroid sized staff is carefully detailed to match up to the original design. Her flashy outfit and hairstyle have also both been carefully shrunk down into adorable Nendoroid form for you to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Nyx (ねんどろいど にくす)
copyright: © 2010 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイド EX パートナーズ

subtitle: HTB's mascot's Nendoroid rendition is coming back again!
description: The popular mascot was originally released in August 2009, but due to popular demand he is retuning to stores once again!

Soon after being created as the Hokkaido TV (HTB) macsot in 1997, the adorable on-chan started to regularly appear on the popular variety show 'Suiyou dou deshou?' as a dressed up character - and now that on-chan is on his way to becoming a Nendoroid!

The hands and feet make use of movable joints allowing for more dynamic poses to be taken, and various additional parts are also included allowing for even more ways to enjoy the cute mascot. If you are an on-chan fan, this is one figure you can't be without!
name: Nendoroid on-chan (きぐるみonちゃん ねんどろいど)

subtitle: Muneakira's first Master Samurai - in her cutest form ever!
description: From the anime created as part of Hobby Japan's 40th anniversary, 'Samurai Girls', comes a Nendoroid of the main heroine from the show, Jubei Yagyu. Her poses and expressions are based on the opening theme of the show

A total of three expressions are included with the figure - her standard face, an awakened face and finally the expression she gave whenever she saw money. The rope on her back and even the swords strapped to her feet are also included - all in adorable Nendoroid size.
Other characters from the series are also planned for release, so keep a look out for them too!
name: Nendoroid Jubei Yagyu (Opening Version) (ねんどろいど やぎゅうじゅうべぇ OP Ver.（おーぷにんぐばーじょん）)
copyright: © すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱パートナーズ

subtitle: The one-wheeled bike from GANTZ is joining the ex:ride series!
description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures. This bike is from the popular manga series that was recently made into a live-action movie, 'GANTZ', and is a futuristic one-wheeled bike that anｙ figma should want to ride!

All of the smallest mechanical details have been carefully reconstructed as a vehicle for your figmas, and the tires are even made from rubber for a realistic ride. There is also a passenger seat located on the back of the model, allowing you to have two figmas ride at once!
name: ex:ride Spride.03: GANTZ Bike (えくすらいど えすぴーらいど.03 がんつばいく)

subtitle: Make a contract with me to make your own model itasha!
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a set of character decals to join the Character Customize Series!

The sheet is filled with all the five girls, Kyubey, some of the witches, as well as various other symbols and signs from the series that help to bring out the Puella Magi Madoka Magica atmosphere - just by sticking a couple of decals onto your favorite model, you to easily create a Madoka Magica themed itasha!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 025: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる025／まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか)

subtitle: Stick her onto things! Hang her off things! Let her ride on your head! A new Octo-Luka to join the invasion!
description: A brand new version of Octo-Luka is joining the others - this time she has a calm expression on her face to sooth your nerves on a busy day. The design has once again has a lot of help from both 'Sangatsuyouka', the original illustrator of Octo-Luka as well as 'idutsu', the mastermind behind the popular "Hagire no Renkinjutsushi"video on NicoNico Douga.

This Octo-Luka has all the same features that you'd expect from the previous plushies - including the magnets in her tentacles that let her stick on all kinds of metal surfaces including your fridge, and even the removable strap on her head which you can use to change her into a giant cellphone or bag accessory. You can even grab the Nendoroid Plus Plushie #09: Luka Megurine and place this plushie right on top of her head.
Have a load of fun with the adorable Luka, or simply release some stress just by having her calm expression by your side.
name: Octo-Luka Plushie (Shoulder Size) 04: Calm Ver. (たこるかぬいぐるみ（かたのりさいず）④おすましがおVer.)

subtitle: Stick her onto things! Hang her off things! Let her ride on your head! The options are endless!
description: The wait is over! Octo-Luka is going on resale! Her plushie design was supervised by both 'Sanpachi', the original illustrator of Octo-Luka as well as 'idutsu', the creator of the popular "Hagire no Renkinjutsushi" clay productions on Nico Nico Douga!. With their help we're bringing you the finest Octo-Luka plushie possible! ♪

She comes in three different varieties, each featuring a different face - you can choose from a smiling face, a drooling face and a 'kyaa!' face! They all come with a removable strap underneath them allowing you to hang them from places, or even connect them together and make a string of Octo-Lukas. She also comes with magnets placed in all of her legs meaning you can even stick her onto any metal surfaces! Your fridge can become Octo-Luka's new home!
She is also the perfect size to place on the the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 09: Luka Megurine, which only adds to the countless fun ways you can display her!
name: Octo-Luka Plushie (Shoulder Size) (Smiling Ver./Kyaa! Face Ver./Drooling Ver.) (たこるかぬいぐるみ（かたのりさいず）（①ほほえみがお ver.／②きゃーがお ver.／③よだれがお ver.）)

subtitle: The strangely mature middle-school student.
description: From the 'Black Rock Shooter' anime comes a figma id Mato Kuroi's best friend, Takanashi Yomi!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with two extra expressions - the smiling face she always had while talking to Mato, and an amazed face.
She comes with her bag for school, indoor slippers, her cell phone and a volley ball. A nice set of extra parts to play with
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yomi Takanashi: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま たかなしよみ)

subtitle: My name is Roger Smith. I perform a much needed job here in this city of amnesia.
description: From the anime 'The Big O' comes a figma of the main character, Roger Smith!

He comes with a three expressions - a standard face, a face wearing sunglasses and a shouting face. Also included is an openable briefcase and an extra arm part to recreate the scenes where Roger calls the Big O - "Big O, Showtime!!"
name: figma Roger Smith (ふぃぐま ろじゃー・すみす)

subtitle: The lovable goth-loli is joining the figma world!
description: From the anime 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai" comes a figma of the middle-school student who always wears goth-loli style clothes - Kuroneko!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Kuroneko comes with three expressions - her standard expressionless gaze, an embarrassed face and even a face full of contempt - perfect for Kuroneko to scorn the things she doesn't approve of.
She comes a couple of extra parts, including her shoulder bag and her doujinshi with it's original sketches.
She also comes with a teacup, saucer and an antique chair, along with a 'Shift:body', which lets her sit on the chair.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kuroneko (ふぃぐま くろねこ)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ/アスキー・メディアワークス/OIP

subtitle: The freshly designed team mascot as 1/10th scale model stickers!
description: A brand new design of Racing Miku, illustrated by Yuichi Murakami is joining the Character Customize Series Sticker Sets - you can use them to make any of your own 1/10th scale model cars or remote controlled cars look just like the official Miku GT car, or create your own custom design!
The stickers are made with special materials that stick easily and neatly around even curved surfaces, will stick firmly and will not lose color over time.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Sticker Set 010: Racing Miku 2011 ver. - 1/10th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと010／れーしんぐみく 2011 ver.)

subtitle: The red shadow that penetrates the darkness
description: From the anime 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the mysterious character seen fighting with Black Rock Shooter at the very start of the movie - Black Gold Saw.

She holds her giant serrated sword, 'King Saw', as she charges forward toward Black Rock Shooter in a dynamic pose based on a scene from the movie. The stand included with the figure features a broken up checkered floor with chains suspended in the air, which recreates the Black Rock Shooter universe so that the figure can feel at home - no matter where you choose to display it.
name: Black Gold Saw - animation version- (ぶらっくごーるどそー あにめーしょんばーじょん)

subtitle: Stay strong with the power of Miku's smile!
description: This is a charity product. For each purchase made, a ¥1000 donation will be made to the Japan Red Cross in order to support relief efforts in Eastern Japan.

The famous Miku Nendoroid is joining the efforts to restore Eastern Japan, and she is bringing with her a brand new smile, a support flag and pompons so she can really cheer on the people who need it most.
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful Ver. (2011 Edition) (ねんどろいど はつねみく おうえんver.)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: "We're friends now."
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE' 1st comes new plushies of both Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa - this time they're wearing casual clothes! They both have huge smiles and are ready to be cuddled!
Their legs and twin-tail hair are both fitted with joints allowing you to enjoy a number of different poses as well! ♪♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 22: Fate Testarossa - Casual Skirt Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず22 ふぇいと・てすたろっさ しふく すかーとver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The carefree younger twin sister is back! The Lucky Star Gym Uniform series is going on resale!
description: The popular Gym Uniform series of Lucky Star characters from FREEing are coming back due to popular demand! Konata, Kagami, Tsukasa and Miyuki are all coming back again in their impressive 1/4th scale renditions, complete with real cotton clothes!
This is your last chance to grab them!
name: Tsukasa Hiiragi Gym Uniform ver. (ひいらぎつかさ たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The priestess of Hakurei Shine who strives to preserve Gensoukyou.
description: From the popular doujin game series 'Touhou Project' created by the doujin circle 'Team Shanghai Alice' comes a Nendoroid of the shine maiden from Hakurei shrine - Reimu Hakurei!

Wearing her red shine maiden outfit with her large red trademark ribbon in her hair, she also comes complete with the prayer rod and charm cards that were seen in the games. Also included is a tea cup and a content face to allow you to recreate her easygoing personality as she sips her tea. The stand has a yin and yang mark placed on it so it too is a part of Gensokyo.
name: Nendoroid Reimu Hakurei (ねんどろいどはくれいれいむ)

subtitle: The witch who lives in the Forest of Magic.
description: From the 'Touhou Project' series by the doujin circle 'Team Shanghai Alice', comes a Nendoroid of Reimu's friend - the witch, Marisa Kirisame!
All of her prominent features, from her black pointed witch's hat and contrasting white apron, to the broom she holds in her hands, have all been converted into her adorable Nendoroid form!

An additional smiling expression is included in addition to her normal face, and she also comes with the 'Eight Trigrams Furnace' so you can even recreate her preforming her signature attack, 'Master Spark'!
name: Nendoroid Marisa Kirisame (ねんどろいど きりさめまりさ)

subtitle: There is no way my sister would be made into a Nendoroid!
description: From the popular series which has recently started airing as an anime, "Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai" comes a Nendoroid of Kirino Kousaka, the middle school student and little sister!

Using the various included parts you can even replicate the pose on the front of the first novel! She even comes with a DVD case from "Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru" and a paper-bag from a doujinshi event. Recreate the world of "Oreimo" in adorable Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Kirino Kousaka (ねんどろいど こうさかきりの)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP

subtitle: The elegant and beautiful vice-president of the student council.
description: From the popular romance adventure game that was recently adapted into an anime, 'Fortune Arterial' comes a Nendoroid of the flawless vice-president of the student council - Erika Sendou.

She comes with an adorable smiling face, a winking face as well as a more serious red-eyed vampire face. She also comes with a chair to sit on as well as a teacup with a saucer... perfect for the elegant Erika. She also comes with extra hand parts, which include a set of hands that allow you to recreate the famous scene where Erika has her hand outstretched in front of her.
name: Nendoroid Erika Sendou (ねんどろいど せんどうえりか)

subtitle: Totori is traveling to the world of the Nendoroids in search of her mother!
description: From the popular role-playing game "Atelier Totori: Alchemist of Arland 2" comes a Nendoroid of Totoria Helmont, also known simply as Totori - the young alchemist who is traveling the world in search of her missing mother.

Totori is accompanied by Chimu - the homunculus that Rorona made for her. She also comes with her staff and a number of alchemists tools such as test tubes and flasks, allowing you to recreate a load of scenes from the game!
name: Nendoroid Totori (ねんどろいど ととり)

subtitle: The younger of the Anarchy sisters, dedicated to eating her favorite sweets!
description: From GAINAX's popular anime series 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' comes a Nendoroid of Stocking - the younger of the Anarchy sisters who have been sent down to Daten City to destroy ghosts.

Stocking comes with a load of extra parts including the cat plushie she always carries around named 'Honekoneko', a Swiss roll and fork to carry around to ease her desire for sweets and of course her two katanas formed from her Stockings - 'Stripe I & II'. Be sure to display her with her older sister Panty who will be going on sale at the same time, and let the two of them beat back the ghosts!
name: Nendoroid Stocking (ねんどろいど すとっきんぐ)

subtitle: The mysterious girl who kept order in the school of the afterlife
description: From the anime Angle Beats! comes a 1/8th scale PVC figure of the angelic student council president, Tenshi.

She is posed with her hands clasped together in front of her and a peaceful smile brimming over her face, which creates a very warm and relaxed atmosphere about her. The angel wings from episode 11 'Change the World' are also included as optional parts which can be attached to her back - you can recreate the beautiful scene where she descended from the sky.
Tenshi is a true angel!
name: Tenshi (てんし)

subtitle: Dedicate your youth to manga!
description: From 'Bakuman', the manga written by Tsugumi Ohba of DEATH NOTE fame, and drawn by Takeshi Obata comes a selection of the characters as trading figures.

The set includes both the main characters Moritaka Mashiro and Akito Takagi, as well as various other characters including two of the characters from "Super Hero Legend" and "CROW", the manga series within the manga.
name: Bakuman Trading Figures (ばくまん。とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健・集英社／NHK・NEP・ShoPro

subtitle: The kind-hearted sniper!
description: With a movie on the way the Strike Witches revolution is far from over, and it's also time for a new Nendoroid to join the 501st Joint Fighter Wing Nendoroid division... this time it's the quiet and gentle witch - Lynette Bishop!

Her trademark braided hair and ribbon, as well as her striped stocks have all been faithfully recreated in Nendoroid form. She also of course comes with her sniper rifle and hands to hold it, her striker unit as well as her cat ears and tail for flying. A separate stand with an elongated arm is also included so you can display her in a flying pose.
Be sure to display her with Yoshika so the two friends can soar the skies together!
name: Nendoroid Lynette Bishop (ねんどろいど りねっと・びしょっぷ)

subtitle: The older of the Anarchy sisters, dedicated to finding guys!
description: From GAINAX's popular anime series 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' comes a Nendoroid of Panty - the older of the Anarchy sisters who have been sent down to Daten City to destroy ghosts.

Panty comes with a variety of extra parts including extra expressions, the guns that her panties transform into 'Backlace' and even her pet(?) Chuck is included for her to stomp on. Be sure to display her with her younger sister Stocking who will be going on sale at the same time - the contrast between the two looks great!
name: Nendoroid Panty (ねんどろいど ぱんてぃ)

subtitle: Get the whole club together!
description: From the popular anime K-ON!! comes another selection of character plushies including the drummer Ritsu Tainaka, the keyboardist Tsumugi Kotobuki and the rhythm guitarist Azusa Nakano are all here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series!

As always the arms and legs are both fitted with joints letting you pose them however you like! Plus you can display these three with the already released Yui and Mio to get the whole of HTT together for a performance!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 41: Azusa Nakano - Winter Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ41 なかのあずさ ふゆふくver.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The kind-hearted Valkyrian.
description: From the popular PSP game 'Valkyria Chronicles 3' comes a Nendoroid of Riela Marceris, the young girl who is sent into the 'Nameless' squad because she is known as the 'Grimreaper' - everyone believes that she brings misfortune and death to anyone who fights alongside her.

She comes with weapons such as her memento knife as well as her Valkyrian spear and shield. She also comes with the Nendoroid original weapon which looks something like a crowbar. This weapon can be unlocked within the game by using the special product code found with the Nendoroid!
name: Nendoroid Riela (ねんどろいど りえら)

subtitle: HTT's Guitarist and Bassist!
description: From the popular anime series "K-ON!!" come two new plushies to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series! This time we have both the clumsy guitarist Yui Hirasawa and the top-student lefty bassist Mio Akiyama both dressed in their winter uniforms!
As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing you to recreate your favorite scenes from the stage! ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 27: Mio Akiyama - Winter Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ27 あきやまみお ふゆふくVer.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: HTT's Guitarist and Bassist!
description: From the popular anime series "K-ON!!" come two new plushies to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series! This time we have both the clumsy guitarist Yui Hirasawa and the top-student lefty bassist Mio Akiyama both dressed in their winter uniforms!
As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing you to recreate your favorite scenes from the stage! ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 26: Yui Hirasawa - Winter Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず26 ひらさわゆい ふゆふくVer.)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: "We're friends now."
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE' 1st comes new plushies of both Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa - this time they're wearing casual clothes! They both have huge smiles and are ready to be cuddled!
Their legs and twin-tail hair are both fitted with joints allowing you to enjoy a number of different poses as well! ♪♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 21: Nanoha Takamachi - Casual Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ21 たかまちなのは しふくver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The adorable Miyuki is back! The Lucky Star Gym Uniform series is going on resale!

You can use them to give your car or motorbike a quick and easy new look, or use it anywhere else to give some Racing Miku charm to anything you like - plus show your support for the team at the same time!
The stickers are made from high quality materials that will stick easily and not lose color quickly.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Big Sticker Set 005: Racing Miku 2011 (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっぐさいずすてっかー005／れーしんぐみく 2011ver.)

description: From the mecha anime 'The Big O' comes a figma of the android who serves Roger, R. Dorothy Wayneright.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with two expressionless faces perfect for her personality, the direction of her eyes differs in the two faces.
The black cat 'Pero' from Act 08: 'Missing Cat' is also included, as well as a posable mop.
She includes replaceable parts to pull out the band in her hair to reveal the memory drive inside.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Mirai comes with both a smiling face and a crying face. She also comes with a handkerchief to wipe the tears from her crying face.
She also comes with both a camera and her laptop, so she can take photos wherever she goes!
Danny Choo - Mirai's creator, is always playing with a Mirai doll, so a figma-sized Mirai doll is also included for figma Mirai to play with!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.

subtitle: Cydonia - named after the area on Mars.
description: As part of the WWR (World War Robot) artistic model series designed by artist Ashley Wood comes this model of the Heavy Bramble robot in a ' Cydonia Western Defense" version! threeA's immaculate sculpting of the models with unique paint work which gives a very convincing weathered look really makes the model stand out. But the Heavy Bramble also comes with an impressive 54cm long RPG launcher which you can equip for an even more stunning appearance!

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.
World War Robot WWR is a series illustrated by Ashley Wood, and written by Ashley Wood and TP Louise, which tells the story of a fictitious war that took place between 1980 and 1990.
name: WWR Heavy Bramble - Cydonia Western Defense (WWR へびーらんぶる さいどにあ うぇすたん でぃふぇんす)
copyright: © ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2011. All right reserved

description: As part of the WWR (World War Robot) artistic model series designed by artist Ashley Wood comes this model of the Heavy Bramble robot in an 'African Defense Freiheit" version! threeA's immaculate sculpting of the models with unique paint work which gives a very convincing weathered look really makes the model stand out. Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. World War Robot WWR is a series illustrated by Ashley Wood, and written by Ashley Wood and TP Louise, which tells the story of a fictitious war that took place between 1980 and 1990.

subtitle: A stampede of animals are joining the ex:ride series!
description: Vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of figures are on their way brought to you by FREEing. The tenth set in the series is a very different set of cars - animal cars like the ones found at amusement parks! From the standard "Panda" car, to the more unique "Tiger" and "Bear" cars - they are all going to be available, and they are even fitted with devices that make the legs move backwards and forwards as the car moves!
It's the most unique set of ex:ride vehicles yet, and your favourite figma is bound to want to embrace their inner child and take a ride in one!
name: ex:ride ride.010: Animal Cars (えくすらいど らいど010 あにまる（べあー／ぱんだ／たいがー）)

subtitle: The magazine 'Monthly Anime Style' is coming back... this time coupled with Nendoroid Petites!
description: Anime Style was a popular magazine featuring articles that delved deep into the work of anime studios and creators - and now it's coming back as "Monthly Anime Style", which will be a monthly publication and will feature a Nendoroid Petite relating to the special feature in each issue!

The first issue features special coverage on the anime 'Toradora!" - including never revealed secrets about the show and never before seen discussions with the main staff, as well as a number of original images. The Nendoroid Petite for this issue is the adorable Taiga Aisaka wearing the cute uniform that she wore in the very last episode of the series. The second special feature in this issue is 'Heart Capture Pretty Cure!' and will include articles exploring the work of the character designer of the series - Yoshihiko Umakoshi. This issue will also feature Mamoru Hosoda, Tatsuya Oishi, Ichirou Ookouchi, Ayumu Watanabe and even a brand new manga by the director of Gurren Lagaan - Hiroyuki Imaishi.
name: Monthly Anime Style - Issue 1 (げっかんあにめすたいる だいいちごう)
copyright: © 竹宮ゆゆこ／アスキー・メディアワークス／「とらドラ！」製作委員会

subtitle: The gentle, carefree waitress.
description: From the popular anime with a movie on the way, 'K-ON!' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the the Sakura High Music Club's keyboardist, Tsumugi Kotobuki!

She's wearing a cute waitress' uniform made by Sawako-sensei, and she's really showing off just how good of a waitress she is - she is carrying some tea, desserts, a steak meal, a salad and an omelette all at the same time! She also has a brilliant smile brimming across her face, perfect for the carefree, fun-loving Mugi-chan!
name: Tsumugi Kotobuki (ことぶきつむぎ)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Fate Testarossa is joining the actsta collection!
description: From the anime movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes an actsta figure of Fate Testarossa, ready to get together with the Nanoha actsta and recreate the thrilling fight scenes from the movie.

Fate comes with a total of three exchangeable expressions: A standard face, a serious face, and a face with closed eyes. She also comes with three different forms of her intelligent device, Bardiche, and just like Nanoha she also comes with effect parts to recreate her "Round Shield", leaving you with countless ways to recreate your favorite scenes from the movie - even the most dynamic action scenes you can think of!
name: actsta: Fate Testarossa (あくすた ふぇいと・てすたろっさ)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: A single set filled with cute girls all from different games!
description: The B.G.M Festival Vol.0 is an music event that will be held on the 16th April 2011, which will feature music from a variety of different games. This set of five Nendoroid Petites are all from characters from the various games that the event will be based on.

The set includes Uesugi Kenshin from Alicesoft's 'Sengoku Rance', Asuka Watarai from NAVEL's 'Oretachi ni Tsubasa wa Nai', Miyako Miyamura from minori's 'ef -a fairy tale of the two', Otome Asakura from Circus' 'D.C.II ~Da Capo II~ ' and finally Kirari Shiino from Overdrive's 'Kira Kira'.
It's a once in a lifetime joint performance - don't miss out!
name: Nendoroid Petite: B.G.M Festival Set – vol.0 (ねんどろいど ぷち B.G.M ふぇすえぃばるせっと vol.0)
copyright: © B.G.M Festival © ALICESOFT © Omegavision, Inc. © minori © 2005 CIRCUS © OVERDRIVE 2007

subtitle: The school's top student who is responsible for the stories of the duo's manga!
description: From the anime about two students attempting to become professional manga artists, "Bakuman" comes a Nendoroid of Akito Takagi, or "Shuujin" as he is better known - the school's top student who came up with the idea to write the stories for Mashiro's manga so they can become professional manga artists.

His trademark earphones and glasses have both been shrunk down to Nendoroid size, plus he comes with three expressions to enjoy, a portfolio case. his idea notes, manga manuscripts and even his cellphone - a ton of extras to recreate the scenes from the anime.
Be sure to display him with Nendoroid Moritaka Mashiro who will be going on sale simultaneously, so the two can get together and work on their manga!
name: Nendoroid Akito Takagi (ねんどろいど たかぎあきと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健・集英社／NHK・NEP・ShoPro

subtitle: Gender: Hideyoshi?!
description: From the campus comedy anime series which has it's second season fast approaching, "Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu" comes a Nendoroid of the male student from class 2-F, Hideyoshi Kinoshita! Just like in the show, you can't really tell his gender just by looking at the figure!

His summon is also included along with a shouting expression and extra hand parts that allow him to put out his hand as if he was summoning it. He also comes with replaceable legs which let him sit on his knees, along with a cushion for him to sit on, and one of the mandarin boxes that the class used for desks - a whole bunch of extras for you to recreate Hideyoshi's life within Class F!
name: Nendoroid Hideyoshi Kinoshita (ねんどろいど きのしたひでよし)
copyright: © 2010 Kenji Inoue／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN, INC.／バカとテストと召喚獣製作委員会

subtitle: The cursed half-demon.
description: From the action anime packed with sexy girls, "Queen's Blade" comes a Nendoroid of the victor of the past two Queen's Blade tournaments and reigning queen - Aldora. She is wearing the sexy outfit she wore in battle and has her left hand bound behind her back - bound by herself as she is afraid of her own power.

You can recreate scenes where she uses both her "Petrifying Gaze" and "Secret Blades" attacks, and she also comes with extra parts which allow her to kneel down. Pick the pose you prefer and display her for all to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Aldora (ねんどろいど あるどら)
copyright: © 2009 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイドパートナーズ

subtitle: The conceited, egotistical vampire.
description: From the 2D fighting game "BlazBlue" comes a 1/6th scale PVC figure of the head of the noble Alucard family, Rachel Alucard.

She has been sculpted preforming her Drive attack, 'Silpheed', which causes her trademark twin-tail hair and frilly goth-loli dress to blow upwards in the wind. Her black cat umbrella "Nago" as well as her red bat "Gii" are also both included!
name: Rachel Alucard (れいちぇる・あるかーど)

subtitle: The naive and eccentric maid!
description: From the slapstick comedy series set in a maid cafe, "Soredemo Machi wa Mawatteiru" comes a figma of one of the maids that works at the 'Seaside' Maid cafe - Hotori Arashiyama.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Even her skirt is fitted with joints allowing the bold action poses Hotori is known for.
She comes with three expressions: A standard face, a smiling face and a black face with some decal stickers for you to create the face you want.
Various extras are included for her to do her work in the maid cafe - a tray, a coffee cup, a broom and even the magnifying glass made from a ballpoint pen.
Extra head parts for Uki Isohata, the head of the maid cafe are also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hotori Arashiyama (ふぃぐま あらしやまほとり)
copyright: © 石黒正数・少年画報社／それ町製作委員会

subtitle: The student with a passion for manga, who is responsible for the drawing in the duo's manga!
description: From the anime about two students attempting to become professional manga artists, "Bakuman" comes a Nendoroid of Moritaka Mashiro, or "Saikou" as he is better known - the student with a huge passion for manga.

Mashiro comes with a total of three expressions, and even comes with his desk for drawing manga, a pen and manga manuscripts! You can use all the included extras to recreate scenes from both his time at school and when he is hard at work on his manga.
Nendoroid Akito Takagi will be going on sale at the same time as Mashiro, so be sure to display them together and recreate some of the scenes between the two!
name: Nendoroid Moritaka Mashiro (ねんどろいど ましろもりたか)

There are also plans to make plushies of other Bakemonogatari characters, so watch out for them as well!
name: Bakemonogatari Plushie Series 02: Koyomi Araragi (ばけものがたりぬいぐるみしりーず②あららぎこよみ)

subtitle: Dead Master is joining the world of plushies!!
description: Following on from the popular Black Rock Shooter plushie last year comes a plushie of Black Rock Shooter's rival - Dead Master! As with all the other plushies, she is fitted with joints that allow you to pose her in dynamic poses, or sit her down peacefully - pick whichever think suits her best!

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger... Kamen Rider Camo is here, aiming to be the best of the best!
description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of Kamen Rider Camo, the hand-to-hand fighter who will do anything to win.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability, making it easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
Kamen Rider Camo comes with his yo-yo weapon - you can recreate a load of close up battle scenes best suited for his fighting style.
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Camo (ふぃぐま かめんらいだーきゃも)
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

subtitle: The First Child, Rei Ayanami: finally joining the world of figmas.
description: From "Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance" comes a figma of the silent heroine, Rei Ayanami.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The neck has an all new figma joint that features a double joint, meaning you can create more unique poses than ever before!
The main body of the figma is made with a combination of hard and soft plastics, leaving the feeling of the plugsuit just as it should be.
The interior of the Entry Plug is also included to recreate your favorite scenes from the cockpit. Various parts in the cockpit such as the seat and control lever are also movable.
Three expressions are included: an expressionless face perfectly suited to Rei, a glaring face for combat scenes and the smiling face that she only showed to the openhearted.
The S-DAT player that played an important role in the film is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rei Ayanami: Plugsuit ver. (ふぃぐま あやなみれい ぷらぐすーつばーじょん)

subtitle: Racing Miku is getting a 1/8th scale figure rendition!
description: The official mascot of the 2010 SUPER GT racing team "GOOD SMILE RACING with COX", which was originally illustrated by redjuice, is now getting her very own figure rendition - it's Hatsune Miku's racing counterpart, Racing Miku!

Her cheerful expression, her mechanic's costume and even the tools she uses have all been sculpted with great attention to the smallest of details, meaning you get a figure that looks just like the original illustration... plus you get to see the back of Racing Miku, which never featured in the illustration!
name: Racing Miku 2010 (れーしんぐみく 2010 ver.)

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger... As graceful as a swan, Kamen Rider Siren has arrived!

A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.

description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of Kamen Rider Wrath, the Kamen Rider created when General Xaviax drew the life out of Vic Frasier's body.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
Kamen Rider Wrath comes with his staff called the Gold Visor which can also transform into a shield, as well as his dual swords. Enough weapons for him to prove he is the most powerful Kamen Rider!
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Wrath (figma かめんらいだーらす)
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of the Kamen Rider that the money-loving Danny transforms into - Kamen Rider Axe.

subtitle: Off to collect the legendary twelve blades!
description: From the second project of the Nisio Isin Anime Project, "Katanagatari", comes a set of Nendoroid Petites featuring three of the main characters from the series - Shichika Yasuri, Togame and Nanami Yasuri.

The set also comes with a couple of extra parts to recreate the characters in different poses - Shichika comes with parts to display him in his Kyoutouryuu pose, Togame has some for her "Cheerio!" pose and Nanami has her "Ninpou: Tsume Awase" claws. Togame also comes with the bobbed hair has in episode seven.
Enjoy the Nendoroized version of the world of Katanagatari!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Katanagatari Set (ねんどろいど ぷち かたながたりせっと)
copyright: © 西尾維新・講談社／「刀語」製作委員会

subtitle: 1/24th scale decals from the Steins;Gate game, which was recently adapted into an anime!
description: From the popular adventure game 'Steins;Gate' comes a collection of 1/24th scale decals featuring images of the heroine Kurisu Makise and various other characters from the game. Create your very own model itasha with your favorite characters from the game!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 024: Steins;Gate - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる024／しゅたいんず・げーと)

subtitle: The beach sprite who brings forth a calming sea breeze.
description: The three company collaboration series between Max Factory, Hobby Japan and Sega continues to bring you the Shining Wind characters dressed in their swimsuits as beautiful PVC figures. The fourth figure in the series is one of Baelgard's four guardians - Xecty!

Based once again on a popular illustration by Tony, every detail down to the smallest curves has been carefully added to the figure, keeping the feeling of the beautiful illustration. It's a strange sight to see Xecty far away from battle and instead as a normal girl by the seaside, but it's also a wonderful sight to see her pure feminine beauty displayed in this figure!
name: Xecty Swimsuit ver. (ぜくてぃ みずぎばーじょん)

subtitle: The black-haired smart girl.
description: From the anime 'The Tatami Galaxy' which originally aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block in April 2010 comes a bust of the aloof Akashi-san. The posing is based on the art used for the front jacket of the first DVD volume, however poses her with the binoculars down instead, so that her beautiful face and eyes are part of the figure as well.

The greatest care was taken in posing her to preserve the 'cool' air that she carries around with her - even the positioning of the 'mochigumas' on her shoulder has had the greatest care put into them. It's a bust that really brings out Akashi-san's personality for all to enjoy!
name: Akashi-san (あかしさん)

subtitle: Tama-nee is here in an incredible 1/4th scale! Wearing her swimsuit!
description: From the popular dating game "ToHeart2" comes a huge 1/4th scale rendition of the main character's childhood friend, Tamaki Kousaka wearing her stunning swimsuit to boot. The volume of her impressive bust she supports with her arm is a treat for any fan to enjoy!
name: Tamaki Kousaka: Swimsuit ver. (こうさかたまき みずぎver.)

subtitle: The mysterious red-eyed  girl is also joining the Nendoroids!
description: From the anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a Nendoroid of the mysterious girl who battled with Black Rock Shooter at the start of the movie, "Black Gold Saw". Even her trademark sword "King Saw" has been shrunk down to Nendoroid size!

A variety of extra parts are included for even more posing possibilities, such as extra leg parts, expressions and a multitude of hand parts. A CHANxCO expression is also included to follow the BRS Nendoroid tradition!
Be sure to display her together with Black Rock Shooter and Dead Master!
name: Nendoroid Black Gold Saw (ねんどろいど ぶらっくごーるどそー)

subtitle: The anti-Gnosis android weapon joins the figma world!
description: From "Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra" comes a figma of the newly designed KOS-MOS ver.4.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Two expressions are included: The standard expressionless face that KOS-MOS kept for most of the game, as well as the smiling face that she showed after her awakening at the end of the game.
Using replaceable parts on her fringe, you can recreate her Fatima Gras Mode.
Two huge Gatling guns are included with stands to support them, as well as a hand gun.
She also comes with her hand-sword and dragon-tooth - a stunning number of weapons!
As if that wasn't enough. her chest also has a replaceable part which allows you to recreate her powerful X-BUSTER attack.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma KOS-MOS ver.4 (ふぃぐま こすもす ver.4)
series: Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra

subtitle: The girl who vowed to fight against her fate.
description: From the anime Angel Beats! comes a 1/8th scale figure of Yuri, the leader of the SSS - the group formed to fight back against God.

The pose is based on a key visual from the series which featured Yuri posed with a confident smile beaming across her face with her gun pointed down towards the ground. Her hair, scarf and dress are all being blown up in the wind creating a very dynamic feeling to the posing, plus the greatest care has been put into every part of the figure, including even the smallest details on the gun.
Tenshi is also on her way to join Yuri, so look forward to her upcoming announcement!
name: Yuri (ゆり)

subtitle: The cunning smile that dances through the darkness
description: From the freely distributed anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a 1/8th scale PVC figure of Black Rock Shooter's rival, Dead Master.

Her pose has her jumping through the air effortlessly, even while wielding her huge scythe, "Dead Scythe". The stand she also includes the two skulls she controls in the anime, which really brings the figure together and pulls out Dead Master's dark charm.
name: Dead Master -animation version- (でっどますたー -animation version-)

subtitle: "Because I'm a member of the SOS Brigade!"
description: From the Haruhi movie "The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya" comes a Nendoroid of the perfectly normal human, Kyon!

He comes with two different expressions - his standard smiling face, as well as a resigned face. He also comes with various extras from the movie, such as a gun, bookmark and his scarf - you can create a variety of different scenes using these!
You can also display him with Nendoroid Yuki Nagato: Disappearance Ver. and Nendoroid Haruhi Suzumiya: Disappearance Ver. and recreate even more from the alternate world in the movie!
name: Nendoroid Kyon: Disappearance Ver. (ねんどろいど きょん しょうしつばーじょん)

subtitle: The jet-black armored Saber is back again!
description: Movic is bringing the popular Saber Alter figure first released in 2008 back on sale. It's a figure of one of Toda Satoshi's popular garage kits, but with a larger scale and more detail than the original kit. The figure comes with two different heads to choose from - one wearing a mask and one without, you can pick whichever you prefer!
You can also place her together with the new 'Sakura Matou ~Makiri's Grail~' figure from Gift, as the stands interconnect with each other!
name: Saber Alter (せいばーおるた)

subtitle: "I order you in the Queen, and my name!"
description: From the anime Kuroshitsuji comes a plushie of the had of the Phantomhive Household, Earl Ciel Phantomhive, here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series! Even Ceil's completely unconcerned expression has been faithfully recreated in plushie form!
Be sure to display him along with his faithful butler, Sebastian ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 28: Ciel Phantomhive (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ28 しえる・ふぁんとむはいう゛)
copyright: © 枢やな／スクウェアエニックス・女王の番犬・MBS

subtitle: Let Nanoha and Fate's magic protect your precious iPhone4!
description: From "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes three different varieties of iPhone4 cases - the Nanoha&Fate Ver. , the Nanoha Magical Circle Ver. and the Fate Magical Circle Ver.
Pick your favorite case and keep your iPhone4 safe while making it look great at the same time!
name: Lyrical Nanoha iPhone4 Cases (Nanoha&Fate Ver. / Nanoha Magical Circle Ver. / Fate Magical Circle Ver.) (りりかるなのは iPhone4ケース シリーズ （①なのは＆ふぇいと／②まほうじんなのはVer.／③まほうじんふぇいとVer.）)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st
copyright: Images are samples only. The actual product may differ slightly. ©NANOHA The MOVIE 1st PROJECT

subtitle: The beautiful siren is here in her swimsuit!
description: From the romantic comedy anime focusing around six girls each with their own unique personalities, "Amagami SS" comes a PVC figure of the girl who stole the hearts of all the guys - Haruka Morishima, wearing her school swimsuit!

From her charming smile to her perfect body - everything she used to charm the boys has all been carefully sculpted based on the popular "kiss behind the knee" scene from the anime. It's a bold, if slightly embarrassing pose that all fans of Morishima-senpai are bound to enjoy!
name: Haruka Morishima: Swimsuit ver. (もりしまはるか みずぎばーじょん)
copyright: © ENTERBRAIN, INC./アマガミSS製作委員会

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger... Kamen Rider Thrust is here!

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
The horn-like weapon he summons with his Strike Vent is included. Recreate his epic battle scenes!

subtitle: The first rubber strap set!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st comes a collection of trading rubber straps. The illustrations are all based on their respective Nendoroid renditions, and then changed into lovely rubber straps! The set contains a variety of popular characters from the series! In total there are 10 different straps to collect - including two secret straps!
Keep your favorite characters by your side all the time, and trade them to complete your collection of Nanoha straps!
name: Nendoroid Plus Trading Rubber Straps: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st - SCENE 01 (ねんどろいどぷらす とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ 【まほうしょうじょりりかるなのは The MOVIE 1st】 SCENE01)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: "For I am nothing more than a butler..."
description: From the anime Kuroshitsuji comes a plushie of the Phantomhive household's faithful butler, Sebastian Michaelis, here to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series! The courteous Sebastian is really to serve in adorable plushie form!
Be sure to display him with his master, Ciel! ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 29: Sebastian Michaelis (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ29 せばすちゃん・みかえりす)

description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of the main character 'Kit', transformed into his Dragon Knight form!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! Kamen Rider action scene posing is as simple as ever!
A selection of weapons are included and can be equipped, allowing various battle scenes to be recreated.

subtitle: The hard-hitting tsundere high-school girl.
description: From the romantic comedy series "Ookami-san to Shichinin no Nakamatachi" comes a 1/8th scale figure of the ferocious wolf, Ryouko Ookami.

She has been sculpted wearing her school uniform including the personal customizations she made - a torn scarf and slit skirt. She is posed bending forward as she glares down with her imposing eyes... the eyes that are said to be so serious that they could stop a child from crying. It really shows off Ryouko's imposing side.
Enjoy the wild charms of the beautiful Ryouko!
name: Ryouko Ookami (おおかみりょうこ)
copyright: © 2010 沖田雅／アスキー・メディアワークス／オオカミさんと製作委員会

subtitle: Also known as "Black Sakura".
description: From Fate/stay night comes this 1/8th scale PVC figure of Sakura Matou wearing the outfit that led her to become known as "Black Sakura". The figure was originally a garage kit created by the sculptor Toda Satoshi (Yume no Kagutsuchino Koukoku), but now it's available for all as a beautiful PVC figure that's both larger and more detailed than the original kit.
Her stand can also be connected to Saber Alter's stand to create a dark scene for the both of them.
name: Sakura Matou ~Makiri's Grail~ (まとうさくら ～まきりのはい～)

subtitle: Attention! All recruits are to grab these 1/35th scale decals to brush up on their English!
description: From the popular series 'Pixel Maritan'. which is currently being serialized in Arms Magazine comes a set of decals featuring the characters of the series, along with a multitude of extra decals filled with the abusive English that Pixel Maritan is famous for. You could even use these decals to customize 1/35th scale military models - create your very own Pixel Maritan army!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 023: Pixel Maritan - 1/35th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる023／まほうのかいへいたいいん ぴくせる☆まりたん)
copyright: © ヒライユキオ／ホビージャパン

subtitle: Stylish pass cases of the famous cat!
description: Good Smile Company's accessory division, 'dicokick' is bringing you more pass cases - this time of the popular Doraemon from the new film - 'Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops: ~Angel Wings~'. There are three colors to choose from - blue, clear and pink - and each is filled with glitter for a much more exiting design - pick your favorite and make your smart cards look a lot more smart!
They are simple to use: just place any smart card inside the case and lock it inside with the included chain.
name: Doraemon Acrylic Pass Cases (Blue/Clear/Pink) (どらえもんあくりるぱすけーす（ぶるー／くりあ／ぴんく）)
series: Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops: ~Angel Wings~

subtitle: The third accessory in the Black Rock Shooter series!
description: The third charm to join the Black Rock Shooter Metal Charm Collection is the Black Gold Saw's weapon - King Saw!

Even as a small charm the saw-like design of the sword is sure to instill fear in it's opponents, and the contrast of the black and gold parts of the sword create a stunning charm to carry around with you. Enjoy the unique design of King Saw wherever you go!
name: Black Rock Shooter Metal Charm Collection 03: King Saw (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー めたるちゃーむこれくしょん03 きんぐそー)

subtitle: The popular new alloy series continues: Change!! Getter-3
description: The new alloy figure series from Art Storm, 'ES Alloy' continues! ES, or "Excellent Short" style, is a compact, deformed figure style that allows the figures to take many poses, allowing them to be displayed in various enjoyable ways!

All three of the Getter Machines, Getter-1, Getter-2 and Getter-3 are all being released simultaneously. Getter-3's arms are loaded with multiple joints and includes replaceable hand parts. The wheels can also be positioned allowing the famous 'Daisetsuzan Oroshi' move to be reborn! It's a perfect addition to the cute, yet robust alloy figure series.
Be sure to add all the three figures to your collection!
name: ES Alloy 05: Getter-3 (いーえすごうきん 05 げったーすりー)
copyright: © 永井豪・石川賢／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger... Ventara's warrior, the Wing Knight is here!
description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of Len, transformed into his Wing Knight form and ready to aid Kit in the battle against the invaders!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! Kamen Rider action scene posing is as simple as ever!
Various items that Len used in the show are included. This includes his Advent Beast and a cloth mantle.
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes a hand that is holding a card.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Wing Knight (ふぃぐま かめんらいだー ういんぐないと)
sculptor: マックスファクトリー・浅井真紀
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

subtitle: She's coming to bring you a nice warm Spring!
description: From NHK General's Newswatch 9 as well as NHK ONLINE's popular online web comic Haru-chan's Weather Trivia comes a Nendoroid of Haru-chan, the Spring Goddess herself!

Her long wavy hair and cherry blossom accessories are all shrunk down to Nendoroid size - even the kanji on her head reads 'Haru' or "Spring' is of course included on the Nendoroid. Haru-chan also comes with three expressions to play with, including her standard smiling face, an agitated face for when the Spring thunderstorms come and even a masked face for when she catches a cold or is suffering from allergies.

She also comes with a rolled-up newspaper sword, her pet white cat that is hanging onto a carp banner that Haru-chan can ride on, and even her two magical staves - "Sakura", which causes cherry blossoms to bloom, as well as "Ame yo Fure", which makes it rain!
Let the warmth of Spring take over with Nendoroid Haru-chan!
name: Nendoroid Haru-chan (ねんどろいど はるちゃん)

subtitle: The internet addicted younger of the twins.
description: From Yosuga no Sora comes this 1/4th scale figure of the main character's twin sister, Sora Kasugano!

The silent, apathetic and socially inept Sora has been sculpted in her gym uniform which brings out her beautiful, pale skin. The gym uniform is also made from real fabric, just like all the other figures in Gift's gym uniform series. The drowsy expression across her face along with the slightly suggestive posing gives the figure a very erotic feeling for you to enjoy!
name: Sora Kasugano: Gym Uniform Ver. (かすがのそら たいそうふくばーじょん)

subtitle: The wild bandit is joining the Nendoroids!
description: From the action anime packed with sexy girls, "Queen's Blade" comes a Nendoroid of the head of the bandit group, Risty! Her rough and short-tempered personality has been captured along with her wild appearance... all in cute Nendoroid form!

Her reliable flail and shield are both included to recreate your favorite battle scenes, and she also comes with an angry face as well as extra parts that allow her to be displayed sitting while resting on one leg. Enjoy the Nendorized version of the bandit out to defend the weak and defeat the strong - Risty is on her way!
name: Nendoroid Risty (ねんどろいど りすてぃ)
copyright: © 2009 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイドパートナーズ

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger...  For justice! Kamen Rider Sting is here!
description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of Kamen Rider Sting, the Kamen Rider who continues to fight even as he battles with his asthmatic complications.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
The mechanical stingray Evildiver is included in shield form, as well as Sting's whip.
A total of nine hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Sting (ふぃぐま かめんらいだー すてぃんぐ)

subtitle: The Lightning Squad's dragon summoner!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of the powerful dragon summoner and reliable member of the Lightning Squad - Caro Ru Lushe!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her glove-type boost device, Kerykeion, can change into both second and third mode using the included fin attachments.
Her pet dragon Friedrich is included and has a poseable neck and legs. He also comes with a replaceable head which is breathing fire.
A clear magical circle as well as alternative hair parts that let you display Caro as she was three years after StrikerS are also included.
New effect parts for figma Erio Mondial's weapon are also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
