subtitle: The red eyes that pierce through the darkness.
description: From the anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a figma of the mysterious ''Black Gold Saw', who was seen fighting with Black Rock Shooter at the very beginning of the movie.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Along with her standard face, she also comes with a bone-chilling smile and a serious face ready to cause some trouble.
Her weapon, "King Saw", is the same length of her entire body and is included covered in scratches and dents from past battles.
Her impressive long hair also contains figma joints, allowing you to recreate dynamic action scenes!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Black Gold Saw (ふぃぐま ぶらっくごーるどそー)

subtitle: Ika-musume is coming to invade your model cars with 1/24th scale decals ~de geso!
description: From the anime "Shinyaku! Ika-musume" comes a set of 1/24th scale decals featuring a load of adorable images of Ika-musume herself, along with tentacles, bubbles and various other little extra decals to help you change your favorite model car into an itasha!

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 020: Shinryaku! Ika-musume - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる020／しんりゃく！いかむすめ)
copyright: © 安部真弘（週刊少年チャンピオン）／海の家れもん

subtitle: A Hatsune Miku figure based on Tony's popular illustration!
description: Popular illustrator Tony's rendition of Hatsune Miku is transforming into a 1/7th scale PVC figure by Max Factory! All the details from the original illustration, from the unique transparent coloring down to the finest of details have been faithfully reproduced into the figure!

Her dynamic pose really makes the figure feel more alive than ever before, and of course even the sides not seen in the original illustration were carefully crafted to keep up the quality of the figure. Now you can gaze at the beauty of Tony's charming creation from any angle you want!
name: Hatsune Miku: Tony ver. (はつねみく Tony ばーじょん)
copyright: © 2009 Crypton Future Media,Inc ALL RIGHT RESERVED

subtitle: 1/24th scale decals of Nitroplus' famous mascot character!
description: Nitroplus' famous mascot character 'Super Sonico" is joining the Character Customize Series as a set of decals to transform a model car into a model itasha! The set of decals is full of some wonderfully risque images of the sexy Sonico, along with a number of extra logos and lines to complete your itasha.

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 019: Super Sonico - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる019／すーぱーそにこ)

subtitle: The heroine shrouded in a veil of mystery is here in 1/6th scale!
description: From "Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance" comes this 1/6th scale PVC figure of the mysterious new heroine of the series - Mari Illustrious Makinami. The pose is based off the front cover of a magazine which was illustrated by Yoshiyuki Sadamoto.

This impressively sized 1/6th scale figure is a reminder of when Mari first tried on her pink test plug-suit and just how much she loved how it felt - the confident smile across her face just shows how serious she is! A definite must-have for any fans of the new Evangelion movies!
name: Mari Illustrious Makinami (まきなみ・まり・いらすとりあす)

subtitle: The little princess of the Sanzenin household ♪
description: From "Hayate the Combat Butler", the comedy series filled with love and war(?) comes a Nendoroid of the main heroine and the daughter of the Sanzenin household, Nagi Sanzenin!

She comes with three expressions, including a smiling face, an embarrassed face and a pompous face perfect for Nagi. She also comes with various extras such as a gaming console to let her play her favorite games, as well as the important hat that was blown off head in the series. Her loving pet Tama is also included for even more fun!
You can display her however you see fit - from an energetic and happy Nagi down to an embarrassed and blushing Nagi... the possibilities are endless!
name: Nendoroid Nagi Sanzenin (ねんどろいど さんぜんいんなぎ)
sculptor: あげたゆきを（マックスファクトリー）
copyright: © 畑健二郎／小学館・白皇学院生徒会・テレビ東京

subtitle: The sincere and honest sister-in-law. ♥
description: From the romance adventure game which has now even made its way onto the PSP, "D.C. ~Da.Capo~" comes a Nendoroid of one of the main heroines, Nemu Asakura! Everything from her trademark ribbons and school uniform down to the finest details on her school bag have all been recreated in adorable Nendoroid form!

Nemu comes with three expressions for you to enjoy: A cheerful smile, an embarrassed face and an expression that is based off the mini-game called "AFTERBANANA", which has her looking rather angry! Utamaru, the mysterious cat and Da Capo mascot is also included with Nemu, for even more fun!
name: Nendoroid Nemu Asakura (ねんどろいど あさくらねむ)

subtitle: The heroine from the real world in the BRS anime. ★
description: From the anime of Black Rock Shooter comes a figma of the main heroine Mato Kuroi!

She comes with three expressions: A standard face, a smiling face and thinking face for when she's planning things. She also comes with her school bag, a basket ball and her cellphone for you to recreate a number of your favorite scenes from the movie.
Have fun with one of the most cheerful figmas yet!
name: figma Mato Kuroi: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま くろいまと せいふくばーじょん)

subtitle: Ultraman-sensei is here!
description: The popular Wonder Festival soft vinyl series is back, this time it featuring this figure of Ultraman, celebrating the 30th anniversary of Ultraman 80!
It's a great product for any fans of the classic Ultraman!
name: Tomokazu Seki - Ultraman 80 (せきともかず・うるとらまん80)

subtitle: Let's have some fun this winter! ♪
description: In commemoration of the snow sculpture of Miku at the 62nd Sapporo Winter Festival comes an all new fully posable version of Nendoroid Snow Miku! She keeps the same adorable look from before with her silver clothes and long beautiful hair made using clear plastic, but this time she also has some extras such as ear muffs, a scarf... and even an adorable Hachune Snowman to play with!

Plus create your very own mini ice sculptures using the ice tray that creates Nendoroid Petite sized 'Ice Mikus" for you to enjoy. Snow Miku will also be debuting in a module for the PSP game "Hatsune Miku -Project Diva 2nd", as well as "Hatsune Miku -Project Diva Arcade".

Be sure to stop by the 'WONDERFUL HOBBY LIFE YOU!! 13' booth at the 62nd Sapporo Winter Festival in Sapporo (from 2011/02/07 until 2011/02/13), or order online to grab your Snow Miku before she melts away!
name: Nendoroid Snow Miku: Snow Playtime Edition (ねんどろいど ゆきみく たのしいゆきあそび・えでぃしょん)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: The best of friends. ★
description: From the anime of Black Rock Shooter comes a set of two adorable Nendoroid Petites featuring the two friends from the series - Mato Kuroi and Yomi Takanashi.

Using one of the popular illustrations from the anime as a basis for the characters designs, the two are posed in an everyday scene on the way to school. It's a great set of figures for any fans of the two girls!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Mato & Yomi Set (ねんどろいど ぷち まと＆よみ せっと)

subtitle: Japan is joining World War Robot!
description: The world renown artist Ashley Wood's company 'ThreeA Toys' is releasing these two figures of the 'JAPAN DEFENSE LEAGUE' as a special Japan-only release. The set features Japanese versions of both the Dropcloth and Square robots - both meticulously designed with stunning paint work that creates a unique weathered look.
ThreeA's magnificent figures will drag anyone into the world of robot figures - don't blame us if you want more after this one!
name: WWR JAPAN DEFENCE FORCE SET (WWR じゃぱん でぃふぇんす ふぉーす せっと)

subtitle: The assistant in the white coat!
description: From the science fiction visual novel "Steins;Gate" comes a Nendoroid of the tsundere heroine Kurisu Makise in a special white coat version. The famous white coat from the game is finally available for the Nendoroid, plus it also comes with a different expression to the normal Nendoroid. An extra expression based off the emoticon: "ヽ(*゜д゜)ノ", is also included, which fans are bound to enjoy.
Combine the parts from this version and the original version to get the widest range of poses possible for your Nendoroid Kurisu!
name: Nendoroid Kurisu Makise: White Coat ver. (ねんどろいど まきせくりす はくいばーじょん)

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger...  Kamen Rider Incisor is here!
description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of Kamen Rider Incisor, the Kamen Rider that fought against Kit to retrieve the million dollars promised to him.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
His right-hand pincer from his Strike Vent, and shield from his Guard Vent are both included.
The weapon based off his summoned monster Volcancer is also included.
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hands to hold his weapons.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Incisor (ふぃぐま かめんらいだー いんさいざー)
sculptor: マックスファクトリー・浅井真紀
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

subtitle: The blue flash that shoots through the darkness - 1/24th scale decals of the popular Black Rock Shooter.
description: From the anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a sheet of decals featuring various images of Black Rock Shooter and Dead Master to place on your favorite 1/24th scale cars. Along with the various illustrations of the characters themselves, the decal sheet also features various images that bring out the world of Black Rock Shooter, allowing you to create a complete itasha using the decals.

The decals are printed using silk-screen printing - which means they are durable with a vibrant color that won't fade over time. These decals are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series's 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 018: Black Rock Shooter - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる018／ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: The popular new alloy series continues: Change!! Getter-2
description: The new alloy figure series from Art Storm, 'ES Alloy' continues! ES, or "Excellent Short" style, is a compact, deformed figure style that allows the figures to take many poses, allowing them to be displayed in various enjoyable ways!

All three of the Getter Machines, Getter-1, Getter-2 and Getter-3 are all being released simultaneously. Getter-2 includes effect parts to recreate his attacks in action. The Getter Drill and Getter Arm are also included to further enrich the posing possibilities of the figure. It's a perfect addition to the cute, yet robust alloy figure series.
Be sure to add all the three figures to your collection!
name: ES Alloy 04: Getter-2 (いーえすごうきん 04 げったーつー)
copyright: © 永井豪・石川賢／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: Nanoha is joining the actsta collection!
description: From the theatrical version of Nanoha, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes another addition to the actsta action figure series, and this time it is the main character of the movie - Nanoha Takamachi herself!

Nanoha comes with three different facial expressions, and also comes with her intelligent device, "Raging Heart" in two different modes. Yuuno is also included and fully articulated. But that is still not all - the figure also comes with parts to recreate the magical circles Nanoha used in the film when casting spells, meaning you can even recreate your favorite action scenes as they occurred in the series!
name: actsta: Nanoha Takamachi (あくすた たかまち なのは)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: A Nendoroid rendition of the heart-moving final scene
description: From the anime movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes a set of two Nendoroid Petite figures of Nanoha Takamachi and Fate Testarossa, that allow you to recreate the touching final scene from the movie.

Nanoha has her hand placed over her heart as she sadly accepts that Fate is leaving, and Fate herself is waving goodbye as she begins to step backwards. Included with the set is a stand the recreates the bridge where the two girls bid each other farewell.
Be sure to collect the other Nanoha Nendoroids in the Nendoroid Petite Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st set, so that these two don't get lonely by themselves!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Nanoha & Fate - Final Scene Ver. (ねんどろいど ぷち なのは＆ふぇいとせっと らすとしーんVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: She bottled up all of her sadness deep within her closed heart.
description: From the hit anime movie, "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes a 1/12th scale figure of the second heroine of the series, Fate Testarossa.

Just like the previously announced Nanoha Airstriker figure, Fate makes use of a base flowing with magical power effect parts, and if you display the two of them together you can recreate the magical battle scenes between the two girls!

The effect base can of course be removed to just display Fate, plus there is a replaceable expression for her and various exchangeable forms of Bardiche. You can display her in so many ways - now you just have to pick which one!
name: Fate Testarossa Airstriker (ふぇいと・てすたろっさ えあすとらいかー)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: There was a third heroine....?
description: From "Hayate the Combat Butler", the comedy series filled with love and war(?) comes a Nendoroid of the main character Hayate Ayasaki, dressed up as a girl in his "Hermione Ayasaki" form!

He comes with three expressions, from his standard expression, to a crying expression and of course the most important embarrassed face. To complete his girly wardrobe he also comes with a bunny-ear Alice band and of course his magical rod! But for those of you who really want him in his standard butler form, an extra body featuring his butler clothes is also included.
You can choose to enjoy either Hayate or Hermione, giving you the ability to create a huge number of situations, and have some real fun!
name: Nendoroid Hermione Ayasaki (ねんどろいど あやさきはーまいおにー)
copyright: © 畑健二郎／小学館・白皇学院生徒会・テレビ東京

subtitle: The young knight of the Lightning Squad!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of The "Guard Wing" of the Lighting forwards - Erio Mondial!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her spear device, 'Strada' is included and comes with replaceable parts allowing three of its forms to be recreated!
She also comes with effect parts for Strada to recreate some action packed fighting scenes.
She comes with her standard face as well as a shouting face. A replaceable fringe part is also included.
A total of ten hand parts are included which allow her to hold her weapons at various angles for a number of different poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Erio Mondial: Barrier Jacket ver. (えりお・ もんでぃある ばりあじゃけっとver.)
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT　© NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: Together, we'll be stronger... Kamen Rider Torque is here with his unbelievable firepower!
description: From the American produced "Kamen Rider Dragon Knight" comes a figma of the long-range fighter, Kamen Rider Torque!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
His summoned gun is included, along with his Shoot Vent's hand-held cannon. You can create a variety of scenes that show off his impressive firepower!
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Torque (ふぃぐま かめんらいだー とるく)
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

subtitle: A figure of the sharp-tongued tsundere heroine.
description: From the popular anime currently on sale on both DVD and Blu-ray comes a figure of the girl who met with a crab - Hitagi Senjyogahara.

The pose is based on a key visual from the anime that featured her with her back turned in a unique position sure to leave a strong impression on anyone. Each piece of stationary falling from her skirt has been carefully sculpted down to the finest of details and placed carefully to create an impressive 3D effect to the figure.
You can also remove all the stationary and instead let her hold just staplers in her hands with her skirt down - it's up to you which pose you want to display!
name: Hitagi Senjyogahara (せんじょうがはらひたぎ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: A Miku to make your heart skip a beat! ♪ A Nendoroid based on the Hatsune Miku Orchestra design!
description: YMO (Yellow Magic Orchestra) recently released a CD called "HMO (Hatsune Miku Orchestra)", and the illustration of that jacket cover, illustrated by manga artist Kuu, became so popular that it is now getting it's very own Nendoroid rendition, oversized sleeves and all!

A variety of extra items seen in the PV of the song "Kimi ni, mune kyun. -Uwaki na Vacation-", such as a keyboard and an electric drum set are included. Also included are some stickers of eyes for Rin and Len, to change the currently on sale Nendoroid Rin and Len into similarly styled characters!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Absolute HMO Edition (ねんどろいど はつねみく あぶそりゅーとHMO・えでぃしょん)
copyright: © 2010 Crypton Future Media, Inc./PAwLaboratory/UMAA Inc./Anima Inc. 　 「VOCALOID」はヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。

subtitle: The innocent memories from the school festival.
description: Following on from Ritsu's 1/7th scale figure comes another 1/7th scale PVC figure from the ever popular K-ON!, this time of Sakura High's left handed bassist, Mio Akiyama!

Dressed in the Gothic Lolita dress she wore at the stage of the school festival, Mio is embracing her beloved bass guitar "Elisabeth" close to her heart in a pose that really shows her cute embarrassed side. Elisabeth has been faithfully recreated to look just like the real guitar, with careful details included even on the pickguard and controller.
It's a figure that captures just how cute Mio is while nervously waiting for her turn to get up on stage, and now you can enjoy that cuteness all the time!
name: Mio Akiyama (あきやま みお)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Even as a figma she's constantly on the move, searching for articles to add to her newspaper!
description: From the popular Touhou Project comes a figma of the crow tengu newspaper reporter - Aya Shameimaru!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A standard expression, a pleased expression and a slightly worried expression.
Her antique camera, notebook and a pen all needed for her reports are included.
A leaf shaped fan and black wings are both included, ideal for a crow tengu. Her companion crow Bunbunmaru is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Aya Shameimaru (ふぃぐま しゃめいまる あや)

subtitle: The white rose priestess, blooming on the beach!
description: The three company collaboration series between Max Factory, Hobby Japan and Sega continues to bring you the Shining Wind characters dressed in their swimsuits as beautiful PVC figures - this third figure is of Clalaclan, the princess of the St. Philias Kingdom!

Once again the figure is based on an illustration my the popular illustrator Tony, and it has been sculpted to keep to his illustration down to the finest of curves and details to keep all the beauty in tact. Clalaclan is wearing a dazzling tiara with her snow white bikini that shows off her glamorous curves. Another Shining Wind character for your eyes to feast on!
name: Clalaclan Swimsuit ver. (くららくらん みずぎばーじょん)

subtitle: Make a wish upon the star around your neck!
description: The accessory brand "dicokick" bring you these Black Rock Shooter silver necklaces featuring Black Rock Shooter's star and Deadmaster's skull! The star features black line coloring while the skull is made up of two-tone black plating, giving a very different feeling to both. They are designed to be the perfect size for a necklace - noticeable, but not too big!
name: Black Rock Shooter Silver Necklace (Star/Skull) (ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたーしるばーねっくれす（ほしがた／すかる）)

subtitle: Decals based off the battles for the Holy Grail! The Fate/stay night decals are back again!
description: The Fate/stay night decals are from the GSR Character Customize Series are back again by popular demand!

Multiple images of the popular characters Saber and Tohsaka Rin, as well as images of the Command Mantra are all included to help you create your very own original itasha! Other images, such as the Tiger Dojo logo and chibi-versions of the characters, are also included as extras!
The decals are made of a high quality material, that doesn't allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 04: Fate/stay night - 1/24th Scale (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる04／ふぇいと すてい ないと)

subtitle: A great help around the house plus she has excellent grades, it's the reliable Ui! ♪
description: From the popular K-ON! comes a Nendoroid of the good natured and ever-reliable Ui Hirasawa!

A total of three expressions are included: A smiling face, an ecstatic expression as well as a dizzy expression. She also comes with both her middle school and the Sakuragaoka High school uniforms, so you can display her wearing either one! Also included is the ribbon used by Yui in the last episode of the first season as a disguise, allowing you to recreate her disguise in Nendoroid form!
Ui is ready to look after her older sister, or support the K-ON club, all in the most adorable Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Ui Hirasawa (ねんどろいど ひらさわうい)
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: The wolf familiar that loves dog food!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st comes a plushie of Fate's familiar, Arf in her human form to join the Nendoroid Petite Plushie Series! The confident and positive Arf is just as cute as all her other friends. As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints allowing you to pose her however you'd like.
Be sure to pose her with the plushie of Fate from the same series - you don't want to separate her from her master!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 33: Arf - Barrier Jacket Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず33 あるふ ばりあじゃけっとばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The magician that came from another world.
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st comes a plushie of Yuuno Scrya in his human form to join the Nendoroid Petite Plushie Series! The honest and kind Yuuno is just as cute as all his friends in the series. As always, the arms and legs are fitted with joints to add a little bit of posability to the plushie. ♪
Be sure to display him with the Nanoha Plushie from the same series! ☆
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 32: Yuuno Scrya - Barrier Jacket Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず32 ゆーの・すくらいあ ばりあじゃけっとばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The Second Child - Shikinami Asuka Langley, the figma!
description: From "Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance" comes a figma of EVA 2's determined pilot, Shikinami Asuka Langley!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The neck has an all new figma joint that features a double joint, meaning you can create even more unique poses than before!
The main body of the figma is made with a combination of hard and soft plastics, leaving the feeling of the test-plugsuit just as it should be.
The interior of the Entry Plug is also included to recreate your favorite scenes from the cockpit. Various parts in the cockpit such as the seat and control lever are also movable.
Three expressions are included: a smiling face, a determined shouting face and the embarrassed face she gave when she first wore the test plugsuit.
A variety of optional parts are included, such as the puppet and cell phone from the movie, as well as replaceable parts for when she sits in the Entry Plug.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Shikinami Asuka Langley: Test Plugsuit ver. (ふぃぐま しきなみ・あすからんぐれー てすとぷらぐすーつばーじょん)

subtitle: Unforgettable feelings, deep within my heart.
description: From the hit movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st" comes this 1/12th scale figure of the main character, Nanoha Takamachi!

The entire figure recreates one of the epic magical battle scenes from the movie, and makes use of a stand flowing with magical power effect parts. Fate Testarossa will also be released soon, and displaying them together will recreate the battle in it's entirety - truly a sight to behold.

The effect parts of the stand can of course also all be removed, allowing you to simply display Nanoha without the flashy battle around her. Two different modes of Raising Heart are included, so you can pick your best one and display her however you see fit!
name: Nanoha Takamachi Airstriker (たかまちなのは えあすとらいかー)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Spend the New Year with and angel by your side! ♪
description: The Nendoroid Petite Hatsune Miku: Christmas Piano Cake Ver. featuring Hatsune Miku in an angelic outfit was originally sold at FamilyMart stores, and is now available once again as part of a special gift set from the Good Smile Café! This time instead of a Christmas cake, Miku comes with two smaller castella cakes featuring Miku outlines branded on the top, along with some delicious cookies!
* This product is exclusive to the Good Smile x Karaoke no Tetsujin Café and the GOOD SMILE ONLINE SHOP. * Stock is limited and orders will close when no further stock is available.
name: Nendoroid Petite Hatsune Miku: Good Smile Café Gift Set (ねんどろいどぷち はつねみく ぐっすまかふぇぎふとせっと)

subtitle: The heroes and heroines of the Tales series are joining the Nendoroid Petites!
description: From the popular Tales series of RPGs comes a set of Nendoroid Petites featuring the characters from various Tales games!

From Tales of Xillia comes Jude Mathis and Milla Maxwell, from Tales of Vesperia we have Yuri Lowell and Estelle and from Tales of Graces comes Asbel Lhant and Sophie! There is also a secret character for fans of the series to look out for! Enjoy your favorite Tales characters altogether in a single set!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Tales Series (ねんどろいどぷち 『ているず おぶ』しりーず)

subtitle: "I wish that all witches were erased from existence…"
description: From the last episode of the hit anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', comes a 1/8th scale figure of Ultimate Madoka - the form Madoka took once her wish was granted and she became a Puella Magi.

Her long flowing hair, the deep space confined within her dress, her transparent wings and even her bow that looks like a budding flower - every part of Ultimate Madoka has been carefully sculpted to faithfully reproduce the original. The included pedestal is made to look like the magical symbols in space that formed each time she fired an arrow.
name: Ultimate Madoka (あるてぃめっとまどか)

subtitle: Hatsune Miku is coming to deliver some presents in her cute Santa costume!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The B prize of the lottery is a special Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku dressed up in a Santa Claus costume in a special 'Santa Ver.'! She also comes with a big sack to carry her presents, a present and even a chimney to show she really can be Santa Claus! Using her winking expression together with the chimney makes for an adorable pose of Miku climbing out the chimney!
(Japanese)
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Santa Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく さんたVer.)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. / www.piapro.net / Design by SEGA

subtitle: The inception of figma is here once again!
description: The foundation of all female figmas, the figma archetype: she is coming back again in a new flesh color ver.!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma archetype: she - flesh color ver. (ふぃぐま あーきたいぷ しー ふれっしゅからーver.)

subtitle: The inception of figma is here once again!
description: The foundation of all male figmas, the figma archetype: he is coming back again in a new flesh color ver.!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma archetype: he - flesh color ver. (ふぃぐま あーきたいぷ ひー ふれっしゅからーver.)

subtitle: The assistant in the white coat is coming back again!
description: As a part of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary rerelease project, the 2011 Winter WonFes Nendoroid of Steins;Gate's tsundere heroine, Kurisu Makise is going to be rereleased!

The WonFes version of Kurisu featured her in the white coat from the game, plus it also comes with a alternate expression to the standard Nendoroid. An extra expression based off the emoticon: ""ヽ(*゜д゜)ノ"", is also included, which fans are sure to enjoy. Combine the parts from this version and the original version to get the widest range of poses possible for your Nendoroid Kurisu!
name: Nendoroid Kurisu Makise: White Coat ver. (ねんどろいど まきせくりす はくいVer.)

subtitle: Includes a second limited edition Madoka Magica Online item code!
description: From the hit anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a set of two Nendoroid Petites as an extension set to add to the original Madoka Nendoroid Petites! This second extension set features the the Witch's Underling as well as Walpurgis Night!

The set also includes a code that will allow you to unlock limited items in the Puella Magi Madoka Magica Online game - 'Walpurgis' Clothes', 'Walpurgis' Hat' and the 'Witch's Underling Hat'. There is no other way to get hold of these items in game, so don't miss out!
Puella Magi Madoka Magica Online http:mm.my-gg.com/
name: Nendoroid Petite: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Extension Set 02 (ねんどろいどぷち まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか えくすてんしょんせっと02)

subtitle: Lyrical! Magical! Now fully posable!
description: From the hit anime movie, 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a fully posable Nendoroid of Nanoha Takamachi wearing her barrier jacket!

She comes with three different expressions, including a standard expression, a shouting expression and a smiling expression. Her intelligent device 'Raising Heart' is included in Exelion Mode, plus you can also use the included parts to change it into Strike Flame Mode instead! The base of her stand is made to look like one of the magical circles from the show to add even more magic to the figure!
name: Nendoroid Nanoha Takamachi : Exelion Mode Edition (ねんどろいど たかまちなのは えくせりおんもーど・えでぃしょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The not-so-everyday life of the Nichijou girls!
description: From the popular anime shown on NHK Educational TV, 'Nichijou' comes a Nendoroid of the self-proclaimed 8-year-old genius - Shinonome Laboratory's Hakase!

She comes with a huge number of optional parts including a table, a Japanese teacup, a mug, a swiss-roll, Sakamoto-san the cat and even a Sakamoto Pharmacy cardboard box! She even comes with a separate fringe part with cat ears and a tail to recreate the famous scene from the show!

A rock-paper-scissors arm and sitting parts are also included for even more ways to have fun - there are even parts designed to let you pose her together with the previously released Nano Shinonome to completely recreate your favorite scenes between the Shinonome Laboratory duo!
name: Nendoroid Hakase (ねんどろいど はかせ)
copyright: ©あらゐけいいち・角川書店／東雲研究所

subtitle: A graceful figure of Saber wearing a yukata!
description: From the popular 'Fate/stay night' series comes a 1/8th scale figure of the series' heroine, Saber, dressed in a refreshing blue yukata with morning-glory flower prints. You can place a folding fan in her one hand and a candied apple in the other to help recreate the summer festival atmosphere! A pony-tail hairstyle is also included, allowing you to alternate between hairstyles whenever you feel like a change.

Illya, Rin Tohsaka and Sakura Matou are also going to be joining the Fate/stay night yukata series - they are all currently in production, but fans of the series can look forward to collecting all four of the girls!
name: Saber: Yukata ver. (せいばー ゆかたver.)

subtitle: The ghostly gardener of Hakugyokurou is back once again!
description: From the popular Touhou Project game series comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Youmu Konpaku - the ghostly gardener who serves Yuyuko Saigyouji.

As she serves as Yuyuko's guardian and sword instructor, her two swords are also both included: the long bladed Roukanken and the shorter Hakurouken, along with a ghost to float around her. She also comes with a total of three expressions, including her standard face, an angry face and a face with closed eyes. A large variety of parts allowing you to recreate all sorts of situations!
name: Nendoroid Youmu Konpaku (ねんどろいど こんぱくようむ)

subtitle: Add some wooser charm to your iPhone5!
description: From the popular 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a number of iPhone5 cases all featuring wooser! There are six different designs in total, so grab the one you like best and add an extra level of cuteness to your iPhone!
name: wooser iPhone Cases (うーさーあいふぉんけーす)

subtitle: A relaxing cushion featuring the Hachune Miku expression!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The D prize of the lottery is a Hachune Miku cushion! If you win the cushion in a hobby shop you'll get a cushion which features a different Hachune Miku expression on either side of the cushion and a super soft texture! If you win the cushion in a FamilyMart store you'll get your hands on a special version of the cushion based on the hugely popular 'Hachune Miku Nikuman'! Both versions are super comfy and sure to relax you after a busy day! (The Nikuman version can't be eaten!)
(Japanese)
name: Hachune Miku Cushion (はちゅねみく くっしょん)

subtitle: Fun to collect and cute to display!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The F prize of the lottery is two of these cute rubber straps illustrated by popular illustrators CHANxCO and Putidevil! The complete set features two types of each of the six different characters, including Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, MEIKO and KAITO.
(Japanese)
name: Rubber Strap Set (らばーすとらぷせっと)

subtitle: Listen to wooser's beautiful voice as you work or study!
description: From the 3DCG anime series with a needlessly impressive staff line-up, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a ballpoint pen featuring recordings of wooser's voice!

You simply need to press the wooser on the top of the pen, and he'll shout out one of his famous lines! Everyone will think he's adorable when they see the pen, but they might think otherwise once they hear what he has to say!

The A-type features the following three different lines, which play randomly: "My name is wooser. I have no interest in things like love and justice!" "Well then, I guess it's time to complain. ...I'm so hopeless." "Okay, let's just settle this with money, shall we?"
name: wooser Talking Ballpoint Pen A (うーさー ぼいすつきぼーるぺん あるふぁ)

subtitle: Listen to wooser's beautiful voice as you work or study!
description: From the 3DCG anime series with a needlessly impressive staff line-up, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a ballpoint pen featuring recordings of wooser's voice!

You'll be able to listen to some of the bizarre things wooser has to say simply by pressing the top of the pen, which means you get to enjoy wooser's cute appearance as well as the extraordinary things he says in the series - whenever you like!

The B-type features the following three lines, which play randomly: "My name is wooser. My present to you, is myself." "Even if you defeat me, wooser #2 and #3 will appear before you and block your way!" "You take care of this, I'll move on without you!"
name: wooser Talking Ballpoint Pen B (うーさー ぼいすつきぼーるぺん べーた)

subtitle: The magnificent Saber in her black suit.
description: From the popular anime series, 'Fate/Zero' comes a figure of Saber wearing the black suit from the series.

Saber comes with three expression parts including her standard glaring expression, an angry expression and a serious expression. She also comes with a variety of optional parts including a Nendoroid-sized version of the motorbike she used in her fight against Rider, the 'Saber Motored Cuirassier' as well as her powerful Noble Phantasm, 'Excalibur'.

You can also combine the new expressions and hair parts with 'Nendoroid Saber : Super Movable Edition' to recreate the pose from one of the key visuals for the series, and various other scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Saber : Zero Ver. (ねんどろいど せいばー Zero Ver.)

subtitle: The student council president has dived into the realm of RPGs!
description: From the 2D fighting game on the PS3, 'AQUAPAZZA' comes a Nendoroid of Sasara Kusugawa wearing the gorgeous Valkyrie armor from ToHeart2 Dungeon Travelers! Her huge halberd and shield are both included to wield into battle, and she also comes with effect parts to pose her swinging the halberd.

Gorgeous wing parts are also included which allow you to display her in the power-up pose from the game, with her halberd thrust into the ground and her wings spread wide open. Her partner, Maryan-senpai, is also included as a Nendoroid Petite to complete to student council combo!
name: Nendoroid Sasara Kusugawa Valkyrie Ver. & Nendoroid Petite Maryan (ねんどろいど くすがわささら う゛ぁるきりー Ver. & ねんどろいどぷち まーりゃん)

subtitle: A posable plushie of Neru!
description: The fanmade character based on Hatsune Miku, 'Neru Akita' is joining the posable Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series! There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose her in a couple of different ways, including a sitting pose. Her ponytail is also fitted with a joint for even more posability!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 48: Neru Akita (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず48 あきた ねる)
copyright: ©スミス・ヒオカ/Crypton Future Media, Inc . www.crypton.net

subtitle: The ultimate Electromaster.
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes an adorable plushie of the third most powerful esper in Academy City, Mikoto Misaka! There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose her in a couple of different ways, including a sitting pose.
Enjoy the characters from Academy City in the most huggable form yet!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 46: Mikoto Misaka (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず46 みさか みこと)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

subtitle: The Judgment member who adores Mikoto!
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes an adorable plushie of Tokiwadai Middle School's one and only teleporter, Kuroko Shirai! There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose her in a couple of different ways, including a sitting pose.
Enjoy the characters from Academy City in the most huggable form yet!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 47: Kuroko Shirai (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず47 しらい くろこ)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

subtitle: A gigantic version of Hatsune Miku, for more cuteness than ever before!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The A prize of the lottery is this giant 30cm tall version of Nendoroid Hatsune Miku, known as Jumbo Hatsune Miku! This special version of Miku will only be available as a part of this project, so don't miss out!
(Japanese)
name: Nendoroid Plus: Jumbo Hatsune Miku (ねんどろいどぷらす じゃんぼはつねみく)

subtitle: A soft and fluffy Miku in a Santa costume!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The last draw prize of the lottery is a cute plushie of Hatsune Miku dressed in a Santa costume, that you can't help but want to hug! Her twintails are movable and she is super soft to the touch for fans to enjoy hugging all day long!
(Japanese)
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie: Hatsune Miku Santa Ver. (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみ はつねみく さんたVer.)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. / www.piapro.net / Design by SEGA

subtitle: The popular papercraft series is turning into an ABS figure series!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The G prize in the lottery features one of six Vocaloid characters as a graphig ABS figure! The set includes Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len and Megurine Luka figures based on illustrations by Putidevil, Sanpachi, Chibo, Souno and even one based on the popular 3D model of Append Miku by Tda.
(Japanese)
name: graphig ABS (ぐらふぃぐABS)

subtitle: Filled with illustrations from popular illustrators!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!
The E prize for the lottery is a special set of three clear files and a 2013 calender, ideal for upcoming new year! If you win this prize you can pick which of the three different designs you want!
(Japanese)
name: Clear File & Calender Set (くりあふぁいる＆かれんだーせっと)

subtitle: A powerful adhesive agent in a convenient extra large bottle!
description: Unlike standard superglue, this special adhesive is specially designed for use with plastic models as it melts the plastic together to form a quick and powerful bond. The glue uses 100% pure ingredients with no impurities for the best quality possible, and comes in a stable and airtight 500ml steel container.
name: MSS-44 Powerful Adhesive Agent Magnum (MSS-44 きょうりょくようちゃくざいマグナム)

subtitle: "We're not heroes of justice, we are justice itself!"
description: From the anime series 'Nisemonogatari' comes a figma of Tsukihi Araragi, the sister in charge of planning for Tsuganoki Junior High School's Fire Sisters!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard expression, an upset expression and a sulking expression.
A replaceable head part to display her with long hair is included, as well as extra feet to display her barefoot.
The kitchen knife, pan lid and awl she takes out when angry are all included.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsukihi Araragi (ふぃぐま あららぎつきひ)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: "I'll do whatever it takes to defeat my brother!"
description: From the anime series 'Tekkaman Blade' comes a figma of Tekkaman Evil, the Tekkaman of the main character's twin brother, Shinya Aiba!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
There are two separate face parts, a standard version and one with the visor open allowing you to see inside.
His main weapon, the Tekk Lancer is included in both its standard version and the cross version seen in the show.
The shoulder parts can be connected to the arm to recreate the 'Ram Shoulder' attack from the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tekkaman Evil (ふぃぐま てっかまんえびる)

subtitle: More fun ways to display your Nendoroids!
description: These new suction stands bring Nendoroid fans a brand new way of displaying their favorite characters! Simply stick the suction cup onto a window or wall, and you can display your Nendoroids in places you never even considered using before!

The arm attached to the suction cup is articulated, allowing you to move it in any direction so that you can place the Nendoroids exactly where you want them! Each stand comes with joints for both Nendoroids and Nendoroid Petites, so you can display any of your favorite characters from either series!

This product was developed by this year's new employees at Good Smile Company. They have also been running a blog testing the development up until this point, which can be found here: http:ameblo.jp/blog-shinsotsu2012/
Notice Regarding the Nendoroid More Series · Please note that the Nendoroid More series is only designed to work with Nendoroids (or Nendoroid Petites) that have a hole on their back.
The series is not compatible with Nendoroids that use other types of stands.
· Characters with long hair sometimes restrict the use of the Nendoroid More series.
For more information, please see the Nendoroid More: Clip Stand and Suction Stands Compatibility List below! http:partner.goodsmile.info/support/more/english_nenmore_clip-kyuban_taiou.pdf
name: Nendoroid More: Suction Stands (White/Pink/Mint) (ねんどろいどもあ きゅうばん ほわいと/ぴんく/みんと)

subtitle: More fun ways to display your Nendoroids!
description: These new clip stands bring Nendoroid fans a brand new way of displaying their favorite characters! The clip can be easily attached to the frame of your cabinet or the edge of your laptop, allowing you to display your Nendoroids in places you never even considered using before!

The arm attached to the clip is articulated, allowing you to move it in any direction so that you can place the Nendoroids exactly where you want them! Each stand comes with joints for both Nendoroids and Nendoroid Petites, so you can display any of your favorite characters from either series!

This product was developed by this year's new employees at Good Smile Company. They have also been running a blog testing the development up until this point, which can be found here: http:ameblo.jp/blog-shinsotsu2012/
Notice Regarding the Nendoroid More Series · Please note that the Nendoroid More series is only designed to work with Nendoroids (or Nendoroid Petites) that have a hole on their back.
The series is not compatible with Nendoroids that use other types of stands.
· Characters with long hair sometimes restrict the use of the Nendoroid More series.
For more information, please see the Nendoroid More: Clip Stand and Suction Stands Compatibility List below! http:partner.goodsmile.info/support/more/english_nenmore_clip-kyuban_taiou.pdf
name: Nendoroid More: Clip Stands (White/Pink/Mint) (ねんどろいどもあ くりっぷ ほわいと/ぴんく/みんと)

subtitle: A chibi posable figure of Sonico!
description: The S.K. series is a brand new series of chibi posable figures brought to you by WING. The very first figure to join the series is none other than the vocalist and guitarist of the band 'Daiichi Uchuu Sokudo', Super Sonico!

She comes with a number of optional parts such as her guitar, alternate expression parts and more that make her cuter than ever before! Become Sonico's newest producer by picking the pose that suits her best, then enjoy her adorable performance right by your side whenever you like!
name: S.K series: Super Sonico (えすけーしりーず すーぱーそにこ)

subtitle: Duchess Drossel's beloved one-wheeled motorbike, Josef!
description: From the CG Animation produced by Disney Japan, 'Fireball Charming' comes a figma sized model of Josef, Drossel's beloved futuristic motorbike!

You can place figma Drossel (Charming) on the bike, close the front and back panels and completely recreate her riding pose from the series! The goggles she used while riding in the series are also included. Let your figma Drossel take a ride on Josef - even though she may never be able to stop riding again!
name: ex:ride SPride.04 : Josef (えくすらいど えすぴーらいど.04 よーぜふ)

subtitle: The adult Nanoha wearing a bunny-girl outfit!
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes a huge 1/4th scale figure of the Ace of Aces, Nanoha Takamachi, wearing a sexy bunny-girl outfit! The pose is based on an illustration from an extra included with a magazine and the net tights she wears on her legs are made from real fabric for a very realistic effect.
Fate T. Harlaown and Hayate Yagami are also scheduled to follow on from Nanoha, so you'll be able to display all three of them together and enjoy the company of some very sexy magical girls!
name: Nanoha Takamachi: Bunny Ver. (たかまちなのは ばにーVer.)

subtitle: The cute Append versions of Miku, Rin and Len are joining the Nendoroid Petite series!
description: The first ever set of lottery-based products from Good Smile Company are finally here! The 'GSC Lottery: Hatsune Miku 2012 Winter Ver.' will only be running this Winter, and you'll be able to enter for a chance to win some amazing products at any FamilyMart convenience stores as well as at various hobby shops!

The C prize of the lottery is this set of Nendoroid Petite Vocaloid characters, all wearing the outfits based on the additional voice library packs 'Hatsune Miku Append' and ' 'Kagamine Rin/Len Append'. Enjoy the unique appearance of the three Append version Vocaloids, all in cute Nendoroid Petite size!
(Japanese)
name: Nendoroid Petite: Miku/Rin/Len Append Set (ねんどろいどぷち みく・りん・れん あぺんどせっと)

subtitle: The adorable genius!
description: From the fantasy anime set in the world of Flonyard, 'DOG DAYS' comes a figure of Millhi's close friend and genius inventor, Ricotta Elmar! She comes with a variety of replaceable parts that allow you to pose her saluting, waving a white flag to surrender or even display her walking along while carrying books like a true inventor!
She also comes with effect parts to display her using Emblem Arts as well as four of the cannons she invented, allowing you to display her on the battlefield as an artillery expert!
name: Nendoroid Ricotta Elmar (ねんどろいど りこった・えるまーる)

subtitle: The intelligent young girl who loves causing mischief!
description: From the popular game 'The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky - Second Chapter' comes a Nendoroid of Ouroboros Agent, Legion No. XV – Renne, also known by the name 'The Angel of Extermination'.

She comes with three expressions, including a cunning smile, an angry face to pose her in combat scenes and a cheeky, overconfident expression with closed eyes. She also comes with the scythe she uses for battle scenes, as well as her black bunny plushie and some ice-cream for more innocent, childish poses Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Estelle Bright to recreate your favorite scenes from the game in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Renne (ねんどろいど れん)
series: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky - Second Chapter

subtitle: The Jersey Club's president, here to help everyone in the Nendoroid world!
description: From the anime series set in the city of Kamogawa, 'Rinne no Lagrange' comes a Nendoroid of the series' heroine, Madoka Kyouno!

She comes with a variety of expressions and replaceable parts which allow you to create her signature poses, display her in either her uniform or her jersey or even pose her with her hair tied up! She also comes with her favorite energy drink, 'Kamokawa Energy'!

Additionally, the Nendoroid is made to work together with Hasegawa's Vox Aura Egg Plane which will be released this August - you can even have the Nendoroid ride inside the Vox Aura model, so be sure to display them together for the full effect!
name: Nendoroid Madoka Kyouno (ねんどろいど きょうのまどか)
series: Rinne no Lagrange (Lagrange: The Flower of Rin-ne)
copyright: ©ラグランジェ・プロジェクト

subtitle: A figure of the most ditsy alchemist in the land!
description: From the PS3 game, 'Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland' comes a figure of Rorona, the main character from the very first in the Atelier Series, Atelier Rorona!

Her childlike appearance, adorable outfit and all the small details of Kishida Mel's unique illustration have all been faithfully recreated in figure form for fans to enjoy! Meruru is also on her way to join the figure world, so be sure to display the two of them together!
name: Rorona (ろろな)
series: Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland

subtitle: Nendoroid Petites that are more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the popular anime series, "Uta no Prince-sama - Maji Love 1000%' comes a set of the princes to join the adorable Nendoroid Petite series of figures!

The set contains Otoya Ittoki, Masato Hijirikawa and Natsuki Shinomiya from A-class as well as Tokiya Ichinose, Ren Jinguuji and Syo Kurusu from S-class, all wearing their Saotome Academy uniforms. There is also a secret character to look out for! Each of the characters is posed in a way that really brings out their personality so you can keep the princes by your side whenever you like! ♪
name: Nendoroid Petite : Uta no Prince-sama - Maji Love 1000% (ねんどろいどぷち うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％)

subtitle: "My name is wooser and my present to you... is myself."
description: The full 3DCG anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' has started airing on TV Tokyo as well as on niconico! This giant plushie of wooser himself will soon be available for fans to hug or swing around to their heart's content! Now that the anime has begun, wooser is shining more than ever before, so grab one to keep by your side and treat however you please!
name: wooser Plushie (うーさーぬいぐるみ)

subtitle: The Nendo-bear is here!
description: From the popular anime series 'Persona 4' comes a Nendoroid of the mysterious Kuma, who lives in the TV World.

Kuma has a playful personality but also has an emotional side, and to help recreate all his emotions he comes with four expressions - a lovable standard expression, an upset expression, a crying expression and even the popular expression with blank white eyes. A Nendoroid Kuma : Human Ver. is also included as an extra with Kuma, and he can even be placed inside the Kuma Nendoroid to recreate the scene where he climbed out in his birthday suit!
name: Nendoroid Kuma (ねんどろいど くま)
copyright: ©IndexCorporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: The Goddess of Victory who led the 2011 series champions!
description: Racing Miku is the official mascot of the 2011 SUPER GT 300 class series champions - GSR&Studie with TeamUKYO!

This lovely figure is based on Racing Miku's original illustration by Yuichi Murakami, and has been sculpted to faithfully reproduce even the smallest of details of the original design. Even the dynamic posing of the hair has been preserved, as well as the unique transparent feeling of her outfit and parasol. It's a figure filled with highlights for both fans of Miku and fans of the racing team!
name: Racing Miku 2011 ver. (れーしんぐみく 2011 ver.)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: Nyarlathotep - always bringing about chaos with a smile! ♪
description: From the popular anime and light novel series, 'Haiyore! Nyaruko-san' comes a Nendoroid of Nyarlathotep, also known as Nyaruko!

She comes with a number of optional parts such as exchangeable parts that let you recreate the pose from the cover of the second novel, along with her weapon - the 'hard-to-describe crowbar-like thingy' that never fails to drop your SAN points. She even comes with three different options for the hair sticking out the top of her head which can be used together with her lovey-dovey expression or the tearful expression she used in episode three of the anime series to recreate all sorts of scenes!
name: Nendoroid Nyaruko (ねんどろいど にゃるこ)

subtitle: Len Kagamine: the charming plushie is being rereleased!
description: The 5th plushie to join the Nendoroid Plus Plushie series! The powerful singer Ren Kagamine has made his way into becoming an adorable plushie!

His characteristic hair-style has been faithfully converted into plushie form, and is loaded with joints allowing you to pose in different positions - along with his arms and legs! His twin sister, Rin, is due to be released alongside him - so you can display them together!
Be sure to give them lots of love! ☆
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 05: Len Kagamine (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ05 ｢かがみねれん｣)

subtitle: The G-class armor set made from the Lord of the Seas!
description: From the Nintendo 3DS exclusive game, 'Monster Hunter Tri G' comes a fully posable Nendoroid of the male swordsman wearing the G-class 'Lagia X Series' of armor that can only be made using materials from the powerful sea wyvern, Lagiacrus!

The surface of his armor has been given a very solid finish to recreate the protective appearance of the armor, and in total he features an amazing 23 different joints for all sorts of different poses. His giant greatsword known as the 'Lagia Blade' can be posed in all the various ways you remember from the game, allowing you to play around to your heart's content!
name: Nendoroid Hunter: Male Swordsman - Lagia X Edition (ねんどろいど はんたー♂ けんし らぎあX・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: The blond haired, blue eyed beauty who can only speak Japanese.
description: From the popular game 'Persona 2: Innocent Sin' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the American girl who speaks fluent Japanese, Lisa Silverman!

Lisa is posed wearing her Seven Sisters High School uniform, with her lovely blond hair and blue eyes beautifully sculpted. Her uniform has also been faithfully reproduced with her skirt fluttering in the wind as she stands in a confident pose that fans of the game are sure to enjoy!
name: Lisa Silverman (りさ・しるばーまん)

subtitle: The second set of figures to join the Puchikko series!
description: From the hit anime series 'Inifinite Stratos' comes a figure of the IS Cadet Representative from Germany, Laura Bodewig, here to join Penguin Parade's new Puchikko figure series! The Puchikko series aims to capture the unique appearance and traits of each character and shrink them down into an adorable palm-sized figure!
Be sure to display her together with Houki Shinonono and Charlotte Dunois who have already been announced in the same series!
name: Puchikko Laura Bodewig (ぷちっこ らうら・ぼーでう”ぃっひ)

subtitle: Flonyard's most popular idol is joining the Petanko series!
description: From the popular anime series with a second season currently airing, 'DOG DAYS' comes a Pentanko figure of the Princess of the Biscotti Republic, Millhiore Firianno Biscotti! The Princess loved by all of her subjects is sitting in a cute little chibi pose for fans to enjoy.
Simply place her by your side and enjoy the company of the adorable Millhi whenever you like!
name: Petanko Millhiore Firianno Biscotti (ぺたんこ みるひおーれ・ふぃりあんの・びすこってぃ)

subtitle: The sister dressed in pure white.
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes an articulated plushie of the sister dressed in white, Index. There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose her in a couple of different ways, including a sitting pose.
Enjoy the characters from Academy City in the most huggable form yet!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 44: Index (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず44 いんでっくす)

subtitle: Imagine Breaker.
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes an articulated plushie of the Level 0 high-school student, Touma Kamijou. There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose him in a couple of different ways, including in a sitting pose. Grab the characters from Academy City in the most huggable form yet!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 45: Touma Kamijou (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず45 かみじょう とうま)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

subtitle: Rin Kagamine: the adorable plushie is being rereleased!
description: The 4th in the Nendoroid Plus Plushie is being rereleased once again! The energetic Rin Kagamine has been given the usual deformed design, but with all her adorable charms in tact, including her number one charm point - the giant ribbon in her hair.

The ribbon, as well as the arms and legs are all fitted with joints, allowing them to be posed, and her twin brother Len is also due to be released alongside her - so you can display them together in any poses you wish. ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 04: Rin Kagamine (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみシリーズ04 ｢かがみねりん｣)

subtitle: "I'll show you the resolution of a Sentinel, and you'll never forget it!"
description: From the anime series, 'Senki Zesshou Symphogear' comes a figma of the young girl who decides to fight against the Noise, Tsubasa Kazanari!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard serious expression, a shouting face for combat scenes as well as a gentle smiling face.
The katanas she uses to combat the Noise are included, along with the smaller dagger that can be stabbed into shadows to prevent movement.
You can also pose her preforming the 'Reverse Rakshasa' attack using attachable blades for her legs.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsubasa Kazanari (ふぃぐま かざなりつばさ)

description: The full 3DCG anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' has started airing on TV Tokyo as well as on niconico! This giant plushie of Darth wooser will soon be available for fans to hug or grab hold of to their heart's content! He is made with a very fluffy, soft material that feels wonderful to the touch!
name: Darth wooser Plushie (だすうさぬいぐるみ)

subtitle: "D-Boy and Takaya Aiba are no more! I am Tekkaman Blade!"
description: From the anime series 'Tekkaman Blade' comes a figma of the Tekkaman that the main character transforms into - Tekkaman Blade!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
There are two separate face parts, a standard version and one with the visor open allowing you to see inside.
The Tekk Lancer is included and can be separated into two different parts.
The Tekk Shield stored in his hip can be equipped and removed.
You can release his ultimate attack, 'Voltekka' by opening up his shoulders.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tekkaman Blade (ふぃぐま てっかまんぶれーど)

subtitle: The good-natured but bluntly humored Koyomi is also going on resale!
description: figma Koyomi Araragi is also going on resale to join figma Hitagi Senjyogahara! If you missed them the first time, now is your chance to grab them!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his jacket, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with three expressions: his standard face, a surprised face and the face he always gave after telling a bad joke.
A variety of extra parts are included, such as his school bag, extra hair parts to reveal his left eye and even effect parts to recreate battle scenes.
Extra hand parts for figma Hitagi Senjyogahara are also included which allow you to display her holding a pencil - you can create all kinds of scenes between them now.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Koyomi Araragi (ふぃぐま あららぎこよみ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The top ace of the Suomus Air Force!
description: From the popular film and anime series, 'Strike Witches' comes a figma of Sanya's partner Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard face, a glaring face and the embarrassed face she sometimes shows in the series.
She also comes with her complete striker unit as well as a fringe part with animal ears, a tail and her MG42 machine gun.
A replaceable shift:body part with detailed sculpting on her pants is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen (ふぃぐま えいら・いるまたる・ゆーてぃらいねん)

subtitle: Filled with energy and ready to ninja about!
description: From the 3DS game filled with cute and sexy characters, 'Senran Kagura: Shoujo-tachi no Shinei' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Hibari, one of the first year students at Hanzou Academy.

Hibari has a slightly childish personality, always trying her best but still causing all sorts of problems - and that playful and innocent personality has been captured perfectly in this figure for fans of the series to enjoy! She also comes with an optional right hand part which allows you to pose her in a double peace-sign pose, which is the same pose she would take when you completed a level in the game!
name: Hibari (ひばり)

subtitle: "I'm not playing around! I'm a hero of justice!"
description: From the anime series 'Nisemonogatari' comes a figma of Karen Araragi, the sister in charge of combat for Tsuganoki Junior High School's Fire Sisters!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard expression, a shouting expression for fighting scenes and a charming winking expression.
She also comes with replaceable hair parts that allow you to display her with short hair, as well as extra feet to display her in socks without shoes.
Effect parts are including to help you recreate her powerful attacks from the series.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Karen Araragi (ふぃぐま あららぎかれん)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: "Take up your sword and the flames shall rise! The battlefield calls!"
description: From the popular anime 'Accel World' comes a figma of Kuroyukihime's Duel Avatar, 'Black Lotus'!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Replaceable arms, legs and head parts allow you to recreate combat mode.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
Display together with figma Silver Crow to recreate all sorts of scenes from the anime.
name: figma Black Lotus (ふぃぐま ぶらっく・ろーたす)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: An old childhood friend, all grown up and more perfect than ever!
description: From the PC game 'sekirara' comes a figure of the main character's childhood friend, Izumi Shizuno. She has a wonderful figure from being in the swimming club, which has been carefully sculpted as a 1/7th scale figure.

Izumi is well-known for having the most perfect body on campus, along with all sorts of other rumors about her circulating among the boys, but you don't need rumors anymore - now you can enjoy her company beside you whenever you like!
name: Izumi Shizuno (しづのいずみ)
copyright: ©se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: "Now! Shout, 'Burst Link'!!"
description: From the anime series, 'Accel World' comes a figma of Haruyuki's Duel Avatar, Silver Crow!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
The cover on Silver Crow's back can be removed to equip his Silver Wings.
Effect parts are included which allow you to pose him performing his finishing attack.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Silver Crow (ふぃぐま しるばー・くろう)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: Wield your sword with pride and hunt down all the dragons!
description: From Sega's role-playing game, '7th Dragon 2020' comes one a 1/7th scale figure of Katanako as one of the character classes - the Samurai!

The figure is based on an illustration by Shirow Miwa and takes care to faithfully recreate the slim body design, beautiful long hair and protective gear in figure form. She also comes with a replaceable wrist part that allows you to display her holding her beloved katana. You'll never need to fear dragons again with this valiant figure by your side!
name: Samurai (Katanako) (さむらい（かたなこ）)

The Puchikko series aims to capture the unique appearance and traits of each character and shrink them down into an adorable palm-sized figure!

The Puchikko series aims to capture the unique appearance and traits of each character and shrink them down into an adorable palm-sized figure!

name: Puchikko Huang Lingyin (ぷちっこ ふぁん りんいん)

subtitle: She's not really wearing a fluffy lion costume ;)
description: From the comedy action game 'Fate/Tiger Colosseum' based in the Fate/stay Night world comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Saber Lion as a part of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary rerelease project!

Her cute appearance seems to completely contradict her vigorous facial expression. Her main weapon - the chunk of meat, as well as a bowl and chopsticks are included. Now you can take the gluttonous lion home with you!

subtitle: The ordinary black magician is bring rereleased!
description: From the popular Touhou Project series of games comes a figma the black magician who lives deep in the Forest of Magic - Marisa Kirisame!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A smiling face, a shouting face as well as a grinning face perfectly suited to Marisa.
Her magic item, a mini-Hakkero is included with hand parts to hold it, so you can even pose her casting the famous 'Master Spark'!
Her witch's broom, a tea cup and her spellbook are also all included.
Additionally, special leg parts allowing her to ride on her broom are also included. You can even pose her flying though the air!
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Marisa Kirisame (ふぃぐま きりさめまりさ)

subtitle: "It's Pirate Time!"
description: From the anime series 'Bodacious Space Pirates' comes a Nendoroid of the young high school student who ends up becoming the captain of a space pirate ship, Marika Kato!

She comes with three expressions including her standard smiling face, a determined expression as well as a much more relaxed expression with closed eyes. She comes with a variety of optional parts including her pirate hat, a sword, her cape and even replaceable arm parts that allow you to pose her giving the orders to attack. She even comes with her firearm, the 'Armor Light Anti-Armor Beamgun' which she can hold in her hands to recreate one of the key visuals for the series.
name: Nendoroid Marika Kato (ねんどろいど かとうまりか)

subtitle: The noble white knight, filled with pride.
description: The third figure in the 1/8th scale Saber Series sculpted by Toda Satoshi (Yume no Kagutsuchino Koukoku). This time it's the elegant and noble version of Saber from the fighting game "Fate/unlimited codes" - Saber Lily.
It's got all of Toda Satoshi's unique charms, along with the incredible details on her stunning outfit and armor. It's a figure sure to catch the attention of anyone who sees her!
name: Saber Lily (せいばー・りりぃ)
copyright: © TYPE-MOON © EIGHTING © cavia © CAPCOM CO., LTD

subtitle: The beautiful shine maiden of paradise is being rereleased!
description: From the incredibly popular 'Touhou Project' series of games comes a figma of the Youkai hunting priestess of the Hakurei Shrine - Reimu Hakurei!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: a smiling face, an angry face and a content face to recreate her easygoing personality as she sips her tea.
Various optional parts that help recreate Reimu's personality are included, such as her charms, a prayer rod, a cup of tea and some alcohol.
She is the first ever figma to be wearing drawers beneath her skirt!
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Reimu Hakurei (ふぃぐま はくれいれいむ)

subtitle: A new series of figures - Puchikko!

Houki's long black hair as well as an expression that captures her personality perfectly have been shrunk down into an adorable palm-sized figure!
name: Puchikko Houki Shinonono (ぷちっこ しのののほうき)

subtitle: A new series of figures - Puchikko!
description: From the popular anime series 'Infinite Stratos' comes a figure of Charlotte Dunois as one of the first to join Penguin Parade's new Puchikko series of figures! Charlotte's unique characteristics as well as her reserved, gentle personality have been shrunk down into an adorable palm-sized figure!
name: Puchikko Charlotte Dunois (ぷちっこ しゃるろっと・でゅのあ)

subtitle: Lily, the songstress created for "anim.o.v.e" is going on resale!
description: A PVC figure of the character created in 2009 for the anime song cover album "anim.o.v.e01" released by Lily and Mosh, but since then she has also moved into to Vocaloid fame, "Lily!" Her dashing pose from the Vocaloid package is now going on resale for all those who missed her the first time around!

Her long beautiful locks make use of clear plastics, creating a transparent feeling that gives a light feeling to the figure. The stand she is placed on is based on the Lily logo. Her large open jacket and tattoos have all been carefully sculpted to really bring out Lily's wild personality within the figure.
name: Lily from anim.o.v.e (りりぃ from anim.o.v.e)
copyright: Character Design KEI © 2010 AVEX MANAGEMENT INC.

subtitle: Madoka Magica themed earphone jacks exclusive to theaters!
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie' comes a set of earphone jack accessories. The set includes earphone jacks fitted with the soul gems with weapons of Madoka Kaname, Homura Akemi, Mami Tomoe, Sayaka Miku and Kyouko Sakura.

There is also a Kyubey earphone jack to have the little creature dangling off your smartphone, or have the cute dessert witch biting down on your phone instead! They will be on sale at theaters screening the movie, so don't miss out!
Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Official Website http:www.madoka-magica.com/
Theater Information http:www.madoka-magica.com/theater/ (Please note some of the theaters listed may not stock these items.)
name: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie: Earphone Jack Accessories (げきじょうばん まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか いやほんじゃっくあくせさりー)

subtitle: He likes money, meat and girls.

This strap features the mysterious creature known as 'wooser' from the series! Use the strap together with the earphone jack to decorate your cellphone in true wooser style!

This strap features the semi-hidden character, 'Darth wooser' from the series! Use the strap together with the earphone jack to decorate your cellphone in Darth wooser style!

subtitle: A kind of hidden character?
description: With full 3D animation by Sanzigen and voice acting by Mamoru Miyano, the TV animation 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' will be broadcast on TV Tokyo from the 2nd October and is also scheduled to be shown on NicoNico Douga! This earphone jack features the parasitic creature known as 'Darth wooser' from the series! Simply attach it to your cellphone and carry Darth wooser around with you wherever you go!

subtitle: The girl who loves stars!
description: From the popular collaborative anime series, 'Wish Upon the Pleiades' comes an adorable 1/8th scale figure of the hard working and kind girl that is often called silly by her friends - Subaru!

She is posed riding on her magical staff that was designed based on a drive shaft, floating gently through the air just as she did in the series. She has a lovely smile across her face that'll make any fan of the series happy to see!
