series: Wish Upon the Pleiades (Houkago no Pleiades)
copyright: ©FUJI HEAVY INDUSTRIES Ltd./ GAINAX / S&G アニメプロジェクト実行委員会

subtitle: This time the lovely Nymph is falling from the heavens... wearing a bunny outfit!
description: From the popular movie of 'Sora no Otoshimono' comes a huge 1/4th scale figure of the Electronic Warfare Angeloid Type Beta - Nymph.

Nymph is wearing a sexy bunnygirl outfit just like Ikaros and Astraea before her! Careful detail was given to her long signature twin-tailed hair as well as the sexy bunny outfit that shows off her thighs for fans to enjoy! She is posed with her back turned, looking over her shoulder with a slightly angry, embarrassed expression on her face - a pose and expression that really brings out her personality perfectly!

subtitle: The pure white, royal knight - even more adorable as a Nendoroid.
description: The ever popular 'Fate/unlimited codes' game series has expanded with the recently released PSP version, and to accompany its release is this adorable Nendoroid of Saber Lily!

Of the many poses the Nendoroid is able to take, it can easily take the pose of its 1/7th scale counterpart, 'Saber Lily ~Distant Avalon~ ', as well as the popular pose from the front cover of the limited edition of the PS2 version of the game. Excalibur, Avalon and Caliburn with its scabbard are all included as separate weapons, creating an almost endless number of posing possibilities!
name: Nendoroid Saber Lily (ねんどろいど せいばー・りりぃ)

subtitle: Enjoy that faithful Summer once again in Nendoroid size!
description: From the popular romantic comedy anime series, 'Waiting in the Summer', comes a Nendoroid of Ichika Takatsuki, a student who transferred from abroad to Kaito Kirishima's school.

Ichika comes with plenty of optional parts to play with - she comes with both her standard glasses as well as misted-up glasses to display her in a more flustered pose. Rinon, the mysterious creature that accompanied her to Earth is also included along with the suitcase that was used as a transmission device in the series. She even comes with the two puppets that appeared in Kaito's daydreams as well as the ray gun that was used during the filming of a movie in the series!
name: Nendoroid Ichika Takatsuki (ねんどろいど たかつきいちか)

subtitle: The sharp-tongued superintendent of The Mystic Archives of Dantalian.
description: From 'Dantalian no Shoka' comes a figure of the young Dalian, sculpted in a very peaceful pose reading one of her beloved books.

She is posed sitting on the floor with her huge skirt and long hair both flowing down to the ground. Even though she has a book is in front of her, she is looking up showing off her beautiful face - an innocent expression that hides the abusive language that is bound to come out at any second!
name: Dalian (だりあん)
copyright: ©2011三雲岳斗・Ｇユウスケ・角川書店／ダンタリアンの書架製作委員会

Be sure to grab the previously released Twin Pack characters - Yozora Mikaduki, Maria Takayama, Sena Kawashizaki and Kobato Hasegawa so that you can keep the Neighbor's Club by your side wherever and whenever you like!

This earphone jack features the mysterious creature known as 'wooser' from the series! Simply attach it to your cellphone and carry wooser around with you wherever you go!
name: wooser Earphone Jack (うーさー いやほんじゃっく)

subtitle: "In order for me to remain as myself... I will destroy you, KOS-MOS!"
description: From 'Xenosaga Episode 3: Also sprach Zarathustra' comes a figma of T-elos, the anti-Gnosis combat android that targets KOS-MOS!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including an emotionless expression, a confident expression and a shouting expression for combat scenes.
She also comes with a handgun, the beam sword that attaches to her left arm and an alternate visor part to display her with her visor down.
A replaceable chest part allows you to pose her making use of her Phase Transfer Cannon.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma T-elos (ふぃぐま てろす)

subtitle: The iron warrior, Ambush.
description: From the film, 'Real Steel' comes a figure of Ambush, the robot used at the start of the film my the main character, Charlie. Ambush's body is covered in catches and dents as a sign of the countless fights he has participated in, and the paintwork on the figure gives off an unbelievably realistic iron look for fans of the film to enjoy!
name: REAL STEEL: AMBUSH (りある・すてぃーる あんぶっしゅ)
copyright: "Real Steel" is a trademark and copyright of DreamWorks II Distribution Co., LLC. All rights reserved.This product is manufactured by ThreeA under license from DreamWorks II Distribution Co., LLC.

subtitle: "Please, use me."
description: From the anime series "Guilty Crown" comes a 1/8th scale of the Undertaker's member, EGOIST's vocalist and heroine of the series - Inori Yuzuriha.

The figure is based on an illustration by the original character designer of the series, redjuice. She is posed with an innocent expression on her face and great care has been put into sculpting her beautiful body-line and delicate appearance. The outfit she wore from the series has also been faithfully reproduced in figure form and along with the dynamic posing of the figure, it makes her look like a beautiful goldfish, elegantly swimming through the air.
name: Inori Yuzuriha (ゆずりはいのり)
copyright: ©ギルティクラウン製作委員会

subtitle: "I ask of you, are you my master?"
description: From Fate/Zero comes a figma of Saber, being rereleased to coincide with the release of ex:ride Spride.05 : Saber Motored Cuirassier.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes three different expressions, including a standard face, a gallant shouting face and her elusive smiling face.
Both Excalibur and Avalon, her two noble phantasms are included. A second version of Excalibur in its "Invisible Air" form is also included.
She comes with alternate hair parts, as well as special effect parts for her swords for even more dynamic poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Saber: Zero ver. (ふぃぐま せいばー ぜろ ver.)

subtitle: The elegant, but sometimes eccentric young lady!
description: From the popular anime, 'Persona 4' comes a figma of elegant, introverted girl - Yukiko Amagi!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: a standard smiling face, a shouting face for action scenes and an embarrassed face.
She comes with her own glasses, as well as the gag glasses that she wears in the series.
The fan she uses as a weapon in included, along with effect parts to display her swinging it.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yukiko Amagi (ふぃぐま あまぎゆきこ)
copyright: ©Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: The other idols are coming on stage!
description: From the popular idol production game, 'THE IDOLM@STER 2' comes a second set of the adorable idols to join the Nendoroid Petite series of figures.

This set features Miki Hoshii, Iori Minase, Yukiho Hagiwara, Azusa Miura, Ami Futami, Hibiki Ganaha and one secret character all wearing the same lovely outfits from Stage 01! Be sure to display them together with the characters from Stage 01 for a complete performance!
name: Nendoroid Petite : THE IDOLM@STER - Stage 02 (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー２ すてーじ02)

subtitle: An ex:ride of the super-fast bike used by Saber!
description: The 'Saber Motored Cuirassier', Saber's motorbike from the series 'Fate/Zero' is joining the ex:ride figma vehicle series!

All the details that give the motorbike its unique curved design have all been faithfully shrunk down to figma form, and the bike has a realistic metal appearance even in figma size! Display the already released 'figma Saber : Zero ver.' riding the motorbike to recreate your favorite scenes from the series!
name: ex:ride Spride.05 : Saber Motored Cuirassier (えくすらいど えすぴーらいど.05 せいばー・もーたーど・きゅいらっしぇ)

subtitle: Both miracles and magic exist!
description: figma Sayaka Miki from the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' is being rereleased!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions, including a standard face, a shouting face and a worried face.
Her mantle is included in both a PVC version and a cloth version allowing for more poses. Just pick the right one for the situation!
She also comes with her eight swords, all each with their own miniature stand. You can display them all out in front of her to recreate a battle scene.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Sayaka Miki (ふぃぐま みきさやか)

subtitle: "I guess we don't need to hold back anymore. Let's do this the flashy way!"
description: figma Kyouko Sakura from the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' is being rereleased!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a shouting expression and a bold grinning expression while eating a treat.
Her spear is also included in two different versions, a long straight version and a disjointed version which can be posed in various ways.
She also comes with her beloved treats - a taiyaki and her 'Rocky' busicuit sticks. She also has en extra arm part to hold Kyubey up.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kyouko Sakura (ふぃぐま さくらきょうこ)

subtitle: The Comiket products will also be available for online order!
description: This product was originally scheduled to only be on sale at the Bushiroad booth at the 2012 Summer Comic Market, but will now also be available to order online! Those who can't make their way to the event can still get hold of the goods!

The fabric and buttons are better quality than the previous years shirts. They are made from 100% cotton which is gentle to the skin and make use of wooden buttons for a fresh look. The design features Kokoro Akechi, so your IQ is sure to skyrocket just by wearing the shirt!!
Due to the way the shirts are made, the position of the print on each shirt may differ. Please note that you cannot select a specific position for the print.
name: Detective Opera Milky Holmes: Character Aloha Shirt ver. KOKORO (たんていおぺらみるきぃほーむず きゃらくたーあろは2012 ver.KOKORO)

subtitle: The popular shirt from 2011's Summer Comiket is coming back again!
description: Ever since this product went on sale at the 2011 Summer Comiket, fans have been asking for a rerelease - and now it's finally here! Plus it will also be available for order online! The shirt features the same popular pattern as before, while the fabric and buttons have been upgraded into a 2012 version!

The design has a very tropical feeling about it with the Milky Holmes girls subtly dotted around, creating a shirt that you could easily wear out and about! The shirt will be available in either an M or L size. Due to the way the shirts are made, the position of the print on each shirt may differ. Please note that you cannot select a specific position for the print.
name: Detective Opera Milky Holmes : Character Aloha Shirt 2011 Remake (たんていおぺらみるきぃほーむず きゃらくたーあろは2011 Remake)

subtitle: Don't forget your secret invitation! (and some presents!)
description: From the CG anime with an impressive fan-base, 'gdgd Fairies' comes a figure set of the three fairies from the show - pkpk, shrshr and krkr!

The figures are made directly from the 3DCG data used in the anime, and then painted with the same vivid colors that the anime is known for. Each of them also comes with a replaceable expression from the series, and the package the figures come in can be used with the included papercraft to create a diorama of the House in the Forest that the fairies stay in!
name: Triple Pack : gdgd Fairies (ぐだぐだふぇありーず)

subtitle: The cute creature that is parasitic for some reason or another!
description: wooser will be starring in the TV animation 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life', with full 3D animation by Sanzigen and voice acting by Mamoru Miyano! The series will be broadcast on TV Tokyo from the 2nd October and will also be shown on niconico Douga!

From that upcoming series comes a plushie of the somewhat hidden character, Darth wooser. The yellow beasts are finally joining the animated world, but there will be much more of them to enjoy coming up soon!
name: Darth wooser Puchi Plushie (だすうさぬいぐるみ ぷち)

subtitle: Nendoroid Miku is back again, wearing a traditional Japanese yukata!
description: From the 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing a yukata!

The same cute Miku we've all come to love is wearing a dark blue yukata with beautiful flower prints scattered along it, creating a very refreshing version of Miku for the hot summer months! She comes with three expressions including her standard smiling expression, a shy expression with a slight blush and an exited expression with sparkling eyes. She also comes with a fan and a pouch that suit her yukata perfectly!
This Nendoroid will be available at the 39's CARAVAN Hakkeijima Event Hall, and will be available for order online at the GSC Online Shop! http:www.mikuevent.com/pc/
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku : Yukata Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく ゆかたver.)

subtitle: Let the cheer reach everyone!
description: The final product to join the Cheerful JAPAN! charity project is a 1/8th scale figure based on the winning illustration from the Cheerful JAPAN! feat. Miku Hatsune Cheerful Illustration Contest. The illustration was titled 'Cheer Up!!', and was illustrated by bun150. She is wearing a cheerful cheerleader's outfit, and has a huge smile across her face to help spread the cheer all over the world!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥2000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Miku Hatsune : Cheerful Ver. (はつねみく ちあふる Ver.)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the Black King!
description: From the popular anime series 'Accel World' comes a Nendoroid if the student council vice-president surrounded in mystery - Kuroyukihime posed in her standard avatar form featuring her lovely black butterfly wings.

She comes with three expressions including a standard face, the smiling face she sometimes and a pouting face for whenever she is feeling jealous. She is wearing a lovely jet black dress with a matching parasol included both open and closed allowing you to decide how to display her. Haruyuki is also included in his standard avatar form - an adorable pink pig!
name: Nendoroid Kuroyukihime (ねんどろいど くろゆきひめ)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: "A message to all you who will never amount to anything!"
description: From the anime 'Mawaru Penguindrum' comes a Nendoroid of the mysterious character that Himari changed into when she put on the penguin hat - The Princess of the Crystal! She comes with three expressions, including her standard composed expression, a shouting face and a face with closed eyes.

Penguin number one, two and three are included, and she can even be posed standing on top of their heads! The skirt, scarf and frilly parts on her arms can all be removed allowing you to pose her all the stages of the famous transformation scene as well!
name: Nendoroid Princess of the Crystal (ねんどろいど ぷりんせす・おぶ・ざ・くりすたる)
copyright: ©イクニチャウダー/ピングループ

subtitle: The alternate, darker version of Annelotte!
description: From the anime series 'Queen's Blade Rebellion' comes a Nendoroid of the Knight Princess and leader of the Rebel Army, Annelotte - this time in a much darker form that before!
name: Nendoroid Annelotte : Dark Knight Ver. (ねんどろいど あんねろって きょうきしVer.)
copyright: © 2012 HobbyJAPAN/QBリベリオンパートナーズ

subtitle: A corrupt heart hidden behind an adorable appearance!
description: wooser will be starring in the TV animation 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life', with full 3D animation by Sanzigen and voice acting by Mamoru Miyano! The series will be broadcast on TV Tokyo from the 2nd October and will also be shown on niconico Douga!

This plushie is of the mysterious creature known as wooser, the main character of this upcoming story! The yellow beast is finally joining the animated world, but there will be much more of him to enjoy coming up soon!
name: wooser Puchi Plushie (うーさーぬいぐるみ ぷち)

subtitle: A cute sitting pose that fits in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime series 'Nichijou' comes a new addition to Penguin Parade's Pentanko series of figures - the robotic high-school student that lives in the Shinonome Research Labs, Nano Shinonome!
The Pentanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Nano Shinonome (ぺたんこ しののめなの)
copyright: ©あらゐけいいち・角川書店／東雲研究所

subtitle: A cute sitting pose that fits in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime series 'Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu' comes a new addition to Penguin Parade's Pentanko series of figures - the student from Fumizuki Academy's 2-F class who is often mistaken for a girl, Hideyoshi Kinoshita!
The Pentanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Hideyoshi Kinoshita (ぺたんこ きのしたひでよし)
series: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu: Ni!
copyright: ©2011 Kenji Inoue／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN, INC.／バカとテストと召喚獣2製作委員会

subtitle: The Puella Magi who fights for what she believes in!
description: From the anime series that received a number of awards in 2011, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of the Puella Magi with a red ponytail - Kyouko Sakura. She is posed equipped with her spear in a dynamic pose that looks ready to jump to life at any moment!

She also comes with replaceable arm parts that allow you to pose her without the spear, instead holding one of her favorite foods - a taiyaki. Be sure to display her with all the previous figures to fully recreate the Madoka Magica universe.
name: Kyouko Sakura (さくらきょうこ)

subtitle: Includes a limited edition Madoka Magica Online item code!
description: From the hit anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a set of two Nendoroid Petites as an extension set to add to the original Madoka Nendoroid Petites! This first extension set features the 'Dessert Witch' Charlotte in both its cuter first form and second form.

The set also includes a code that will allow you to unlock two limited items in the Puella Magi Madoka Magica Online game - the 'Dessert Witch's Hat' and 'Dessert Witch Doll'. There is no other way to get hold of these two items in game, so don't miss out!
Puella Magi Madoka Magica Online http:mm.my-gg.com/
name: Nendoroid Petite: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Extension Set 01 (ねんどろいどぷち まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか えくすてんしょんせっと01)

subtitle: Experience that faithful Summer once again...
description: From 'Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day' comes a 1/7th scale of the heroine of the series, Meiko Honma! She is wearing a swimsuit in a cute pose based on a special illustration created for Comiket 80 goods.

Careful attention has been given to all the smallest details on the figure, such as the hibiscus flower in her hair or the 'wise words' that were originally found on Jin-tan's T-shirts, but are now written all over her swimming tube! She is wearing an adorable two-piece swimsuit while treating herself to an ice cream, as she enjoys a beautiful summer day at the beach!
name: Meiko Honma (ほんまめいこ)
series: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day

subtitle: The beautiful leader of the Rebel Army!
description: From the TV anime series, 'Queen's Blade Rebellion' comes a Nendoroid of the Knight Princess and leader of the Rebel Army, Annelotte!

She comes with two expressions - a smiling face and an angry face. You can also pose her ready to fight her enemies with her sword known as Grim Venus as well as the shield she carries into battle. Recreate all your favorite scenes of the brave Annelotte in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Annelotte (ねんどろいど あんねろって)
copyright: ©2012 HobbyJAPAN/QBリベリオンパートナーズ

subtitle: "...may I stay by your side, forever?"
description: From the anime 'Guilty Crown' comes a figma of the mysterious heroine, Inori Yuzuriha!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, a singing face and a face with closed eyes.
She also comes with the two pistols she used during her Undertaker's activities.
Her little robotic helper, Funell is also included to help recreate more scenes from the show.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Inori Yuzuriha (ふぃぐま ゆずりはいのり)
copyright: ©ギルティクラウン製作委員会

subtitle: A lovely big figure of the assertive young princess!
description: From the PC game, 'sekirara' comes a figure of the fun-loving Aya Kagura!

The pose is taken directly from the game, and shows Aya in a very assertive pose as a lovely 1/7th scale figure. The figure has been carefully sculpted to look as if a gust is blowing across her, making her hair and skirt flutter about in the wind. Careful attention has also been given to her beautiful uniform, which is made to look exactly as it did in the game!
name: Aya Kagura (かぐらあや)
copyright: ©se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: "I have no interest in justice. It cannot save the world."
description: From the popular anime 'Fate/Zero' comes a figma of the 'Magus Killer', Kiritsugu Emiya!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with three expressions: a calm expression with a cigarette in his mouth, a serious expression for combat and the smiling face he rarely shows.
He comes with a variety of weapons he used in the Holy Grail War, including the Walther WA 2000, Calico M950 and his Thompson Contender.
A replaceable arm to pose him with his hand in his pocket is included, as well as effect parts that connect to the gun barrels to display him shooting.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kiritsugu Emiya (ふぃぐま えみやきりつぐ)

subtitle: The second set of Neighbor's Club members to join the Twin Pack series!
description: From the popular light novel series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a set of two blond cuties - Sena Kashiwazaki & Kobato Hasegawa!

Sena's beautiful figure has been carefully sculpted leaving her as glamorous as always, while Kobato is seated on the floor hugging the plushie rabbit that she always carries around with her. The third Twin Pack is in production and will feature Rika Shiguma and Yukimura Kusunoki. Collect them all together and enjoy the company of the Neighbor's Club whenever you like!
name: Twin Pack: Sena Kashiwazaki & Kobato Hasegawa (ついんぱっく かしわざきせな＆はせがわこばと)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: Producer! We're getting decals! Decals!!
description: From the anime 'iDOLM@STER' comes a set of water-application decals featuring various illustrations of the lovely idols! You can change your favorite model car into an itasha of the series, or apply them on anything else to easily create some iDOLM@STER themed goods!
The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 044: iDOLM@STER (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる044 あいどるますたー)

subtitle: The foolish angel with a lovely body has fallen from the heavens... wearing a bunnygirl outfit!
description: From the popular movie of 'Sora no Otoshimono' comes a huge 1/4th scale figure of the Close Combat Angeloid, Type Delta - Astraea!

Astraea is wearing a sexy bunny outfit with her brilliant wings opened up behind her and her long blond twin-tails reaching all the way down to her ankles. Just like the Ikaros figure before her, the net tights on her legs are made from real material for a realistic appearance and feel. She is posed in a very alluring pose, leaning forward to show off her impressive breasts with a mischievous wink - a pose that will charm almost anyone into falling for her!
name: Astraea : Bunny Ver. (あすとれあばにーVer.)
series: Sora no Otoshimono the Movie: The Angeloid of Clockwork
copyright: ©2011 水無月すう／角川書店／新大陸発見部 ©2011 Suu Minazuki／Kadokawashoten／Solaoto Movie Partners

subtitle: "My power can be used to help someone? Then count me in!"
description: From the anime 'Senki Zesshou Symphogear' comes a figma of the main character from the series, Hibiki Tachibana!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Four expressions are included: a bright smiling face, a shouting face for combat, a singing face for equipping her Gear and a frenzied face.
She comes with alternate legs, alternate arms and effect parts to help create all sorts of scenes from the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hibiki Tachibana (ふぃぐま たちばなひびき)

subtitle: "There are things I want to protect as well!"
description: From the anime series, 'Senki Zesshou Symphogear' comes a Nendoroid of the cheerful Hibiki Tachibana!

She comes with various optional parts including a combat expression and fighting effect parts to recreate the amazing combat scenes from the series all in Nendoroid size! She also comes with a frenzied face, the huge sword known as Durandal and even a little figure of one of the 'Noise', allowing you to pose her together with an opponent in battle!
name: Nendoroid Hibiki Tachibana (ねんどろいど たちばなひびき)

subtitle: The world-famous band is joining the Nendoroid world.
description: LINKIN PARK, the rock band that has sold over 50 million albums and boasts popularity worldwide, is joining the cute Nendoroid Petite series of action figures.

Each of the band members is posed as if they were in the middle of a live performance, with careful detail given to each of their characteristics, expressions and even their instruments. They come with a standard Nendoroid Petite stand as well as a special stage pedestal that lets you display the entire band together. Enjoy LINKIN PARK performing in a way you've never seen them before.
You can read the 'A Thousand Horizons' event report here: http:gscmikatan.wordpress.com/2011/09/12/linkin-park-x-good-smile-a-thousand-horizons-event/
name: Nendoroid Petite : LINKIN PARK Set (ねんどろいどぷち りんきん ぱーく せっと)

subtitle: Gallantly riding into the Nendoroid world on his eggplant!
description: The popular virtual vocalist 'Gackpo Kamui' is joining the Nendoroids!

He comes with a variety of optional parts including his sword 'Gakutou Mifuri' and a singing expression that allow you to recreate the illustration from the original packaging. He also comes with a feudal lord expression and an eggplant so that you can display him riding valiantly on his eggplant mount!
name: Nendoroid Gackpo Kamui (ねんどろいど かむいがくぽ)
copyright: ©2012 INTERNET Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.

subtitle: The Vocaloid characters are joining in on the Summer Festivals!
description: Cute rubber straps based on Sanpachi's illustrations of the Vocaloid characters in yukatas will be on sale at 2012 Summer events! Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, MEIKO and KAITO will all be available as straps to hang wherever you like!
This product will be available at the 39's CARAVAN Hakkeijima Event Hall, and will then be available for order online at the GSC Online Shop! http:www.mikuevent.com/pc/
name: Rubber Straps: Vocaloid Yukata Ver. (らばーすとらっぷ 【ぼーかろいど ゆかたVer.】)
copyright:
© Crypton Future Medea.Inc www.crypton.net
illustration by Sanpachi

subtitle: A new friend is coming to join the Nendoroids!
description: From the PSP game 'Milky Holmes 2' comes an adorable Nendoroid of Kokoro Akechi!
name: Nendoroid Kokoro Akechi (ねんどろいど あけちこころ)

subtitle: The little sister of the Scarlet Devil Mansion is being rereleased!
description: The much anticipated rerelease of Flandre Scarlet from the Touhou Project Nendoroid series is on its way!

She comes with three expressions including her standard expression, a childish, innocent smiling expression as well as the grinning expression that shows off her devious intentions to destroy everything around her. Her trademark wings are also included, shining with all the vibrant colors of the rainbow!
Display her with her elder sister Remilia, and recreate the sibling rivalry of the adorable Scarlet sisters!
name: Nendoroid Flandre Scarlet (ねんどろいど ふらんどーる・すかーれっと)

subtitle: The Neighbor's Club is joining the Twin Pack series!
description: From the popular light novel series, 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a set of two figures - one of Yozora Mikaduki, the cold-hearted president of the Neighbor's Club and the other of Maria Takayama, the young supervising teacher of the Neighbors Club!

Yozora is posed folding her arms in a pose that fans will know very well, while Maria is seated on the floor munching on some of her favorite potato chips. The second set is already in production and will include figures of both Sena Kashiwazaki and Kobato Hasegawa. Collect them all together and enjoy the company of the Neighbor's Club whenever you like!
name: Twin Pack : Yozora Mikaduki & Maria Takayama (ついんぱっく みかづきよぞら＆たかやままりあ)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: The heir to the spiritual power of the Shinguji family.
description: From the popular series 'Sakura Wars' comes a Nendoroid of the heroine in the Flower Division of the Imperial Assault Force - Sakura Shinguji, along with a Nendoroid sized version of her Koubu Unit.

Sakura comes with a standard confident expression, as well a a smiling expression for a gentler appearance, and an angry expression for combat scenes. She also comes with her Father's sword, Reiken-Arataka, as well as a scabbard for the sword. The Koubu unit has an hatch on the top which can be opened to allow Sakura to get inside and be posed riding the unit.
name: Nendoroid Sakura Shinguji & Koubu Set (ねんどろいど しんぐうじさくら＆こうぶせっと)

subtitle: A collaboration between Miku and FamilyMart!
description: The popular character lot draws at FamilyMart will feature Hatsune Miku starting in August with a special campaign titled 'Happy Lots Hatsune Miku', which will be be running at all FamilyMart Convenience Stores!

If you're lucky enough to draw the B prize, you'll get your hands on this lovely Nendoroid of Miku dressed up in the FamilyMart staff uniform! Plus she also comes with one of FamilyMart's most popular products, the 'Family Chicken' as an optional extra, as well as parts that allow you to pose her welcoming new customers to the store!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku : FamilyMart Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく ふぁみりーまーと Ver.)

subtitle: A collaboration between Miku and FamilyMart!
description: The popular character lot draws at FamilyMart will feature Hatsune Miku starting in August with a special campaign titled 'Happy Lots Hatsune Miku', which will be be running at all FamilyMart Convenience Stores!

If you're lucky enough to draw the A prize, then you'll get your hands on this 1/8th scale figure of Miku dressed up in the FamilyMart staff uniform! She will only be available as a prize from this campaign, so don't miss out!
name: Hatsune Miku : FamilyMart Ver. (はつねみく ふぁみりーまーと Ver.)

subtitle: Racing Miku 2012 is joining the GSR decal series!
description: The newest version of Racing Miku illustrated by GAN is joining the GSR Character Customize Series!

You can change your favorite model car into a Racing Miku themed car to match the official cars! The decals are made in Japan with silk-screen printing, making them durable with vibrant color that will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 045: GSR Hatsune Miku BMW (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる045／GSR はつねみく BMW)

subtitle: A cute sitting pose that fits in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular series that aired during the noitaminA anime block, 'Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day' comes a figure of Naruko Anjou dressed in her school uniform, here to join Penguin Parade's Pentanko figure series.
The Pentanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Naruko Anjou (ぺたんこ あんじょうなるこ せいふくver.)
series: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day

subtitle: Huge stickers of Racing Miku 2012!
description: The newest Racing Miku illustrated by GAN is joining the Character Customize Series Sticker Sets - an A3 sheet filled with huge stickers of the 2012 Racing Miku!

You can use the stickers to change your own car or motorbike into a Racing Miku themed vehicle, or stick them on anything else that you think needs some Racing Miku flair! You can even create your own custom cheering goods for the GSR team!
The stickers stick onto most surfaces with ease, and are made from high quality materials to endure the weather and ensure the color will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Big Sticker Set 006: GSR Hatsune Miku BMW (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーずびっぐさいずすてっかー006／GSR はつねみく BMW)

subtitle: "A message to all you who will never amount to anything!"
description: From 'Mawaru Penguindrum' comes a set of trading rubber straps of all the popular character of the series, specially illustrated as adorable Nendoroid designs! There are a total of ten different straps including two secret straps. (Please note that one box of straps may not include all the variations.)
name: Nendoroid Plus Trading Rubber Straps: Mawaru Penguindrum (ねんどろいどぷらす とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ【まわるぴんぐどらむ】)
copyright: Images are for illustrative purposes only and may differ from the final product.© イクニチャウダー／ピングループ

subtitle: The unusual life of the Nichijou girls in Nendoroid form!
description: From the popular anime that is now showing on NHK Educational TV, 'Nichijou' comes a Nendoroid of Nano Shinonome, the robot high-school student who lives in the Shinonome Laboratory.

She comes with a load of extra parts to change her standard hands - a shark hand, a swiss cake, a chikuwa and even a machine gun. She also comes with three expressions, including a smiling face, a crying face and an exited face. Parts that allow her kneeling are also included, giving you even more options to recreate Nano's very unusual everyday life! It's the start of Rock 'n' Roll!
name: Nendoroid Nano Shinonome (ねんどろいど しののめなの)
copyright: ©あらゐけいいち・角川書店／東雲研究所

subtitle: The high-achieving, although somewhat silly supervisor of the Neighbor's Club!
description: From the popular anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai', comes a 1/7th scale PVC figure of the small nun who takes the role of the Neighbor's Club supervisor. She is posed in a cat-like pose wearing a lovely blue leotard with adorable cat ears. She has her head tilted slightly, with an innocent smile beaming across her face - really showing off her cute side.
Be sure to display her with the Kobato Hasegawa figure that will be released at the same time to complete to joint pose between the two figures!
name: Maria Takayama (たかやままりあ)
copyright: ©2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: Kodaka's attention-seeking younger sister!
description: From the popular anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai', comes a 1/7th scale PVC figure of Kodaka's younger sister with a love for darkness and vampires, Kobato Hasegawa! She is posed in an outfit quite different to her normal goth-loli fashion, wearing a black leotard with cat ears and a tail! Her eye brows are bent with a fascinated expression across her face that really captures her adorable charm.
Be sure to display her with the Maria Takayama figure that will be released at the same time to complete to joint pose between the two figures!
name: Kobato Hasegawa (はせがわこばと)
copyright: ©2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: A cute sitting pose that fits in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular series that aired during the noitaminA anime block, 'Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day' comes a figure of Meiko Honma to join Penguin Parade's Pentanko figure series.
The Pentanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Meiko Honma (ぺたんこ ほんまめいこ)
series: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day

subtitle: Beyond this universe...
description: From the TV anime that aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block, 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of the main character, Black Rock Shooter herself!

She comes with a variety of optional parts - from the much expected blue flame over her eye to an additional head part to display her wearing a hood, allowing you to recreate the hooded scene from the series. She also comes with a variety of weapons including the Rock Cannon in both its standard form and Gatling form, as well as the Black Blade. Enjoy the epic battles of Black Rock Shooter in Nendoroid size, whenever you like!
name: Nendoroid Black Rock Shooter : TV ANIMATION Ver. (ねんどろいど ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー TV ANIMATION Ver.)

subtitle: The clumsy young girl who controls Kukuri.
description: From the anime 'Kamisama Dolls' comes a figure of Utao Kuga, the Seki that controls the doll named Kukuri.

Utao is posed on her knees wearing a lovely red and white shine maiden outfit and hugging a small plushie-sized version of Kukuri. The shine maiden outfit can also be completely removed and with the addition of some included extra parts you can choose to pose her in a school swimsuit instead! Enjoy the company of the adorable Utao in whichever outfit you prefer!
name: Utao Kuga (くがうたお)
copyright: ©2011 やまむらはじめ・小学館／案山子保存協会・テレビ東京

subtitle: A wish upon a star shooting through the darkness.
description: From the anime series 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a figma of Mato's existence in the alternate world - Black Rock Shooter.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, as well as a more focused, glaring expression.
She also comes with her Rock Cannon and Black Blade to battle against her enemies.
She comes with additional head parts that let you pose her without her hood, as well as a fringe part with the blue flame over her eye.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Black Rock Shooter: TV ANIMATION ver. (figma ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー TV ANIMATION ver.)

subtitle: The adorable idol of the professional baseball world!
description: The official mascot character of the Orix Buffaloes' baseball team is joining the figma line-up!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Buffalo Bell's adorable appearance has been faithfully reproduced for fans to enjoy.
You can pose her supporting the team with the included team flag and pompons!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Buffalo Bell (ふぃぐま ばふぁろーべる)

subtitle: A hero of justice... even if he doesn't act like one!
description: From 'Astro Fighter Sunred' comes a figma of Sunred! The main character who battles against the evils of the world such as the members of Florsheim's Kawasaki Branch!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
His shirt and shorts are made from real cloth.
He comes with various key items from the series, including a hand holding a cigarette, a packet from the gyuudon shop, a fishing rod and can of beer.
He also comes with his gun, 'Sunshoot', along with the AC adapter he uses to charge it in the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
Display him together with figma General Vamp and the Animal Soldier Set to bring the Astro Fighter Sunred world together!
name: figma Sunred (ふぃぐま さんれっど)
copyright: © くぼたまこと/スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: "I don't know everything. Just the things I know."
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a figma of Tsubasa Hanekawa, the girl possessed by a cat!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a gentle smiling face, an upset face and a playful winking face.
Optional parts include a book and a replaceable fringe part with cat ears.
You can choose to pose her with twin braids, a single strand of braided hair or with short hair.
Her glasses can be used with any of the hairstyles, or you can display her without glasses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsubasa Hanekawa (ふぃぐま はねかわつばさ)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: Shall we initiate the survival strategy?
description: From the popular anime series, 'Mawaru Penguin Drum' comes a figma of the Princess of the Crystal - the mysterious personality that takes over Himari Takakura's body whenever she puts on the penguin hat!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a condescending expression befitting of a princess and a shouting face to pose her in her signature pose.
The three penguins are included and can carry the Princess on their heads. They also comes with insecticide and a hand mirror as optional parts.
She comes with different arms and an extra skirt part, allowing you to pose her without her entire outfit.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Princess of the Crystal (ふぃぐま ぷりんせす・おぶ・ざ・くりすたる)
copyright: © イクニチャウダー/ピングループ

subtitle: The head maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion is being rereleased!
description: The much anticipated rerelease of Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project Nendoroid series is on its way!

Sakuya comes with three expression parts, a tea-set and a knife as extra parts, allowing you to pose her in a variety of different ways. Pose her working hard as a maid in the mansion, or instead pose her in battle, ready to throw her knives! It's a Nendoroid that any Touhou Project fan is bound to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Sakuya Izayoi (ねんどろいど いざよいさくや)

subtitle: The 501st Joint Fighter Wing's nocturnal guardian.
description: From the popular anime series, 'Strike Witches' comes a figma of Sanya V. Litvyak, the night-watch who specializes in combat during the hours of darkness!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a glaring expression for combat scenes and an expression with closed eyes for her patrol route.
Her Striker Unit is included, along with the ears and a tail for using it. She also comes with a rocket launcher and effect parts to display it firing.
Additional parts are also included to recreate the patrol radar she used during her night-watch.
A replaceable shift:body part with detailed sculpting on her pants is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Sanya V. Litvyak (ふぃぐま さーにゃ・V・りとう゛ゃく)

subtitle: A beautiful angel has fallen from the heavens... wearing a bunnygirl outfit!
description: From the popular anime series and movie, 'Sora no Otoshimono' comes a huge 1/4th scale figure of the Strategic Battle-Class Angeloid, Type Alpha - Ikaros!

Ikaros is wearing a sexy bunny girl outfit, with her twin-tailed hair sculpted beautifully with a long red ribbon winding around it. The net tights on her legs are made from real material for a very realistic appearance and feel, and she is posed with her hands interlocked as if making a wish the the heavens, with a relaxed expression across her face to calm you down on even the most stressful of days!
name: Ikaros : Bunny Ver. (いかろすばにーVer.)
series: Sora no Otoshimono the Movie: The Angeloid of Clockwork
copyright: © 2011 水無月すう／角川書店／新大陸発見部 © 2011 Suu Minazuki／Kadokawashoten／Solaoto Movie Partners

subtitle: The curtain of fate has opened once more!
description: With Fate/Zero's second season underway the ever Fate series is as popular as ever, and now the characters from Fate/stay night's fan disc, Fate/hollow ataraxia are coming to join the Nendoroid Petite series!

The set includes Saber, Rin Tohsaka, Sakura Matou and Rider all wearing adorable maid outfits, along with figures of Illya, Caren, Taiga Fujimura, Bazett, Leysritt, Stheno, Saber Alter and even one secret character that you can get your hands on. Enjoy the quest for yet another Holy Grail in the cutest form possible!
name: Nendoroid Petite : Fate/hollow ataraxia (ねんどろいどぷち ふぇいと/ほろう あたらくしあ)

subtitle: Yamada has arrived, and she wants someone to spoil her!
description: From the popular anime series, 'WORKING!!' comes another Nendoroid to join the Wagnaria staff, Aoi Yamada!

She comes with three expressions including an astonished face, a smiling face and a crying face. She also comes with various optional parts including a plate for her to hold and a broken plate... to show that she is the queen of breaking things! An attic door to attach to the ceiling is included along with extra hair parts to pose her hanging upside down - allowing you to recreate the scene where she pokes her head out of the attic!
Wagnaria's troublemaker is here for everyone to bring into their own homes, where you can watch over her and spoil her however you wish!
name: Nendoroid Aoi Yamada (ねんどろいど やまだあおい)
copyright: ©高津カリノ／スクウェアエニックス・「WORKING!!」製作委員会

subtitle: The youngest Bracer, with a personality as bright as the sun!
description: From the popular game that has become an OVA, 'Trails in the Sky : THE ANIMATION', comes a Nendoroid of the heroine of the series - the young Bracer, Estelle Bright. She is wearing the from 'Trails in the Sky: Second Chapter', which was also the setting for the anime version.

Estelle comes with a variety of extra parts that let you pose her ready for combat, including her staff and an orbment. She also comes with a depressed expression and harmonica to recreate the touching scene where she plays her brother Joshua's harmonica.
name: Nendoroid Estelle Bright (ねんどろいど えすてる・ぶらいと)
series: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky - Second Chapter

subtitle: A Nendoroid set of Nanoha & Fate, both in their school uniforms!
description: From the popular series with its second film fast approaching, 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha', comes a Nendoroid set of both Nanoha and Fate wearing their school uniforms!

Both Nanoha and Fate each come with a standard smiling expression as well as another smiling expression where they are both tearing up. They also come with extra parts that allow you to display them holding the animal forms of Yuuno and Arf! They also each come with their intelligent devices as well as school bags.
name: Nendoroid Nanoha Takamachi & Fate Testarossa : Seishoudai Primary School Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど たかまちなのは&ふぇいと・てすたろっさ しりつせいしょうだいふぞくしょうがっこうVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: Easy to pose and still adorable! Buffalo Bell is back wearing her visitor's outfit!
description: The adorable official mascot of the Orix Buffaloes, 'Buffalo Bell' is back again as a special visitor version!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Every part of the lovable Buffalo Bell has been faithfully reproduced in figma form.
Her beloved baseball glove and the miniature baseball bats she uses to cheer for the team are also included.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Buffalo Bell: Visitor ver. (figma ばふぁろーべる びじたーver.)

subtitle: The fully posable Saber is back with shiny armor!!
description: In commemoration of TYPE-MOON's 10th anniversary, Nendoroid Saber : Super Movable Edition is coming back with a new effect applied to her armor, giving it a shinier and more metallic appearance!

She comes with three expressions: a smiling face, an angry face and even a face in mid-tantrum. But that is not all - she also comes with her swords Excalibur and Caliburn, as well as replaceable parts to recreate the sword in its "Invisible Air" form. It's still the same adorable Nendoroid, but the Super Movable edition allows you to recreate even more of your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Saber : 10th ANNIVERSARY Edition (ねんどろいど せいばー 10th ANNIVERSARY・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: Insane Black Rock Shooter is joining the Nendoroid world!
description: From the anime series that aired on Fuji TV's noitaminA block, 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of the more psychotic version of Black Rock Shooter that played a big role in the series - Insane Black Rock Shooter.

She includes a number of weapons including the huge 'Insane Cannon Lance' as well as the 'Insane Blade Claw' allowing you to recreate your favorite battle scenes from the show. She might be a lot smaller and cuter than the original - but she keeps all the characteristics that made her unique, even as a Nendoroid!
name: Nendoroid Insane Black Rock Shooter

subtitle: Another Vocaloid figure based on Tony's illustrations!
description: Luka is joining the Vocaloid figure collection based on popular illustrator Tony's works, following on from the previously released figure of Miku Hatsune!

The unique transparent coloring and soft look of Tony's illustration has all been faithfully reproduced in figure form. She is also posed in a lovely sexy pose that shows off her unique charms! Enjoy Tony's lovely illustration in figure form, allowing you to see her from all the angles you could never see from the illustration!
name: Megurine Luka: Tony Ver. (めぐりねるか Tony ver.)

subtitle: "I was talking to my friend. My imaginary friend!"
description: From the popular light novel, 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai', comes a 1/7th scale figure of the main heroine from the show who has a wonderful appearance, but a rather dislikable personality - Yozora Mikaduki.

The figure brings out her stunning good looks, and is posed with crossed arms and an expression that really brings out her personality as well. She might have a disappointed expression across her face, but fans of the series certainly won't be disappointed by this figure!
name: Yozora Mikaduki (みかづきよぞら)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: The manga serialized in YOUNG GANGAN has become an anime series and Nendoroid!
description: The anime that is currently available to watch online, '+TIC ELDER SISTER' is going on sale on BD and DVD with new episodes. The BD/DVD set will also comes with a Nendoroid Nee-san! The set will contain a total of 12 episodes, as well as various extras such as non-stop versions of the opening and ending songs.

The included Nendoroid Nee-san can be posed in all sorts of ways from the series, and of course has the model castle standing on her head to prove she is the head of the modeling club. She comes with a total of three expressions, including a smiling face, an 'Olaola' face from episode two and the wacky expression seen in episode three. A load of extras for you to display Nee-san however you think suits her best!
name: Nendoroid Nee-san: Blu-ray Set/DVD Set (ねんどろいど ねえさん Blu-ray Discせっと／DVDせっと)
copyright: © 栗井茶/スクウェアエニックス・「＋チック姉さん」製作委員会

subtitle: The little devil with beautiful blond twin tails!
description: From the popular anime and light novel series, 'Listen to Me, Girls. I Am Your Father!' comes a Nendoroid of the second eldest of the three sisters - Miu Takanashi!

She is sculpted wearing the original shirt and tie outfit that was designed for the anime series. She comes with the suitcase she always uses when she visits Yuuta's house, along with a long-sleeved T-shirt from the original light novel. She also comes with an extra skirt and arm part that allow you to pose her pulling her skirt up to show off her devilish side. A cute addition to the Nendoroid world for both Miu fans and Nendoroid collectors!
name: Nendoroid Miu Takanashi (ねんどろいど たかなしみう)
series: Listen to Me, Girls. I Am Your Father!
copyright: © 松智洋・なかじまゆか／集英社・PPP

subtitle: Ultra-thin diagonal pliers in a limited edition orange color!
description: These are a special edition of the Takumi Tools ultra-thin diagonal pliers which feature the orange color that represents Good Smile Company as well as the GSC logo inscribed onto the tool with a laser. The blade is incredibly thin, yet sharp allowing for quick and easy cutting. The grip is made of elastomer to make sure you don't slip off your mark and the spring in the center is made from high quality plastic to ensure great durability that will last for many years to come.

The Takumi Tool Series was created through the experience and ideas of professional modelers, giving high-quality tools to help modelers get the most out of their work. All the problems found in the tools of the past have been corrected, leaving easy-to-use tools that still perform exactly how you expect them to. The Japanese word 'Takumi' means 'Craftsman', and the Takumi tools can help any modeler turn their work into that of a true craftsman. Whether you are an expert in the field or an absolute beginner - these tools are designed to be the very best for anyone!
name: Takumi Tools : Ultra-Thin Diagonal Pliers - Good Smile Orange Special (たくみつーるず ごくうすばにっぱー ぐっどすまいる おれんじすぺしゃる)

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the A-class student, Masato Hijirikawa, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 03: Masato Hijirikawa (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず③ひじりかわまさと)

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the A-class student, Natsuki Shinomiya, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 05: Natsuki Shinomiya (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず⑤ しのみやなつき)

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the S-class student, Syo Kurusu, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 06: Syo Kurusu (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず⑥ くるすしょう)

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the S-class student, Ren Jinguuji, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 04: Ren Jinguuji (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず④じんぐうじれん)

subtitle: The Animal Soldiers are ready to sortie!
description: From 'Astro Fighter Sunred' comes a set of figures of the cute little animals that are a part of the evil organization Florsheim's Kawasaki Branch - The Animal Soldiers. They are made to be the perfect size to display with the upcoming figmas from the same series.

Each of them is posable all over, and Usacots, Devil Cat and P-chan Custom all come with optional parts to pose them in battle scenes. Hell Wolf also comes with a reversible speech bubble - the one side says 'Chuki' and the other 'Korochu'.
name: Animal Soldier Set (あにまるそるじゃーせっと)
copyright: © くぼたまこと/スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: The elegant girl with an unexpected whimsical side.
description: From the anime series 'Persona 4' comes a Nendoroid of the elegant and popular Yukiko Amagi.

She comes with three different expressions, as well as various extra parts from the series such as her glasses and a folding fan which let you pose her summoning her Persona. She also comes with parts that allow you to pose her showing her whimsical side that she normally tries to hide - holding her stomach while bursting out in laughter. She even comes with the fake glasses from episode four of the anime series!
name: Nendoroid Yukiko Amagi (ねんどろいど あまぎゆきこ)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: The newest Square is bigger than ever!
description: A WonFes preorder product brought to you by Good Smile Company! This is the third Square to join the WWR series, and the biggest one yet! The coloring is once again that of the JDF (JAPAN DEFENSE FORCE).

The back of the chassis has the same 'EMGY' letters painted on it as the previously announced charity product, the JDF EMGY Armstrong. The hatch on the side of the model can also be opened allowing you to see a part of the inside of the Square as well - definitely a great feature for fans of the series!
name: WWR JDF Mighty Square (WWRp JDF まいてぃ すくうぇあ)

subtitle: A 1/43rd scale miniature car of the BMW Z4 that excelled in the national races!
description: The car that took the title of series champion in the 2011 GT300 class championship races! The 'Hatsune Miku GOODSMILE BMW Z4' which showed us incredible races during the national races has been transformed into an officially licensed BMW and GT association miniature car! Every detail and coloring of the car has been carefully recreated in high quality resin for fans to enjoy!
name: Miku Hatsune GOODSMILE BMW Z4 2011 FUJI Champion Ver. (はつねみく ぐっどすまいる BMW Z4 2011 ふじゆうしょう Ver.)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: The young heroine who expresses herself through song.
description: From the anime series, 'Guilty Crown' comes a Nendoroid of the Undertaker's member, singer and heroine of the series, Inori Yuzuriha. She has been sculpted wearing the lovely red and orange outfit from the series!

Inori comes with a wide selection of optional parts, letting you pose her peacefully making a Cat's Cradle from string, or instead holding two pistols and ready to bravely fight against her enemies. She even comes with special Void Effect Parts that allow you to pose her as if her void was being taken out. For even more fun, she also comes with the little robotic helper, Funell! A wide variety of parts that will allow Inori fans to pose her however they think she looks best!
name: Nendoroid Inori Yuzuriha (ねんどろいど ゆずりはいのり)
copyright: ©ギルティクラウン製作委員会

subtitle: Time to invade the Nendoroid world ~de geso!
description: From the anime series, "Shinryaku! Ika Musume" comes a Nendoroid of the invader from the sea herself - Ika Musume! She comes with a standard smiling face, a confident expression to proclaim her invasion plans, and a crying face for when those plans inevitably fail.

She also comes with a variety of optional extras from the series, including the umbrella she named 'Ika #1', as well as two bendable tentacles that can be swapped out with the standard tentacles. She also comes with beer mugs and prawn fried rice which can be held using the bendable tentacles, allowing you to pose her hard at work as a waitress at the Lemon beach house!
name: Nendoroid Ika Musume (ねんどろいど いかむすめ)
copyright: ©安部真弘(週刊少年チャンピオン)/海の家れもん2号店

subtitle: General Vamp is joining the figma series even before Sunred!
description: From 'Astro Fighter Sunred' comes a figma of General Vamp - the leader of Florsheim's Kawasaki Branch, bent on world domination!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The memorable purple cloak is included as real cloth. You can even pose him kneeling down for when Sunred needs to lecture him.
Two items that an evil leader should never be without, a shopping bag and a cute phone are both included.
His spear and shield are also included. The shield even has the secret compartment to hide his shopping away.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
Pose him together with the 'Animal Soldier Set' that was announced at the same time for even more from the Astro Fighter Sunred universe
name: figma General Vamp (ふぃぐま う゛ぁんぷしょうぐん)
copyright: © くぼたまこと/スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: The champions standing on their podium!
description: A commemoration product to the Miku GT project winning the 2011 championship series! Miku, Luka and Rin are all back again as Nendoroid Petites, this time wearing their race queen outfits. They also come with their very own podium stand, as well as a pull-back car based on the Miku GT car!
Display the car together with the figures and relive the day of victory in the cutest way possible!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Racing Miku Set 2011 Ver. (ねんどろいど ぷち れーしんぐみくせっと 2011 Ver.)
sculptor: Mesuka, GSC 3D Team (Fumitoshi Nakamura, Isao Shirasagi)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc

subtitle: "Don't call me Princess! Call me Your Majesty!"
description: From the anime DOG DAYS comes a figma of the Galette Lion Army's leader, Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a confident standard expression, as well as a shouting expression for action scenes.
Her hand axe is included, as well as the Galette Lion Army's treasured weapon, Granvale.
She also comes with effect parts to recreate the Emblem Arts she uses to create the Galette crest.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois (ふぃぐま れおんみしぇり・がれっと・で・ろわ)

subtitle: A sniper hidden beneath his ghillie suit
description: The first of the WWR series humanoid figures to be released by Good Smile Company. The figure is dressed in a camouflage outfit and equipped with a large, heavy-looking anti-robot rifle. He also comes with a full ghillie suit, allowing you to pose him as he waits in silence and safety for his target to appear.
name: World War Robot PUNTER BOT SNIPER BBICN EXCLUSIVE (WWR ぱんたーぼっとすないぱー)

subtitle: The Puella Magi with a strong sense of justice.
description: From the popular anime series that won multiple awards in 2011, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', comes this 1/8th scale figure of Sayaka Miki, Madoka's close friend who become a Puella Magi for her childhood friend.

The pose is based on a key visual from the anime, and features her dynamically posed in her Puella Magi outfit with her cloak fluttering in the wind behind her. She also comes with replaceable left and right hand parts that allow you to pose her holding swords in either hand. You can choose the pose you prefer!
name: Sayaka Miki (みきさやか)

subtitle: Ryomou is back as a huge 1/4th scale figure wearing a bunny suit!
description: From the newest addition to the Ikkitousen (Battle Vixens) series, 'Ikkitousen: Shuugaku Toushi Keppuroku' comes a figure of one of Nanyo Academy's Big Four - Shimei Ryomou. This time around Ryomou is wearing a bunny outfit, in place of the maid outfit that she normally wears.

Along with the bunny ears, the outfit also features a lovely white leotard and net tights made from real material for a more realistic appearance. It's a sexy pose that is ready to charm anyone - both fans and newcomers alike!
name: Shimei Ryomou : Bunny Ver. (りょもうしめい ばにーVer.)
copyright: © 2011 塩崎雄二・ワニブックス／一騎当千集鍔闘士血風録パートナーズ

subtitle: A 1/43rd scale miniature car based on the series championship car!
description: The car that took the title of series champion in the 2011 GT300 class championship races! The 'Hatsune Miku GOODSMILE BMW Z4' which showed us incredible races in the last season has been transformed into an officially licensed BMW and GT association miniature car! Every detail and coloring of the car has been carefully recreated in high quality resin for fans to enjoy!
name: Miku Hatsune GOODSMILE BMW Z4 2011 Series : Champion Ver. (はつねみく ぐっどすまいる BMW Z4 2011 しりーずゆうしょう Ver.)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: The time comes when we must let go of each other's hands.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, as well as an expression with narrowed eyes to watch her opponent carefully.
The figma includes the gigantic weapon known as the 'Insane Canon Lance', as well as the 'Insane Blade Claw' - along with hands to equip them!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Insane Black Rock Shooter (ふぃぐま いんせいん・ぶらっくろっく★しゅーたー)

subtitle: Open your eyes, this time it shall begin!
description: From the popular anime that is currently airing, 'Persona 4', comes a figure of the Persona that the main character summons, 'Izanagi' as well as the first shadow to join the series - Slipping Hablerie.

Kan Takahama is once again behind the unique sculpting of the figure that really brings out the atmosphere of the Persona universe. Be sure to display them with the already announced 'Twin Pack: Teddie & TV', as well as other upcoming 'Persona 4' Twin Packs!
name: Twin Pack DX : Izanagi & Slipping Hablerie (ついんぱっく でらっくす いざなぎ＆しつげんのあぶるりー)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: Aiming to be top idols as Nendoroid Petites!
description: From the popular idol production simulation game, 'THE IDOLM@STER2' comes a set of Nendoroid Petite figures of the cute idols! Haruka Amami, Chihaya Kisaragi, Makoto Kikuchi, Yayoi Takatsuki, Mami Futami and Takane Shijou are all dressed up in their stage outfits and ready to perform. There is also one secret character to collect!
Become the producer for these adorable idols - the stage can be your very own desk!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER 2 - Stage 01 (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー２ すてーじ01)

subtitle: A figure that captures the atmosphere of the Atelier Totori world!
description: From the PS3 game, 'Atelier Totori: The Adventurer of Arland' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the young alchemist who travels the world, Totori!

Her characteristic dress, staff and even her shoes have all been faithfully sculpted to match the original character design! She also comes with a large base that features all sorts of test tubes, flasks and other cute items that help bring out the atmosphere of the Atelier Totori world!
name: Totori (ととり)
series: Atelier Totori: The Adventurer of Arland

subtitle: Cute miniature squid girls to collect!
description: From the popular anime series, Squid Girl (Shinryaku! Ika Musume) comes a set of 1/1 scale trading figures based on the miniature squid girl that Sanae Nagatsuki takes care of in her dreams in the episode "Won't You Keep It?" from the first season of the anime! There are a total of eight figures to collect, seven standard figures and one secret figure!
name: Mini Ika Musume Trading Figures (みにいかむすめ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)
copyright: © 安部真弘（週刊少年チャンピオン）／海の家れもん2号店

subtitle: Tachikoma is back, this time with goodies to cheer everyone on!
description: As a part of the 10th month of Cheerful JAPAN!, the adorable Nendoroid Tachikoma is coming back in a special 'Cheerful Ver.'.! Along with all the optional parts from the original version, the Cheerful version also comes with pompons, a banner and a folding fan with the Japanese flag on it. The adorable little war machine is ready to cheer on for everyone!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1500 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid Tachikoma: Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど たちこま おうえんVer.)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: Her weapon is her fist, and her favorite word is 'truth'!
description: From the anime seires, 'Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai!' comes a Nendoroid of the powerful fighter Momoyo Kawakami, the oldest member of the Kawakami family.

She comes with three expressions, including a standard confident looking expression, an upset looking expression and finally an adorable embarrassed expression. There are also extra parts that allow you to pose her in the 'Buddhist Iron' pose, as well as some extra effect parts to pose her preforming her 'Star Killer' move. A variety of extra parts for fans to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Momoyo Kawakami (ねんどろいど かわかみももよ)
copyright: © みなとそふと／まじこい製作委員会

subtitle: "Wo-Would you mind if I hit you...?"
description: Following on from Popura Taneshima comes another Nendoroid from the popular anime 'WORKING!!', this time it's the shy girl with a fear of men - Mahiru Inami!

She comes with three expressions: a strained smile, a blushing embarrassed expression and a shouting expression. She also comes with an arm part ready to punch any guy that comes near her - it even includes effect parts which have Takanashi's silhouette flying away! The 'Magic Hand' that she used to keep distance between Takanashi and herself while walking home together is also included.
A lovely variety of parts to pose the adorable Inami hard at work at Wagnaria!
name: Nendoroid Mahiru Inami (ねんどろいど いなみまひる)
copyright: © 高津カリノ／スクウェアエニックス・「WORKING!!」製作委員会

subtitle: The Moekana learning series gets a boost!
description: The Moekana Booster Pack features 9 new cards and illustrations to expand your hiragana knowledge and power up your moekana game! These Booster cards complement the Moekana hiragana learning cards (sold separately) and enable you to make dakuten and handakuten hiragana in the game. The first edition of the Moekana Booster Pack is a collaboration with the trading card game company Bushiroad and comes with a Weiβ Schwarz card of Mirai Suenaga!

Moekana are a set of cards to help folks learn the basic Japanese syllabary: hiragana. The cards feature the characters of the TV show and website produced by Danny Choo called Culture Japan who are, Mirai Suenaga, Haruka Suenaga and Kanata Hoshikawa. Find out more about how to learn hiragana while playing moekana at www.moekana.com.
name: Moekana Booster Pack (もえかな ぶーすたーぱっく)

subtitle: The popular Persona 4 series is joining the Twin Packs!
description: From the anime series 'Persona 4' comes a Twin Pack featuring Kuma, the mysterious figure that lives in the television world, as well as the TV itself - a very iconic item from the series. Display the adorable Kuma beside his TV and enjoy the world of Persona right beside you!
name: Twin Pack: Kuma and TV (ついんぱっく くま＆てれび)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: Figure's of the Shinsengumi characters created by Makoto Tsuchibayashi!
description: From the doujinshi created by character designer Makoto Tsuchibayashi titled, 'Makoto Tsuchibayashi Charactors: Shinsengumi VOL.3" comes a set of 6 trading figures including Kondou Isami, Hijikata Toshizou, Okita Rintaro, Saitou Hajime, Keisuke Yamanami and Kamo Serizawa. There is also one secret figure to collect!
Each character also comes with a card featuring the package illustration that the figure is based on. A wonderful set for fans to enjoy!
name: Makoto Tsuchibayashi Charactors: Shinsengumi Trading Figures (つちばやしまこと きゃらくたーず しんせんぐみ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: Even more characters are joining the new Pettanko series!
description: From the popular anime and light novel series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a Pettanko figure of Yozora Mikaduki, the beautiful heroine with a very unfortunate personality.
Penguin Parade's new Petanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Yozora Mikaduki (ぺたんこ みかづきよぞら)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ないPhotography: Yokohama-Shashinkan

subtitle: Even more characters are joining the new Pettanko series!
description: From the popular anime and light novel series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a Pettanko figure of Sena Kashiwazaki, the student who is considered to be perfect in almost every way... except for her personality.
Penguin Parade's new Petanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Sena Kashiwazaki (ぺたんこ かしわざきせな)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ないPhotography: Yokohama-Shashinkan

subtitle: A strong sense of justice, a huge appetite and a cheerful personality that always sets the mood!
description: From the popular anime 'Persona 4' comes a figma of Chie Satonaka - the energetic young girl who is obsessed with Kung fu!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, a shouting face and an insidious 'shadow' expression to recreate her other self in the TV world.
She comes with her glasses, the fake nose glasses used in joke scenes and a separate fringe part for wearing the glasses.
She also comes with effect parts to show off her Kung fu moves in figma form!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Chie Satonaka (ふぃぐま さとなかちえ)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会Photos represent a product still in development.

subtitle: The first ever official Nendoroid Album comes complete with a Saber Nendoroid wearing casual clothes!
description: The very first Nendoroid album fulled with the lovable Nendoroids produced by Good Smile Company is going on sale soon! This Nendoroid of Saber in her casual clothes is included as an extra to those who buy the book!

She comes with a total of three expressions, a stuffed lion, a fencing stick, chopsticks, a rice bowl and even sitting parts! A huge selection of parts to display her however you think she looks best!
name: Nendoroid Saber : Nendoroid Complete File Edition (ねんどろいど せいばー ねんどろいどこんぷりーとふぁいる・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: Kamui Kobayashi is joining the Cheerful JAPAN! series, with Japan's dream resting on his shoulders!
description: As a part of the 'Cheerful JAPAN!' project, Kamui Kobayashi is rejoining the Nendoroid world in a special 'Ganbare Nihon!' version! He comes with different head parts and a different helmet to the standard version, as well as an all new racing car made specially for Cheerful JAPAN!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid Kamui Kobayashi: Ganbare Japan Ver. (ねんどろいど こばやしかむい がんばれにっぽんVer.)
copyright: Copyright 2011-2012 by Sauber Motorsport AG Licensed through: Global Sport IP GmbH, Munich - All rights reserved -

subtitle: Mickey Mouse's adorable girlfriend!
description: Nendoroid Mickey Mouse was released to commemorate the 100th Nendoroid release, and now Minnie Mouse will also be joining the Nendoroid series to keep him company! She comes with various extras that were drawn up specially for her Nendoroid release, such as a dresser with lots of make-up goodies to help her get ready for the show - as well as a script, so she can check her lines before filming starts!

Chip and Dale are also included as extras, carrying some sound equipment to help out with the filming! Be sure to display her together with Mickey Mouse and recreate the world of Disney in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Minnie Mouse (ねんどろいど みにーまうす)

subtitle: Miku and the other Vocaloids are celebrating GSC's 10th Anniversary! ♪
description: In commemoration of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary, the delicious treats, 'Sakuma Drops' are joining in collaboration with the Character Vocal Series!

Original illustrations and photos of the Vocaloids are plastered all over the Sakuma Drops tin for a lovely new colorful look, and each tin also includes an adorable rubber strap of one of the Vocaloid characters. There are a total of 8 different straps to collect, including one secret strap! Enjoy the delicious Sakuma Drops along with an extra dose of cuteness!

[strong]These special edition Sakuma Drops will be on sale during May at Circle K Sunkus stores, as well as the Official Circle K Sunkus Shopping Site, KARUZAMA ONLINE. Preorders on KARUZAKA ONLINE will start from 16th February (Thurs) at 10:00 JST.
name: Sakuma Drops: Character Vocal Series Ver. - Nendoroid Petite Rubber Strap Included. (さくまどろっぷす きゃらくたー・ぼーかる・しりーずVer. ねんどろいどぷらす らばーすとらっぷつき)

subtitle: Bringing smiles back to everyone with her hair tied up in a ponytail!
description: The ninth product to join the Cheerful JAPAN! project is a 'Cheerful Ver.' of the popular Nendoroid Luka Megurine!

She comes with all the optional parts from the original Nendoroid, along with new parts such as pink pompons and a tambourine to cheer everyone on! Luka also comes with all new ponytail hair parts, and the little Nendoroid Petite sized Octo-Luka comes with an orange sun cap featuring the Cheerful JAPAN! logo!
Enjoy Luka and Octo-Luka in their cutest versions ever - ready to cheer on for everyone who needs it!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid relief efforts.
name: Nendoroid Luka Megurine : Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど めぐりねるか おうえんVer.)

subtitle: Welcome to Wagnaria!
description: From the anime series 'WORKING!!" comes a playset designed for the Nendoroids of the series to be displayed in Wagnaria itself! The A set features the guest seating area of the restaurant, while the B set recreates the kitchen. You can connect the two sets to recreate the full restaurant.
