Grab some of the Nendoroids from 'WORKING!!" and recreate your favorite scenes from the series! B Set Contents : Normal wall, kitchen wall, floor, refrigerator, stove, shelves, sink, cutting board, knife, frying pan, ladle and a floor divider screen.
name: Nendoroid Playset #05 : Wagnaria B Set - Kitchen (ねんどろいどぷれいせっと＃05 わぐなりあ B ちゅうぼうせっと)
copyright: © 高津カリノ／スクウェアエニックス・「WORKING!!」製作委員会Nendoroid Popura Taneshima is sold separately.

subtitle: Welcome to Wagnaria!
description: From the anime series 'WORKING!!" comes a playset designed for the Nendoroids of the series to be displayed in Wagnaria itself! The A set features the guest seating area of the restaurant, while the B set recreates the kitchen. You can connect the two sets to recreate the full restaurant. Grab some of the Nendoroids from 'WORKING!!" and recreate your favorite scenes from the series!
A Set Contents: Two windowed walls, floor, table, 2x sofas, parfait, coffee cup & saucer, coffee pot, order machine and Wagnaria signboard.
name: Nendoroid Playset #05 : Wagnaria A Set - Guest Seating (ねんどろいどぷれいせっと＃05 わぐなりあ A きゃくせきせっと)
copyright: © 高津カリノ／スクウェアエニックス・「WORKING!!」製作委員会Nendoroid Popura Taneshima is sold separately.

subtitle: Gumako is back to cheer for everyone, bigger than ever before! ♪
description: The first scale figure to join the Cheerful! JAPAN line-up is a 1/8th scale figure of Good Smile Company's mascot character, Gumako!

The proportions from the original Nendoroid design have all been scaled up by Hiroyuki Tsumezuka for her very first scale figure debut, looking as cute as ever! Her white outfit is complemented by the orange scarf around her neck and the yellow pompons in her hands. Her innocent eyes and refreshing expression will cheer you on through the toughest of times! She also comes with an alternate expression with a beaming smile!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will donate 2000JPY to aid relief efforts in Japan.
name: Gumako: Cheerful Ver. (ぐまこ ちあふる Ver.)

subtitle: Saber and Rin are ready to cheer everyone on!
description: The eighth product to join the Cheerful JAPAN! project is a set of two Nendoroids of TYPE-MOON's popular characters - Saber and Rin Tohsaka, both wearing adorable cheerleader outfits! The Nendoroids are based on an illustration by the original illustrator of the two girls, Takashi Takeuchi - just shrunk down to adorable Nendoroid size!

Both come with pompons that correspond to their image colors, as well as a flag they can both hold up together! They also come with the popular lazy expressions and extra parts that let them sit down! From the energetic cheering poses down to the tired out sitting pose after the cheering - these are two Nendoroids with a ton of fun poses to play around with!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 2000JPY to aid relief efforts.
name: Nendoroid Saber & Rin Tohsaka : Cheerful ver. (ねんどろいど せいばー&とうさかりん おうえんVer.)

subtitle: The Tachikomas have gathered together to support Japan!
description: As a part of the 10th month of the 'Cheerful JAPAN!' project, the illustration provided by Production I.G for Nendoroid Tachikoma: Cheerful Ver. is being printed onto T-shirts for fans to enjoy! The illustration on the shirt features five Tachikomas all posed together, each holding various banners, folding fans and pompons to cheer everyone on!
For each shirt sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Ghost in the Shell: S.A.C.: Cheerful T-Shirt (こうかくきどうたいS.A.C. ちあふるTしゃつ)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The caring student with a a cool and calm personality.
description: From the anime series with its second season now under way, 'Amagami SS', comes the second Nendoroid from the series - the newcomer to the school swimming team, Ai Nanasaki. She comes with three expressions including her standard smiling face, an embarrassed face and an exited face.

She also comes with other optional parts such as her school bag to pose her on the way to school as she looked in one of the game's key visuals. She also comes with parts to recreate the scene where she lifts up her skirt for Junichi - this time it's all for you though!
name: Nendoroid Ai Nanasaki (ねんどろいど ななさきあい)
copyright: © ENTERBRAIN, INC./アマガミSS製作委員会

subtitle: A pure white encounter.
description: From the anime series 'Mashiroiro Symphony'' comes a Nendoroid the playful young girl who is kind to everyone, Sana Inui!

She comes complete with three expressions, and also comes with parts that let you display her as she looked on the packaging for the game - with her hands shaped as a heart. She also comes with folded arm parts to create a more upset looking pose.
Last but not least, the strange cat-like creature, 'Pannya' is also included - allowing you to recreate all sorts of scenes and poses from the game and anime!
name: Nendoroid Sana Inui (ねんどろいど いぬいさな)
copyright: © ２０１１ ぱれっと／結姫女子学園ぬこ部

subtitle: The characters from 'Ano Natsu de Matteru' are joining the Character Decal Series!
description: From the anime that recently came to an end, 'Ano Natsu de Matteru' comes a set of water-application decals featuring the characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into an itasha of the series, or stick them on anything else to easily create some 'Ano Natsu de Matteru' themed goods!
The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 042: Ano Natsu de Matteru (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる042／あのなつでまってる)
series: Ano Natsu de Matteru (Waiting in the Summer)

subtitle: The love comedy filled with regret!
description: From 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes an adorable plushie of the bad-mannered young nun who has no friends - Maria Takayama! She is wearing her nun's habit, which has carefully been shrunk down to plushie size!
Grab the other characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!
name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Plushie Series 06 : Maria Takayama (ぼくはともだちがすくない ぬいぐるみしりーず⑥ たかやま まりあ)
copyright: ©2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the S-class student, Tokiya Ichinose, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 02: Tokiya Ichinose (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず② いちのせときや)

subtitle: A plushie more wonderful than a kiss!
description: From the anime series, 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a plushie of the A-class student, Otoya Ittoki, dressed up in his St. Rish uniform. Collect all the plushies from the series to enjoy the company of all the St. Rish characters whenever you like - in the most huggable form possible! ♪
name: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% Plushie Series 01: Otoya Ittoki (うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％ ぬいぐるみしりーず① いっときおとや)

subtitle: A blue eye with a blue and yellow body.
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

The Deimos Def colorway version features a blue and yellow body. The body is also covered in a striped design to give it a very different feel to the other colorways. They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble Deimos Def (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる だいもす でぃふぇんす)

subtitle: The story of a small, heart-warming encounter.
description: From the anime series based in 19th century Paris, 'Croisée in a Foreign Labyrinth' comes a set of three Nendoroid Petite figures, including Claude, who runs his family's ironwork shop in Enseignes du Roy, Yune, the young girl who came to Paris from Japan to work at Enseignes du Roy and finally Alice, the daughter of the upper class Blanche family.

The set also comes with some optional parts, including the picture book that Claude gave to Yune, an apron and hammer for Claude to do his work at the ironwork shop and a tea set for Alice! Enjoy the wonderful characters from the heart-warming story in the a cute Nendoroid way!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Croisée in a Foreign Labyrinth Set (ねんどろいど ぷち いこくめいろのくろわーぜせっと)
copyright: © 2011 武田日向／富士見書房／異国迷路のクロワーゼ製作委員会

subtitle: The goth-loli lover has also dressed up in a maid outfit!
description: From the popular anime and light novel series, 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a figure of the goth-loli fashion lover, 'Kuroneko' wearing her maid outfit from the series!

She is posed twirling around with with her skirt fluttering around her in a very cute pose. It's a different side of Kuroneko for fans to enjoy, and is designed to be displayed with the previously announced Kirino Kousaka: Maid Ver.!
name: Kuroneko : Maid Ver. (くろねこ めいどVer.)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／ＯＩＰ

subtitle: The Milky Holmes member with the Toys ability to strengthen all her senses.
description: From the anime series with a second season under way, 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes this Nendoroid of Cordelia Glauca.

She comes with a load of optional parts, such as extras to pose her using her Toys ability, and parts to recreate the way she looked when she was possessed by her ancestor, Cordelia Gray, in the eighth episode of the first anime series!

The lovely Cordelia is looking just as cute as her friends, and is the last of them to get the Nendoroid treatment - which means fans can now complete their collection of all the Milky Holmes Nendoroids!
name: Nendoroid Cordelia Glauca (ねんどろいど こーでりあ・ぐらうか)

subtitle: The love comedy filled with regret!
description: From 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes an adorable plushie of Kodaka's younger sister who has no friends - Kobato Hasekawa! She is wearing her goth-loli fashioned one-piece, which has carefully been shrunk down to plushie size!
Grab the other characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!
name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Plushie Series 05 : Kobato Hasekawa (ぼくはともだちがすくない ぬいぐるみしりーず⑤ はせがわ こばと)
copyright: ©2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: "That is the what the Einzbern's wish for, I'll do anything for it..."
description: From the popular anime series 'Fate/Zero' comes a figma of Kiritsugu Emiya's wife who bears an unfortunate fate - Irisviel von Einzbern!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions - a standard expression, a confident looking gaze and a gentle smiling expression with closed eyes.
She also comes with the wire bird that she used in her confrontation with Kirei Kotomine.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Irisviel von Einzbern (ふぃぐま あいりすふぃーる・ふぉん・あいんつべるん)

subtitle: The world renowned Overdrive King!
description: The famous Japanese F1 racer who has attracted attention from all over the world, 'Kamui Kobayashi', is getting his very own 1/8th scale figure! He is posed just as he stood as he began his 2011 racing season, wearing his racing suit and ready to hit the track!
The figure features such realistic sculpting, that even Kamui himself said that it looked so much like him, it was a little scary!
name: Kamui Kobayashi (こばやしかむい)

subtitle: The holy angel has descended from the heavens to be with you.
description: From the 8th volume of the 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wage ga Nai' novel, comes a 1/7th scale of Kuroneko wearing the outfit from her very first date, or as Kuroneko called herself, 'Holy Angel Kamineko'.

Every detail about the outfit has been carefully reproduced in figure form for fans to enjoy. She has a lovely confident smile across her face and each of her eyes is a different color for a mystical kind of charm. She is holding a mask in her right hand, but also comes with an empty hand that can be used instead if you prefer. Kuroneko is ready to charm both fans and figure lovers alike with this adorable outfit and pose!
name: Holy Angel Kamineko (せいてんしかみねこ)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP

subtitle: I-It's not like I'm being cute for you, okay!?
description: The third season of the popular Zero no Tsukaima anime has recently come to a close, but a Nendoroid of Louise is back for more in this figure planned by the online hobby site "HOBBYSTOCK", and assisted by Goodsmile Company!

Both her angry face and her cute face are included, as well as a crying face which was included due to being the most popular expression on a poll preformed online. Her magic wand and whip that were seen often in the anime are included, as well as "The Progenitor's Prayer Book".
All the added extras make it easy for fans to display Louise in any way they want to see her!
name: Nendoroid Louise (ねんどろいど るいず)
copyright: ©2012 ヤマグチノボル・メディアファクトリー／ゼロの使い魔F製作委員会

subtitle: Sneak into one of Sonico's gravure idol photo sessions!
description: Super Sonico is now known as a gravure idol, game character and musician - and this figure is here to give you a sneak peek into one of her gravure idol photo sessions. She's wearing a very provocative outfit that gives you a nice look at her wonderful figure, and she also has an adorable smile across her face to let you know she is enjoying the company!

She also comes with replaceable extra parts that allow you to give her a worried expression and a separate bust part that shows off her body even more than before - just pick the way you want to display her, and enjoy her company to your heart's content!
name: SUPER SONICO TOKONATSU Ver. (すーぱー そにこ とこなつ Ver.)

subtitle: A marble phantasm for your heart!
description: From the TYPE-MOON 10th Anniversary anime 'Carnival Phantasm' comes a figma of the magical girl version of Arcueid - Phantasmoon!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard expression, a cute winking expression and an angry expression with gritted teeth.
She comes with her magical wand, the 'Phantasm Rod' as well as a plate of mapodon as optional parts.
Effect parts for waving her wand as well as for creating her signature move are both included, allowing you to recreate even more famous scenes!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Phantasmoon (ふぃぐま ふぁんたずむーん)
copyright: © TYPE-MOON・武梨えり・一迅社／ノーツ・ラルケ・エモーション

subtitle: "Have you awakened, my lady?"
description: From Disney Japan's popular CG animated series, 'Fireball Charming' comes a newly designed figma of Drossel!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Based on the series, the elbows and knees are fitted with double joints for incredibly smooth and flexible poses!
The 'Astrology Unit' and 'Perception Unit' are both included.
She also comes with various other parts to recreate popular scenes - wheels, her huge red cape and even the Flügel family's potable secretary, Reginald.
name: figma Drossel (Charming) (ふぃぐま どろっせるちゃーみんぐ)

subtitle: The members of the amusement club are joining the the Character Decal Series!
description: From the anime 'YuruYuri♪♪' comes a set of water-application decals featuring the lovable characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into a YuruYuri itasha, or stick them on anything else to easily create some YuruYuri themed goods!
The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 043: YuruYuri♪♪ (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる043／ゆるゆり♪♪)
copyright: ©なもり/一迅社・七森中ごらく部

subtitle: A special Heavy Bramble sold only in Asia!
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

As the name implies, this special version of the Heavy Bramble is available only in Asian regions. This colorway features paint work that created a very rusted look which works very well with the chassis. They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble Regional Edition -ASIAN LINK DEFENCE- (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる りーじょなる えでぃしょん -あじあん りんく でぃふぇんす-)

subtitle: With various letters and numbers printed on its massive RPG!
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

The JEA Marine colorway features a popular green painted body. The giant RPG it carries as a weapon is filled with various letters and numbers, allowing you to create your own story as to what they represent. They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble JEA Marine (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる JEA まりーん)

subtitle: Gravedigger carrying a massive RPG over his shoulder.
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

The Gravedigger colorway features a grey-toned body which makes the crimson eye on his head strand out ominously. The RPG also features an "X" mark on its sides to make it stand out from the other colourways. They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble Gravedigger (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる ぐれいう゛でぃがー)

subtitle: The Cydonia Def colorway, named after the Cydonia Region of Mars.
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

The Cydonia Def colorway features a camouflage pattern and a motif pattern of four circles. As always with threeA's work, The paint job is incredibly detailed and is a wonder to look at from any angle! They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble Cydonia Def (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる さいどにあ でぃふぇんす)

subtitle: The amateur voice actress is joining the Nendoroids!
description: From the popular anime series with a third season on the way, 'Bakuman', comes the forth Nendoroid of the series, and the first of the girls to join to collection - Miho Azuki! She comes with three different expressions, as well as various optional parts to show off her voice actress career, such as a dubbing microphone and the script for 'St. Visual Girl's Academy', the anime that she voiced.
Display her together with all the previous Bakuman Nendoroids and recreate your favorite scenes from the series in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Miho Azuki (ねんどろいど あずきみほ)
copyright: ©大場つぐみ・小畑健・集英社／NHK・NEP・ShoPro

subtitle: A colorway that you can't miss!
description: Massive four-barreled RPGs wielded by the robust, powerful Heavy Bramble chassis are joining the WWRp series as 1/12th scale models!

The African Def colorway has a very eye-catching color scheme based off animal patterns. They might be smaller in terms of size, but they're definitely still just as detailed and noticeable as the larger counterparts!
name: WWRp Heavy Bramble African Def (WWRP へびーぶらんぶる あふりかん でぃふぇんす)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Penumbra (あどべんちゃー かるてる ぴなんぶら)

subtitle: The flashy Masamune is going on resale!
description: From the popular game and anime "Sengoku Basara" comes a Nendoroid of the main character that has spanned over the entire series, "Masamune Date"!

Masamune's wild personality has been shrunk down into a cute Nendoroid format which includes three expressions, unique arm parts with posable elbow joints and a set of folded arms! He also has his six katana sheath by his side, and all six swords can be removed and equipped to recreate his epic battle scenes!
His rival, Sanada Yukimura is also getting the Nendoroid treatment soon, so be ready for some frightful combat between the two!
name: Nendoroid Masamune Date (ねんどろいど だてまさむね)
copyright: © CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

subtitle: The fanatical warrior is joining the battle as a Nendoroid!
description: From the popular 'Sengoku BASARA' series comes a Nendoroid of Yukimura Sanada, the young commander who is always loyal to Takeda Shingen.

He comes with three expressions, including a shouting face ideal for the fanatical personality of Yukimura, a loyal face for him to show to his most respected Takeda Shingen and finally a pained expression for whenever he has not lived up to his own expectations. He also comes with his two separate spears which can also be connected together to recreate the double-sided spear from the series.
He also comes with a variety of extra arm and leg parts, as well as an alternate headband allowing for all kinds of action poses ideal for the hot-blooded Yukimura!
name: Nendoroid Yukimura Sanada (ねんどろいど さなだゆきむら)

subtitle: The popular aspiring detectives are joining the Character Customize Series!
description: From the popular anime and game series, 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes a set of character decals featuring the Milky Holmes girls!

The sheet is filled with both character illustrations as well as various symbols and logos that bring out the Milky Holmes atmosphere, allowing you to turn your favorite model car into a Milky Holmes itasha! The decals are made using silk-screen printing for high quality images that won't fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 021: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる021／たんていおぺら みるきぃほーむず)

subtitle: There is no way my little sister would dress in a maid outfit!
description: From the popular light novel and anime series, 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the anime loving middle-school student who works as a magazine model - Kirino Kousaka, wearing a lovely maid outfit!

She is posed in a dynamic pose holding onto the side of her skirt with both hands while spinning around! It's not how normally see Kirino, but it's certainly still sure to get the fan's approval! A Kuroneko : Maid Ver. will also be along shortly for you to display the two together!
name: Kirino Kousaka : Maid Ver. (こうさかきりの めいどVer.)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／ＯＩＰ

subtitle: "I might be a Nendoroid, but I'm not small!"
description: From the second season of the anime series set in a family restaurant, 'WORKING!!', comes a Nendoroid of the reliable waitress, Popura Taneshima!

She comes with three expressions, including a smiling face, a cute looking upset face and a chibi face. She also comes with a menu for the restaurant, a tray to carry out orders to her customers and of course a little footstool to help her reach those high up places!
The small and lovable Taneshima is ready to be displayed hard at work - or in whatever pose you think suits her best!
name: Nendoroid Popura Taneshima (ねんどろいど たねしまぽぷら)
copyright: © 高津カリノ／スクウェアエニックス・「WORKING!!」製作委員会

subtitle: The talented student council vice-president, wearing a sexy bikini!
description: From the popular adventure dating sim game, 'ToHeart2' comes a 1/6th scale figure of Sasara Kusugawa - the talented vice-president of the student council who manages to get through all the council's duties on her own!

She is well known for her cold personality, and may be feared by most students at her school - but they'd definitely warm up to her if they got a good look at her wonderful proportions! She is wearing a lovely white bikini posed on her knees while holding onto her bikini strings - definitely a pose that fans won't be able to get enough of!
name: Sasara Kusugwa (くすがわささら)

subtitle: Learn hiragana the fun and moe way with moekana!
description: Moekana are a set of cards to help folks learn the basic Japanese syllabary: hiragana. The cards feature the characters of the TV show and website produced by Danny Choo called Culture Japan who are, Mirai Suenaga, Haruka Suenaga and Kanata Hoshikawa.

The pack of 50 different moekana cards feature cute kawaii illustrations by the Japanese artist Ikkyuu - the adorable artwork alone is enough to help learners learn hiragana but there are many ways one can also use the cards to start learning Japanese.
name: Moekana (もえかな)

subtitle: Super Sonico in an unbelievable pose with a gorgeous base!
description: Super Sonico has dressed herself up in a maid outfit and is in a rather voluptuous pose for her fans to enjoy!

Sonico has just recently debuted as an idol, and this pose and expression are a part of her gravure work! Cloth ribbons are also included, allowing you as the cameraman to liven up the setting a bit! It's definitely a figure that Sonico fans from all over the world won't be disappointed with, so be sure to grab her!
* The images above are of a coloring prototype. The actual figure may differ slightly. * The ribbon included is not pre-tied. You can tie it as in the image above, or in your own way.
name: Super Sonico Gothic Maid ver. + Bed Base Set (すーぱーそにこ ごしっく めいど ver.＋ べっどふうだいざつき)

subtitle: The love comedy filled with regret!
description: From 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes an adorable plushie of the poor maid who yearns to become less effeminate, Yukimura Kusunoki! She is wearing the maid outfit from the series which has carefully been shrunk down to plushie size!
Grab the other characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!
name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Plushie Series 03 : Yukimura Kusunoki (ぼくはともだちがすくない ぬいぐるみしりーず③ くすのき ゆきむら)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: Super Sonico in an unbelievable pose!!
description: Super Sonico has dressed herself up in a maid outfit and is in a rather voluptuous pose for her fans to enjoy!

Sonico has just recently debuted as an idol, and this pose and expression are a part of her gravure work. It's definitely a figure that Sonico fans from all over the world won't be disappointed with, so be sure to grab her!

* The images above are of a coloring prototype. The actual figure may differ slightly. * Ribbons are not included with this version. * The base of this version will be a simple base. (Still under design - the images used above make use of a temporary base.)
name: Super Sonico Gothic Maid ver. (すーぱーそにこ ごしっく めいど ver.)

subtitle: The three most popular Falcom heroines are joining the Nendoroid Petite world!
description: The video game company 'Nihon Falcom' has celebrated its 30th anniversary this year, and in commemoration a project was launched as a collaboration between Nihon Falcom, Good Smile Company, Dengeki Playstation and Dengeki Online! The most popular Falcom heroines were all put in a poll to decide which three would join the Nendoroid Petite Falcom Heroine Set!

The top three most popular heroines were Renne (Trails in the Sky), Estelle Bright (Trails in the Sky) and Feena (Ys I). Each comes with optional parts that show off their character a little more - Renne has her scythe, Estelle has her fighting staff and Feena has her stunning angel wings and raiment. Enjoy the company of the world's favorite Falcom Heroines - in the cutest way possible!
name: Nendoroid Petite Falcom Heroine Set (ねんどろいどぷち ふぁるこむひろいん せっと)
copyright: © 1996-2010 Nihon Falcom Corp. All rights reserved.

subtitle: The lively Milky Holmes girl, who'd rather use brawn over brains!
description: From the anime with a second season on the way, 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes another Nendoroid to join the Milky Holmes family! - Nendoroid Nero Yuzurizaki!

She includes three different expressions, as well as the metal rod she uses when using her toys ability, an 'Umauma Stick' treat for her to munch on and even the flying machine that was seen in the last episode of the first season. She also comes with extra parts to recreate the way she looked in episode 9 - after she was possessed by her ancestor, Nero Wolfe.
name: Nendoroid Nero Yuzurizaki (ねんどろいど ゆずりざきねろ)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the girl that all the guys fall for!
description: From the TV anime series with a second season on the way, "Amagami SS", comes a Nendoroid of the young girl who attracts the gazes of all the guys at school - the third year student, Haruka Morishima!

She comes with three expressions - a smiling face, an embarrassed face and a troubled face! She also comes with extra parts to help you recreate all sorts of scenes such as famous poses from key visuals of the game, a schoolbag for the walk to school and of course parts for the 'kiss behind the knees' scene!
name: Nendoroid Haruka Morishima (ねんどろいど もりしまはるか)
copyright: © ENTERBRAIN, INC./アマガミSS製作委員会

subtitle: Ran Yakumo's shikigami is back for a resale!
description: From the popular doujin game series by 'Team Shanghai Alice', the 'Touhou Project' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Ran Yakumo's shikigami - Chen, the cat demon!

This figure was originally created by sculptor YOSHI as a garage kit based on an illustration drawn by the group 'QP flapper'. She is posed with an embarrassed smile as she holds down her skirt and hat as a strong blows on her - a very cute pose!
Figures of both Yukari Yakumo and Ran Yakumo are also both in production, so look forward to them!
name: Chen (ちぇん)

subtitle: The love comedy filled with regret!
description: From 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes an adorable plushie of the perverted scientist, Rika Shiguma! She is wearing St. Chronica's Academy uniform which has carefully been shrunk down to plushie size!
Grab the other characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!
name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Plushie Series 04 : Rika Shiguma (ぼくはともだちがすくない ぬいぐるみしりーず④ しぐま りか)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: Ready to invade the figma series!
description: From the popular anime series with a second season under way, 'Shinraku! Ika Musume" comes a figma of Ika Musume herself, ready to conquer humanity!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including a smiling face, a crying face and a determined face.
The back of her head has posable tentacles for all kinds of interesting squid girl poses.
She also comes with squid-ink pasta, fried rice and a beer mug to recreate her work environment at the beach shop.
Head parts to recreate the short hair in episode 12 of season one are included, as well as a set of longer front tentacles
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Ika Musume (ふぃぐま いかむすめ)
copyright: ©安部真弘（週刊少年チャンピオン）／海の家れもん

subtitle: The kind and gentle princess, loved by all.
description: From the anime series with a second season on the way, 'DOG DAYS', comes a figma of the Princess of Biscotti Republic, Millhiore F. Biscotti!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions, including a standard face, an adorable embarrassed face and a downhearted face.
She also comes with a microphone to sing for her fans, as well as separate ear parts to make her look more downhearted.
Bright power effect parts are also included to recreate her using her Emblem Arts.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Millhiore F. Biscotti (ふぃぐま みるひおーれ・F・びすこってぃ)

subtitle: Yukari Yakumo's shikigami, the nine-tailed strategist!
description: From Shanghai Alice's popular game series, the 'Touhou Project' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Yukari Yakumo's shikigami - the nine-tailed Ran Yakumo!

Everything from her huge nine tails, the tags on her hat and even the patterns on her outfit have all been faithfully reproduced in figure form for fans to enjoy! She is designed to be posed with both Yukari Yakumo who will be released soon, and Chen who is already available!
name: Ran Yakumo (やくも らん)

subtitle: "Answer me. Are you my master?"
description: The 4th figure to join the Saber series sculpted by Akira Toda (Principality of Kaguisuchino)! This 1/8th scale Saber comes from the RPG game Fate/EXTRA, and features Saber in a beautiful red outfit!
Toda's unique sculpting is really shown off on this figure, with the finest of details visible all over the outfit. It's a product that is bound to impress any who set their eyes upon it!
name: Saber Extra (せいばーえくすとら)

subtitle: Ride the Vanguard with these figures!
description: From the popular anime series, 'Cardfight!! Vanguard" comes a set of miniature figures of characters and units from the series!

The two main characters, Aichi Sendou and Toshiki Kai are both included, along with some of the units they use in their cardfights. This includes Blaster Blade, Draconic Overlord, Soul Saber Dragon and Blazing Flare Dragon! Plus there is one secret figure to get your hands on as well!
Each figure also comes with one of three possible random Vanguard! cards - either "Wyvern Strike Gyuntor", "Mithril Summoner" or "Dark Dragon Monk, Makoraga".
name: Nendoroid Plus: Cardfight!! Vanguard - Grade 01 (ねんどろいどぷらす かーどふぁいと!!ヴぁんがーど ぐれーど01)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Tommyred (あどべんちゃー かるてる とみーれっど)

subtitle: The unsociable Miku that everyone still loves!
description: From the 4-panel manga currently serialized in Weekly Young Jack, 'Shuukan Hajimete no Hatsune Miku' comes a brand new Nendoroid design for Miku, with the well known mean looking expression from the series!

She comes with a total of three different expressions, as well as a mike stand, baseball and a paper-craft cardboard box to allow you to create all sorts of scenes from the series! She also comes with some ice cream and sitting parts to help recreate the atmosphere from the official music video, 'Mukashimukashi no Kyou no Boku'!

* By purchasing 'Nendoroid Shuukan Hajimete no Hatsune Miku with Exclusive Amazon.co.jp Cardboard Box Papercraft' directly from Amazon.co.jp, you will also receive an exclusive Amazon.co.jp cardboard box papercraft together with your figure!
name: Nendoroid Shuukan Hajimete no Hatsune Miku (ねんどろいど しゅうかんはじめてのはつねみく)
copyright: © mikumix / Crypton Future Media Inc./Shueisha　※VOCALOIDはヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。

description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Hoodzome (White) (あどべんちゃー かるてる ふーどぞんぶ ほわいと)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Hoodzome (Red) (あどべんちゃー かるてる ふーどぞんぶ れっど)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Johnson (あどべんちゃー かるてる じょんそん)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Junglevet (あどべんちゃー かるてる じゃんぐるう゛ぇっと)

subtitle: The genius high-school manga artist!
description: From the popular anime about two young school boys who want to become manga artists, 'Bakuman', comes a Nendoroid of Saiko and Akito's biggest rival, Eiji Niizuma!

You can recreate all sorts of famous scenes from the series, including his trademark pose, his pose holding six different writing tools or even the pose of him standing on one leg. He also comes with a feather pen and a sketchbook as extra items to recreate even more of your favorite scenes!
name: Nendoroid Eiji Niizuma (ねんどろいど にいづまえいじ)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健・集英社／NHK・NEP・ShoPro

description: The 'POP & CUTE' version of Miku! The popular version of Miku illustrated by Hiro Kanzaki for Hana Soumen P's popular Vocaloid videos is getting her very own figure rendition!

Her cute, younger look, shoulder keyboard and even the strange green creature acting as a sound source for the keyboard are all sculpted down to the finest of details - creating a lovely figure of Hiro's amazing illustration. Enjoy a whole different charm from the lovely Miku!
name: Hatsune Miku: HSP ver. (はつねみく HSP ver.)

subtitle: Kanu is joining the huge 1/4th scale bunny girl series!
description: From the new upcoming anime series, 'Ikki Tousen: Shuugaku Toushi Keppuroku" comes a 1/4th scale figure of Seito Academy's strongest fighter, Unchou Kanu wearing an outfit you wouldn't normally see her in - a bunny girl suit!

She is wearing a lovely blue leotard that compliments her image perfectly, along with net stockings which are made from real material! She is posed on her knees in a sexy pose that is sure to allure both Kanu fans and figure fans alike!
name: Unchou Kanu : Bunny Ver. (かんううんちょうばにーVer.)
series: Ikki Tousen: Shuugaku Toushi Keppuroku (Battle Vixens Season 5)
copyright: © 2011 塩崎雄二・ワニブックス／一騎当千集鍔闘士血風録パートナーズ

subtitle: The hardworking Princess, loved by all her followers.
description: From the popular anime series with a second season on the way, 'DOG DAYS', comes a 1/8th scale figure of the Princess of Biscotti Republic and world-renown songstress, Millhiore F. Biscotti!

The figure is placed in a pose based on a scene from the ending of the anime - it is a dynamic pose of Millihore dancing around with outstretched arms. She also has a huge smile across her face - it's not hard to see why all her followers love her so much, and now you can keep her by your side and love her just as much!
name: Millhiore F. Biscotti (みるひおーれ・F・びすこってぃ)

subtitle: Eight different figures from the Adventure Kartel series - all releasing at the same time!
description: The next set of products from threeA are a set of eight posable figures!! It's the first series brought to you by Good Smile Company, and it is also the first series to feature female figures in the line-up!
name: Adventure Kartel Hoodzomb (Black) (あどべんちゃー かるてる ふーどぞんぶ ぶらっく)

subtitle: "You'll be able to change fate!"
description: That main character from 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', 'Madoka Kaname' is joining the figma series wearing her school uniform!
name: figma Madoka Kaname : School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま かなめまどか せいふくVer.)

subtitle: A collaboration with the vivid casual clothing brand, 'galaxxxy'!
description: GAINAX's popular anime series Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt has joined up with the vivid casual brand 'galaxxxy' to bring you figures of both Panty and Stocking in a much more colorful and stylish design than their standard designs - of course Chuck is included as well, also in a colorful variation!
Enjoy the Anarchy sisters in a way you've never seen them before, with pastel colors to brighten up any dull day!
name: Twin Pack+ : Panty & Stocking with Chuck + galaxxxy (ついんぱっくぷらす ぱんてぃあんどすとっきんぐ うぃず ちゃっく ＋ ぎゃらくしー)

subtitle: The gentle and hardworking Princess of the Biscotti Republic!
description: From the anime set in the alternate world known as Flonyard, 'DOG DAYS', comes a Nendoroid of Millhiore F. Biscotti, the Princess of the Biscotti Republic!

She comes with a set of expressions, as well as some optional parts including a microphone to recreate the scenes in which she sings, as well as the sword Excelied. She also comes with the beloved feathered friend, Harlan! You can even let her ride Harlan using the included extra parts - giving you all sorts of different ways to display her!
name: Nendoroid Millhiore F. Biscotti (ねんどろいど みるひおーれ・F・びすこってぃ)

subtitle: The beautiful girl who is always popular with the boys - but never has any female friends.
description: The anime based on a light novel series, 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai', has finally started airing - and to commemorate, a Nendoroid of Sena Kashiwazaki is on its way!

She comes with three expressions - her standard rather upset looking face, a crying face and an expression with sparkling eyes! She also comes with extra parts to recreate the Neighbor's club clubroom, such as a TV set, a game console and a sofa! You can combine the sofa with the sofa included with Nendoroid Yozora Mikaduki to create a long sofa that both girls can sit on!
Display her together with Yozora and let the rivalry between the two begin - in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Sena Kashiwazaki (ねんどろいど かしわざきせな)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: The curly haired girl with a cheerful outlook to everything!
description: From the anime series created to commemorate P.A Works 10th anniversary, 'Hanasaku Iroha' comes a Nendoroid of the main character who starts working at a Japanese inn, Ohana Matsumae.

She comes with a large variety of optional parts, including four-legged trays to carry meals to the customers at the inn, as well as a broom for her to sweep the entrance. An extra figure of the blue heron that wanders around the inn is also included! She even comes with an extra body to recreate the bondage scene from episode 3 of the series - all these extras as well as various expressions to help recreate all your favorite scenes in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Ohana Matsumae (ねんどろいど まつまえおはな)

subtitle: Kirino's closest friend outside of the otaku world!
description: From the popular anime series 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai" comes a Nendoroid of Kirino's classmate and fellow model, Ayase Aragaki!

She comes with a number of extras, including her cellphone and schoolbag for some casual poses, the doujinshi of 'Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru" and even some handcuffs to recreate the famous scene from the original novel. She also comes with both a worried expression and an upset expression, allowing you to recreate all sorts of your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Ayase Aragaki (ねんどろいど あらがきあやせ)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP

subtitle: Your survival strategy is to find some itasha decals!
description: From the anime series, 'Mawaru Penguindrum' comes a set of water-application decals featuring various illustrations of characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into a 'Penguindrum' itasha, or stick them on anything else around you to easily create some unique Mawaru Penguindrum themed goods!
The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 040: Mawaru Penguindrum (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる040／まわるぴんぐどらむ)
copyright: ©イクニチャウダー/ピングループ

subtitle: Cousin, I'm going to be a figure!
description: From the popular anime 'Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko" comes a 1/8th scale of the self-proclaimed alien who loves to wrap herself up in futons - Erio Touwa!

The figure features her sitting in a pose with an upward glance allowing you to look down upon her her beautiful face - without it being hidden behind a futon! She is wearing her school uniform, and her long blue hair has been sculpted with the greatest care, as it flows down to the ground beside her bare feet. It's a figure filled with charm that any fans of the series will love!
name: Erio Touwa (とうわえりお)
copyright: ©入間人間／アスキー・メディアワークス／『電波女と青春男』製作委員会

subtitle: The honest young girl who always tries her very best!
description: From the anime set in 19th century Paris, 'Ikoku Meiro no Croisée' comes a Nendoroid of Yune, the gentle Japanese girl who helps out in Claude's shop.

Her trademark kimono has been shrunk down to Nendoroid size, but still keeps all its delicate details. She also comes with three expressions, the picture book that Claude gave to her as a present, an umbrella, cleaning headband and apron. She even comes with an extra lower body part that allows her to be posed in the bowing position from the first episode!
A huge set of optional parts to help you recreate your favorite scenes of Yune trying her very best in a foreign land!
name: Nendoroid Yune (ねんどろいど ゆね)
copyright: © 2011 武田日向／富士見書房／異国迷路のクロワーゼ製作委員会

subtitle: Guilty Crown is joining the Character Customize Series line-up!
description: From the anime series, 'Guilty Crown' comes a set of water-application decals featuring various illustrations of characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into a 'Undertakers' itasha, or stick them on anything else around you to easily create some Guilty Crown themed goods!
The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before!
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 041: Guilty Crown (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる041／ぎるてぃくらうん)
copyright: ©ギルティクラウン製作委員会

subtitle: The selfless Mami is joining the Puella Magi figma, ready to fight off some witches!
description: From the popular anime series, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', comes a figma of the veteran Puella Magi, Mami Tomoe!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, winking face and a desperate face for when things don't go her way.
Her hat is included and can be worn or removed with any of the expressions for even more variety.
She also comes with six muskets, along with a little musket stand for each one of them.
The Candy Witch from episode three of the anime series is also included!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mami Tomoe (ふぃぐま ともえまみ)

subtitle: The kindhearted Muramasa, wearing a maid uniform and ready to serve!
description: From the popular PC game, 'Full Metal Daemon: Muramasa' comes this 1/7th scale figure of Muramasa Sansei, the human form of the Tsurugi that Kageaki Minato made a contract with!

She is posed wearing a maid outfit with an embarrassed expression across her face. The figure also comes with a table and tea-set as extras to recreate the atmosphere behind the scene as well - just how many times will she spill the tea this time?
name: Muramasa Sansei (さんせいむらまさ)

subtitle: The King of Overtaking - captivating everyone who watches him race!
description: The F1 race driver with an impressive track record, Kamui Kobayashi, is joining the figma line-up!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
The coloring of the helmet and racing suit have been faithfully reproduced in figma form.
Different head parts allowing you to display him wearing either his helmet or his cap are included.
He also comes with a HANS device to place around his neck to prevent injuries.
Various hand parts are included, such as hands holding his gloves which let you recreate the scene just before the big race.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamui Kobayashi (ふぃぐま こばやしかむい)

subtitle: Japan's strongest swordswoman is joining the figma line-up!
description: From the latest game in the popular Rance PC game series, 'Rance Quest', comes a figma of Kenshin Uesugi - known as Japan's most powerful swordswoman!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a ladylike embarrassed expression and a focused expression for combat.
She comes with various optional parts including a sword and dagger with effect parts, as well as a giant rice ball.
Her helmet can be attached and removed using replaceable parts.
Ten different hand parts are included allowing her to hold weapons at all kinds of angles for all sorts of poses!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kenshin Uesugi (ふぃぐま うえすぎけんしん)

subtitle: Cheer along with these lovable versions of Saber & Rin!
description: As a part of the eighth month of the 'Cheerful JAPAN!' project, a special T-shirt featuring an illustration by Takashi Takeuchi of younger versions of both Saber and Rin will be available! Both of the girls are wearing adorable cheerleader outfits and are ready to cheer on for everyone who needs it!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 1000JPY to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Fate/stay night Cheerful T-shirt (ふぇいとすていないと ちあふる Tしゃつ)

subtitle: The ever-determined, mysterious Puella Magi.
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Homura Akemi, the mysterious, yet beautiful transfer student to Madoka's school! She is posed standing up with a Soul Gem on the back of her left hand - a pose based on one of the key visuals used for the series. She also comes with replaceable arm parts that allow you to equip her with a shield and pistol!
Pick the pose you prefer, and enjoy Homura's determined expression wherever you choose to display her!
name: Homura Akemi (あけみほむら)

subtitle: KAITO is joining the cheering squad!
description: The sixth month of the Cheerful JAPAN! project brings Nendoroid KAITO back in a special Cheerful version!

He comes with the same smiling face and ice cream as the original Nendoroid KAITO, but also comes with a new body, a folding fan and pompons to cheer everyone on! He also comes with a paper-craft headband to wear to put the cheering on a whole new level - pick whatever pose you want, and have KAITO cheer along with the others!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid KAITO: Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど かいと おうえんVer.)

subtitle: The Anarchy Sisters are descending from the heavens in their angel outfits!
description: From GAINAX's popular anime 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' comes another figure set of the two angel sisters, this time as an 'Angel ver.", which features them both wearing their angel outfits.

Both Panty and Stocking are posed in sexy poses with their weapons at the ready - Panty has 'Backlace', her pistols, while Stocking is ready to slice up some ghosts with her katanas 'Stripes 1 & 2'. A Heaven Coin is also included to help the two sisters get back to heaven!
name: Twin Pack+ : Panty & Stocking with Heaven Coin - Angel ver. (ついんぱっくぷらす ぱんてぃあんどすとっきんぐ うぃず へぶんこいん エンジェルver)

subtitle: "I don't want to be protected by her, I want to protect her!"
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figma of Homura Akemi in her school uniform! She comes with shy expressions back from when she wore glasses, as well as a confident looking expression which can be used with the Puella Magi figma version of Homura.

She also comes with a variety of different weapons from the series, and an extra fringe part that includes Madoka's red ribbon. A load of extras creating a set that is sure to please any fans of the series!
name: figma Homura Akemi: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま あけみほむら せいふくver.)

subtitle: Protecting the world from the super-powered Dino-Army!
description: The 11th figure to join the Tomokazu Seki series!

The new figure to join the collection it is the multi-colored hero formed through the sibling bond of Tachibana Zen and Tachibana Ai - Izenborg! Careful detail has been given to every part of the figure from the head down to the feet, to make sure that fans will not be disappointed in any way!
name: Tomokazu Seki - Izenborg (せきともかず・あいぜんぼー)

subtitle: Dressed up for a night of fun in the snow! ♪
description: As a commemoration product for the 63rd Sapporo Snow Festival, a special design for Snow Miku that was voted as the best design on the Piapro website has been made into a Nendoroid! She is wearing a lovely fluffy winter outfit which includes a ribbon with a beautiful jewel in the middle - a new, stylish design for Snow Miku!

She also comes with a mike stand that can also be turned into a shovel for a variety of different poses. A Nendoroid Petite sized snow sculpture of Miku made from clear plastic is also included, as well as an ice stage with LED lights which can light up the lovely sculpture for all to enjoy!
(The LED stage requires 3 AAA batteries to operate. Batteries are not included.)
name: Nendoroid Snow Miku: Fluffy Coat Ver. (ねんどろいど ゆきみく ふわふわこーとVer.)

subtitle: A load of optional parts to create all sorts of scenes from the series!
description: Nendoroid Homura Akemi is back, this time wearing her school uniform! She comes complete with three different expressions, a bag for school and her handkerchief. She even comes with a separate lower body part that allows you to display her sitting down.

But there is even more! She also comes with an extra fringe part that is wearing Madoka's ribbon, a bow and arrow, wings and new arm parts that let you recreate the pose from one of the series' famous key visuals. You can combine this Nendoroid with the standard Puella Magi Nendoroid of Homura to enjoy more variety than ever before!
name: Nendoroid Homura Akemi : School Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど あけみほむら せいふくVer.)

subtitle: Even more Pettanko figures to join the collection!
description: From the popular light novel series, 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes another one of Penguin Parade's new pettanko figures - this time of Mikoto's roommate, 'Kuroko Shirai'. The new Pettanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her with Petanko Mikoto Misaka!
name: Petanko Kuroko Shirai (ぺたんこ しらいくろこ)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ撮影 ： 井上写真スタジオ

subtitle: The Glamorous Shirley - fast, big and soft!
description: From the popular anime series 'Strike Witches' with a theatrical release coming next year, comes a Nendoroid of Charlotte E. Yeager, one of the squad member with a body to boast about!

She comes with both a smiling face that suits her playful personality perfectly, as well as an expression for combat, in which she is still smiling, ready to take on any enemies that come her way! She also of course comes with her Striker Unit, bunny ears and tail to recreate scenes where she is flying through the clouds, trying to break yet another speed record!
Be sure to display her with Lucchini, and recreate scenes between the two friends!
name: Nendoroid Charlotte E. Yeager (ねんどろいど しゃーろっと・E・いぇーがー)

subtitle: A new friend is joining the Nendoroids!
description: Desert Army-san is being released as a Nendoroid!
name: Nendoroid Desert Army-san (ねんどろいど さばくのあーみーさん)
copyright: ©ヒライユキオ／ホビージャパン  Photography : Inowye Studio

subtitle: The Puella Magi are joining the Nendoroid Petite lineup!
description: From the popular anime, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a set of small and adorable Nendoroid Petite action figures featuring the main cast of the series!

The set features the five main characters each in two different versions - the first set has each of them wearing their Puella Magi outfits, posed as they were in one of the key illustrations for the series.

The second set has all of them wearing their school uniforms, or casual clothes. Kyubey is included with both versions of Madoka, as well as with Sayaka's school uniform version - plus there is also one secret figure for you to look forward to!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Puella Magi Madoka Magica (ねんどろいど ぷち まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか)

subtitle: A 1/43rd scale miniature car, in commemoration of victory!
description: The Miku Hatsune BMW has managed to become the season champion in the 2011 GT300 class tournament. The famous car that won this season, the "Miku Hatsune GOODSMILE BMW Z4" is turning into an officially BMW and GT licensed miniature car!

The car features the same coloring and decals used on the car used during the tournament that gave the car its champion title. It is made from high quality resin, for both great quality and amazing detail!
name: Miku Hatsune GOODSMILE BMW Z4 2011 - Sepang Champion Ver. (はつねみく GOODSMILE BMW Z4 2011 せぱんはつゆうしょう Ver.)
copyright: ©Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: The two Steins;Gate girls are working together to cheer everyone up!
description: As a part of the fifth month of the 'Cheerful JAPAN!' project, A Nendoroid set of both Kurisu Makise and Mayuri Shiina from the game and anime series 'Steins;Gate' are rejoining the Nendoroid world in cheerleader outfits!

They come complete with pompons, megaphones and support flags. Kurisu comes with an encouraging expression as well as a worried expression, while Mayuri comes with a cheerful expression and a '(´・ω・｀)' face - but it doesn't matter which expression you use, if you pose the two of them together, they'll be set to cheer for anyone!
For each sale made, Good Smile Company will donate 2000JPY to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid Kurisu Makise & Mayuri Shiina: Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど まきせくりす＆しいなまゆり おうえんVer.)

subtitle: Monthly Anime Style's 6th issue features a special look at 'Ano Hana'!
description: The sixth volume of Monthly Anime Style is a special issue focusing on the Noitamina series, 'Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai', which was one of 2011's most appreciated anime series. As usual, Monthly Anime Style will be taking a very in-depth look at the series, from start to finish! Not to mention that the issue is also loaded with illustrations and visuals that any fan of the series will enjoy. The issue will include a Nendoroid Petite of Menma.

The second special feature in this issue is a look at Hiroyuki Imaishi's Anime Style. Hiroyuki Imaishi is famous for his work on 'Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagaan', 'Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt' and other series - and he is here to share his creative secrets with you!
Along with both the above special features, the issue will also take a look at other series and creators - not to mention it is serializing loads of series including Masaaki Yuasa's 'Konnano Sekai'.

*Monthly Anime Style is a monthly publication that delves into the production side of anime while also featuring a look at some rare images of the original works. Each issue will feature a Nendoroid Petite relating to the special feature in each issue!
name: Monthly Anime Style - Issue 6 (げっかんあにめすたいる だいろくごう)

subtitle: Overtaking all his opponents, with Japan's dream resting on his shoulders!
description: The F1 race driver with an impressive track record, Kamui Kobayashi, is becoming a Nendoroid!

Even when shrunk down to Nendoroid size, the coloring and details on his helmet and racing suit have all been faithfully preserved based on their originals - even the sponsors names are included on his outfit. He also comes with extra parts that allow you to display him either holding his helmet, or wearing it - however you'd prefer to see him!
name: Nendoroid Kamui Kobayashi (ねんどろいど こばやしかむい)

subtitle: Even more Pettanko figures to join the collection!
description: From the popular light novel series, 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes another one of Penguin Parade's new pettanko figures - this time of Tokiwadai's Level 1 Electromaster, Mikoto Misaka! The new Pettanko series of figures features chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her with Petanko Kuroko Shirai
name: Petanko Mikoto Misaka (ぺたんこ みさかみこと)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ撮影 ： 井上写真スタジオ

subtitle: Cheering everyone along with a playful whistle!
description: As part of the forth month of the Cheerful JAPAN! project, Nendoroid Rin Kagamine is coming back in a special 'Cheerful version', and just like the original Nendoroid, she comes with blank faces and expression stickers to create your very own expressions.

The Cheerful version also features lots of new parts, such as pompons, a support flag and a whistle, which she can hold and blow - a set of parts that allows her to easily show her support! Be sure to display her with her twin brother, Nendoroid Len Kagamine: Cheerful ver. which will be available at the same time!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid Rin Kagamine : Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど かがみねりん おうえんver.)

subtitle: Shouting out words of encouragement as loud as possible!
description: As part of the forth month of the Cheerful JAPAN! project, Nendoroid Len Kagamine is coming back in a special 'Cheerful version', and just like the original Nendoroid, he comes with blank faces and expression stickers to create your very own expressions.

The Cheerful version also features lots of new parts, such as pompons, a support flag and a megaphone, which he can hold and use to shout out his support! Be sure to display him with his twin sister, Nendoroid Rin Kagamine: Cheerful ver. which will be be available at the same time!
For each figure sold, Good Smile Company will be donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.
name: Nendoroid Len Kagamine: Cheerful Ver. (ねんどろいど かがみねれん おうえんver.)

subtitle: A collaboration model between threeA and Linkin Park
description: A product announced at the charity event 'A Thousand Horizons', which was held on the 9th September 2011.

Linkin Park, currently well known for the theme songs in the Transformers movie series, is working with threeA in an incredible collaboration to bring you a charity product - 10% of all proceeds will be donated to relief efforts in Japan.

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them. Linkin Park Linkin Park is a 6-man rock band consisting of Chester Bennington on vocals, Rob Bourdon on drums, Brad Delson on guitar, Joe Hahn as the DJ, Dave 'Phoenix' Farrell on bass and Mike Shinoda also on vocals. The band has won two Grammy awards - their first was 'Best Hard Rock Performance' for their hit single 'Crawling' in 2002. The second was for 'Best Rap/Sung Collaboration' which was awarded to their collaboration song with JayZ titled 'Numb/Encore' in 2006.

Since their debut in 2000, Linkin Park have sold over 50 million albums worldwide, with their first album 'Hybrid Theory' having sold 18 million copies alone, making it a diamond rated album. According to SoundScan/Billboard, Linkin Park is also the best-selling Rock/Alternative band of the past 10 years.

In 2005, the band joined with the Red Cross Society and created 'Music for Relief', which helps to raise donation money when disasters strike around the world, and raise money for various other charity projects.
A Thousand Horizons Official Website http:1000horizons.com/
name: WWRp BRAMBLE MK2 GATLING Linkin Park EXCLUSIVE (WWRp ぶらんぶる まーくつー がとりんぐ りんきんぱーく えくすくるーしぶ)

subtitle: The naughty Catherine is here to make you her prisoner
description: From the popular action adventure game, 'Catherine' comes a 1/7th scale figure of Catherine herself - the mysterious girl who suddenly appears in Vincent's life and seduces him.

She is posed in a sexy pose showing off her long, slim legs as she pulls on one of her stockings with a naughty look on her face. Her charming face and beautifully proportioned body will let you find out just why Vincent couldn't resist her!
name: Catherine (きゃさりん)

subtitle: The junior high idols are ready to make their Nendoroid debut!
description: The popular idol unit 'ClariS', known for singing the opening songs to popular anime series such as 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' and 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' is getting the Nendoroid Petite treatment!

This version is based on the ClariS girls as illustrated by Hiro Kanzaki for their debut single, 'irony'. The set will also come with a special stand that will let you display them on top of the CD case! You can have the ClariS girls by your side whenever you listen to 'irony', or their new single - 'nexus'!
name: Nendoroid Petite: ClariS Set – irony Ver. (ねんどろいどぷち くらりすせっと あいろにー Ver.)
copyright: © 2011 SME Records Inc, All rights reserved.

subtitle: An ongoing declaration of war!
description: From the popular song composed by ryo and produced by supercell with illustrations by Shirou Miwa, 'Love is War,' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Miku Hatsune in a Love is War version!

Her long flowing hair is blowing up behind her, her skirt is also flying up in the wind as she holds a megaphone in her one hand and leans over the edge of a railing, shouting out about her love. It's a beautiful and dynamic pose that recreates Shirou Miwa's original illustration perfectly!
It's a figure that represents the war a girl goes through when in love, and the figure itself has just as much power behind it as the song that it is based on!
name: Miku Hatsune: Love is War ver. (はつねみく こいはせんそうver.)

subtitle: Nanoha and Fate's summer memories...
description: From the movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a set of two Nendoroid Petite figures - one of Nanoha Takamachi and the other of Fate Testarossa.

Nanoha is posed pulling on Fate's hand trying to get her to swim, while they stand on a base filled with sand and beach toys - including a beach ball and a floating tube which can be worn by the girls! Everything you need to keep their summer memories by your side forever!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Nanoha & Fate - Summer Memories Set (ねんどろいどぷち なのは＆ふぇいと なつのおもいでせっと)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: Miku's mysterious Append ver. is also joining the Nendoroid world!
description: From the additional library pack released for Hatsune Miku, titled 'Hatsune Miku: Append', comes a brand new Miku Nendoroid!

She comes with three expressions - a smiling face, a singing face and a face with closed eyes. She also comes with a completely separate body to recreate her awakened state in Nendoroid form, which can also be posed in mid-air using the included stand to recreate the famous package art for Hatsune Miku: Append.
The stand is also fitted with LED lights allowing you to light up the figure - perfect to complement the unique translucent feeling surrounding Hatsune Miku: Append!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Append (ねんどろいど はつねみく・あぺんど)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the palm-top tiger, Taiga Aisaka!
description: From the anime Toradora! comes a Nendoroid of the main heroine from the series, Taiga Aisaka!

She comes with her a standard expression, as well as a much angrier looking frowning expression. She also comes with a variety of arm and hand parts, such as arms to put her hand on her hip, folded arms, and even a hand for her to hold her wooden sword - making it easy to pose Taiga in all her most common poses! She also comes with a little palm-top tiger!
name: Nendoroid Taiga Aisaka (ねんどろいど あいさかたいが)
copyright: © 竹宮ゆゆこ／アスキー・メディアワークス／『とらドラ！』製作委員会

subtitle: The assassin whose very body is a weapon - Nendoroid Yami!
description: A spinoff manga of the ever popular ToLoveRu series, 'ToLoveRu Darkness' is currently being serialized in Jump Square, and from that series comes an adorable Nendoroid of the dangerous assassin from another world - Golden Darkness!

She comes with three expressions, a typical expressionless face ideal for her personality, an embarrassed and angry looking expression and finally a blank stare. She also comes with a bag of taiyaki as well as a book to carry around with her - two things you rarely see Yami without!

Last but not least, she also comes with replaceable hair parts which allow you to pose her with her hair made into a number of fists - ready to punch anyone who makes her upset! There are so many different ways you can pose her - pick whichever you like best!
name: Nendoroid Golden Darkness (ねんどろいど こんじきのやみ)
copyright: © 矢吹健太朗・長谷見沙貴／集英社・とらぶる製作委員会

subtitle: Elsie's tsundere classmate and friend!
description: From the anime series, 'The World God Only Knows' comes a Nendoroid of the beautiful and smart, albeit somewhat stubborn demon - Haqua!

She comes with three expressions - a standard expression, an upset expression and a surprised expression. She also comes with the scythe that proves she graduated from demon school with the best grades, her purple raiment around her neck and of course a jar to seal away the runaway spirits!
Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Elsie and recreate your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Haqua (ねんどろいど はくあ)
copyright: © 若木民喜／小学館・落とし神駆け魂隊・テレビ東京

subtitle: Cousin, I'm going to be a Nendoroid!
description: From 'Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko' comes a Nendoroid of the self-proclaimed alien, Erio Touwa!

She comes complete with parts that allow her to to be displayed wrapped up in a futon, as well as parts that let her stick just her head out of the futon! She also comes with extra bits that let you pose her sitting on the floor, munching on her favorite food - pizza!

She even comes with the UFO attached to a stick - plenty of optional parts allowing you to display her however you prefer! In fact, there are so many parts that you can display a second Erio using nothing but the optional parts!
name: Nendoroid Erio Touwa (ねんどろいど とうわえりお)
copyright: © 入間人間／アスキー・メディアワークス／『電波女と青春男』製作委員会

subtitle: The mysterious leader of the Gentlemen Thieves!
description: From the popular anime 'Tantei Opera Milky Holmes' comes of 1/8th scale figure of the leader of the Gentlemen Thieves, Arséne!

She is posed in the enchanting pose from the ending theme of the anime, which shows off her stunning body in a very sexy outfit with her hips bent to the side and her fingertips slipping into the top of her long black boots. The mask over her face can be removed and placed in her hand instead - just pick the way you prefer to display her!
name: Arséne (あるせーぬ)

subtitle: A model of the Light Cycle that boasts both unrivaled speed and mobility!
description: From the action film 'Tron: Legacy' comes a model of a light cycle - the futuristic two-wheeled vehicle similar to a motorcycle that is powered by the grid and creates a light wall wherever it drives. The original 3D CAD modelling data used in the film has been used as a basis for the figure.

Lighting units have been been attached to the front and back wheels as well as the engine of the bike, and parts of the body makes use of a die-casting to creating a model that really looks just like the original!
Please note that the model and the base are attached, and cannot be separated.
name: Light Cycle 2010 Diecast Figure (らいとさいくる2010だいきゃすとふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: huke's first art book, with a figma included!
description: huke is a popular illustrator who has done the character designs for series such as Steins;Gate and is the creator of Black Rock Shooter. His first art book, 'BLK' is now being released, and to commemorate it's release, the limited edition will come with a figma of the newly illustrated character - Black Rock Shooter BEAST!

The figma comes with multiple expressions, as well as the BRS Blade and Seven Shot that feature in the illustration - all finely detailed to be as close to the original illustration as possible. Enjoy huke's wonderful illustrations and get a great figma of BRSB all at the same time!
name: BLK Limited Edition (figma BRSB Included) (びーえるけー げんていばん(ふぃぐま BRSBどうこん）)
series: イラストレーターhuke氏初画集

subtitle: The solitary berserker who challenges his fate!
description: From the upcoming film based on the popular manga 'Berserk', comes a figma of the main character that has sworn revenge against the God Hand - Guts!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with a standard expression as well as an expression with gritted teeth, for combat scenes.
He also comes with his giant sword, the 'Dragon Slayer', as well as extra arm parts that allow you to recreate scenes of him shooting his cannon arm.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Guts: Black Swordsman ver. (ふぃぐま がっつ くろいけんしver.)
copyright: © 三浦建太郎（スタジオ我画）/ 白泉社

subtitle: A set of model car decals for all fans of the Sora no Otoshimono movie!
description: From 'Sora no Otoshimono the Movie: The Angeloid of Clockwork' comes a set of water-application decals featuring illustrations of the cute angeloids and other characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into a angeloid itasha, or stick them on anything else to easily create some Sora no Otoshimono themed goods!

The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before! They are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 035: Sora no Otoshimono the Movie: The Angeloid of Clockwork - 1/24 Scale (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる035／げきじょうばんそらのおとしもの とけいじかけのえんじぇろいど)
series: Sora no Otoshimono the Movie: The Angeloid of Clockwork (Heaven's Lost Property)
copyright: ©2011 水無月すう／角川書店／新大陸発見部

subtitle: The shy girl with a snake wrapped around her.
description: From the popular anime, 'Bakemonogatari', comes a figure of the shy Nadeko Sengoku.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, a gentle smiling face and an embarrassed face ideal for Nadeko.
Her trademark hat and the coat that she drapes over her shoulders are both included and can be attached or removed.
She also comes with a second version of the coat, allowing for more dynamic poses.
Hands that are clasped together are included, as well as the lucky charm she always held while wishing her curse away.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: Another set of decals featuring the lovable Kud-chan!
description: From the PC game, 'Kud Wafter' comes a set of water-application decals featuring illustrations of the adorable Kudryavka Noumi and her friends! You can change your favorite model car into a Kudryavka itasha, or stick them on anything else to easily create some Kud Wafter themed goods!

The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before! They are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 036: Kud Wafter - 1/24 Scale (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる036／くどわふたー)

subtitle: The popular comedy series is joining the GSR character decal series!
description: From the popular anime series, 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a set of water-application decals featuring all the characters from the series! You can change your favorite model car into a 'Haganai' itasha, or stick them on anything else to easily create some Yoroza or Sena themed goods!

The quality of the decals have been improving with every release, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before! They are designed to be used with the GSR Modeler Support Series' 'Decal Fitter', and 'Decal Fitter Pro'.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 037: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai - 1/24 Scale (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる037／ぼくはともだちがすくない)

Grab the other upcoming characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!

subtitle: The love comedy filled with regret!
description: From the series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes an adorable plushie of Sena Kashiwazaki, the girl who is perfect in almost every way - other than her personality. She is wearing St. Chronica's Academy uniform which has carefully been shrunk down to plushie size!
Grab the other upcoming characters in the plushie series and recreate the Neighbor's Club in the fluffiest form possible!
name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Plushie Series 01: Sena Kashiwazaki (ぼくはともだちがすくない ぬいぐるみしりーず② かしわざき せな)

subtitle: The last two girls in the Bakemonogatari Plushie series!
description: The 5th set of plushies from the Bakemonogatari plushie set are here - this time featuring Nadeko Sengoku and Tsubasa Hanekawa as cute plushies to join the collection! Both Nadeko's trademark hat and Tsubasa's cat hair accessories have all been shrunk down into huggable plushie size!
Grab them both and then display them with all the previously released characters!
name: Bakemonogatari Plushie Series 10 : Tsubasa Hanekawa (ばけものがたりぬいぐるみシリーズ⑩ はねかわ つばさ)

subtitle: The last two girls in the Bakemonogatari Plushie series!
description: The 5th set of plushies from the Bakemonogatari plushie set are here - this time featuring Nadeko Sengoku and Tsubasa Hanekawa as cute plushies to join the collection! Both Nadeko's trademark hat and Tsubasa's cat hair accessories have all been shrunk down into huggable plushie size!
Grab them both and then display them with all the previously released characters!
