subtitle: huke's first ever art book, BLK!
description: huke is a popular illustrator who has done the character designs for series such as Steins;Gate and is the creator of Black Rock Shooter. His first art book, 'BLK' is now being released, filled with various illustrations from the Black Rock Shooter world, Stein's Gate and more! The book has 240 pages filled with huke's best illustrations.
If you're a fan of huke's unique artwork and coloring, you won't want to miss out on the very first collection of his stunning illustrations!
name: BLK (びーえるけー)
series: イラストレーターhuke氏初画集

subtitle: Carry Kyubey around with you!
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a special ball-point pen featuring Kyubey, including some recordings of his voice! The design of the pen is based on Madoka's illustration in the series, with a little Kyubey on the top holding a Soul Gem. If you press down on Kyubey, he'll say one of his lines from the series!
name: Kyubey Pen with Voice (きゅぅべえぼいすつきぺん)

subtitle: The lovable nun who is always hungry, and loves to eat!
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes a figma of the nun with a perfect memory, Index!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her skirt is made from fabric, allowing for easy posing even in her long skirt.
She comes with three expressions - a standard face, an upset face and the face with sparkling eyes that she had whenever she insisted on something.
The wimple that she wears on her head can be removed using separate hair parts.
She comes with various hand parts, including praying hands and hands holding a knife and fork.
Her kitten, Sphinx, is also included to be displayed by her side - or on her head!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Index (ふぃぐま いんでっくす)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬/アスキー・メディアワークス/PROJECT-INDEX Ⅱ

description: The long-awaited cycling apparel from the popular band, 'JAM Project' Cycling apparel featuring the logo and lyrics from JAM Project! Burn with a passionate heart as you ride your bike up the mountains, by the coast or through the city!
· JAM Project! Cycling Jersey · JAM Project! Cycling Cycling Bib Shorts · JAM Project! Cycling Pants
name: JAM Project: Cycle Wear Series (「じゃむ ぷろじぇくと」さいくるうぇあしりーず)

subtitle: Out on a newspaper delivery run with Wanko! Vroom, vroom! ♪
description: "Friendship is the key to saving the world"" in the popular anime series Vivid Red Operation, and from that series comes this 1/8th scale figure of the energetic and cheerful main character, Akane Isshiki!

The pose is based on a key visual illustration of Akane out on her part-time job as a newspaper delivery girl, riding 'Wanko', the hoverbike created by her grandfather! You can even see Akane's mayonnaise strap to the back of Wanko, showing just how much she loves her mayonnaise!
name: Akane Isshiki (いっしきあかね)

subtitle: The beautiful swordswoman who excels at cooking... is back again!
description: From 'Sword Art Online' comes a Nendoroid rerelease of the beautiful swordswoman and sub-leader of the Knights of Blood, Asuna! She comes with three different expressions including her standard expression, a serious expression to for combat poses and even the cheerful smiling expression she often showed to Kirito!

Her rapier, 'Lambent Light', is included in both its standard form as well as the form it took whenever she made use of a sword skill, allowing you to recreate all sorts of scenes from the online world of Sword Art Online!
name: Nendoroid Asuna (ねんどろいど あすな)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: The sexy witch with an unparalleled power.
description: From the action game for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, 'Bayonetta', comes a 1/7th scale figure of Bayonetta, the main character herself!

The figure is a faithful rendition of a CG illustration from the game which places Bayonetta in a dynamic pose wearing a number of accessories and with pistols in both hands and on both feet! The semi-clear pedestal she stands on is based on the butterfly effects from her attacks and jumping animations in the game. It's a bold and detailed rendition of the sexy Bayonetta, for all of her fans to enjoy!
name: Bayonetta (べよねった)

subtitle: "Wouldn't you like to accelerate even faster?"
description: From the anime ‘Accel World’ comes a 1/8th scale figure of the elegant and cunning young lady, Kuroyukihime! She has been sculpted in her butterfly avatar form, wearing a black dress which contrasts beautifully with her pale skin.

Her long dress spreads out magnificently to the floor, and the lacing on the edges features a beautiful transparent purple – everything has been sculpted to the finest of details. Her outfit together with her huge wings create a beautiful, mystical figure of Kuroyukihime for fans to enjoy.
name: Kuroyukihime (くろゆきひめ)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: "Ignition! Texture on!"
description: From the anime series 'Vivid Red Operation' comes a Nendoroid of the ever-cheerful main character, Akane Isshiki! She comes with two expressions including her standard smiling face, as well as a transformation expression which can be used together with the included 'Operation Key' to pose her in the transformation scene from the series!

Her hover-bike 'Wanko' is also included as an optional part for her to ride on, and the otter form of Kenjirou Isshiki, 'Uso-kun' is included to stand by her side! Of course a bottle of Akane's favorite mayonnaise is also included, allowing you to recreate a number of your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Akane Isshiki (ねんどろいど いっしきあかね)

subtitle: "Don't forget. No matter which world line you're in, you aren't alone. I'm there with you."
description: The 'hypothetical science adventure' game "Steins;Gate" has recently had a sequel and movie version released, and from that series comes a figma of Kurisu Makise wearing her white lab coat!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a rather intense glaring expression, an expression with closed eyes and an embarrassed expression.
Parts to pose Kurisu with crossed arms or with her hands in her pockets are both included. An arm with Mirai Gadget #12 'Darling no Baka' is also included.
Her slippers can be taken off and put back on whenever you like.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kurisu Makise: White Coat ver. (ふぃぐま まきせくりす はくいver.)

subtitle: The expert alchemist, all grown up.
description: From the PS3 game 'Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the first-class alchemist, Totori - who has now grown up into a young adult. Her new outfit makes use of a flexible, transparent material to recreate the original illustration as best as possible in figure form.
Her homunculus, 'Chimu-chan' is also included, taking the same pose as Totori and looking adorable standing on a chair by her side. Be sure to display her with Meruru and Rorona from the same series!
name: Totori: 19 Year Old ver. (ととり19さいver.)
series: Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland
copyright:
© GUST CO.,LTD.
© コーエーテクモゲームス All rights reserved.

subtitle: The ultimate goddess of figures is descending from the heavens, exclusive to this magazine!
description: Figure Japan is a figure collector's magazine with each issue focusing on a specific anime series and including a figure from that series. Each issue will have a complete figure catalog and a listing of new and upcoming products from the series it is based on, focusing on the figure included with that issue. It's filled with lovely photos and all sorts of figure-related information, creating the perfect fan book for figure fans!
The first issue will be focusing on the popular series with a new movie coming this Fall, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica'! The included figure this time around is a GSC 1/10th scale Ultimate Madoka!
name: Figure JAPAN: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Edition (ふぃぎゅあじゃぱん『まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか』へん)
series: Figure JAPAN: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Edition
copyright:
© Magica Quartet／Aniplex・Madoka Movie Project

subtitle: A rerelease?! This must also be the choice of Steins;Gate!
description: From the sci-fi adventure series "Steins;Gate" comes a rerelease of the young genius, figma Kurisu Makise!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, an angry face and a smirking face. You can create both sides of her tsundere personality!
Extra arm parts are included to recreate her classic 'folded arm' pose. Mirai Gadget #6: 'Cyalume Saber' is also included.
A total of 12 extra hand parts are included, including hands that allow her to hold important items from the game, such as her cellphone and a drink bottle.

subtitle: "It seems you really are a complete and utter pervert."
description: From the romantic comedy anime series "Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko" comes a Nendoroid of the cute and calm heroine of the series, Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi! She can take a number of popular poses from the series including the pose seen on the first volume of the original light novel!

Optional parts include cat ears and a tail to recreate cute catgirl poses, and other food-related parts such as the nikuman she ate together with Youto, as well as a plate of curry and rice are also included! She even comes with a chewing expression to pose together with the food, showing just how much she loves to eat!
name: Nendoroid Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi (ねんどろいど つつかくしつきこ)
copyright: ©2013 さがら総・メディアファクトリー／「変猫。」製作委員会

subtitle: Tony Stark is back again, this time with a special stand to show off the Iron Man suits of the past!
description: From the much-awaited sequel in the Iron Man movie series 'Iron Man 3' comes a Nendoroid of the Iron Man Mark 42 Suit! The design has changed considerably compared to the previously released Mark 7, but is once again fully articulated allowing for epic poses that still look adorable in Nendoroid size!

All the elaborate details of the Mark 42 have been faithfully sculpted and painted to make a Nendoroid that fans will be proud to display! Special effect parts to display him flying or in combat, as well as an alternate head part to display Tony Stark without the mask are all included!

A miniature 'Hall of Armor' is also included which features the Mark 1 through Mark 7 suits all lined up, and also acts as a display stand! He even comes with alternate parts to recreate the scene where he punches the ground after putting on the suit! There are so many parts to help you create your favorite scenes from the movie!
name: Nendoroid Iron Man Mark 42: Hero’s Edition + Hall of Armor Set (ねんどろいど あいあんまん まーく42 ひーろーず・えでぃしょん+ほーる・おぶ・あーまーせっと)

subtitle: "Don't be afraid. This is the fate you chose for yourself."
description: From the new movie series 'The Amazing Spider-Man' comes a figma of the web-slinging hero himself, Spider-Man!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The entire figure has makes use of a metallic coating to recreate the unique look of his spandex suit.
Optional parts include spider web parts as well as the smartphone and backpack that have become trademark to the series.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Spider-Man (ふぃぐま すぱいだーまん)
copyright: Spider-Man, the Character TM & © 2012 Marvel Characters, Inc. The Amazing Spider-Man, the Movie© 2012 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The silent necromancer is here in a bunny girl outfit!
description: From the anime series 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?' comes a figure of Eucliwood Hellscythe, the necromancer with beautiful doll-like blue eyes and long silver hair who starts living with Ayumu. She is wearing an adorable bunny girl suit giving her quite a different look to the armor she normally wears.

Her hair is tied up in twin-tails which suits her cute look while the sexy outfit creates interesting contrast to her young appearance! The figure is also an impressive 1/4th scale in size and the net tights covering her legs are made from fabric for a more realistic look.
name: Eucliwood Hellscythe: Bunny Ver. (ゆーくりうっど・へるさいず ばにーVer.)
series: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? Of the Dead
copyright: ©2012 木村心一・こぶいち むりりん／富士見書房／マテライズ魔法学校

subtitle: Hayate is joining the others in her swimsuit! ♪♪
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE A's' comes a figure of Hayate Yagami wearing a cute bikini! Be sure to display her with the previously released Nanoha Takamachi: Swimsuit ver. & Fate Testarossa: Swimsuit ver. to multiply the cuteness even more!

* Photos of Hayate Yagami: Swimsuit Ver. represent a prototype still in production. The final product may differ. * Photos of Nanoha Takamachi: Swimsuit Ver. & Fate Testarossa: Swimsuit Ver. are photos of the final released products. * Hayate Yagami's base is not final.
name: Hayate Yagami: Swimsuit Ver. (やがみはやて みずぎVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The diligent girl who tries to keep things calm at the Hidamari Apartments.
description: From the anime 'Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb' comes a figma of the diligent Sae!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with two expressions: a standard expression and an embarrassed expression.
Her normal glasses, as well as fogged up glasses are both included.
Head parts for 'Nori' are also included allowing you to display either of the two girls!
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Sae (ふぃぐま さえ)
copyright: ©蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: Get ready to take more photos of the girls... this time as Nendoroid Petites!
description: From the game that became a popular anime series 'Photo Kano' comes a set of Nendoroid Petites of the girls that become models for the main character's photos! The set includes seven different characters including Haruka Niimi, Aki Muroto, Mai Sakura, Hikari Sanehara, Nonoka Masaki, Rina Yunoki and Tomoe Misumi!

They are all sculpted in the lovely poses from the anime's key visual, each sitting atop a desk while posing for the camera! There is also one secret character, meaning if you want to get a photo of them altogether you'll need to collect all eight!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Photo Kano (ねんどろいどぷち ふぉとかの)
copyright: ©ENTERBRAIN, INC. Developed by DINGO Inc./フォトカノ製作委員会

subtitle: "That's not true!"
description: From the anime series 'Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation' comes a Super High School Level Nendoroid of Makoto Naegi, the main character of the series! He comes with three expressions including his uncertain standard expression, a shouting expression for when he is trying to prove things and a surprised expression for when things don't go his way!

Optional parts include a witness stand and a 'confutation' sign, allowing you to recreate your favorite scenes from the class trials! Be sure to display him with the previously released Nendoroid Monokuma to even further recreate the deadly academy life of Kibougamine Academy.
name: Nendoroid Makoto Naegi (ねんどろいど なえぎまこと)
series: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation
copyright: ©Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd. / 希望ケ峰学園映像部 All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Macross heroines through the ages!
description: In commemoration of Macross’ 30th anniversary, a set of heroines from various Macross series are being released in a cute set of Nendoroid Petite trading figures! The set contains a total of seven characters including Lynn Minmay, Sharon Apple, Mylene Jenius, Sara Nome, Ranka Lee, Sheryl Nome and one secret character! Be sure to collect and display them all together! ♪
name: Nendoroid Petite: Macross Heroines (ねんどろいどぷち まくろすひろいん)
series: Macross: Do You Remember Love?, Macross Plus, Macross 7, Macross Zero, Macross F
copyright: ©1984,1994,2002 ビックウエスト ©2007 ビックウエスト／マクロスF製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: The Picktam! series has begun its invasion!
description: A new series of rubber strap accessories featuring swappable parts! The first set to join the series is none other than the characters from the popular manga and anime series, 'Attack on Titan'!

The set features eight characters including Eren Yeager, Mikasa Ackerman, Armin Arlert, Levi, Sasha Braus, Jean Kirschtein, Christa Renz and one secret character! Each character's face part had two sides each with a different expression, allowing you to pick the one that suits your mood best each day!
name: Picktam! Attack on Titan: Part 1 (ぴくたむ！ しんげきのきょじん ぱーと1)
copyright: © 諫山創・講談社 / 「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: "I shall allow you to be my temporary servant."
description: From the anime series 'Rozen Maiden' comes a Nendoroid of the fifth Rozen Maiden, Shinku! She comes with various expressions including a cute doll face, a face with closed eyes and an upset glaring face. A fighting expression will now also be included as a bonus forth expression! She also comes with her wind-up key and doll case creating a complete doll set for fans to enjoy!

Other optional parts include a teacup and saucer allowing you to pose her enjoying her beloved tea, and even some 'Rosetail' effects to display her in combat! Bring your very own Shinku home and enjoy her in whichever pose you think suits her best!
*Please note the doll case cannot close with Nendoroid Shinku inside it.
name: Nendoroid Shinku: Rozen Maiden Set (ねんどろいど しんく ろーぜんめいでんせっと)
copyright: ©PEACH-PIT・集英社／ローゼンメイデン製作委員会

subtitle: A Nendoroid destined to start a revolution.
description: The popular music artist 'T.M. Revolution' is joining the Nendoroid series wearing the stage outfit seen during his live tour 'T.M.R. LIVE REVOLUTION'13 -UNDER：COVER 2-'. The Nendoroid also includes the 'CLOUD' seen in his 'Preserved Roses' music video, along with a sticker allowing you to recreate the important cut on his cheek seen in the music video!

Various other optional parts such as a mike stand, tour T-shirt and towel are all also included to recreate one of his live performances! You can choose to pose him in the cool poses from the music video, or instead have him performing for you live on stage!
name: Nendoroid T.M. Revolution (ねんどろいど てぃー・えむ・れぼりゅーしょん)

subtitle: Cycle apparel from Danganronpa!
description: From the popular anime series 'Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation' comes a set of cycling apparel. Become a top high-school class cyclist and enjoy cycling more than ever before!

■ Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation Cycling Jersey: Monokuma ver. ■ Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation Cycling Jersey: Kibougamine Academy ver. ■ Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation Cycling Jersey: Kibougamine Academy Monotone ver. ■ Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation Cycling Bib Shorts
name: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation: Cycle Series (「だんがんろんぱ きぼうのがくえんとぜつぼうのこうこうせい じ あにめーしょん」さいくるしりーず)
series: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation
copyright: © Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd./希望ヶ峰学園映像部 All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Guts' former appearance, back in the Golden Age.
description: From the anime film series 'Berserk: Golden Age Arc' comes a figma of the Band of the Hawk's Commander, Guts!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with both a standard expression and a shouting expression for combat scenes.
Gut's huge sword is included along with a number of hand parts, allowing you to recreate all sorts of scenes.
An articulated figma stand is included.
name: figma Guts: Band of the Hawk ver. (ふぃぐま がっつ たかのだんver.)
copyright: ©三浦建太郎（スタジオ我画）・白泉社/ BERSERK FILM PARTNERS.

subtitle: The carefree, gentle girl who takes care of everyone in the Hidamari Apartments.
description: From the anime 'Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb' comes a figma of the gentle Hiro!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a smiling expression as well as a upset expression.
Head parts for 'Nazuna' are also included allowing you to display either of the two girls!
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hiro (ふぃぐま ひろ)
copyright: ©蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: "Our fight has only just begun!"
description: From the anime series with a needlessly impressive staff line-up and a second season on the way, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc' comes a second set of four clear files for fans to enjoy. The designs each feature the various characters from the series, with each design focusing on one of the four classic themes of natural beauty: flowers, birds, the wind and the moon.

The files all have illustrations on both the back and front each with a complete story to tell - allowing you to enjoy the world of wooser and friends while also keeping all of your important documents safe!
name: wooser Clear Files (flower/bird/wind/moon) (うーさー くりあふぁいる ふらわー/ばーど/うぃんど/むーん)

subtitle: On that day, mankind remembered the fear of being controlled by the Titans…
description: From the anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes a Nendoroid of the Colossus Titan that breaks down the walls that protect mankind! He comes with two expressions including a realistic expression that looks more like the face in the series, as well as a chibi expression designed for the Nendoroid!

A special dioramic base made to look like the Shiganshina District including the giant wall and city are also included to recreate the epic scenes from the series! The Titan that ate Carla, a 15-meter class titan and one other secret titan are also all included as miniature Titans to help bring out the tense atmosphere. Miniature villagers and soldiers and even a broken wall are also included! The 'Attack of Titan' world is coming to life in Nendoroid size for fans to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Colossus Titan & Attack Playset (ねんどろいど ちょうおおがたきょじん & しんげきのぷれいせっと)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: Santa Sonico will be stopping by this Christmas!
description: Nitroplus' popular mascot character Super Sonico is coming back this Winter wearing a bright red and white Santa outfit for fans to enjoy! Just like the previous Bunny Ver., Sonico comes with net tights made from fabric for a truly realistic appearance, and she is still an impressive 1/4th scale!
She is posed with a bag of goodies and a present to bring out the Christmas spirit, and what present could be more suited for Sonico fans this Christmas!
name: Super Sonico: Santa Ver. (すーぱーそにこ さんたVer.)

subtitle: "This is the choice of Steins;Gate."
description: From the sci-fi adventure series "Steins;Gate" comes a figma of the main character, Rintarou Okabe!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
He comes with three expressions including his standard listless expression, a confident expression and a worried expression.
Alternate parts to display him with hands in his pockets are included, as well as the Mirai Gadget #12: 'Darling no Baka'.
The 'Bit Particle Cannon' and Okabe's cellphone are both included, as well as optional leather boots.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rintarou Okabe (figma おかべりんたろう)

subtitle: Beyond those eyes…
description: From the series that aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of the newly designed version of Strength, the character with glaring red eyes who always keeps her mouth hidden with a hood!

Her powerful gigantic 'Ogre Arms' are included and are articulated at the fingers for all sorts of different poses - there are a total of four of these gigantic hands to attach, creating some amazing volume! You can even swap out the fingertips to change them into gun barrels and then make use of the included effect parts to recreate epic combat scenes in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Strength: TV ANIMATION Ver. (ねんどろいど すとれんぐす てれび あにめーしょん Ver.)

subtitle: The Tengu reporter always rushing around Gensokyo!
description: From the popular game series by Team Shanghai Alice, the 'Touhou Project' comes a Nendoroid of Gensokyo's resident Tengu reporter, Aya Shameimaru! She comes with three different expressions including a standard expression, a smiling expression and even the popular 'Take it easy!' expression!

Optional parts include her leaf fan and a tornado part which allow you to pose her manipulating the wind! She also comes with a crow and various tools to help her report an anything she comes across, including her camera, pen and notepad! Enjoy posing her in all sorts of situations!
name: Nendoroid Aya Shameimaru (ねんどろいど しゃめいまるあや)

subtitle: The long-awaited first Nendoroid from Bakemonogatari!
description: The 'Bakemonogatari Premium Item Box' is filled with goodies that all Bakemonogatari fans will love, including the long-awaited Nendoroid of Hitagi Senjyogahara! She comes complete with various items of stationery to hold, as well as optional parts allowing you display her with a pony-tail!

The Nendoroid also allows you to display her in the popular key visual pose with stationary falling from her skirt - the same pose used for the 1/8th scale Hitagi Senjyogahara. Plus you can also place her in a pose based on one of Akio Watanabe's popular illustrations. The July issue of Monthly Hobby Japan features this Nendoroid, so be sure to take a look!
name: Nendoroid Hitagi Senjyogahara (ねんどろいど せんじょうがはらひたぎ)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The giant Kirari is back once again!
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a newly sculpted 'Lovely Princess' version of the popular Dekacchu Kirari Moroboshi sold during the 2013 Winter WonFes! Her outfit and accessories have all been faithfully sculped and she's even bigger than before! It's a rather unique looking version of Kirari that fans are sure to enjoy!
name: Dekacchu Kirari Moroboshi ~Lovely Princess ver.~ (でかっちゅ☆もろぼしきらり～らぶりーぷりんせすver.～)

subtitle: The idol heroine is here in all her magnificence!!
description: From 'Eiyuu*Senki' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the leader of Britannia, idol and heroine - Arthur! Her cute expression and outfit have both been sculpted carefully by Hiroshi (Sakurazensen), allowing fans to enjoy her wondrous smile whenever they please!
name: Arthur (あーさー)

subtitle: The first Nendoroid to join the Tetsudou Musume series is Alice Kuji from Sanriku Railways!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Alice Kuji, the character from Sanriku Railways who drives trains along the Sanriku Coast!

Alice can be posed in a number of different ways including her signature pose with one hand to her mouth and the other holding her bag. For those who prefer a more comical pose, she also comes with a snorkel and fish to illustrate some of the popular attractions in the area she comes from! Other optional parts include a ticket punch, and even a 'cardboard box train' which she can wear to pretend to be a train by herself, or instead you can make use of the included rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well!
name: Nendoroid Alice Kuji (ねんどろいど くじありす)
copyright: © 2005 TOMYTEC/三陸鉄道商品化許諾済

subtitle: The second to join the Tetsudou Musume Nendoroids is Miyuki Takano from Hiroshima Electric Railways!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Miyuki Takano, the character from Hiroshima Electric Railways who drives trams in Hiroshima city!

Miyuki comes with the bag that all drivers on the Miyajima Line use, and she can be posed carrying it on her left arm. She can also be posed ready to greet customers on the tram, and for those who prefer a more comical pose, she also comes with some okonomiyaki and a torii archway to illustrate some of the popular attractions from the area she comes from! She even includes a 'cardboard box train' which she can wear to pretend to be a train by herself, or instead you can make use of the included rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well!
name: Nendoroid Miyuki Takano (ねんどろいど たかのみゆき)

subtitle: "Brave Duel, Rerise Up!"
description: From the manga series and social game 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha INNOCENT' comes a set of two Nendoroid Petites - Nanoha Takamachi and Vita, both wearing their barrier jackets! Alternate smiling expressions for both characters are also included!
The set also includes a serial code which can be used in the 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha INNOCENT' social game!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Nanoha Takamachi Sacred Jacket & Vita (ねんどろいどぷち たかまちなのは せいくりっどもーど ＆ う゛ぃーた)

subtitle: The Hatsune Miku GT Project's 2013 Character Mascot!
description: This is a set of apparel featuring the Hatsune Miku GT Project's mascot character, 'Racing Miku 2013'!

There are 5 products in the line-up: · Racing Miku 2013: Cycling Jersey (EDGE Ver.) · Racing Miku 2013: Cycling Jersey (TEAM Ver.) · Racing Miku 2013: Cycling Pants · Racing Miku 2013: UV Cut Arm Covers · Racing Miku 2013: Short Cycling Gloves
name: GSR Gear: Racing Miku 2013 Cycling Series (GSR Gear 「れーしんぐみく 2013 さいくるしりーず」)
copyright: © saitom / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: The second coming of the 'Sword of the Godslayer'.
description: From the latest in the BlazBlue game series 'BlazBlue: Chronophantasma' comes a dynamically posed figure of Mu-12, Noel's awakened form as the successor to the True Azure. Her long hair, slim yet well-built body and all the details of the cross between girl and machine have been carefully sculpted into figure form.

The two metallic parts floating by her side are just another highlight to the figure that help pull everything together to create a figure worthy of the series - both filled with excitement and beauty!
name: Mu-12 (μ-No.12-（みゅー・てゅえるぶ）)

subtitle: Soft black snow embraced by twin black blades.
description: From the anime 'Accel World' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the heroine, Kuroyukihime! The bold pose is based on the cover illustration of the 6th volume of the original light novel. The figure features replaceable parts which allow you to choose between either displaying Black Lotus and Kuroyukihime separately, or instead displaying them together as a single figure, whereby fans can enjoy having Black Lotus embracing the beautiful Kuroyukihime, ready to protect her from harm.
name: Kuroyukihime ~Death by Embracing~ (くろゆきひめ～です ばい えんぶれいしんぐ～)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: "Good morning everyone!! My Nendoroid is being rereleased! If you don't buy it, expect punishment!!"
description: From the high-speed detective action game 'Super Danganronpa 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen' comes a rerelease Nendoroid Monokuma!

He comes with both his standard expression and a laughing expression! He also comes with a number of extra parts to recreate the famous punishment scene, including sitting parts and a punishment button! Enjoy posing him in your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Monokuma (ねんどろいど ものくま)
copyright: © Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The cursed race that serve the Goddess of Death.
description: From the popular online RPG 'Lineage II' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the Dark Elf to contrast against the previously announced Elf figure. She is posed equipped with the Daimon Crystal, in a pose based on a one of the main illustrations from the game. Every part of the figure has been sculpted down to the finest of details, including her outstanding outfit and compelling expression.
Fans will be able to enjoy the charming Dark Elf from any angle they please!
name: Dark Elf (だーくえるふ)

subtitle: The alternate appearance of the cursed race.
description: From the popular online RPG 'Lineage II' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the Dark Elf race in a brown skinned version. She is posed in the same way as the standard version and still holds the Daimon Crystal, but has an alternate skin color for a completely different feel.
Fans of the series can enjoy both this version and the standard 'Dark Elf' version!
name: Dark Elf: Brown Skin ver. (だーくえるふ かっしょくver.)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime 'Persona 4' comes another one of Penguin Parade's Petanko figures - this time it's of everyone's favorite idol, Rise Kujikawa! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Fans can enjoy keeping a hand-sized Risette by their side at all times! ♪
name: Petanko Rise Kujikawa (ぺたんこ くじかわりせ)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: The UtaPuri characters are joining the Nendoroid Plus rubber strap series!
description: From 'Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000%' comes a set of characters as trading rubber straps based on Nendoroid illustrations! The set includes Otoya, Masato, Natsuki, Tokiya, Ren, Syo, Haruka and one secret character for a total of eight to collect! Keep your favorite character with you no matter where you go! ♪
*A HAYATO rubber strap will be included with each each box of straps ordered. *There is no guarantee that one box of straps will include all varieties.
name: Nendoroid Plus Trading Rubber Straps - Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 1000% (ねんどろいどぷらす とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ【うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ1000％】)
copyright: ©UTA☆PRI PROJECT Images shown are for illustrative purposes only and the final product may differ.

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime 'Persona 4' comes another one of Penguin Parade's Petanko figures - this time of the main character with a unique personality, Yu Narukami! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Fans can enjoy keeping a hand-sized version of the handsome group leader by their side at all times! ♪
name: Petanko Yu Narukami (ぺたんこ なるかみゆう)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: Featuring everyone's passionate messages on the bonnet of the car!
description: The SUPER GT racing car created in collaboration with the 'Hatsune Miku and Future Stars Project mirai' game is being made into another 1/32nd scale miniature car, this time based directly off how the car looked during the second leg of the 2012 SUPER GT at the Fuji Speedway.

The bonnet of the car is covered in all the passionate comments from those involved with the team as well as from fans of the team - just the way it looked in the final race! The chassis is made from ABS for a durable design that still looks great!
name: GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012: Second Leg Fuji ver. (GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012 だいにせんふじ ver.)
series: Hatsune Miku and Future Stars Project mirai
copyright: ©SEGA ©Crypton Future Media, Inc.www.crypton.net / Design Cooperation: NendoronThe BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: The 3 year-old Hina wearing her adorable swimsuit!
description: From the anime series 'Papa no Iukoto o Kikinasai!' comes a 1/4th scale figure of the youngest daughter of the Takanashi family, Hina Takanashi!

She is sculpted wearing a cute swimsuit with an innocent expression on her face, as she happily plays with an inflatable ball. The ball has a lovely design filled with hearts and also acts as the figure's base. Be sure to display her with her two sisters, Miu and Sora Takanashi, and enjoy all the daughters together!
name: Hina Takanashi: Swimsuit Ver. (たかなしひな みずぎVer.)
copyright: ©松智洋・なかじまゆか／集英社・PPP

subtitle: "Everyone embrace each other! To the far end of of the Galaxy!"
description: From the anime 'Macross Frontier' comes a Nendoroid of one of the heroines, Ranka Lee! She is wearing the 'Seikan Hikou' outfit seen in the second opening of the TV series as well as in the final episode! She comes with three expressions including a shouting expression, a singing expression and a winking expression to recreate her trademark 'Kira' pose.

Other optional parts include a microphone and various other exchangeable parts to pose her during one of her live performances. A special stage part is also included which can be attached to her standard base for her to perform on! It's time for the 'Super-Dimensional Cinderella' to shine on the Nendoroid stage!
name: Nendoroid Ranka Lee (ねんどろいど らんか・りー)
copyright: ©2007 ビックウエスト／マクロスF製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: wooser is here to promise you good fortune!
description: From the anime series with a second season on the way, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc', comes a charm made to bless the holder with good fortune in romance. If you keep it by your side you're sure to become popular with everyone you've had your eyes on... probably!
Other charms will be joining this series in the future, so keep an eye out for the one that suits you best!
name: Not-so-Blessed wooser Charm of Love (ごりやくがあるきがしない うーさーおまもり れんあいじょうじゅVer.)

subtitle: A plushie series you can pose however you want!
description: A resale of the Hachune version is accompany the original! Where there is Miku Hatsune, there has to be a Miku Hachune to join her! This version of the Miku plushie has the classic 'Hachune' expression and comes complete with a leek to wave around!
Joints are located inside the plushie, allowing it to be posed in different ways, such as sitting and waving her leek around! Display her however you prefer! ♪
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 02: Miku Hachune (ぬいぐるみシリーズ02 「はちゅねみく｣ ねんどろいどぷらす)
copyright: © おんたま/Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: A goddess descending from the heavens with the ring of a bell.
description: From the popular manga 'Oh My Goddess!' comes a 1/10th scale figure of the main heroine, Belldandy! The figure is based on an illustration which was originally released as a pinup poster, and also features her angel, Holy Bell, supporting her from behind.

The figure has been carefully sculpted to create a dynamic effect through the flowing material of her dress and her windswept wings, and each figure will include a unique serial number to ensure collectability. With over ten years passed, the beauty of Belldandy and Holy Bell will be be available for all fans to enjoy.
name: Belldandy with Holy Bell (べるだんでぃー うぃず ほーりーべる)

subtitle: Aiming to be a man amongst men!
description: From the popular anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the 1st year student and member of the Neighbor's Club who is aiming to become a 'true man', Yukimura Kusunoki!

Yukimura is posed wearing the cute maid outfit that she wears in the Neighbour's Club clubroom, but the maid outfit can also be removed to reveal a swimsuit for fans to enjoy! You can choose whether you prefer Yukimura as a maid, or wearing a swimsuit instead!
name: Yukimura Kusunoki (くすのき ゆきむら)
copyright: © 2011 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ない

subtitle: The new Petanko Mini! series! ☆
description: The cute sitting 'Petanko' series of chibi figures have been shrunk down to half their original size to create a new series of trading figures - Petanko Mini!

The first set of characters to join the series come from 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', including all five main characters in both their school uniforms and in their Puella Magi outfits. That means there are a total of ten characters for you to collect, display and enjoy!
name: Petanko Mini!: Madoka Magica Trading Figures (ぺたんこみにっ！ まどか☆まぎか とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)

subtitle: The figma series has been reborn with the magical No.200!
description: The commemorative figma No.200 is none other than an upgraded version of everyone's favorite idol - Hatsune Miku!
features: The newly designed figma joints allow for all sorts of different poses!
Superior articulation helps bring out Hatsune Miku's cute side more than ever before.
She comes with an adorable smiling expression, an embarrassed expression and a singing expression with a playful wink.
Optional parts include a microphone and stand, a guitar and even a pair of angelic wings.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hatsune Miku 2.0 (ふぃぐま はつねみく 2.0)

subtitle: 1/12 Scale Caesar WWRp figures!
description: The third and latest generation of robots from threeA toys, the 'Caesar' is joining the 1/12 scale WWRp series. The unique design by Ashley Wood has been carefully sculpted and also features threeA's famous weathered paintwork for fans to enjoy. There are four different varieties in the line-up, including the Aus Republic, BcELL, Deimosll and USMC.

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.
name: WWRp Caesar USMC (WWRp しーざー USMC)

subtitle: 1/12 Scale Caesar WWRp figures!
description: The third and latest generation of robots from threeA toys, the 'Caesar' is joining the 1/12 scale WWRp series. The unique design by Ashley Wood has been carefully sculpted and also features threeA's famous weathered paintwork for fans to enjoy. There are four different varieties in the line-up, including the Aus Republic, BcELL, Deimosll and USMC.

His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.
name: WWRp Caesar Aus Republic (WWRp しーざー Aus リぱぶりっく)

The unique design by Ashley Wood has been carefully sculpted and also features threeA's famous weathered paintwork for fans to enjoy. There are four different varieties in the line-up, including the Aus Republic, BcELL, Deimosll and USMC.

name: WWRp Caesar Deimos II (WWRp しーざー でいもすⅡ)
