description: The third and latest generation of robots from threeA toys, the 'Caesar' is joining the 1/12 scale WWRp series. The unique design by Ashley Wood has been carefully sculpted and also features threeA's famous weathered paintwork for fans to enjoy. There are four different varieties in the line-up, including the Aus Republic, BcELL, Deimosll and USMC.

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.
name: WWRp Caesar BcELL (WWRp しーざー べくえる)

subtitle: "I guess it's time for the main dish..."
description: From 'STARLESS', the popular game released by Empress (a division of WillPlus., Ltd.), comes a figure of the 'Marie Mamiya', the current Mamiya family head who lives with her two daughters and a number of servants in a mansion deep in the mountains.

As if she wasn't sexy enough, her outfit can also be removed for fans to enjoy her voluptuous body even more. Plus two different wine glasses are included to choose between - one with red wine and another with a white liquid. Every little detail from the original game has been faithfully sculpted for fans to enjoy!
name: Marie Mamiya (まみや まりえ)

subtitle: "My lady, it's time for the ball."
description: From 'Fireball Charming' comes a Nendoroid of the shiny white JUNO-XIII type Hyperion, Drössel!

She includes a number of optional parts including the (thing that looks like a) blue rose that she got for her birthday, as well as her book-type recording device 'Prospero' and alternate parts to attach her perception unit, 'Perdita'. She is also fitted with a special lighting gimmick so when there is a power outage in the estate she can still find her way around! Enjoy recreating a number of your favorite scenes from the series!
Included Parts: ・Perception Unit 'Perdita' ・Book-type Recording Device 'Prospero' ・Container with a (thing that looks like a) Blue Rose '501622731' ・Alternate arm and hand parts.
name: Nendoroid Drössel (Charming) (ねんどろいど どろっせる（ちゃーみんぐ）)

subtitle: Taking off with updated equipment!
description: From 'Strike Witches 2' comes a new Nendoroid of the highly requested Yoshika Miyafuji, using the new Nendoroid specifications from #300! She is the same cute Yoshika as before, but the overall Nendoroid design and coloring of her guns have been reworked.

Her Striker Unit is the new 'Shinden' unit that featured in the later episodes of the series as well as in the movie and Sakamoto's Zero-Type 22 Combat Aircraft unit. The propellers can be swapped out with the previous version for even more play value, and of course her dog ears and tail are included as before!
name: Nendoroid Yoshika Miyafuji: Shinden Ver. (ねんどろいど みやふじよしか しんでんVer.)

subtitle: "Become mine, Hero!"
description: From the light novel that originated on 2channel and was then transformed into an anime series, 'DEMON KING AND HERO' comes a Nendoroid of the main character, the Demon King herself! She comes with optional parts that allow you to display her lifting her skirt to recreate the scene where she first greets the Hero. Plus you can also recreate some more embarrassing poses using the included dakimakura! Her 'horns' can also be attached and removed.
You'll know exactly how the hero felt with this Nendoroid by your side!
name: Nendoroid Demon King (ねんどろいど まおう)
copyright: ©2013 Tohno Mamare/PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN, INC./Projectまおゆう

subtitle: The simple and innocent school idol.
description: From the anime series 'D.C.III ~Da Capo III~' comes a Nendoroid of the 'official' newspaper club's president, the smart and beautiful magician - Ricca Morizono!

Ricca includes two separate Nendoroid bodies: one wearing her Hatsunejima uniform and the other in her Kazamidori uniform, allowing you to switch between the story arcs just by changing bodies! Plus the cape and pointing stick seen in the series are also included! Be sure to recreate your favorite scenes from both the Hatsunejima and Kazamidori story arcs!
name: Nendoroid Ricca Morizono (ねんどろいど もりぞのりっか)

subtitle: Waiting in the Summer.
description: From the high school romantic comedy anime 'Waiting in the Summer' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the main heroine, Ichika Takatsuki! The pose is based on an illustration by the series’ original character designer, Taraku Uon.

Careful attention has been taken to ensure that the same feeling of the original illustration has been kept on the figure, by faithfully recreating the relaxed, gentle appearance of Ichika. Even though she is a high school student, this figure shows off her more mature side for fans to enjoy.
name: Ichika Takatsuki (たかつきいちか)

subtitle: The story that everyone brings to life!
description: The characters from the popular anime series 'LoveLive!' are joining the cute Nendoroid Petite trading figure series! The set includes Honoka Kousaka, the central member of the 'µ's' school idol group, as well as two of the other members, Umi Sonoda and Kotori Minami!

Each of the characters comes in both their Otonokizaka Academy uniform as well as their 'µ's' stage outfits, for a total of six different variations. Plus there is also one secret character to look out for! Collect and display them all to recreate the school idol project right by your side!
name: Nendoroid Petite: LoveLive! (ねんどろいどぷち らぶらいぶ！)
copyright: ©2013 プロジェクトラブライブ！

subtitle: "Let the whistle of demise be heard! Ragnarok!"
description: From 'Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a Nendoroid of Hayate Yagami, the keeper of the Tome of the Night Sky. She comes with three expressions including a smiling face, a shouting face for combat scenes and a chanting face for casting spells.

She also comes with her intelligent device 'Schwertkreuz' as well as two different variations of the Tome of the Night Sky. Her human-form unison device 'Reinforce' is also included, and her stand is made to look like one of the magical circles from the series!
name: Nendoroid Hayate Yagami: Unison Edition (ねんどろいど やがみはやて ゆにぞんいん・えでぃしょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The blind cowboy and his horse.
description: The Dead Equine Super Set is joining threeA's Popbot series! The set includes threeA's original 1/6th scale human character figure as well as his ghost horse (Black ver.) companion to travel beside him. The outfits and bandaging throughout the figure show off both the unique and talented design and quality of threeA's toys.

Ashley Wood Ashley Wood was born in 1971. He is an Australian artist that is known for his comic book cover art, concept designs and his work as an art director. His works often combine various media such as digital art with oil painting, which give his work a very unique and expressionistic feeling to them.

Popbot Popbot is one of the designer toy lines that threeA produces. The line is based on a comic book of the same name, which features illustrations by Ashley Wood and is published by IDW Publishing.
name: Dead Equine Super Set (でっど いーくあん すーぱーせっと)
copyright: ©ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2013. All right reserved

subtitle: The figurehead maid at May Queen Nyan-nyan 2!
description: The 'hypothetical science adventure' game Steins;Gate has just recently had a sequel and movie version released, and from that series comes a Nendoroid of lab member number 007 - Faris Nyannyan! She comes with three different expressions including a smiling face, a winking face and a smug expression.

Optional parts include a tray as well as the omlette rice dish with 'The world is in trouble' written on it in ketchup. A set of 'Rai-Net Access Battlers' cards are also included in Nendoroid size. Plus alternate parts are included allowing you to pose her in her trademark 'Nyannyan' pose!
The adorable Faris is hoping you'll play with her as much as possible! ♪
name: Nendoroid Faris Nyannyan (ねんどろいど ふぇいりす・にゃんにゃん)

subtitle: Would you like me first? Or would you prefer me? Or maybe... me?
description: From the hard-to-describe anime series 'Haiyore! Nyaruko-san' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the series heroine - the crawling chaos, Nyaruko-san!

She is posed in a rather bold outfit based on a popular illustration that was originally a magazine pin-up. In her right hand she holds the famous 'hard-to describe crowbar like thingy', which can also be swapped out for a ladle! The base she stands on is shaped like a cute plate, adding even more appeal to the adorable Nyaruko-san! Fans can look forward to this chaos crawling their way soon!
name: Nyaruko (にゃるこ)
copyright: © 逢空万太・ソフトバンク クリエイティブ／名状しがたい製作委員会のようなもの

subtitle: Aiming to be the No.1 Cinderella Girl!
description: From the popular social game, 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a collection of cute Nendoroid Petite trading figures featuring five different idols from the game - Ranko Kanzaki, Miku Maekawa, Kirari Moroboshi, Mika Jougasaki and Uzuki Shimamura!

The girls have each been shrunk down into Nendo Petite size wearing their casual clothes!In addition to the standard five characters, there are also special versions of Miku Maekawa and Kirari Moroboshi wearing different outfits. This means there are a total of seven figures to collect in the set - five standard and two special!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS - Stage 02 (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず すてーじ02)

subtitle: The 'childhood friend' is here to cause some trouble in the figure world!
description: From the popular anime series 'Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru' comes a figure of one of the main heroines and the main character's childhood friend, Chiwa Harusaki! Chiwawa's playful personality is captured in the figure by both her pose and her cute smile, both of which are sure to soothe the heart of any fans of the series! A figure of Masuzu Natsukawa from the same series is also currently in development - so fans can look forward to her as well!
name: Chiwa Harusaki (はるさき ちわ)
series: Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru
copyright: ©裕時悠示・ソフトバンク クリエイティブ／「俺修羅」製作委員会

subtitle: The boy who fell from the stars and landed on Gargantia…
description: A special Blu-ray Box Set of Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet featuring the complete series in three volumes. The set also includes an exclusive 30cm plushie of Chamber, loaded with a device that allows him to talk!
name: Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet Blu-ray Box Set & Exclusive Talking Chamber Plushie Set (すいせいのがるがんてぃあ ぶるーれい ぼっくす 1～3かんかんぜんせいさんげんていおしゃべりちぇいんばーくんぬいぐるみせっと)
copyright: © オケアノス／「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

subtitle: The young nun and supervising teacher of the Neighbor's Club.
description: From the anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT' comes a Nendoroid of the 10 year-old nun with blue eyes and silver hair, Maria Takayama! She is sculpted wearing her nun's habit, looking as cute and lively as ever! She comes with various expression parts including both an upset face and a blissful face to help you recreate your favorite scenes from the show.

She also comes with some food parts to show just how much she loves eating – including a packet of her favorite potato chips as well as the bento box that Kodaka made for her! Be sure to display her with the previously released Nendoroids of Yozora, Sena and Kobato and recreate the Neighbor's Club in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Maria Takayama (ねんどろいど たかやままりあ)
series: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
copyright: © 2013 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ないNEXT

subtitle: The Puella Magi who always looks out for her juniors is being rereleased!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a rerelease of the 1/8th scale figure of Madoka's schoolmate and fellow Puella Magi - Mami Tomoe. She has been sculpted in a lovely dynamic pose based on a key visual from the series, it is a pose that really makes the figure look ready to jump to life!
She also comes with replaceable arm parts that allow you two equip her with her two muskets - one for each hand - allowing her to be posed in an elegant combat pose befitting of Mami!
name: Mami Tomoe (ともえまみ)

subtitle: The kindhearted Puella Magi is coming back once again!
description: The popular 1/8th scale figure of Madoka Kaname, the main character from 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', is being rereleased! The pose is based on a famous key visual used for the series, which features Madoka in a vibrant and dynamic pose with a huge smile.

The ever cute Kyubey is also included hanging from her arm just as in the illustration - it's a complete figure set that shows off all of Madoka's charms, and is bound to please any fans of the series.
name: Madoka Kaname (かなめまどか)

subtitle: One of Mikoto Misaka's clone 'sisters'.
description: From the anime series 'Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S' comes a Nendoroid of one of Mikoto Misaka's clones! She comes with three expressions including her standard blank expression, an interested expression and a chibi expression. The goggles she wears are also included, and can be worn on either her forehead or over her eyes. Other optional parts include a fully detailed assault rifle and electricity effect parts for combat scenes.

The kitten that appeared when she first met Mikoto, as well as a rolled up skirt part to display the kitten in are also included! A Gekota badge is even included to place on her uniform! This Misaka may be a clone, but there are still many unique elements to her for fans to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Misaka (ねんどろいど みさか)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN S

subtitle: The reliable 14 year old wearing a dazzling bikini!
description: From the popular anime 'Papa no Iukoto o Kikinasai!' comes a huge 1/4th scale figure of the eldest daughter of the Takanashi family, Sora Takanashi!

She is posed wearing an adorable pink bikini with a gentle smile on her face, as her hair and ribbons sway in the gentle breeze. She also comes with a big swimming tube filled with heart shapes which can either be held in her left hand or simply displayed by her side - you can choose how you'd prefer to display her!
name: Sora Takanashi: Swimsuit Ver. (たかなしそら みずぎver)
copyright: © 松智洋・なかじまゆか／集英社・PPP

subtitle: "It's something that I have to do."
description: From the anime series 'VIVIDRED OPERATION' comes a figma of the mysterious transfer student, Rei Kuroki!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard calm expression, a glaring expression as well as the embarrassed expression she sometimes shows.
She comes with her bow and arrow, as well as both the handgun and submachine gun from the series.
Alternate short pants are included allowing her to store the handgun at her hips.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rei Kuroki (ふぃぐま くろきれい)

subtitle: Metal charms featuring wooser's lines!
description: Two different charms from the anime 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life'. Both feature wooser's famous lines from the series!
name: wooser Metal Strap A & B (うーさーめたるすとらっぷ A・B)

subtitle: Goods from the 'Attack on Titan' anime!
features: Attack on Titan Pins: Scouting Legion, Military Police, Stationary Guard, Trainees Squad
Attack on Titan Gold Stickers: Scouting Legion, Military Police, Stationary Guard, Trainees Squad
Attack on Titan: Masking Tape
name: Attack on Titan: Goods Series (『しんげきのきょじん』ぐっずしりーず)
copyright: © 諫山創・講談社 / 「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: The practice robot that managed to catch up to the champions, Atom!
description: From the film 'Real Steel' comes a figure of Atom, the robot that was put together by the main character's father, using nothing but salvaged parts from the junkyard.

You can display Atom in the valiant fighting pose he took in his fight against the Champion, Zeus - recreating the excitement of the film's climax scene! His joints are all filled with cylinders and wires for a truly realistic appearance, and his eyes are loaded with fiber optic lights.
name: REAL STEEL: ATOM (りある・すてぃーる あとむ)
copyright:
“Real Steel”is a trademark and copyright of Dreamworks II Distribution CO.,LLC.All rights reserved.
© 2012 DreamWorks II / ©2012 ThreeA / Ashley Wood all rights reserved.

subtitle: Sakura is joining the others in her yukata, with a refreshing breeze brushing through her hair.
description: From the popular series 'Fate/stay Night' comes a figure of another one of the heroines, Sakura Matou! The beautiful magus is wearing a cute yukata with cherry blossom prints. She is posed with a mature expression across her face, with a light breeze blowing across her causing her hair to gently sway in the wind.

She's holding a fan in her left hand, but this can also be switched out for an empty hand which allows you to pose her with a hand on Rin Tohsaka's shoulder, if you choose to pose them together! Be sure to display her with all the other Fate/stay girls in the yukata series!
name: Sakura Matou: Yukata ver. (まとうさくら ゆかたver.)

subtitle: The Hatsune Miku GT Project's 2013 Character Mascot!
description: A bonus period for applications has been added! Personal sponsor applications will be accepted from the 10th May 2013 (Fri) at 15:00JST until the 12th May 2013 (Sun) at 24:00JST. For more info, please see the GSR Personal Sponsors Entry Website: http:gsr-global.ecq.sc/
GSR Personal Sponsors Entry Website: http:gsr-global.ecq.sc/
A Nendoroid of the 2013 Racing Miku, based on the original illustration and design by saitom!
name: Nendoroid Racing Miku: 2013 Ver. (ねんどろいど れーしんぐみく 2013 Ver.)
copyright:
© saitom / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net
Illustration by saitom Costume design by Mari Shimazaki

subtitle: "If there's one thing I believe in, it's you guys! So you'll win!"
description: From the high-speed detective action game 'Super Danganronpa 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen' comes a Nendoroid of the instructor that leads the main characters, Monomi! She comes with both a standard expression and a crying expression, plus the wooden stick she carries around while patrolling the island is also included as an optional part.

Be sure to display her together with the previously announced 'Nendoroid Monokuma' – not only do the two suit each other perfectly, but you can recreate even more of your favorite scenes from the game!
name: Nendoroid Monomi (ねんどろいど ものみ)
copyright: © Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: "I wanted to have a little more fun... but let's get this over with."
description: From the anime series 'Total Eclipse' comes a Nendoroid of one of the Soviet Army's 'Scarlet Sisters', Cryska Barchenowa!

Optional parts include an insane expression as well as a special cockpit part allowing you to display her under the effect of Prafka. She also comes with alternate hand parts allowing you to display her holding hands with Nendoroid Yui Takamura just as she was in the key visual illustration of the series. A Dragunov sniper rifle and Laser-type BETA are also included. To recreate even more of scenes from the show, be sure to display her with the other Scarlet Sister, Inia Sestina!
name: Nendoroid Cryska Barchenowa (ねんどろいど くりすか・びゃーちゅのわ)
copyright: © 吉宗鋼紀・ixtl / テレビ東京 / オルタネイティヴ第一計画

subtitle: "Listen to my song!"
description: From the anime 'Macross Frontier' comes a Nendoroid of one of the heroines, Sheryl Nome! The outfit is based on the same one she wore in one of the opening themes as well as in the final episode of the anime! It's just shrunk down to cute Nendoroid size!

She comes with three different expressions including a smiling face, a shouting face and a singing face. She also comes with a number of optional parts to help reproduce her live performances, including some alternate arm and leg parts as well as her mike. A special stage part is also included, which can be connected onto her standard base! It's time for the 'Songstess of the Galaxy' to shine on the Nendoroid stage!
name: Nendoroid Sheryl Nome (ねんどろいど しぇりる・のーむ)
copyright: ©2007 ビックウエスト／マクロスF製作委員会・MBS

subtitle: Goods from the 'Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet' anime!
features: Chamber Smartphone Case
Grace Plushie
Amy's Hair Accessory
Rubber Coasters
name: Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet: Goods Series (『すいせいのがるがんてぃあ』ぐっずしりーず)
copyright: ©オケアノス/「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

subtitle: He's finally here! The male Vocaloid with a relaxing voice!
description: KAITO, the Vocaloid that acts like a big brother to Hatsune Miku, is finally joining the figma series!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with three expressions: a smiling face, a powerful singing face and a gentle smiling face with closed eyes.
His favorite ice cream as well as his long scarf are both included as optional parts.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma KAITO (ふぃぐま かいと)

subtitle: A set of goods that no idol producers should be without!
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a set of goods including a plushie, metal charms, smartphone sticker and character cards! The 'Cu' set features the following cute idols: Sachiko Koshimizu, Azuki Momoi, Anzu Futaba, Arisa Mochida, Kanako Mimura, Chieri Ogata, Uzuki Shimamura, Nana Abe, Kana Imai, Mayu Sakuma and Mirei Hayasaka!
name: THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS Goods Set Cu (あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるずぐっずせっと きゅ)

subtitle: I'm in despair! I'm in despair that I'd be released in this color!
description: To celebrate the rerelease of Nendoroid Zetsubou-sensei, a special version featuring colors selected by the original manga's author, Kouji Kumeta, is being released as 'Nendoroid Nozumu Itoshiki 1.5: Kouji Kumeta Color Ver.'.

It might not be the same Zetsubou-sensei you're used to, but the colors were selected by Kouji Kumeta himself! The Nendoroid itself is exactly the same as Nendoroid Nozumu Itoshiki 1.5 - just the coloring is different.
name: Nendoroid Nozomu Itoshiki 1.5: Kouji Kumeta Color Ver. (ねんどろいど いとしきのぞむ 1.5 くめたこうじしていからーVer.)
copyright: © 久米田康治・講談社／さよなら絶望先生製作委員会

subtitle: "It's already over? Boring…"
description: From the anime series 'Total Eclipse' comes a Nendoroid of one of the Soviet Army's 'Scarlet Sisters', Inia Sestina!

She comes with a special cockpit that can be connected to the cockpit included with Nendoroid Cryska Barchenowa, allowing you to recreate the two-seat cockpit from the series and really experience the Scarlet Twins as a pair! A variety of other optional parts are also included, such as a special expression to display her under the effects of Prafka, her teddy-bear Misha and a chibi Grappler-class BETA! Recreate all your favorite scenes from the series in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Inia Sestina (ねんどろいど いーにゃ・しぇすちな)
copyright: © 吉宗鋼紀・ixtl / テレビ東京 / オルタネイティヴ第一計画

subtitle: I'm in despair! I'm in despair over being rereleased!!
description: Nendoroid Nozomu Itoshiki is being rereleased in the new Nendoroid format introduced from No.300! The super negative teacher with a pessimistic view on everything is back once again, looking just as cute as ever in Nendoroid size!

He is posed wearing his characteristic Japanese style clothes, with both his scarf and bag included. He also comes with a despairing expression and an impatient expression to bring out his personality even more! The symbolic rope to hang the poor teacher is also included for some rather unique poses.
name: Nendoroid Nozomu Itoshiki 1.5 (ねんどろいど いとしきのぞむ 1.5)
copyright: © 久米田康治・講談社／さよなら絶望先生製作委員会

subtitle: The third release of the tsundere genius from Steins;Gate!
description: The 'hypothetical science adventure' game Steins;Gate has just recently had a sequel and movie version released, and now Nendoroid Kurisu Makise is being rereleased too!

You can recreate a number of the poses from the game by using the included upset and embarrassed expressions. A few items from the game such as the documents in a paper folder, and her cell phone are also included as optional parts. Enjoy recreating the suspenseful atmosphere of Steins;Gate in Nendoroid scale!
name: Nendoroid Kurisu Makise (ねんどろいど まきせくりす)

subtitle: Nobody expects the mischievous wind…
description: From the popular PC game 'sekirara' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the diligent and bookish member of the disciplinary committee, Mana Miyuki!

She is posed trying to hold her skirt down as she is hit by a sudden gust of wind, but even in a situation like this she has a relaxed expression on her face, capturing her personality perfectly! Fans can enjoy Mana from a number of different angles, peeking at her beautiful curves as her uniform flutters in the wind.
name: Mana Miyuki (みゆきまな)
copyright: ©se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: "Upupupupu! I've prepared some super special goods for everyone!!"
description: From Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation comes a collection of high quality goods for fans to enjoy!
features: Deskmat
"Step on Me and My Gooey White Inner Cotton Will Come Out!" Beach Sandals
Storage Box: Monokuma, Makoto Naegi, Kyouko Kirigiri
Pet Bottle Holder
School Badge Key Cover
Stickers Sets A, B
name: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation: Goods Series (『だんがんろんぱ きぼうのがくえんとぜつぼうのこうこうせい じ あにめーしょん』ぐっずしりーず)
series: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation
copyright: © Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd./希望ヶ峰学園映像部 All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A set of goods that no idol producers should be without!
description: From the popular social game ' IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls' comes a set of goods including a plushie, metal charms, a smartphone sticker and character cards! The 'Co' set features the following cool idols: Ranko Kanzaki, Ryo Matsunaga, Ayaka Kishibe, Haruna Kamijo, Sarina Matsumoto, Hina Araki, Rin Shibuya, Minami Nitta, Fumika Sasigawa, Kaede Takagaki and Anastasia!
name: IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Goods Set Co (あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるずグッズセットCo)

subtitle: A set of goods that no idol producers should be without!
description: From the popular social game ' IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls' comes a set of goods including a plushie, metal charms, a smartphone sticker and character cards! The 'Pa' set features the following passion idols: Mika Jougasaki, Rika Jougasaki, Kirai Moroboshi, Yuki Himekawa, Yui Ohtsuki, Nagisa Aino, Syoko Hoshi, Airi Totoki, Miria Akagi and Nana Ichihara!
name: IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Goods Set Pa (アイドルマスター シンデレラガールズグッズセットPa)

subtitle: "Open!! The Door of the Water Bearer!!! Aquarius!!!"
description: From the popular manga and anime series 'FAIRY TAIL' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the beautiful celestial mage, Lucy Heartfilia! The figure is based on the cover illustration of the 9th volume of the manga, which features Lucy in a lively pose holding out a key in her hand with her skirt fluttering about.
Certain parts are also removable for a slightly different pose, but no matter how you choose to display her you'll always be able to enjoy her energetic personality!
name: Lucy (るーしぃ)
copyright: ©真島ヒロ／講談社・フェアリーテイル製作ギルド・テレビ東京

subtitle: Orders for this cute sitting Kurisu are now open!
description: From the popular series which just had it's movie premiere on the 20th April, 'STEINS;GATE' comes a Petanko figure of the heroine, Kurisu Makise!

Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! She has lovely rosy cheeks and is ready to sit by your side as your very own adorable assistant!
name: Petanko Kurisu Makise (ぺたんこ まきせくりす)
copyright: © 2011 5pb.／Nitroplus 未来ガジェット研究所

subtitle: The beautiful little devil with long blond hair!
description: From the anime 'Papa no Iukoto o Kikinasai!' comes a figure of the second daughter of the Takanashi family, Miu Takanashi! She is posed wearing a rather revealing white bikini, with her long blond twin-tails waving about around her as she makes a cute peace sign with a huge smile on her face! She also comes with a cute swimming tube filled with heart shapes, which you can place in her left hand.
The figure is a lovely big 1/4th scale for fans to really enjoy Miu to the fullest!
name: Miu Takanashi: Swimsuit Ver. (たかなしみう みずぎVer.)
copyright: ©松智洋・なかじまゆか／集英社・PPP

subtitle: The blond-haired, dark-skinned, well-endowed glasses girl!
description: From the popular anime 'Mayo Chiki!' comes a figure of one of the series heroines - the glasses-loving beauty, Nakuru Narumi! She is sitting in a cute pose that show's off her sleek body, with her busty bosom just visible through her opened up uniform. Her trademark cat ears and glasses are of course also included for fans to enjoy! Be sure to display her with the other characters from the same series!
name: Nakuru Narumi (なるみなくる)
copyright: © あさのハジメ・メディアファクトリー／まよチキ！製作委員会

subtitle: Rin & Len are also joining the FamilyMart crew!
description: This Summer, FamilyMart convenience stores will be running the 'Happy Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2013 Summer Ver.", a raffle that gives you a change to grab exclusive character goods not only related to Miku, but also from the Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin & Len!

The B prize is a special 'Nendoroid Kagamine Rin: FamilyMart 2013 Ver.' which features Rin wearing a FamilyMart staff uniform! A Nendoroid sized register set is also included as an optional part allowing you to recreate the atmosphere of a FamilyMart convenience store, where Rin ready to greet you at the entrance!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Rin: FamilyMart 2013 Ver. (ねんどろいど かがみねりん ふぁみりーまーと 2013 Ver.)
copyright:
FamilyMart Uniform/Costume Design: Putidevil
© FamilyMart © Crypton Future Media , INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: Vocaloid melody in cute, petite size! ♪
description: The cute and small Nendoroid Petite action figure series is getting a brand new set of Vocaloid figures named the 'Hatsune Miku Selection'!

The six official characters are all included in brand new poses, and a number of fanmade characters are also included such as the winner of PIAPRO's Gem Outfit competition, 'Mikurisutaru', as well as some characters from popular songs on NicoNico Douga such as 'Daughter of Evil', 'Servant of Evil', 'Deep Sea Girl' , 'Akahitoha' and 'Romeo and Cinderella'. There are a total of 12 different characters to collect and enjoy! ♪
name: Nendoroid Petite: Hatsune Miku Selection (ねんどろいどぷち はつねみく せれくしょん)
sculptor: Ajiken, Keita Yagyuu, Yukiwo Ageta (Max Factory)

subtitle: A flame of insanity burning in her eyes.
description: From the anime series that aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Insane Black Rock Shooter, the character with a flame of insanity burning in her eyes. She is posed holding both of her primary weapons - the Insane Cannon Lance and the Insane Blade Claw.

Both her and her weapons have been sculpted down to the finest of details, and even the base she stands on has been intricately designed to remind everyone of the 'Hollow World'. If you're a fan of the series you'll be sure to enjoy this impressive figure of Insane Black Rock Shooter!
name: Insane Black Rock Shooter (いんせいん・ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

subtitle: A figure made through collaboration with galaxxxy!
description: From 'Gurren Lagann' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Magical Nia, who appeared at the 'galaxxy Present Gurren Lagann Exhibition'. The illustration used for the event was drawn by popular anime illustrator, Sushio, and has now been transformed into a figure so you can enjoy her from any angle you want! A specially designed version of Boota is also included with Nia!
The figure is sculpted by Ken Kawanishi (GRIMROCK!) and painted by Maimocchi (turunoyakata), and is here to celebrate Gurren Lagann's 5th anniversary!
name: Magical Nia (まじかるにあ)
copyright: © GAINAX・中島かずき／アニプレックス・KDE-J・テレビ東京・電通

subtitle: Hatsune Miku will be collaborating with FamilyMart once again this year!
description: This Summer, FamilyMart convenience stores will be running the 'Happy Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2013 Summer Ver.", a raffle that gives you a change to grab exclusive character goods from Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku! The A prize features a lively Nendoroid of Miku riding on a dolphin while wearing a cute swimsuit!

The set also includes an alternate body featuring the FamilyMart body designed by Putidevil as well as a FamilyMart register counter! Optional parts include one of FamilyMart's most popular products, FamiChicken, as well as a content expression to display together with it!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Swimsuit Ver. & FamilyMart 2013 Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく みずぎVer. ＆ふぁみりーまーと 2013 Ver.)
copyright:
FamilyMart Uniform/Costume Design: Putidevil
© FamilyMart © Crypton Future Media , INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: Katsuragi, ready for some ninja action!
description: From the popular Nintendo 3DS game that has now also become a popular anime, 'Senran Kagura: Shoujo-tachi no Shinei' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Katsuragi, the bossy character with a rather perverted side. She has been sculpted in a dynamic pose wearing her refreshing blue and white outfit, with a joyful smile across her face. Her shirt is also completely unbuttoned to show off her impressive body!
Be sure to display her with both Hibari and Ikaruga, the previous figures from the same series! ♪
name: Katsuragi (かつらぎ)

subtitle: The two heroines that never get along are rejoining the Twin Pack series!
description: From the anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT' comes a Twin Pack featuring a short haired Yozora Mikaduki in her new outfit and Sena Kashiwazaki with a ponytail! Be sure to display them together with the previously released characters in the Twin Pack series (Kobato Hasegawa, Yukimura Kusunoki, Maria Takayama & Rika Shiguma) to completely recreate the NEXT stage of the Neighbour's Club!
name: Twin Pack: Yozora Mikaduki & Sena Kashiwazaki (ついんぱっく みかづきよぞら＆かしわざきせな)
series: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
copyright: © 2013 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友だちが少ないNEXT

subtitle: T-Shirts from the 'Attack on Titan' anime series!
features: Attack on Titan T-Shirt A (White)
Attack on Titan T-Shirt B (Black)
name: Attack on Titan: T-Shirts (A,B) (しんげきのきょじん Tしゃつ)
copyright: © 諫山創・講談社 / 「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: Cycling apparel from Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen!!
description: From the anime 'Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen' comes a set of cycling apparel brought to you as a part of the KASOKU brand from AURORA! (http:www.auroras.jp/)
· Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen Cycling Jersey: Mazinger Z · Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen Cycling Bib Shorts (With Shoulder Strap) · Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen Cycling Pants (No Shoulder Strap)
name: Shin Mazinger Shougeki! Z Hen: Cycle Wear Series (「しんまじんがー しょうげき! ゼットへん」さいくるうぇあしりーず)
copyright: ©2009 永井豪／ダイナミック企画・くろがね屋

subtitle: Hatsune Miku will be collaborating with FamilyMart once again this year!
description: This Summer, FamilyMart convenience stores will be running the 'Happy Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2013 Summer Ver.", a raffle that gives you a change to grab exclusive character goods from Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku! The 'last' prize (the person who draws the final prize in a store), is this Nendoroid of Miku wearing a special FamiltMart colored swimsuit designed by Putidevil!

The set also includes optional parts such as a shopping bag and one of FamilyMart's most popular products, FamiChicken. She also comes with a content expression to display her munching on the chicken!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Swimsuit Ver. FamilyMart Color (ねんどろいど はつねみく みずぎVer. ふぁみりーまーとからー)
copyright:
FamilyMart Uniform/Costume Design: Putidevil
© FamilyMart © Crypton Future Media , INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: The diva who lit up the 2012 racing circuit.
description: A dynamic figure of the official mascot of the Hatsune Miku 2012 GT Project , 'Racing Miku 2012 ver.'! Her long twin-tails are fluttering by her sides as she stands on one leg while waving a flag, creating a really dynamic figure that looks as if it could jump to life at any second.
Racing Miku is dressed up and ready for the racing circuit, and now you can enjoy having her by your side whenever you like!
name: 1/7th Scale Racing Miku 2012 ver. (1/7 れーしんぐみく 2012 ver.)
copyright: © GAN / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: The Goddess of the Racing Circuit - Racing Miku 2012!
description: 'GSR&Studie with TeamUKYO' is a racing team that took part in the 2012 season SUPER GT300. The official mascot of the team, 'Racing Miku' was designed by GAN, and has now been transformed into a 1/8th scale figure for fans to enjoy! It's a figure filled with highlights such as her unique transparent costume, detailed paintwork throughout the figure, and the dynamic sculpting of her hair!
name: 1/8th Scale Racing Miku 2012 ver. (1/8 れーしんぐみく 2012 ver.)
copyright: © GAN / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: Rin & Len are also joining the FamilyMart crew!
description: This Summer, FamilyMart convenience stores will be running the 'Happy Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2013 Summer Ver.", a raffle that gives you a change to grab exclusive character goods not only related to Miku, but also from the Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin & Len!

The C prize is a special 'Nendoroid Kagamine Len: FamilyMart 2013 Ver.' which features Len wearing a FamilyMart staff uniform! A Nendoroid sized counter and nikuman warmer are both included as optional parts, allowing you to recreate the atmosphere of a FamilyMart convenience store, where Len is ready to greet you at the entrance!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Len: FamilyMart 2013 Ver. (ねんどろいど かがみねれん ふぁみりーまーと 2013 Ver.)
copyright:
FamilyMart Uniform/Costume Design: Putidevil
Hachune Nikuman Design: Otomania, Tamago Yukino 
© FamilyMart © Crypton Future Media , INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: "Let me have a happy dream, just once..."
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie' comes a figma of Sakura Kyouko wearing her casual clothes.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including a smiling face, a doubtful face and an angry face.
Optional parts of her snacks including an apple, crêpe and 'unmaibou' treat are all included, as well as a paper bag.
Special 'prayer hands' are included, allowing you to recreate the final scene.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kyouko Sakura: Casual ver. (ふぃぐま さくらきょうこ しふくver.)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie

subtitle: Cute little Vocaloids to keep you company!
description: From the Character Vocal Series comes a set of little figures attached to earphone jacks featuring Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin and Kagamine Len!

The cute designs are based on illustrations by popular illustrators Y-Oji, Souno and Putidevil! You can attach them to the top of your smartphone or any other device to add an extra bit of cuteness to enjoy throughout the day! A special earphone jack holder is also included to store them away when not in use! Be sure to collect the complete set so you can choose which one to keep with you each day! ♪
name: Character Vocal Series: Earphone Jack Accessories (きゃらくたー・ぼーかる・しりーず いやほんじゃっくあくせさりー)
series: Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku & Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin/Len
copyright:
illustration by Souno, illustration by Y-Oji, illustration by Putidevil
© Crypton Future Media,INC.www.piapro.net

subtitle: "If you want to get through here, you'll have to go through me first!"
description: From the popular anime series 'Nisemonogatari' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the girl who was stung by a bee, Karen Araragi!

The figure is based on the cover illustration used for the 1st volume of the Blu-ray & DVD: "Karen Bee: Part 1", which features Karen wearing her trademark yellow jersey. Even the huge road roller in the illustration a part of the figure, and the valiant pose has been faithfully reproduced in figure form - Karen truly looks like a 'hero of justice'!
name: Karen Araragi (あららぎ かれん)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The Hidden Student Council's Vice-President and vigilant watchdog of the boys!
description: From the manga series published in Weekly Young Magazine, 'Prison School' comes a figure of the Vice President of the Hidden Student Council, Meiko Shiraki! She is holding her trademark pointing stick, with a sharp gaze which gives her an amazing presence and is sure to fill the boys with fear! A special stand that recreates the gutter scene from the series is also included.
The figure is also cast-off, allowing fans to enjoy the vice-president's glamorous body to their heart's content!
name: Prison School's Hidden Student Council Vice-President: Meiko Shiraki (Uniform Ver.) (ぷりずんすくーる うらせいとかいふくかいちょう しらきめいこ（せいふくver.）)

subtitle: The novice inspector with a 'Powder Blue' mental color.
description: From the popular noitaminA anime series 'PSYCHO-PASS' comes a Nendoroid of Akane Tsunemori, the Public Safety Bureau's Criminal Investigation Division's newest inspector! Her skirt is made from flexible parts allowing you to easily create a number of different poses.

She comes with three different expressions including her standard face, a frightened face and a 'chimi character' face, which is based on illustrator Yu-pon's popular illustrations. She also comes with the 'Dominator', an important item throughout the series - you can even switch it between Paralyzer Mode and Eliminator Mode!
name: Nendoroid Akane Tsunemori (ねんどろいど つねもりあかね)
copyright: © サイコパス製作委員会

subtitle: New colors of the Nendoroid More Suction Stands!
description: The Nendoroid More: Suction Stands that give you brand new ways to display your Nendoroids are being released in a new 1.5 version! The previous 'white', 'pink' and 'mint' colors are all available as before, but three new colors are now also available - the much-requested 'crystal clear', a soft yellow 'dandelion' color that suits many characters and a 'cerulean blue' color made in the image of Nendoroid Hatsune Miku 2.0.

This new version also comes with special attachment parts for characters with longer hair, making it even easier to display your favorite Nendoroids! Be sure to grab some new Nendoroid More: Clip Stands for your own collection!
Notice Regarding the Nendoroid More Series · Please note that the Nendoroid More series is only designed to work with Nendoroids (or Nendoroid Petites) that have a hole on their back.
The series is not compatible with Nendoroids that use other types of stands.
· Characters with long hair sometimes restrict the use of the Nendoroid More series.
For more information, please see the Nendoroid More: Clip Stand and Suction Stands Compatibility List below! http:partner.goodsmile.info/support/more/english_nenmore_clip-kyuban_taiou.pdf
name: Nendoroid More: Suction Stands 1.5 (Crystal Clear / Dandelion / Cerulean Blue / White / Pink / Mint) (ねんどろいどもあ きゅうばん1.5【くりすたるくりあ/だんでらいおん/せるりあんぶるー/ほわいと/ぴんく/みんと】)

subtitle: To all the girls who commute to work or school... apologies for the wait.
description: From the anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a pass case featuring the mysterious yellow creature himself, wooser!

The case itself is a fluffy plushie of wooser that you can carry around with you wherever you like, and it also features an extendable cord ensuring easy use! Attach it to your work or school case, or any other bag you use, and wooser will ensure that you stand out in any crowd!
name: wooser's Fluffy Pass Case (うーさーのふわふわぱすけーす)

subtitle: Little Witch Academia is being released on Blu-Ray with extras!
description: Little Witch Academia was originally created as a part of the Japanese Agency for Cultural Affair's 'Anime Mirai 2013' project, and now the highly acclaimed anime by Studio TRIGGER is being released on Blu-Ray together with some extras for fans to enjoy!
The sequel to the original has also been announced, and was able to reach its goal on Kickstarter in just one day - so don't miss out of the original that started it all!
'Little Witch Academia' Blu-Ray Running Time: 26min Audio: Japanese 5.1ch / 2ch Stereo Subtitiles: Japanese, English, Spanish, Chinese, German, French, Italian
・Special Video Documentary 'How the Magic was Born' (66min)

A special documentary showing the hard work and dedication of the young animators as they worked on Little Witch Academia. You can see just what each section of the work involved as well as the instructions and corrections that came from director Yoshinari Yoh. The documentary is voiced by the voice actor of Shiny Chariot, Noriko Hidaka. (Note that the documentary only has English subtitles)
・Original Soundtrack CD
Includes all the background music from the episode. (An unused short version of the ending is also included)
・112 Page Official Book
Includes the following:
Yoshinari Yoh's Episode Commentary Staff/Cast Interviews Design Illustrations Original Scene Cuts Storyboard Cuts Original Scenario Manuscript
name: Little Witch Academia Blu-Ray (『りとるうぃっちあかでみあ』ぶるーれい)
copyright:
©Y.YOSHINARI/TRIGGER Inc.
Image is for illustrative purposes only. The actual package design will differ.

subtitle: Mikudayo- has decided to join the Nendoroid Petite series too!
description: From the Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku comes a Nendoroid Petite of the super conspicuous character, Mikudayo-! The unique standing pose of Mikudayo has been preserved in cute Nendoroid Petite form, still looking just like the original costume!! A must-have item for Mikudayo- fans!
name: Nendoroid Petite Mikudayo- (ねんどろいどぷち みくだよー)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular light novel series with a second anime season on the way, 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a Petanko figure of Kirino Kousaka in the same outfit that she wore when she attended the 'Natsukomi' summer convention. Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her together with Pentanko Kuroneko: Natsukomi ver.!
name: Petanko Kirino Kousaka: Natsukomi ver. (ぺたんこ こうさかきりの なつこみver.)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: © 伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP2

The previous 'white', 'pink' and 'mint' colors are all available as before, but three new colors are now also available - the much-requested 'crystal clear', a soft yellow 'dandelion' color that suits many characters and a 'cerulean blue' color made in the image of Nendoroid Hatsune Miku 2.0.
