name: Nendoroid More: Clip Stands 1.5 (Crystal Clear / Dandelion / Cerulean Blue / White / Pink / Mint) (ねんどろいどもあ くりっぷ1.5【くりすたるくりあ/だんでらいおん/せるりあんぶるー/ほわいと/ぴんく/みんと】)

subtitle: 100% Kow Yokoyama, revived once again.
description: The original 'S.A.F.S & Pilot' figure that Maschinen Krieger fans have carved into their hearts.

This new release takes the original works by Kow Yokoyama that appeared in Hobby Japan magazine and creates replicas of them in polystone - it is the definitive rerelease! Each base has a serial number carved into it to ensure collectability. After 30 years of Maschinen Krieger, fans can truly enjoy this amazing figure.
name: S.A.F.S & Pilot Original Cast Sculpture (S.A.F.S.&ぱいろっと おりじなるきゃすてぃんぐすたちゅー)

subtitle: "Picture it in your mind! This is Vanguard!"
description: From the anime series 'Cardfight!! Vanguard' comes a Nendoroid of the solitary Vanguard fighter, Toshiki Kai! He comes with three different expressions including his standard expression, a shouting expression and a sinister expression. Plus he also comes with a Nendoroid Petite-sized version of "Draconic Overlord the End"!

He also comes with a number of hand parts, including hands holding Vanguard cards and hands wearing Vanguard Fight Gloves, allowing you to display him in the middle of a cardfight against another character! As an extra bonus, two actual Vanguard cards are also included - "Demonic Dragon Mage, Makoraga" and "Wyvern Strike, Gyunturu".
name: Nendoroid Toshiki Kai (ねんどろいど かいとしき)
copyright: © ヴァンガードプロジェクト／テレビ愛知

subtitle: The Alcott family's earnest daughter and England's IS representative.
description: From the popular anime 'IS <Infinite Stratos>' comes the second Nendoroid from the series, 'Cecilia Alcott'! She comes with three different expressions including her standard expression, a expression with sparkling eyes and a slight blush and a smiling expression! She also comes with a sandwich and a basket as optional parts, allowing you to recreate lunchtime!

Her trademark rolled hair has been made to look just like the series, and even includes joints for some extra posing options - plus extra replaceable parts are included to recreate the running scene from the ending theme of the anime! Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Houki Shinonono!
name: Nendoroid Cecilia Alcott (ねんどろいど せしりあ・おるこっと)

subtitle: threeA's KRÖTE: Ready for orders.
description: From the popular series 'Maschinen Krieger' comes a model of the bipedal assault and reconnaissance mech known as the KRÖTE. The very first 1/12th scale rendition of the mech comes from the Hong-Kong based company, threeA!

The model features incredible paintwork that suits the mech design perfectly, a real light used in the radar as well as another light used in the fully rotating Vulcan cannon! A large number of features together with amazing workmanship all come together to bring a model that fans can be proud of!
Other Photos(Facebook)
name: Ma.K. KRÖTE (ましーねんくりーがー くれーて)

description: From the documentary-style history show 'Time Scoop Hunter' comes a figure of the time-travelling journalist, Yuichi Sawajima!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with a confident looking standard expression as well as a more tense expression.
An alternate fringe part with hair hanging down is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yuichi Sawajima (ふぃぐま さわじまゆういち)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular light novel series with a second anime season on the way, 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' comes a Petanko figure of Kuroneko in the outfit she wore when she attended the 'Natsukomi' summer convention. Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
Be sure to display her together with Pentanko Kirino Kousaka: Natsukomi ver.!
name: Petanko Kuroneko: Natsukomi ver. (ぺたんこ くろねこ なつこみver.)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: ©伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP2

subtitle: "I'll stay just as unmotivated as ever today."
description: From the anime series 'Sasami-san@Ganbaranai' comes a Nendoroid of the shut-in main character, Sasami Tsukuyomi!

She comes with three different expressions including a gentle smile, a panicky embarrassed face and a sleepy expression! The tassel of her nightcap is fitted with a joint for some extra posing options, and the nightcap can also be completely removed! She even comes with an attachable strand of sticking-up hair to complete her cute curly-haired look when not wearing the hat!

Special parts are also included to display her sitting with her laptop on her knees! Other optional parts such as headphones and her 'Brother Surveillance Tool' are also included, allowing you to recreate a number of scenes from the series! Be sure to take great care of Sasami-san, just as her brother would!
name: Nendoroid Sasami Tsukuyomi (ねんどろいど つくよみささみ)
copyright: ©日日日･小学館／製作委員会＠がんばらない

subtitle: The proud little kitten who doesn't get close to others easily.
description: From the popular game that recently became an anime series 'Little Busters!' comes a Nendoroid of the main heroine, the cat-loving Rin Natsume!

Her characteristic ponytail, slightly oversized blazer and pleated skirt have all been shrunk down into cute Nendoroid size for fans to enjoy. She also comes with three different expressions including a smiling face, an embarrassed face and a hissing cat face that works perfectly with the included cat ears!

A load of other optional parts are also included, such as a baseball glove and ball so the team can practice, as well as two of her favorite cats - Lennon and Dorj. A cat toy is also included so she can play with the cats, allowing you to recreate even more scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Rin Natsume (ねんどろいど なつめりん)

subtitle: "Whatever, let's all just let loose! ♪"
description: From the anime series featuring the 'new hero'(?) wooser, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a Nendoroid of the modern-day girl, Len! She comes with both a smiling expression and a winking expression, as well as an alternate body part which allows you to display her in a sexy swimsuit instead of her normal clothes! Plus even more extra parts are included to display her wearing her hoodie too!

But that's not all - Darth wooser, the silent freeloading creature is also included, and Len also comes with special parts to pose her in a heart pose together with the previously announced 'Nendoroid Rin & wooser + Mechawooser'! There are all sorts of extra parts to really show off Len's adorable charm!
name: Nendoroid Len & Darth wooser (ねんどろいど れん＆だすうさ)

subtitle: "If we're together, we can save the world!"
description: From the anime series 'VIVIDRED OPERATION' comes a figma of the cheerful main character, Akane Isshiki!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard expression, a smiling expression and a reluctant expression.
Her hoverbike 'Wanko' is included along with a Shift:body to show off her body's curves.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Akane Isshiki (ふぃぐま いっしきあかね)

subtitle: Ichika's 'first childhood friend', who refuses to be honest with herself!
description: From the popular anime series 'IS <Infinite Stratos>', comes a Nendoroid of Houki Shinonono! Her long, trademark ponytails are fitted with joints, and she comes with special alternative parts to allow you to display her in the running pose from the ending theme of the series!

She comes with her standard expression, a expression with gritted teeth and a cute smiling expression. She also comes with folded arm parts allowing you to pose her standing with an imposing appearance, or even a hand pointing forward! Her wooden sword and fencing stick are also both included as optional parts allowing you to pose her in a number of your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Houki Shinonono (ねんどろいど しのののほうき)

subtitle: The idols from 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' are appearing on stage as chibi figures!
description: Based on the social game released by Mobage, 'IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls' comes a set of cute chibi figures based on illustrations by Kengou Yakumo - the first in a new series of figures by Phat Company called the 'Minicchu' series.

The set includes figures of Rin Shibuya, Kaede Takagaki, Natalia, Nina Ichihara, Anzu Futaba, Kirari Moroboshi, Kanako Mimura and one secret character to look forward to! Put together your very own miniature idol unit with your favorite idols!
name: Minicchu THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS 01 (みにっちゅ あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず 01)

subtitle: "I'll be back. Back where I belong!"
description: From the movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figma of Fate Testarossa in Blaze Form!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her enhanced device 'Bardiche Assault' is included in Zanber Form.
A clear sheet is included to recreate the magical circle formed when she uses magic.
She comes with both a standard serious expression and a slightly embarrassed smiling expression.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: Blaze Form ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ぶれいずふぉーむver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: A rerelease to commemorate the start of the Little Busters! anime!
description: Nendoroid Kudryavka Noumi: Summer Uniform Ver. is being rereleased!
name: Nendoroid Kudryavka Noumi: Summer Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど のうみくどりゃふか なつふくVer.)

subtitle: The magical girls are visiting the beach! ♪
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a 1/4th scale figure of Nanoha Takamachi, dressed in an adorable pink and red bikini!

She is holding a swimming tube made from clear plastic on her right arm, and is posed in a dynamic pose that looks as if it will jump to life at any moment! A Fate Testarossa figure also wearing a swimsuit is currently in production and will also be on sale shortly after Nanoha, so be sure to display the two of them together!
Images shown are of a colored prototype that is still in development. The final product may differ.
name: Nanoha Takamachi : Swimsuit Ver. (たかまちなのは みずぎVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The NANA PARTY action figure!
description: The singer and voice actress, Nana Mizuki is joining the Nendoroid series!

She is posed in the waitress outfit seen in her 'Lovely Fruit' music video, and also comes with a hamburger on a tray to complete the pose! A Nendoroid-sized version of her mascot character 'Nanet-san', a live T-shirt and microphone are also all included to help you recreate her live stage performance!
name: Nendoroid Nana Mizuki (ねんどろいど みずきなな)

subtitle: Nendoroid Madoka Kaname is back, this time dressed as an elegant maiko!
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a Nendoroid of Madoka Kaname dressed as an elegant maiko. She comes with three different expression parts including a standard expression, a smiling expression and a gentle expression with closed eyes.

Optional parts include a Grief Box as well as two Japanese umbrella parts. She also comes with alternate sitting parts, which you can use together with the gentle expression to create a cute bowing pose. It's a different appearance for Madoka, but one that fans are sure to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Madoka Kaname: Maiko Ver. (ねんどろいど かなめまどか まいこVer.)

subtitle: "My name is Leysis Vi Felicity Sumeragi... an ancestor of the Great Blood Clan of the Night!"
description: From the anime series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT' comes a Nendoroid of the Kodaka's little sister, the beautiful Kobato Hasegawa!

Her cute goth-loli outfit has been shrunk down, and her different colored eyes look just as cute in Nendoroid form! A special expression and other optional parts are included allowing you to pose her as the anime character she often pretends to be. She also comes with the patched-up bunny plushie she always holds onto, along with the 'An-chan Plushie' which shows just how severe her brother complex is!
name: Nendoroid Kobato Hasegawa (ねんどろいど はせがわこばと)
copyright: ©2013 平坂読・メディアファクトリー／製作委員会は友達が少ないNEXT

subtitle: The twins with relaxing, electronic voices are back!
description: From the 'Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin/Len' comes a rerelease of the charming girl with a huge ribbon in her hair, Nendoroid Rin Kagamine!

As usual, Rin comes with several faces, but this time we asked the fans to come up with their own designs and submit them to us. With the help of consumer generated media site Piapro, we have selected the very best for inclusion with the Nendoroid!

In addition, Rin comes with a completely blank face, allowing for infinite levels of customization. Combined with Len Kagamine's completely cross-compatible parts, the sheer variety of poses and expressions is nothing short of mind-boggling!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Rin (かがみねりん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: The relaxing, refreshing singer is being rereleased!
description: Following the fans wishes, Nendoroid KAITO is being rereleased! Keeping the official original illustration in mind, KAITO's Nendoroid version has been perfected! His scarf is fluttering in the wind, faithfully recreating his most well-known pose in Nendoroid form.

Various extras are included such as an ice-cream and interchangeable faces, as well as other small accessories that fans will love. If you missed out on previous sales, be sure to grab him this time around!
name: Nendoroid KAITO (ねんどろいど かいと)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku is back in an elegant yukata once again!
description: From the 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing a all-new red yukata! The lovely yukata has a design which makes use of the 'natsutsubaki' flower, and her famous twin-tails are just as cute as ever! Even during the hot summer, Miku is ready to perform for everyone!

She comes with three different expressions including a standard smiling face, a charming winking expression and a chibi drooling face for all the delicious food she'll find during the Summer festivals! She also comes with some extra items to ensure she has fun at the festival, including a candy apple and a balloon yo-yo!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Yukata Ver. Natsutsubaki (ねんどろいど はつねみく ゆかたVer. なつつばき)
copyright: Outfit Plan: Suzunosuke © Crypton Future Media,INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: "Earth's entertainment is the best in the universe!"
description: From the second season of the anime sure to bring your SAN points down, 'Haiyore! Nyaruko-san W' comes a figure of Nyaruko herself dressed in an adorable maid outfit! She has her hair tied up in little balls together with cute twin tails, altogether creating an adorable appearance!

Nyaruko comes with three different expressions including a winking expression, an excited expression as well as a smiling expression. She also comes with a variety of optional parts including a 'Nightgaunt Drink' on a tray, a 'Kurogane no Striver' Blu-ray boxset, heart effect parts to let Nyaruko show her never-ending love and even a Nendoroid sized version of the mysterious Manta-kun! The crawling chaos is ready to serve all the fans!
name: Nendoroid Nyaruko: Maid Ver. (ねんどろいど にゃるこ めいどVer.)
copyright: © 逢空万太・ソフトバンク クリエイティブ／名状しがたい製作委員会のようなものＷ

subtitle: "I told you! I'm not your 'assistant' or 'Christina'!"
description: The 'hypothetical science adventure' game Steins;Gate has just recently had a sequel and movie version released, and from that series comes a 1/8th scale figure of Kurisu Makise wearing her white lab coat. She is posed with her long white lab coat fluttering behind her, as she blushes with the same cute expression she made whenever others made fun of her.

In her right hand she holds a bottle of 'Dokupe' and on her left wrist she is wearing Mirai Gadget #12: 'Darling no Baka'. It's a pose and figure that any fans of the tsundere genius are sure to enjoy!
name: Kurisu Makise: White Coat Ver. (まきせくりす はくいVer.)

subtitle: The twins with relaxing, electronic voices are back!
description: From the 'Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin/Len' comes a rerelease of the cheerful and energetic Nendoroid Kagamine Len!

As usual, Len comes with several faces, but this time we asked the fans to come up with their own designs and submit them to us. With the help of the consumer generated media site Piapro, we have selected the very best for inclusion with the Nendoroid

In addition, Len comes with a completely blank face, allowing for infinite levels of customization. Combined with Kagamine Rin's completely cross-compatible parts, the sheer variety of poses and expressions is nothing short of mind-boggling!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Len (かがみねれん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

subtitle: The popular Luka & Octo-Luka are back once more!
description: In response to all the fan requests, Nendoroid Megurine Luka is being rereleased! The fashionable yet mysterious feel about her has been shrunk down to cute Nendoroid size for your collection!
Also included is a Nendoroid Petite of the well-known 'Octo-Luka' - it's a set that captures all of Luka's many charms in a single figure! Enjoy adding both Luka and Octo-Luka to your collection!
name: Nendoroid Megurine Luka (ねんどろいど めぐりねるか)
copyright: © 三月八日/アゴアニキ/Crypton Future Media,Inc.

subtitle: The valiant knight, standing at the front line!
description: From the anime series which recently completed its second series, 'DOG DAYS' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the leader and Princess of the Galette Lion Army Territory, Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois! She is the second in the series, following on from the previously released Millhiore F. Biscotti figure.
The pose is taken from the ending scene of the series, with Leonmitchelli wielding her sword and shield as she stands ready for battle - a pose that captures her unwavering courage for fans to enjoy!
name: Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois (れおんみしぇり･がれっと･で･ろわ)

subtitle: Another 'LIVE Battle' in Nendoroid Petite size!
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a set of Nendoroid petites including Ranko Kanzaki, Uzuki Shimamura and Mika Jougasaki each in their S-Rare+ outfits! They are all dressed up and ready to perform in their stage outfits - a LIVE Battle at this Summer's Wonder Festival!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS - Ranko, Uzuki and Mika + Live Stage Set (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず らんこ・うづき・みか＆らいぶすてーじせっと)

subtitle: The lovable girl who always tries her best for her childhood friend.
description: From the popular PC game 'sekirara' comes a 1/7th scale of Yu Kawamura, the main character's childhood friend who loves to cook! Her gentle personality has been captured in a lovely dynamic pose.
Yu always kept close to the main character with a warm smile across her face, and now you can enjoy that same smile by your side whenever you like!
name: Yu Kawamura (かわむらゆう)
copyright: ©se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: "Love...? I don't understand how that could be love."
description: The second figma to join the COBRA series is Cobra's long-time partner, Lady!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
An alternate shift:body part is included allowing you to recreate the memorable crouching pose from the original manga.
A special winking expression that can be used on figma Cobra is included, as well as a Psychogun effect part.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Lady (ふぃぐま れでぃ)

subtitle: Beyond the icy stare…
description: From the anime series that aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block, 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of Chariot, the character specially designed for the TV series! The set also includes a Nendoroid-sized version of Mary, the spider-like tank that Chariot used to torture Black Rock Shooter.

Every part of Chariot's design from her trademark crown to the wheels attached to her legs have been faithfully shrunk down into Nendoroid form! She also comes with optional parts such as her sword and shield for combat scenes, as well as the memorable macaroons from the series. Chariot can also ride Mary, allowing you to recreate all sorts of scenes from the anime!
name: Nendoroid Chariot with Tank(Mary) Set: TV ANIMATION Ver. (ねんどろいど ちゃりおっと うぃず せんしゃ（めありー）せっと てれび あにめーしょん Ver.)

subtitle: Giant Ankou figures have arrived!
description: From the 'ADVENTURE KARTEL' series comes a figure of the Ankou Sentry built to fight against the large Zombs, AnkouEX. The AnkouEx is a larger version of the Ankou Sentry with a number of bags hanging at his waist, and the figure truly gives him the overwhelming presence he deserves!

The THRUXTON INDUSTRIAL ARMY HIRE version doesn't look as dirty compared to most of threeA's products, however there is also a "Dirty Swine Mode" version which has the dirty look that threeA are well known for, so you can choose which version you'd rather display! The soft outfit is also made to look and feel just like leather and really shows off threeA's sewing ability. There are a total of four different AnkouEX figures, each with their own unqiue highlights. They can also be displayed with the Johnson and Junglevet series of figures to really recreate the world of ADVENTURE KARTEL!
name: ADVENTURE KARTEL: AnkouEX THRUXTON INDUSTRIAL ARMY HIRE (あどべんちゃーかるてる あんこう いーえっくす すらくすとん いんだすとりある あーみー はいあ)

subtitle: The 'Ultimate Sadist' is joining in on the fun!
description: From the popular anime 'High School DxD' comes a figure of Akeno Himejima, one of the 'Two Great Ladies of Kuoh Academy' together with Rias.

Her characteristic long black ponytail has been faithfully sculpted, and she is posed in a very lascivious pose with one hand to her mouth, and the other teasingly pulling down on her own panties! She also comes with an alternate part to open up her breast area, which really brings out her naughty personality, allowing anyone to be mesmerized by the beauty of the Priestess of Thunder!
name: Akeno Himejima (ひめじまあけの)
copyright: © 2012 石踏一榮・みやま零／富士見書房／ハイスクールＤ×Ｄ製作委員会

subtitle: "If Mika's gonna be an idol, then so am I!"
description: From the hugely popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a figma of Rika Jougasaki in her school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a playful winking expression, a smiling expression with sparkling eyes as well as a more serious expression.
She comes with a rhinoceros beetle, an Alice band with bear-ears and her memo pad as optional parts.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rika Jougasaki (ふぃぐま じょうがさきりか)

subtitle: "If you're the best, you need to aim to be the very best!"
description: From the hugely popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a figma of Mika Jougasaki in her school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a determined expression, a winking expression and an embarrassed expression showing her gentle side.
Her cellphone as well as an alternate head part to display her with twin tails are included as optional parts.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken
name: figma Mika Jougasaki (ふぃぐま じょうがさきみか)

subtitle: Giant Ankou figures have arrived!
description: From the 'ADVENTURE KARTEL' series comes a figure of the Ankou Sentry built to fight against the large Zombs, AnkouEX. The AnkouEx is a larger version of the Ankou Sentry with a number of bags hanging at his waist, and the figure truly gives him the overwhelming presence he deserves!

The SHADOW SECURITY version has a hooded head and graffiti styled painting for his face. His outfit can be opened up to reveal his robust looking body as an alternate way of displaying him. There are a total of four different AnkouEX figures, each with their own unqiue highlights. They can also be displayed with the Johnson and Junglevet series of figures to really recreate the world of ADVENTURE KARTEL!
name: ADVENTURE KARTEL: AnkouEX SHADOW SECURITY (あどべんちゃーかるてる あんこう いーえっくす しゃどうせきゅりてぃ)

subtitle: GRUNTS and Square Mk.2 are joining the JDF.
description: As a part of threeA's popular 'World War Robot' series comes a new addition to the JDF colorway released by GSC. This time its a set of two which includes both the GRUNTS and Square Mk.2.

The GRUNTS figure has long been requested by fans and is now finally available. His outfit is incredibly detailed, featuring packs that can open and close as well as highly realistic paintwork to give him a worn appearance. The Square Mk.2 is different to the original Square as it has multiple joints in his legs, allowing for more active poses. The legs can be extended out for a more intimidating effect, or instead kneeling down for a cuter appearance - pick the style you prefer!
name: WWR Hara Patrol (WWR はら ぱとろーる)

subtitle: Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru is joining the Nendoroids~☆
description: With a second season on the way, 'Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai' is still as popular as ever - as is the anime series which features within it, 'Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru' and from that series within a series comes a Nendoroid of the magical girl, Meruru!

She comes complete with two different expressions, her weapon, a heart-shaped stand and even Comet-kun, the mysterious creature that gives her magical girl powers. A special stand to recreate the trophy seen in the cosplay competition in the series is also included! You can display Meruru in poses ranging from epic battle scenes to cute magical girl poses - however you think she looks best!
name: Nendoroid Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru (ねんどろいど ほしくず★うぃっち めるる)
series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai
copyright: ©伏見つかさ／アスキー・メディアワークス／OIP

subtitle: The race that worships the Goddess of Water, bound by fate to protect the World Tree.
description: From the popular MMORPG 'Lineage 2' comes a 1/7th scale of the most popular player class in the game - the Elf! The figure is based on the original image illustration for the class and has faithfully been reproduced in figure form.

The figure is filled with highlights that are sure to charm anyone who sets their eyes upon her - from her transparent skin to her affectionate expression, her beautiful pearl outfit with elegant armor and even her elaborately detailed weapon - every part of her has been beautifully sculpted for fans to enjoy.
name: Elf (えるふ)

subtitle: The Vocaloid with a charming, electronic voice is back again!
description: The popular 1/8th scale figure of Kagamine Rin from the Character Vocal Series is being rereleased! Sculpted by the popular sculptor Kanji Toona, this figure of Rin makes her look like she is energetically performing for her fans on stage. Grasping a mike in her hand, the singing Rin gazes ahead at her fans with a super cute expression and pose!
Be sure to display her together with Kagamine Len and Hatsune Miku to recreate a lively scene straight from a Vocaloid concert!
name: Kagamine Rin (かがみねりん)
series: Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin and Len

subtitle: The Vocaloid idol is back again; singing at the top of his powerful voice!
description: The popular 1/8th scale figure of Kagamine Len from the Character Vocal Series is being rereleased! Sculpted by the popular sculptor Kanji Toona, this figure of Len makes him look like he is energetically performing for his fans on stage. His face looks as if it's about to burst into song, as he plays on his finely detailed keyboard which adds even more to the figure!
Be sure to display her together with Kagamine Len and Hatsune Miku to recreate a lively scene straight from a Vocaloid concert!
name: Kagamine Len (かがみねれん)
series: Character Vocal Series 02: Kagamine Rin and Len

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime 'Angel Beats!' comes a new addition to Penguin Parade's Petanko series of figures! This time it's the cute girl with a sharp tongue - the vocalist and guitarist, Yui! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Yui (ぺたんこ ゆい)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime 'Angel Beats!' comes a new addition to Penguin Parade's Petanko series of figures! This time it's the girl who commands the SSS in the afterlife, Yuri! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Yuri (ぺたんこ ゆり)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the anime 'Angel Beats!' comes a new addition to Penguin Parade's Petanko series of figures! This time it's the mysterious girl who protects order in the afterlife, Tenshi! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Tenshi (ぺたんこ てんし)

subtitle: The pure-hearted master of the Tome of the Night Sky, who broke free from her chains of sadness.
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figma of Hayate Yagami in her knight armor!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her primary device 'Schwertkreuz' is included, as well as the Tome of the Night Sky in both a closed and open form.
An alternate head part is included to display her in the Unison state.
A special clear sheet is included to recreate the magical circles that appear when she uses magic.
She comes with three expressions: a gentle smile, a face with closed eyes and a glaring expression for the Union state.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hayate Yagami: The MOVIE 2nd A's ver. (ふぃぐま やがみはやて ざ むーびー せかんど えーす ver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The troublemaker who keeps things cheery at the Hidamari Apartments!
description: From the anime 'Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb' comes a figma of the cheerful Miyako!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with two different expressions: a cheerful smiling expression and a wide smile with closed eyes.
Chopsticks and a rice bowl are both included as optional parts.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Miyako (ふぃぐま みやこ)
copyright: © 蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: "It's not over… I won't let it end like this!"
description: From the movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figma of Nanoha Takamachi in Excelion Mode!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her enhanced device 'Raising Heart Excelion' is included in both 'Excelion Mode' and 'Excelion Mode: Strike Flame' form.
The wings of light seen in the 'Excelion Mode: Strike Flame' form can be recreated using exchangeable parts.
She comes with both a determined expression and a smiling expression with rosy cheeks.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Nanoha Takamachi: Excelion Mode ver. (ふぃぐま たかまちなのは えくせりおんもーどver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The motherly figure who excels at housework!
description: From 'Minamike', the anime with its forth season now airing, as well as a manga that is still being serialized comes the long-awaited Nendoroid of the oldest sister of the Minami household, Haruka Minami! She is posed wearing her school uniform and also comes with her school bag. She also comes with three different expressions including her standard expression, a smiling expression and the 'realistic' expression she sometimes showed in the series.

Optional parts include an extra body part wearing an apron, together with a knife and frying pan, allowing you to pose her cooking! Be sure to display Haruka together with Kana and Chiaki to complete the Nendoroid Minami Family!
name: Nendoroid Haruka Minami (ねんどろいど みなみ はるか)
copyright: © 桜場コハル・講談社／「みなみけ ただいま」製作委員会

subtitle: The Princess who hopes to use alchemy to better the future of her Kingdom!
description: From the PS3 game, 'Atelier Meruru ~The Apprentice of Arland~' comes a 1/8th scale of the main character of the game, Meruru herself! The vibrant multicolored gradient on her cape, a beautiful transparent jewel on her staff, additional parts to create a unique background and Meruru's bright and cheerful smile are just a few of the features that bring Meru Kishida's unique illustration into the world of figures!
A figure of the 19-year old Totori who appears in Atelier Meruru is also currently in production, so you'll be able to display the two of them together!
name: Meruru (めるる)

subtitle: The sub-leader of the Knights of the Blood is joining the S.K. series!
description: From 'Sword Art Online' comes an S.K. series figure of the Knights of the Blood sub-leader, Asuna!

She comes with a effect parts to display her swinging her rapier 'Lambent Light', allowing you to show off her valiant side, but she also comes with alternate expressions to display her in much cuter, girlish poses instead! A status window is also included to recreate even more scenes from the series!
name: S.K. series: Asuna (えすけーしりーず あすな)
copyright: © 川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: Giant Ankou figures have arrived!
description: From the 'ADVENTURE KARTEL' series comes a figure of the Ankou Sentry built to fight against the large Zombs, AnkouEX. The AnkouEx is a larger version of the Ankou Sentry with a number of bags hanging at his waist, and the figure truly gives him the overwhelming presence he deserves!

The C.O.S.D version features a unique head part that looks like part of a ghillie suit with just a single eye sticking out through the gaps in the camouflage to give the figure an mysterious appeal. The paintwork and lettering across his suit leave his background to your imagination. There are a total of four different AnkouEX figures, each with their own unqiue highlights. They can also be displayed with the Johnson and Junglevet series of figures to really recreate the world of ADVENTURE KARTEL!
name: ADVENTURE KARTEL: AnkouEX C.O.S.D (あどべんちゃーかるてる あんこう いーえっくす しー・おー・えす・でぃー)

subtitle: Giant Ankou figures have arrived!
description: From the 'ADVENTURE KARTEL' series comes a figure of the Ankou Sentry built to fight against the large Zombs, AnkouEX. The AnkouEx is a larger version of the Ankou Sentry with a number of bags hanging at his waist, and the figure truly gives him the overwhelming presence he deserves!

The THRUXTON INDUSTRIAL ARMY HIRE version doesn't look as dirty compared to most of threeA's products, however there is also a "Dirty Swine Mode" version which has the dirty look that threeA are well known for, so you can choose which version you'd rather display! The soft outfit is also made to look and feel just like leather and really shows off threeA's sewing ability. There are a total of four different AnkouEX figures, each with their own unqiue highlights. They can also be displayed with the Johnson and Junglevet series of figures to really recreate the world of ADVENTURE KARTEL!
name: ADVENTURE KARTEL: AnkouEX THRUXTON INDUSTRIAL ARMY HIRE (あどべんちゃーかるてる あんこう いーえっくす すらくすとん いんだすとりある あーみー はいあ )

subtitle: Kudo-chan is joining the Nendoroids! Wafu~!!
description: From the PC game "Little Busters! Ecstasy" comes a Nendoroid of the adorable Kudryavka Noumi!

Kudo comes with three expressions - a smiling face, a worried face and of course her famous 'wafu!' face, along with extra hands to recreate the full 'wafu!' pose! She also comes with dog ears and a tail, a Frisbee and even her pet dog Belka - a set of extras that willl let you create all sorts of adorable scenes for the adorable Kudryavka!
name: Nendoroid Kudryavka Noumi: Winter Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど のうみくどりゃふか ふゆふくばーじょん)

subtitle: Super Sonico wearing a frilly bunny girl outfit!
description: Nitroplus' mascot character 'Super Sonico' is joining FREEing's bunny girl collection wearing an adorable outfit filled with frills and ribbons! Her net tights are made from real fabric and her frilly outfit is all sculpted in a huge 1/4th scale which gives the figure some impressive volume!

She is looking straight ahead with a slightly embarrassed expression on her face, and the outfit also shows off her impressive bust to bedazzle her fans! If you're a Sonico-chan fan, then you won't want to miss out on this giant bunny girl version of her!
name: Super Sonico: Bunny Ver. (すーぱーそにこ ばにーVer.)

subtitle: "A message to all you who will never amount to anything!"
description: From the anime series 'Mawaru Penguindrum' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the Princess of the Crystal, sculpted in one of her most memorable poses from her transformation scene.

Every part of her glamorous outfit, including the wonderful penguin hat, has been carefully sculpted to faithfully reproduce the original designs. The skirt is also removable allowing you to pose her without it as well. Enjoy her long slender legs, her beautiful hips and her lovely curves whenever you like with this beautiful figure!
name: Princess of the Crystal (ぷりんせす・おぶ・ざ・くりすたる)
copyright: ©イクニチャウダー／ピングループ

subtitle: Fate is also wearing her swimsuit to join Nanoha! ♪
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a cute figure of Fate Testarossa wearing a bikini. Be sure to display her with the previously released Nanoha Takamachi: Swimsuit ver. for double the cuteness!
name: Fate Testarossa: Swimsuit Ver. (ふぇいと・てすたろっさ みずぎver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st
copyright:

The design is based on the cheering scene from the 3rd race which took place between the 15th and 16th of June at the Sepang Circuit.
Android Cases will be available from the 24th June from the phocase website: http:phocase.jp/

subtitle: An action figure of the Yukari Kingdom's Princess!
description: The world's cutest voice actor, Yukari Tamura, is joining the Nendoroid series!

She's also a well-known singer, so she is dressed in her stage outfit with a mike in hand, ready to sing for the fans! The happi coat often seen during her live performances as well as the two cat suits are all included as optional parts, allowing you to completely recreate her stage performance in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Yukari Tamura (ねんどろいど たむらゆかり)

subtitle: One of the 'Scarlet Sisters', and a revered pilot of the Soviet Union.
description: From the anime series 'Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse' comes a figma of Cryska Barchenowa!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her favorite pistol is also included as an optional part.
She comes with three expressions: a standard expression, a grinning expression and an embarrassed expression.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

description: This official iPhone case features the Hatsune Miku GT Project mascot character, Racing Miku 2013 ver., and was specially designed by Racing Miku's illustrator, saitom together with her character designer, Mari Shimazaki!
Android Cases will be available from the 24th June from the phocase website: http:phocase.jp/
name: Racing Miku 2013: iPhone 4 Case (れーしんぐみく 2013 あいふぉん4けーす)

subtitle: A certain Misaka's four-wheel-drive car!
description: Tamiya's Mini 4WD model car series has just celebrated its 30th anniversary and is now working in collaboration with the Nendoroid Petite series to create a joint product that will be produced by Dengeki Hobby Magazine! The third character to join the series is Mikoto Misaka from 'Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S'!

Using specially developed parts, the Nendoroid Petite figures can easily jump into the Mini 4WD models and drive around! Each car is specially designed to suit the image and colors of the character that the car is designed for, and the figure mount is a cleverly designed battery holder! A set of stickers is also included with the Mini 4WD to add even more flair to their ride!
name: Nendoroid Petite x Mini 4WD: Mikoto Misaka drives Thunder Shot Special (ねんどろいどぷち×みによんく みさかみこと どらいぶす さんだーしょっと すぺしゃる)

subtitle: Learn kanji the fun and moe way with moekanji!
description: The long awaited sequel to the hit Japanese learning card series Moekana is finally here!

Moekanji is a set of 87 illustrated cards to help you learn first grade Japanese Kanji which include the “On” and “Kun” readings written in hiragana. Join Mirai Suenaga and friends in learning kanji and basic Japanese!
The cards feature the characters of the TV show and website produced by Danny Choo called Culture Japan and are illustrated by the Japanese illustrator Ikkyuu.
Knowledge of the basic Japanese syllabary hiragana is required to benefit from Moekanji. If you have not done so already, you can learn hiragana with Moekana!
name: Moekanji (もえかんじ)

subtitle: Two cars aiming for first and second place!
description: In the 2012 season, the Miku GT Project is entering two cars. The second car was made in collaboration with the game 'Miku Hatsune and FutureStars Project mirai' and has been named the 'GSR ProjectMirai BMW' - it will be also be released as a 1/32 scale miniature car.

The design features various cute illustrations of the characters as they appeared in the game. The sponsor logos as they were at the start of the season are also all included in as much detail as possible. The chassis makes use of ABS for a durable design that still looks great!
name: GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012 : Season Opening ver. (GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012かいまくver.)
series: Miku Hatsune and Future Stars Project mirai
copyright: ©SEGA ©Crypton Future Media, Inc.　Design Cooperation : NendoroidThe BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of｠BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: Aiming to be the winner of the GT300 series once again!
description: The GSR Miku Hatsune BMW that is currently taking part in the SUPER GT300 series will be released as a 1/32 scale miniature car.

The new design has a lovely colorful appearance and features brand new illustrations of Racing Miku by GAN. The sponsor logos that were on the actual car at the start of the season are also all included in as much detail as possible on the model. The chassis makes use of ABS for a durable design that still looks great!
name: GSR Miku Hatsune BMW 2012 : Season Opening ver. (GSR はつねみく BMW 2012かいまく ver.)
copyright: ©GAN / Crypton Future Media, Inc.The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: Nendoroid Melona is back, this time in her 2nd player colors!
description: From the anime series 'Queen's Blade' comes another Nendoroid of the shapeshifter and close aide to the Swamp Witch, Melona! This time she is in her 2nd player color scheme for a completey different feel, and also comes with an all new 'damaged' body part and expression for even more fun ways to display her!
name: Nendoroid Melona: 2P Color Ver. (ねんどろいど めろーな 2PからーVer.)
copyright: ©2010 HobbyJAPAN/クイーンズブレイドEXパートナーズ

subtitle: The famous Egashira 2:50 is now a part of the figma series!
description: Enjoy the legend of Egashira 2:50 in your very own hands with this special limited edition version of figma Egashira 2:50, wearing his famous white tights - the same white tights that were sold on Yahoo! auctions for about 280000 yen as a charity auction to aid those affected by the Tohoku earthquake. You can also display him together with the standard black version for amazing contrast which you can enjoy forever!
name: figma Egashira 2:50 - White Tights ver. (ふぃぐま えがしら にじごじゅっぷん しろたいつver.)

subtitle: I'm Lieutenant Yui Takamura, it's good to have you on board.
description: From the popular anime series 'Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse' comes a Nendoroid of the First Lieutenant of the Imperial Guard, Yui Takamura, wearing her armored TSF pilot outfit! You can display her in a number of resolute poses suited to her personality as a member of a samurai family, plus she also comes with an embarrassed expression for some cuter poses and even a blood-stained expression to recreate her fierce battles with the BETA.

Optional parts including her pistol, a pot with her special meat and potato stew as well as her Japanese sword are also included together with a Nendoroid-sized BETA solider! All these extras allow you to recreate all sorts of scenes ranging from her everyday life to impressive combat scenes!
name: Nendoroid Yui Takamura (ねんどろいど たかむらゆい)
copyright: ©吉宗鋼紀・ixtl/テレビ東京/オルタネイティヴ第一計画

subtitle: "Hi! I'm Rin! I'm kinda nervous about being made into a figure..."
description: From the anime series featuring the new hero(?) wooser, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes a Nendoroid of the carefree Rin together with wooser himself! Rin is wearing her wooser hoodie, but she also comes with an alternate body part that lets you display her in a swimsuit! A glaring expression is also included to recreate scenes from the episode where wooser considered a glare from a girl to be a reward for his work!

Mechawooser, the robotic wooser that destroyed an entire city in search of uniforms, is also included as an optional part - and it can even open up so that someone can ride inside! Also don't forget that wooser himself is included in the set - it's a huge set for fans to really enjoy the world of wooser!
name: Nendoroid Rin & wooser + Mechawooser (ねんどろいど りん&うーさー＋めかうーさー)

subtitle: The cutest Crawling Chaos, Nyarlathotep!
description: From the chaotic comedy series 'Haiyore! Nyaruko-san' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Nyaruko, the main heroine of the story! Her pose is based on one of the key visuals used in the series which features her standing up on one leg with her skirt fluttering around her. Her long, trademark strand of hair, which sticks out from her head and also functions as a radar for evil, has been faithfully sculpted onto the figure for fans to enjoy!
Just wait for her to crawl her way onto your desk and enjoy the company of this cute creature from the mythos whenever you like!
name: Nyaruko (にゃるこ)
copyright: ©逢空万太・ソフトバンク クリエイティブ／名状しがたい製作委員会のようなもの

subtitle: The warm, powerful and relaxing voice of Kagamine Rin: Append!
description: The slightly more mature looking 'Append' version of Kagamine Rin is joining the Nendoroids! She comes with three different expressions including a cheerful smiling face, a winking face to display her happily singing along to some songs and even a pleading expression allowing you to pose her trying to get something from Len!
She also comes with a background panel and special display arm allowing you to pose her back-to-back with Nendoroid Kagamine Len: Append, to ensure you can display the twins close together!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Rin: Append (ねんどろいど かがみねりん・あぺんど)

subtitle: The soft, serious and powerful soul singer, Kagamine Len: Append!
description: The slightly more modern looking 'Append' version of Kagamine Len is joining the Nendoroids! He comes with three different expressions including a cheerful smiling face, a winking face to display him happily singing along to some songs and even a serious expression to show off his cooler side!
He also comes with a background panel and special display arm allowing you to pose him back-to-back with Nendoroid Kagamine Rin: Append, to ensure you can display the twins close together!
name: Nendoroid Kagamine Len: Append (ねんどろいど かがみねれん・あぺんど)

subtitle: Yunocchi's close friend, with a fun and cheerful personality!
description: From the anime series 'Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb' comes a Nendoroid of Yuno's close friend, Miyako! She comes with a number of optional parts that show her love for food, such as a giant serving of rice with chopsticks as well as a hanging scroll with the kanji for 'tuna' written on it. She also comes with cross-legged parts and a floor cushion to sit on.

Three different expressions are also included - her standard expression, a smiling expression and a blank expression with stickers, allowing you to create your very own expression! Be sure to display her together with Yuno, and enjoy the energetic antics of Miyako whenever you like!
name: Nendoroid Miyako (ねんどろいど みやこ)
copyright: ©蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: The witch of Shiroinu hill, in the town of Misaki.
description: From the visual novel game 'Mahou Tsukai no Yoru' comes a Nendoroid of the young witch that lives in hiding, Alice Kuonji!

She comes with a number of expressions including her standard relaxed expression, an embarrassed expression and a chibi face that comes from the 'bonus corner' found in the game. She also comes with sitting parts and a artistic moon stand that she can sit on. Her little blue bird familiar, 'Robin', is also included along with the 'Diddle Diddle' bell. Be sure to display her together with the previously released Aoko Aozaki and recreate your favorite scenes from the game!
name: Nendoroid Alice Kuonji (ねんどろいど くおんじありす)

subtitle: The daring and mysterious young girl.
description: From the popular anime series 'Waiting in the Summer' comes a figure of the character with a petite build and twintails, Remon Yamano. She is posed wearing her school uniform, holding a camera in her right hand with her left hand against her knee as she leans forward with a suspicious upward gaze... making you wonder what exactly is going through her mind!
Be sure to display her with the previously announced Ichika Takatsuki.
name: Remon Yamano (やまのれもん)
copyright: © I＊Chi＊Ka／なつまち製作委員会 Images represent a product still in development.

subtitle: The troublemaker of the Minami household!
description: The 4th season of the Minamike anime is now airing, and the manga is still being serialized and is just as popular as ever! The Nendoroid series of Minamike is also getting bigger, as Kana Minami, the long awaited troublemaker of the Minami household, is also coming to join the Nendoroid family!

She is wearing her school uniform and also includes a school bag, allowing you to display her on her way to school. She also comes with three different expressions - her standard triumphant expression, a smiling expression and even the realistic expression she sometimes shows in the series!
A small kitchen set is also included to help you recreate even more scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Kana Minami (ねんどろいど みなみ かな)
copyright: © 桜場コハル・講談社／「みなみけ ただいま」製作委員会

subtitle: Blunt and straight to the point. In a cute way!
description: From 'Minamike', the anime with its forth season now airing, as well as a manga that is still being serialized, comes a Nendoroid of the expressionless, slow-going third daughter of the Minami household, Chiaki Minami.

Wearing her school uniform, and complete with both her school bag and school hat, she is ready to head for school. In addition to her standard 'half-awake' expression, she also comes with the 'realistic' expression she often showed in the series, as well as an embarrassed expression. Her beloved teddy bear 'Fujioka' is also included!
name: Nendoroid Chiaki Minami (ねんどろいど みなみちあき)
copyright: © 桜場コハル・講談社／みなみけ 製作委員会

subtitle: An album featuring all the best YuruYuri songs, 'YuruYurism♪'!
description: 'YuruYurism♪' is the first best album from the popular 2011 Summer anime 'YuruYuri', and the limited edition special package will include this transparent Nendoroid Akari Akaza: Akariiin Ver.!
- Limited Edition Special Package Contents - Tracks: Includes 23 songs and one brand new song. (3CDs) Release Date: 2013/06/05 Price: ¥6,825

- Three Huge Bonuses Included - Bonus #1: Nendoroid Akari Akaza (Limited Album Edition) Bonus #2: Nanamori-chuu Goraku-bu Live Advance Ticket Application Ticket ( Includes two serial numbers for two applications and twice the chance to be selected!) Bonus #3: Nanamori-chuu Goraku-bu's New Song CD
name: Nendoroid Akari Akaza: Akariiin Ver. (ねんどろいど あかざあかり ＼あっかり～ん／Ver.)
copyright: © なもり/一迅社・七森中ごらく部

subtitle: Mikoto has dressed herself up in a fancy bunny girl outfit!
description: From ''Toaru Kagaku no Raingun' comes a 1/4th scale figure of one of the seven Level 5 espers in Academy City, Mikoto Misaka! She is wearing a cute, white bunny girl outfit with net tights made from real fabric for a realistic effect. The chair she sits on is also included, and allows you to display her sitting comfortably with one hand up near her breasts in a slightly suggestive pose.

She comes with both her standard expression as well as an embarrassed expression, allowing you to decide how you'd rather display her! Be sure to display her together with the previously announced Kuroko Shirai: Bunny Ver.!
name: Mikoto Misaka: Bunny Ver. (みさかみこと ばにーVer.)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN

subtitle: Cuteness that makes you feel all warm and fuzzy, like you're wrapped up in sunshine!
description: From the popular anime now onto it's forth season, 'Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb' comes a Nendoroid of the main character, Yuno! She comes with a standard expression, a smiling expression and a blank expression with stickers allowing you to create various extra expressions!

She also comes with a number of optional parts that you'd expect an art student to have, such as her sketchbook, a pencil, some bread to munch on and even a Nendoroid-sized version of the fan favorite, 'Ume-sensei'! You can recreate a number of poses from all the opening themes, as well as various other scenes!
name: Nendoroid Yuno (ねんどろいど ゆの)
copyright: ©蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: "I wish to become needed by all women!" - wooser.
description: From the ever-popular TV anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes some traditional Japanese facial oil removal paper! A special bag to keep the used paper is also included, which could also be used as an envelope for a small letter.
Every time you make use of one of these, you'll be one step closer to becoming wooser's kind of girl... maybe!
name: wooser's Facial Oil Removal Paper (うーさーのあぶらとりがみ)

subtitle: The female butler is joining the others wearing her (girl's) school uniform!
description: From the popular anime series 'Mayo Chiki!' comes a figure of the main character who works as Kanade Suzutsuki's butler, Subaru Konoe.

She is posed wearing her school uniform which is slowly slipping off at the shoulder, with one leg stretched out in front of her while sitting down. It's a different side to Subaru that you normally don't get to see behind her butler's uniform, and gives her a chance to show off her body's lovely curves! She is looking as cute as ever with upturned eyes and an embarrassed expression, ready to keep you company after a busy day.
name: Subaru Konoe (このえすばる)
copyright: © あさのハジメ・メディアファクトリー／まよチキ！製作委員会

subtitle: "Well… I can give you a little compliment..."
description: From the online mahjong game, 'Momoiro Taisen Pairon' comes a Nendoroid of Alice wearing a dress that shows her love for Lolita fashion, as well as huge black ribbon in her hair! She comes with a number of optional parts including different expressions, a chair, mahjong tiles, her rabbit staff and a pouch, which means you can even pose her in the middle of a mahjong match - just about to play her tile!

As a special bonus for the first release of the figure, a serial code for a new Alice card which can be used in the game is also included. The card is only available with the Nendoroid, so don't miss out!!
name: Nendoroid Alice (ねんどろいど ありす)

subtitle: "Oh? So you're going to be my producer?"
description: From the popular social game, 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a collection of Nendoroid Petite figures featuring five different characters from the game - Rin Shibuya, Anzu Futaba, Kanako Mimura, Kaede Takagaki and Rika Jougasaki.

The characters are wearing their 'Normal' or 'Rare' outfits from the game, all sculpted down to cute Nendoroid Petite size! There are also two secret characters that are dressed up are in their 'Plus+' outfits from the game, creating a total of seven different figure to collect!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS - Stage 01 (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず すてーじ01)

subtitle: "Until every last dragon has been hunted down... leave the logistics to me..."
description: From Sega's popular RPG game, '7th Dragon 2020' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the one of the player classes - the Hacker!

The figure is based on an illustration by Shirow Miwa and takes care to faithfully reproduce all the smallest details and delicate frills on her outfit, as well as her long and flowing twintail hair! She has a glum expression on her face that captures her personality nicely, so fans can truly feel like they have the Hacker by their side!
name: Hacker (Chelsea) (はっかー（ちぇるしー）)

subtitle: Magmel's competent system operator with a flair of mystery!
description: From the popular arcade game 'BORDER BREAK' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the system operator Fiona, also known as 'Opeko'!

The figure captures both Fiona's beauty and her intelligence in a cute standing pose based on an illustration by Kazama Raita. It's a whole new way for fans to experience Fiona's company as the perfect system operator! ♪
name: Fiona: Kazama Raita ver. (ふぃおな かざまらいたver.)

subtitle: The gorgeous girl who manipulates time
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the calm and cool Puella Magi, Homura Akemi, sculpted by Satoshi Toda (Principality of Kagutsuchino). The unique sculpting work of Satoshi Toda creates a figure with an amazing presence, sure to draw the attention of anyone who lays eyes on her!
name: Homura Akemi (あけみほむら)

subtitle: Taichi swapping bodies with Himeko!
description: From the anime 'Kokoro Connect' comes a 1/8th scale figure of one of the heroines of the series, Himeko Inaba. Himeko normally has a cool and calm personality, but when she switches bodies with the main character of the series, Taichi, she ends up in this model's pose that she'd normally never consider taking! It's a figure that captures a very different side of Himeko for fans to enjoy!
name: Himeko Inaba (いなばひめこ)
copyright: ©庵田定夏 by エンターブレイン／私立山星高校文研部

subtitle: Stand up! Vanguard!
description: From the anime series 'Cardfight!! Vanguard' comes a Nendoroid of the shy character with a gentle heart, Aichi Sendou! He comes with three different expressions including a smiling expression, a shouting expression and an embarrassed expression.

Aichi also comes with various optional parts such as Vanguard cards and a card case he can hold in his hands, as well as his Vanguard Fight Glove and one of his most faithful units, Wingal! Recreate your favorite scenes from the series in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Aichi Sendou (ねんどろん)

subtitle: The shy girl with a lovable personality, who takes the role of a mascot in her group of friends.
description: From the PC game 'se-kirara' comes a 1/7th scale figure of Nozomi Akiyama, the transfer student surrounded in mystery. Her facial expression gives her a bit of a listless impression at first, but behind it is a number of cute quirks that lead her to become known as the 'mascot' in the group.
Aya and the other characters from the game love to take good care of the cute little Nozomi, so be sure to keep her by your side so that you can watch over her too!
name: Nozomi Akiyama (あきやまのぞみ)
copyright: © se・きららプロジェクト / Maxfactory

subtitle: Mikudayo- is back again, this time made from soft vinyl!
description: The popular Mikudayo- character costume based on 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' was first transformed into a Nendoroid, and now is also on her way to becoming a 20cm tall 1/8th scale vinyl figure as well!

The hair section on the figure even makes use of the same texture as the original for a truly realistic rendition of the costume! As an optional part, she also includes the Mikudayo- x Fujiya collaboration product, 'pop candy', which she can hold in her hand for a slightly different pose!

Special Mikudayo- wallpapers are heading out to visit the product pages of other Miku figures! Find them to recieve the special wallpaper! For more information on where she is each week, be sure to follow @GSC_GUMA on Twitter!
* The special wallpaper will appear under with the product thumbnails. * If you find it, simply click the wallpaper thumbnail to enlarge the image and then download the wallpaper!
name: Mikudayo- (みくだよー)

subtitle: The other heroine at the whims of the 'Hollow World'.
description: From the popular anime series 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a figma of Yomi Takanashi's other self, Dead Master!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with her standard expression, a condescending expression as well a an expression with closed eyes to recreate the scene she was captive.
Her powerful weapon, the 'Dead Scythe' is also included, along with the chains that bound her.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Dead Master: TV ANIMATION ver. (ふぃぐま でっどますたー てれびあにめーしょん ver.)

subtitle: Dressed up as a bunny girl for Mikoto!
description: From ''Toaru Kagaku no Raingun' comes a 1/4th scale figure of Kuroko Shirai, the Judgment member who attends Tokiwadai Middle School together with Mikoto Misaka. She is dressed up in a bunny girl outfit with tights made from real fabric, and her trademark twin-tails have been faithfully sculpted together with a sexy pose that really lets her to show off her body!

She comes with two different expressions - her standard expression, as well as a expression with a broad grin across her face, allowing you to choose which expression you prefer! Mikoto Misaka is scheduled to be joining her shortly, so you'll be able to enjoy both the girls together!
name: Kuroko Shirai: Bunny Ver. (しらいくろこ ばにーVer.)
copyright: © 鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN

subtitle: The veteran Puella Magi is being rereleased!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a rerelease of the of the egotistical Nendoroid Kyouko Sakura!

She comes with a three expressions including a smiling face, an angry face and a face munching on some of her favorite 'Rocky' treats - plus she also comes with a taiyaki so you can really show just how much she loves to eat! She also comes with two different versions of her weapon - one as a straight spear and the other in its disjointed form for a more dynamic battle pose!
Be sure to display her together with the other Puella Magi Nendoroids for the complete Madoka Magica experience!
name: Nendoroid Kyouko Sakura (ねんどろいど さくらきょうこ)

subtitle: Alicesoft's most popular female character, finally joining the figure world!
description: Alicesoft ran a poll on their official website in order to select the most popular female character from their games, with the winner to be made into a figure! The mysterious Reset Kalar from Rance Quest took first place in the poll, and has now received her prize by being made into this lovely figure!

A special illustration by the series character designer, Orion, was made specially for the figure, which has now been faithfully transformed into a figure! She is posed with a cute expression across her face as she runs forward while elegantly holding her dress up. Pasel Kalar, the queen of Kalar, is also included as a small ghost to display together with Reset!
name: Reset Kalar (りせっと・からー)

subtitle: The new Kaleido Ruby, 'Prisma Illya' is here!
description: From the spin-off manga of 'Fate/stay night' with an anime on the way, 'Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya' comes this 1/8th scale figure of Illya transformed into her magical girl form! She is posed in the her signature pose while holding her magical wand, 'Magical Ruby' in her one hand.
She has a lovely smile across her face and the sculpting gives the figure an amazingly dynamic feeling that fans of the series are sure to enjoy!
name: Prisma Illya (Manga ver.) (ぷりずま☆いりや［こみっくver.］)
copyright: ©2013 ひろやまひろし・TYPE-MOON・角川書店／「プリズマ☆イリヤ」製作委員会

subtitle: One of the three Sorcerer Generals - a powerful warrior with impressive breasts to boot!
description: From the popular manga 'BASTARD!!: Ankoku no Hakaishin' comes a figure of one of the three Sorcerer Generals that serve The Thunder Empress, Arshes Nei. Kai is a master of both magic and swordsmanship, but she is also an absolute beauty with perfect balance between her sexy narrow body and her huge breasts! To emphasize her body even more, she is wearing a very revealing outfit that also gives you a perfect look at her superb hip-line.
Be sure to display her together with the other characters in the same series to recreate the complete scene!

subtitle: The twin-tailed girl who makes a great maid!
description: From the popular anime series 'Mayo Chiki!' comes a figure of Masamune Usami, one of the main character's classmates who also works as a maid at the Suzutsuki household. Her trademark wavy hair is tied up in twin-tails as she sits in a rather bold pose with both her shirt open and her skirt lifted up!

With just a quick glance you can enjoy the carefully sculpted Masamune, but if you take the time to look in more detail you'll really be able to appreciate just how impressive she is! Be sure to keep her right by your side, so you can always enjoy her mistrustful gaze staring back at you!
name: Masamune Usami (うさみまさむね)
copyright: © あさのハジメ・メディアファクトリー／まよチキ！製作委員会

subtitle: The girl with long red hair, who came from 'far away'.
description: From the popular anime series set in Nagano prefecture's Koromo city, 'Waiting in the Summer' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the transfer student that arrived just as the first semester came to an end, Ichika Takatsuki! Her outstanding body has been faithfully transformed into figure form for fans to enjoy!

From her beautiful big eyes peeking over the rims of her glasses, to the impressive bust you can easily make out even beneath her uniform and even the stunning curves you can see below her skirt as it flutters in the wind - it's a figure full of highlights for Ichika fans! Plus she also comes with a figure of Rinon, the little pet that came along with her to earth!
name: Ichika Takatsuki (たかつきいちか)

subtitle: "I want some friends too!"
description: From the popular light novel series "Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Sena Kashiwazaki, the girl who would be perfect if it wasn't for her personality! Sena has great grades and excels at sports, she has lovely blond hair, blue eyes and big breasts - but at the same time she has a really stuck-up and bossy personality.
This figure captures all the beauty of her body and even brings out her personality with the unimpressed expression on her face. Be sure to display her with the previously announced Yozora Mikaduki!
name: Sena Kashiwazaki (かしわざきせな)

She is standing in a valiant pose with a serious expression across her face, leaving her looking calm and collected as she draws her treasured sword, 'Hien'. Her unique outfit has also been sculpted and painted with great care to detail that fans of the series are sure to appreciate! Be sure to display her together with the previously announced Hibari figure!

subtitle: The 25 year old 'Ace of Aces' Aerial Combat Mage, ready for battle!
description: From the manga series currently being serialized in Nyan Type Magaine, 'Magical War Lyrical Nanoha Force' comes a figure of the adult Nanoha Takamachi equipped with her CW-AECOOX Fortress Armament.

The figure faithfully reproduces the original design from the manga in 1/8th scale, including the huge strike cannon and shields included with her AEC Armament! The large, medium and small shields are all included and each can be attached to Nanoha's right arm. Using the included pedestal you can also display Raising Heart alongside her! Enjoy a more imposing and mature Nanoha than ever before!
name: Nanoha Takamachi CW-AEC00X Fortress & CW-AEC02X Strike Cannon (たかまちなのは CW-AEC00X ふぉーとれす & CW-AEC02X すとらいくかのん)

They're fun to collect and look adorable on display, so if you're a fan of the series, be sure you don't miss out!
name: graphig++ Hidamari Sketch x Honeycomb (ひだまりすけっち×はにかむ)
copyright: ©蒼樹うめ・芳文社／ひだまり荘管理組合

subtitle: The most beautiful girl on campus - elegant on the outside but mischievous on the inside.
description: From the popular anime series 'Mayo Chiki!' comes this figure of Kanade Suzutsuki, the only daughter of Rouran High's principal and Subaru Konoe's master!

Kanade is showing off her naughty side by opening the front of her blouse and kneeling down in a very suggestive pose, lifting up her skirt with one hand and innocently pointing at her mouth with the other. The mischievous smile across her face together with the beautiful curves you can see beneath her skirt come together to create a very striking figure of Kanade for fans to enjoy. subtitle: Kaori is here to bring some sex appeal to Academy City!
description: From the anime series 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the skilled swordsman and ever-popular character, Kaori Kanzaki! Her tall build and unique style have both been faithfully captured in figure form!

Kaori is normally known for her more serious personality, but this figure gives us a taste of her cuter side - she has her faithful sword by her side as she stands in a rather revealing pose for fans to enjoy!

description: From the popular anime series 'High School DxD' comes a figure of Rias Gremory, the school idol who ends up serving the main character of the series!

Rias is sculpted sitting on her knees with her long red hair fluttering around her like a flame in the wind. She is posed with her head titled to the side as she looks ahead with a provocative expression across her face. She also comes with an alternative parts that show off her her impressive bosom, creating a situation that suits her character even more!

description: From the popular Touhou Project game, 'Imperishable Night' comes a Nendoroid of the extra level boss - the immortal Fujiwara no Mokou, also known as Moko-tan!

subtitle: One of the three Sorcerer Generals - the beautiful blond who wields powerful amulets!
description: From the popular manga 'BASTARD!!: Ankoku no Hakaishin' comes a figure of Sean Ari, another one of the three Sorcerer Generals that serve The Thunder Empress, Arshes Nei. She is posed a a very showy pose down on her knees, with her bottom sticking out over her very short miniskirt! She is looking over her shoulder with an embarrassed expression across her face, trying to cover up whatever she can!
Be sure to display her with the other figures from the same series to recreate the complete scene!
name: Sean Ari (しーん・はり)

subtitle: The bright and cheerful Puella Magi is being rereleased!
description: From the popular anime series "Puella Magi Madoka Magica" comes a rerelease of Madoka's best friend, the strong-willed Nendoroid Sayaka Miki!

She comes with three expressions including a standard smiling face, an upset face and a pained expression for combat scenes. She also comes with an total of eight swords to either hold or display around her - each comes with its own stand allowing you to recreate the famous combat scene where she is surrounded by swords! Plenty of extra arm parts are also included, leaving you with tons of different ways to display her!

The Nendoroid captures Yozora's unsociable and cranky image, but still has that cute Nendoroid appeal!

She comes with three different expressions including her standard cranky expression, a smug expression and a smiling expression to pose her chatting with her imaginary friend, Tomo-chan! A number of other optional parts are also included, such as a sofa and a portable game console, allowing you to recreate all sorts of scenes from the Neighbor's Club!
name: Nendoroid Yozora Mikaduki (ねんどろいど みかづきよぞら)

She comes with two possible posing options - you can pose her either holding her bow, or instead with Tori Aoi lying between her legs. The wings on her hips are also removable giving you even more ways to display the the lovely Tomo!

She comes with everyday optional parts such as her frog cellphone and school bag to recreate her calmer student life, but also comes with effect parts allowing you to display her firing her signature 'railgun' attack to show off her more outgoing side! Just be sure this cute and cool Electromaster doesn't leave you too electrified!
name: S.K. series: Mikoto Misaka (えすけーしりーず みさかみこと)

description: Nitroplus' mascot girl, Super Sonico, is joining the figma series!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a bright smiling expression, a winking expression as well as a cute, clumsy looking expression.
Her beloved guitar is also included as well as the option to pose her with or without the tiger-ear hoodie.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: threeA's HALO series has begun!
description: threeA's latest product is a figure of Commander Carter from the popular first-person shooter game, HALO. The figure stands approximately 35cm in height and features the finest of details in superb quality. His helmet can also be illuminated and the figure utilizes magnetized areas to connect his shoulder shields and weapons to, for all sorts of interesting options!

All of the areas between his armor have also been carefully sculpted to recreate the rubber suit beneath the armor, and the figure is fully articulated to allow for realistic renditions of your favorite poses - even the fingers are fully articulated allowing you to easily pose him holding weapons such as a grenade or one of his guns. The unique rusted paintwork from threeA also gives the figure an incredibly realistic look that fans are sure to enjoy!

subtitle: The large busted shrine maiden, joining the Nendoroids!
description: From 'Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere PORTABLE' comes a Nendoroid of the Asama Shrine's only daughter, Tomo Asama, wearing her uniform!
name: Nendoroid Tomo Asama: Uniform ver. (ねんどろいど あさま・とも せいふくVer.)
series: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere
