subtitle: The knight clad in pure white is being rereleased!
description: As a part of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary rerelease project, the 2010 Winter WonFes product, 'Saber Lily ~Golden Caliburn~ ' is going to be rereleased!

She is in the same pose as the 'Saber Lily ~Distant Avalon~ figure, but in this version she is wearing less armor, leaving her beautiful flowing dress visible to all. Her expression has also been altered to a subtle smile as she brandishes her glimmering sword through the air.

Her sword 'Caliburn' as well as its scabbard have been carefully sculpted down to the finest of details, together with her thin, gorgeous body that makes it hard to believe that she is a servant that fights in the Holy Grail War. If you add her to your collection, be sure to display her together with 'Saber Lily ~Distant Avalon~'!
name: Saber Lily ~Golden Caliburn~ (せいばー・りりぃ ～しょうりすべきおうごんのけん（かりばーん）～)

subtitle: A special set of the Puella Magi Petanko figures!
description: A special set of The Puella Magi from Penguin Parade's Petanko figure series! The set contains Madoka Kaname, Homura Akemi, Mami Tomoe, Sayaka Miki and Kyouko Sakura all at the same price as the single figures, but also includes a special Petanko figure of Kyubey! You can only get Kyubey as a part of the this special package, so don't miss out!
name: Petanko Madoka Magica Special Package (Includes Kyubey) (ぺたんこ まどか☆まぎか すぺしゃるぱっけーじ（きゅうべえつき）)

subtitle: A huge replica of The Giant Warrior.
description: It's been announced that from November 17, 2012, the theatrical release of "Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo" will be shown together with an extended theatrical edition of the "A Giant Warrior Descends on Tokyo" short "tokusatsu" special effects film produced by Studio Ghibli! In commemoration of this special event, the "Giant Warrior Statue Replica" will again be available for limited-time preorder. *Please be aware that the release date will differ from the initial product reservation period.

Studio Ghibli's newest short special effects film 'A Giant Warrior Descends on Tokyo' is being screened at Anno Hideaki's Special Effects exhibition, and from that film comes this huge model of the Giant Warrior. The model is based on a life-size puppet of the Giant Warrior that was used for special effects in the film, made into a miniaturized replica for fans to enjoy! Takayuki Takeya is behind the beautiful sculpting of the model itself, the base it stands on as well as the rod of light it holds. The model measures an amazing 50cm from head to toe and is made from polystone which allows for incredibly delicate and detailed sculpting - all in all creating a model that fans will be proud to own!
name: Giant Warrior Statue Replica (きょしんへいぞう れぷりか)
series: A Giant Warrior Descends on Tokyo

subtitle: The second series of graphig figures!
description: The characters from Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie are going to be the second set of characters to join the chibi square series of graphig figures!

The set includes Madoka Kaname, Homura Akemi, Mami Tomoe, Sayaka Miki, Kyouko Sakura, Kyubey as well as one secret character! They're fun to collect and they'll look adorable displayed throughout your house, so if you're a Madoka Magica fan don't miss out on these graphig++ Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie figures!
name: graphig++ Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie (ぐらふぃぐ+ + げきじょうばん まほうしょうじょまどか☆まぎか)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie

subtitle: "So... you can make any wish come true, right?"
description: From the anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figma of Madoka's best friend, Sayaka Miki, wearing her school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes three expressions parts including a triumphant face, a face with closed eyes and a frightened face.
Her school bag, a normal baseball bat as well as her magically enhanced baseball bat are all included.
An alternate fringe part is included which features her hair accessory. This can also be used with the Puella Magi ver. figma.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Sayaka Miki: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま みきさやか せいふくver.)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie

subtitle: "A Chain Knuckle for anyone who breaks public order!"
description: From the 2D fighting game 'Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena' comes a figma of Yasogami High School's student council president, Labrys!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a gentle smiling expression, a shouting expression for combat poses and a shadow expression.
The axe she uses in the game, as well as chains and effect parts to pose her performing her 'Chain Knuckle' attack are all included.
The visor that was added in the 'Glasses' DLC pack is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Labrys (ふぃぐま らびりす)
series: Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena

subtitle: "One thing to take with to a deserted island?" - I think this is a pretty good idea.
description: wooser is finally expanding into the food market! From the surreal anime 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' comes some canned bread for all your emergency needs! The bread is lovely and airy with a sweet maple syrup taste. Be sure to grab some before heading to any deserted islands, or before shutting yourself away from the rest of the world!
name: wooser's Preserved Food to Take to a Deserted Island (むじんとうにもっていくべき うーさーのほぞんしょく)

subtitle: "Won't you join me for some witch hunting?"
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figma of the experienced Puella Magi, Mami Tomoe, wearing her school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a smiling face, an expression with closed eyes as well as a glaring expression.
Other optional parts include her beloved tea cup and saucer as well as her school bag.
Her Soul Gem is also included in its pre-transformation state, allowing you to pose her ready to transform.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mami Tomoe: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ともえまみ せいふくver.)
copyright: Images are of a product still in development. ©Magica Quartet／Aniplex・Madoka Partners・MBS

subtitle: Following on from Aigis, Labrys will also be available in her Famitsu original color variation!
description: From the PS3/Xbox360 game released on the 26th July 2012, 'Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena' comes a figma of Labrys brought to you by Max Factory in the Famitsu original color variation, available for a limited time at Enterbrain's online shop website, 'ebten'. All purchases will also come with a limited edition original post card - but both have limited stock, so don't miss out!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a gentle smiling expression, a shouting expression for combat poses and a shadow expression.
The axe she uses in the game, as well as chains and effect parts to pose her performing her 'Chain Knuckle' attack are all included.
The visor that was added in the 'Glasses' DLC pack is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Labrys: Famitsu Original Color (ふぃぐま らびりす ふぁみつうおりじなるからー)
series: Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena

subtitle: The red eyes that watch over the 'Hollow World'.
description: From the anime series 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a figma of Saya Irino's other self, Black Gold Saw!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a glaring expression and the joyful expression she sometimes shows while fighting.
Black Gold Saw's weapon, 'Kingsaw', is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Black Gold Saw: TV ANIMATION ver. (ふぃぐま ぶらっくごーるどそー てれびあにめーしょん ver.)

subtitle: The Thunder Empress, bound and locked by chains.
description: From the popular manga 'BASTARD!!: Ankoku no Hakaishin' comes a figure of the mage who excels in lightning-based magic, the 'Thunder Empress', Arshes Nei! She is posed with her arms tied up in chains to the magical lightning sword which forms a part of the figure's pedestal. She is wearing a very revealing outfit which shows off her dark skin and sexy body for fans to enjoy. The chains can also be removed.
The others in the series who serve Nei are also planned to be released, so look forward to them too!
name: Arshes Nei (あーしぇす・ねい)

subtitle: Eyes filled with strong determination and conviction…
description: From the anime 'Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse' comes a figma of the heroine from the series, Yui Takamura.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including her standard confident expression, a shouting expression for action scenes and an embarrassed expression.
Her Japanese sword is included in both its drawn state and a half-drawn state allowing you to display her drawing or sheathing her sword.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Yui Takamura (ふぃぐま たかむらゆい)
copyright: ©吉宗鋼紀・ixtl/テレビ東京/オルタネイティヴ第一計画

subtitle: The 2nd character to join the Nendoroid Petite and Mini 4WD collaboration project!
description: Tamiya's Mini 4WD model car series has just celebrated its 30th anniversary and is now working in collaboration with the Nendoroid Petite series to create a joint product that will be produced by Dengeki Hobby Magazine! The second character to join the series is Fate/stay night's Saber!

Using specially developed parts, the Nendoroid Petite figures can easily jump into the Mini 4WD models and drive around! Each car is specially designed to suit the image and colors of the character that the car is designed for, and the figure mount is actually a cleverly designed battery holder! A set of stickers is also included with the Mini 4WD to customize it your way!
name: Nendoroid Petite x Mini 4WD Saber drives Super Saber Special (ねんどろいどぷち×みによんく せいばー どらいぶす すーぱーせいばー すぺしゃる)
copyright:
© GAN / Crypton Future Media, Inc.
© TAMIYA
Mini 4WD is a registered trademark of TAMIYA, INC.

subtitle: The Puella Magi are all plopped down in the same cute pose!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of Sayaka Miki to join Penguin Parade's 'Petanko' figure series! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! Be sure to collect all five of the Puella Magi! ♪
name: Petanko Sayaka Miki (ぺたんこ みきさやか)

subtitle: The ultimate harmony of cuteness and valiance!
description: From the anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a Nendoroid of the ultimate form that Madoka Kaname took after fighting numerous battles over countless timelines - Ultimate Madoka! She comes with both a standard smiling expression as well as a determined expression to show everyone there is always hope!

Her bow and arrow are also included, along with the magical symbols that appeared at her feet whenever she fired an arrow, which allows you to recreate the famous pose with her bow drawn and ready to fire!
name: Nendoroid Ultimate Madoka (ねんどろいど あるてぃめっとまどか)

subtitle: "Should we try scrapping it?"
description: From the PC game 'DRAMAtical Murder' comes this 1/7th scale figure of the main character from the game, Aoba Seragaki!

Aoba is dynamically posed within the 'RHYME' cyber game together with his dog-type 'ALL MATE' named Ren, who is always by his side in the virtual world. The figure also features an impressive base that includes a number of motifs from other characters in the game! The unique posing and mischievous smile really bring out Aoba's personality perfectly, creating a figure that can be enjoyed by all fans from almost any angle!
name: Aoba (あおば)

subtitle: The Puella Magi are all plopped down in the same cute pose!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of Madoka Kaname to join Penguin Parade's 'Petanko' figure series! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! Be sure to collect all five of the Puella Magi! ♪
name: Petanko Madoka Kaname (ぺたんこ かなめまどか)

subtitle: The Puella Magi are all plopped down in the same cute pose!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of Homura Akemi to join Penguin Parade's 'Petanko' figure series! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! Be sure to collect all five of the Puella Magi! ♪
name: Petanko Homura Akemi (ぺたんこ あけみほむら)

subtitle: Laughing and singing in Nendoroid form!
description: From the anime series 'TARI TARI' comes a Nendoroid of Wakana Sakai, one of the members of the 'choir, but sometimes badminton club'. She comes with both a smiling expression and a singing expression as well as a number of other optional parts.

A complete Nendoroid-sized piano as well as sitting parts are included, which allow you to pose her playing the piano. The water fountain from the ending theme of the series is also included, so you can choose to pose her sitting there as well! Even her beloved cat Dora is included, together with a bowl of food to keep him happy!
name: Nendoroid Wakana Sakai (ねんどろいど さかいわかな)

subtitle: A time will come when we must let go of each other's hands...
description: From the anime series that aired in Fuji TV's noitamina block, 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of Dead Master based on the new design used in the TV anime series - wearing her clear veil while grinning with a sadistic smile.

Dead Master comes with optional parts that allow you to display her posed in her signature pose holding her giant weapon, 'Dead Scythe' or instead recreate your favorite battle scenes from the series! The giant throne from the series is also included in a special Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Dead Master: TV ANIMATION Ver. (ねんどろいど でっどますたー てれびあにめーしょん Ver.)

subtitle: "...I'm going to the place I belong now."
description: From 'Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a fully articulated Nendoroid of Fate Testarossa in Blaze Form! She comes with three different expressions including her standard expression, an expression with closed eyes and a shouting expression.

Bardiche, her intelligent device which plays a very important role in the series is included in Assault Zanber form. She also comes with a special stand featuring a magical circle to help you recreate even more of your favorite scenes from the movie!
name: Nendoroid Fate Testarossa: Blaze Form Edition (ねんどろいど ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ぶれいずふぉーむ・えでぃしょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The genius programmer and  king of internet slang... with great looks to boot!
description: From the popular anime 'Robotics;Notes' comes a Nendoroid of the beautiful, genius programmer - Frau Koujiro! She comes with three expressions including a composed expression, an expression with a cunning smile and an expression that makes her look half-sleep. She also comes with extra hair parts that allow you to display her with her hair untied, allowing you to pose her as if she just woke up!

A number of optional parts are also included, such as her Poke-com for important data collection, some treats to snack on, a doujinshi and even her beloved Gunvarrel plushie! Everything you need to display Frau in the pose you think suits her best ! Plus you'll even be able to change her outfit using an AR application!
*Regarding of AR App "Iruo. N" is now available in Japan only.
name: Nendoroid Frau Koujiro (ねんどろいど こうじろふらう)
copyright: © 2012-2013 MAGES./5pb./Nitroplus © チュウタネロボ部

subtitle: The valiant Princess of Galette!
description: From the anime DOG DAYS comes a Nendoroid of Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois, the leader and Princess of the Galette Lion Army's Territory! She comes with three expressions including a standard expression, an angry expression and a content expression.

The magic battleaxe, Granvale, as well as a sword and shield are all included for her to wield into battle - and she can also ride into battle on her trusty cercle mount, Daumas! Be sure to display her with the previously released Nendoroid Millhiore F. Biscotti!
name: Nendoroid Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois (ねんどろいど れおんみしぇり・がれっと・で・ろわ)

subtitle: Sonico-chan is back again in a more colorful Lolita ver.!
description: Super Sonico in back again, this time wearing a Lolita maid outfit but in the same naughty pose! The different colors of her new outfit give the figure a slightly different feeling to the previously released version.

The same gorgeous base shaped like a bed is included again along with the fabric ribbon to tie her hands to the bed to complete the pose - you're the cameraman for this idol, so you can choose exactly how the ribbon should be tied!
* The images above are of a coloring prototype. The actual figure may differ slightly. * The ribbon included is not pre-tied. You can tie it as in the image above, or in your own way.
name: Super Sonico Lolita Maid ver. + Bed Base Set (すーぱーそにこ ろりーた めいど ver. ＋ べっどふうだいざつき)

subtitle: The 'Angel of Confinement', descending from the heavens wearing sexy clothes!
description: From the popular manga and anime series 'Freezing' comes a 1/4th scale figure of the highest ranked second-year Pandora, Ganessa Roland! She is posed wearing a sexy opened up shirt and net nights made from real fabric just like the previous characters in the series - she makes use of the same white-colored net tights as the previously announced Rana figure!

Ganessa's trademark red twintails have been beautifully sculpted together with her lovely corset, which gives her a very elegant appearance. Even when it comes to sexy poses like this, the proud and confident Ganessa is ready to prove she deserves to be the ranked with the best!
name: Ganessa Roland: Sexy Ver. (がねっさ=ろーらんど せくしーVer.)
copyright: ©2011 林達永・金光鉉・アートリムメディア・キルタイムコミュニケーション／フリージング製作委員会

subtitle: The Puella Magi are all plopped down in the same cute pose!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of Mami Tomoe to join Penguin Parade's 'Petanko' figure series! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! Be sure to collect all five of the Puella Magi! ♪
name: Pentanko Mami Tomoe (ぺたんこ ともえまみ)

subtitle: The Puella Magi are all plopped down in the same cute pose!
description: From the popular anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a figure of Kyouko Sakura to join Penguin Parade's 'Petanko' figure series! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! Be sure to collect all five of the Puella Magi! ♪
name: Petanko Kyouko Sakura (ぺたんこ さくらきょうこ)

subtitle: New Japan Pro-Wrestling x Nendoroid Petite - The Limited Edition!
description: The Nendoroid Petite: New Japan Pro-Wrestling Ring Set will also be available in a special Shinnichi Premium Store Limited Ver.!

The limited edition set includes Hiroshi Tanahashi as well as the ultimate tag-team known by fans as 'Tenkoji' - Hiroyoshi Tenzan and Satoshi Kojima, all dressed-up in Good Smile Company themed outfits! The wrestling ring on the limited version features the Good Smile Company and Nendoroid logos, and a Good Smile Championship Belt is also included!
For more information about the Shinnichi Premium Store, please see the following website. (Japanese) Shinnichi Premium Store: http:njpw-p.jp
name: Nendoroid Petite: New Japan Pro-Wrestling Ring Set (Shinnichi Premium Store Limited Ver.) (ねんどろいどぷち しんにほんぷろれすりんぐ せっと しんにちぷれみあむすとあげんていVer.)

subtitle: Miku is bringing Spring with her, surrounded by cherry blossoms!
description: Nendoroid Miku is back again as 'Sakura Miku' , wearing an adorable pink outfit created with the image of cherry blossoms. The design is based on an illustration by Putidevil, which has been converted into Nendoroid form with careful attention to the meticulous use of color in the illustration!

She comes with her standard expression, a crying face as well as an innocent expression munching on a rice cake. She also comes with an alternate head part which allows you to change the accessories in her hair into cherries to suit the season even more! Enjoy your Spring with Sakura Miku by your side!
name: Nendoroid Sakura Miku (ねんどろいど さくらみく)

subtitle: The struggle of the Puella Magi is starting once again...
description: The previously released 1/8th scale figure of Sayaka Miki has been altered into a special version for the Puella Magi Madoka Magica Movie!

The pose is based on a key visual from the anime, and features her posed in her Puella Magi outfit with her cloak fluttering behind her. This version also includes the hair accessory that featured in the movie. She also comes with replaceable left and right hand parts that allow you to pose her holding swords in either hand, allowing you to choose the pose you prefer!
name: Sayaka Miki: Movie ver. (みきさやか げきじょうばんver.)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie

subtitle: New Japan Pro-Wrestling x Nendoroid Petite!
description: From 'New Japan Pro-Wrestling' brought to you by KING of SPORTS comes cute Nendoroid Petite figures of some of the most popular wrestlers!

The set includes Hiroshi Tanahashi as well as the ultimate tag-team known by fans as 'Tenkoji' - Hiroyoshi Tenzan and Satoshi Kojima! Each of them are posed in their signature poses, and Tenzan even comes with his trademark 'Mountain Horn' mask. A pro-wrestling ring is also included to truly recreate the atmosphere!
name: Nendoroid Petite: New Japan Pro-Wrestling Ring Set (ねんどろいどぷち しんにほんぷろれすりんぐ せっと)

subtitle: "Our fight has only just begun!"
description: From the anime series with a needlessly impressive staff line-up, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life', comes four clear files each with a completely different design! Each file features all the cute characters from the series enjoying themselves, with each of the four files representing one of the four seasons.

The files all have illustrations on both the back and front of the file, which each have a complete story to tell, allowing you to enjoy the world of wooser and friends while also keeping all of your important documents safe!
name: wooser Clear Files (spring/summer/autumn/winter) (うーさー くりあふぁいる すぷりんぐ/さまー/おーたむ/うぃんたー)

subtitle: The 'vessel' with long, black hair.
description: From Erect Sawaru's surreal manga series 'PANDRA -Shiroki Yokubou Kuro no Kibou-' comes a 1/6th scale figure of one of the heroines in the series, The Black Haired Shine Priestess, Rayleigh.

She is posed with both her arms lifted above her head while gazing ahead in a bold pose that shows off her impressive bust and curves! Enjoy the same wonderfully detailed and sexy body you've come to love in the manga, right by your side in figure form!
name: The Black Haired Shine Priestess, Rayleigh (くろきしょくはつのみこ・れいりぃ)
copyright: ©エレクトさわる/キルタイムコミュニケーション

subtitle: The leader of the group and everyone's favorite idol are both joining the Twin Pack series!
description: From the Persona 4 anime series comes a Twin Pack of both Yu Narukami, the main character of the series and Rise 'Risette' Kujikawa, everyone's favorite idol! The figures are based on poses from the game's battle scenes or stage transitions. Be sure to display them together with the previously announced Twin Pack: Yukiko Amagi & Chie Satonaka and others already released in the Twin Pack series!
name: Twin Pack: Yu Narukami & Rise Kujikawa (ついんぱっく なるかみ ゆう ＆ くじかわりせ)
copyright: © Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: The cruel assassin in pursuit of the Holy Grail. Back again after four years.
description: The previous 1/8th scale Kiritsugu Emiya/Zero figure was originally released in 2008 by Max Factory, but is now returning in a refined version for the anime series! The 'Magus Killer' Kiritsugu is posed glaring over his shoulder in a pose based on one of the key visuals from the original novels.

He holds his favorite weapon in his right hand - the Thompson Contender. The pistol can also be switched out to a cigarette with replaceable hand parts. Saber/Zero: Refined Ver. will be going on sale at the same time, and the two stands can be connected allowing you to easily display the master and servant together!
name: Kiritsugu Emiya/Zero: Refined Ver. (えみやきりつぐ/ぜろ りふぁいんVer.)

subtitle: The characters of Fate/Zero as graphig figures!
description: The characters of Fate/Zero are joining the chibi square series of figures, graphig! There are a total of seven characters to collect, including Saber, Irisviel von Einzbern, Archer, Kirei Kotomine, Waver, Rider and one secret character!
name: graphig++ Fate/Zero 1 (ぐらふぃぐ+ + ふぇいと/ぜろ Ⅰ)

subtitle: The servant dressed in black. Back again after four years.
description: The previous 1/8th scale Saber/Zero figure was originally released in 2008 by Max Factory, but is now returning in a refined version for the anime series!

The unique look of Saber from Fate/Zero with her stiff personality has been faithfully sculpted based on the original illustration from the novel. Replaceable parts are also included allowing you to pose her holding Excalibur at her side. Kiritsugu Emiya/Zero: Refined Ver. will be going on sale at the same time, and the two stands can be connected to complete the Fate/Zero combo!
name: Saber/Zero: Refined Ver. (せいばー/ぜろ りふぁいんVer.)

subtitle: The best of friends are releasing together as a Twin Pack!
description: From the anime series 'Persona 4' comes a Twin Pack of Yukiko Amagi, the successor to the Amagi Inn and the kung-fu loving Chie Satonaka. The figures are based on poses from the game's battle scenes or stage transitions.
A set featuring Yu Narukami and Rise Kujikawa is also on its way, and you can combine these new sets together with the previously released Twin Packs to recreate the world of Persona 4!
name: Twin Pack: Yukiko Amagi & Chie Satonaka (ついんぱっく あまぎゆきこ＆さとなかちえ)
copyright: ©Index Corporation/「ペルソナ４」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: Included with the first limited edition Berserk manga!
description: A collaboration between the popular figma action figure series and the latest volume of the Berserk manga brings a figma of Guts wearing his berserker armour!
features: The high quality action figure is based on the original character designs and fully supervised by Kentaro Miura himself.
The figure is sculpted by Max Factory's Masaki Asai, who has faithfully reproduced the armor's design while still keeping the figure posable.
There are two different head parts included, a 'Beast of Darkness' head part as well as a sane head part.
A luminous Schierke is also included to recreate Guts and Schierke's unison scene.
The figure is 160mm in height and features 14 different points of articulation for all sorts of different poses.
Two postcards illustrated by Kentaro Miura are also included.
name: figma Guts: Berserk Armour ver. (ふぃぐま がっつ きょうせんしのかっちゅうver.)
copyright: © 三浦建太郎（スタジオ我画）/ 白泉社

subtitle: The hero who forges his own path!
description: From the worldwide hit film 'The Avengers' comes a fully articulated Nendoroid of Iron Man - the hero that industrialist billionaire Tony Stark becomes whenever he puts on his powerful armored suit. The unique metallic look of the Iron Man suit has been faithfully recreated in Nendoroid form for fans to enjoy!

You can choose to display him with either a closed or open helmet, and a number of booster effect parts are also included to easily pose him in combat scenes. He also comes with a special dioramic pedestal to display him flying above the city!
name: Nendoroid Iron Man Mark 7: Hero's Edition (ねんどろいど あいあんまん まーく7 ひーろーず･えでぃしょん)

subtitle: The white swordsman, wandering the frozen lands.
description: From the popular Nintendo 3DS game, 'Monster Hunter Tri G' comes a Nendoroid of the female swordsman wearing the 'Bario X' series of armor made from the powerful ice-fanged Barioth! The unique design of the armor as well as the one-handed sword she wields have all been faithfully sculpted down to Nendoroid size! The bottom of the coat is separated into different parts, allowing for easy posing of the legs and amazing action poses!
Display her together with the previously announced 'Lagia X Edition' Nendoroid and recreate some of your favorite hunting scenes from the game.
name: Nendoroid Hunter: Female Swordsman - Bario X Edition (ねんどろいど はんたー♀けんし べりおX・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: A gentle pose of Rin wearing an elegant yukata.
description: From the popular 'Fate/stay night' series comes a 1/8th scale figure of Rin Tohsaka wearing a lovely red yukata! She is posed sitting relaxed on a bench with the wind gently blowing through her hair. The yukata is a deep red to match with Rin's image color, and features prints of camellia flowers and butterflies. A mosquito repellent 'pig' is also included to display alongside her, to really recreate the atmosphere of a summer festival!
The Fate/stay night Yukata series is still set to continue, with Sakura Matou on her way shortly! After Sakura there will also be another character that fans of the series can look forward to!
name: Rin Tohsaka: Yukata ver. (とうさかりん ゆかたver.)

subtitle: The kind-hearted cyborg girl, living each moment to the fullest.
description: From 'GUNSLINGER GIRL' comes a figma of the cyborg heroine of the show, Henrietta!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including a standard expression, a gentle smiling face and a serious face for missions.
Her favorite machine gun as well as a violin case to store it in are both included.
Special parts that allow you to pose her crouching down for action poses are included.
Various parts allowing you to recreate the more relaxed side of her life are also included, such as a chair, tea set, Alice band and alternate skirt.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Henrietta (ふぃぐま へんりえった)
copyright: ©相田裕／アスキー・メディアワークス，マーベラスAQL

subtitle: The Vocaloid who is rapidly gaining popularity - Lily!
description: Lily, the Vocaloid character who is becoming more and more popular by the day, is joining the Nendoroid series!

She comes with optional parts including a microphone and speaker, which allow you to recreate the pose on the 'VOCALOID2 Lily' packaging! She also comes with a singing expression to pose her singing out loud, as well as an expression from 'Harii' the fan-made bee character based off Lily!
name: Nendoroid Lily from anim.o.v.e (ねんどろいど りりぃ from anim.o.v.e)

subtitle: The popular 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' will remain forever popular on DVD!
description: The popular anime series with a needlessly impressive staff line-up, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life', is going to be released on DVD! The DVD set includes all 12 original episodes of the series as well some other video extras to enjoy, for a total running time of 48 minutes. Enjoy wooser's everyday antics whenever you like!

The set also comes with a special medium-sized wooser plushie, so that you can enjoy watching through the entire series and listening to Mamoru Miyano's wooser voice while cuddling your very own wooser!
name: wooser's hand-to-mouth life DVD & Plushie Set (うーさーのそのひぐらしDVD＆ぬいぐるみせっと)

subtitle: The impulsive member of the robotics club, who is always a beacon of cheerfulness!
description: From 'ROBOTICS;NOTES', the third game in 5pb's scientific adventure series, comes a Nendoroid of the robotics club chairman, Akiho Senomiya!

She comes with a variety of optional parts including the Poke-com that she uses throughout the series as well as the Tanegashi Machine 3! She even comes with a pair of showy glasses to recreate the scene where she quoted a certain other famous character! You can display her in many popular poses from the game as well as poses that really show off her cheerful attitude! Plus you'll even be able to change her outfit using an AR application!
*Regarding of AR App "Iruo. N" is now available in Japan only.
name: Nendoroid Akiho Senomiya (ねんどろいど せのみやあきほ)

subtitle: A night of indulgence begins!
description: From Fate/Extra comes a figma of Saber wearing a tight wedding dress!
name: figma Saber Bride (ふぃぐま せいばーぶらいど)

subtitle: Horizon is joining the Nendoroid series!!
description: The Nendoroid series follows the keywords 'Cute to look at, fun to play with and great to collect', and from the series Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere comes a figure of Horizon Ariadust to join that series!

You can pose her in a number of popular scenes including the popular singing scene from the beginning of the anime series, or the scene where she makes use of the Mortal Sin Armament: Lype Katathlipse. It's a Nendoroid that fans won't want to miss out on!
name: Nendoroid Horizon Ariadust: Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど ほらいぞん・ありあだすと せいふくVer.)
series: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere
copyright: ©川上稔／アスキー・メディアワークス／境界線上のホライゾン製作委員会 ©2013 TENKY／ASCII MEDIA WORKS Inc.

subtitle: The undefeatable ace of aerial combat!
description: From the popular anime series and film, 'Strike Witches' comes a Nendoroid of Erica Hartmann - the sixth Nendoroid from the series!

She comes complete with her MK42 machine gun to prove she is the queen of shooting things out of the sky, along with effect parts to recreate her special ''Sturm' technique. A Striker Unit is also included along with her animal ears and tail, allowing you to pose her soaring through the skies. The stand features the logo of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing and is fitted with joints allowing you to easily pose her in mid-air combat scenes!

She also comes with a lovely winking expression which can be used together with the included military cap to display her receiving a decoration for her services - one of many poses that fans are sure to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid Erica Hartmann (ねんどろいど えーりか・はるとまん)

subtitle: "Accepting suggestions and requests 24 hours a day, 365 days a year!"
description: From the anime series, 'Medaka Box' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Medaka Kurokami, posed holding a fan in her hand with a very imposing appearance. The two green armbands on her arms can be removed and attached whenever you feel like a change.
It's a figure that captures Medaka's appearance and personality for all fans of the series to enjoy whenever they like!
name: Medaka Kurokami (くろかみめだか)
copyright: ©2012 西尾維新・暁月あきら／集英社・箱庭学園生徒会

subtitle: "I will not allow all your prayers to end in despair!"
description: From the anime series, Puella Magi Madoka Magica comes a figma of Madoka in her final form, Ultimate Madoka!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with both a smiling expression to show her cuter side, as well as a serious expression to show her strong will.
Her large bow as well as two different arrows are included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Ultimate Madoka (ふぃぐま あるてぃめっとまどか)

subtitle: Wearing a sexy open shirt for her soulmate!
description: From the popular manga and anime series 'Freezing' comes a 1/4th scale figure of the transfer student from Tibet, Rana Linchen! She's wearing a sexy opened up shirt as well as net tights! Her breasts are wrapped up tightly in cotton, and she is wearing some traditional 'fundoshi' underwear on her lower body - a faithful rendition of the original manga!

As usual, FREEing have made the net tights from real fabric for a truly realistic effect, but this time around they are white! Enjoy a more mature side of the naïve Rana whenever you like with this figure by your side! Ganessa Roland is also currently in production and will be joining her soon!
name: Rana Linchen: Sexy Ver. (らな＝りんちぇん せくしーVer.)
copyright: Images represent a product still in development.©2011 林達永・金光鉉・アートリムメディア・キルタイムコミュニケーション／フリージング製作委員会

subtitle: A collection of the TYPE-MOON girls to commemorate their 10th anniversary!
description: A set of Nendoroid Petites featuring all your favourite heroines from all the TYPE-MOON games of the past ten years!

The set includes characters come from Fate/stay night, Tsukihime, MELTY BLOOD, Fate/Zero and even TYPE-MOON's latest game, Mahoutsukai no Yoru. There are a total of 12 characters to collect, including one secret character. It's the definite set of TYPE-MOON heroines, that no fan should be without!
name: Nendoroid Petite: TYPE-MOON COLLECTION (ねんどろいどぷち たいぷむーん これくしょん)

subtitle: More fun ways to display your Nendoroids!
description: These new clip stands bring Nendoroid fans a brand new way of displaying their favorite characters! The clip can be easily attached to the frame of your cabinet or the edge of your laptop, allowing you to display your Nendoroids in places you never even considered using before!

The arm attached to the clip is articulated, allowing you to move it in any direction so that you can place the Nendoroids exactly where you want them! Each stand comes with joints for both Nendoroids and Nendoroid Petites, so you can display any of your favorite characters from either series!

This product was developed by this year's new employees at Good Smile Company. They have also been running a blog testing the development up until this point, which can be found here: http:ameblo.jp/blog-shinsotsu2012/
Notice Regarding the Nendoroid More Series · Please note that the Nendoroid More series is only designed to work with Nendoroids (or Nendoroid Petites) that have a hole on their back.
The series is not compatible with Nendoroids that use other types of stands.
· Characters with long hair sometimes restrict the use of the Nendoroid More series.
For more information, please see the Nendoroid More: Clip Stand and Suction Stands Compatibility List below! http:partner.goodsmile.info/support/more/english_nenmore_clip-kyuban_taiou.pdf
name: Nendoroid More: Clip Stand (Orange) (ねんどろいどもあ くりっぷ おれんじ)

subtitle: figma Aigis in a whole new set of colors - the Famitsu original color variation!!
description: The Famitsu color variations were available as downloadable content for 'Persona 4 The ULTIMATE in MAYONAKA ARENA' via a special code found in the August 9th volume of weekly Famitsu magazine - the code gave each of the characters a Famitsu color variation. Aigis' color variation made her make use of Labrys' colors, and now that color variation is available in figma form!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a gentle smiling expression as well as a shouting expression for combat scenes.
The Gatling gun, bazooka and missile launcher that she uses in the game are all included and can all be attached to her back.
An alternate fringe part is included with a mask over her eyes to recreate the way she looks with the 'Glasses' DLC.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Aigis: The ULTIMATE ver. Famitsu Original Color (ふぃぐま あいぎす ざ あるてぃめっと ver. ふぁみつうおりじなるからー)
series: Persona 4 The ULTIMATE in MAYONAKA ARENA

subtitle: The best princess in the world is being rereleased!
description: The supercell feat. Hatsune Miku: World is Mine scale figure is being rereleased! From supercell's beautiful PV 'World is Mine', with music composed by ryo and graphical designs by redjuice, comes this regal figure of 'Princess' Miku. She has been sculpted in an identical pose to the original illustration, with her charming eyes gazing deeply ahead as she lies relaxed on a comfortable bed with a cute, yet selfish expression.

The stand for the figure is designed as a frame, allowing you to display her in a range of new ways! Besides simply displaying the figure by itself, you can now also use the frame to display her as a wall-mounted decoration, or a leaning ornament! A new style of figure made with interior design in mind!
name: supercell feat. Hatsune Miku: World is Mine (Brown Frame) (すーぱーせる ふぃーちゃりんぐ はつねみく わーるどいずまいん ぶらうんふれーむ)

subtitle: Start a 'LIVE Battle' in Nendoroid Petite Size!
description: From the popular social game ‘THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS’ comes a set of Nendoroid Petites featuring Anzu Futaba, Kaede Takagaki and Rika Jougasaki all wearing their S Rare+ outfits!

The set also includes a huge stage pedestal which can be put together in a number of different ways to recreate the LIVE Battles from the game! Not only can you change the positions of the stage objects, you can also place up to five different idols on stage!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS - Anzu, Kaede and Rika + Live Stage Set (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず あんず・かえで・りか ＆らいぶすてーじせっと)

subtitle: threeA's 'Square' is becoming a smart phone case!
description: The popular 'Square' model from threeA has been transformed into a smart phone case designed for the iPhone5! The case is much more than just a print, as it features the characteristic mouth of the Square as well as the amazing rusted paintwork seen on threeA figures!
The design is by Ashley Wood and the paintwork by threeA's skilled craftsmen, ensuring the same amazing quality you've come to expect from threeA products!
name: WWR JDF Square SMART PHONE CASE (WWR すくうぇあ すまーとふぉん けーす)

subtitle: The cute little charms of your favorite idols are being rereleased!
description: An anime series of Puchimasu is now showing every weekday, plus the manga of the popular IDOLM@STER spin-off is still being serialized in Dengeki Maou!

A rerelease of all four sets of of the Puchimasu Character Charm series is also on the way to make sure that fans can get hold of their favorite little idols! This first set includes three cute characters - Haruka-san, Makochii and Yayo. There are a total of thirteen idols to collect and keep by your side wherever you go!
name: Character Charm Collection: Puchimasu! (Haruka-san / Makochii / Yayo) (きゃらくたーちゃーむ これくしょん ぷちます! （はるかさん／まこちー／やよ）)

subtitle: The cute little charms of your favorite idols are being rereleased!
description: An anime series of Puchimasu is now showing every weekday, plus the manga of the popular IDOLM@STER spin-off is still being serialized in Dengeki Maou!

A rerelease of all four sets of of the Puchimasu Character Charm series is also on the way to make sure that fans can get hold of their favorite little idols! This second set includes three more cute characters - Io, Chicchan and Miura-san. There are a total of thirteen idols to collect and keep by your side wherever you go!
name: Character Charm Collection: Puchimasu! (Io / Chicchan / Miura-san) (きゃらくたーちゃーむ これくしょん ぷちます! （いお／ちっちゃん／みうらさん）)

A rerelease of all four sets of of the Puchimasu Character Charm series is also on the way to make sure that fans can get hold of their favorite little idols! This third set includes four cute characters - Koami, Komami, Chibiki and Takanya. There are a total of thirteen idols to collect and keep by your side wherever you go!
name: Character Charm Collection Puchimasu! (Koami / Komami / Chibiki / Takanya) (きゃらくたーちゃーむ これくしょん ぷちます! （こあみ/こまみ/ちびき/たかにゃ）)

subtitle: A posable plushie of Haku!
description: The fanmade character based on Hatsune Miku, 'Haku Yowane' is joining the posable Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series! There are a number of joints fitted inside the plushie allowing you to pose her in a couple of different ways, including a sitting pose! Be sure to display her with all the previously released Vocaloid plushies!
name: Nendoroid Plus Plushie Series 49: Haku Yowane (ねんどろいどぷらす ぬいぐるみしりーず49 よわね はく)

subtitle: Kuroyukihime's Accel Assault avatar!
description: Accel World is a popular novel series serialized in Dengeki Bunko, which was originally released in commemoration of Ascii Media Works' 20th anniversary. It has now also become a popular anime series, and with Bandai Namco Games releasing the game 'Accel World: Ginyoku no Kakusei', it has even joined the gaming scene. The game also included a special OVA featuring Kuroyukihime as this avatar!

This version of Kuroyukihime was designed by Sunrise, based on a congratulations illustration by the illustrator of the original novel, HIMA. The figma allows you to pose her in various action scenes from the OVA, and also includes the option to switch to human arms and legs!
Dengekiya Product Page http:dengekiya.com/p/4942330056097/?aid=topbnr_kuroyukihime
name: figma Kuroyukihime: Accel Assault ver. (ふぃぐま くろゆきひめ あくせる あさると ver.)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: The heartless angel surrounded by weapons!
description: From the 2D fighting game, 'Persona 4 The ULTIMATE in MAYONAKA ARENA' comes a figma of Aigis, who is now one of the leaders of the secret spec-ops group known as Shadow Worker!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a gentle smiling expression as well as a shouting expression for combat scenes.
The Gatling gun, bazooka and missile launcher that she uses in the game are all included and can all be attached to her back.
An alternate fringe part is included with a mask over her eyes to recreate the way she looks with the 'Glasses' DLC.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Aigis: The ULTIMATE ver. (ふぃぐま あいぎす じ あるてぃめっと ver.)
series: Persona 4 The ULTIMATE in MAYONAKA ARENA

subtitle: Kaito's childhood friend, Kanna!
description: From the anime series 'Waiting in the Summer' comes a Nendoroid of Kanna Tanigawa, the girl who finds herself caught up in a complicated love triangle. She is wearing her Komoro High School uniform just like Ichika Takatsuki before her!

Kanna comes with an alternate head part that allows you to display her wearing a cat-ear Alice band, and she also comes with a crying expression which means you can recreate the cute cat pose with teary eyes. You can also pose her with Remon Yamano's special 'Dynamite Drink', as well as in the crawling pose she took when she was drunk, which looks great with the included indulgent expression!
name: Nendoroid Kanna Tanigawa (ねんどろいど たにがわかんな)

subtitle: "I won't forget, no matter what."
description: From the anime series 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Akemi Homura, the time traveler who fought in endless parallel worlds. She comes with a number of replaceable parts which allow you to display her in all sorts of different poses.

You can choose to display her holding her bow with Madoka's red ribbon in her hair, just as she looked in episode 12, or instead you can display her with braids and glasses while holding a bomb or golf club, as she was in episode 10. Enjoy both the confident and the shy Homura, all with just one figure!
name: Homura Akemi: you are not alone. (あけみほむら ゆーあーのっとあろーん.)

subtitle: The calm, collected and determined new generation idol - figma Rin Shibuya's debut!
description: From the hugely popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a figma of Rin Shibuya in her school uniform.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a smiling expression as well as bashful smile with closed eyes.
Special parts to display her with one hand in her pocket are also included.
Her pet dog 'Hanako' is included, together with a leash to take him out for walks.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Rin Shibuya (ふぃぐま しぶや りん)

subtitle: The warrior of flame, who fights against the Belial Army!
description: The 12th figure to join the Tomokazu Seki series comes from the Ultraman Zero Movie - the pirate bodyguard of flame, Glenfire! The sculpting of the impressive flames burning atop his head together with the confident pose create a figure that fans are sure to love!
name: Tomokazu Seki: Glenfire (せきともかず・ぐれんふぁいやー)
series: Ultraman Zero: The Revenge of Belial

subtitle: Snow Miku is visiting again this Winter, this time in a white kimono!
description: Designs for the 2013 Snow Miku were submitted by fans to the piapro website and then a winner was chosen by viewers during a NicoNico Live Broadcast. The winning entry was an illustration of Snow Miku with a slightly more mature air, wearing a beautiful white kimono - which has now been transformed into a Nendoroid!

Her cotton veil can be removed, and she comes with two different hair styles to choose from when it is removed - you can display her with either her trademark twintails, or instead with her hair tied up. Sitting parts are also included for a more relaxed pose, and she also comes a number of items for a snowy day, including an umbrella, a toothpick and a snow bunny.
name: Nendoroid Snow Miku: Strawberry White Kimono Ver. (ねんどろいど ゆきみく いちごしろむくVer.)

subtitle: The cute idol known as the 'Lazy Fairy' - figma Anzu Futaba's debut!
description: From the hugely popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a figma of Anzu Futaba wearing casual clothes.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a yawning expression, a forced smile as well as a dead tired expression with closed eyes.
A number of extra parts are included, such as her favorite plushie bunny, a game console and some candy.
Tear-shaped stickers are included which can be used as tears on the yawning expression, or sweat on the tired expression.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Anzu Futaba (ふぃぐま ふたば あんず)

subtitle: A giant version of Kirari!
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a special version of one of Phat! Company's new Minicchu series, a much bigger 'Dekacchu' version of Kirari Moroboshi! She is approximately 4 times bigger (220mm) than the Minicchu version, so fans can enjoy even more cute power from the lovely Kirari!
name: Dekacchu Kirari Moroboshi (でかっちゅ☆もろぼしきらり)

subtitle: The cute little charms of your favorite idols are being rereleased!

A rerelease of all four sets of of the Puchimasu Character Charm series is also on the way to make sure that fans can get hold of their favorite little idols! This forth set includes four cute characters - Yukipo, Afuu and Chihyaa. There are a total of thirteen idols to collect and keep by your side wherever you go!
name: Character Charm Collection Puchimasu! (Yukipo / Afuu / Chihyaa) (きゃらくたーちゃーむ これくしょん ぷちます! （ゆきぽ/あふぅ/ちひゃー/）)

subtitle: Fate is back with lightning wings and a sharpened blade!
description: From the movie, 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figma of Nanoha's best friend, Fate Testarossa, wearing her new barrier jacket!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her upgraded intelligent device, 'Bardiche Assault' is included in its axe-shaped Bullova Form.
Even her cape is fitted with two figma joints allowing for amazing dynamic poses.
She comes with a smiling expression and a shouting expression.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: Lightning ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ らいとにんぐふぉーむver.)

A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her upgraded intelligent device, 'Raising Heart' is included in both Accel Mode and Buster Cannon Mode.
The wings of light that appear on the device in Buster Cannon Mode can be attached with replaceable parts.
She comes with a bright smiling expression as well as a shouting expression for combat scenes.

subtitle: The champion of the Underworld.
description: threeA is bringing more figures from the film 'Real Steel', the next in the line-up is the robot used in Underworld fighting matches, Midas!

The figure has a number of highlights, such as his shining golden body and red Mohawk styled hair. His body is also covered in scratches and dents from all his previous fights and all his joints are filled with cylinders and wires for a truly realistic appearance! His eyes are also loaded with fiber optic lights.
name: REAL STEEL: MIDAS (りある･すてぃーる みだす)

subtitle: A dream collaboration between Nendoroid Petite and Mini 4WD!
description: Tamiya's Mini 4WD model car series has just celebrated its 30th anniversary and is now working in collaboration with the Nendoroid Petite series to create a joint product that will be produced by Dengeki Hobby Magazine! The first in the series is the Hatsune Miku GT Project's mascot character, Racing Miku!

Using specially developed parts, the Nendoroid Petite figures can easily jump into the Mini 4WD models and drive around! Each car is specially designed to suit the image and colors of the character that the car is designed for, and the figure mount is actually a cleverly designed battery holder! A set of stickers is also included with the Mini 4WD to customize it your way!

The arm attached to the suction cup is articulated, allowing you to move it in any direction so that you can place the Nendoroids exactly where you want them!
