subtitle: Fate is wearing a bunny-girl outfit with a lovely smile on her face!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes this 1/4th scale figure of the Time-Space Administration Bureau's Enforcer, Fate T. Harlaown.

Fate is wearing a sexy bunny-girl outfit, and the net tights she wears on her legs are made from actual fabric for a very realistic appearance. Be sure to pose her together with the previously announced Nanoha Takamachi: Bunny Ver. and Hayate Yagami: Bunny Ver. to complete the lovely pose of all three girls together!
name: Fate T. Harlaown: Bunny Ver. (ふぇいと・T・はらおうん ばにーVer.)

subtitle: The ghost girl from the Netherworld Tower is back again!
description: Another member of the Nendoroid Touhou Project series is being rereleased! This time it is the ghostly owner of Hakugyokuro, Nendoroid Yuyuko Saigyouji!

She is wearing her light blue kimono with a gentle smile across her face, but also comes with two extra expressions, including a contemptuous expression for a darker look, as well as an innocent smile for a cuter appeal. She also comes with both an open and a closed folding fan, some spirits to float around her and even some ghostly butterflies to flutter around her.
You can display her with together with Nendoroid Youmu Konpaku to recreate the everyday life at Hakugyokuro!
name: Nendoroid Yuyuko Saigyouji (ねんどろいど さいぎょうじゆゆこ)

subtitle: The Eyes of Death awaken at last.
description: Shiki Ryougi, the main character of Kinoko Nasu's light novel is coming back again as a part of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary rerelease project!

The pose is based on the cover illustration of the second book, and accurately reproduces the wistful atmosphere of the original art. Special care has also been taken in sculpting her understated bearing and intricate kimono pattern, making her distinctly vibrant and life-like.
name: Shiki Ryougi Garannodou (りょうぎ しき がらんのどう)
copyright: © 奈須きのこ/講談社・アニプレックス・ノーツ・ufotable

subtitle: The heavily armed HAROLD is joining WWR with the JDF colorway.
description: threeA, the company that brings world-renowned artist Ashley Wood's works to life as models, is adding the WWR JDF HAROLD to the Summer Wonder Festival 2012 exclusive product line-up. As with previous WonFes World War Robot models, the HAROLD is painted with the JAPAN DEFENCE FORCE colors.

The model is an impressive 36cm long with two huge 38cm long cannons equipped on its sides. The cannons can also be replaced with the included standard arm parts, allowing you to choose which you would rather display. The large caterpillar treads that the HAROLD uses look great with the red and white weathered paintwork, and they come together with the rest of the model perfectly to give it an incredibly realistic and heavy appearance that WWR fans are sure to enjoy.
name: WWR JDF HAROLD (WWR JDF はろるど)

subtitle: The Border of Phantasm, Yukari Yakumo.
description: The 1/8th scale figure of Yukari Yakumo is going to be rereleased! Another chance to grab the oldest and one of the most powerful youkai in all of Gensoukyou!

The figure was originally a garage kit created for event sales by YOSHI, which was based on an illustration by the group 'QR flapper'. She is posed sitting on a rip in space, with a gaze that seems to judge anyone who dares to look at her. Ran Yakumo is also in production, and Chen has already been announced - so be sure to display them altogether once they have all been released!
name: Yukari Yakumo (やくも ゆかり)

subtitle: The leek swinging Hachune Miku is back again!
description: As a part of Good Smile Company's 10th anniversary rerelease project, the 2008 Summer WonFes product, 'Nendoroid Miku Hatsune: Hachune Face Ver. ' is going to be rereleased!

This version of the Miku Nendoroid comes with the fan favorite Hachune Miku face as her default expression, along with a variety of replaceable parts to place her in some fun poses! She also comes with the drooling Hachune face as well as a blank face with stickers so you can create your very own expression!
name: Nendoroid Miku Hatsune: Hachune Face Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく はちゅねふぇいすVer.)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of Culture Japan's mascot character!
description: Mirai Suenaga, the mascot character from the Culture Japan TV show and main character of the original story 'Mirai Millennium' is joining the Nendoroid series! Her standard expression is based on Nao Shirahane's illustration of Mirai, but she also comes two different smiling expressions based on illustrations from the Moekana cards illustrated by Ikkyuu.

A variety of extras are also included to display together with Mirai, including a Japanese flag, Nendoroid-sized Moekana card, Mirai-chan's sidekick Retrokyu and even a miniature itasha featuring Tasuku Iizuki's illustration of Mirai on the bonnet.
A miniature pack of the original 50 Moekana cards plus six brand new cards are also included, so you can continue to improve your hiragana as well!
name: Nendoroid Mirai Suenaga (ねんどろいど すえながみらい)

subtitle: figma Racing Miku 2011 ver. is back once again!
description: From 20:00 on the 20th September until 20:00 on the 9th October, GSR & Studie with TeamUKYO will be taking personal sponsor applications. Please see NicoNico Chokuhan more more information!
NicoNico Chokuhan (Japanese) http:chokuhan.nicovideo.jp/

The famous mascot character of the Hatsune Miku GT Project, 'Racing Miku', is back again as figma Racing Miku 2011! Her lovely transparent hair and unique racing queen outfit have both been faithfully preserved in figma form, and she can be posed in all sorts of wonderful poses. She also comes with a racing queen parasol, winner's trophy and series championship trophy.
name: figma Racing Miku 2011 ver. Returns (ふぃぐま れーしんぐみく2011 ver. りたーんず)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The stubborn, diligent ace of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing!
description: The 5th Nendoroid from the hit anime series 'Strike Witches' is the reliable ace of the squad, Gertrud Barkhorn!

She comes with her Striker Unit along with dog ears and a tail to display her in flying poses - plus she comes with two MG42 machine guns and a scowling expression ideal for combat scenes, allowing you to create scenes that show off the fighting capability of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing's ace! Various additional parts are included to recreate even more scenes from the series - you can also pose her standing at attention or even in an embarrassed pose!
name: Nendoroid Gertrud Barkhorn (ねんどろいど げるとるーと・ばるくほるん)

subtitle: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2011 Ver. is back once again!
description: From 20:00 on the 20th September until 20:00 on the 9th October, GSR & Studie with TeamUKYO will be taking personal sponsor applications. Please see NicoNico Chokuhan more more information!
NicoNico Chokuhan (Japanese) http:chokuhan.nicovideo.jp/

Your chance to grab the 2011 version of Racing Miku if you missed out before! The famous mascot character of the Hatsune Miku GT Project, 'Racing Miku', is back again as Nendoroid Racing Miku 2011 ver.! The Nendoroid faithfully recreates Racing Miku's transparent hair and her lovely racing queen outfit! Plus she also comes with a Nendoroid Car, a racing queen parasol and an all-new series championship trophy!
name: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2011 Ver. Returns (ねんどろいど れーしんぐみく 2011 Ver. りたーんず)
copyright: © Yuichi Murakami / Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The online sensation is joining the Nendoroids!!
description: The image character for the Virtual Vocalist Megpoid, GUMI, is finally joining the Nendoroid world! She can be posed in a number of well-known poses, including the pose from the illustration of the packaging and her signature winking pose!

You can even pose her with her goggles down over her eyes for a more stylish pose, or instead choose the cuter option and have her riding on a giant carrot with an adorable chibi expression! GUMI is known to sing a large variety of songs, and this Nendoroid comes with just as many poses for fans to enjoy!
name: Nendoroid GUMI (ねんどろいど ぐみ)

subtitle: "If you'd like I can take my true form... but you'll lose some sanity points?"
description: From the anime 'Haiyore! Nyaruko-san' comes a figma of Nyaruko herself!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including her popular shouting face, an adorable winking face and a grinning face for all of her cunning plotting.
Two of the Space C.Q.Cs that she uses in combat are also included - the 'hard-to-describe crowbar-like thingy' and the 'unholy hand grenade'.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Nyaruko (ふぃぐま にゃるこ)
copyright: ©逢空万太・ソフトバンク クリエイティブ／名状しがたい製作委員会のようなもの

subtitle: "Honey! It's a PSP case with Miki!"
description: From the PSP game 'THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA' comes a set of three PSP cases each featuring illustrations based on the different versions of the game!

This case features Miki Hoshii, Takane Shijou, Makoto Kikuchi and Yukiho Hagiwara - the four idols from the 'Groovy Tune' version of the game, all enjoying themselves on a vacation island! Take your work as a producer one step further by decorating your PSP with your favorite idols, and carry them along with you wherever you take your PSP!
name: THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA PSP® Case (Groovy Tune) (あいどるますたーしゃいにーふぇすたＰＳＰ®けーす（ぐるーびーちゅーん）)

subtitle: "Ooh! A PSP case! Yay!"
description: From the PSP game 'THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA' comes a set of three PSP cases each featuring illustrations based on the different versions of the game!

This case features Yayoi Takatsuki, Iori Minase, Hibiki Ganaha, Ami Futami and Mami Futami - the five idols from the 'Funky Note' version of the game, all enjoying themselves on a vacation island! Take your work as a producer one step further by decorating your PSP with your favorite idols, and carry them along with you wherever you take your PSP!
name: THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA PSP® Case (Funky Note) (あいどるますたーしゃいにーふぇすたＰＳＰ®けーす（ふぁんきーのーと）)

subtitle: The goddess of the racing circuit, ready to guide the team to the top of the podium!
description: This product is a part of the personal sponsor course that will be available at NicoNico Chokuhan from the 29th July 2012 (Sun) at 10:00JST until the 11th September 2012 (Tues) at 20:00JST.
GSR&Studie with TeamUKYO Personal Sponsorship Program (English) http:gsr-global.ecq.sc/

Racing Miku is joining the figma world in her 2012 design! The GT project's specially designed Miku Hatsune mascot, 'Racing Miku' is joining the figma series once again in her new 2012 ver. design! The racing queen is wearing her unique costume and can be placed in all sorts of different poses for you to enjoy! Her racing queen parasol and a champagne bottle are also included for even more posing options!
name: figma Racing Miku 2012 ver. (ふぃぐま れーしんぐみく 2012 ver.)
copyright: © GAN / Crypton Future Media, Inc. www.crypton.net

subtitle: "Oh? You're not going to run? I guess you've not a complete coward!"
description: From the anime series, 'Accel World' comes a figma of one of the Seven Kings, Scarlet Rain!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The correct proportions of Scarlet Rain are kept without compromising posability.
Her gun from the series is included as an optional extra.
Extra parts that connect to her arms and into her back are included to pose her in the cockpit of the Immobile Fortress!
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Scarlet Rain (ふぃぐま すかーれっと・れいん)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: "Do you want to accelerate even more?"
description: From the anime series 'Accel World' comes a figma of the beautiful Kuroyukihime in her school avatar form.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: A standard smiling expression, a composed expression with closed eyes and a blushing embarrassed expression.
The umbrella she usually carries around with her is included in both a closed and open form.
Her beautiful black and red butterfly wings are made to look just like the original.
Haruyuki's pink pig avatar is also included.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kuroyukihime : School Avatar ver. (ふぃぐま くろゆきひめ がくないあばたーver.)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／AW Project

subtitle: "Producer-san! It's a PSP case! A PSP case!!"
description: From the PSP game 'THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA' comes a set of three PSP cases each featuring illustrations based on the different versions of the game!

This case features Haruka Amami, Chihaya Kisaragi, Azusa Miura and Ritsuko Akizuki - the four idols from the 'Honey Sound' version of the game, all enjoying themselves on a vacation island! Take your work as a producer one step further by decorating your PSP with your favorite idols, and carry them along with you wherever you take your PSP!
name: THE IDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA PSP® Case (Honey Sound) (あいどるますたーしゃいにーふぇすたＰＳＰ®けーす（はにーさうんど）)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the newest witch!
description: From famous game developer TYPE-MOON's latest work, 'Mahou Tsukai no Yoru' comes a Nendoroid of the game's main character and heroine, Aoko Aozaki!

She comes with three expressions including a shouting face to display her giving orders as the head of the student council, an adorable smiling face and an embarrassed chibi face! She also comes with a special pedestal, magic effect parts and a special arm to display her using her magic, allowing her to live up to her 'Magical Cannon' nickname. Enjoy the company of the apprentice witch whenever you like, in the pose of your choice!
name: Nendoroid Aoko Aozaki (ねんどろいど あおざきあおこ)

subtitle: "...Bardiche and I can stop them!!"
description: From the movie, 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figma of Fate Testarossa in her Sonic Form!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her upgraded intelligent device, 'Bardiche Assault' is included in its scythe-shaped Crescent Form.
Her wings of light are made from clear plastic, and can be attached to her arms and feet for flying poses.
She comes with a glaring expression and a shouting expression.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: Sonic Form ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ そにっくふぉーむver.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 2nd A's
copyright: Photos represent a product still in development.©NANOHA The MOVIE 2nd A's PROJECT

subtitle: Sonico-chan has a golden brown tan from her summer photoshoots!
description: Super Sonico is now known as a gravure idol, game character and musician - and this figure is here to give you a sneak peek into one of her gravure idol photo sessions. She's wearing a very bold outfit that gives you a closer look at her wonderful figure and also shows off her beautiful tan! Plus she has a cute smile across her face to let you know she is enjoying the company!

Sonico-chan also comes with replaceable parts that allow you to give her an embarrassed expression and a separate bust part with her polo shirt rolled up, allowing you to show off even more of her lovely body - just pick the way you want to display her, and enjoy her company to your heart's content!
name: SUPER SONICO TOKONATSU Suntanned Ver． (すーぱー そにこ とこなつひやけver.)

subtitle: Illya is joining Saber wearing a lovely yukata!
description: From the popular 'Fate/stay night' series comes a 1/8th scale figure of the innocent looking, yet powerful master, Illya! She is wearing a lovely purple yukata with bellflower prints and is standing in a very innocent pose that suits her personality perfectly! She also comes with a Berserker festival mask that can be attached and removed, so you can choose to display her with or without it.
Rin Tohsaka and Sakura Matou are still in production, but they will also be joining the Fate/stay night yukata series shortly!
name: Illya: Yukata ver. (いりや ゆかたver.)

subtitle: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2010 Ver. is back once again!
description: From 20:00 on the 20th September until 20:00 on the 9th October, GSR & Studie with TeamUKYO will be taking personal sponsor applications. Please see NicoNico Chokuhan more more information!
NicoNico Chokuhan (Japanese) http:chokuhan.nicovideo.jp/
The special racing version of Hatsune Miku, 'Racing Miku' is coming back again in her 2010 version. Decals for a Nendoroid car with the colors used in the 2010 racing season are also included.
name: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2010 Ver. Returns (ねんどろいど れーしんぐみく2010 Ver. りたーんず)

subtitle: Hayate in a sexy bunny girl outfit, all limiters removed!
description: From 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes a figure of the Commander of Riot Force 6, Hayate Yagami, looking as sexy as ever in a bunny girl outfit! She is the same magnificent 1/4th scale size as the previously announced 1/4th scale Nanoha Takamachi, and also features net tights made from real fabric!
She also comes with replaceable arm parts that allows you to complete the joint pose of Nanoha, Hayate and Fate all standing together!
name: Hayate Yagami: Bunny Ver. (やがみはやて ばにーVer.)

subtitle: "Never give up living."
description: From the anime series 'Senki Zesshou Symphogear' comes a Nendoroid of Tsubasa Kazanari, the character who uses 'Ame no Habakiri', the first Symphogear System! She comes with three different expressions including a smiling expression, an angry expression and a Swansong expression.

Tsubasa also comes with with four different Armed Gears to wield, including her standard sword, large sword, giant sword and leg blades. A Nendoroid-sized Noise figure is also included allowing you to recreate many popular combat scenes from the show!
name: Nendoroid Tsubasa Kazanari (ねんどろいど かざなりつばさ)

subtitle: The Seven-Colored Puppeteer.
description: From Team Shanghai Alice's popular Touhou Project game series, comes a Nendoroid of the magician who lives in the Forest of Magic, Alice Margatroid!

She comes with a variety of optional parts including a smiling expression, her grimoire as well as three of her puppets, one of which is also a headphone jack. The puppets allow you to pose Alice showing off her ability to control them in battle - just one of the many interesting situations you can recreate in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Alice Margatroid (ねんどろいど ありす・まーがとろいど)

subtitle: A wooser lunch box!
description: A cute? lunch box featuring wooser! It might be designed to put fruits and veggies in, but that's all the more reason to put beef in instead! These COSPA ASIA exclusive colors are limited in number, so don't miss out!
This product will be sold at COSPA ASIA Makuhari New City. Please see the official site below for more details.
■COSPA ASIA: http:cospaasia.com/en/
name: wooser's 'I LOVE BEEF' Lunch Box (Blue / Green / Yellow)

subtitle: The receptionist of Mezeporta Square, ready to welcome Hunters into G-rank.
description: From 'Monster Hunter Frontier G' comes a Nendoroid of the 'G-rank Receptionist', the character who provides various quests!

Her beautiful, dignified outfit has been carefully shrunk into cute Nendoroid size! She comes with both a bright smiling expression as well as a completely original glaring expression. Optional parts include the umbrella she always loves from the game, as well as the classic Monster Hunter pet, a Poogie! You can display her in all sorts of familiar poses from the game, including the pose she takes when you accept a quest at Mezeporta Square! Included with the Monster Hunter Frontier G 2014 Anniversary Premium Goods Official Page: http:members.mhf-g.jp/topic/anniversary2014goods/
name: Nendoroid G-rank Receptionist (ねんどろいど じーきゅううけつけじょう)

subtitle: The Hollow World form of the insistent childhood friend.
description: From the anime series 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a figma of Kagari Izuriha's existence in the alternate world - Chariot!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, a downward glancing face as well as a shouting face for combat scenes.
Chariot's sword is included, and she also comes with the huge shield shaped like a tank wheel.
The few of the colorful macarons from the series are also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Chariot: TV ANIMATION ver. (ふぃぐま ちゃりおっと てれび あにめーしょん ver.)

subtitle: Super Sonico-chan is here wearing her tiger hoodie!
description: Super Sonico is here once again, wearing her classic tiger hoodie! The 1/8th scale figure is sculpted in a lovely dynamic pose, skipping along with her guitar case on her back! Her adorable smile is ready to capture your heart and never let go again!
*Product images are photographs of a PVC sample, not a painted prototype.
name: Super Sonico: Tiger Hoodie Ver. (すーぱーそにこ とらぱーかーVer.)

subtitle: A Sandmaster with a Hatsune Miku: Racing Ver. (Racing Miku) driver!
description: * Note the included figure is a non-articulated upper body part only. The lower body is not included.
features: Good Smile Racing's Hatsune Miku GT Project in a whole new collaboration project!
An exclusive Nendoroid Plus: Racing Miku 2014 Ver. by Good Smile Company is included to ride inside the Sandmaster!
The frame and canopy have been specially adjusted to allow the figure to fit inside. The roof part can be removed for a roll bar instead.
Special decals are included for the wireless remote control.
The friction damper is pink and the springs are green to match with Racing Miku's color scheme.
The product is a special ready-for-use set that requires no assembly. (batteries and charger included)
As a part of the EZ (Easy) Series, you can perform maintenance with just a single screwdriver.
name: Sandmaster Racing Miku: 2014 Version (さんどますたー れーしんぐみく 2014ばーじょん)
copyright: © おぐち/ Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net costume designed by コヤマシゲト

subtitle: From 'Team Fortress 2' comes robot versions of the Pyro!
description: From the popular team-based FPS multiplayer game 'Team Fortress 2' comes a figure of the Robot Pyro that was a part of the August 2012 update which introduced the 'Mann vs Machine' mode to the game.

The figure is available in both Red and Blue color schemes and boasts over 30 points of articulation, illuminated blue LED eyes and even includes the Pyro's signature flame-thrower weapon. A pack of three grenades is included which magnetically attach to the body, and two single grenades are also included. Get ready to burn down your opponents with this robotic pyromaniac!
name: Team Fortress 2: Robot Pyro Blue (ちーむふぉーとれす２ ろぼっとぱいろ ぶるー)

subtitle: "Panzer, vor."
description: From the popular anime series 'GIRLS und PANZER' comes a Nendoroid More size of their tank, the Panzer IV Ausf. D! The tank has been carefully shrunk down to Nendoroid size, keeping the finer details in tact while adding a cute size to the design!

The Nendoroid Petite figures of Miho Nishizumi, Yukari Akiyama, Saori Takebe, Hana Isuzu and Mako Reizei which are going on sale soon will be able to take their places on the tank! Additionally, you can combine the tank with the turret included with Nendoroid Miho Nishizumi in order to have a full-size Nendoroid ride the tank instead! The tank also features a pull-back motor, allowing you to have it ride into combat - ready for action!
name: Nendoroid More: Panzer IV Ausf. D (ねんどろいどもあ よんごうせんしゃでぃーがた)

subtitle: Nendoroid Menma is back again to fulfil your wish!
description: From the anime series 'Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day' comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Meiko Honma, better known as Menma - the lively, friendly member of the 'Super Peace Busters'. She comes with a variety of optional parts, including Menma's diary filled with her memories and thoughts of all her friends, as well as some of her steamed bread, which helped everyone believe she was actually with them.

She also comes with parts to recreate the scene from the ending theme - including flower parts and stands to place them on, as well as an expression with closed eyes and arm parts to let her put her arms behind her back. She comes with everything you need to recreate your favorite heart-warming scenes from the series!
She comes with everything you need to recreate your favorite heart-warming scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Menma (ねんどろいど めんま)
series: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day

subtitle: From 'Team Fortress 2' comes robot versions of the Pyro!
description: From the popular team-based FPS multiplayer game 'Team Fortress 2' comes a figure of the Robot Pyro that was a part of the August 2012 update which introduced the 'Mann vs Machine' mode to the game.

The figure is available in both Red and Blue color schemes and boasts over 30 points of articulation, illuminated red LED eyes and even includes the Pyro's signature flame-thrower weapon. A pack of three grenades is included which can magnetically attach to the body, and two single grenades are also included. Get ready to burn down your opponents with this robotic pyromaniac!
name: Team Fortress 2: Robot Pyro Red (ちーむふぉーとれす２ ろぼっとぱいろ れっど)

subtitle: Equip your figma figures with the LittleArmory series!
description: TOMYTEC's 'LittleArmory' series is a set of weapons that can be used by 1/12th scale figures. This set of figma hands allows figma figures to hold the weapons from the LittleArmory set! The hands are modelled off tactical gloves with knuckle guards, which combined with the realistic guns in the LittleArmory series will leave your figmas ready for anything!

The set is available in two common military colors - Coyote Tan and Foliage Green. Each set includes four different hands for a total of eight pieces that allow the guns to be held, readied and carefully aimed! Use them together with the LittleArmory set for all sorts of new posing options!

* Parts are sold as a connected plastic kit. Parts require no assembly but do require tools to be cut apart. * This is a set of hand parts that allow figma figures to hold items from TOMYTEC's LittleArmory set. * The LittleArmory weapons and figma figures are not included. This kit includes the hand parts only. * Parts are made to work best with the latest figma figures (No.200 and over). Please note that older figures may not be compatible.
name: LittleArmory-OP2: figma Tactical Gloves (Foiliage Green) (りとるあーもにー -OP02：ふぃぐませんようたくてぃかるぐろーぶ「ふぉりっじぐりーん」)

subtitle: The beautiful girl with long black hair and dark skin.
description: From the original anime series 'Captain Earth' comes a Nendoroid of the heroine, Hana Mutou! She comes with three expressions including her a gentle standard face, an innocent smiling face and a singing face.

Optional parts include a baked potato, special parts to pose her sitting as well as the cute little squirrel-like creature 'Pitz' who always accompanies her! Recreate your favorite scenes from the series in Nendoroid size.
name: Nendoroid Hana Mutou (ねんどろいど むとうはな)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of Defense Four's troublemaker and top marksman.
description: From the railroad action series that deals with incidents from searching for lost children to bomb disposal, 'RAIL WARS!' comes a Nendoroid of the Tokyo Railway Public Safety Office's 4th Defense Division's Aoi Sakurai! Optional parts include her pistol, a target filled with bullet holes and an aiming expression to display her practising her marksman skills at the target range.

She also comes with a special lower body part to pose her crouching down while shooting! An embarrassed expression and police baton are also included! Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Haruka Koumi who will be released at the same time - Haruka comes with a pet carrier allowing you to pose Aoi disarming the pet carrier bomb with cold spray!
name: Nendoroid Aoi Sakurai (ねんどろいど さくらいあおい)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the calm and clear-headed Haruka!
description: From the railroad action series that deals with incidents from searching for lost children to bomb disposal, 'RAIL WARS!' comes a Nendoroid of the Tokyo Railway Public Safety Office's 4th Defense Division's Haruka Koumi! Optional parts include her pistol, a target without a single bullet in it and a troubled expression to display just how terrible she is at shooting.

The dog 'Keiyon' as well as a pet carrier and smiling face are also all included. Special arm parts are also included to allow for more posing options around her impressively sized bosom! Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Aoi Sakurai who will be going on sale at the same time - Aoi comes with a cold spray allowing you to pose her disarming the pet carrier bomb with cold spray!

Her extravagant outfit is rather impressive in size even as a Nendoroid, and all the smaller details have been taken into careful consideration.

Her outer jacket can even be removed allowing you to enjoy her Miko Priestess outfit on the inside! She also comes with three expressions including her standard face, a confident smiling face and a face with closed eyes. Optional parts include two different sacred treasures. She even comes with 'medusa' parts and some alternate arm parts lifting her skirt, allowing you recreate the medusa stare pose! Will you be able to steal away Hana-chan's first kiss? Or rather... will you be able to face up to her revenge?

subtitle: "Jarvis…sometimes you gotta run before you can walk."

The Egg Attack: Iron Man Mark II features silver paintwork to bring out the heavy, metallic appearance of the steel body. Just like other figures in the Egg Attack series, he is also fitted with LED lights in his eyes, reactor, legs and base. The base is also newly designed, allowing you to pose him in a flying pose with ease. The sculpt is also filled with intricate details and textures, which fans are sure to appreciate!

The figure is based on an illustration by Namaniku ATK, with features a mischievous smile as her long blond hair flows around her. Certain parts can also be removed allowing you to give her a slightly different look - simply pick the way you want to see her!

The chest area can be opened and closed and careful thought has gone into all points of articulation to allow for action poses similar to those from the series.
A number of different hand parts as well as his High Frequency Vibration Sword, Unit G are all included.
An alternate chest part is included to pose him using the Pressure Cannon.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.

Shimakaze's beautiful slender body has been sculpted down to the finest of details, and the three Rensouhou-chan artillery cannons by her side have been faithfully included, each with their very own playful expression!

The figures come in five different varieties - SD01 Aki (Grey Suit), SD02 Maxim (Black Suit), SD03 Dante (Red Suit), SD04 Sam (Blue Suit), SD05 Julian (No Suit). Each of them is 6 inches in height and fully articulated. They even feature the symbolic meallic plate on the torso, which was a key element to the original Microman toys. The mask and torso parts can be attached and removed.

A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.

His favorite sword, 'Elucidator' as well as the sword made by Lisbeth, 'Dark Repulser' are both included, each with effect parts.
Both swords can also be stored away on his back for non-combat scenes.

subtitle: Akiho dressed up as a maid with cat ears!
description: From the scientific adventure series 'Robotics;Notes' comes a figure of the Robotics Club's president 'Akiho Senomiya' dressed up in 'Nekomimi Mode' with cat ears and a maid outfit!

Her trademark red framed glasses are also included, but can be attached and removed whenever you like allowing you to choose the appearance you prefer! A rather different outfit compared to her school uniform, but one that fans of Akiho are sure to enjoy!
name: Akiho Senomiya: Nekomimi Mode Ver. (せのみや あきほ ねこみみもーどVer.)

subtitle: The classic Marvel hero redesigned by Ashley Wood!
description: Ashley Wood and Marvel have joined forces in a dream collaboration bringing fans the heroes of Marvel in threeA style! The first in the series is Iron Man who will be available in this red and silver 'Silver Centurion' design! The design is based on the original comic form of Iron Man, keeping all his most important features while adding Ashley Wood's unique touch to the design, creating a unique Iron Man that both fans of threeA and Marvel are sure to love!

The action figure is a fairly large 1/6th scale articulated figure. The joints in the arms and legs are covered with a soft PVC plastic making them look seamless, providing a truly realistic appearance. The knees make use of clutch joints ensuring that poses always stick in place reliably. His eyes, arc reactor and palm repulsors are all fitted with lighting effects.
name: Iron Man Silver Centurion (あいあんまん しるばーせんちゅりおん)

subtitle: A superior version of the Roundfacer, upgraded by Korchima's Engineers with all new parts.
description: From the anime series 'Fang of the Sun Dougram' comes the 24th Battalion's Soltic H8-RF 'Korchima Special' combat armor!
features: Four model kits which make use of snap-fit connections. Glue is not required for assembly.
Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
The cockpit canopy comes as a prepainted frame canopy, popular with the Dougram release.
The kit includes the Korchima Specials weapons - the Hand Linear Gun and Turbozack.
The various markings on the Korchima Special are included as water-application decals.
The box art features illustrations by Hidetaka Tenjin.
name: COMBAT ARMORS MAX 04:1/72nd Scale Soltic H8-RF Korchima Special (こんばっと あーまーず まっくす04 1/72 すけーる そるてぃっく H8RF こーちまSpl)

subtitle: The four of the 24th Battalion's "Korchima Special" with pilot figures included!

Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
The cockpit canopy comes as a prepainted frame canopy, popular with the Dougram release.
The kit includes the Korchima Specials weapons - the Hand Linear Gun and Turbozack.
As a bonus only included with the four model set, a figure set of the 24th Battalion pilots is included.
The various markings on the Korchima Special are included as water-application decals.

name: I-58: Half-Damage ver. (い58 ちゅうはVer.)

subtitle: "Domo. I am figma Ninja Slayer. Fully articulated. Expect no mercy."
description: From the mysterious cyberpunk ninja novel with an anime series on the way, 'Ninja Slayer' comes a figma of Ninja Slayer himself!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with a number of hand parts allowing poses such as his 'aisatsu' and 'karate' poses! An alternate scarf part for more dynamic action poses is also included!
Three expressions are included: His standard face, a half-Naraku face with effect parts and a Naraku Ninja face.
Optional parts include his shuriken, shuriken throwing effect parts, a grappling hook, two types of sushi, dark red flame effect parts and an enemy ninja head part.
A selection of speech bubbles are also included on a plastic sheet to display with him.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Ninja Slayer (ふぃぐま にんじゃすれいやー)

subtitle: "Even Tsukiko is head over heels for my figure!"
description: From the anime series 'Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the "Steel King" Tsukushi Tsutsukakushi, based on the cover illustration of the light novel's 4th volume.

All of Tsukushi's unique traits have been faithfully preserved in figure form - from her unique blend of long hair and a ponytail, to her impressive body which can easily be made out even over her jersey. The shoes she is holding in her left hand can be switched out for the photos she showed at the 'Tsukiko Memorial', allowing you to show how much she loves her sister too!
name: Tsukushi Tsutsukakushi (つつかくしつくし)
copyright: ©2013 さがら総・株式会社KADOKAWA メディアファクトリー刊／「変猫。」製作委員会

subtitle: MLB / HELLO KITTY is joining the Nendoroid Family!
description: The popular 'HELLO KITTY' brand loved all around the world is joining the Nendoroid Family! The set contains ten different figures each wearing the uniform of MLB baseball teams and placed in dynamic poses you're likely to see at a baseball match!
Each also comes with a special Nendoroid base which can be placed together to create a baseball field for them to play on - all the more reason to collect them all!

subtitle: An A3 tapestry featuring the Yama no Susume girls!
description: The tapestry features the popular illustration by Shiro seen in the ending theme of the anime season's second season!
name: Yama no Susume A3 Tapestry
copyright: ©しろ/アース・スター エンターテインメント/『ヤマノススメ』製作委員会

subtitle: The official mascot character of the 2014 Hatsune Miku GT Project!
description: The design for Racing Miku 2014, the official character of the 2014 Hatsune Miku GT project, has been decided! This year once again her design will be made into a fashionable set of cycling gear for fans to enjoy!

■ Racing Miku 2014 Lightweight Windbreaker ■ Racing Miku 2014 Cycling Jersey: EDGE Ver. ■ Racing Miku 2014 Cycling Bibshorts ■ Racing Miku 2014 Cycling Pants ■ Racing Miku 2014 x TeamUKYO Cycling Bottle
name: GSR Gear: Racing Miku 2014 Cycle Series (GSR ぎあ 「れーしんぐみく 2014」さいくるしりーず)
copyright:
© おぐち / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net
costume designed by コヤマシゲト

subtitle: "May all of our dreams come true!"
description: From the popular anime series 'LoveLive!' comes a 1/8th scale of the idol group μ's leader, Honoka Kosaka! She is posed wearing her outfit from the anime's first opening theme! The figure captures Honoka in mid-performance, showing off her optimistic side with a lovable smile - one of the many reasons she makes such a great idol!

Her outfit has been detailed down to the most intricate of frills, and both the outfit and her hair are sculpted dynamically to show her moving about during her live performance! A figure filled with charm for all LoveLive fans to enjoy!
name: Honoka Kosaka (こうさかほのか)
copyright: ©2013 プロジェクトラブライブ！

subtitle: "I aim to be the top idol - bright and cheerfully!! Ehehe!"
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Mio Honda in her 'New Generation' outfit! The bright and cheerful Mio has been sculpted as faithfully as possible wearing her sexy orange stage outfit, with all of her star-shaped accessories sculpted down to the finest of details!
Be sure to display her with the previously announced 'Rin Shibuya: New Generation Ver.' and 'Uzuki Shimamura: New Generation Ver.' to complete 'New Generation' stage in your collection!
name: Mio Honda: New Generation Ver. (ほんだみお にゅーじぇねれーしょんVer.)

subtitle: The UK's electronic artist "Feed Me" launches a figure.
description: Who is 'Feed Me'? Feed Me is an electronic artist and founder of Sotto Voce. He has attracted listeners worldwide with his unique blend of heavy bass, electronic sound and melodic phrases. His first performance in Japan was at the FUJI ROCK FESTIVAL 2013, where he left an unforgettable impact on the audience.
Now the 'Feed Me' monster that fans across the world will recognize is being transformed into a figure by Good Smile Company!
name: Feed Me (ふぃーど みー)

subtitle: A Nendoroid of the iron-blooded, hot-blooded, cold-blooded vampire.
description: Following on from the previously released 'Bakemonogatari Premium Item BOX' comes the 'Nisemonogatari Premium Item BOX' which will include the much-awaited Nendoroid Shinobu Oshino!

She has been sculpted wearing her white one-piece dress as well as her large straw hat, which can also be removed. She comes with three different expressions including her standard face, a content expression for enjoying her donuts as well as a darker, grinning expression. She also comes with various different donuts to munch on! The demon sword 'Kokorowatari' is also included, faithfully matching the impressive length from the series!
name: Nendoroid Shinobu Oshino (ねんどろいど おしのしのぶ)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The long-awaited figure version of Rockin'Jelly Bean's original illustration!
description: The popular original illustration by 'Rockin'Jelly Bean' has been turned into an even cuter, even sexier figure - 'Devil's Cheerleaders'! The original illustrator of the character was closely involved in all aspects of the figure's creation - from sculpting, painting and even keeping the atmosphere of the illustration in the figure - Rockin'Jelly Bean has carefully ensured no details were left unnoticed!

She has one arm on her hip with one of her legs resting on a water server as she takes a lick from a sucker - a pose that brings out her little devil personality. The logo plate on the stand is also slideable, allowing you to select whichever angle you think looks best!
name: POP-DELIC GIRLS series Devil's Cheerleaders (ぽっぷ-でりっく がーるず しりーず でびるず ちありーだーず)

subtitle: The Adventure Kartel Characters in a smaller size!
description: From threeA's popular 'Adventure Kartel' series featuring battle between man, undead and robots comes a selection of 1/12th scale figures! Even in a smaller scale the detail has not been compromised in any way. Each figure is fully articulated and also features outfits made from real fabric.

There are a total of 14 different characters in the lineup! · Tommy Mission (Tommy Red Ver.) · Little Shadow (Shadow MK2 Ver.) · Cherry Shadow (Cherry Bomb Ver.) · Shit Got Real JC (Open Pale Style SGR JC Ver.) · Shit Got Real JC (Pale as Fuck SGR JC Ver.) · Bleak Mission (Original Ver.) · Merde Mission (Original Ver.) · Merde Mission (Gold Melt Ver.) · Golden Dolphin (Original Ver.) · Golden Dolphin (Soy Dolphin Ver.) · Removalists Zomb (A) · Removalists Zomb (B) · Johnson Ankou · Junglevet Ankou
name: Adventure Kartel Action Portable Series One (あどべんちゃー かるてる あくしょん ぽーたぶる しりーず わん)
copyright: ©ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2013. All right reserved

subtitle: DRAMAtical Murder is joining the Picktam! series!
description: From the anime series 'DRAMAtical Murder' comes a set characters to join the 'Picktam!' series of tradable rubber straps with exchangeable expressions! There are six different characters to collect, featuring Aoba, Koujaku, Noiz, Clear, Mink and one secret character! Each character's face part had two sides each with a different expression, allowing you to pick the one that suits your mood best each day!
name: Picktam! DRAMAtical Murder (ぴくたむ！ ドラマティカルマーダー)

subtitle: "Nendoroid Hiei! Ready! For! Anything!"
description: From the popular browser game 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes a Nendoroid of the high-speed battleship, Hiei! She has joined the Nendoroids hoping to get a little bit closer to the power of her older sister, Kongo!

Hiei comes with three different face parts including her standard expression, a winking expression as well as her 'half-damage' expression! Optional parts include attacking effect parts as well as special effect parts to place around her feet which show her determined spirit! A tea stand and table are also included to serve Kongo at tea time, and her speciality dish 'Hiei Curry' is also included!
name: Nendoroid Hiei (ねんどろいど ひえい)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle:
"By the light of the star that soars above us...

    

By the glittering crystal that transcends through time. Awaking!"
description: From the anime series 'Fantasista Doll' comes a figma of the main character, Uzume Uno!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a cheerful smiling face, a serious expression for battle as well as a unsure expression.
Her beret and school bag are both included, as well as a card for battle scenes, and a drum with drumsticks to recreate your favorite scenes.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Uzume Uno (ふぃぐま うのうずめ)
copyright: © 2013 ファンタジスタドールプロジェクト/FD製作委員会

subtitle: Madoka-chan is dressed up in her yukata again, this time as a Nendoroid!
description: From 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie' comes a Nendoroid of Madoka Kaname wearing a yukata!

Optional parts include a smiling expression and an embarrassed expression, as well as a Kyubey pouch and a floral hairpin. She's cuter than ever before dressed up in her yukata, ready for fans to enjoy her company!
name: Nendoroid Madoka Kaname: Yukata Ver. (ねんどろいど かなめまどか ゆかたVer.)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie

subtitle: A second magical girl dressed up in a yukata for Summer!
description: From the popular anime 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figure of Fate Testarossa wearing a yukata! Fate has moved away from all the battles, allowing her beautiful smile to be enjoyed by fans in a much more gentle pose. Be sure to add this beautiful magical girl to your collection, and display her with Nanoha and Hayate from the same series!
name: Fate Testarossa: Yukata Ver. (ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ゆかたVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The future commanding officer, dressed up in a yukata for Summer!
description: From the popular anime 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd A's' comes a figure of Hayate Yagami wearing a yukata, which brings out a slightly different charm to her normal outfits. Be sure to add this beautiful magical girl to your collection, and display her with Nanoha and Fate from the same series!
name: Hayate Yagami: Yukata Ver. (やがみはやて ゆかたVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: A new set of Nendoroid Plus Touhou Rubber Straps
description: From the 'Touhou Project' comes another set of rubber straps to join the collection! There are a total of six characters to collect, all based on Nendoroid illustrations! Be sure to grab your favorite character and carry her around with you wherever you go!
*These rubber straps are not blind box sales. They are sold as visible singles.
name: Nendoroid Plus Rubber Straps: Touhou Project Set #4 - Sanae Kochiya ver.2 / Satori Komeiji / Koishi Komeiji / Yukari Yakumo / Ran Yakumo / Chen) (ねんどろいどぷらす らばーすとらっぷ とうほうぷろじぇくと だいよんしょう こちやさなえ ver.2/こめいじさとり/こめいじこいし/やくもゆかり/やくもらん/ちぇん)

subtitle: The third set of cycling apparel from Love Live is being rereleased!!
description: From the anime 'Love Live' comes a set of cycling apparel featuring three of the third year students.
· Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Eri Ayase Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Nozomi Toujou Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Niko Yazawa Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Windbreaker · Love Live! Cycling Cap

subtitle: MISSION COMPLETE!!
description: From 'METROID Other M' comes a rerelease of figma Samus Aran!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Various extras including the popular 'Morph Ball', two beam effects, and a part to pose her shooting missiles are included.
Five alternate left hand parts are included, such as an open hand, a gripped hand and the classic 'thumbs-up' hand
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Samus Aran (ふぃぐま さむす・あらん)

subtitle: Be as cruel as need be!
description: From Nippon Ichi's latest game 'The Witch and the Hundred Knight' comes a 1/8th scale of the main witch from the game, Metallica! The pose is based on one of the official illustrations from the game, and features her usual confident smile as she holds the Hundred Knight she summoned up by one leg - fully capturing her arrogant personality within the figure!

Her huge witch's hat and broom have also been faithfully sculpted giving some impressive volume to the figure. The base of the figure captures the surroundings of her home in the Niburuhenne swamp, bringing out the atmosphere of the game even more!
name: Swamp Witch Metallica (ぬまのまじょ めたりか)
series: The Witch and the Hundred Knight

subtitle: The second set of cycling apparel from Love Live is being rereleased!!
description: From the anime 'Love Live' comes a set of cycling apparel featuring three of the first year students.
· Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Rin Hoshizora Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Maki Nishikino Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Hanayo Koizumi Ver.
name: Love Live!: Cycle Wear Series #2 (「らぶらいぶ！」さいくるうぇあしりーず だいにだん)

subtitle: Nendoroid Plus IDOLM@STER Rubber Straps dressed for the stage!
description: From 'THE IDOLM@STER ONE FOR ALL' comes a set of rubber charms featuring Haruka Amami, Chihaya Kisaragi and Miki Hoshii based on their cute Nendoroid illustrations, dressed up for a live performance! Attach it to your cellphone, bag or anything else and keep your favorite character with you wherever you go!
* Limited quantities of this product will be sold at THE IDOLM@STER 9th ANNIVERSARY WE ARE M@STERPIECE!!.
name: Nendoroid Plus Rubber Straps: Haruka Amami / Chihaya Kisaragi / Miki Hoshii Set (ねんどろいどぷらす らばーすとらっぷ あまみはるか/きさらぎちはや/ほしいみきせっと)

subtitle: A second set of huge stickers featuring the latest Racing Miku!
description: A second set of large stickers featuring the 2014 version of Racing Miku illustrated by Oguchi! This A3 sheet of stickers can be used to add a Racing Miku theme to your own car or motorbike, or stick them on anything else that you think needs some Racing Miku flair! You can even create your own custom cheering goods for the GSR team!
The stickers stick onto most surfaces with ease, and are made from high quality materials to endure the weather and ensure the color will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Big Sticker Set 008: Good Smile Hatsune Miku Z4 2014ver.
category: 1x A3 sheet of stickers. Made in Japan
copyright: © おぐち/ Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net piapro costume designed by コヤマシゲト

subtitle: The super robot legend has been brought back to life!
description: Under supervision of the original series author Go Nagai, threezero has created a brand new Mazinger Z figure that brings out the retro design of the series! The figure stands an impressive 40cm in height, and the paintwork all over gives it a heavy, metallic and even weathered look that truly marks Mazinger Z as the 'Iron Castle'.

The figure is fully articulated down to the fingers and the Hover Pilder in his head can be removed and even deploy its wings. Lights are also included in the eyes and cockpit of the Hover Pilder. The Mazinger Blade as well as two Iron Cutters that attack to his forearms are included as weapons. The Iron Cutters can even change into a weapon specially made for this figure - the Mighty Knuckle!
name: Mazinger Z (まじんがーぜっと)

subtitle: Levi is here to clean up once again - now as a Picktam!
description: From the popular anime 'Attack on Titan' comes yet another appearance of Levi's 'Cleaning Ver.', this time joining the Picktam series of rubber accessories!
Like all the previous Picktam straps he comes with a different expression on either side of his head, allowing you to pick the expression you prefer, or switch them out depending on the day!
name: Picktam! Levi: Cleaning Ver.
category: Rubber trading accessory. Approximately 60mm in size.
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社 / 「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: Wake Up, Nendoroid!
description: From the anime 'Wake Up, Girls!' comes a Nendoroid of one of the 'Wake up, Girls!' idol group members, Mayu Shimada! She is sculpted wearing the stage outfit from the final episode's live concert - the concert where she sings '7 girls war', which is also the opening theme of the series.

She comes with a smiling expression and singing expression both perfect to pose her performing on stage, and a variety of other optional parts are also included, which allow you to recreate all sorts of dance moves from '7 girls war'! ♪
name: Nendoroid Mayu Shimada (ねんどろいど しまだまゆ)
copyright: © Green Leaves / Wake Up, Girls！製作委員会

subtitle: The master samurai of the True Shadow maid cafe as a gorgeous figure!
description: From the popular anime series 'Hyakka Rouran Samurai Bride' comes a figure of Jyubei Yagyu! Her hair accessories, the huge rope tied on her back and the swords on her thighs have all been sculpted in great detail for fans to enjoy.

She also comes with parts that allow you to pose her in her underwear instead of her standard outfit - simply select the pose you prefer and enjoy the company of the innocent Jyubei whenever you please!
name: Jyubei Yagyu (やぎゅうじゅうべえ)
copyright: ©2013 すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱SBパートナーズ

subtitle: "Ooi, reborn as an Nendoroid! Nice to see you again, Admiral!"
description: From the popular browser game 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes the sixth Nendoroid to join the series - the heavy torpedo cruiser, Ooi! The numerous torpedo launchers on her legs have all been faithfully included, but alternate parts also allow you to display her in her light cruiser form!

Her type-93 oxygen torpedoes are included together with effect parts for some powerful combat scenes, and she even comes with special hand parts that allow you to display her holding hands with Kitakami! Expressions include a smiling face and an annoyed face for all sorts of different posing options!
name: Nendoroid Ooi (ねんどろいど おおい)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The first set of cycling apparel from Love Live is being rereleased!!
description: From the anime 'Love Live' comes a set of cycling apparel brought to you as a part of the KASOKU brand from AURORA! (http:www.auroras.jp/) Due to popular demand the first set is being rereleased!

· Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Honoka Kousaka Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Umi Sonoda Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Jersey: Kotori Minami Ver. · Love Live! Cycling Bib Shorts (With Shoulder Strap) · Love Live! Cycling Pants (No Shoulder Strap)
name: Love Live!: Cycle Wear Series (「らぶらいぶ！」さいくるうぇあしりーず)

description: A second set of Racing Miku 2014 cycling apparel!
■ Racing Miku 2014 Cycling Jersey: Summer Long Sleeve Ver. ■ Racing Miku 2014 Cycling Jersey: EDGE2 Ver.
name: GSR Gear: Racing Miku 2014 Cycle Series #2 (GSR ぎあ 「れーしんぐみく 2014」さいくるしりーず だいにだん)

costume designed by コヤマシゲト

subtitle: A Miku dressed up for spring, exclusive to Figure JAPAN!
description: Figure Japan is a figure collector's magazine with each issue focusing on a specific series and including a figure from that series. Each issue will have a figure catalog and a listing of new and upcoming products from the series it is based on, focusing on the figure included with that issue. It's filled with lovely photos and all sorts of figure-related information, creating the perfect fan book for figure fans!

The second issue will be focusing on the popular electronic diva - Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku! The included figure is a 1/10th scale 'Sakura Miku feat KEI' - a classic figure based on an illustration by KEI, colored a beautiful cherry blossom pink! The cover of the magazine will also feature an illustration by KEI!

This product will be available for order from the 9th March (Miku's Day) at the Hobby Japan Online Shop and the GOOD SMILE ONLINE SHOP. It will also be available at standard hobby shops and book stores across Japan.
name: Figure JAPAN: Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku Edition (ふぃぎゅあじゃぱん『きゃらくたー・ぼーかる・しりーず 01 はつねみく』へん)

subtitle: A figure from the popular FPS game, 'KILLZONE'!
description: From the popular video game 'KILLZONE' comes a figure of the Hazmat Trooper, the powerful bodyguards equipped with thick armored suits and equipped with their unique Sta-5X Arc Rifles - all of which have been faithfully preserved on this figure!

Together with the unique design of the trooper comes threeA's unique weathered paintwork, realistic textures and full articulation allowing for a number of poses from the game. The figure also features light-up eyes for an even more epic presence that fans will be proud to own!
name: KILLZONE Hazmat Trooper (きるぞーん はずまっと とるーぱー)
copyright: ©Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Developed by Guerrilla.

subtitle: "If you don't give me any treats, expect some tricks!"
description: From the 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku dressed up a cute little devil for Halloween! Her dress is made in the image of a pumpkin, and the outfit is covered with cute and colorful lace and ribbons! She also features expressions with orange eyeshadow, fangs and wings, bringing out the little devil in Miku for fans to enjoy!

Together with her standard smiling expression, she also comes with a confident sneering expression and a special pumpkin head for all sorts of Halloween pranks! Optional parts include Halloween-themed items such as some candy and a jack-o'-lantern which can even be used as a head part for Nendoroid Petites! Enjoy this year's Halloween with Miku by your side!
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Halloween Ver. (ねんどろいど はつねみく はろうぃんVer.)
copyright: Costume Design: Suoh © Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net

subtitle: "Yes... this world, is cruel."
description: From the anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes a rerelease of figma Mikasa Ackerman!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
She comes with three expressions including her standard emotionless expression, a shouting expression and an expression with clenched teeth.
Her dual blades are included for combat scenes, along with her Vertical Maneuvering Equipment and smoke effects to recreate its use.
The hooks connected to a wire that shoot out from the equipment are also included, along with an optional mantle.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mikasa Ackerman (ふぃぐま みかさ・あっかーまん)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: "Time to take control of the seas! Bath Time Collection, move out!"
description: From the popular 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes the third character to join the Bath Time Collection series of bath toys - Ryujo!

The design is based on an illustration of Ryujo by popular illustrator CHANxCO, and also features a wind-up motor which is designed to work both in water and on the ground! Enjoy the company of the cute Ryujo in the bath or anywhere else!
name: Bath Time Collection: Ryujo (おふろこれくしょん りゅうじょう)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The official mascot character of the 2014 Hatsune Miku GT Project!
description: Personal sponsor applications which include this Nendoroid will be available from the 1st April 2014 (Tues) at 18:00JST until the 19th May 2013 (Sun) at 23:59JST. For more info, please see the GSR Personal Sponsors Entry Website: http:gsr-global.ecq.sc/

Racing Miku 2014 was illustrated by the up-and-coming illustrator Oguchi with design direction by Shigeto Koyama, famous for his work in various anime series including Kill la Kill! The Nendoroid is based on the pose from the main visual.
Bonus trophies have been added to all preorders and future orders! One for the first victory, and one for the second!
name: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2014 Ver. (ねんどろいど れーしんぐみく 2014 Ver.)
copyright: © おぐち/ Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net piapro costume designed by コヤマシゲト

subtitle: "I'm Bath Time Collection Kitakami. Nice to meet ya."
description: From the popular 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes the forth character to join the Bath Time Collection series of bath toys - the light cruiser Kitakami!
The design is based on an illustration of Kitakami by popular illustrator CHANxCO, and features a wind-up propeller unit allowing her to speed along the water!
name: Bath Time Collection: Kitakami (おふろこれくしょん きたかみ)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: wooser's popular canned bread is back once again!
description: A new version of the popular preserved food based on the second season, 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc'! Flavoured with honey and lemon!
*Image for illustrative purposes only.
name: wooser's Preserved Food to Take to a Deserted Island #2

subtitle: The self-proclaimed "Warrior of Love" is back again!
description: From the popular action anime filled with cute samurai, 'Hyakka Ryouran: Samurai Girls', comes an upgraded rerelease of Kanetsugu Naoe wielding her giant hammer!

Her trademark features such as the gourd handing down from her hips and the giant bells in her twin-tail hair give her impressive volume, and her outfit can also be removed for an even more revealing pose whenever you like! Her stand has been changed to a more extravagant golden color and smaller details all over the figure have also been improved for this rerelease!
name: Kanetsugu Naoe ver 1.5 (ひゃっかりょうらん なおえかねつぐ ver.1.5)
copyright: ©2010 すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱パートナーズ

subtitle: "I am... a brand new Kitakami. Cuter than ever before."
description: From the popular browser game 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes the fifth Nendoroid to join the series - the heavy torpedo cruiser, Kitakami! You can pose her with her lighter armaments in 'Light Cruiser' mode, or instead in the heavy 'Super Kitakami-sama' mode!
Alternate face parts include a smiling expression and a glaring expression, and she also comes with a bollard which she can stand upon, as well as a flower which she can water!
name: Nendoroid Kitakami (ねんどろいど きたかみ)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A Nendoroid foreseen by Divine Revelation!
description: From the sci-fi war anime which bases character off famous historical figures, 'Nobunaga the Fool' comes a figure of the main heroine who has mysterious divine revelations, Jeanne Kaguya d'Arc!

She comes with three expressions including her standard smiling face, a confident expression for combat as well as an embarrassed expression. Optional parts include the accessory form of her sacred weapon of light. She also comes with a number of alternate arm and leg parts allowing for epic combat scenes and various other poses!
name: Nendoroid Jeanne Kaguya d'Arc (ねんどろいど じゃんぬ・かぐや・だるく)

subtitle: The Master Samurai, with power awoken by Muneakira!
description: From the popular action anime filled with cute samurai, 'Hyakka Ryouran: Samurai Girls', comes an upgraded rerelease of Jubei Yagyu based on the cover illustration of the first volume of the original light novel.

The pose shows off Jubei's innocent smile in a dynamic scene with careful attention given to her outfit and swords. Her outfit can also be removed for an even more revealing pose whenever you like! Her stand has been changed to a more extravagant golden color and smaller details all over the figure have also been improved for this rerelease!
name: Jubei Yagyu ver. 1.5 (ひゃっかりょうらん やぎゅうじゅうべえ ver.1.5)

subtitle: The evolved, king of insects.
description: From the anime 'TERRAFORMARS' comes a figma of the threat to mankind, the Terraformar!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
The Terraformar's eyes can be moved left and right, allowing you match his line of sight with any pose.
The club that the Terraformars wield in the series is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Terraformar (ふぃぐま てらふぉーまー)

You can also switch parts with the previously released Tiger Hoodie Ver. to allow for all sorts of different situations! ♪
name: Nendoroid Super Sonico: Working Set (ねんどろいど すーぱーそにこ おしごとせっと)

description: The GSR Hatsune Miku BMW 2013 racing car that achieved 3rd place in the yearly ranking of the 2013 season is joining the miniature car series!

The colorful, speedy-looking design as well as each of the sponsors logos have all been faithfully preserved on the miniature version. The chassis makes use of ABS resin for a faithful rendition of the original.

subtitle: From the third-person shooter game LOST PLANET 2 comes the VS Drio!
description: From the hugely popular game 'LOST PLANET 2' comes a 1/12th scale figure of the GTF-11 Drio, one of the more popular Vital Suits built to combat the Akrid of E.D.N. III. The Drio features over 100 points of articulation, allowing for almost any pose from the game.

The figure also features lights on the front armor, two headlights, back fins and cockpit. The main chassis of the Drio features weathered paintwork for a truly realistic appearance that faithfully sticks to the game's original design. The included pilot is of the same scale and is also articulated. He even features detailed armor and clothing made from real fabric.
Batteries sold separately.
name: LOST PLANET 2 GTF-11 DRIO (ろすと ぷらねっと 2 GTF-11 どらいお)

subtitle: A magical girl dressed up in a yukata for Summer.
description: From the popular anime 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd' comes a figure of Nanoha Takamachi wearing a yukata! The yukata provides a whole different charm to her standard barrier jacket appearance, and is packed with cuteness for fans to enjoy. A candy apple and folding fan are both included to help bring out the feeling of a Summer festival. Be sure to add this beautiful magical girl to your collection!
name: Nanoha Takamachi: Yukata Ver. (たかまちなのは ゆかたVer.)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha the MOVIE 2nd A's

subtitle: The largest model in the COMBAT ARMORS MAX series yet! The 'Abitate' heavy combat armor!
description: The third in Max Factory's 'Fang of the Sun Dougram' model series is the overpowering Abitate T10B Blockhead heavy combat armor!
features: This model kit makes use of snap-fit connections, glue is not required for assembly.
Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
The cockpit and turret in front have been faithfully preserved on the model.
The search lights on the head makes use of clear parts.
A Mag Launcher is included as a weapon, and can be held with both hands for combat poses.
The various markings of the Blockhead are included as water-application decals.
The box art features illustrations by Hidetaka Tenjin.
name: COMBAT ARMORS MAX 03: 1/72nd Scale Abitate T10B Blockhead (こんばっと あーまーず まっくす03 1/72 すけーる あびてーと T10B ぶろっくへっど)

subtitle: A collaboration between the Nendoroid series and Sonico-chan!
description: The Nendoroid of Nitroplus' Mascot Character, 'Super Sonico' is being rereleased!

Nendoroid Sonico is wearing the Tiger hoodie that fans have come to love, and she also comes with her electric guitar as an optional part. Sonico has become so much more than just a mascot - she is an idol, game character and musician known by fans all over. Now fans can enjoy her as a part of the Nendoroid universe as well!
name: Nendoroid Super Sonico : Tiger Hoodie Ver. (ねんどろいど すーぱーそにこ とらぱーかーVer.)
copyright:
© 2006-2012 Nitroplus
Images are for illustrative purposes only.

subtitle: Admirals, are you ready?
description: From 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes a figma of the aircraft carrier, Akagi!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The ship deck on her back is articulated at the base for various possible angles.
Areas such as the base of her quiver and her shoulders make use of soft materials for easy action poses.
She comes with a standard expression, a half-damaged expression as well as a satisfied expression for enjoying her rice.
Optional parts include her bow, her arrows based on famous aircraft, a repair bucket, bauxite and a bowl full of rice.
An articulated figma stand is included.
name: figma Akagi (ふぃぐま あかぎ)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

■ Super Sonico Late 2013: Cycle Wind Jacket ■ Super Sonico Late 2013: Cycle Jersey ■ Super Sonico Late 2013: Full Color Bag
name: GSR Gear: Super Sonico Late 2013 Series (「すーぱーそにこ れいと2013」さいくるうぇあしりーず)

copyright: ©オケアノス／「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

description: A new cycle apparel series featuring Nitroplus' mascot character, Super Sonico! The short sleeved jersey comes in both a 'Sonico ver.' and a 'Logo ver.' for fans to choose from. The arm covers and cylcing pants will be going on sale at the same time and are designed to match with either version of her jersey.

■ Super Sonico Early 2013: Cycle Jersey (Sonico Ver.) ■ Super Sonico Early 2013: Cycle Jersey (Logo Ver.) ■ Super Sonico Early 2013: Cycle Pants ■ Super Sonico Early 2013: Spandex Arm Cover ■ Super Sonico Early 2013: Fingerless Cycling Gloves
name: GSR Gear: Super Sonico Early 2013 Series

subtitle: The third in the figma Avengers series - Captain America!
description: From the film 'The Avengers' comes a figma of Captain America!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Great attention has been given to the smallest of details and painting of his armor, giving the figma a heavy, metallic appearance.
Careful thought has gone into the articulation of the chest and other areas, keeping the Captain's unique style in mind and still allowing for various action poses.
A number of hand parts as well as his impenetrable shield are included.
Like figma Thor, his eyes are moveable allowing you to change the direction he is looking.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.
name: figma Captain America (ふぃぐま きゃぷてん・あめりか)

subtitle: "Kirito-kun... please come and rescue me soon..."
description: From the popular anime Sword Art Online comes a 1/7th scale figure of the heroine 'Asuna'! The figure features Asuna in her Titania avatar from the Fairy Dance Arc, posed as a captive of the Fairy King Oberon.

Metal chains are included with the figure allowing you to complete her captured appearance in its entirety. The sorrowful look on her face, her long flowing hair and the plants growing around her arms are all sculpted to the finest of details for fans to enjoy!
name: Asuna ~Captured Titania~ (あすな ～とらわれのてぃたーにあ～)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: Brand new goods from the new OVA!
description: To commemorate the upcoming OVA 'Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet ~Meguru Kouro, Haruka~' comes two different clear files which also come with duplicates of the original key frames illustrations from the OVA!
