copyright: ©オケアノス／「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

subtitle: A set of badges featuring the main characters from the new OVA!
description: To commemorate the upcoming OVA 'Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet ~Meguru Kouro, Haruka~' comes a set of badges each featuring one of the main characters - Ledo, Amy and Lima.
name: Badge Set (Ledo, Amy, Lima)
copyright: ©オケアノス／「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

subtitle: "Yay... I get to be a Nendoroid! Tee-hee!" "Nfu, Nfu..."
description: From the popular game 'Touch Detective' comes a Nendoroid of the main character Mackenzie as well as her assistant, Funghi!

She comes with three different expressions and a number of different arm parts allowing for all sorts of poses from the game - including her trademark 'touch' pose as well as her deducing pose! The 'Fungcoin' which is an important element in the upcoming 'Touch Detective 3' is also included! Get ready to head out and solve some difficult cases with Mackenzie and Funghi!
name: Nendoroid Mackenzie & Funghi (ねんどろいど おざわりな＆なめこ)

subtitle: The long awaited follow up to the Metal Gear REX - the Metal Gear RAY!
description: It's been about one year since the release of the MG REX which impressed hobby fans worldwide, and now the long-awaited announcement of the MG RAY has arrived. The model is approximately 42cm in height, and boasts an amazing 98cm width when its wings are opened.

The wings, legs and torso are also fully articulated and the cockpit is also fitted with lights for even more impact. The detailed chin area can be opened and closed, the feet are wrapped with a rubberised material, and the entire body features unique metallic paintwork. It's made to contrast against the REX beautifully, and comes with an articulated stand for various positions.
name: Metal Gear RAY (めたるぎあ れい)
copyright: ©2013 Konami Digital Entertainment. This product is manufactured by threeA under license from Konami Digital Entertainment.

subtitle: Brand new goods from the new OVA!
description: To commemorate the upcoming OVA 'Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet ~Meguru Kouro, Haruka~' comes this stylish tote bag featuring Chamber! It's the perfect size to keep leaflets in.
name: Chamber Design Tote Bag
copyright: ©オケアノス／「翠星のガルガンティア」製作委員会

subtitle: "I'm here... to make your wish come true."
description: From the original anime series 'Sora no Method' comes tapestries featuring the five main characters! The illustrations are by Ohara Tometa (QP:flapper)!
name: Sora no Method: Life-size Tapestries(Noel / Nonoka Komiya / Yuzuki Mizusaka / Koharu Shiihara / Shione Togawa

subtitle: The second in the Egg Attack series is the Iron Patriot!
description: The 'Egg Attack' series is a series of deformed figures created by the Taiwan brand 'Beast Kingdom'! The second to be released in Japan is the United States government's patriotic hero - the Iron Patriot!

His vivid coloring based on the colors of the American flag have been faithfully preserved, and he is textured in such a way that he truly looks to be made from metal. Just like the previously announced Egg Attack Iron Man Mk.42, the design also features LED lights all over the figure including the base, eyes, legs and reactor!
name: Egg Attack: Iron Patriot (えっぐあたっく あいあん・ぱとりおっと)

subtitle: The genius programmer, Frau Koujiro!
description: From the popular scientific adventure game and anime series 'Robotics;Notes' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Frau Koujiro, the genius programmer who loves to speak in internet slang. The figure is based on the cover of the 1st volume of the 'ROBOTICS;NOTES REVIVAL LEGACY' manga.

She is posed gazing ahead while holding onto a figure of her beloved Gunvarrel, with her characteristic hairstyle and uniform both sculpted in careful detail. She is seated on her favorite sofa while surrounded by Pocki packages, which all come together to create a figure that brings out her character perfectly!
name: Frau Koujiro (こうじろふらう)

subtitle: The second in The Avengers figma series - the invincible Iron Man!
description: From the movie 'The Avengers' comes a figma of the world's strongest CEO - Iron Man wearing his Mark VII suit!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The utmost care has been given to the details of both design and coloring, ensuring a high quality figure that fans will be proud to own.
Careful thought has gone into all points of articulation on the figma, preserving his heroic appearance while allowing for various poses from the movie!
Along with a number of alternate hand parts, he also comes with effect parts for flying and firing his repulsors.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.
name: figma Iron Man Mark VII (ふぃぐま あいあんまん・まーく７)

subtitle: The muse of the underworld with the utmost beautiful legs!
description: From the popular manga serialized in Monthly ASUKA magazine, 'ZONE-00' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the male character with a womanly touch – Benten!

The figure is based on a beautiful illustration by Kiyo QJO – and has been faithfully recreated in all aspects! He is sure to capture the attention of anyone who looks his way, and fans can enjoy his company by their side at all times!
*Limited First Edition Orders include a clear postcard illustrated by Kiyo QJO.
name: Benten (べんてん)
copyright: ©2014 九条キヨ　発行：株式会社ＫＡＤＯＫＡＷＡ 角川書店

subtitle: A pleasure to meet you, scallywags!
description: From Queen's Blade: Rebellion comes a 1/7th scale figure of the notorious Great Pirate Captain Liliana! She has been sculpted wearing her pirate outfit while holding her sword out to the side in a confident pose that shows off her personality. A special stand is also included which was made in the image of combat effects, creating an even more epic pose!
Her outfit can also be removed, and she comes with an alternate arm and head part as well as a banana allowing you to recreate the famous banana eating pose!
name: Great Pirate Captain Liliana (だいかいぞくきゃぷてん・りりあな)
copyright: ©2012 HobbyJAPAN/QBリベリオンパートナーズ

subtitle: The Fairy Tail Guild's Mage, Natsu Dragneel!
description: From the popular series 'FAIRY TAIL' comes a figure of the Dragon Slayer who always looks out for his friends, Natsu Dragneel!

He has been sculpted in 1/7th scale with his fist raised in an imposing stance, ready to fight! He also comes with special flame effect parts to attach to his fist, showing exactly why he is known as the 'Salamander'! Both his jacket and the flame effect parts can be attached and removed whenever you like, allowing you to choose the pose you prefer!
name: Natsu Dragneel (なつ・どらぐにる)
copyright: © Hiro Mashima･KODANSHA/Fairy Tail project･TV TOKYO.All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A Nendoroid of Miss Monochrome alternate colors from the ending theme!
description: From the anime series 'Miss Monochrome -The Animation- comes a Nendoroid of the alternate color version of Miss Monochrome from the anime's ending theme! This product will only be purchasable by those who purchase the limited first edition of both the 'Miss Monochrome - The Animation' Blu-ray & DVD Black and White versions. Inside you will find a special purchase ticket and application sheet which can be used to apply to purchase Nendoroid Miss Monochrome: Poker Face Black ver.

Monochrome's close family member 'Ru-chan' as well as alkaline batteries and a battery box to keep her powered are all included as optional parts. If you pose her together with the standard Nendoroid Miss Monochrome you can also recreate the dance scene from the ending theme! Please see the Miss Monochrome official website for more information: http:www.starchild.co.jp/special/miss_monochrome_anime/
name: Nendoroid Miss Monochrome: Poker Face Black ver. (ねんどろいど みす・ものくろーむ ぽーかー ふぇいす ぶらっく ver.)
copyright: ©ミス・モノクローム製作委員会

subtitle: Homura-chan dressed up in a yukata!
description: From the popular anime movie, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie Rebellion' comes a figure of Homura Akemi! She is dressed up in a dark purple yukata with spider lily prints giving off a rather mature look, which is contrasted by the pink candyfloss she holds in her hand. The other Puella Magi are also planned to be released in this yukata series, so be sure to collect and display them all together!

What is Y-STYLE? Y-STYLE is a series of figures that aims to sculpt characters with a more 'Japanese' look through elegant accessories and poses, while still preserving the atmosphere of the series they come from.
name: Homura Akemi: Yukata Ver. (あけみほむら ゆかたVer.)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie -Rebellion-

subtitle: 2000% Rubber Straps!
description: From 'Uta no Prince-sama Maji LOVE 2000%' comes a set of trading rubber straps based on Nendoroid style illustrations! This set includes seven characters including Natsuki, Sho, Cecil, Ai, Camus, Ringo and Ryuuya!
Please see Gift's official website with regard to box sales: http:www.gift-gift.jp/acce/acce031.html (Boxes contain all variations)
*Product images are for illustrative purposes only, and will differ to the final product.
name: Nendoroid Plus: Trading Rubber Straps - Uta no Prince-sama Maji LOVE 2000% 02 (ねんどろいどぷらす とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ うたの☆ぷりんすさまっ♪まじらぶ2000％ 02)

subtitle: The good-natured former vampire and main character of the series!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a Nendoroid of Koyomi Araragi! He comes with three expressions including his standard disinterested face, a grinning face that looks ready for some mischief and a frightened face that fans are sure to remember from the series!

Optional parts include his school bag as well as various different sticking-up hair parts, as his hair would often show his emotions! The sword he borrowed from Shinobu 'Kokorowatari' and a special base made to look like a road are also both included, allowing for all sorts of situations from the series!
name: Nendoroid Koyomi Araragi (ねんどろいど あららぎこよみ)

Please see Gift's official website with regard to box sales: http:www.gift-gift.jp/acce/acce030.html (Boxes contain all variations)

subtitle: "Let's do this! Ice-Make!"
description: From the popular series 'FAIRY-TAIL' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the ice mage, Gray Fullbuster!

He is sculpted in an confident pose with his two hands together using his 'Ice-Make' magic. His shirt is also removable, allowing you to display him in true Gray style! Be sure to display him with the previously announced Natsu Dragneel!
name: Gray Fullbuster (ぐれい・ふるばすたー)
copyright: © Hiro Mashima･KODANSHA/Fairy Tail project･TV TOKYO.All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A 1/32 scale model of the Miku BMW at the start of the 2014 season!
description: The GSR Hatsune Miku BMW 2014 racing car taking part in the 2014 SUPER GT is already on it's way to become a miniature car for fans to collect and enjoy!

The design featuring the latest Racing Miku illustrated by Oguchi has been shrunk down to a 1/32 scale while keeping all the details of the design intact - even down to each of the sponsor logos as they were at the start of the season. The chassis makes use of ABS resin for a faithful rendition of the original.
name: GSR Hatsune Miku BMW 2014 : Season Opening ver. (GSR はつねみく BMW 2014 かいまくせんver.)

subtitle: A mysterious TK from the Underverse.
description: The Tomorrow Kings (TK) are clone warriors that fight against the enemy of mankind, the Mortis. These genetically bred warriors were made from the genes of Japan's commanders and soldiers, yet their origin is still unknown. The KOZO is said to be made from the genes of a powerful admiral - some TK have the ability to traverse the underverse and move through time itself, however whether the KOZO has that power is yet unknown... he also seems equipped with diving equipment unseen on any other TK, but is there any reason behind the equipment?
This product was sold at the GOOD SMILE ONLINE SHOP for only 24 hours from the 9th February 2014 10:00JST.
name: KOZO TK UNDERNAUT (ORIGIN HUNTER) (こーぞー TK あんだーのーと（おりじんはんたー）)
copyright: © ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2014. All right reserved.

subtitle: The 'first' childhood friend dressed up in her swimsuit!
description: From the anime series IS <Infinite Stratos> comes a 1/7th scale figure of one of the heroines, Houki Shinonono! She has been sculpted in a cute pose with a rather embarrassed expression on her face - showing just how bashful she is when you stare at her!
name: Houki Shinonono: Swimsuit Ver. (しのののほうき みずぎVer.)

subtitle: The Student Council president of Hakoniwa Academy proudly wearing a bunny girl outfit!
description: From the popular series 'Medaka Box' comes a figure of the accomplished, beautiful, intelligent and flawless heroine - Medaka Kurokami, and to top it all off she is wearing an amazingly sexy bunny outfit!

Her stockings are made from real material, and her tail is made from a fluffy material for a truly realistic look and feel! She is also an impressive 1/4th scale in size allowing for incredible details and a presence that will not go unnoticed!
name: Medaka Kurokami: Bunny Ver. (くろかみめだか ばにーVer.)

subtitle: The bipedal tank with nuclear armaments - the Metal Gear REX.
description: From the popular stealth action game, 'Metal Gear Solid' comes a model of the bipedal tank known as 'Metal Gear REX', brought to you by threeA.

The model measures an incredible 360mm in height even when in standby mode. All of the powerful weapons on the REX have also been faithfully reproduced, including the multiple rotary cannons, an anti-tank missile launcher, a free-electron laser and the nuclear powered railgun. But there is much more to this model - the lights and railgun are fitted with a lighting system, the cockpit can be opened and closed, certain armored parts can be removed and there are various other highlights that any Metal Gear fan is bound to appreciate.

Yoji Shinkawa, the art director for Metal Gear Solid and designer of the Metal Gear REX was directing the production of the figure, and together with the detailed and careful work of threeA, they have created the ultimate model of the REX!
The Metal Gear Series

KONAMI's popular stealth action game series, the 'Metal Gear' series has now sold a total of over 31 million copies worldwide. The game series was the first that took the standard action genre and transformed it by adding stealth elements - which make it more important to stay hidden than to fight.

The game system creates a thrilling atmosphere that is only enhanced by the direction of Hideo Kojima, who creates a unique atmosphere that has become popular all over the globe. With the series having reached its 25th anniversary, the whole world is now looking on to see which direction the series will move in next.
name: Metal Gear REX (めたるぎあ れっくす)
copyright: © Konami Digital Entertainment.This product is manufactured by ThreeA under license from Konami Digital Entertainment.

subtitle: From the popular game 'Lost Planet 2' comes a figure of the Mercenary!
description: From Capcom's third-person shooter action game, 'Lost Planet 2' comes a figure of the Mercenary, brought to you by threeA. His outfit designed to withstand the most harsh environments, his boots, and all the small gadgets he is carrying have been carefully sculpted and painted for a very realistic appearance.

He also comes complete with both a hand gun and machine gun as equippable weapons, and four different sets of hand parts are included, allowing for various different poses. threeA has brought the Mercenary out of the game and into the real world for all fans to enjoy!
name: LOST PLANET 2: MERCENARY (ろすとぷらねっと2 まーせなりー)
copyright: © CAPCOM. Licensed for use by ThreeA Trading Company Ltd.

Along with his standard expression, he also comes with a damaged expression with blood spray parts and a head part to recreate the 'Machete Zombie'.

Optional parts include her headset with special hair parts to display her wearing it, as well as her cellphone.

An articulated figma stand is included.

The set features a total of seven characters including Fighter, Cerberus, Vania, Orchis, Feena, Teena and one secret character! Enjoy the mysterious beauty of the Rage of Bahamut world in adorable Nendoroid Petite form!

The set features seven characters to collect: Kirino Kousaka, Kyousuke Kousaka, Kuroneko, Saori Bajiina, Ayase Aragaki, Kanako Kurusu and Manami Tamura! Her third expression is a pained expression, which also comes with creeper plants to display her tied up in the cage. Kneeling parts are also included to complete the scene in its entirety! Her expressions can also be switched with the original Nendoroid Asuna, allowing for even more possibilities!

Her light blue panties feature transparent frills, which contrast beautifully with the long red hair wrapping around her leg. Her cute expression also shows off Mea's personality perfectly, bringing out her innocent charm to the fullest!

She also comes with a selection of 'chocolate' stickers for you to place wherever to like to create your very own exclusive Sonico! The melted chocolate, guitar and base all add a chocolaty charm to the figure, leaving Sonico ready to rock your world in the sweetest way possible!

Her neck, shoulders and arms are all movable and she also comes with an alternate lower body allowing you to pose her sitting down - simply display her however you think she looks cutest! The figure is based on Itto Maru's original illustration featuring Miku looking over her shoulder with her hand pointing in the shape of a gun, as if firing behind her.

All the details of her pose and design have been faithfully recreated, making sure Miku is ready to shoot right into the heart of her fans! The spirit of the song is already retained in the figure beautifully, but Rin and Len are also in production to display with her soon, allowing you to bring out the Senbonzakura atmosphere even more!

Her undeniably beautiful body are ready to charm fans all over the world!

Instead of her standard Goth-loli outfit, she has been sculpted in her school uniform! The school uniform can also be removed - and by removing it and swapping some parts you can display her in her school swimsuit instead!

series: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

subtitle: "All I wanted was to eat cheese one more time!"

features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her expressions include a standard face, a smiling face as well as the famous 'Bebe' face.
The trumpet she uses as a weapon in the series, as well as the tray which held the Witch's servants are both included.
A figma sized Bebe with special sitting parts is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: The mysterious bystander, always watching over the other's battles.
description: From the anime that aired during Fuji TV's noitaminA block, 'Black Rock Shooter' comes a Nendoroid of Black Gold Saw in her updated design from the TV anime series! Her trademark weapon, the giant 'King Saw' as well as the watering can she used in the series are both included. Additionally, the 'incomplete girls' from the series are also included in miniature size.

She comes with two expressions including her standard expression as well as a combat expression for fighting scenes. Her knees are also specially articulated, allowing you to recreate even more of your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Black Gold Saw: TV ANIMATION Ver. (ねんどろいど ぶらっくごーるどそー てれび あにめーしょん Ver.)

subtitle: "If you're worried about something at home, come discuss it with me!"
description: From the anime series 'Sasami-san@Ganbaranai' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the eldest of the three Yagami sisters, Tsurugi Yagami! She is posed playing one of her beloved video games in a cute pose that captures her personality in figure form.
Tsurugi is usually seen wearing her white lab coat for work, but this figure instead shows her relaxed at home in a more casual outfit as she plays games to her heart's content!
name: Tsurugi Yagami (やがみつるぎ)
copyright: ©日日日・小学館／製作委員会＠がんばらない

subtitle: The much awaited second addition to the COMBAT ARMORS MAX series!
description: From the anime series 'Fang of the Sun Dougram' comes the second in the COMBAT ARMORS MAX series - the primary model of the Federation's Combat Armor forces, the Soltic H8 Roundfacer!
features: This model kit makes use of snap-fit connections, glue is not required for assembly.
Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
The cockpit canopy comes as a prepainted frame canopy, popular with the previous Dougram release.
The kit includes the Roundfacer standard 'Linear Gun', together with parts to pose it held in both hands.
The various markings on the Roundfacer are included as water-application decals.
The box art features illustrations by Hidetaka Tenjin.

subtitle: "This is a serious problem... we need to get started immediately!"
description: From the popular anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes another figma of Levi... this time dressed up in his cleaning gear!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Three expressions are included: a standard expression, a shouting expression and a combat expression!
His bandana comes in two forms: one hanging from his neck and another tied up around his mouth.
A cloth, duster and broom are all included to help him clean.
Alternate front hair parts for Levi, as well as some bonus alternate front hair parts for Mikasa are both included!
An articulated figma stand is included
name: figma Levi: Cleaning ver. (ふぃぐま りう゛ぁい おそうじver.)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: A member the railway police team, Sakura Monden!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Sakura Monden wearing her 'Railway Police' armband and ready to keep the stations and railways safe! She comes with a railway crossing set used during train safety explanations at schools, as well 'pedestrian', 'truck' and 'train' mask cutouts to wear on her head - display Sakura teaching everyone about train safety!

While previous figures in the series included a 'cardboard box train', Sakura instead comes with a cardboard police patrol car! Just like the previous figures she still comes with a rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well! Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Minami Kurihashi who will be going on sale at the same time! ♪
name: Nendoroid Sakura Monden (ねんどろいど もんでんさくら)

subtitle: The third fleet is ready for deployment!
description: From the popular game 'Kantai Collection ~KanColle~' comes a third set of cute rubber straps for admirals to collect! The 3rd fleet includes six characters: Nagato, Mutsu, Hiei, Kirishima, Yukikaze and Shimakaze!
name: Nendoroid Plus: KanColle Straps - 3rd Fleet (Vol.3) (ねんどろいどぷらす かんこれすとらっぷ だいさんかんたい（vol.3）)

subtitle: "This isn't clean at all. Start again."
description: From the popular anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes a special 'Cleaning' version of Nendoroid Levi! He comes with all sorts of optional parts to help him keep things clean, including a duster, bamboo broom and mask. You can choose to display him with the mask up covering his face, or instead hanging around his neck. Folded arm parts and a shouting expression are also included.

The inner cardboard of the box is specially printed to allow you to recreate the famous scene from the anime where he opens the window. Be sure to combine parts with the previous released Nendoroid Levi to recreate even more of your favorite scenes!
name: Nendoroid Levi: Cleaning Ver. (ねんどろいど りう゛ぁい おそうじVer.)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: The calm 'rinshan' technique user.
description: From the anime filled with cute girls and mahjong, 'Saki: Zengokuhen' comes a Nendoroid of Saki Miyanaga! She comes with three expressions including a smiling face, a focused face and a lost expression about to burst into tears! She also comes with a number of optional parts from the series including a mahjong table, replacement tile effect parts and a lightning effect part!

Additionally she also comes with both her long skirt for the national tournaments as well as her mini-skirt used in the prefectural matches! Be sure to display her with the previously released Nendoroid Nodoka Haramura for even more fun!
name: Nendoroid Saki Miyanaga (ねんどろいど みやながさき)
copyright: ©小林 立/スクウェアエニックス・咲全国編製作委員会

subtitle: The second set of Attack on Titan Picktams are preparing to invade!
description: The third set of Picktam! rubber accessories is a second selection of characters from Attack on Titan! The second set features another eight characters including Eren Yeager (Shirt), Annie Leonhart, Reiner Braun, Bertolt Hoover, Connie Springer, Marco Bott, Zoë Hange as well as one secret character!

Each character's face part features a different expression on each side, allowing you to pick whichever you prefer! Be sure to enjoy them together with the previously released 'Picktam! Attack on Titan - Part 1' set!
name: Picktam! Attack on Titan: Part 2 (ぴくたむ！ しんげきのきょじん ぱーと2)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社 /「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: Dead Cosmonaut Golovorez
description: From the Adventure Kartel Series comes a figure of Dead Cosmonaut Golovorez. The spacesuit and helmet are fully removable, revealing a zip-up undersuit as an alternate way to display him.

The helmet also include LED lights, and special attention has been given to the oxygen pipes connecting his backpack to his suit, giving a truly realistic look and design filled with details for fans to enjoy. Two pistols are also included.
name: ADVENTURE KARTEL Dead Cosmonaut Golovorez (でっど こすものーと ごろほれつ)
copyright: ©ThreeA Trading Company Limited 2013. All right reserved

subtitle: The 'Egg Attack' series is finally in Japan! The first being Iron Man Mk.42!
description: The 'Egg Attack' series is a series of deformed figures created by the Taiwan brand 'Beast Kingdom', and they're now headed to Japan too! The first to be released in Japan is Iron Man Mk 42 from the popular superhero film 'Irom Man 3'.

The figure is a fairly large at 180mm in height, and is colored and textured in such a way that it truly looks to be made from metal. The design also features LED lights all over the figure including the base, eyes, reactor and repulsors!
(Batteries sold separately)
name: Egg Attack: Iron Man Mk.42 (えっぐあたっく あいあんまん まーく42)

subtitle: The graceful and elegant samurai princess!
description: From the anime series 'Hyakka Ryouran: Samurai Bride' comes a 1/8th figure of the Buou School Council Vice-President, Sen Tokugawa! She is posed with her shirt rolled up as she lifts her shirt, inviting onlookers to get closer with a sexy pose.
Bring her home and enjoy her impressive bust and full thighs whenever you please - nobody will be able to resist the allure of the confident Sen!
name: Sen Tokugawa (とくがわ せん)
copyright: ©2013 すずきあきら・Niθ・ホビージャパン／百花繚乱ＳＢパートナーズ

subtitle: From the popular game "League of Legends" comes a Nendoroid of Ahri!
description: From the internationally popular E-sports game "League of Legends" comes a Nendoroid of Ahri! She comes with two face plates, both of which capture her charming expressions in cute Nendoroid form. Her detailed costume has been faithfully recreated, including the gold adornments.

Two kinds of effect parts are included to display her using her abilities. Two tail parts are included allowing you to display her two different ways! Bent arms and bent leg parts are included allowing you to create a variety of different scenes!
name: Nendoroid Ahri
copyright: © 2017 Riot Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Riot Games, League of Legends and PvP.net are trademarks, services marks, or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.

subtitle: The fifth Nendoroid to join the Bakemonogatari series~nyan!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a Nendoroid of the girl charmed by a cat, Tsubasa Hanekawa! She comes with three expressions including her standard smiling face, an upset face perfect for he role as class representative as well as a cute embarrassed face.
Attachable cat ears are also included allowing you to pose her in her possessed form, and a black and white cat are also both included to display by her side!
name: Nendoroid Tsubasa Hanekawa (ねんどろいど はねかわつばさ)
copyright: ©西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The first in The Avengers figma series - the mighty God of Thunder!
description: From the movie 'The Avengers' comes a figma of the most powerful fighter in Asgard - the Mighty Thor!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The utmost care has been given to the details of Thor's design and paintwork, ensuring a high quality figure fans will be proud to own.
Careful thought has gone into all points of articulation on the figma, preserving his heroic appearance while allowing for various poses from the movie!
A number of optional hand parts, as well as Thor's mighty hammer 'Mjolnir' are included.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.
name: figma Thor (ふぃぐま そー)

subtitle: The logical mahjong player!
description: From the anime series about girls who play mahjong, 'Saki Achiga-hen episode of Side-A' comes a Nendoroid of the popular Nodoka Haramura, also known as 'Nodocchi'! You can display her with either the long hair that she used for national tournaments or instead with the twin-tails she used in regional matches!

A variety of optional parts are also included, such as mahjong tiles and point bars as well as Nodoka's beloved penguin plushie, Etopen! You can also pose her with the included spaced-out expression to recreate the "Nodocchi mode" that she enters while playing mahjong! A load of options that allow you to choose how you want to display her!
name: Nendoroid Nodoka Haramura (ねんどろいど はらむらのどか)
copyright: ©小林 立/スクウェアエニックス・咲阿知賀編製作委員会

subtitle: Tobu Railway's Station Assistant, Minami Kurihashi!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Tobu Railway's station assistant, Minami Kurihashi! Minami is known to be one of the biggest train lovers in the Tetsudou Musume series, and she comes with an entranced expression to show off that love! She also comes with a variety of optional parts including a lantern and a puppet of the Tobu Railway's main customer relations character, Nana Himemiya!

As with the previous figures in the series, she also includes a 'cardboard box train' which she can wear to pretend to be a train by herself, or instead she can make use of the included rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well! Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Sakura Monden who will be going on sale at the same time! ♪
name: Nendoroid Minami Kurihashi (ねんどろいど くりはしみなみ)

subtitle: A selection of new expressions for your Nendoroids!
description: The latest addition to the 'Nendoroid More' series is a collection of alternate expression parts! Bring out a whole new side of your favorite Nendoroid by giving them one of these nine special expressions to try on!

Some of the expressions were chosen from a selection sent in by fans, while others are by famous illustrators such as huke, CHANxCO and Jigoku no Misawa! Give your Nendoroids a whole new look, and create and enjoy all sorts of new situations!
* Images are for illustrative purposes only. The Nendoroid head parts and 'Nendoroid More: Dress-up Pajamas' are not included.
name: Nendoroid More: Face Swap (ねんどろいどもあ とりかえっこふぇいす)

subtitle: "Time for walkies... and we'll crush our enemies along the way! Woof!"
description: From the popular social game 'Rage of Bahamut' comes a 1/7th scale figure of the popular Demon-type character, Cerberus! The figure is based on the Legendary Card '[Tricepticanus Magica] Cerberus' illustrated by popular illustrator Mushimaro, and the unique atmosphere created by the card has been faithfully converted into figure form!

Cerberus' innocent expression and beautiful body are ready to charm anyone who comes her way, and her unique purple outfit as well as the golden ornaments that adorn it have been sculpted with the finest of detail. The gradient of her hair and skirt have also been fine-tuned to create a figure that fans will be proud to own.
name: Cerberus (けるべろす)

subtitle: "I'm slowly starting to understand how I can help."
description: From the popular action game 'GOD EATER 2' comes a Nendoroid of the popular heroine who debuted in the original game, Alisa! She is of course equipped with her 'God Arc' weapon, which comes in both its standard 'Blade Form', as well as its 'Gun Form' and 'Predator Form'! All the forms keep their imposing appearances even in the cute Nendoroid size!

But that's not all - she also comes with various other parts including the Aragami 'Ogretail', as well as three different expressions - her standard face, a shouting face for combat scenes and an embarrassed face! A huge collection of parts to help fans recreate their favorite scenes from the game, and experience the unique GOD EATER atmosphere in the cutest form ever!
name: Nendoroid Alisa Ilyinichna Omela (ねんどろいど ありさ・いりーにちな・あみえーら)

subtitle: Alright then... I hope you're ready!
description: From the anime 'Fantasista Doll' comes a 1/8th scale figure of one of the five girls that appeared from cards - the powerful leader type doll, Sasara! She has been sculpted in a dynamic pose wielding her rapier, with her long hair blowing around her. A special base made to look like swirling light is also included to display her on!
name: Sasara (ささら)
copyright: © 2013 ファンタジスタドールプロジェクト/FD製作委員会

subtitle: The limited edition of ClariS' third album will include their 4th Nendoroid Petite rendition!
description: ClariS' third album 'PARTY TIME' will feature the hit theme song for Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie -Rebellion-, 'Colorful' as well as the popular anime Nisekoi's first and second opening theme songs 'CLICK' and 'STEP' together with nine other tracks for a total of twelve great songs. The limited first edition of the album will also include ClariS' fourth Nendoroid set!
name: Nendoroid Petite: ClariS reunion Ver.

subtitle: The beautiful sorceress with unmatched magical prowess.
description: From the popular MMORPG 'Dragon Nest' comes a 1/8th scale of the popular character class, the Sorceress!

The figure is based on the official image illustration used for the sorceress class. She may look a little childish on the outside, but she has a mature expression on her face, and her lovely outfit shows off her beautiful skin, creating a very charming figure for fans to enjoy!
name: Sorceress (そーされす)
copyright:
©Shanda Games
©EYEDENTITY GAMES Inc. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The third set of figures to join the Petanko Mini series!
description: The cute sitting 'Petanko' series of chibi figures have been shrunk down to half their original size to create the Petanko Mini! trading figure series!

The third set of figures to join the series come from the popular anime 'Fate/Zero', featuring 10 characters to collect: Saber, Saber: Armor Ver., Irisviel, Illyasviel, Kariya Matou, Lancer, Archer, Rin Tohsaka, Waver and Sola-Ui. Be sure to collect and display them all!
name: Petanko Mini! Trading Figures: Fate/Zero (ぺたんこみにっ！ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ ふぇいと/ぜろ)

subtitle: The innocent looking vampire girl is being rereleased!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a rerelease of the 1/8th scale Shinobu Oshino - the vampire responsible for biting Araragi. The pose is based on the package illustration of the sixth volume of the Blu-Ray & DVD cover.

She is posed seated on a mountain of doughnuts and various other trademark items from all the other characters in the series. She has a cute expression across her face as she stares ahead with a doughnut in her mouth. The whole figure is filled with highlights for fans of the series!
name: Shinobu Oshino (おしのしのぶ)

She is based on an illustration by popular illustrator CHANxCO, and while she is designed to float in a bath or pool, she can also totter slowly along the ground by using the wind-up motor built into her design. Shimakaze is clearly enjoying floating around in her repairs bucket, and fans are sure to enjoy her company just as much!
name: Bath Time Collection: Shimakaze (おふろこれくしょん しまかぜ)
copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: figma Shimakaze and Rensouhou-chan, ready for deployment!
description: From the popular browser game 'Kantai Collection ~KanColle~' comes a figma of the destroyer class ship, Shimakaze!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: a standard expression, an embarrassed 'damaged' expression and a confident expression.
Three different sized versions of Rensouhou-chan cannons are included, the largest of which is articulated!
The five-tube torpedo launcher on her back can be attached and removed.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

copyright: ©2013 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The long-awaited rerelease of Nendoroid MEIKO! ♪

She comes with various optional parts such as a mike, mike stand and even a lower body part which allows you to display her in the dynamic pose from the packaging of the software! She also comes with a extra parts that allow you to give her a drunk look - as all fans will know, MEIKO loves her alcohol! Just pick the situation that you think suits her best!

description: The latest version of Racing Miku illustrated by Oguchi has been transformed into an A3 size selection of large stickers! You can use the stickers to add a Racing Miku theme to your own car or motorbike, or stick them on anything else that you think needs some Racing Miku flair! You can even create your own custom cheering goods for the GSR team!
The stickers stick onto most surfaces with ease, and are made from high quality materials to endure the weather and ensure the color will not fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Big Sticker Set 007: GSR Hatsune Miku BMW 2014 ver. (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっぐさいずすてっかー007／GSR はつねみく BMW 2014ver.)

subtitle: The gentle little sister, always thinking of her brother.

She has a loving expression and innocent appearance which is contrasted by the rather sexy outfit and pose she is posed in. Her loose pajamas show off her impressive bust and style - ready to capture your heart!
name: Suguha Kirigaya (きりがや すぐは)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: Learn hiragana and katakana with Mirai and friends!
description: Moekana are a set of cards to help folks learn the basic Japanese syllabary: hiragana and katakana.
The cards feature Mirai Suenaga, Haruka Suenaga and Kanata Hoshikawa who are mascot characters of the TV show and website produced by Danny Choo called Culture Japan.
The second edition of Moekana includes Katakana with revamped illustrations that now include the rest of the Culture Japan team who are Eiji Seiun, Kizuna Yumeno, Chitose Shirasawa and Retrokyu.

The pack of 56 different moekana cards feature cute kawaii illustrations by the Japanese artist Ikkyuu - the adorable artwork alone is enough to help learners learn hiragana & katakana but there are many ways one can also use the cards to start learning Japanese.

subtitle: More metal charms featuring lines from the series!
description: From the anime with a needlessly impressive staff line-up, 'wooser's hand to mouth life: awakening arc' comes another two metal straps featuring lines from the series - another of wooser and one of Darth wooser!
name: wooser Metal Strap C & Darth wooser Metal Strap A (うーさーめたるすとらっぷC、だすうさめたるすとらっぷA)

subtitle: The beautiful successor of the Mizuhara Dojo.

features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

She comes with both a smiling expression and a serious expression.
Her reliable sword and its scabbard are both included to help you recreate amazing scenes.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hazuki Mizuhara (ふぃぐま みずはらはづき)

subtitle: "Woohoo! This is great!!"
description: From the anime series 'GIRLS und PANZER' comes a figma of Yukari Akiyama from the Ankou Team!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

name: figma Yukari Akiyama (ふぃぐま あきやまゆかり)

subtitle: Akagi, Bath Time Collection - ready for deployment!
description: From the popular 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes the long-awaited first in the Bath Time Collection series of toys - Akagi!

She is based on an illustration by popular illustrator CHANxCO, and while she is designed to float in a bath or pool, she can also speed along the ground as well using the wind-up motor built into her design. Akagi is sprawled out on the ship deck, making sure nobody can touch her previous rice! Be sure to enjoy her company in the bath or anywhere else!

copyright: ©2014 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Version 2.0 of the electronic diva is being rereleased!
description: "The updated version of the world's most famous electronic diva is being rereleased! Nendoroid Hatsune Miku 2.0 is back again! Miku 2.0 comes with both the winking expression and the excited expression that featured in the opening movie of the 'Hatsune Miku and Future Stars Project mirai' game.

She also comes with all new optional parts such as a keyboard and a guitar for some brand new poses, and even comes with some alternate parts that allow you to pose her sitting down! It's the same Miku everyone has come to love with an extra touch! She also still comes with her famous leeks! ♪"
name: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku 2.0 (ねんどろいど はつねみく 2.0)

subtitle: From the Walking Dead TV Series comes figures of Michonne's pet zombies!
description: From the TV Series that began airing in 2010 and instantly became a worldwide hit, 'The Walking Dead' comes a figure of the powerful swordswoman Michonne's red pet zombie.

subtitle: The fastest songstress on the racing circuit, Racing Miku 2013 ver.!
description: GSR&Studie with TeamUKYO took part in the GT300 class races of one Japan's most well known motor races, the SUPER GT 2013, and they finished the season in third place! The main mascot character for the team is of course Racing Miku, who has been sculpted in a 1/8th scale for fans of both Miku and the racing team to enjoy.

Racing Miku 2013 was illustrated by saitom with costume design by Mari Shimazaki - both of their unique touches have been preserved on the figure to bring a high quality design and sculpt that fans will be proud to own!

subtitle: "So... you were able to see my potential? It seems you also possess the 'vision'..."
description: From the social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a figma of Ranko Kanzaki!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included - her standard expression, a confident expression and a pouting expression.
Optional parts include her beloved umbrella, as well as her spellbook.

subtitle: "I love you, so I want to protect you!"
description: From the original anime series 'Fantasista Doll' comes a Nendoroid of one of the five girls that appeared before Uzume - the leader type doll, Sasara! She comes with three different expression parts including her standard smiling face, a combat face and a winking face.

Optional parts include her fencing sword as well as kneeling parts to recreate the popular scene from the series. Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Uzume Uno to recreate even more scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Sasara (ねんどろいど ささら)
copyright: ©2013 ファンタジスタドールプロジェクト/FD製作委員会

subtitle: The fourth Nendoroid in the Bakemonogari series is Nadeko!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a Nendoroid of the girl with a snake wrapped around her - Nadeko Sengoku! She comes with three expressions including her standard expression, an unsure embarrassed expression and a bright smiling expression!

Her trademark large hat as well as the coat she wears on her shoulders are both included and can be attached and removed whenever you like, allowing you to recreate all sorts of different scenes from the series! She also comes with other optional parts including a swimsuit and sitting parts! Be sure to display her with the other characters from the series to fully bring out the Bakemonogatari universe!
name: Nendoroid Nadeko Sengoku (ねんどろいど せんごくなでこ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

subtitle: The girl chosen by 'The Star' Tarot card.
description: From the anime series 'Day Break Illusion' comes a Nendoroid of the character who holds the power of The Star's elemental tarot, Seira Hoshikawa!

Seira comes with two completely separate head parts, allowing you to display her in both her standard and transformed versions! She also comes with 'The Star' tarot card as well as her weapon, the Crystal Bow, allowing you to pose her in all sorts of scenes from the series. Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Akari Taiyo!
name: Nendoroid Seira Hoshikawa (ねんどろいど ほしかわせいら)

subtitle: "You were born to meet me."
description: From the third movie in the Rebuild of Evangelion series, "Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo" comes a figure of EVA Unit-13's pilot, Kaworu Nagisa.

The mysterious charm of the beautiful Kaworu has been captured by sculptor 'Hiroshi' - even preserving the delicate atmosphere that accompanies Kaworu's character. Everything from his stunning body-line to his gentle eyes have been carefully sculpted for Evangelion and Kaworu fans to enjoy for years to come!
name: Kaworu Nagisa (なぎさかをる)

subtitle: The COMBAT ARMORS MAX series is finally ready for deployment!
description: From the anime series 'Fang of the Sun Dougram' comes Max Factory's first ever plastic model kit - the main mecha from the series, Dougram!
features: This model kit makes use of snap-fit connections, glue is not required for assembly.
Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
The special cockpit canopy comes in three forms: articulated or fixed in either open or closed form.
Includes the 'Turbo Pack' and 'Linear Cannon' armaments.
The various markings on the Dougram are included as water-application decals.
The box art features illustrations by Hidetaka Tenjin.
name: COMBAT ARMORS MAX 01: 1/72nd Scale Combat Armor Dougram (こんばっと あーまーず まっくす01 1/72 すけーる こんばっとあーまー だぐらむ)

subtitle: The cheese loving Puella Magi is joining the Nendoroids!
description: From the popular anime movie 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie Rebellion' comes a Nendoroid of the newest character in the series, Nagisa Momoe, wearing her Puella Magi outfit! Optional parts include her trumpet weapon with effect parts, as well as her beloved cheese! Dessert Familiars are also included!
She also comes with three expressions including her standard smiling face, an expression with an open mouth and a Bebe expression. You can easily create cute battle scenes from the series! ♪
name: Nendoroid Nagisa Momoe (ねんどろいど ももえなぎさ)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie -Rebellion-

subtitle: From the Walking Dead TV Series comes figures of Michonne's pet zombies!
description: From the TV Series that began airing in 2010 and instantly became a worldwide hit, 'The Walking Dead' comes a figure of the powerful swordswoman Michonne's green pet zombie.

The realistic soft simulated skin gives a seamless appearance, and the details on the fleshy wounds and texture of the bag and jeans are all very high quality, creating a faithful rendition from the series!
name: The Walking Dead Michonne's Pet 1 (Green) (うぉーきんぐ・でっど みしょーんのペっと１（ぐりーん）)
copyright: © 2013 AMC Film Holdings LLC. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Saber Alter, tainted with darkness - and wearing a dark yukata to match!
description: From the popular series Fate/stay night comes a figure of the darker form of the series' main heroine, tainted by darkness - Saber Alter! She is posed wearing a dark blue yukata holding a sparkler in her one hand while gazing ahead with a listless expression on her face. It's a figure filled with beauty and character, that fans of the series shouldn't miss out on!

She's also the fifth in the set of 'Fate/stay night' Y-STYLE yukata figures, each with a unique charm that was never really experienced in the original series. Be sure to display all the Fate/stay girls in the yukata series together for a lovely matching collection!
name: Saber Alter: Yukata Ver. (せいばーおるた ゆかたVer.)

subtitle: Emile is joining the long-awaited HALO series!
description: From HALO Reach comes an articulated figure of Emile, the merciless warrior. He may have a bit of a vulgar personality, but he is respected by his peers and known to be a powerful fighter. His trademark skull helmet and the kurki knife on his right shoulder have been faithfully preserved on the figure, and threeA's unique weathered paintwork shows the harsh reality of the battlefield.
name: HALO Reach A239 Emile Spartan-III (へいろー りーち A239 えみーる すぱるたんすりー)

subtitle: The web-slinging Nendoroid hero is being rereleased!
description: The world-famous Spider-Man joined the Nendoroids as a fully posable figure wearing his newly designed outfit from 'The Amazing Spider-Man' - and due to popular demand he is being rerelased! His entire outfit has both the spiderweb texture and appearance that fans have come to love.

Spider-Man also comes with a few optional extras, such as parts to display him shooting his web as well as a suction cup that attaches to the support prop for even more poses. He also comes with a special dioramic pedestal that allows you to display him swinging above the city, watching over the citizens of New York!
name: Nendoroid Spider-Man: Hero's Edition (ねんどろいど すぱいだーまん ひーろーず・えでぃしょん)
copyright:
Spider-Man, the Character TM & © 2012 Marvel Characters, Inc.
The Amazing Spider-Man, the Movie © 2012 Columbia Pictures
Industries, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: "I promise you, I will drive the Titans to extinction!"
description: From the anime 'Attack on Titan' comes a figma of mankind's strongest soldier, Levi!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
Three expressions are included: His standard face, an expression with clenched teeth ready for combat and a cold-hearted expression perfect for Levi.
His dual blades are included for combat scenes, along with his Vertical Maneuvering Equipment and effects parts.
Special hand parts to display Levi holding the blades in his trademark reverse grip are also included.
The hooks connected to a wire that shoot out from the equipment are also included, along with his Scouting Legion mantle.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Levi (ふぃぐま りう゛ぁい)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社/「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: The adorable optimist who loves fairy tales!
description: From the popular anime series 'Little Busters! ~Refrain~' comes a Nendoroid of the spirited girl who loves candy and fairy tales - Komari Kamikita! She comes with three expressions including her standard expression, a gentle smiling expression as well a chibi expression.

Her cute twin-tails as well as the long ribbons that tie them up can be posed at various angles, allowing for various dynamic poses. She also comes with sitting parts allowing you to recreate the scene with her legs curled up to the side, based on one of the popular illustrations from the original game! Komari-chan also comes with a donut and sucker to satisfy her love for sweet things! Be sure to display her with the previously released Kudryavka Noumi and Rin Natsume!
name: Nendoroid Komari Kamikita (ねんどろいど かみきたこまり)

subtitle: The head of the Neighbor's Club with amazing looks, but far too many other problems!
description: From the comedy series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT' comes a figure of the main heroine, Yozora Mikaduki! She is wearing a dark red leotard with kitty ears and a tail, in a lovely 1/7th scale for fans to enjoy!

She is sculpted in a cute cat pose with a slightly embarrassed expression on her face - a different feeling to the moody expressions she normally shows. Be sure to display her with Sena Kashiwazaki who will be on sale at the same time, as well as with the previously released Maria Takayama and Kobato Hasegawa!
name: Yozora Mikaduki: Cat Costume Ver. (みかつきよそら きゃっとこすちゅーむVer.)
series: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
copyright: ©2013 平坂読・株式会社KADOKAWA メディアファクトリー刊／製作委員会は友達が少ないNEXT

subtitle: "Don't you forget! Because you won't find many women as good as me!"
description: From the anime film 'Macross Frontier The Movie: The False Songstress' comes a 1/7th scale figure of one of the main heroines, Sheryl Nome! The pose and base are both based on the main visual illustration used for the movie when it first released in cinemas in 2009 - the unique design has been carefully sculpted into a truly dynamic and detailed figure for fans to enjoy.

The figure is filled with a number of highlights such as the huge gears that spin around her, the sorrowful expression across her face and the various parts of her alternating black and white outfit as they all twist together. The 'Galactic Songstress' is ready to capture the hearts of all who lay eyes on her!
name: Sheryl Nome (しぇりる・のーむ)
series: Macross Frontier The Movie: The False Songstress
copyright: © 2009 ビックウエスト／劇場版マクロスＦ製作委員会

subtitle: "I'll become the world's best Hunter, and then I'll be back!"
description: From the popular anime 'HUNTER x HUNTER' comes a rerelease of the series' main character - figma Gon Freecss!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with both a friendly smiling expression and a valiant shouting expression.
Eleven different hand parts are included, which include hands to recreate the rock-paper-scissors from the series.
The backpack he carried around with him everywhere, two fishing rods as well as a glass to recreate the water divination scenes are all included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Gon Freecss (ふぃぐま ごん=ふりーくす)
copyright: © POT（冨樫義博）1998年-2011年© VAP・日本テレビ・集英社・マッドハウス

subtitle: "Hyaha! Lemme open up some keyholes in ya stomach!"
description: From the popular game 'Eiyuu*Senki GOLD' comes a figure of the USA gunner, 'Billy the Kid' wearing a micro bikini showing off loads of skin for fans to enjoy! Billy the Kid was voted as the most popular character in the 6th Eiyuu*Senki character popularity polls, and this figure has captured her energetic yet charming personality and looks perfectly!
She's posed holding a water pistol in a cute yet sexy pose, ready to aim straight at the hearts of all her fans!
name: Billy the Kid (びりー・ざ・きっど)
copyright: ©大槍葦人/英雄＊戦姫ＧＯＬＤ製作委員会  All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The patriotic armor used by Tony Stark's close friend.
description: From the popular film 'Iron Man 3' comes a Nendoroid of the Iron Patriot! The unique design and coloring based on the American flag have been faithfully preserved in Nendoroid form, and even shrunk down into chibi size the suit looks just as epic as ever!

The Nendoroid is fully articulated just like the other Iron Man figures, allowing you to pose various scenes from the series! A special base modeled off the climax scene is included to pose him on! Be sure to display him with the previously released Iron Man Mk.42 to recerate the Iron Man world in Nendoroid form!
name: Nendoroid Iron Patriot: Hero's Edition (ねんどろいど あいあん・ぱとりおっと ひーろーず・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: "… you're all perverts, aren't you?"
description: From the popular anime 'Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko' comes a figure of the young looking girl with cute short hair, Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi! She has been sculpted in a rather risque pose half way through getting dressed!

The shapely stomach you can see under her uniform as well as her modest bust have both been faithfully sculpted for fans to enjoy. The cute and cool Tsukiko is ready to keep you company whenever you need it!
name: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi (Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko)
copyright: ©2013 さがら総・メディアファクトリー／「変猫｡」製作委員会

subtitle: The girl chosen by 'The Sun' Tarot card.
description: From the anime series 'Day Break Illusion' comes a Nendoroid of the character who holds the power of The Sun's elemental tarot, Akari Taiyo!

She comes with an alternate expression as well as exchangeable hair parts allowing you to pose her in either her standard or transformed forms. Optional parts include her tarot card as well as her weapon, the rapier, allowing you to recreate combat scenes from the series too!
name: Nendoroid Akari Taiyo (ねんどろいど たいようあかり)

subtitle: The 2012 Hatsune Miku BMW in 1/43 scale!
description: The GSR Hatsune Miku BMW that took part in the 2012 SUPER GT300 has been shrunk down to 1/43 scale for everyone to enjoy!

The design features illustrations of Racing Miku 2012 ver. by GAN, with a unique color scheme that overflows with a feeling of speed and power! Even the sponsor logos have been faithfully shrunk down onto the miniature car's design. The body is made from high quality resin for a glamorous look made to last.
name: 1/43 GSR Hatsune Miku BMW 2012: Season Opening ver. (1/43 GSR はつねみく BMW 2012かいまくver.)
copyright: ©GAN / Crypton Future Media, INC.The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: "That's why I'm glad that I became a Puella Magi. I really am."
description: From the movies released in 2012, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie: The Beginning Story / The Everlasting' comes a scale figure of Kaname Madoka in her Puella Magi outfit. The figure is a complete rendition of the key visual for the movie, originally illustrated by character designer Ume Aoki. The sculpting work is by Hiroshi (Sakurazensen), the same sculptor who brought you the 1/8th scale Ultimate Madoka. It's a figure filled with amazing detail for fans to enjoy.
name: Kaname Madoka ~The Beginning Story / The Everlasting~ (かなめまどか はじまりのものがたり/えいえんのものがたり)
series: Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie: The Beginning Story / The Everlasting

subtitle: Cute sitting figures in miniature size!
description: The cute sitting 'Petanko' series of chibi figures have been shrunk down to half their original size to create the Petanko Mini! trading figure series!

The second set of figures to join the series come from the popular anime 'Sword Art Online', featuring 10 characters to collect: Kirito, Asuna, Asuna: Starting Equipment Ver., Yui, Silica, Lizbeth, Sachi, Agil, Klein and Heathcliff. Be sure to collect and display them all!
name: Petanko Mini! Trading Figures: Sword Art Online (ぺたんこみにっ！ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ そーどあーと・おんらいん)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: "Mankind's counterattack… begins now!"
description: A second release of figma Eren Yaeger from the anime series 'Attack on Titan'!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
He comes with three expressions including his standard determined face, an angry face and a shocked face.
His dual blades are included for combat scenes, along with his Vertical Maneuvering Equipment and smoke effects to recreate its use.
The hooks connected to a wire that shoot out from the equipment are also included, along with his Scouting Legion mantle.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Eren Yeager (ふぃぐま えれん・いぇーがー)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: The fourth charm in wooser's series!
description: From the anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc' comes another lucky charm! This charm is a charm of health, which will ensure you won't get sick or injured... probably! Be sure to keep a look out for the other charms in the series too, and find the one that suits you best!
name: Not-so-Blessed wooser Charm of Health (ごりやくがあるきがしない うーさーおまもり むびょうそくさいVer.)

subtitle: The sole survivor of the Kurta clan, who proudly fights for his friends.
description: From the anime 'Hunter x Hunter' comes a rerelease of figma Curarpickt, the Hunter with 'scarlet eyes'!

*This page previously incorrectly stated there were three expressions included with this figma. This was incorrect and has been corrected to 'two'. We apologise for any inconvenience caused by this error.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Two expressions are included: a standard expression and an angry expression showing his scarlet eyes.
Parts to recreate three of his Nen abilities are included: Chain Jail, Judgement Chain and Dowsing Chain!
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Curarpickt (ふぃぐま くらぴか)
copyright: © POT（冨樫義博）1998年-2011年 ©VAP・日本テレビ・集英社・マッドハウス

subtitle: The GSR ProjectMirai BMW in 1/43 scale!
description: The 2012 racing season featured two cars as a part of the Hatsune Miku GT Project, one of which was created in collaboration with the 'Hatsune Miku and FutureStars Project mirai' game - the GSR ProjectMirai BMW! The complete design of the car has now been shrunk down to 1/43 scale for all to own and enjoy!

The car features illustrations from the game with a cute and colorful design sure to brighten any day, and all the details of the official design at the start of the season have been faithfully included on the model - even the sponsor logos! The body is made from high quality resin for a glamorous look made to last.
name: 1/43 GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012: Season Opening ver. (1/43 GSR ProjectMirai BMW 2012かいまくver.)
series: Hatsune Miku and FutureStars Project mirai
copyright: ©SEGA ©Crypton Future Media, INC.　Design Assistance: Nendoroid The BMW logo, the BMW wordmark and BMW model designations are Trademarks of　BMW AG and are used under license.

subtitle: The darker version of the 'Sword of the Godslayer'.
description: From the latest in the BlazBlue game series 'BlazBlue: Chronophantasma' comes a dynamically posed figure of Mu-12, Noel's awakened form as the successor to the True Azure. This 'Black Ver.' features an alternate, darker color variation. Her long hair, slim yet well-built body and all the details of the cross between girl and machine have been carefully sculpted into figure form. The two metallic parts floating by her side are an additional highlight that bring even more to the figure.
It's the same beautiful figure with a darker appearance and more contrast that fans are sure to enjoy!
name: Mu-12: Black Ver. (μ-No.12- （みゅーとゅえるぶ）ぶらっくVer.)

subtitle: The Sylvan girl with both strength and beauty
description: From the anime 'Sword Art Online' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the heroine of the Fairy Dance arc, Leafa!

She is posed with sword in hand in a dynamic pose with her ponytail and outfit blowing in the wind as she dances around the battlefield. A beautiful base that captures the Sword Art Online universe is also included to display her on.
name: Sword Art Online Fairy Dance Arc: Leafa (そーどあーと・おんらいん ふぇありぃ・だんすへん りーふぁ)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: The Blu Robot Heavy from Team Fortress 2!
description: From the popular team-based FPS multiplayer game 'Team Fortress 2' comes a figure of the Robot Heavy that was a part of the August 2012 update which introduced the 'Mann vs Machine' mode to the game. The figure is available in both RED and BLU color schemes. The figure boasts over 30 points of articulation, illuminated blue LED eyes and includes the Heavy's signature Minigun weapon.
Get ready to blow away the enemy team with the unstoppable power of the Heavy!
name: Team Fortress 2: Blue Robot Heavy (＜ちーむ ふぉーとれす2 ろぼっと へう゛ぃ ぶるー＞ ちーむ ふぉーとれす2 ろぼっとへう゛ぃぶるー)

subtitle: The Red Robot Heavy from Team Fortress 2!
description: From the popular team-based FPS multiplayer game 'Team Fortress 2' comes a figure of the Robot Heavy that was a part of the August 2012 update which introduced the 'Mann vs Machine' mode to the game. The figure is available in both RED and BLU color schemes. The figure boasts over 30 points of articulation, illuminated red LED eyes and includes the Heavy's signature Minigun weapon.
Get ready to blow away the enemy team with the unstoppable power of the Heavy!
name: Team Fortress 2: Red Robot Heavy (＜ちーむ ふぉーとれす2 ろぼっと へう゛ぃ れっど＞ ちーむ ふぉーとれす2 ろぼっとへう゛ぃれっど)

subtitle: The return of the mysterious yellow creature who lives on the Internet!
description: Lovely and yet filled with darkness... seems to act cool but actually just apathetic... the mysterious yellow creature is back! wooser's not-really-heartwarming series of short animations has returned, as he continues to strive for nothing but his own desires.

Just like the first season, the awakening arc DVD features a needlessly impressive staff line-up, and contains all 12 episodes of the season! It also includes mini plushies of both Ajipon and The-Creature-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named as extras! Don't miss out!
name: wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc: DVD + Ajipon & The-Creature-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named Mini Plushie Set (うーさーのそのひぐらし かくせいへん DVD＋あじぽん＆なまえをよんではいけないあのどうぶつぬいぐるみぷちせっと)

subtitle: The ex-assassin who travels together with Gon!
description: From the anime 'Hunter x Hunter' comes a rerelease of figma Killua Zaoldyeck, Gon's closest friend!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with both his standard expression and a confident glaring expression.
A number of hand parts, his favorite skateboard as well as a glass to recreate the water divination scenes are all included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Killua Zaoldyeck (ふぃぐま きるあ＝ぞるでぃっく)
copyright: ©POT（冨樫義博）1998年-2011年©VAP・日本テレビ・集英社・マッドハウス

subtitle: The third charm in wooser's series!
description: From the anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc' comes another lucky charm! This charm is a charm of realization ready to make all your dreams come true... probably! Be sure to keep a look out for the other charms in the series too, and find the one that suits you best!
name: Not-so-Blessed wooser Charm of Realization (ごりやくがあるきがしない うーさーおまもり たいがんじょうじゅVer.)

subtitle: Transformable Getter Machines from the classic Getter Robo!
description: From the classic super robot series 'Getter Robo' comes a set of the Getter Machines that can all transform just like the series!

The red Eagle, the white Jaguar and the yellow Boar are all included, and can be combined together to recreate Getter-1, Getter-2 and Getter-3! They're small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, but still fitted with loads of joints for all kinds of unique poses!
name: Dynamic Change Getter Robo (だいなみっくちぇんじ げったーろぼ)
copyright: © 永井豪・石川賢／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: "I'll work as hard as I can, so that everyone can keep on smiling!"
description: From the popular social game 'THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Uzuki Shimamura wearing her 'New Generation' outfit!

She has a huge smile on her face bringing out her cheerful personality, and the cute pink stage outfit has been sculpted down to the finest of details for fans to enjoy! She also comes with two different expressions for fans to choose from - you can choose to enjoy her cheerful smile either with closed eyes to recreate the original illustration, or instead use the alternate version with open eyes!
name: Uzuki Shimamura: New Generation Ver. (しまむらうづき にゅーじぇねれーしょんVer.)

subtitle: The race that harnesses the power of souls.
description: From the popular online RPG 'Lineage II' comes a 1/7th scale figure of one of the playable races in the game, the Kamael! The figure faithfully depicts the class based on one of the image illustrations from the game, which shows off the impressive single wing as well as her stunning body and unique armor all at once.

The figure is filled with highlights for fans to enjoy, from her cunning smile with a seductive charm to it, to her beautiful wings which make partial use of clear parts and even her intricate armor which has been sculpted and painted down to the smallest of details! Her beauty is sure to charm anyone who looks upon her!
name: Kamael (かまえる)

subtitle: A mouse with a cheeky smile… but this kind of mouse is more than welcome!
description: Super Sonico has been sculpted as a 1/7th scale figure wearing a cute mouse outfit! She is posed leaning on some cheese with a smile on her face and her tongue sticking out to the side! The figure is a long-awaited sculpt based on an illustration that was used for a collaboration laptop cover!

Her ears and tail are covered in a flock material for a rather unique fuzzy feeling, and Mouse Sonico's favorite cheese creates a large stand for her to kneel and lean on! The gentle smile is contrasted by her sexy outfit and bold pose - ready to be enjoyed by fans all over!
name: Super Sonico: Mouse ver. (すーぱーそにこ まうすver.)

subtitle: The UK's Representative Candidate, dressed up in a dazzling bikini!
description: From the anime series 'IS (Infinite Stratos)' comes a figure of the United Kingdom's IS Representative Candidate, Cecilia Alcott!

Cecilia has been sculpted wearing a trim blue bikini, looking a little embarrassed to be showing off her glamorous body. Her pareo can be attached and removed, allowing for two different ways to display her!
name: Cecilia Alcott: Swimsuit Ver. (せしりあ・おるこっと みずぎVer.)

subtitle: The Beastmaster, 'Dragon Tamer Silica'!
description: From the popular anime series 'Sword Art Online' comes a figure of the Beastmaster, Silica! She is posed holding a dagger in her one hand with her tamed Feathery Dragon, 'Pina' clinging to her other arm. Pina herself is placed in a dynamic pose that really brings the figure together!
Be sure to display them together with the previously announced Asuna figure to bring out even more of the SAO world!
name: Silica (しりか)
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: The long awaited transformable robots from the Getter Robo sequel!
description: From the classic super robot series 'Getter Robo G' comes a set of transformable Getter Robos similar to those previously released from the first season!

The set includes Dragon, Liger and Poseidon and each can be transformed and connected together to form 'Star Dragon', 'Star Arrow' and 'Star Poseidon'! They're small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, but still amazingly detailed and easily transformable! A must-have for all Getter Robo fans!
name: Dynamic Change Getter Robo G (だいなみっくちぇんじ げったーろぼG)
copyright: ©永井豪・石川賢／ダイナミック企画

subtitle: The songstress has changed from her stage outfit into a beautiful yukata!
description: From the popular series 'Guilty Crown' comes a figure of the main heroine and vocalist of EGOIST, Inori Yuzuriha! She has been sculpted wearing a beautiful orange yukata with a listless expression that captures her mysterious character.

The yukata gives her a more mature look than usual, which is contrasted by the bright colors to capture Inori in a beauitful scene. In her hand she holds a fan featuring the 'EGOIST' logo, bringing out the Guilty Crown universe for fans to enjoy.
name: Inori Yuzuriha: Yukata Ver. (ゆずりはいのり ゆかたVer.)
copyright: ©ギルティクラウン製作委員会

subtitle: Sasami-san, even unmotivated while wearing a yukata?
description: From the popular series 'Sasami-san@Ganbaranai' comes a figure of the main character, Sasami Tsukuyomi, wearing a beautiful yukata! Sasami-san is a shut-in that relies on her older brother to take care of her, but she is also the 'Tsukuyomi Miko', with the power of the Supreme God within her!

Although she is usually highly unmotivated to do much, this time she tried a little harder than usual and dressed up in a yukata for fans to enjoy! Her unkempt hair and playful pose capture her personality in figure form, and the details on her yukata are worthy of the 'Tsukuyomi Miko'. Enjoy the adorable Sasami-san by your side from any angle you choose!
name: Sasami Tsukuyomi: Yukata Ver. (つくよみ ささみ ゆかたVer.)
copyright: ©日日日・小学館／製作委員会@がんばらない

subtitle: Tama-nee is showing off some skin while wearing a beautiful yukata!
description: From AQUAPLUS's popular game 'ToHeart2' comes a figure of Tamaki Kousaka, better known as Tama-nee, wearing a yukata already ready for the Summer! The yukata has a lovely indigo blue color and is covered with hydrangea prints giving her a rather mature air.

The yukata has been removed at her shoulders, showing off her generous bust for fans to enjoy! She's also posed holding a folding fan in her hand, lightly touching it to her mouth with a charming expression that gently invites anyone to enjoy her company.
name: Tamaki Kousaka: Yukata Ver. (こうさかたまき ゆかたVer.)

subtitle: She'd be a perfect beauty... if it wasn't for her personality!
description: From the comedy series 'Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT' comes a figure of one of the heroines, Sena Kashiwazaki! She is wearing a cute pink leotard with kitty ears and a tail, in a lovely 1/7th scale for fans to enjoy!

Her impressive body and unique style have been faithfully preserved, and she is posed looking ahead with a confident smile on her face as she plays around with her tail. Be sure to display her with Yozora Mikaduki who will be on sale at the same time, as well as with the previously released Maria Takayama and Kobato Hasegawa!
name: Sena Kashiwazaki: Cat Costume Ver. (かしわざきせな きゃっとこすちゅーむVer.)
series: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
copyright: ©2013 平坂読・株式会社KADOKAWA メディアファクトリー刊／製作委員会は友達が少ないNEXT

subtitle: "I've finally found it! My way of the tank!"
description: From the anime series 'GIRLS und PANZER' comes a figma of the Ankou Team's commander, Miho Nishizumi!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a gentle smiling expression, a slightly worried expression and a shouting expression.
Optional parts include her microphone, binoculars, and alternate hair parts wearing a headset.
A commander's seat and tank cupola are also included.
An articulated figma stand is included.
name: figma Miho Nishizumi (ふぃぐま にしずみみほ)

subtitle: Your friendly guide to the world of Altera!
description: From the popular MMORPG 'Dragon Nest' comes a Nendoroid of the idol-like NPC, Irine!

You can pose her in many cute poses from the game, such as waving her hands as she sees the player off with a smile, or sending out some encouragement by blowing her trumpet! subtitle: The white rabbit that wanders the Frozen Sea.
description: From the Nintendo 3DS exclusive game 'Monster Hunter 4' comes a Nendoroid of a female hunter wearing the Lagombi equipment made from the 'White Rabbit Beast', Lagombi! The unique design of the armor has been made even cuter to suit the Nendoroid's chibi size!

Two weapons are included with the Nendoroid allowing you to switch between equipment - she comes with both the sturdy 'Frozen Core' hammer as well as the 'Lagomberator' Gunlance. She also comes with a Felyne comrade posed blowing on a horn to support the Hunter, and various optional parts including a bottle of Demondrug and various effect parts. All sorts of extras to help you recreate the Monster Hunter universe in Nendoroid size!
name: Nendoroid Hunter: Female - Lagombi Edition (ねんどろいど はんたー♀ うるく・えでぃしょん)

subtitle: Bright, cheerful and perfect for Spring!
description: Good Smile Company's lottery-based series of products is back to brighten up the Spring! This year's 'Good Smile Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2014 Spring Ver.' lottery will be available at FamilyMart convenience stores as well as TSUTAYA book stores across Japan.

The F-Prize is one of these rice bowl and chopstick sets perfect for the start of Spring! There are four different designs all with a Springtime theme, ensuring each and every meal is bright and enjoyable!
name: Rice Bowl Set (おちゃわんせっと)
copyright:

subtitle: The second charm in wooser's series, sure to make you rich in no time!
description: From the anime series that recently started its second season 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life: awakening arc' comes another lucky charm! This charm is a charm of money, ready to ensure you have good luck in all things economically related. If you keep it by your side you're sure to become rich in no time at all... probably!
Other charms will be joining this series in the future, so keep an eye out for the one that suits you best!
name: Not-so-Blessed wooser Charm of Money (ごりやくがあるきがしない うーさーおまもり きんうんじょうしょうVer.)

subtitle: Nendoroid Plus Touhou Rubber Straps
description: From the Touhou Project comes a set of Nendoroid Plus trading rubber straps. The cute illustrations based on Nendoroid designs have all been transformed into straps for fans to enjoy. There are a total of seven characters to collect, all from the top of the popularity rankings!
Keep the strap with you to be with your favourite character at all times!♪
