subtitle: Cute earphone jack figures from the SAO world!
description: From the anime series 'Sword Art Online' comes a set of four earphone jack accessories featuring small figures of Asuna, Asuna Titania Ver., Suguha and Leafa! Attach them to your smartphone or other device and enjoy the company of the characters lying or sitting comfortably by your side all day long!

The figures can be purchased separately, or as a complete set of four. The complete set will also include a special earphone jack holder stand to display them on - giving you the choice to either have them on display in your room or instead take them with you wherever you go! ♪
name: Sword Art Online Earphone Jack Figures (Set of 4) (そーど－あーと・おんらいん いやほんじゃっくふぃぎゅあ(4しゅせっと))
copyright: ©川原 礫／アスキー・メディアワークス／SAO Project

subtitle: Musashi's Vice Chancellor, aiming to succeed the title of 'Best of the East'
description: From the anime series 'Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere' comes a figma of Musashi Ariadust Academy's Vice Chancellor, Futayo Honda.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with her standard expression, a confident shouting expression and an embarrassed expression.
The Tonbokiri as well as an alternate sword are both included, and effect parts for the Tonbokiri allow for epic combat scenes.
Effect parts to display her using her 'Soaring Wings' ability are included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Futayo Honda (ふぃぐま ほんだ・ふたよ)
series: Horizon on the Middle of Nowhere
copyright: ©川上稔／アスキー・メディアワークス／境界線上のホライゾン製作委員会

subtitle: figma Akane is back, this time wearing her Palette suit! Ignition! Texture on!
description: From the anime series 'Vividred Operation' comes a figma of Akane Isshiki wearing her Palette Suit.
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: a cheerful smile, a shouting expression and a cute giggling expression.
Optional parts include her 'Naked Rang' weapon and booster effect parts for her feet.
Alternate front hair parts with her sunglasses attached are also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Akane Isshiki: Palette Suit ver. (いっしきあかね ぱれっとすーつver.)

The base pose features her wearing her school uniform, but the uniform can be removed to reveal a bright yellow swimsuit, allowing you to display her ready for the Summer! She also comes with both a smiling expression and a a face pulling a tongue, giving you even more choice as to how you want to display her! ♪

The C-Prize matches up with the Spring theme, as Rin and Len are sitting in tulips which act as coin jars - based on designs by popular illustrator Putidevil! Even if you don't need them as a coin jars, they're adorable enough to simply display as figures too!

The D-Prize is a set of two items based on designs by illustrator Asagiri! An adorable neck pillow based on Hatsune Miku together with an eye mask based on Megurine Luka! Use them at the office, on vacation... even at home! You'll be sure to get some comfortable rest!

description: Good Smile Company's lottery-based series of products is back to brighten up the Spring! This year's 'Good Smile Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2014 Spring Ver.' lottery will be available at FamilyMart convenience stores as well as TSUTAYA book stores across Japan.

The A-Prize this time around is Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Sailor Uniform Ver., based on a design by the popular illustrator 'tica85 bookstores'. As Spring is the season of graduations in Japan, she comes with a graduation certificate and tear drop sticker. Her bag, glasses and even a Nendoroid-sized grand piano are also all included to pose her in all sorts of school-related scenes. Two special display kits are also included, allowing you to pose her with a background of cherry trees or inside the classroom!

subtitle: "Hee, hee, hee! It's ready! My super special hex!"
description: From the Nintendo 3DS game, 'Fire Emblem: Awakening' comes a figure of the the Dark Mage who hails from Plegia, Tharja! She is posed as if in front of her most admired Avatar, with a sexy gaze and charming smile on her face.

Her proportions which are considered the 'best in the army' have also been faithfully kept in figure form, and she wears a regal cape which has been sculpted to help bring out her character even more. The stand also features intricate detail, with a large pile of magic books for her to lean on, with an ominous skull placed at the bottom to truly bring out the atmosphere of the Fire Emblem world!
name: Tharja (さーりゃ)

subtitle: Hatsune Miku is back in an all new outfit as a part of this year's Good Smile Kuji!
description: Good Smile Company's lottery-based series of products is back to brighten up the Spring! This year's 'Good Smile Kuji: Hatsune Miku 2014 Spring Ver.' lottery will be available at FamilyMart convenience stores as well as TSUTAYA book stores across Japan.
The B-Prize this time around is figma Hatsune Miku: Sailor Uniform ver. - a special version of Miku based on a design by the popular illustrator 'tica85 bookstores'.
features: The figma series' original joints allow for better articulation and all sorts of poses!
She comes with both her standard gentle expression, as well as a heartfelt smiling expression with optional tear stickers.
Her graduation certificate, school bag and glasses are all included.
An alternate front hair part allows you to display her wearing her red headphones.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hatsune Miku: Sailor Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま はつねみく せーらーふくver.)

subtitle: "It's about time for your injection!"
description: From the anime series 'Binbou-gami Ga!' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the God of Misfortune who keeps careful balance of happiness and unhappiness, Momoji! She is sculpted wearing the mini-shirt nurse outfit seem in the original manga, and the gigantic injection used to remove 'happiness energy' has been faithfully reproduced in figure form! Be sure to display her together with the previously announced Ichiko Sakura to complete the joint pose!
name: Momiji (もみじ)
copyright: ©助野嘉昭/集英社・「貧乏神が!」製作委員会

subtitle: From Hyperdimension Neptunia comes a Nendoroid of Neptune!
description: From the 'Hyperdimension Neptunia' anime series that aired in Summer 2013 comes a Nendoroid of Neptune! She is included as an extra with the 7th volume of the Blu-ray and DVD for the anime series! She is wearing her jumper skirt outfit and comes with two expressions - a standard smile and a chibi expression! Optional parts include a console controller allowing you to display her absorbed in a game!

- Other Extras - · Outer Case: 'Hyperdimension Case' · Special CD: Processor Disc · Point Ticket: 'Gold Venus ☆ Silver Venus' · Special N Case · Audio Commentary: 'Megami no Gyoukai Houdan' · 32P Booklet 'Dengeki Neptunia' · Game Card · Hyper Super Ultra Picture Label · Bonus Video

subtitle: Cycling apparel from 'Attack on Titan'!
description: From the popular anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes a set including a cycling jersey and bib shorts. Wear these as a proud member of the Scouting Legion and enjoy cycling even more!
■ Attack on Titan: Cycling Jersey ■ Attack on Titan: Cycling Bib Shorts
name: GSR Gear: Attack on Titan Series
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社/「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: If you're headed to the WonFes ocean then don't leave us out, okay?
description: From the popular game 'Kantai Collection -KanColle-' comes a set of the light cruisers Tenryuu & Tatsuta, joining the new 'Medicchu' series! The Medicchu series features larger figures than the Minicchu series, allowing for more detail to be added to the ship and weapon parts of the characters! The KanColle Medicchu series is also set to continue, so look forward to more!
name: Medicchu KanColle: Tenryuu & Tatsuta Set (かんたいこれくしょん -かんこれ-)
copyright: ©2013 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO / C2 / KADOKAWA All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: Commemorating ten years of May'n!
description: In commemoration of the upcoming 'May'n Road to 10th Anniversary Japan & World Tour 2014-2015 "dots and lines"' comes a Nendoroid of May'n herself! Her well-known hairstyle and trademark short pants have all been converted into Nendoroid size as accurately as possible for fans to enjoy!

Her microphone is included together with special hand parts based off actual poses from her live performances, allowing you to pose her ready to perform on stage! A hand towel from her live performances is also included for her to hold! On the other hand, she also comes with a delicious taiyaki allowing you to pose her as the (self-proclaimed) Goodwill Ambassador for Taiyaki! Simply choose between the serious or the more playful May'n whenever you like!
name: Nendoroid May'n (ねんどろいど めいん)

subtitle: The Winter Songstress is joining the figma series this Winter!
description: The famous Snow Miku that was changed into a Nendoroid for the Sapporo Snow Festival is finally becoming a figma too!
features: The newly designed original figma joints allow for better articulation, letting you create a cuter Miku than ever before!
She comes with an adorable smiling expression, a cheerful singing expression and a blushing expression.
An attachable scarf and gloves are included, and she also comes with a snowman mascot holding a microphone.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Snow Miku (ふぃぐま ゆきみく)

subtitle: I've got to do this. I'll have to think while I speak!
description: From the anime series 'Attack on Titan' comes a figma of Armin Arlert!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
He comes with three expressions including his standard determined face, an emotional shouting face and a worried expression.
His dual blades are included for combat scenes, along with his Vertical Maneuvering Equipment and smoke effects to recreate its use.
The hooks connected to a wire that shoot out from the equipment are also included, along with his Scouting Legion mantle.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Armin Arlert (ふぃぐま あるみん・あるれると)
copyright: ©諫山創・講談社／「進撃の巨人」製作委員会

subtitle: "Alright then... let's stop over at my place!"
description: Nendoroid Mami Tomoe is being release in her school uniform! She comes with two expressions as well as various other optional parts including her school bag a tea set based on the one in her room as well as an alternate lower body part which allows you to display her sitting down.
She also comes with parts to recreate the pose that starts her transformation scene in the anime, as well as her close friend 'Bebe' from the movie version.
name: Nendoroid Mami Tomoe: School Uniform Ver. (ねんどろいど ともえまみ せいふくVer.)

subtitle: The small and cute yet slightly strange characters as decals!
description: The characters of 'Puchimasu!' are all coming together as a set of water-application decals! You can change your favorite model car into an itasha of the series, or apply them to anything else to easily create some 'Puchimasu!' themed goods!
The quality of the decals is constantly undergoing improvements, making them more vibrant in color and less likely to fade than ever before. They are also made in Japan to ensure high quality.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 047: Puchimasu! (GSRきゃらくたー かすたまいずしりーず でかーる047／ぷちます！)

subtitle: GOODSMILE RACING's Cycling Apparel - even usable as everyday clothes!
description: A set of cycling apparel based on the SUPER GT racing team, GOODSMILE RACING! The design is simple yet effective, allowing you to easily coordinate it with other cycle wear!

· GOODSMILE RACING Cycling Jersey: BLACK Ver. · GOODSMILE RACING Back Pocket T-Shirt: WHITE Ver. · GOODSMILE RACING Cycling Windbreaker: BLACK Ver. · GOODSMILE RACING Cycling Bib Shorts · GOODSMILE RACING Bag
name: GOODSMILE RACING Cycle Series (「ぐっどすまいる れーしんぐ」さいくるしりーず)

subtitle: "I know I won't be popular... might as well become a Nendoroid."
description: From the anime series that many people are sure to sympathize with, 'Watashi ga Motenai no wa dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!' comes a Nendoroid of the main character of the series, Tomoko Kuroki! She can be posed in various popular scenes from the series such as the famous panties tearing scene, or holding her Handy Massage Machine and 'Nude Butlers' game.

These optional parts together with her rather unique expressions allow for all sorts of fun poses for fans to enjoy! A piece of paper with 'Reality' written on it is also included as a special Nendoroid-only part for her to rip apart! Mokocchi's really hoping you'll give her some attention!
name: Nendoroid Tomoko Kuroki (ねんどろいど くろきともこ)
series: Watashi ga Motenai no wa dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
copyright: ©谷川ニコ/スクウェアエニックス・「ワタモテ」製作委員会

subtitle: The 'summoner' who must save the world.
description: From the anime series 'DEVIL SURVIVOR 2 THE ANIMATION' comes a Nendoroid of the main character, Hibiki Kuze! He comes with two expressions including a confident 'summoner' expression as well as the gentle smile he always showed when talking with Daichi or Io.

He comes with various optional parts including his cellphone, his primary demon Byakko and even summoning effect parts, which altogether allow you to pose him in the demon summoning scene from the series! Alternate head parts allowing you to display him wearing the hood on his trademark bunny-ear hoodie are also included, giving you even more options to choose from!
name: Nendoroid Hibiki Kuze (ねんどろいど くぜひびき)
copyright: ©Index Corporation/「デビルサバイバー2」アニメーション製作委員会

subtitle: Following on from  (the childhood friend) Chiwa comes (the girlfriend?) Masuzu!
description: From the popular anime series 'Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru' comes a figure of the 'girlfriend' with long silver hair and beautiful blue eyes, Masuzu Natsukawa! She is sculpted in a gentle walking pose with her long hair and skirt gently fluttering about around her as she stares directly into your eyes! Be sure to display her with the previously announced Chiwa Harusaki!
name: Masuzu Natsukawa (なつかわ ますず)
series: Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru

subtitle: The idols are back, this time wearing their 'Million Dreams' stage outfits!
description: The popular Nendoroid Petites from 'THE IDOLM@STER 2' are back again, this time featuring the idols in their 'Million Dreams' outfits! The set includes seven idols including Haruka Amami, Chihaya Kisaragi, Makoto Kikuchi, Yayoi Takatsuki, Mami Futami, Takane Shijou and Ritsuko Akizuki. The alternate colored outfits will help you produce your cutest concert ever!
name: Nendoroid Petite: THE IDOLM@STER 2 Million Dreams Ver. - Stage 01 (ねんどろいどぷち あいどるますたー２ みりおんどりーむす Ver. すてーじ01)

subtitle: The P-Body from Portal 2, the sequel to the original masterpiece game!
description: In 2007, the original puzzle action game 'Portal' was released, and received a number of prizes in the gaming industry. This is a figure of P-Body from 'Portal 2', the highly acclaimed sequel to the original game!

The P-Body is one of the playable androids in Portal 2's cooperative campaign, and has been brought to life as a figure with threeA's signature paintwork giving it an aged look, faithfully recreating the unique feeling of the Portal universe. Of course a portal gun is also included, and the camera eye on the center of his torso is fitted with a light. Be sure to display the P-Body together with the ATLUS, which will be released at the same time.
name: 3A x VALVe Portal 2 P-Body (3A x VALVe ぽーたる2 ぴーぼでぃ)

subtitle: The ATLUS from Portal 2, the sequel to the original masterpiece game!
description: In 2007, the original puzzle action game 'Portal' was released, and received a number of prizes in the gaming industry. This is a figure of ATLUS from 'Portal 2', the highly acclaimed sequel to the original game!

The ATLUS is one of the playable androids in Portal 2's cooperative campaign, and has been brought to life as a figure with threeA's signature paintwork giving it an aged look, faithfully recreating the unique feeling of the Portal universe. Of course a portal gun is also included, and the camera eye on the center of his torso is fitted with a light. Be sure to display the ATLUS together with the P-Body, which will be released at the same time.
name: 3A x VALVe Portal 2 Atlas (3A x VALVe ぽーたる2 あとらす)

subtitle: Snow Miku is here to bring you some Winter magic!
description: 2014 is Snow Miku's 5th anniversary year, and once again designs were added to the piapro website and the most popular was voted for on a live NicoNico Broadcast! The winning design of the 2014 Snow Miku was by dera_fury, who created a playful Snow Miku filled with magical girl charm! The pet to be included was a separate competition, and the selected design was 'Rabbit Yukine' illustrated by nekosumi – the two of them have now been transformed into the 2014 Nendoroid Snow Miku for a Winter that fans are sure to remember!

Included with the Nendoroid is a special spell book stand, her magic wand, effect parts, a magic circle as well as sitting parts are also all included! She even comes with special arm parts to display her hugging Rabbit Yukine instead of just holding her! All the parts you'll need for a truly magical experience with Snow Miku!!

subtitle: The admiral will now be preparing for his bath.
description: The very first in a brand new series of bath toys, the 'Bath Time Collection'! The first in the series is a collection of the Kanmusu girls, ready to dock in your bathtub!! The goods feature illustrations by the popular illustrator CHANxCO, and the set includes all sorts of goodies to enjoy!

There are sea chart calenders to decorate your bathroom with, and each has the launching date of the Kanmusu noted down - icon stickers are also included allowing you to transform the sea charts into your own! Dissolve the Akagi bath fizzie in your bath to give it the color of oil, true to a battleship! (But enjoy the fresh cypress smell!) Various other goodies are also included, and they'll be great to use with other upcoming additions to the Bath Time Collection series!
name: Bath Time Collection: KanColle Docking Set (おふろこれくしょん ～かんこれ にゅうきょせっと～)

subtitle: The third Tetsudou Musume Nendoroid is Sanriku Railway's Station Assistant, Mana Kamaishi!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Mana Kamaishi, the station assistant from Sanriku Railways! She can be posed in a variety of poses including her standard smiling pose and a dizzy pose! The Sanriku Railway's mascot character 'Santetsu-kun' is also included, which she can hold to advertise for the company! Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Alice Kuji to have the two Sanriku Railway characters working together!

As with the previous figures in the series, she also includes a 'cardboard box train' which she can wear to pretend to be a train by herself, or instead she can make use of the included rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well!
name: Nendoroid Mana Kamaishi (ねんどろいど かまいしまな)

subtitle: "Judgment desu no!"
description: From the popular anime series 'Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S' comes a Nendoroid of the teleporting member of Judgement, Kuroko Shirai! She comes with various optional parts such as handcuffs and her schoolbag including her iron arrow holster - allowing for a selection of poses from everyday scenes to combat scenes!

She even comes with an 'Onee-sama~♡' expression as well as some Gekota panties to show just how much she loves Mikoto! Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Mikoto Misaka and recreate your favorite scenes from the series!
name: Nendoroid Kuroko Shirai (ねんどろいど しらいくろこ)
copyright: ©鎌池和馬／冬川基／アスキー・メディアワークス／PROJECT-RAILGUN S

subtitle: The forth Tetsudou Musume Nendoroid is Hiroshima Electric Railway's Matoba Marina!
description: From 'Tetsudou Musume' comes a Nendoroid of Matoba Marina, the train driver from Hiroshima Electric Railway! She can be posed in a variety of poses including her confident standard pose as well as a cheerful pose as she munches her favorite treat, the momiji manjuu! Be sure to display her with the previously announced Nendoroid Miyuki Takano to have the two Hiroshima Electric Railway characters working together!

As with the previous figures in the series, she also includes a 'cardboard box train' which she can wear to pretend to be a train by herself, or instead she can make use of the included rope to share the fun with other characters in the series as well!
name: Nendoroid Matoba Marina (ねんどろいど まとばまりな)

subtitle: The diligent class representative wearing nothing but a red ribbon!
description: From the anime series 'Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru!' comes a figure of Konoe Tsuruma! She's known for the huge white ribbon she wears in her hair, but this time that isn't the only ribbon she's wearing - her whole body is wrapped up in nothing but a long red ribbon making for a rather daring outfit!

All the beautiful curves of her body are brought out by the tight ribbon, as she sits in a lady-like position with an innocent expression across her face. The other girls from the series are also planned to be joining her shortly, and having them all on display will be a treat for any fans of the series!
name: Konoe Tsuruma (つるま このえ)
series: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru!

subtitle: The cross-dressing beauty... wearing nothing but a black ribbon!
description: From the anime series 'Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru!' comes a figure of the beautiful girl who disguises herself as a man to watch over and protect Shougo, Ikusu Mizutani! This time around she isn't cross-dressing at all - she's instead showing off her body wearing nothing but a black ribbon, which shows off her body-line beautifully!
The other girls from the series are also planned to be joining her shortly, and having them all on display will be a treat for any fans of the series!

series: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru!

subtitle: The devoted messenger of love, who descended into the Netherworld!
description: From the ever-popular 'Disgaea' game series that began in 2003 comes a Nendoroid of the devoted angel, Flonne! She comes with two alternate expression parts including a fervent expression and a confused expression.

Her trademark blue ribbon and articulated angel wings have all been faithfully converted into Nendoroid form! Two of her favorite weapons - the bow and staff are also included, allowing you to create a number of combat scenes from the game! Be sure to display her together with Etna, who will be on sale around the same time!
name: Nendoroid Flonne (ねんどろいど ふろん)

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular anime series 'Fate/Zero' comes a figure of the young heroine from Fate/stay night, Rin Tohsaka, here to join Penguin Parade's Petanko series of figures! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Rin Tohsaka (ぺたんこ とおさかりん)

subtitle: The mysterious girl in an enticing swimsuit.
description: From the mystery/horror anime series 'Another' comes a figure of the series' main heroine, Mei Misaki, wearing the swimsuit seen on the cover of the 4th DVD volume. The pose features not only her school swimsuit, but also a light blue hoodie flapping around in the wind and also a straw hat that looks as if it's about to blow away as Mei holds it down. The entire figure faithfully keeps the mysterious feeling of Mei, while also showing off her cute side!

A separate expression with her eye-patch removed is also included, allowing you to display her with her artificial blue eye showing. The hoodie and straw hat can also be removed, allowing you to customize exactly how you want to display her!
name: Mei Misaki: Swimsuit Ver. (みさきめい みずぎVer.)
copyright: ©2012 綾辻行人・角川書店/「Another」製作委員会

subtitle: Cute chibi figures that can sit in the palm of your hand!
description: From the popular anime series 'Fate/Zero' comes a figure of the beautiful Saber wearing her armor, here to join Penguin Parade's Petanko series of figures! Petanko figures are chibi characters all sitting in the same cute pose, and all small enough to fit in the palm of your hand!
name: Petanko Saber (ぺたんこ せいばー)

subtitle: The foxy, 'good wife' delivered straight from Kenen Tomb!
description: From the PSP game 'Fate/EXTRA CCC' comes a 1/8th scale figure of the self-proclaimed 'good wife' servant, Caster!

Her outfit has changed from the Japanese-style outfit from Fate/EXTRA into a gothic lolita outfit with a slight bondage appeal to it. The ribbon in her hair, the frills on her clothes and even her tail make use of transparent parts for an even cuter appearance! ♪
name: Caster [Fate/EXTRA CCC] (きゃすたー ［フェイト/エキストラ CCC］)

subtitle: Pour some boiling water over wooser and enjoy a delicious treat!
description: wooser is collaborating with Belle Maison's popular 'Shirukuma Cafe' to create a special wooser edition of the tasty treat! Two different sets are available - one includes 'Hokkaido Aduki Beans and Chestnut Shiruko' and 'Sendai Specialty Soybean Shiruko', and the other includes 'Kyoumaccha Shiruko' and 'Kagoshima Potato and Chestnut Shiruko'.

All are carefully made and freeze-dried by the famous Kanagawa brand, Kagadane. A special Shirukuma original rubber strap is also included that isn't available anywhere else! Be sure to keep warm this Winter with some delicious oshiru!
* Inside each outer shell is freeze-dried oshiruko soup. Simply place it in a cup, add 80ml of boiling water and enjoy!
The set that includes all flavors together can be purchased from Karuzawa Online.
name: Shirukuma & wooser's Chummy Shiruko Sets (しるくまとうーさーのもっとなかよしるこせっと)

subtitle: The slightly bold Third Princess of Deviluke.
description: From the anime series 'To Love-Ru Darkness' comes a 1/6th scale of the gentle-looking schemer, Momo! She has been sculpted in a rather risqué bridal outfit, wearing nothing but sexy lingerie and a bridal veil!

The pure white lace, clear material used for the drape of her veil and detail put into her bouquet of roses all come together to create a very intricate figure for fans to enjoy! She's dressed up as a bride and ready to charm anyone that comes her way!
name: Momo Belia Deviluke (もも・べりあ・でびるーく)
copyright: © 矢吹健太朗・長谷見沙貴／集英社・とらぶるダークネス製作委員会

subtitle: The second set of Minicchu figures from IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls is here!
description: From the popular social game ‘THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS’ comes a second set of idols based on the adorable illustrations of Kengou Yakumo, here to join the chibi Minicchu series of figures from Phat! Company.

The second set includes Airi Totoki and Ranko Kanzaki, the two idols who were voted most popular in the first and second Cinderella Girl Elections respectively. The others in the set include Mika Jougasaki, Rika Jougasaki, Uzuki Shimamura, Sachiko Koshimizu, Koume Shirasaka and one secret character for a total of 8 different idols to collect!
name: Minicchu THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS 02 (みにっちゅ あいどるますたー しんでれらがーるず 02)

subtitle: The first member of the Data Processing Club who always sets a cheerful mood!
description: From the relaxed anime series 'Yuyushiki' comes a figure of the main heroine, Yuzuko Nonohara, wearing a delightful red swimsuit! She is sculpted in a youthful, energetic pose that shows off the fact that she has only just entered high school!
It's a figure that captures her fun-loving, energetic personality for fans to enjoy whenever they please!
name: Yuzuko Nonohara: Swimsuit Ver. (ののはらゆずこ みずぎVer.)

subtitle: "I've put together the fragments of chaos..."
description: From the anime series based on a mystery novel, 'GOSICK' comes a 1/8th scale figure of Victorique, the young detective who spends her days sitting in a rocking chair while reading books alone in the library tower of Saint Marguerite Academy.

She is wearing the cute, pink outfit covered with frills which was seen in episode 20 of the anime series, and is posed holding a pipe in one hand - ready to solve any mystery that comes her way! Her blond hair and blue eyes are beautiful enough to mistake her for a doll, and now fans can enjoy that beauty right by their side!
name: Victorique (う゛ぃくとりか)

Saber is known to be a valiant and confident character, however this figure captures her cuter side to remind everyone that there is more to her than meets the eye. It's a gentle, soft image of Saber for fans to enjoy whenever they like!

subtitle: The daughter of the demon king wearing a sexy open shirt!

The little ribbon on her panties has also been faithfully sculpted onto the figure creating a cute, sexy pose to charm any fans of the series!

subtitle: Gargantia's resident delivery girl, always filled with energy and curiosity!
description: From the anime series 'Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet' comes a figma of the series' heroine, Amy!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A gentle smiling face, a cheerful grinning face and a nervous face.
Optional parts include Amy's messenger bag as well as her large kite to pose her soaring through the air.
Amy's close friend and partner, Grace, is also included.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: The second Bakemonogatari Nendoroid is the twin-tailed elementary school student!
description: From the popular anime series 'Bakemonogatari' comes a Nendoroid of Mayoi Hachikuji! She comes with various expressions including a winking expression and a cute expression pulling a tongue to show her innocent and playful personality!

Her giant trademark backpack is also included, and it's just as big as you'd expect even in Nendoroid size! Other characters from Bakemonogatari are also planned to join the line-up soon, so she'll also have some others to display by her side soon!

She comes with two alternate expression parts including a grinning expression and a raging expression. Two of her favorite weapons - the bow and gun, are also included, allowing you to create a number of combat scenes from the game. Be sure to display her together with Flonne, who will be on sale around the same time!
name: Nendoroid Etna (ねんどろいど えとな)

subtitle: The super lucky girl is here in her gym uniform!
description: From the anime 'Binbou-gami Ga!' comes a figure of the super lucky, good-looking, smart and healthy main character of the series, Ichiko Sakura!

She is posed wearing her gym clothes consisting of bloomers and a jersey, in a pose that shows off her healthy figure as she swings around an 'oonuki'. She has a lovely smile across her face and is shining with 'happiness energy'! The God of Misfortune, 'Momiji' is currently in production, so fans can look forward to her too!

description: From the popular arcade game 'Border Break' comes a second scale figure of the system operator Fiona, also known as 'Opeko'. This time the figure is based on an illustration by Shunya Yamashita, and is absolutely packed with detail - even the binder she holds is incredibly detailed, and of course very confidential! Her sexy outfit, slim legs and captivating body are sure to charm you whether you're a fan of the game or not!
The figure faithfully keeps the feeling from Shunya Yamashita's illustration, creating a cute, sexy figure that fans can enjoy to their heart's content!

She also comes with a huge number of powerful weapons including the 'BILLION MAIDEN' Gatling Cannon, the 'MEGA DETH PARTY' miniature missile launcher, the 'MEGA DETH QUARTET' large missile launcher and even the laser cannons seen during her swansong!

The unique outfit which is also used by the team's racing queens has been beautifully sculpted to look just like the original illustration, and the figma design allows for an endless number of poses for fans to enjoy. She also comes with a parasol and clipboard to display her as a racing queen!
